bible.status: New Testament in Maasai/Arusha © Leipzig Lutheran Mission, 1964,1970.

chapter.verse: Enkitabu eiunoto e Yesus Kristos, enkerai e David, enkerai e Abraham.
Etoiwuo Abraham Isaak. Neiu Isaak Yakoob. Neiu Yakoob Yuda o lalashera lenyena;
neiu Yuda Peres o Seraa te Tamar; neiu Peres Esrom; neiu Esrom Raam;
neiu Raam Aminadab; neiu Aminadab Naashon; neiu Naashon Salmon;
neiu Salmon Boas te Rahab; neiu Boas Obed te Rut; neiu Obed Yese;
neiu Yese olkarsis David. Neiu David Salomo tʼengʼoroyoni e Uria:
neiu Salomo Rehabeam; neiu Rehabeam Abia; neiu Abia Asa;
neiu Asa Yosafat; neiu Yosafat Yoram; neiu Yoram Usiya;
neiu Usiya Yotam; neiu Yotam Ahas; neiu Ahas Hiskiya;
neiu Hiskiya Manase; neiu Manase Amon neiu Amon Yosiya;
neiu Yosiya Yekonya o lalashera lenyena tʼenkata enkibooroto te Babel.
Ore peishunye enkibooroto te Babel, neiu Yekonya Sealtiel; neiu Sealtiel Serubabel;
neiu Serubabel Abihud; neiu Abihud Eliakim; neiu Eliakim Asor;
neiu Asor Sadok; neiu Sadok Akim; neiu Akim Eliud;
neiu Eliud Eleasar; neiu Eleasar Matan; neiu Matan Yakoob;
neiu Yakoob Yosef, olmoruo le Maria natoiwuo Yesus, oji Kristos.

Akae, ore lajijik pookin eiter te Abraham metabaiki David, naa lajijik tomon o ong'wan; ore eiter te David metabaiki enkibooroto te Babel, lajijik tomon o ongʼwan; ore eiter tʼenkibooroto te Babel metabaiki Kristos, lajijik tomon o ong'wan.
Neaku eiunoto e Yesus Kristos nji: Ore Maria ng'otonye enye, esanjanita Yosef neton eitu enyikakino, nelioi emena tʼenkidimata Olmumua Sinyati.
Tiaraki nara Yosef oltung'ani supat, neitu eyeu neitukurru neyeu neing'ua ninye tʼemikio.

Ore eibirribirrita kuna, ng'orai, nelioi olmalaika lʼOlaitoriani te ninye tʼenkidetidetata ejo: Yosef, nakerai e David, miurei iamaa eng'oroyoni ino Maria, amu etaa emenai enye tʼenkidimata Olmumua Sinyati.
Nelaiu ninye enkerai olee nimpot engarna enye Yesus, amu ninye olaitopok olorere lenye tiatua nkitarruot enye.
Etaa kuna pookin, pebaia enairoro Olaitoriani tʼolayolounoni ejo:
Ng'orai, elamenai entito neiu enkerai olee, nepuo aaipot ninje engarna enye: Imanuel, ore enkitaalata enye: Eboitare yook Engai.
Ore peinyototo Yosef too njok, neitobir anaa peitanapa ninye olmalaika lʼOlaitoriani, neamaa eng'oroyoni enye.
Neitu eyolou ninye tukul, metabana nelaiu olkikau lenye; neipot engarna enye Yesus.
Ore peiuni Yesus te Betlehem e Yudaya, tʼenkata olkarsis Herodes, ng'orai, nepuonu lang'eni ooing'ua enkilepunoto engolong', nebau Yerusalem,
ejo: Kaji etii olotoiwuoki olkarsis loo Yudayoi? Amu kitadua olakira lenye tʼenkilepunoto engolong, nikietuo si yook aaserem ninye.
Ore pening' olkarsis Herodes kuna, neng'ayung'ayu ninye te nebo o Yerusalem pookin.
Ore peiturrur laidasak kituak pookin o layolok lʼesirata tiatua olorere, nesipunye ninje eneiunyeki Kristos.
Nejoki si ninje: Te Betlehem e Yudaya, amu neijia etisiraki tʼolayolounoni:
Ore iye, Betlehem, olosho le Yuda, mira kiti tukul too laigwenak le Yuda; amu epuku te iye olaiturukoni olairrita olorere lai Israel.
Ore peidipai, neipot Herodes lang'eni tʼenkilepata netum too ninje esiparoto enkata natalie olakira,
neutaki Betlehem, nejo: Embung'a engoitoi, entisiputu naleng' mbaak enkerai; ore pindipidipi aatadol, nikintayololo, peiye alotu si nanu aserem ninye.
Ore peidip aatoning' olkarsis, neibung' engoitoi, naa ng'orai, neiturukie ninje ilo akira lotadua tʼenkilepunoto engolong', metabana nelotu aitashe te shumata ene wueji netii enkerai.
Ore pedol ninje ilo akira, neng'ida tʼeng'ida kitok naleng'.
Nejing' aji nedol enkerai te nebo o Maria ng'otonye enye, nebatata aaserem ninye; nebolu masaa enye neisho ninye esahabu o emanoo narropil o eilata enkinyang'a nagol.
Neitanap Engai ninje tiatua enkidetidetata, pemerrinyokino Herodes; neim engai oitoi aapuo enkop enye.

Ore peidip aashom lelo, ng'orai, nelioi olmalaika lʼOlaitoriani te Yosef tiatua enkidetidetata, ejo: Tudumunye, toriko enkerai o ng'otonye, sikaki Misri, pibik te ina alo metabana naaliki iye; amu eyeu Herodes neing'oru ina kerai, peiminye.
Nedumunye ninye neibung' enkerai o ng'otonye kiarie nelo metabaiki Misri.
Nebik te ina alo, metabana nee Herodes, pebaia enairoro Olaitoriani tʼolayolounoni ejo: Aipoto enkerai ai aitung'ua Misri.

Ore pedol Herodes, ajo eteleja lang'eni ninye, negoro naleng', neirriwaa, peari nkera oo leak pookin naatii Betlehem o nkutot enyena pookin, eiter too noo larin aare o neitu eishu, tʼenkata natisipua too lang'eni.
Nebaia enairoro olayolounoni Yeremiya ejo:
Etoning'oki oltoilo te Rama, enkishirata kitok o olkiyoi; Rahel naishiraki nkera enyena, nemeitigirai, amu mekure etii.
Ore pee Herodes, ng'orai, nelioi olmalaika lʼOlaitoriani te Yosef tiatua enkidetidetata te Misri
ejo: Tudumunye, mbung'a enkerai o ng'otonye, mbung'a engoitoi alo olosho le Israel, amu etuata looing'orutua oltau lʼenkerai.
Nedumunye neibung' enkerai o ng'otonye nelotu olosho le Israel.
Kake ore pening', ajo eitorisho Arkelaos te Yudaya tʼewueji e Herodes lora menye, neurei elo ina alo; neroji tʼenkidetidetata, pelo metabaiki mbat e Galilaya.
Nelotu nebik tʼengang' naji Nasaret, pebaia enairoro layolounok aajo: Eipoti ninye Olnasarayos.
Nedumunye too nona olong'i Yohanes Olaibatisani neinosu lomon lʼEngai ti ang'ata e Yudaya
nejo: Entaalata! amu etinyikua enkarsishu e shumata.
Nera ninye ake ilo loiroro olayolounoni Yesaya otejo: Etii oltoilo lʼoloipotisho ti ang'ata: Entobira engoitoi Olaitoriani, entorioi nkiimat enyena!
Neishopito Yohanes openy olkila loo lpapit lʼendames o enkimeita enjoni tʼempolos enye; nera endaa enye ilmaat o naishi oo mulugi.
Nepuo enetii ninve lootii Yerusalem o Yudaya pookin o loshon pookin lʼembata e Yordan
neisho eibatis ninye ninje tiatua engare Yordan, neibalu nkitarruot enye.
Ore pedol ninye Ilfarisayoi o Sadukayoi kumok epuonu enetii enkibatisa enye, nejoki ninje: Ndai embeu oo lasuria, kang'ai otiaka ndai, ajo ilanyaanya engoro e akenya?
Akae, entoiu ilmomo sidan lʼenkitaalata!
Emijo too ltauja linyi aajo: Kiata papa lora Abraham. Amu aliki ndai, ajo eidim Engai ainyeyeki Abraham nkera tiatua kulo soito.
Eidipaki aatipik entolu entonata oljani; akae, ore oljani pookin lemeiu ilmomo sidan, nedung'i nenang'akini atua enkima.
Aibatis nanu ndai tʼengare, pitumutumu aataalata; ore ninye olotu tekurum ai egol naalang' nanu, namaiteu atanapa namuka enyena; elaibatis ninye ndai tʼOlmumua Sinyati o tʼenkima.
Neata enkutet enye tiatua engaina enye nelaor ninye naleng' eneisalaashishore, neiturrur entapa enye tʼembeje; kake ore suut nepej tʼenkima nememuta.
Nelotu Yesus eing'ua Galilaya metabaiki Yordan enetii Yohanes, peiye eibatisi ninye.
Kake etomitikio ilo ninye nejo: Eaku pikimbatis iye nanu, nilotu si iye enatii?
Nealiki ake Yesus nejoki: Tapala nena taata! amu meata kata nimikintabaia erioto pookin. Akae, neiruk ninye.
Ore peidipi aaibatisa Yesus, neilepu nabokata tʼengare; naa ng'orai, nebolo shumata, nedol ninye Olmumua lʼEngai edou anaa olmaitai nelotu shumata enye.
Naa ng'orai, neing'ua oltoilo shumata nejo: Nyele Oinoti lai lanyor oshipakino oltau lai.
Nerik Olmumua Yesus te ina kata ang'ata, peiye etem satan ninye.
Neitupukoo kion ngolong'i artam, dama o kiarie, netum tekurum olamei.
Nelotu olaitasuroni enetii ninye nejo: Teni ira Oinoti lʼEngai, ntanapa kulo soito, peaku endaa.
Nealiki nejo: Etisiraki: Meishiu oltung'ani tʼendaa ake, kake tʼororei pookin opuku tʼenkutuk Engai.
Neitoki arik satan ninye atua engang' sinyati neitasheye ninye tʼoldidio lʼengaji sinyati
nejoki ninye: Teni ira Oinoti lʼEngai, tusulakinoi enkop, amu etisiraki: Kintanapaki ilmalaikan lenyena, pekinap te shumata oo ngaik, pemikinkob osoit enkeju ino.
Nejoki Yesus ninye: Eitoki si asira: Mitem Olaitoriani, Engai ino!
Neitoki arik satan ninye shumata oldonyo oado naleng' neitadol ninye nkarsishuni pookin olmaa o enkitook enye
nejoki ninye: Aaisho iye kuna pookin, teni kibatatakino nikiserem.
Nejoki Yesus ninye: Nno, satan! amu etisiraki: Teserema Olaitoriani, Engai ino, syayaki ninye openy ake!
Neing'ua satan ninye, ng'orai, nepuonu ilmalaikan aaisyayaki ninye.
Ore pening' Yesus, ajo eteenaki Yohanes, nedumunye alo Galilaya.
Neing'ua engang' Nasaret nelotu aton te Kapernaum natii embata olbalbal, erishata e Sebulon o Naftali,
peiye ebaia enairoro olayolounoni Yesaya ojo:
Olosho le Sebulon o olosho le Naftali tʼembata engoitoi olbalbal, lido kekun le Yordan, o Galilaya oo loreren,
olorere otii atua enaimin, etadua ninye enkilang'et kitok; o kulo oototonitio tʼolosho o tʼoloip lʼenkea, eilepaka ninje enkilang'et.
Neiter Yesus te ina kata ainosu lomon lʼEngai ejo: Entaalata, amu etinyikua enkarsishu e shumata.
Nelimana Yesus tʼembata olbalbal le Galilaya nedol lalashera aare, Simon oji Petros, o Andreas, olalashe lenye, enang'aki rresheta enye atua olbalbal, amu era larreshok loo singir.
Nejoki ninje: Entusujaki, aitaa ndai larreshok loo ltung'anak!
Neing'ua nabokata rresheta enye nesuj ninye.
Ore peigut peno, nedol kulekai alashera aare, Yakobos le Sebedayos o Yohanes, olalashe lenye, te nebo o Sebedayos, menye lenye, tiatua engalawa, eripita rresheta enye; neipot ninje.
Neing'ua ninje nabokata engalawa o menye lenye, nesuj ninye.
Nemanaa Yesus te Galilaya pookin, eiteng'enisho too ngajijik Engai enye neinosu lomon lʼeng'ida lʼenkarsishu neishiunye moiyaitin pookin o menatishuitin pookin tiatua olorere.
Neibulu mbaak enyena atua Siria pookin. Neaki ninye loomoiyaa pookin, looibung'a nkeaitin o mioitin kumok, looata ilmeneng'a, looata olkiterriata, looata supeta, neishiunye ninje pookin.
Nesuj isiamin kumok ninye eing'ua Galilaya o Manyat tomon o Yerusalem o Yudaya o lido kekun le Yordan.
Ore pedol ninye siamin, neilepaki oldonyo neton; nepuonu laiteng'enuok enetii ninye.
Nebol enkutuk enye neiteng'en ninje ejo:
Teshi loora laisinak lʼolmumua, amu era enkarsishu Engai enenye.
Teshi looata enkilishoto, amu epuoi aaitigir lelo.
Teshi loobor, amu epuo aajung'u lelo enkop.
Teshi looata olamei o enkure esupato, amu epuo aaraposho lelo.
Teshi loonana oshuak, amu epuoi aaibung'aki engoshoke nanana.
Teshi looibor iltauja, amu epuo aadol lelo Engai.
Teshi loonyor eseriani, amu epuoi aaipot lelo nkera Engai.
Teshi looinyali tʼolbae lʼesupato, amu enenye enkarsishu e shumata.
Irara ndai teshi, teni emor neinyal iltung'anak ndai neiro ntorrok too ndai tʼolbae lai, elejisho.
Enting'idata, entagoluoto, amu kitok olkwaje linyi te shumata. Amu neijia einyala ninje layolounok looiturukie ndai.
Irara ndai emakat olmaa. Kake teni etarruoiye emakat — kainyo epiki, pejing'aa? Meitoki aaku tukul, kake eiturrakini boo, neroro olorere ninye.
Irara ndai enkilang'et olmaa. Meidim engang' aisudori natii enetala.
Nemeinok iltung'anak enkilang'et nepik kop olkisembe, kake epik shumata enkibung'et, peilang'aki pookin lootii atua aji.
Neijia njeilang'isho enkilang'et inyi tʼengomom oo ltung'anak, petum aatadol nkitobirat inyi sidan, peitadaraa Minyi linyi otii shumata.
Emijo, aajo aewuo nanu, paar nkitanapat o layolounok; me, eitu alotu, paar ninje, kake aewuo, paitabaia.
Amu japa aliki ndai: Metabana nemuta shumata o enkop, memuta oltipoto arashu oltili obo loo nkitanapat oo metaa pookin.

Akae, ore oltung'ani omen enkitanapata nabo too kuna kutiti neiteng'en iltung'anak nji, neipoti olkiti tukul tiatua enkarsishu e shumata: ore oltung'ani loitobir neiteng'enu ninje, neipoti ilo olkitok tiatua enkarsishu e shumata.
Amu aliki ndai: Teni melang' esupato inyi esupato oo layolok lʼesirata o noo Lfarisayoi, nimijing'ijing'i enkarsishu e shumata tukul.
Itoning'o, aajo etiakaki iltung'anak le opa: Miar metua; oloar metua, meata kata nemeigwenakini.

Kake aliki nanu ndai: Ologoroki olalashe lenye, meata kata nemeigwenakini; olojoki olalashe lenye: Mira toki! meata kata nemeigwenakini tiatua esiamu; olojo ake: Kimba Engai! meata kata nemear ninye enkima nememuta.
Akae, teni iau enkishooroto ino olperere lʼenkidasare nidamu te ina alo, ajo kiataiye olalashe lino ororei,
tung'ai enkishooroto ino tʼengomom olperere lʼenkidasare, nno, tang'asa ntobirakinore olalashe lino, pitum atorrinyoi, pintarasaa enkishooroto ino.
Ntobirakinore olaitang'oroni lino asioki, epon iriamunyenye t'engoitoi, pimikirik ele aitang'oroni lino enetii olaigwenani, nikintarasaki olaigwenani ngaik olaisyayani, pikieni.
Japa, aaliki iye: Mipuku tiatua tukul, metabana nindip atalaa empesai enkiting'oto.
Itoning'o, aajo etiakaki iltung'anak le opa: Miar enkidikidikoto olmoruo o eng'oroyoni!
Kake aliki nanu ndai: Oloing'oraa eng'oroyoni neng'war ninye, eidipa ilo ataara enkidikidikoto olmoruo o eng'oroyoni tiatua oltau lenye.
Teni kintapong'oo engong'u ino e tatene, tukurtu ninye, nturraki enelakwa; amu eikash te iye, teni eimin embata ino nabo, nemenang'akini osesen lino olulung'a atua enkima e gehena.
Teni kintapong'oo engaina ino e tatene, tudung'o ninye, nturraki enelakwa, amu eikash te iye, teni eimin embata ino nabo, pemelo osesen lino olulung'a atua gehena.
Etejoki si: Teni eing'ua oltung'ani eng'oroyoni enye, njeisho ninye empalai erishata.

Kake aliki nanu ndai: Oloing'ua eng'oroyoni enye neme too mbaak entalare, eitaa ninye, peaku engaarani enkidikidikoto olmoruo o eng'oroyoni; ore oloamu enatung'aiyoki, near ninye enkidikidikoto olmoruo o eng'oroyoni. Mindimidimi aaisyayakiti Engai o mamon (masaa).
Ninyaakitia si aaning', aajo etiakaki iltung'anak le opa: Minturuj ilejisho, kake ntabaiki Olaitoriani nkiturujat inono.
Kake aliki nanu ndai: Minturujishore tukul, neme shumata, amu ninye olorika lʼEngai;
neme baiki enkop, amu ninye eiteleiki Engai nkejek enyena; neme baiki Yerusalem, amu ninye engang' olkarsis kitok.
Minturujishore baiki elukunya ino, amu mindim aitaala olpapita o obo, peiborru arashu eroku.
Njeaku rorei linyi: Ee, ee; me, me! Enalang' kulo, nepukunye oltorrono.
Itoning'o, aajo etejoki: Engong'u tʼengongʼu, olalai tʼolalai!
Kake aliki nanu ndai: Emigilunore entorroni! kake olikiosh eseder e tatene, mbelekenyaki ninye en e are!
Ore olikintang'or nikioru emekiti, tung'aiki ninye baiki oliopore!
Ore olikintanapaki pintare emaili nabo, turubare too are!
Olikiomonu, njoo ninye! olikisilen, minjo empiding'!
Itoning'o, aajo etejoki: Tonyorra ol elatia ino nimbai olmang'atinda lino!
Kake aliki nanu ndai: Entonyor ilmang'ati linyi; entamayan loodek ndai; entobirakiti sidan looiba ndai; entasayakiti looitarriki neinyal ndai,
peiye iakuku nkera e Minyi linyi otii shumata; amu eisho ninye, peilepaki engolong' enye iltorrok o sidan, neshaiki enjan enye loora supati o lemera supati.
Amu teni inyorrurru loonyor ndai — kalo kwaje itumutumu? Meiko neijia baiki laoshok le kodi?
Ore piborrurru too lalashera linyi ake — kaa ponata inkoko? Meiko neijia baiki lemeata Engai?
Onaa meata kata nimintabaiaia aten anaa peata Minyi linyi le shumata enkitabaiaroto.
Eng'orai, piminjoioio nkishoorot inyi t'engomom oo ltung'anak, peiye edol ninje ndai; amu teni inkoko neijia, mitumutumu olkwaje te Minyi linyi otii shumata.

Akae, teni injooio enkishooroto ino, miosh esekegwa tʼengomom ino anaa peiko laitusupatuok tiatua ngajijik Engai o too ngoitoi, peiye eitadaraa iltung'anak ninje. Japa, aliki ndai: Eidipa aainoto ninje olkwaje lenye.
Kake teni injooio iye enkishooroto, njoo meyolo engaina ino e kedyanye enaitobirita engaina ino e tatene,
peshuma enkishooroto ino; nikirrinyoki Minyi lino lodolita nashuma, tʼewuas.

Teni isaishosho, eminyanyukie laitusupatuok, amu enyor aatasaishoto eitashe tiatua ngajijik Engai o too rishat oo ngoitoi, peiye eitadaraa iltung'anak ninje. Japa, aliki ndai: Eidipa aainoto olkwaje lenye.
Kake teni isaisho iye, tijing'a olgilata lino, ngeno kutukaji ino, pisai Minyi lino ishuma; nikirrinyoki Minyi lino lodolita nashuma, tʼewuas.
Teni isaishosho, emiyang'iyang' anaa iltungʼanak lemeata Engai; amu ejo ninje, eningʼi, tiaraki naa kumok rorei lenye.
Akae, eminyanyukiei lelo! Eyolo Minyi linyi, enimindimidimi aatalaita, eton eitu iomonunu ninye.
Akae, entasaishoto ndai nji: Papa lang' litii shumata, njesinyari engarna ino!
Njelotu enkarsishu ino! Njeaku eyeunoto ino tʼenkop anaa peaku te shumata!
Njoo yook taata endaa ang' nabaiki yook!
Tung'aiki yook silen inono, anaa piking'uaiki si yook loo silen ang'!
Mirik yook atua enkitasuroto, kake ntopua yook tʼentorroni! Amu era enino enkarsishu o engolon o enkitook nkatan pookin. Amen.
Amu teni ing'uaikiki iltung'anak nkitarruot enye, neing'uaiki baiki ndai Minyi linyi le shumata.
Kake teni ming'uaikiki iltung'anak nkitarruot enye, nemeingʼuaiki baiki Minyi linyi ndai nkitarruot inyi.
Teni ipukooko, eminyanyukiei laitusupatuok ooata nkirribon naasoto, amu eitaal nkirribon enye, pelioi too ltung'anak, aajo etupukoitie. Japa, aliki ndai: Eidipa aainoto ninje olkwaje lenye.
Kake teni ipukoo iye, ielie eilata elukunya misuj engomom ino,
pimilioi too ltung'anak itupukoiye, kake te Minyi lino oshuma; nikirrinyoki Minyi lino odolita nashuma, tʼewuas.
Eminturrurroki aten masaa tʼenkop, peitarruo lai-ng'ur o endoran, nejing'aki lapurrok nepurroo;
kake enturrurroki aten masaa te shumata nemeitarruo laing'ur, baiki endoran, nemejing'aki lapurrok aapuroo.
Amu enetii masaa inono, naa ine etii oltau lino.
Nera engongʼu enkilang'et osesen. Akae, ten aa sidai engong'u ino, neata osesen lino pookin enkilang'et;
kake ten aa torrono engong'u ino, neaku osesen lino pookin enaimin. Akae, teni era enkilang'et natii atua iye enaimin — kaa aimin ina!
Metii oltung'ani oidim aisyayaki laitoriak aare; amu elaibai obo nenyorru oliare, arashu eibung' obo nemenu oliare.
Onaa aliki ndai: Emiekenyakino empuan inyi eninyanya o eniokioko, baiki seseni linyi eninjopishopo. Melang' empuan endaa? nemelang' osesen olkila?
Eng'orai ntaritik e shumata, aajo meun nemeisambu nemeiturrur ninje too mbejen, kake eitoti Minyi linyi le shumata ninje. Miororere ndai aalang' ninje?
Kang'ai too ndai loidim ateekenyai, pepon engadoro enye engaina nabo?
Ainyo piekenyakinono ilkilani? Eng'orai ntapuka enkuruma eneiko teni ebulu: meitobir ninje enkyas nemeshetisho.
Aliki ndai, ajo eitu eishopi baiki Salomo tʼenkitook enye pookin anaa nabo too nena.
Teni eishop Engai olkujita lʼenkuruma nji, lotii taata nenang'akini taisere enkima — me naleng' eishop ndai, ndai lʼenkirukoto kinyi?
Akae, emiekenya aajo: Ainyo kinya arashu ainyo kiok arashu ainyo kinjop?
Eing'oru loreren lemeata Engai kuna pookin; amu eyolo Minyi linyi le shumata, ajo mindimidimi aatalaita kuna pookin.
Entang'as eng'orutu enkarsishu Engai o esupato enye, neponikini ndai kuna pookin.
Akae, emiekenyakino entaisere, amu eshilaa entaisere mbaak enyena. Ebaiki neata engolong' pookin entorroni enye.
Emingwenaki, pemeigwenakini ndai.
Amu ore enkigwena ningwenunu, ninye epuoi aaigwenakinye ndai; ore entemet nitemishorere, ninye epuoi aatemakinye ndai.
Ainyo ping'oraa iye embajuai natii engong'u olalashe lino nimidol olmuambai otii engong'u ino?
Arashu kaji inko teni ijoki olalashe lino: Ntasho, ayeu naaitaiki iye embajuai tʼengong'u ino, — naa ng'orai, etii olmuambai tʼengong'u ino?
Iye laitusupatuoni, tang'asa ntai olmuambai otii engong'u ino, pitum atadua naleng' aitai embajuai tʼengong'u olalashe lino.
Eminjo ildiain naara sinyat, niminang'akiki ilpusi linyi engomom oo lbitiro, pemeroruaki enkop too nkejek enye, nemeibelekenya aapolos ndai.
Entoomonutu, neishori ndai; eng'orutu, nitumutumu; entooshiosh, nebolokini ndai.
Amu oloomonu, neng'amu; oloing'oru, netum; olooshiosh, nebolokini.
Kalo tung'ani too ndai loata enkerai, teni eomonu olmkate — keisho osoit?
Arashu teni eomonu osingirri — keisho olasurai?
Akae, teni iyololo ndai lirara torrok aaishoo nkera inyi nkishoorot sidan, me naleng' eisho minyi linyi le shumata sidan loomonu ninye!
Akae, ore pookin niyeuu neitobiraki iltung'anak ndai, nji entobirakiti si ndai ninje. Nera ina nkitanapat o layolounok.
Eima kishomi napirik, amu elala kishomi naa dapash engoitoi naitahaia enkiminata, naa kumok kulo looim ina.
Nepirik ake kishomi, naa rongai engoitoi naitahaia empuan, naa kuti kulo lootum ninye.
Entaduai aten too layolounok lʼelejare loopuonu enitiiti, ooishopito ndapan oo nkerra, kake ore tiatua naa suiyan malmalin.
Iyolouu ninje too lmomo lenye. Keisambuni lama too lbibia, arashu ilng'abolo too ntulele?
Neijia eiu oljani sidai ilmomo sidan, neiu oljani torrono ilmomo torrok.
Meidim oljani sidai atoiu ilmomo torrok, nemeidim atoiu oljani torrono ilmomo sidan.
Ore oljani lemeiu ilmomo sidan, nedung'i nenang akini enkima.
Akae, ipuopuo aayolou ninje too lmomo lenye.
Mejing' oltung'ani pookin laajoki: Laitoriani, Laitoriani! enkarsishu e shumata, kake ele ake loitobir enayeu Papa lai le shumata.
Kumok laapuo aajoki te ina olong': Laitoriani, Laitoriani! eitu kintayolou mbaak e akenya tʼengarna ino? Eitu kimir ilmeneng'a Tengarna ino? Eitu kintobir nkitobirat engolon kumok tʼengarna ino?
Te ine alaibalaki ninje: Eitu ayolou ndai tukul; entung'aiyoki, ndai looitobir ntorrok.
Akae, ore oltung'ani pookin loning' kulo rorei neitobir ninje, naitanyanyukie ninye olee ng'en lotesheta engaji enye te shumata osoit.
Esha enjan nelotu engare kitok nekutishoi olkutati neipony ena aji nemeurori, amu etii entonata enye atua osoit.
Ore oltung'ani pookin loning' kulo rorei nemeitobir, naitanyanyukie ninye olee modai lotesheta engaji enye tiatua osunyai.
Nesha enjan nelotu engare kitok nekutishoi olkutati neipony ena aji, neurori neaku kitok erratanyata enye.
Neaku ore peidip Yesus kulo rorei, neiputukuny siamin tʼenkiteng'enare enye,
amu eiteng'ena ninye anaa oloata engolon, neme neijia anaa layolok lʼesirata.
Ore pedou tʼoldonyo, nesuj isiamin kumok ninye.
Naa ng'orai, nelotu oltung'ani obo loata enkea oo lbolot neserem ninye, ejo: Laitoriani, teni iyeu, nikindim aisuja.
Neitorioo Yesus engaina enye neing'unye ninye nejo: Ayeu, sujai! Neisujunye nabokata enkea enye oo lbolot.
Nejoki Yesus ninye: Ng'orai, pimiliki oltung'ani, kake nno, pintadol kion olaidasani, pinjooio enkishooroto naitanapua Mose, peaku enjakenishu too ninje.
Ore pejing' Yesus Kapernaum, nelotu olkigeluni obo loo lmurran enetii ninye nesai ninye:
nejo: Laitoriani, eirrag olaisyayani lai tiatua aji, emoi osupetai nemeikini torrono naleng'.
Nejoki Yesus ninye: Alotu paishiunye ninye.
Nealiki olkigeluni loo lmurran ninye nejo: Laitoriani, mara toki, pijing' iye abori e keperaji ai, kake tolimu ororei obo ake, neishiu olaisyayani lai.
Amu ara si nanu oltung'ani otii abori enkitoria, naata ilmurran tiabori ai. Teni ajoki obo: Nno! nelo; o olekai: Wou! nelotu; o olaisyayani lai: Ntobira ena! neitobir.
Ore pening' Yesus ena, neiputukuny nejoki kulo lootusuja ninye: Japa, aliki ndai, eitu aikata adol tiatua Israel enkirukoto kitok anaa ena.
Kake aliki ndai: Kumok loopuonu eing'ua enkilepunoto o endoiyoroto engolong' netoni te nebo o Abraham o Isaak o Yakoob tʼenkarsishu e shumata,
kake eiturrakini nkera enkarsishu atua enaimin e aulo; netii ina alo enkishirata o eonyoto oo lala.
Nejoki Yesus olkigeluni loo lmurran: Nno, njeaku neijia anaa piruko! Neishiu olaisyayani lenye te ina kata ake.
Ore pelotu Yesus engaji e Petros, nedol engaputani enye eirrag, emoi oltikana.
Neibung' engaina enye neingʼuaiki oltikana ninye. Neinyototo neisyayaki ninye.
Ore peaku teipa, nerikoki ninje ninye ilkumok looata ilmenengʼa, nemir ilmeneng'a too rorei neishiunye loomoiyaa,
peiye ebaia enairoro olayolounoni Yesaya, ejo: Nedumaki ninye kion menatishuitin ang', nenap nkeaitin ang.
Ore pedol Yesus siamin kumok emanita ninye, neitanapu, pelangʼaa aabaiki lido kekun.
Nelotu olayoloni obo lʼesirata nejoki ninye: Laiteng'enani, ayeu naasuj iye tʼewueji pookin nilo.
Nejoki Yesus ninye: Eata ntirrashin ngumot neata ntaritik singin, kake meata Enkerai oltung'ani eneiteleiki elukunya enye.
Nejoki olekai tiatua laiteng'enuok lenyena ninye: Laitoriani, njooki, pang'as alanuk papa lai.
Nejoki Yesus ninye: Tusujaki iye, tapala lootuata metunuka lootuata lenye.
Neilepaki ninye engalawa nesuj laitengʼenuok lenyena ninye.
Naa ng'orai, nejing' enkiposhiposhata kitok atua olbalbal neopoo lopir lʼengare engalawa; neirura ninye.
Nepuonu laitengʼenuok lenyena enetii ninye neinyeye ninye nejo: Laitoriani, ntopua yook, kimin!
Nejoki ninje: Ainyo pirara kureti, ndai lʼenkirukoto kinyi? Neinyototo nebuaki olkutati o olbalbal; neaku olgira kitok.
Neiputukuny ake iltung'anak nejo: Kalo tung'ani ele loning' olkutati o olbalbal ninye?
Ore pebaiki ninye lido kekun atua olosho loo Lgadarenoi, netumore ninye iltung'anak aare looata ilmeneng'a eing'ua nkuraren, malmalin naleng', neitu eiteu oltung'ani aima baiki ena oitoi.
Naa ng'orai, nedar tʼoltoilo nejo: Ainyo kiataiye yook iye, Yesus, Oinoti lʼEngai? Amaa, iewuo ene, pintame yook, eitu ebau enkata?
Netii enelakwaniki ninje emboo oo lbitiro looirrititai.
Nesai ilmeneng'a ninye nejo: Teni imir yook, njoo yook, pikijing' atua emboo oo lbitiro.
Nejoki ninje: Enjom! Nepuku nejing' atua ilbitiro. Naa ng'orai, nesulakino emboo pookin aasioki tʼemarti atua olbalbal nee tʼengare.
Nekwet lairritak nepuo engang' neinosu mbaak pookin naataa o mbaak oo kulo looata ilmeneng'a.
Naa ng'orai, nepuku engang' pookin alanang'are Yesus. Ore pedol ninye, nesai, pepuku too mbatai enye.
Neilepaki ninye engalawa nelang' nebaia engang' enye.
Naa ng'orai, nerikoki ninje oltamoiyai lʼosupetai oirragieki tʼerruat. Ore pedol Yesus enkirukoto enye, nejoki ele tamoiyai lʼosupetai: Ntagoluoi tʼoltau, nakerai ai, kintaikiaki nkitarruot inono.
Naa ng'orai, nejo ematua oo layolok lʼesirata tiatua aten: Emor ele Engai.
Ore peyolou Yesus nkibirribirrat enye, nejo: Kaji etiu, pimbirribirrirri ntorrok too ltauja linyi?
Kaa nalelek; teni ajo: Kintaikiaki nkitarruot inono, arashu: Nyototoi, tilimanai?
Kake piyolouu, aajo eata Enkerai oltung'ani engolon naitaunye nkitarruot tʼenkop, nejoki ele tamoiyai lʼosupetai: Nyototoi, tudumu erruat ino, nno ang'!
Neinyototo nelo ang'.
Ore pedol isiamin ena, neiputukuny neitadaraa Engai naishoo iltung'anak engolon naba nji.
Ore peing'ua Yesus ina alo, nedol oltung'ani eton tʼeneitainyeki kodi, oji engarna enye Matayos, nejoki ninye; Tusujaki! Neinyototo nesuj ninye.
Neaku, ore peton ninye tʼengaji, pedaa, naa ng'orai, nepuonu laoshok le kodi kumok o laitarruok, netoni te nebo o Yesus o laiteng'enuok lenyena.
Ore pedol Ilfarisayoi ina, nejoki ninje laiteng'enuok lenyena: Ainyo pedaa olaiteng'enani linyi te nebo o laoshok le kodi o laitarruok?
Ore pening' Yesus ina, nejoki ninje: Meyeu loora biot olaishiunoni, kake loomoiyaa.
Embung'a engoitoi ake, enteng'enuoto enkitaalata oo kulo rorei: Anyor eng'adunoto neme enkidasare. Eitu alotu nanu, paipot supati, kake laitarruok, petum aataalata.
Nepuonu te ina kata laiteng'enuok le Yohanes enetii ninye nejo: Ainyo pikipukoo yook o Ilfarisayoi aigil kumok nemepukoo laiteng'enuok linono?
Nejoki Yesus ninje: Keidim iltung'anak lʼengiama aaishira, epon eboitare ninje osanja? Kake epuonu ngolong'i neoruni ninje osanja, nepukoo te ina kata.
Metii oltung'ani opik erashet olkila ng'ejuk atua olkila musana; amu epolos ena rashet olkila neaku empolosata torrono naleng'.
Nemepiki olmarua ng'ejuk atua ilbenia musan; teni epiki, nepolosa ilbenia neibukori olmarua, nerruoio ilbenia. Kake epiki olmarua ng'ejuk atua ilbenia ng'ejuko, nepoku pokira are.
Ore epon eliki ninje kuna, ng'orai, nelotu olkitok obo negilaki ninye kung' nejo: Etua entito ai taata nji, kake wou, pinteleiki engaina ino, pepiu.
Nedumunye Yesus nesuj ninye te nebo o laiteng'enuok lenyena.
Naa ng'orai, nelotu tekurum enye eng'oroyoni nabo naata empukunoto osarge enkata oo larin tomon o are, neporoo enaipukoi olkila lenye;
amu etejo tʼoltau lenye: Teni aporoo ake enaipukoi olkila lenye, naishiu.
Neibelekenya Yesus nedol ninye nejoki: Ntagoluoi tʼoltau, entito ai, enkirukoto ino nikintopua. Neishiu ena ng'oroyoni eiter te ina kata.
Ore pebaia Yesus engaji olkitok nedol lakutak loo nkisuleta o enkiposhiposharoto olorere,
nejoki ninje: Ewuang'a! amu eitu ee entito, eirura. Nekweniye ninye.
Ore peitupukuni olorere, nejing'aki neibung' engaina enye, neinyototo entito.
Neibulaa kuna baak atua ilo osho pookin.
Ore peing'ua Yesus te ina alo, nesuj ninye ilmodook aare, edarita nejo: Tokordu yook, nakerai e David!
Ore pebaia ang' nepuonu ilmodook enetii ninye. Nejoki Yesus ninje: Irukuruku, aajo aidim aitobira kuna? Nejoki ninje: Ee, Laitoriani!
Neporoo ninye ngonyek enye nejo: Njeaku neijia anaa piruko.
Nebolo ngonyek enye. Neiture Yesus ninje nejo: Eng'orai, pemeyolou oltung'ani o obo.
Kake nepuku neibulunye ninye atua ilo osho pookin.
Ore pepuku lelo, nerikokini ninye oltung'ani lemeidim airoro neata ilmeneng'a.
Ore pemiri olmeneng'ani, neiro leitu eidim airoro. Neiputukuny isiamin nejo: Eitu edoli tʼewueji o nabo tiatua Israel nji.
Nejo ake Ilfarisayoi: Emir ninye ilmeneng'a tʼolkitok loo lmeneng'a.
Nemanaa Yesus tiatua ngang'itie kituak o kutiti neiteng'enisho tiatua ngajijik Engai enye neinosu lomon lʼeng'ida lʼenkarsishu neishiunye nkeaitin pookin o menatishuitin pookin tʼempolos olorere.
Ore pedol ninye siamin, neibung'aki ninje engoshoke nanana, amu etanaurate neisardaka anaa ntare nemeata oljokut.
Nejoki ninye laiteng'enuok lenyena: Kitok enkisambuare naa kuti laitobirak;
akae, entasai Olaitoriani lʼenkisambuare, peirriwaa laitobirak atua enkisambuare enye.
Neipot ninye laiteng'enuok lenyena tomon o are neisho ninje engolon too lmumuan ooiduruk, pemir ninje neishiunye nkeaitin pookin o menatishuitin pookin.
Ore ngam oo lairriwak tomon o are ninje kuna: ol elukunya Simon oipotoki Petros, o Andreas, olalashe lenye; Yakobos le Sebedayos o Yohanes, olalashe lenye;
Filipos o Bartolomayos; Tomas o Matayos, olaoshoni le kodi; Yakobos le Alfayos; Lebayos oipotoki Tadayos:
Simon Olkananayos o Yudas Iskariotes oitarasaiye ninye.
Neirriwaa Yesus kulo tomon o are neitanap ninje nejo: Emiim ngoitoi oo loreren lemeata Engai, emijing' atua ngang'itie oo Samareites,
kake enaikash enjom enetii nkerra naaimina engaji Israel.
Enjom ake, enosai, entejo: Etinyikua enkarsishu e shumata!
Enjiunye loomoiyaa, esuja looata enkea oo lbolot, entopiu lootuata entimir ilmeneng'a. Inoto pesho, enjooi pesho!
Eminap esahabu, baiki ngoshola, baiki mpesai tiatua nkimeitan inyi,
arashu olbene lʼolototo arashu ilkilani aare arashu namuka arashu olartat; amu eaku, petum olaitobirani loo nkyasin endaa enye.
Ore engang' pookin, kitok arashu enkiti, nijing'ijing'i, eng'orutu oltung'ani Ioaku; entobik te nebo o ninye metabana nipukuku.
Teni ijing'ijing'i engaji, erorokiti ninye;
teni eaku ena aji, nejing'aki eseriani inyi atua ninye; teni meaku, nerrinyokino ndai eseriani inyi.
Teni meitoomon oltung'ani ndai nemening' rorei linyi, entupukutu te ina aji o te ina ang', empiripiroi enterit oo nkejek inyi.
Japa, aliki ndai; Eikashieki Sodom o Gomora tʼengolong' enkigwena e akenya nelang' ina ang'.
Eng'orai, airriwaa nanu ndai anaa nkerra atua suiyan; onaa enteng'enuoto anaa lasuria nimiatata olosek anaa ilmaita.
Entaduai aten tiatua iltung'anak! Amu epuo aaitarasaki ndai atua nkigwenaitin enye nepuo aar ndai tiatua ngajijik Engai enye;
neriki ndai ngomomi oo laiturukok o noo lkarsisi tʼolbae lai, peaku enjakenishu too ninje o too loreren lemeata Engai.
Kake teni eitarasaa ninje ndai, eming'ayung'ayu aajo kainyo kilimu, amu eishori ndai te ina kata ake enilimumu;
amu me ndai ooiro, kake Olmumua le Minyi linyi oiro tiatua ndai.
Neitarasaa olalashe olalashe lenye, petum atua, o menye enkerai enye, nedumakino nkera lootoiutuo ninje, neisho metaari metuata.
Neibai ndai iltung'anak pookin tʼolbae Tengarna ai; kake olong'iri metabaiki enkiting'oto, ninye olapok.
Teni einyal ninje ndai tiatua engang' nabo, enkwetikiti engai. Japa, aliki ndai: Mipuopuo aaidip ngang'itie pookin e Israel, metabana nelotu Enkerai oltung'ani.
Melang' olaiteng'enuoni olaiteng'enani lenye o olaisyayani olaitoriani lenye.
Ebaiki olaiteng'enuoni peaku anaa olaiteng'enani, o olaisyayani anaa olaitoriani. Teni eipoto ninje olopeny engaji Beelsebul, me naleng' eipot neijia kulo loora lʼengaji enye!
Akae, emiurei ninje! Metii embae naisudori nemelo abolunye tekurum, nemetii entoki emikio nemeyolouni.
Enaliki ndai tʼenaimin, entolimutu tiatua enkilang'et; ore enining'ining'i tʼenking'oming'om, enosutu too nkeperi oo ngajijik.
Emiurei looar osesen metua nemeidim aataar olmumua metua; sidai, teni iureii ele loata engolon naiminye osesen o olmumua te gehena enkima.
Meinyang'uni nkipaikut are tʼempesai nabo? Kake medoiki o nabo too ninje enkop nemeyolo Minyi linyi.
Eikenaki baiki ilpapit linyi pookin lʼelukunya.
Akae, emiurei! Irara ndai sidan nilang'ilang'a nkipaikut kumok.
Olaaibalu nanu tʼengomom oo ltung'anak, naibalu si nanu ninye tʼengomom e Papa lai le shumata;
olaamiki nanu tʼengomom oo ltung'anak, nayeu namiki si nanu ninye tʼengomom e Papa lai le shumata.
Emijo, aajo aewuo nanu, paau eseriani; me, eitu alotu, paau eseriani, kake olalem.
Amu aewuo nanu, pairriki oltung'ani o menye lenye, entito o ng'otonye enye, esyayunoti o engaputani enye;
neaku ilmang'ati lʼoltung'ani kulo lootii engaji enye.
Olonyor menye arashu ng'otonye naalang' nanu, nemeaku olalai; olonyor olaiyoni lenye arashu entito enye naalang' nanu, nemeaku olalai.
Olemedumu esalaba enye, paasuj tekurum ai, nemeaku olalai.
Oloyeu netum empuan enye, nelaiminye ninye; ore oloiminye empuan enye tʼolbae lai, nelatum ninye.
Oloitoomon ndai, naaitoomon nanu; olaaitoomon nanu, neitoomon olaairriua.
Oloitoomon olayolounoni tʼengarna olayolounoni, nelang'amu olkwaje l'olayolounoni; oloitoomon osupat tʼengarna osupat, nelang'amu olkwaje lʼosupat.
Oloitook obo too kulo kunyinyi tʼeoket engare nairobi ake tʼengarna olaiteng'enuoni, japa, aliki ndai, melau ninye tukul olkwaje lenye.
Ore peidip Yesus aitanapa laiteng'enuok lenyena tomon o are, nepuku te ina alo neiteng'enisho neinosu lomon lʼEngai tiatua ngang'itie enye.
Ore pening' Yohanes tiatua engaji eenata nkitobirat e Kristos, neirriwaa laiteng'enuok lenyena aare,
pejoki ninye: Ira iye ololotu arashu kianyu olekai?
Nealiki Yesus nejoki ninje: Embung'a engoitoi, enosakiti Yohanes nining'itoto o nidolitata:
edolisho ilmodook, nelimana lemeidim aashom, neisuja looata enkea oo lbolot, nening'isho ilming'an, neitopiuni lootuata, neinosakini laisinak lomon lʼeng'ida;
naa tesh oltung'ani lamaarikare nanu.
Ore peing'ua ninje ninye, neiter Yesus aliki siamin mbaak e Yohanes: Kainyo ishomo ndai aaing'oraa ti ang'ata? Itayeutuo nidolidolo olperesi ong'uyanita olkutati?
Arashu ainyo ishomo aadol? Itayeutuo nidolidolo oltung'ani oishopito ilkilani oopuyapui? Eng'orai, etii iltung'anak ooishopito ilkilani oopuyapui atua ngajijik oo lkarsisi.
Arashu ainyo ishomo aadol? Itayeutuo nidolidolo olayolounoni? Ee, aliki ndai ololang' olayolounoni.
Amu ilo ninye etisiraki: Ng'orai, airriwaa olmalaika lai lukunya engomom ino, olikintobiraki engoitoi tʼengomom ino.
Japa, aliki ndai: Metii tukul atua kulo ootoiwuoki too ng'oroyok olkitok lolang' Yohanes Olaibatisani; kake olora kiti tukul tiatua enkarsishu e shumata, naa kitok nelang' ninye.
Ore eiter too ngolong'i e Yohanes Olaibatisani metabaiki taata etumi enkarsishu e shumata t'engolon, nearu kulo looibung' ninye tʼengolon.
Amu eitayoloutuo layolounok pookin o nkitanapat metabaiki Yohanes mbaak naaku.
Naa teni iyeuu nirukuruku, ninye lora Eliya olalotu.
Ore oloata nkiyaa naaning'ie, njening'!
Kainyo aitanyanyukie ena kishon? Enyanyukie ninye nkera naatoni tʼosingira neipot nʼemboitei enye
nejo: Kitooshokitio ndai nkisuleta, neitu iyeuu ninguranana; kinjirakitia ndai, neitu iyeuu nintong'ung'u ilkiyo.
Eewuo Yohanes, neitu enya, neitu eok; nejo ninje: eata olmeneng'ani.

Eewuo Enkerai oltung'ani, nenya, neok; nejo ninje: Eng'orai, era ele tung'ani olainosani o olaokoni lʼolmarua, oljore loo laoshok le kodi o loo laitarruok! Meata kata nemeitaai supat eng'eno too nkera enyena.
Neiter ailepilepaki ngang'itie enetaa nkitobirat enyena kumok, tiaraki neitu eala:
Ee kake aiya, Korasin! Ee kake aiya, Betsaida! Ten emutu etaa nena kitobirat te Tiros o te Sidon naataa too ndai, anaata etaalate opa tiatua ilguniani o nkuruon.
Kake aliki ndai: Eikashieki Tiros o Sidon tʼengolong' enkigwena nelang' ndai.
Ore iye, Kapernaum, nikintadaraiyoki metabaiki shumata, kipuo aaitadou metabaiki abori enkop: amu ten emutu etaa nkitobirat engolon naataa te iye, te Sodom, anaata etii metabaiki taata.
Kake aliki nanu ndai: Eikashieki olosho le Sodom tʼengolong' enkigwena e akenya nikilang' iye.
Nealu te ina kata Yesus nejo: Aaitoning'oo iye, Papa o Olaitoriani le shumata o enkop, tiaraki nitushumaka kuna lang'eni o iljartani, nintayolo ilkutiti.
Ee, Papa, amu neijia itonyorrua tʼengomom ino.
Aaitarasaka Papa lai ntokitin pookin, nemetii oloyolo Oinoti neme Menye, nemetii oloyolo Menye neme Oinoti o oloyeu neitayolo Oinoti ninye.
Ewotu enatii nanu pookin lootanaurate neiroshiki rridat, nayeu naeng'ieng'ie nanu ndai.
Entudumakiti aten enkiroshi ai, enteng'enuoto te nanu; amu abor nanu naitadou kion tʼoltau, nipuopuo aatum eng'ieng'are oo lmumuan linyi;
amu eneneng' enkiroshi ai nelelek orridati lai.
Neim Yesus te ina kata tʼengolong' naeng'ieng'areki atua nkuruman; neata laiteng'enuok lenyena olamei neiter aadung' lukuny entapa nenya.
Ore pedol Ilfarisayoi nona, nejoki ninye: Ng'orai, eitobirita laiteng'enuok linono nemeaku tʼengolong' naeng'ieng'areki.
Nejoki ninye ninje: Eitu isomama enaitobira David, eata olamei o lʼemboitei enye?
Eneikuna nejing' engaji Engai nenya ilmkaten lʼenkitaduaroto, nemeaku te ninye, penya o lʼemboitei enye, neme laidasak oopeny ake.
Arashu eitu isomama tiatua nkitanapat, ajo eitaa laidasak engolong' naeng'ieng'areki torrono tʼengaji sinyati tʼengolong' naeng'ieng'areki, neitu eitarruo?
Kake aliki nanu ndai, ajo etii ene olora kitok nelang' engaji sinyati.
Ten emutu iyololo enkitaalata oo kulo rorei: Anyor enkordunoto neme enkidasare, — anaata eitu idekideke kulo leitu eitarruo.
Amu era Enkerai oltung'ani baiki Olaitoriani lʼengolong' naeng'ieng'areki.
Nepuku te ina alo nejing' atua engaji Engai enye.
Naa ng'orai, etii oltung'ani oikang'a engaina. Neikilikwan ninje ninye nejo: Keaku, teni eishiunyeki tʼengolong' naeng'ieng'areki? Petum enaitang'orie.
Nejoki ninje: Kalo obo too ndai loata enker nabo nadoiki atua engumoto tʼengolong' naeng'ieng'areki nemeibung' ninye ailepunye?
Amaa, melang' naleng' oltung'ani enker? Onaa, eaku, teni eitobiri sidan tʼengolong' naeng'ieng'areki.
Nejoki ninye ele tung'ani: Ntorioi engaina ino! Neitorioo ninye neishiu, neaku bioto anaa engai aina.
Neipung' Ilfarisayoi neigwenare ninye, petum aaiminye.
Ore peyolou Yesus kuna, neing'ua ina alo. Nesuj isiamin kumok ninye, neishiunye ninje pookin,
neitanap ninje naleng', pemelimu ninye,
pebaia enairoro aloyolounoni Yesaya nejo:
Ng'orai, era ele olaisyayani lai lategelua, olanyor lai, oshipakino oltau lai; ayeu naisho ninye Olmumua lai, neinosaki ninye loreren enkigwena.
Meitarrikisho ninye nemedar nemening'i oltoilo lenye too ngoitoi;
nemegil ninye olperesi otororoki, nemear enkishinga nailiilaa, pee, metabana neitupuku enkigwena enye, peaku engilunoto;
neng'idare loreren engarna enye.
Nerikoki ninye oloata ilmeneng'a, ora olmodooni nemeidim airoro; neishiunye ninye, neidim ele leitu eiro, airoro nedolishoi.
Neing'asia pookin nejo: Mera ele enkerai e David?
Kake ore pening' Ilfarisayoi kuna, nejo: Memir ele ilmeneng'a neme tʼengolon e Beelsebul, ora olkitok loo lmeneng'a.
Ore peyolou Yesus ndamunot enye, nejoki ninje: Teni eitarrikino enkarsishu tiatua kion, neimin; Teni eitarrikino engang' arashu engaji tiatua kion, nemebik.
Teni emir satan obo olekai, neitarrikinore tiatua kion; kaji eiko teni elabik enkarsishu enye?
Teni amir si nanu ilmeneng'a tʼengolon e Beelsebul — ke tʼengolon e ng'ai emir nkera inyi ninje. Onaa eaku ninje laigwenak linyi.
Kake teni amir nanu ilmeneng'a tʼengolon Olmumua lʼEngai, eewuo enkarsishu Engai enitiiti.
Arashu kaji eiko teni eidim atijing'a oltung'ani engaji oloata engolon nearaa masaa engaji enye, nemeng'as aen oloata engolon, petum ataarai engaji enye?
Ore oltung'ani lemera lʼematua ai, nera olmang'atinda lai; olemeiturrur te nebo o nanu, neisardakie.
Onaa aliki ndai: Eing'uaikini iltung'anak nkitarruot o emoroto pookin, kake meing'uaikini iltung'anak loomor Olmumua.
Ore oloimakinye ororei Enkerai oltung'ani, neinguaikini ninye; kake oloimakinye Olmumua Sinyati, meing'uaikini ninye; tiatua ele maa le taata, baiki tiatua lido olotu akenya.
Arashu entuun oljani sidai, neaku ilmomo sidan; arashu entuun oljani torrono, neaku ilmomo torrok. Amu too lmomo eyolouni oljani.
Ndai eishoi oo lasuria, kaji inkoko teni iroro sidan, irara torrok? Ore enatii atua oltau, neiro enkutuk.
Eiu oltung'ani sidai sidan too masaa sidan oltau lenye; neiu oltung'ani torrono ntorrok too masaa torrok enyena.
Aliki nanu ndai ake, ajo meata kata nemeisho iltung'anak alat enye tiatua enkigwena e akenya tʼolbae lʼororei pookin le pesho looiroro ninje.
Kinjori esupato too rorei linono, nikipuoi aadek too rorei linono.
Nealiki ematua oo layolok lʼesirata o en oo Lfarisoyoi ninye nejo: Laiteng'enani, kitayeutuo nikidol olponoto te iye.
Nealiki nejoki ninje: Eing'oru ena kishon torrono naar osotua l'enkiama olponoto, nemeishori ninye olponoto neme olponoto lʼolayolounoni Yona.
Amu neijia anaa petobiko Yona ngolong'i uni, dama o kiarie, tiatua engoshoke osingirri, neijia elabik Enkerai oltung'ani ngolong'i uni, dama o kiarie, tiatua oltau lʼenkop.
Nepuo aaitashe iltung'anak le Ninive tʼenkigwena e akenya te nebo o iltung'anak lʼena kishon, nepuo aadek ninye; amu etaalate tʼenkinosunoto e Yona; eng'orai, etii ene ololang' Yona.

Nelaitashe enkarsis eunore engolong' tʼenkigwena e akenya te nebo o iltung'anak lʼena kishon, neladek ninye; amu eewuo ninye eing'ua nkiting'ot enkop, peinining' eng'eno e Salomo; engorai, etii ene ololang' Salomo.
Teni eidip atupuku olmeneng'ani duruki tiatua oltung'ani, neim atua wuejitin engaroni, neing'oru eneeng'ieng'are, nelau.
Nejo tekurum: Arrinyokino engaji ai natung'aiye; ore pelotu, neinepu erok neoro nekaji.

Nelo nabokata ninye neriku te nebo o ninye kulekai meneng'a oopishana, torrok nelang' ninye; ore pejing', nebik tiatua; neaku tʼenkiting'oto mbaak ele tung'ani torrok nelang' nʼenkata elukunya. Neijia elaaku tʼena kishon torrono.
Ore epon eirorita o siamin, ng'orai, neitashe te boo ng'otonye o lalashera lenyena neyeu neirorie ninye.
Nejoki oltung'ani obo ninye: Ng'orai, eitashe ng'utunyi o lalashera linono te boo neyeu nikirorie.
Nealiki nejoki olojoki ninye: Kang'ai yeiyo ai o kang'ai lalashera lainei?
Neitorioki engaina shumata oo laiteng'enuok lenyena nejo: Eng'orai yeiyo ai o lalashera lainei!
Amu oloitobir enayeu Papa lai le shumata, nera ninye olalashe lai o enganashe o yeiyo.
Nepuku Yesus te ina olong' neing'ua ang' nelo aton tʼembata olbalbal.
Neiturrurrokino ninye siamin kumok neilepaki engalawa neton, neitashe siamin pookin tʼembata olbalbal.
Neirorie ninje too nkitanyanyukieta kumok nejo: Eng'orai, etupukuo olaisuaroni, pelaisuaisho.
Ore peisuaia, nedoiki ematua embeu engoitoi; nepuonu ntaritik nenya ina.
Nedoiki engai matua enetii soito nemetum nkulupuok kumok; nebulu nabokata, tiaraki neitu etum nkulupuok naasur.
Ore peilepu engolong', neinaaia, netoi, tiaraki nemeata ntonat.
Neitoki adoiki engai matua atua ilkikarreta; nebulu ilkikarreta, negor ina.
Neitoki adoiki engai matua enetii nkulupuok sidan, neiu ilmomo, ematua iip, ematua ntomoni ile, ematua osom.
Oloata nkiyaa naaning'ie, njening'.
Nepuonu laiteng'enuok nejoki ninye: Ainyo pirorie ninje too nkitanyanyukieta?
Nealiki nejoki ninje: Eitumunyanaki ndai, piyolouu njumat enkarsishu e shumata, kake meitumunyani lelo.
Amu ore oloata, neishori ninye aaiganyaki; ore olemeata, neoruni baiki ena naata.
Onaa airorie ninje too nkitanyanyukieta; amu eing'orisho — nemedol; neinining'isho — nemening', nemeyolou kuna.
Nebaia too lelo enkitayolounoto e Yesaya najo: „Ore ening'oto ipuopuo aaning', nimiyolouu; ore enking'oraroto ipuopuo aaing'oraa, nimidolidolo.
Amu epising'a iltauja lʼele orere, neiroshieki nkiyaa enye tʼening'oto, neiturukuny ngonyek enye, pemedol too ngonyek, nemening' too nkiyaa, nemeyolou too ltauja, nemeibelekenya, paitopok ninje.“
Kake teshi ngonyek inyi, amu edolita, o nkiyaa inyi, amu ening'ito.
Amu, japa, aliki ndai: Etayeutuo layolounok kumok o loora supati nedol nidolitata ndai, neitu edol, neyeu nening' nining'itoto, neitu ening'.
Akae, entoning' ndai enkitanyanyukiet olaisuaroni.
Ore oltung'ani pookin loning' ororei lʼenkarsishu nemeyolou, nelotu oltorrono neoru enaisuakaki atua oltau lenye; ninye enaisuakaki engoitoi.
Ore enaisuakaki enetii soito, nera ninye oloning' ororei neng'amu nabokata tʼeng'ida.
Kake meata ntonat tiatua ninye, nebik enkiti kata; ore pebau enkilishoto o enkinyala tʼolbae le ilo rorei, nerikai nabokata.
Ore enaisuakaki atua ilkikarreta, nera ninye oloning' ororei, negor enkishilaroto ele maa o elejata oo masaa ororei, neaku meiu ilmomo.
Ore enaisuakaki atua enkulupuoni sidai, nera ninye oloning' ororei neyolou ninye neiu baiki ilmomo, ematua iip, ematua ntomoni ile, ematua osom.
Neitoki aliki ninje engai kitanyanyukiet nejo: Enyanyukie enkarsishu e shumata oltung'ani oisuaka embeu sidai atua enkuruma enye.
Ore peirura iltung'anak, nelotu olmang'atinda lenye neisuaki olmasinde empolos engano nelo ninye.
Ore pebulu engano neisho, nelioi olmasinde.
Nepuonu laisyayak lʼolopeny enkuruma nejoki: Laitoriani, eitu isuaki embeu sidai atua enkuruma ino? Akae, kaji einotie olmasinde?
Nejoki ninye ninje: Olmang'atinda lai oikuna nji. Nejoki laisyayak ninye: Akae, iyeu nikipuo aadotoki enkop?
Nejoki: Me! pemidotutu engano te nebo o olmasinde.
Enjoo pebulu pokira are metabaiki endung'ore; ore tʼenkata endung'ore naliki ladung'ok: Enturrurro aang'as olmasinde nieniene rridat, pepeji ninye; kake enturrurrokiti engano atua embeje ai.
Neitoki aliki ninje engai kitanyanyukiet nejo: Enyanyukie enkarsishu e shumata embeu e karadali naibun'ga oltung'ani obo neisuaki atua enkuruma enye,
nera kinyi nelang' mbeun pookin; kake ore pebulu, neaku kitok nelang' mbenek pookin, neaku enjani, nepuonu ntaritik e shumata neshet singin tiatua ilng'osil lenyena.
Neliki ninje engai kitanyanyukiet: Enyanyukie en-karsishu e shumata enkisiijoi naibung'a eng'oroyoni nabo neitushulie ntemeta uni entapa, metabana neisiijoi pookin.
Etiaka Yesus kuna pookin isiamin too nkitanyanyukieta, neitu eliki ninje ororei neme too nkitanyanyukieta ake,
pebaia enairoro olayolounoni ejo: Abol enkutuk ai too nkitanyanyukieta nayeu nalimu njumat tʼenkiterata enkop.
Ore peidip Yesus aitanapare siamin, nelo aji. Nepuonu laiteng'enuok enetii ninye nejo: Ntaaliki yook enkitanyanyukiet olmasinde lʼenkuruma.
Nealu nejo: Era Enkerai oltung'ani oloisuaia embeu sidai.
Nera olmaa enkuruma. Nera olmasinde nkera oltorrono.
Nera olmang'atinda oisuaia ninye satan. Nera en-dung'ore enkiting'oto olmaa. Nera ladung'ok ilmalaikan.
Akae, neijia anaa pedotuni olmasinde nepeji tʼenkima neijia eaku tʼenkiting'oto ele maa:
Elairriu Enkerai oltung'ani ilmalaikan lenyena, nepuo aaiturrur ninje tiatua enkarsishu enye nkitarrikinot pookin o kulo looitobir ntorrok,
nenang'aki ninje atua engaji enkima; atua eakunye enkishirata o eonyoto oo lala.
Nepuo aailang'isho supati anaa engolong' tiatua enkarsishu e Menye lenye. Oloata nkiyaa naaning'ie, njening'!
Neitoki anyanyukie enkarsishu e shumata masaa naashuma tiatua enkuruma, naatadua oltung'ani obo neisudoo ninje, nelo tʼeng'ida enye nemir pookin naata ninye, neinyang'u ena kuruma.
Neitoki anyanyukie enkarsishu e shumata olamirani obo loing'orua ilpusi sidan.
Ore petum olpusi obo lʼenkinyang'a kitok, nelo nemir pookin naata ninye, neinyang'u ilo.
Neitoki anyanyukie enkarsishu e shumata erreshet nabo natanang'akaki atua olbalbal, perreshieki noo muain pookin.
Ore peigany, neilepunye embata, netoni ninje neiturrurroki naara sidan atua enaret enye, neiturraa ntorrok.
Neijia elaaku tʼenkiting'oto olmaa: nepuo aapuku ilmalaikan nerishu iltorrok tiatua supati,
nepuo aanang'aki ninje atua engaji enkima; atua eakunye enkishirata o eonyoto oo lala.
Nejoki Yesus ninje: Ketijing'aitie ndai kuna pookin? Nejoki ninje ninye: Ee, Laitoriani!
Nejoki ninje: Onaa enyanyukie olayoloni pookin lʼesirata oata eng'eno en-karsishu e shumata olopeny engaji oitupuku tiatua masaa enyena ntokitin ng'ejuko o musan.
Neaku ore peidip Yesus kuna kitanyanyukieta, neing'ua ina alo,
nelotu engang' e menye neiteng'en ninje tiatua engaji Engai enye, neing'asia ninje baiki nejo: Kaji einotie ele ena ng'eno o kuna kitobirat engolon?
Mera ele enkeiai olagwetani? Me ninye eji ng'otonye Maria? o lalashera lenyena Yakoob o Yoses o Simon o Yudas?
Metii nganashera enyena pookin enikitii yook? Akae, kaji einotie ele kuna pookin?
Nerikare ninje ninye. Nejoki Yesus ninje: Melau olayolounoni enganyit enye neme tiatua olosho lenye o tʼengaji enye.
Neitu eitobir te ina alo nkitobirat engolon kumok, tiaraki natanyaita eiruk ninye.
Nening' te ina kata Herodes, Olaitoriani lʼematua e ong'wan olosho, mbaak e Yesus.
Nejoki ninye laisyayak lenyena: Era ele Yohanes Olaibatisani; etopiwuo ninye too lootuata, onaa epuku te ninye kuna kitobirat engolon.
Amu eibung'a Herodes Yohanes, neen ninye nepik engaji eenata tʼolbae le Herodias, eng'oroyoni e Filipos, olalashe lenye.
Amu etiaka Yohanes ninye: torrono te iye, teni iata ninye.
Ore peyeu near ninye metua, neurei olorere, amu etejo, aajo era ninye olayolounoni.
Ore tʼengolong' eiunoto e Herodes neiguran entito e Herodias tʼengomom enye. Neiting'id Herodes.
Onaa eisiliga ninye tʼenkiturujata, ajo eisho ninye pookin nayeu ninye.
Ore peiteng'en ng'otonye ninye, nejo: Njooki tene tʼengirra elukunya e Yohanes Olaibatisani!
Neilish olkarsis; kake tʼolbae lʼenkiturujata enye o tʼolbae loo kulo oototonitio te nebo tʼendaata, neitanapisho, peishori ninye.
Neirriwaa oltung'ani nedung' ninye Yohanes elukunya tiatua engaji eenata.
Neauni elukunya enye tʼengirra neishori entito; neaki ng'otonye.
Nepuonu laiteng'enuok lenyena neibung' osesen lenye nepuo aanuk; nepuonu neinosaki Yesus ina.
Ore pening' Yesus ina, neing'ua ina alo tʼengalawa nelo ewueji nemetii olorere. Ore pening' isiamin ina, nesuj ninye too nkejek, eing'ua ngang'itie.
Nepuku si ninye Yesus nedol isiamin kumok; neibung'aki ninje engoshoke nanana neishiunye iltamoiya lenye.
Ore peaku teipa, nepuonu laiteng'enuok lenyena enetii ninye nejo: Etii ene ang'ata nebau enkiarie; ntanapare siamin, pepuo ngang'itie, peinyang'aki aten ndaikin.
Nejoki Yesus ninje: Meaku, pepuo; enjoo ndai ninje endaa!
Nejoki si ninje ninye: Mikiata toki tene, neme ilmkaten imiet o singir aare.
Nejo: Eakaki nena tene!
Neitanapu, petoni siamin tʼolkujita, neibung' kulo mkaten imiet o singir aare, neimariri shumata nejo ashe negiligil neisho laiteng'enuok kulo mkaten, neitarasaki laiteng'enuok ninje siamin.
Nenya pookin neraposho, nedumu mbelat naatelekutua ilbenia tomon o are oolulung'a.
Ore looinosa era leak iip onom, metii ng'oroyok o nkera.
Neitanap Yesus te ina kata laiteng'enuok lenyena, peilepaki engalawa, peiturukie ninye aapuo lido kekun, metabana neitanapare siamin.
Ore peidip aitanapare siamin, neilepaki oldonyo openy alasaisho. Neaku teipa, etii ewueji enye openy.
Eidipa atabai engalawa empolos olbalbal, etumito osina too lopir lʼengare, amu etii olkutati orrinyito.
Ore tʼerripore e ong'wan e kiarie nelotu Yesus enetii ninje, elimana ti oriong' olbalbal.
Ore pedol laiteng'enuok ninye elimana ti oriong' olbalbal, neng'ayung'ayu ejo: Oloip ele! neyetaki t'enkuretishu.
Neirorie Yesus ninje nabokata nejo: Entagolo iltauja, nanu ele; emiureisho!
Nealiki Petros ninye nejo: Laitoriani, teni ira iye, ntanapuaki, palotu enitii ti oriong' engare.
Nejo ninye: Wou! Nepuku Petros tʼengalawa nelimana ti oriong' engare alo enetii Yesus.
Kake ore pedol olkutati lʼengolon, neureishoi neiter aasurori, neyetaki ajo: Laitoriani, ntopuaki!
Neitorioo Yesus nabokata engaina enye neibung' ninye nejoki: Iye loata enkirukoto kinyi, ainyo ping'arrirre?
Neilepaki ninje engalawa negira olkutati.
Nepuonu si ninje lootii engalawa aaserem ninye nejo: Esipa, ira iye Oinoti lʼEngai.
Ore peidip ninje aatalang', nebaia olosho Genesaret.
Ore peyolou iltung'anak le ine wueji ninye, neirriwaki mbat pookin naamanita, neaki ninye iltamoiya pookin
nesai ninye, peporoo ake tʼenaipukoi olkila lenye. Ore pookin lootaporoitie, eishiutuo tukul.
Nepuonu te ina kata enetii ninye layolok lʼesirata o Ilfarisayoi, eing'ua Yerusalem nejo:
Ainyo pelang' laiteng'enuok linono ng'amunot oo lpaiyani? Amu meisuj ngaik, teni enya endaa.
Nealiki Yesus nejoki ninje: Ainyo pilang'ilang'a ndai enkitanapata Engai t'olbae loo ng'amunot inyi?
Amu eitanapua Engai: Ntaa kituak minyi o ng'utunyi; ore olodek menye arashu ng'otonye, njee tʼenkea.
Ilimumu ndai ake: Olojoki menye arashu ng'otonye: Era ena toki enkidasare Engai natayeuo naaisho nanu iye, — neitobir sidai.
Neaku te ina kata, ajo metii oloitaa menye o ng'otonye kitok, niariara neijia enkitanapata Engai too ng'amunot inyi.
Ndai laitusupatuok, sidai enaitayolouo Yesaya too ndai nejo:
Aanyikaki ele orere too nkutukie enye naaitaa kitok too njonito oo nkutukie enye, kake aalakwaniki iltauja lenye;
naaisyayaki ninje pesho, tiaraki naiteng'enu nkiteng'enareitin naara nkitanapat oo ltung'anak.
Neipot isiamin nejoki ninje: Entoning', piyolouu!
Me enajing' atua enkutuk naitaa oltung'ani torrono, kake enapuku tʼenkutuk, ninye naitaa oltung'ani torrono.
Nepuonu laiteng'enuok lenyena enetii ninye nejoki: Iyolo, ajo etirikate Ilfarisayoi te ilo rorei lotoning'o?
Nealu ninye nejo: Ore unot pookin neitu eun Papa lai le shumata, nedotuni.
Entung'ai lelo! Era ninje ilmodook o larikok loo lmodook; teni erik olmodooni obo olekai, nesulakino atua engumoto pokira are.
Nealu Petros nejoki ninye: Ntaaliki yook ena kitanyanyukiet.
Nejoki Yesus ninje: Epon si ndai miatata eng'eno?
Midamumu, aajo ore pookin najing' atua enkutuk, nelo engoshoke nenang'akini tʼosiadi?
Kake napuku tʼenkutuk, nepuku tʼoltau, naa nena naaitaa oltung'ani torrono.
Amu epuku tʼoltau ndamunot torrok: earata metua, earata enkidikidikoto olmoruo o eng'oroyoni, entalare, empurrore, enjakenishu elejare, emoroto.
Nena tokitin naaitaa oltung'ani torrono; kake enkinosata endaa meisuja ngaik, meitaa ninye oltung'ani torrono.
Nepuku Yesus te ina alo nelo mbat e Tiros o Sidon.
Naa ng'orai, nepuku eng'oroyoni nara Enkananaya oo nona rishat, neapaa oltoilo nejo: Laitoriani, nakerai e David, tokorduaki! Eitameito naleng' ilmeneng'a entito ai.
Neitu ealiki ninye ororei. Nepuonu laiteng'enuok lenyena nesai ninye nejo: Njoo elo ang', amu eapaa oltoilo tekurum ang'.
Nealu ninye nejo: Eitu aairriwari nanu neme enetii nkerra naaimina engaji Israel.
Nelotu ninye ake negilaki kung' nejo: Laitoriani, taretokoki!
Nealu ninye nejo: Me sidai, teni eoruni nkera endaa enye nenang'akini ildiain.
Nejo ninye: Ee, Laitoriani, kake enya si ildiain mbelat kunyinyi naadoiyo tʼenaraa oo laitoriak lenye.
Nealu Yesus te ina nejoki ninye: Iye, nang'oroyoni, kitok enkirukoto ino! Njeaku anaa piyeu! Neishiu entito enye te ina kata ake.
Neing'ua Yesus ina alo nelotu embata olbalbal le Galilaya neilepaki oldonyo neton te ina alo.
Nepuonu siamin kumok enetii ninye, eata te nebo o ninje lemeidim aashom o ilmodook o lemeidim aairoro o looata rrugi o ilkulekai kumok, neitaperoki nkejek e Yesus neishiunye ninje.
Neing'asia siamin edolita eiro lemeidim aairoro naa biot looata rrugi, nepuo lemeidim aashom, nedolisho ilmodook; neitadaraa ninje Engai e Israel.
Neipot Yesus laiteng'enuok lenyena nejo: Aibung'aki siamin engoshoke nanana, amu etaa ngolong'i uni ebik enatii nanu nemeata endaa; namayeu naitanapaa etupukoitie, pemeiterre tʼengoitoi.
Nejoki laiteng'enuok lenyena ninye: Ke ti aji kitum tene ti ang'ata ilmkaten kumok, peraposho esiamu kitok naba nji?
Nejoki Yesus ninje: Iatata ndai ilmkaten aja? Nejo ninje: Oopishana o singir kuti.
Neitanap isiamin, petoni tʼenkop,
neibung' kulo mkaten oopishana o kulo singir, nejo ashe nebelibel neisho laiteng'enuok lenyena; neitarasaki si ninje, laiteng'enuok lenyena, siamin.
Nenya pookin neraposho; nesotu lekunot oo mbelat ilbenia oopishana oolulung'a.
Ore looinosa nera leak iip artam, metii ng'oroyok o nkera.
Ore peidip aitanapare siamin, neilepaki engalawa nelotu embata e Magdala.
Nepuonu Ilfarisayoi o Sadukayoi netem ninye, peitadol ninje olponoto oing'ua shumata.
Nealuninyenejoki: Ijojo ndai teipa: Elakiny, amu edo shumata;
ore enasirie ijojo ndai: Eirujuruj taata, amu edo shumata neopoko. Ndai laitusupatuok, indimidimi aatayolo emua e shumata, kake mindimidimi aatayolo ntokitin kituak ena kata?
Eing'oru ena kishon torrono nanyor mbaak eloloito olponoto, nemeishori olponoto neme olponoto lʼolayolounoni Yona. Neing'ua ninje alo.
Ore peidip aatalang' laiteng'enuok lenyena aabaiki lido kekun, nerikino enap ilmkaten.
Nejoki Yesus ninje: Eng'orai, piduaiaia aten tʼenkisiijoi oo Lfarisayoi o noo Sadukayoi.
Neishangarrakino ninje oopeny nejo: Tiaraki mikinapita ilmkaten.
Ore peyolou Yesus ina, nejoki ninje: Ainyo pinjangarrakinono ndai maten, ndai lʼenkirukoto kinyi, tiaraki neitu iauu ilmkaten?
Epon eitu iyolouu ndai o nyoo? Midamumu ndai kulo mkaten imiet too kulo iip onom o ilbenia aja litudumutua ndai?
Baiki kulo mkaten oopishana too kulo iip artam o ilbenia aja litudumutua?
Kaji inkoko teni miyololo, aajo maliki ndai embae oo lmkaten, teni ajo: Entaduai aten tʼenkisiijoi oo Lfarisayoi o noo Sadukayoi!
Neyolou ninje te ina kata, aajo eitu ejo, peduaia aten tʼenkisiijoi olmkate, kake tʼenkiteng'enare oo Lfarisayoi o noo Sadukayoi.
Ore pelotu Yesus engalo engang' Kaisarea-Filipi, neikilikwan ninye laiteng'enuok lenyena nejo: Kejo iltung'anak era Enkerai oltung'ani ng'ai?
Nejo ninje: Ejo ilkulekai, aajo ira Yohanes Olaibatisani, nejo ilkulekai: Eliya, nejo ilkulekai: Yeremiya, arashu obo too layolounok.
Nejoki ninye ninje: Kake ijojo ndai ara nanu ng'ai?
Nealu Simon Petros nejo: Ira iye Kristos, Oinoti lʼEngai naishiu!
Nealiki Yesus nejoki ninye: Ira tesh, Simon le Yona, amu eitu kintayolo nkiri o osarge, kake Papa lai le shumata.
Naaliki si nanu iye: Ira iye Petros, nayeu nashet te shumata ele soit esirit ai nemegilu kishomini engang' e satan ninye.
Nayeu naaisho iye mboleta enkarsishu e shumata. Ore pookin nien iye tʼenkop, neaku eteenaki te shumata; o pookin nilalak iye tʼenkop, neaku etalaaki te shumata.
Neitanap te ina alo naleng' laiteng'enuok lenyena, pemeliki ninje oltung ani, ajo era ninye Kristos.

Ore te ina kata neiter Yesus aitayolo laiteng'enuok lenyena, ajo meata kata nemelo ninye Yerusalem, neitame naleng' laigwenak o laidasak kituak o layolok lʼesirata ninye, neari metua, nepiu tʼengolong' e uni.
Neibung' Petros ninye nerik enkilepata neiter aikok ninye nejo: Laitoriani, taduai kion, njoo mikitum kuna!
Neibelekenya ninye nejoki Petros: Nyaai kurum ai, satan, ira erikata ai, amu mimbirribir nara nʼEngai neme nʼentung'anishu.
Nejoki Yesus te ina kata laiteng'enuok lenyena: Ore oltung'ani loyeu naasuj, njeisim kion, njedumakino esalaba enye, paasuj.
Amu teni eyeu oltung'ani neitopok empuan enye, neiminye ninye; ore oltung'ani oiminye empuan enye tʼolbae lai, netum ninye.
Kaa dupoto etum oltung'ani, teni eng'eru olmaa pookin, netum elaunoto olmumua lenye? Arashu kainyo elakunye oltung'ani olmumua lenye?
Amu eaku elotu Enkerai oltung'ani tʼenkitook e Menye lenye te nebo o ilmalaikan lenyena; te ina kata elalaaki oltung'ani pookin anaa peitobira ninye.
Japa, aliki ndai: Etii iltung'anak atua kulo ooitashe tene, lemeinyorrinyor ninje enkea tukul, metabana nedol Enkerai oltung'ani elotu tiatua enkarsishu enye.
Ore peishunye ngolong'i ile, negelu Yesus Petros o Yakobos o Yohanes, olalashe lenye, nerik ninje shumata oldonyo oado oopeny.
Neala emua enye neilang'isho engomom enye anaa engolong' neiborru ilkilani lenyena anaa enkilang'et.
Naa ng'orai nelioi too ninje Mose o Eliya; neirorie ninje ninye.
Nealu Petros nejoki Yesus: Laitoriani, sidai, kitii yook ene! Teni iyeu, nashet tene iltomboitie okuni: obo lino, obo le Mose, obo le Eliya.
Ore epon eirorita, neopoo ninje erukenya naibor; naa ng'orai, neing'ua oltoilo erukenya ejo: Nyele Oinoti lai lanyor oshipakino oltau lai; entoning' ninye!
Ore pening' laiteng'enuok kuna, nebatata aaijululo neureishoi naleng'.
Nelotu Yesus enetii ninje neiseiye ninje nejo: Enyoito, emiureisho!
Ore peapu ngonyek enye, neitu edol oltung'ani neme Yesus ake.
Ore pedou ninje tʼoldonyo, neitanap Yesus ninje ejo: Emiliki oltung'ani ina duaroto, metabana nepiu Enkerai oltung'ani tiatua lootuata.
Neikilikwan laiteng'enuok lenyena ninye ejo: Ainyo naa pejo layolok lʼesirata, aajo meata kata nemeng'as alotu Eliya?
Nealu Yesus nejoki ninje: Esipa, eng'as alotu Eliya neibelekeny pookin metaa ng'ejuko;
kake aliki nanu ndai: Eidipa aeu Eliya, neitu eyolou ninje ninye, kake eitobirakitia ninye enatayeutuo ninje. Neijia meata kata nemeitame ninje Enkerai oltung'ani.
Neyolou te ina kata laiteng'enuok lenyena, aajo einosaki ninje mbaak e Yohanes Olaibatisani.
Ore pepuonu ninje enetii esiamu, nelotu oltung'ani obo enetii ninye negilaki kung'
ejo: Laitoriani, to-kordu enkerai ai, amu eibung' olkiterriata ninye neata emion torrono: Eurokino aigil kumok enkima, aigil kumok engare;
nariku ninye enetii laiteng'enuok linono, neru aaishiunye ninye.
Nealu Yesus nejo: Ndai enkishon nemeiruk neriwuo, ke metabaiki anu atii e nebo o ndai? Ke metabaiki anu ang'iriaki ndai? Eakaki ilo!
Nebuaki Yesus ninye, nepuku olmeneng'ani te ninye neishiu ena kerai eiter te ina kata.
Nepuonu ina kata laiteng'enuok enetii Yesus tʼewueji enye oopeny nejo: Ainyo peitu kindim yook aatimir ninye?

Nejoki Yesus ninje: Tiaraki nimirukuruku ndai; amu japa, aliki ndai: Teni iatata enkirukoto anaa embeu e karadali, nijokiki ele donyo: Tadotunye tene abaiki idya alo! nedotunye si ninye; nemetii entoki nemeaku too ndai.
Kake mepuku ena mua neme tʼesayata o tʼempukoroto.
Ore etii ninje Galilaya, nejoki Yesus ninje: Eaku eitarasakini Enkerai oltung'ani ngaik oo ltung'anak,
near ninje ninye metua, nepiu tʼengolong' e uni. Neilish ninje naleng'.
Ore pepuonu ninje Kapernaum, nepuonu kulo loobosu kodi engaji Engai enetii Petros nejo: Melak olaiteng'enani linyi kodi engaji Engai?
Nejo: Elak. Ore pelotu engaji, neiter Yesus aikilikwan ninye nejo: Ijo aa, Simon? Ke too akua tung'anak eaiye ilkarsisi kodi? Too nkera enye arashu too lomon?
Nejoki Petros: Too lomon. Nejoki Yesus ninye: Akae, elakuno nkera.
Kake pimikintirik yook ninje, nno embata olbalbal, ntadoiki erreshet, mbung'a osingirri lʼelukunya opuku; ore pibol enkutuk enye, nilatum engosholai: mbung'a ina, njooi tʼolbae lai o lino.
Nepuonu te ina kata laiteng'enuok enetii Yesus nejo: Ang'ai naa ora kitok tʼenkarsishu e shumata?
Neipot Yesus enkerai nabo neitasheye tʼempolos enye
nejo: Japa, aliki ndai, teni mimbelekenyanya aaku anaa nkera, mijing'ijing'i tukul atua enkarsishu e shumata.
Akae, ore oltung'ani pookin loitadou kion anaa ena kerai, ele lora kitok tʼenkarsishu e shumata.
Ore oltung'ani pookin loitoomon enkerai nabo nanyanyukie ena tʼengarna ai, naaitoomon nanu.
Ore oloitapong'oo nabo too kuna kunyinyi naairuk nanu, eikash, teni eenikini emurt enye osoit oituutishoreki neitadoikini ninye eneasur olbalbal.
Ee, kake aiya olmaa tʼolbae loo nkitarrikinot! Amu meata kata nemepuonu nkitarrikinot; kake ee, kake aiya oltung'ani oau nkitarrikinot!

Teni kintadiak engaina ino arashu enkeju ino, tudung'o ninye, pinang'aki enelakwa. Eikash te iye, pijing' atua empuan, miata engaina arashu enkeju, nelang' iata ngaik are arashu nkejek are, nikinang'akini atua enkima nememuta.
Ore pikintadiak engong'u ino, tukurtu ninye, pinang'aki enelakwa. Eikash te iye, pijing' atua empuan, niata engong'u nabo, nelang' iata ngonyek are, nikinang'akini atua enkima nememuta.
Eng'orai, pemimenimene nabo too kuna kutiti. Amu aliki ndai: Edol ilmalaikan lenye le shumata ngolong'i pookin engomom e Papa lai le shumata.
Amu eewuo Enkerai oltung'ani, peitopok enaimina.
Ijojo aa? Teni eata oltung'ani nkerra iip neimin nabo too ninje, aa meing'ua ninye kuna ntomoni enturuj o enturuj tʼoldonyo neibung' engoitoi, pelaing'oru ina naimina?
Ore pelatum, japa, aliki ndai: Eng'idakino ena naleng' nelang' kuna ntomoni enturuj o enturuj neitu eimin.
Neijia meiting'idisho tʼengomom e Minyi linyi le shumata, teni eimin nabo too kuna kutiti.
Teni kintarruoki olalashe lino, nno, toroja ninye iboitata o ninye openy. Teni kining', inoto olalashe lino;
teni mikining', mbung'a obo arashu aare te nebo o iye, peiye eaku nkutukie oo ljaken aare arashu okuni, peitagoli ororei pookin.
Ore pemening' kulo, tiaki esirit; ore pemening' baiki esirit, njeaku te iye anaa oltung'ani lemeata Engai o olaoshoni le kodi.
Japa, aliki ndai: Ore pookin nieniene tʼenkop, neeni te shumata; o pookin nilakilaka tʼenkop, nelaki te shumata.
Naitoki ajoki ndai: Teni eibung'are ilkulinyi aare tʼenkop tʼembae pookin naomonu, neitobiraki ninje Papa lai le shumata.
Amu teni etumo aare arashu okuni tʼengarna ai, natii nanu empolos enye.
Nelotu Petros enetii ninye nejoki ninye: Laitoriani, kaigil aja aing'uaiki olalashe lai laaitarruoki? Mebaiki aigil naapishana?
Nejoki Yesus ninye: Aaliki nanu iye: me aigil naapishana, kake aigil ntomoni naapishana kat naapishana.
Onaa, enyanyukie enkarsishu e shumata olkarsis obo oikenakinore laisyayak lenyena.
Ore peiter aikenakinore, nerikokini obo oata esile enye talanta iip kat iip.
Ore pemeata entoki nalakie, neitanapisho Olaitoriani lenye, pemiri ninye o eng'oroyoni enye o nkera enyena o pookin naata ninye, pelaki ena sile.
Akae, nebatata olaisyayani nesai ninye nejo: Laitoriani, ntirring'akaki, paalaaki iye tukul.
Neibung'aki olaitoriani ilo aisyayani engoshoke nanana, nelaku ninye neing'uaiki ena sile.
Nepuku ilo aisyayani nedol obo too lalashera lenyena oata esile enye denaria iip; newuap ninye neibung' olgos lenye nejo: Talaakaki esile ai!
Akae, nebatatakino olalashe lenye nkejek enyena nesai ninye nejo: Ntirring'akaki, paalaaki iye tukul.
Neitu eyeu ninye, nelo nenang'aki ninye engaji eenata, metabana nelak ena sile.
Ore pedol lalashera lenyena kuna naataa, neilish naleng', nepuonu neitayolo olaitoriani lenye pookin naataa.
Akae, neipot olaitoriani lenye ninye nejoki: Iye, laisyayani torrono, aatung'aikia nanu iye ena sile pookin, kitasaiya.
Ainyo peitu imbung'aki iye olalashe lino engoshoke nanana anaa paaibung'aka nanu iye engoshoke nanana?
Negoro olaitoriani lenye neitarasaki ninye laitamiok, metabana nelak ena sile pookin.
Neijia elaikunaki ndai Papa lai le shumata, teni ming'uaikiki too ltauja linyi oltung'ani pookin olalashe lenye nkitarruot enyena.
Neaku ore peidip Yesus kulo rorei, nedumunye te Galilaya nelotu rishat e Yudaya, tʼolkekun le Yordan.
Nesuj isiamin kumok ninye neishiunye ninje te ina alo.
Nepuonu Ilfarisayoi enetii ninye, netem ninye nejoki ninye: Ke sidai, teni erishare olmoruo eng'oroyoni enye tʼolbae lʼentoki naje?
Nealiki nejoki ninje: Eitu isomama, ajo oloitobira tʼenkiterata oltung'ani, eitobira, peaku olmoruo obo o eng'oroyoni nabo,
nejo: Onaa elaing'ua oltung'ani menye o ng'otonye neibung'are eng'oroyoni enye, neaku pokira are osesen obo?
Akae, nemeitoki aaku are, kake osesen obo. Ore enaidikidiko Engai, njoo merish oltung'ani.
Nejoki ninje ninye: Ainyo peitanapua Mose, peishori empalai erishata, peing'uari eng'oroyoni?
Nejoki ninye ninje: Tiaraki natagolito iltauja linyi, neisho Mose ndai, irisharere ng'oroyok inyi; eitu eaku neijia neba tʼenkiterata.

Kake aliki nanu ndai: Olonshare eng'oroyoni enye neme tʼolbae loo mbaak eloloito neamaa engai, near ninye enkidikidikoto olmoruo o eng'oroyoni; ore oloamaa enatirishareki, near enkidikidikoto olmoruo o eng'oroyoni.
Nejoki laiteng'enuok lenyena ninye: Teni eaku mbaak oltung'ani nji, sidai, teni meamisho.
Nejoki ninje: me pookin ooidim aatayolo ele rorei neme kulo ake ooitumunyanaki.

Amu etii loogelema looing'ua ngoshuak oo noong'otonye etiu nji; netii loogelema ootegelema iltung'anak; netii loogelema looitaa aten loogelema tʼolbae lʼenkarsishu e shumata. Oloidim atayolou, njeyolou.
Nerikuni nkera enetii ninye, peiteleiki ngaik ninje nesaisho; nebuaki ake laiteng'enuok ninje.
Kake etejo Yesus: Enjoo nkera epuonu enatii, emimitiki ninje, amu era enkarsishu e shumata noo loonyanyukie kuna.
Neiteleiki ninje ngaik; neing'ua ina alo.
Naa ng'orai, nelotu oltung'ani obo enetii ninye nejoki ninye: Laiteng'enani sidai, kaa toki sidai aitobir, peiye atum empuan nemeiting'?
Nejoki ninye: Ainyo pikijo sidai? Metii osidai neme obo lora Engai; kake teni iyeu nijing' atua empuan, mbung'a nkitanapat.
Nejoki ninye: Akua? Nejo Yesus: Miar metua! Miar enkidikidikoto olmoruo o eng'oroyoni! Mipurrisho! Minjakenu elejare!
Ntaa kituak minyi o ng'utunyi o: Meata kata niminyor olʼelatia ino anaa pinyor kion!
Nejoki ele barnoti ninye: Aibung'a kuna pookin neba tʼenkitishu ai — ainyo naainyaaka ang'oriki?
Nejoki Yesus ninye: Teni iyeu niaku olbaiaroti, nno, timira pookin niata, pinjo laisinak, piata iye masaa te shumata; ore pindip, nikilotu asuj.
Ore pening' ele barnoti ena bae, nelo ang' eilish; amu eata masaa kumok.
Nejoki Yesus laiteng'enuok lenyena: Japa, aliki ndai: Egol, pejing' oladupani atua enkarsishu e shumata.
Naitoki aliki ndai: Elelek eim endames eudoto esindano nelang' oladupani ejing' atua enkarsishu Engai.
Ore pening' laiteng'enuok lenyena kuna, neing'asia naleng' nejo: Ang'ai naa loidim atopua?
Neing'oraa Yesus ninje nejoki ninje: Meidimai ena too ltung'anak, kake eidimai ntokitin pookin tʼEngai.
Nealiki Petros nejoki ninye: Ng'orai, kitung'aitie yook pookin nikisuj iye. Kainyo naa kitum?

Nejoki Yesus ninje: Japa, aliki ndai: Ore ndai likitusuja, tʼeiunoto e are nipuopuo aatonie lorikaishi tomon o are, ingwenakiki njomito tomon o are e Israel, teni elatonie Enkerai oltung'ani olorika lʼenkitook enye.

Ore pookin looing'ua ngajijik arashu lalashera arashu nganashera arashu menye arashu ng'otonye arashu eng'oroyoni arashu nkera arashu nkuruman tʼolbae lʼengarna ai, nelang'amu ninye aigil iip nejung'u empuan nemeiting'.
Kake ore lkumok loora lʼelukunya, neaku lʼenkiting'oto, neaku lʼenkiting'oto lʼelukunya.
Amu enyanyukie enkarsishu e shumata olopeny engaji otupukuo enasirie alaing'oru laisyayak, perik atua enkuruma enye oo nkeek olmarua.
Ore peitobirakinore laisyayak te denarion nabo endama, neirriwaa ninje atua enkuruma enye oo nkeek olmarua.
Nepuku te saa uni, nedol kulekai looitashe tʼosingira, meata enkyas.
Neitoki ajoki ninje: Enjom si ndai atua enkuruma ai oo nkeek olmarua; ayeu naisho ndai enairirikinore.
Nepuo. Neitoki apuku te saa ile o te saa enturuj, neiko neijia ake.
Ore te saa tomon o nabo nepuku neinepu ilkulekai looitashe, meata enkyas, nejoki ninje: Ainyo pintasheshe tene endama pookin, miatata enkyas?
Nejoki si ninje: Ai, metii oltung'ani oewuo aing'oru yook. Nejoki ninye ninje: Enjom si ndai atua enkuruma ai oo nkeek olmarua, nipuopuo aatum enairirikinore.
Ore pemutu, nejoki olaitoriani lʼenkuruma oo nkeek olmarua olaing'orani lenye: Mpoto laisyayak, pinjo ninje olkwaje, ninter too lʼenkiting'oto metabaiki lʼelukunya.
Nepuonu looipotoki te saa tomon o nabo, neng'amu oltung'ani pookin denarion enye.
Ore pepuonu kulo lʼelukunya, nejo ninje, aajo eng'amu enalang'; neng'amu si ninje oltung'ani pookin denarion enye.
Ore peidip aatang'amutu ina, neing'unyung'unyaki olopeny engaji,
nejo: Ore kulo lʼenkiting'oto eitobira enkyas esaa nabo ake, nintorisioki ninje yook likiting'iriakitia osina o enkirowuaj endama.
Nealiki ninye nejoki obo too ninje: Oljore lai, eitu aaisil iye. Eitu kidung'okino nanu o iye te denarion nabo?
Eao enara enino, nno ang'! Anyor aishoo ele lʼenkiting'oto enarisiore enino.
Arashu maata engolon, paitobir tʼentoki ai enayeu? Ke torrono engong'u ino, tiaraki nara arip?
Neijia eaku lʼenkiting'oto lʼenkiterata, neaku lʼenkiterata lʼenkiting'oto. Amu eipotoki ilkumok, kake etegeluaki ilkuti.
Ore peyeu neilep Yesus alo Yerusalem, nerik laiteng'enuok tomon o are enkilepata nejoki ninje tʼengoitoi:
Eng'orai, kishumari metabaiki Yerusalem, neitarasakini Enkerai oltung'ani ngaik oo laidasak kituak o layolok lʼesirata, neigwenaki ninye, peari metua,
neitarasaki ninje ninye atua ngaik oo loreren, petum aatamor, near ninye too nkeenda nesheiki esalaba; nelapiu tʼengolong' e uni.
Nelotu enetii ninye ng'otonye oo nkera e Sebedayos te nebo o nkera enyena, negilaki ninye kung' neomonu ororei te ninye.
Nejoki ninye: Kainyo iyeu? Nejoki ninye: Njoo etoni kulo inot lainei aare tʼenkarsishu ino, obo te tatene ino, olekai te kedyanye ino.
Nealu Yesus nejo: Miyololo ndai eniomonunu. Indimidimi aatook ndai enkwaru naok nanu, neibatisi ndai tʼenkibatisa naaibatisieki nanu? Nejoki ninje ninye: Ee, kindim.

Nejoki ninye ninje: Esipa, iokioko enkwaru ai, neibatisi ndai tʼenkibatisa naaibatisieki nanu, kake ore entonata te tatene o te kedyanye ai maata enkitanapata naishorie ndai, kake noo kulo looitobiraka Papa lai.
Ore pening' kulo tomon kuna, nelisaki kulo alashera pokira are.
Kake neipot Yesus ninje nejo: Iyololo ndai, aajo eitorisho ilkarsisi loo loreren neata ilkituak lenye engolon too ninje.
Meaku nji too ndai! Kake oloyeu neaku kitok too ndai, njeaku olaisyayani linyi.
Ore oltung'ani pookin loyeu neaku olaiturukoni too ndai, njeaku olaisyayani linyi,
neijia anaa peitu elotu Enkerai oltung'ani, peisho eisyayakini ninye, kake peisyaisho neishooio empuan enye, peaku elakunoto oo lkumok.
Ore pepuku te Yeriko, nesuj esiamu kitok ninye.
Naa ng'orai, netoni ilmodook aare tʼembata engoitoi; ore pening', aajo Yesu oimita, neapaa iltoiloi nejo: Laitoriani, nakerai e David, tokordu yook!
Nebuaki esiamu ninje, peiye egira. Kake nepon aapaa iltoiloi lenye nejo: Laitoriani, nakerai e David, tokordu yook!
Neitashe Yesus neipot ninje nejo: Ainyo iyeuu naasaki ndai?
Nejoki ninje ninye: Laitoriani, pebolo ngonyek ang'.
Neibung'aki Yesus ninje engoshoke nanana neporoo ninje ngonyek; nedolishoi ngonyek enye nabokata nesuj ninje ninye.
Ore petaaniki ninje Yerusalem, nebaia Betfage tʼOldonyo loo loirienito, neirriwa te ine Yesus laiteng'enuok aare nejoki ninje:
Embung'a engoitoi metabaiki engang' naitoriokinore ndai, ninepupu nabokata esikiria lipong' naena te nebo o enkurrarru enye; entalakutu, pikireakiki!
Naa teni eliki ndai oltung'ani ororei, entejo: Olaitoriani oyeu ninje; neisho ndai nabokata.
Etaa kuna pookin, pebaia enairoro olayolounoni ejo:
Entiakiti entito Sion: Ng'orai, elotu olkarsis lino enitii, obor, neilepaka esikiria o enkurrarru elipong' nanapita orridati.
Neibung' kulo aiteng'enuok engoitoi neiko anaa peitanapa Yesus ninje,
nereu esikiria lipong' o enkurrarru, neisalaashaki ilkarashi lenye shumata enye, neitoton ninye te shumata enye.
Neisalaash ilkumok tʼesiamu ilkarashi lenye t'engoitoi; nedung'u ilkulekai ilng'osil loo ljanito neisalaash tʼengoitoi.
Ore esiamu naituruk o nasujita neapaa iltoiloi ejo: Hosiana, enkerai e David! Njeitadarari ololotu tʼengarna Olaitoriani! Hosiana te shumata!
Ore pejing' ninye Yerusalem, neing'oling'ola engang' pookin nejo: Kang'ai ele?
Nejo siamin ake: Era ele Yesus, olayolounoni le Nasaret e Galilaya.
Nejing' Yesus engaji sinyati nemir lamirak o lainyang'ak pookin tʼengaji sinyati neibelekeny naraan oo kulo ooitaalita ngoshola o lorikaishi loo lamirak loo lmaita,
nejoki ninje: Etisiraki: „Meata kata nemeipoti engaji ai engaji esayata“, kake intaa ndai ninye engapunet oo laisimak.
Nejing'aki ninye tiatua engaji sinyati ilmodook o lemeidim aashom, neishiunye ninje.
Ore pedol laidasak kituak o layolok lʼesirata mbaak naaiputukunyisho naaitobira ninye, o nkera tiatua engaji sinyati naapaa iltoiloi, nejo: Hosiana, enkerai e David! nelis ninje
nejoki ninye: Ining'ito enajoito kuna? Nejoki Yesus ninje: Ee! Eitu isomama ndai tukul: „Intabaiye enkitadararoto too nkutukie oo nkunyinyi o nganaak?“
Neing'ua ninje alo aulo engang' metabaiki Betania neirrag te ina alo.
Ore enasirie errinyokino engang', neibung' olamei ninye.
Nedol ninye olng'aboli obo tʼembata engoitoi, nenyikaki neitu edol toki te shumata enye neme mbenek ake, nejoki ninye: Mintoki aiu ilmomo nkatan pookin! Neinaaia olng'aboli nabokata.
Ore pedol laiteng'enuok kuna, neing'asia nejo: Kaji eikuna teni einaaia olng'aboli nabokata?

Nealiki Yesus nejoki ninje: Japa, aliki ndai: Teni iatata enkirukoto niming'arrirrorro, nintobiribiri neme ina nʼolng'aboli ake, kake teni ijokiki baiki ele donyo: Tadotunye, tanang'akinoi atua olbalbal! neaku.
Ore pookin eniomonunu tʼesayata, teni irukuruku, nipuopuo aang'amu.
Ore pejing' ninye atua engaji sinyati, nepuonu enetii ninye laidasak kituak o laigwenak lʼolorere, eiteng'enisho ninye, nejo; Ke ti aa golon intobirita kuna? Kang'ai likinjoo ena golon?
Nealiki Yesus nejoki ninje: Ayeu naikilikwan nanu si ndai ororei obo; teni kialikiki, naliki si nanu ndai, ajo ke ti aa golon aitobirita kuna.
Kaji eing'ua enkibatisa e Yohanes? Keing'ua shumata arashu atua iltung'anak? Neirorioro ninje oopeny nejo: Teni kijo: Eing'ua shumata! ejoki yook: Ainyo naa peitu irukuruku ninye?
Teni kijo: Atua iltung'anak! nikiure esiamu; amu edolita pookin Yohanes, ajo era olayolounoni.
Nealiki ninje Yesus nejo: Mikiyolo. Nejoki si ninye ninje: Onaa maliki si nanu ndai, ajo ke ti aa golon aitobirita kuna.
Ijojo aa? Etii oltung'ani obo oata nkera are, nelo ninye enetii olbotor nejo: Nakerai ai, nno taata, ntobira nkyasin tiatua enkuruma ai oo nkeek olmarua.
Nealu ninye nejo: Mayeu naitobir. Tekurum neala nelo.
Nelo enetii oliare nejoki neijia. Nealu si ninye nejo: Laitoriani, alo, — neitu elo.

Kalo obo too kulo pokira are oitobira enanyor menye lenye? Nejoki ninje: ilo botor. Nejoki Yesus ninje: Japa, aliki ndai: Eiturukie ndai laoshok le kodi o iltung'anak lʼentalare aajing' enkarsishu e shumata nelang' ndai.

Amu eewuo Yohanes enitiiti neiteng'en ndai engoitoi naitoriori, neitu irukuruku ndai ninye; kake eiruko ninye laoshok le kodi o iltung'anak lʼentalare. Ore itadua ndai, neitu ialala, pitumutumu aairuko ninye.
Entoning' engai kitanyanyukiet: Etii olopeny engaji otuuno enkuruma oo nkeek olmarua, neitaman osariko netur engumoto naironyishoreki neshet olmnara neitamany laturok nelo enelakwa.
Ore petaanu eng'erunoto oo lmomo, neirriwaa laisyayak lenyena enetii laturok, peng'amu ilmomo lenyena.
Neibung' kulo aturok laisyayak lenyena; near obo, near olekai metua, near oli okuni too soito.
Neitoki airriwaa ilkulekai aisyayak, kumok loolang' kulo lʼelukunya; neikunaki ninje ake neijia.
Tekurum neirriwaki oinoti lenye nejo: Epuo aaanyit oinoti lai.
Ore pedol laturok oinoti, neirorioro oopeny: Nyelido lora olajung'oni; ewotu, mataar ninye metua, pikiea enjung'o enye!
Neibung' ninje ninye nenang'aki oriong' enkuruma oo nkeek olmarua near ninye metua.
Ore pelalotu ele aitoriani lʼenkuruma oo nkeek olmarua, kainyo easaki kulo aturok?
Nejoki ninje ninye: Ear torrono kulo torrok, neitamany ilkulekai aturok atua enkuruma oo nkeek olmarua loopuo aaisho ilmomo tʼenkata enye.
Nejoki Yesus ninje: Eitu isomama tukul tiatua esirata: Ore osoit lotanyaita lashetak, etaa ele osoit kitok lʼolpijata. Etaa ina tʼOlaitoriani, neiputukunyisho ninye too ngonyek ang'?
Onaa, aliki nanu ndai: Eitauni enkarsishu Engai too ndai neishori olorere oiu ilmomo lenyena.
Ore loobatatakino shumata ele soit, negiligila: olourokino ninye, nepurdupurd.
Ore pening' laidasak kituak o Ilfarisayoi kuna kitanyanyukieta enyena, neyolou, aajo eimaki ninje.
Neing'oru eneiko, peibung' ninye; neurei ake siamin, amu etadua ninye, aajo era olayolounoni.
Nealu Yesus neitoki ajoki ninje too nkitanyanyukieta ejo:
Enyanyukie enkarsishu e shumata olkarsis obo oamaka olaiyoni lenye.
Neirriwaa laisyayak lenyena, peipot looyeuni, pepuonu enkiama; neitu eyeu nepuonu.
Neitoki airriwaa ilkulekai aisyayak nejo: Entiakiti looyeuni: Eng'orai, aitobiraka ndai endaa ai, ateyeng'a ilmong'i o ilkerra oopir, eidipate pookin; ewotu enkiama!
Neitu eshilu ninje ina nepuo wuejitin enye: obo enkuruma enye, olekai enkinyang'a enye.
Ore lootelekutua neibung' laisyayak lenyena, nesul near ninje metuata.
Ore pening' olkarsis ina, negoro neirriwaa iltimito lenyena near kulo arak metuata, nepej engang' enye.
Tekurum nejoki laisyayak lenyena: Eitobirakine enkiama, kake eitu eaku too kulo looitobirakaki.
Onaa enjom rishat oo ngoitoi, entorikutu pookin lidolidolo meetu enkiama.
Nepuku laisyayak aapuo ngoitoi neiturrur pookin lootadua, iltorrok o sidan, neborei enkiama too lomon.
Nejing' olkarsis, peing'oraa lomon, nedol oltung'ani obo tiatua lemeishopito olkarash lʼenkiama;
nejoki ninye: Oljore, kaji inkuna teni ijing'u iye ene, miata olkarash lʼenkiama? Negira ninye.
