Nejoki olkarsis laisyayak lenyena: Enteen nkejek o ngaik enyena, entanang'akiti ninye atua enaimin e aulo; neaku ine enkishirata o eonyoto oo lala.
Amu eipotoki ilkumok, negeluni ilkuti.
Nepuo ina kata Ilfarisayoi aanya enkigwena eneiko, perresh ninye too rorei.

Neirriwaki ninye laiteng'enuok lenye te nebo o laisyayak le Herodes. Nejo ninje: Laiteng'enani, kiyolo iye, aajo ira oltung'ani lʼesipata nintorioo aiteng'enu engoitoi Engai tʼesipata nimishilu oltung'ani o obo niming'oraa entemet oltung'ani.
Akae, tiaki yook, ijo aa? Ke sidai, teni eishori kaisar kodi arashu me?
Ore peyolou Yesus olosek lenye nejo: Ndai laitusupatuok, ainyo pikitemiteme?
Entaduaki engosholai e kodi! Neaki ninye endenarion nabo.
Nejoki ninye ninje: Ken e ng'ai ena mua o ena sirata?
Nejoki ninje ninye: Ne kaisar. Nejoki ninye ninje: Akae, enjoo kaisar en e kaisar, o Engai en Engai!
Ore pening' ninje kuna, neiputukuny neing'ua ninye nepuo.
Nepuonu te ina olong' Sadukayoi enetii ninye, oojo: metii empiunoto oo lootuata, neikilikwan ninye,
nejo: Laiteng'enani, etejo opa Mose: Teni ee oltung'ani nemeata ninye nkera, njeea olalashe lenye eng'oroyoni enye, peiye etumoki ainyeyeki olalashe olmuate.
Etii opa atua yook lalashera oopishana. Neamisho ol elukunya nee; ore meata olmuate, neing'uaiki olalashe eng'oroyoni enye;
neijia si ninye oliare o oliokuni metabaiki pokira oopishana.
Ore tʼenkiting'oto oo pookin nee si ninye, ina ng'oroyoni.
Akae, keaku eng'oroyoni en e alo too kulo oopishana tʼengolong' empiunoto? Amu eama pookin ninye.
Nealiki Yesus nejoki ninje: Imanimanaana ndai, amu miyololo sirat o engolon Engai.
Amu metii atua empiunoto looamisho o naayamari, kake enyanyukie ninje ilmalaikan lʼEngai te shumata.
Eitu isomama ndai tiatua mbaak empiunoto oo lootuata enatiaka Engai ndai ejo:
Ara nanu Engai e Abraham o Engai e Isaak o Engai e Yakoob? Mera Engai Engai oo lootuata, kake noo looishiu.
Ore pening' siamin nena, neing'asia tʼeng'eno enye.
Ore pening' Ilfarisayoi, aajo eitigira ninye Sadukayoi, neiturrurro te nebo.
Ore obo too ninje lora olayoloni lʼesirata neikilikwan etem ninye nejo:
Laiteng'enani, kaa kitanapata nara kitok tiatua nkitanapat?
Nejoki Yesus ninye: Meata kata niminyor Olaitoriani, Engai ino, tʼoltau lino pookin o tʼolmumua lino pookin o tʼeng'eno ino pookin.
Ena enkitanapata elukunya nara kitok.
Ore eniare narisiore ninye ena: Meata kata niminyor oltung'ani lʼelatia ino anaa pinyor kion.
Kuna kitanapat are naaum nkitanapat pookin o layolounok.
Ore peiturrurro Ilfarisayoi, neikilikwan Yesus ninje
ejo: Ijojo aa tiatua mbaak e Kristos? Kera enkerai e ng'ai? Nejoki ninje ninye: Ne David.
Nejoki ninje: Kaji eiko teni eipot David ninye tʼolmumua Olaitoriani ejo:
Etiaka Olaitoriani Olaitoriani lai; Totona te tatene ai, metabana napik ilmang'ati linono abori oo nkejek inono?
Akae, teni eipot David ninye Olaitoriani, kaji eiko teni eaku enkerai enye?
Nemetii oltung'ani oitewuo aikilikwana ninye ororei eiter te ina olong'.
Neirorie Yesus te ina kata siamin o laiteng'enuok lenyena
ejo: Etoni layolok lʼesirata o Ilfarisayoi tʼolorika le Mose.
Akae, ore pookin naliki ninje ndai, embung'a nintobiribiri nena, kake emisuj nkitobirat enye. Amu eiro ake, nemeitobir.
Amu een irridat ooiroshi lemenapai, nedumaki ninje ronyi loo ltung'anak, kake meyeu oopeny neing'unye ninje tʼolkimojino lenye.
Eitobir ake nkitobirat, enye pookin, peiye eing'oraa iltung'anak. Neitaa dapashi nkeenda enye esirata nepon too naipuko oo lkilani lenye.
Nenyor aatotoni too wuejitin elukunya tʼenedaareki o tiatua ngajijik Engai,
o nkirorokinot tiatua singiraitin neipot iltung'anak ninje ilkituak.
Eminjo eipoti ndai ilkituak; amu etii olaiteng'enani obo ake too ndai, nera Kristos, nirara ndai pookin lalashera.
Nimimpotipoto oltung'ani o obo tʼenkop minyi linyi, amu obo ake lora Minyi linyi, olotii shumata.
Eminjo eipoti ndai laiteng'enak, amu obo ake lora olaiteng'enani linyi, nera Kristos.
Olora kitok too ndai, njeaku olaisyayani linyi.
Ore pookin loitaa kion kitok, neitadouni; ore oloitadou kion, neitaai kitok.
Ee, kake aiya, ndai layolok lʼesirata o Ilfarisayoi, ndai laitusupatuok, lingenigene enkarsishu e shumata too ngomomi oo ltung'anak!
Ee, kake aiya, ndai layolok lʼesirata o Ilfarisayoi, ndai laitusupatuok, lidaarere ngajijik oo ngolia niyetiyete sayat tʼenkitusupatuo! Onaa ipuopuo aang'amu enkigwena kitok nalang'.

Ee, kake aiya, ndai layolok lʼesirata o Ilfarisayoi, ndai laitusupatuok, limanimana olbalbal o olosho otoiyo, peiye intaata oltung'ani obo olkalotuij ore peidip ataa, nintaata, peaku enkerai eweji enkima aigil are nelang' ndai oopeny.
Ee, kake aiya, ndai larikok modook, ndai lijojo: Me o nyoo, teni eiturujishore oltung'ani engaji sinyati; kake ore oltung'ani oiturujishore esahabu engaji sinyati, eteena kion.
Ndai ilmoda naa modook! Amu kaa kitok: esahabu arashu ina aji sinyati nasinyaa esahabu?
o: Oloiturujishore olperere lʼenkidasare, mera o nyoo; kake oloiturujishore enkidasare natii shumata enye, eteena kion.
Ndai ilmoda naa modook! Amu kaa kitok: enkidasare arashu olperere lʼenkidasare losinyaa enkidasare?
Akae, ore oloiturujishore olperere lʼenkidasare, neiturujishore ninye o pookin natii shumata enye.
Ore oloiturujishore engaji sinyati, neiturujishore ninye o olomanya atua.
Ore oloiturujishore shumata, neiturujishore olorika lʼEngai o olotonie shumata enye.

Ee, kake aiya, ndai layolok lʼesirata o Ilfarisayoi, ndai laitusupatuok, linjoioio ematua e tomon olkujitai orropil o embeu naitorropil ndaikin, nipalipala mbaak kituak tiatua nkitanapat, eji enkigwena o eng'adunoto o enkirukoto! Meata kata nemeitobiri nena, nemepali nkulie.
Ndai larikok modook, lijiaiaia engojong'ani, niijoojo endames.
Ee, kake aiya, ndai layolok lʼesirata o Ilfarisayoi, ndai laitusupatuok, lisujusuju oriong' oo nkwarun o motiok, nebore atua enkisima o entootiki!
Iye Olfarisayos modooni, tang'asa suja atua enkwaru o emoti, petum ataa sidai oriong' enye.
Ee, kake aiya, ndai layolok lʼesirata o Ilfarisayoi, ndai laitusupatuok, linyanyukiekie nkuraren naaelaki tʼenturoto, nelioi te boo ekaja, kake ore tiatua ebore loik loo lootuata o olduruki pookin!
Neijia baiki ndai: iliolio te boo too ltung'anak anaa looata esupato, kake ore tiatua eiganya ndai enkitusupatuo o ntorrok.
Ee, kake aiya, ndai layolok lʼesirata o Ilfarisayoi, ndai laitusupatuok, lishetishete nkuraren oo layolounok, nikajikaja oo looata esupato,
ijojo: Ten emutu kitii yook tʼenkata oo loopapa lang', anaata eitu king'arie ninje osarge loo layolounok!
Nji injakenunu tiatua ndai oopeny, ajo irara nkera oo kulo lootara layolounok.
Aiya, enganya naa si ndai entemet oo loominyi linyi.
Ndai lasuria o embeu oo lasuria! Kaji inkoko teni ikwetikwete enkiminata enkima e gehena?

Onaa, eng'orai, airriwaki nanu ndai layolounok o lang'eni o layolok lʼesirata; niariara ilkulekai lenye metuata nisheshe, niariara ilkulekai lenye too nkeenda tiatua ngajijik Engai inyi, ninyalinyala ninje too ngang'itie,
pebaiki ndai sargeta pookin supati ooibukokinote enkop, eiter tʼosarge le Abel supat metabaiki osarge le Sakarias, enkerai e Barakias, litaara metua tʼempolos ewueji sinyati o olperere lʼenkidasare.
Japa, aliki ndai, ajo ebaiki kuna pookin ena kishon.

Oi Yerusalem, Yerusalem, niar layolounok metuata ninang' too soito likirriwakaki! Kaigil aja atayeuo naiturrur nkera inono anaa peiturrur enkikusieki te nebo nkera enyena tiabori oo naipuko, neitu iyeuu ndai!
Eng'orai, eing'uaikini ndai engaji inyi, metii toki.
Amu aliki ndai: Mikintokiki aadol nanu tukul eiter taata, metabana nipuopuo aajo: Njeitadarari ololotu tʼengarna Olaitoriani.
Nepuku Yesus tʼengaji sinyati nelo, nepuonu laiteng'enuok lenyena aaitadol ninye enjetunoto engaji sinyati.
Nealu Yesus nejoki ninje: Midolidolo kuna pookin? Japa, aliki ndai: Meleku tene osoit te shumata olekai soit lemerratanyuni.
Ore peton tʼOldonyo loo loirienito, nepuonu laiteng'enuok enetii ninye tʼenkilepata nejo: Tiaki yook, kanu eaku kuna? Ainyo olponoto lilotunye o lʼenkiting'oto olmaa?
Nealu Yesus nejoki ninje: Eng'orai, pemeitapong'oo ndai oltung'ani.
Amu epuo aapuonu ilkumok tʼengarna ai nejo: Ara nanu Kristos, nepuo aalej ilkumok.
Nipuopuo aaning' njorin o ririn loo njorin; eng'orai, pemiruturutu. Amu meata kata nemeaku nona pookin, kake eton eitu ebau enkiting'oto.
Amu edumunye olorere aarare olekai orere o enkarsishu nabo engai arsishu, nepuo aaku lameitin o nkeaitin o nkikirikirat enkop too wuejitin o wuejitin.
Nera nona pookin enkiterata oo sinaitin.
Ore te ina kata nepuo aaitarasaki ndai atua enkisiloto, nepuo aar ndai entuata. Nipuopuo aaku looibaini tiatua loreren pookin t'olbae lʼengarna ai.
Nepuo aarika ilkumok neikitalaro oopeny neibaro oopeny.
Nepuo aainyototo layolounok kumok lʼelejare nepuo aaiminye ilkumok.
Tiaraki napona ntorrok, nelairobiju enyorrata oo lkumok.
Kake olong'iri metabaiki enkiting'oto, ninye lolapok.
Neinosuni kulo omon lʼeng'ida o lʼenkarsishu tiatua olmaa pookin, peaku enjakenishu too loreren pookin, tekurum nelotu enkiting'oto.
Teni ipuopuo aadol entorroni erruoroto nairoro olayolounoni Daniel, eitashe tʼewueji sinyati, oloisoma, njeyolou!
Ore lootii Yudaya, njekwetiki te ina kata ildonyo;
oloti keper aji, njoo meitoki adou, peau natii atua engaji enye;
ore olotii atua enkuruma, njoo merrinyo, peau ilkilani lenyena.
Ee, kake aiya, naamena o naaitanakisho too nona olong'i!
Entasaishoto, pemeaku enkwetata inyi tʼenkata oloirujuruj arashu tʼengolong' naeng'ieng'areki.
Amu elaaku te ina kata osina kitok leitu eaku neba tʼenkiterata olmaa metabaiki taata, nemeitoki aaku tukul.
Naa ten emutu meitadorropi nona olong'i, anaata mepoku oltung'ani o obo; kake epuoi aaitadorropu nona olong'i tʼolbae loo lootegeluaki.
Teni elajoki ndai te ina kata oltung'ani: Eng'orai, etii Kristos ene! arashu: idye! — emiruk.
Amu epuo aainyototo ilkristoi lʼelejare o layolounok lʼelejare kumok, neitobir ilponot kituak o nkiputukunyot, pepuoi aaitapong'oo baiki lootegeluaki, teni eidimu.
Eng'orai, aitera aliki ndai.
Akae, teni ejoki ninje ndai: Eng'orai, etii ang'ata! emipuku; — eng'orai, etii aji! emiruk.
Amu neijia anaa enkiwang'ata naing'ua enkilepunoto nelioi tʼendoiyoroto, neijia elaaku elotunoto Enkerai oltung'ani;
amu ewueji pookin netii empopong', neiturrurrokino ilmotonyi.
Ore pesioki aaidipai sinaitin lo nona olong'i, neopokino engolong' enaimin nemeitoki ailang'isho olapa, nesulunye lakir te shumata, neing'unung'un ngoloni e shumata.

Nelalioi te ina kata olponoto lʼEngerai oltung'ani te shumata. Nepuo aaishir tʼolbae lʼosina njomito pookin olmaa, nepuo aadol Enkerai oltung'ani elotu te shumata erukenya e shumata tʼengolon o tʼenkitook kitok.
Nelairriwaa ninye ilmalaikan lenyena tʼoltoilo kitok lʼesekegwa, nepuo aaiturrur ninje lootegeluaki lenyena aaitung'ua ilkutat ong'wan, eiter tematua nabo metabaiki engai matua e shumata.
Enteng'enuoto enkitanyanyukiet tʼolng'aboli: teni enanau olng'osilai lenye nedanyu mbenek, niyolouu, aajo etaana enkata olodalu.
Neija si ndai, teni idolidolo kuna pookin, entayolou, aajo etii enetaana metabaiki kutukaji.
Japa, aliki ndai: Memuta ena kishon, metabana neaku kuna pookin.
Epuo aamuta shumata o enkop, kake mepuo aamuta rorei lainei tukul.
Nemetii oloyolo ina olong' o ina saa, baiki ilmalaikan le shumata o Oinoti, neme Papa lai ake openy.
Kake neijia anaa petaa too ngolong'i e Noa, neijia elaaku elotunoto Enkerai oltung'ani.
Amu neijia anaa petaa ninje too nona olong'i, eton eitu eaku engare kitok: edaa, neokisho, neamisho, neamari, metabaiki ena olong' natijing'ie Noa engalawa;
neitu eshilu ninje, metabana nelotu engare nea pookin, — neijia eaku baiki elotunoto Enkerai oltung'ani.
Nelaaku etii aare enkuruma, nepuoi aang'amu obo, neing'uari olekai;
neituutisho are eneituutishoreki, nepuoi aang'amu nabo, neing'uari engai.
Akae, enjololoto, amu miyololo, kaa kata elalotu Olaitoriani linyi.
Kake entayolou ena: Ten emutu eyolo olopeny engaji enkata nalotunye olapurroni, anaata eishololo nemeisho engaji enye metuudi.
Onaa entobirakinoto si ndai, amu elalotu Enkerai oltung'ani tʼenkata nimijojo.
Akae, kang'ai lora olaisyayani airukoni naa ng'en, otipika olaitoriani lenye shumata enkisyayare enye, peisho kulekai aisyayak endaa tʼenkata enye?
Tesh ele aisyayani loinepu olaitoriani lenye eiko nji, teni elotu.
Japa, aliki ndai, Elapik ninye shumata oo masaa enyena pookin.
Kake ore olaisyayani torrono olojo tʼoltau lenye: Mesioku olaitoriani lai!
neiter aar lalashera lenyena, nenya neokisho te nebo o lamerak:
nelotu olaitoriani lʼele aisyayani tʼengolong' nemeanyunye o tʼesaa nemeyolo,
ne-dung'udung' too nkeenda osesen lenye neisho earata enye te nebo o laitusupatuok; neaku ina alo enkishirata o eonyoto oo lala.
Nelanyanyukiei enkarsishu e shumata ntoiye tomon naatudumutua taai enye, nepuku aapuo aanang'are osanja.
Kake imiet moda too ninje, naa ng'eni imiet.
Nedumu kuna moda taai enye neitu eshoroo eilata te nebo o ninje.
Kake ore kuna ng'eni neshoroo eilata too ltuleta lenye te nebo o taai enye.
Ore peimutie osanja, neimug pookin neirura.
Ore tʼempolos enkiarie neaku olodoo: Eng'orai, elotu osanja, entupukutu aapuo aanang'are ninye!
Neinyototo nabokata kuna toiye pookin neitobir taai enye.
Nejoki kuna moda nena ng'eni: Enjoo yook ematua eilata inyi, amu ee taai ang'.
Kake nealiki kuna ng'eni ninje nejo: Me neijia, pemekilau yook o ndai; enaikash, embung'a engoitoi aapuo enetii lamirak, pinyang'ung'u oopeny.
Ore peidip aashom ninje, peinyang'u, nelotu osanja; ore naaitobirakinote nejing' te nebo o ninye enkiama, neigeni kutukaji.
Ore tekurum nepuonu si ninje kuna kulie toiye nejo: Laitoriani, laitoriani, tabolu yook!
Kake nealiki ninye nejo: Japa, aliki ndai: Mayolo nanu ndai.
Onaa enjololoto! amu miyololo engolong' arashu esaa nalotu Enkerai oltung'ani.
Amu neijia anaa peipot oltung'ani oyeu nelo olekai osho loo nkwapi laisyayak lenyena, neshum too ninje masaa enyena,
neisho obo talanta imiet, olekai talanta are, oliokuni entalanton nabo, oltung'ani pookin anaa peidim ninye, nelo olekai osho.
Ore olotang'amua talanta imiet, neibung' engoitoi neitobirishore ninje netumie nkulie talanta imiet.
Neiko neijia ake si ninye oloata are, netumie nkulie are endupoto.
Ore ele otang'amua nabo, nelo ninye, neturoki enkop neshum ngoshola olaitoriani lenye.
Ore peishunye enkata kitok, nelotu olaitoriani loo kulo aisyayak neikenishore ninje.
Nelotu ele lotang'amua talanta imiet, neaunye nkulie talanta imiet, nejo: Laitoriani, itushuma te nanu talanta imiet, ng'orai, ainoto too ninje endupoto oo nkulie talanta imiet.
Nejoki olaitoriani lenye ninye: Ee, laisyayani sidai naa airukoni, itaa supat to nkuti, ayeu naapik iye, pintore nkumok; tijing'a atua eng'ida Olaitoriani lino!
Nelotu si ninye ele lotang'amua talanta are nejo: Laitoriani, itushuma te nanu talanta are; ng'orai, ainoto too ninje endupoto oo nkulie talanta are.
Nejoki olaitoriani lenye ninye: Ee, laisyayani sidai naa airukoni, itaa supat too nkuti, ayeu naapik iye, pintore nkumok; tijing'a atua eng'ida olaitoriani lino!
Nelotu si ninye, ele otang'amua entalanton nabo, nejo: Laitoriani, aatayolo iye, ajo ira oltung'ani ogol oshoke, nisambu neitu iun, ninturrur neitu isuaia;
naureishoi, nalo nashum entalanton ino tʼenkop. Ng'orai, nko enino.
Nealiki olaitoriani lenye nejoki: Iye laisyayani torrono nishal! itayolo, ajo aisambu, eitu aun, naiturrur, eitu aisuaia;
akae, anaata itushuma ngoshola ainei too laitaalak loo ngoshola, ore palotu nanu, anaata ainoto nanu enara enai o endupoto enye.
Onaa entoorutu ninye entalanton enye, enjoo oloata talanta tomon.
Amu ore pookin looata, neishori ninye, petum nkumok; ore pookin lemeata, neoruni baiki ina naata.
Entanang'akiti olaisyayani lemeaku atua enaimin e aulo; neaku inalo enkishirata o eonyoto oo lala.
Teni elalotu Enkerai oltung'ani tʼenkitook enye o ilmalaikan sinyat pookin te nebo o ninye, nelaton te ina kata tʼolorika lʼenkitook enye,
neiturrurro loreren pookin tʼengomom enye; nerish ninye ninje tʼempolos anaa olairritani orish nkerra o ilkerra.
Nearaki nkerra ematua e tatene enye o ilkerra kedyanye.
Ore peidipai, nejoki olkarsis kulo lootii tatene enye: Ewotu ndai, lootamayana Papa lai, entujung'u enkarsishu naitobirakaki ndai tʼenkiterata olmaa!
Amu aainosa olamei, nikinjosho endaa; ainoto enkure, nikintookioko; ataa olomoni, nikintoomonimono;
ashomo neijia, nikinjopishopo; atamoiya, nikibaikiki; aateenaki, nipuonunu enatii.
Nealiki te ina kata kulo supati ninye nejo: Laitoriani, kanu kitadua iye iata olamei, nikintoti iye? arashu iata enkure, nikintook iye?
Kanu kitadua iye ira olomoni, nikintoomon iye? arashu ishomo neijia, nikinjop iye?
Kanu kitadua iye itamoiya arashu kiteenaki, nikipuonu enitii iye?
Nealiki olkarsis nejoki ninje: Japa, aliki ndai: Ore enitaasakitia obo tiatua kulo alashera lainei kutiti, kitaasakitia nanu.
Ore peidip, nejoki si ninje lootii kedyanye: Entung'aiyoki nanu, ndai lootediaki, enjom atua enkima nememuta, naitobirakaki satan o ilmalaikan lenyena!
Amu aainosa olamei, neitu kinjosho endaa; natum enkure, neitu kintookioko;
ataa olomoni, neitu kintoomonimono; ashomo neijia, neitu kinjopishopo; atamoiya naaeni, neitu kibaikiki.
Nepuo aalu ake si ninje nejo: Laitoriani, kanu kitadua iye iata olamei arashu enkure arashu ira olomoni arashu ishomo neijia arashu itamoiya arashu kiteenaki, neitu kisyayaki iye?
Nealiki si ninye ninje nejo: Japa, aliki ndai: Ore eneitu iasakiki obo tiatua kulo loora kutiti, neitu kiasakiki si nanu.
Nepuo kulo atua emion nemeiting', kake supati atua empuan nemeiting'.
Neaku ore peidip Yesus kulo rorei pookin, nejoki ninye laiteng'enuok lenyena:
Iyololo, aajo ore peishunye ngolong'i are, neaku pasaka; nepuoi aaitarasaa Enkerai oltung'ani, peoshokini esalaba.
Nepuo aaiturrurro te ina kata laidasak kituak o layolok lʼesirata o laigwenak lʼolorere tʼengaji olaidasani kitok oji Kayafas,
neigwena te nebo, peiye eibung' Yesus tʼolosek near ninye metua.
Etejo ninje ake: Me tʼenkata oo ngolong'i kituak, pemeaku enkiposhai tiatua olorere!
Ore etii Yesus te Betania, atua engaji e Simon loata enkea oo lbolot,
nenyikaki ninye eng'oroyoni nabo, naata oltulet lʼeilata narropil nagol enkinyang'a, nejiaki ninye elukunya, eton edaa.
Ore pedol laiteng'enuok lenyena ina, neibai nejo: Ken e nyoo ena kiminata?
Amu anaata etimiraki ena ilata too ngoshola kumok neishori laisinak.
Ore peyolou Yesus ina, nejoki ninje: Ainyo pinosiesie osina eng'oroyoni?
Etii laisinak atua ndai ngolong'i pookin, kake mikiatata nanu ngolong'i pookin.
Ore paatubukoko ninye ena ilata osesen lai, naaitobiraki enukare ai.
Japa, aliki ndai, ore tʼewueji pookin neinosuni kulo omon lʼeng'ida, neinosuni baiki nedamuni enaitobira ninye.
Nelo te ina kata obo too lelo tomon o are, oji Yudas Iskariotes, enetii laidasak kituak,
nejo: Kainyo iyeuu nikinjosho, paitarasaki ndai ilo? Ayeu naitarasaki ninye ndai. Nedung'oki ninye ngoshola osom.
Neiter aing'oru te ina kata erishata naitarasarie ninye.
Ore tʼengolong' elukunya oo lmkaten lemeisiijo nepuonu laiteng'enuok enetii Yesus nejoki ninye: Kaji iyeu nikintobirakinye endaata e pasaka?
Nejo ninye: Enjom engang' enetii ng'ania, entiakiti ninye: Ejo Olaiteng'enani: Etaana enkata ai; ayeu naitaa pasaka tʼengaji ino te nebo o laiteng'enuok lainei.
Neiko laiteng'enuok neijia anaa peitanapa Yesus ninje, neitobir pasaka.
Ore peaku teipa, neton te nebo o kulo aiteng'enuok tomono are.
Ore edaa ninje, nejo: Aalikioo obo too ndai.
Neilish ninje naleng', neiter oltung'ani pookin ajoki ninye: Ke nanu, Laitoriani?
Nealu ninye nejo: Ore ele likiriamaki endaa tʼengirra, ninye laalo alikioo.
Elo Enkerai oltung'ani anaa petisirakaki ninye; ee, kake aiya ele tung'ani lolaitarasaa Engerai oltung'ani! Eikash, ten emutu eitu eiuni ele tung'ani.
Nealu Yudas otolikioiye ninye nejo: Ke nanu, Laiteng'enani? Nejoki ninye: Itejo iye.
Ore einosita endaa, neibung' Yesus olmkate, nemayan nebelibel neisho laiteng'enuok lenyena nejo: Enkoito, entaam; nera ele osesen lai.
Neibung' enkwaru nejo ashe, neisho ninje nejo: Entookie pookin ena;
amu era ele osarge lai lʼosotua ng'ejuk, oibukorieki ilkumok, peaku enkitaunoto oo nkitarruot.
Kake aliki ndai: Maitoki aok tukul eiter taata te ina ishoi oo nkeek olmarua metabaiki ina olong' naok eng'ejuk te nebo o ndai tiatua enkarsishu e Papa lai.
Ore peidip aaitadarai, nepuku boo, nepuo Oldonyo loo loirienito.
Nejoki Yesus ninje: Kipuopuo aarikare ndai pookin tʼena kiarie; amu etisiraki: Alaar olairritani, neisardak enjoo oo ntare.
Kake ore paidip atopiu, naaiturukie ndai alo Galilaya.
Nealiki Petros nejoki ninye: Teni kirikare ilkulekai pookin, namaarikare nanu tukul.
Nejoki Yesus ninye: Japa, aaliki iye: Ore tʼena kiarie, eton eitu eorito olkikusieki, nikimiki iye kat uni.
Nejoki Petros ninye: Baiki teni ae te nebo o iye, maamiki iye. Nejo laiteng'enuok pookin neijia.
Nelotu Yesus te nebo o ninje metabaiki enkuruma naji Getsemane nejoki laiteng'enuok lenyena: Entotoni tene, palo idyalo asaisho.
Nerik ninye Petros o nkera are e Sebedayos neiter atum enkilishoto neisuuto.
Nejoki Yesus ninje te ina kata: Eata olmumua lai enkilishoto metabaiki enkea; entotoni tene, enjololoto te nebo o nanu!
Nenyikaa peno, nebatata aijululo nesaisho ejo: Papa lai, teni eaku, njaalusoo ena kwaru; kake me neijia anaa payeu nanu, njeaku anaa piyeu iye!
Nelotu enetii laiteng'enuok neinepu, eirurate, nejoki Petros: Ke nji miatata engolon ninjololorere te nebo o nanu esaa nabo?
Enjololoto, entasaishoto, pemijing'ijing'i atua enkitasuroto! Eidipakine Olmumua, kake eshal osesen.
Neitoki alo engaigil e are nesaisho nejo: Papa lai, teni meaku, paalusoo ena kwaru, pamaok ninye, njeaku eyeunoto ino!
Nelotu neinepu ninje, einyaakitia aairura, amu eiroshiutuo ngonyek enye.
Neitoki aing'ua ninje nelo nesaisho en e uni nelimu kulo rorei ake.
Tekurum nelotu enetii laiteng'enuok lenyena nejoki ninje: Erraga tekurum, eeng'ieng'ata! Eng'orai, etabaua enkata, peitarasakini Enkerai oltung'ani atua ngaik oo laitarruok.
Enyoito, maapeti! Eng'orai, etinyikua olaaitarasaa.
Ore epon eirorita, ng'orai, nelotu Yudas, obo too kulo tomon o are, te nebo o esiamu kitok, neata lalema o siaren, eing'ua enetii laidasak kituak o laigwenak lʼolorere.
Eidipa aishoo olaitarasaroni lenye ninje olponoto nejo: Ore olang'utut, ninye ilo; embung'a ninye!
Nelotu nabokata enetii Yesus nejo: Supai, Laiteng'enani! neng'utut ninye.
Nejoki Yesus ninye: Oljore, kainyo ieunye? Nepuonu neaki Yesus ngaik neibung' ninye.
Naa ng'orai, obo too kulo lootaboitare Yesus, neitorioo engaina enye neshitu olalem lenye neosh olaisyayani lʼolaidasani kitok adung'u ninye enkiyok.
Nejoki Yesus ninye: Torrinyoki olalem lino ewueji enye! amu ore oltung'ani pookin loibung' olalem, neimin tʼolalem.
Arashu ijo iye, ajo maidim atasaya Papa lai, paairriwaki ninye iltimito tomon o are loo lmalaikan?
Kaji eiko peidipai naa esirata, ajo neijia meata kata nemeaku?

Ore te ina kata nejoki Yesus nena siamin: Itupukutuo ndai too lalema o siaren ninyanyukiekie anaa iltung'anak loomirita olaisimani, pikimbung'ubung'u. O patotona too ngolong'i pookin tiatua engaji sinyati neiteng'enisho, neitu kimbung'ubung'u.
Kake etaa kuna pookin, peiye ebaia sirat o layolounok. Neing'ua te ina kata laiteng'enuok pookin ninye aailanyisho.
Ore kulo looibung'a Yesus, nerik enetii olaidasani kitok, Kayafas, enetutumore layolok lʼesirata o laigwenak.
Nesujita Petros ninye tʼenelakwa metabaiki engang' olaidasani kitok, nejing' atua neton te nebo o laisyayak pedol enkiting'oto.
Neing'oraki laidasak kituak o enkigwena pookin Yesus enjakenishu elejare, peiye ear ninye metua,
neitu etum o nyoo. Tekurum nepuonu iljaken aare lʼelejare
nejo: Etejo ele: Aidim atigila ena aji sinyati, naitoki ashet ninye too ngolong'i uni,
Neinyototo olaidasani kitok nejoki ninye: Mialu ororei kainyo kinjakenoki kulo?
Negira Yesus. Nealiki olaidasani kitok ninye nejoki: Aaiturujaki iye tʼEngai naishiu, piliki yook, ten ake ira iye Kristos, Oinoti lʼEngai.
Nejoki Yesus ninye: Itejo iye. Kake aaliki iye: Ore eiter taata nipuopuo aadol Enkerai oltung'ani eton te tatene Engolon, elotu tʼerukenya e shumata.
Nepolos te ina kata olaidasani kitok ilkilani lenyena nejo: Etamoro Engai! Kainyo pikintoki aayeu niking'oru iljaken? Eng'orai, itoning'o taata nji emoroto enye.
Ijojo aa? Nealu ninje nejo: Meata kata nemee!
Nenotaki ninje ngamulak engomom enye, near ninye too ntinan, near kulekai ninye too ndapi
nejo: Tiaki yook, iye Kristos, kang'ai likitaara?
Neton Petros ake te boo engaji: nelotu enetii ninye engaisyayani nabo nejo: Itii si iye e nebo o Yesus le Galilaya.
Kake nemiki ninye too ngomomi pookin nejo: Mayolo enijoito.
Ore pepuku nebaiki kishomi, nedol engai aisyayani ninye nejoki kulo ootii: Etii opa ele e nebo o Yesus le Nasaret.
Neitoki amiki tʼenkiturujata: Mayolo nanu ele tung'ani.
Ore tʼenkiti kata nepuonu looitashe te ine nejoki Petros: Esipa, ira si iye obo lenye, amu kilimu enkiroroto ino.
Neiter ninye adek kion neituruj, ajo: Mayolo nanu ele tung'ani. Neorito nabokata olkikusieki.
Nedamu Petros ilo rorei le Yesus lotiaka ninye: Ore eton eitu eorito olkikusieki, nikilamiki aigil uni, nelo aulo neishir tʼemion.
Ore pekenyu, neigwena laidasak kituak o laigwenak lʼolorere tʼolbae le Yesus, petum aataar metua.
Neen ninje ninye nerik neitarasaki olkitok lʼolosho Pontios Pilatos.
Ore pedol Yudas oitarasaiye ninye, ajo eidipaki aaigwenaki, neirridu ninye entorroni enye, nerrinyoki laidasak kituak o laigwenak kuna dung'ot oo ngoshola
nejo: Aitarruoiye, tiaraki natolikioiye osarge lemeata eleyata. Nejo ninje: Akae, naa ainyo naatii ninje yook? Ng'orai, eninko openy!
Nenang'aki ninye kuna dung'ot oo ngoshola atua engaji sinyati nedumunye nelo negor kion.
Nedumu laidasak kituak kuna dung'ot oo ngoshola nejo: Menare, teni kipik nena atua osanduku lʼEngai; amu era enkinyang'a osarge.
Neigwena neinyang'u too ninje enkuruma olaitobirani loo motiok, penukieki lomon.
Onaa eipoti ena kuruma enkuruma osarge oo taata.
Nebaia enairoro olayolounoni Yeremiya ejo: Eibung'a ninje ndung'ot osom oo ngoshola nara enkinyang'a olotimiraki loinvang'utua ninje too nkera Israel,
neishooio tʼenkuruma olaitobirani loo motiok anaa paaitanapa Olaitoriani.
Neitashe Yesus tʼengomom olkitok lʼolosho neikilikwan olkitok lʼolosho ninye nejo: Ira iye olkarsis loo Yudayoi? Nejoki Yesus ninye: Itejo iye.
Ore peitang'or laidasak kituak o laigwenak ninye, neitu ealu ororei.
Nejoki Pilatos ninye: mining'ito, ke mbaak aja kintang'orie ninje?
Neitu ealiki ninye ororei o obo neiputukuny baiki olkitok lʼolosho naleng'.
Ore tʼenkata oo ngolong'i kituak neata olkitok lʼolosho orregie, pelaaki olorere obo loena lotayeutuo ninje.
Neata ake te ina kata oloena oyoloi oji Barabas.
Akae, ore peiturrurro ninje, nejoki Pilatos ninje: Kalo iyeuu nalaaki ndai? Barabas arashu Yesus oipoti Kristos?
Amu etayolo, ajo eitarasutua ninye tʼengilata e tau.
Ore peton ninye tʼolorika lʼenkigwena, neirriwaki eng'oroyoni enye embae nejo: Miasaki toki ilo loata esupato; amu aaitamioki too nkumok taata tiatua enkidetidetata tʼolbae lenye.
Neisis laidasak kituak o laigwenak olorere, peyeu ninje Barabas neiminye Yesus
Nealu olkitok lʼolosho nejoki ninje: Kalo iyeuu, palaaki ndai too kulo pokira are? Nejo ninje: Barabas!
Nejoki Pilatos ninje: Akae, kaji aikunaki Yesus loipoti Kristos? Nejo ninje pookin: Njoo eoshokini esalaba!
Nejo olkitok lʼolosho: Kaa torroni eitobira ninye? Nepon ninje naleng' aapaa iltoiloi ejo: Njoo eoshokini esalaba!
Ore pedol Pilatos, ajo meidim o nyoo, epona ake oloilepilep, neibung' engare neisuj ngaik tʼengomom olorere nejo: Maata nanu eng'oki tʼosarge lʼele tung'ani lora supat; eng'orai ndai oopeny!
Nealu olorere pookin nejo: Njelotu osarge lenye shumata ang' o shumata oo nkera ang'!
Nelaaki te ina kata ninje Barabas; ore peidip ataara Yesus too nkeenda, neitarasaa ninye, petumi aatooshoki esalaba.
Nerik isikerin lʼolkitok Yesus atua engaji enkigwena, neitasheiki ninye oltim olulung'a,
neitai ninye ilkilani neishopoki olkila odo,
neoi olmarisian loo lkikarreta neishopoki elukunya enye neitarasaki ninye eng'udi olmoloi engaina enye e tatene negil kung' tʼengomom enye nekweniye ninye nejo: Supai, lekarsis loo Yudayoi!
Nenotaki ninye ngamulak neoru eng'udi olmoloi nearie ninye elukunya.
Ore peidip ninje aatakweniye ninye, neitai ilo kila neishopoki ninye ilkilani lenyena nerik, peoshoki esalaba.
Ore peidip aatupukutu, netumore ninje oltung'ani obo le Kirene oji engarna enye Simon; neitanap ilo tʼengolon, penap esalaba enye.
Ore pebaia ewueji naji Golgota, nera enkitaalata enye: Emborbor,
neisho ninje ninye engare naitiming'anisho neshulare olodua; ore peinyorrinyor, neitu eyeu neok.

Ore peidip ninje aatooshokiti ninye esalaba, neor ninje ilkilani lenyena neosh olenkukuo, peiye ebaia enairoro olayolounoni: Etoorikinote ilkilani lainei tʼempolos enye neosh olenkukuo tʼolbae lʼolkarash lai.
Netoni aarrip ninye te ina alo.
Nepik shumata elukunya enye enkitang'oroto enye natisiraki: Era ele Yesus, olkarsis loo Yudayoi.
Neoshokini te ine laisimak aare esalaba te nebo o ninye, obo te tatene o olekai te kedyanye.
Ore kulo looimita engoitoi nemor ninye eipiripir lukuny enye,
nejo: Iye logil engaji Engai nintoki ashet ninye too ngolong'i uni, ntopua kion! Teni ira Oinoti lʼEngai, tadou tʼesalaba!
Neiko si ninje neijia, laidasak kituak, nekweniye ninye te nebo o layolok lʼesirata o laigwenak nejo:
Eitopua kulekai nemeidim aitopua kion. Teni era ninye olkarsis le Israel, njedou taata tʼesalaba, pikiruk si yook ninye.
Eting'idare ninye Engai; njeitopok taata, teni enyor ninye; amu etejo ninye: Ara nanu Oinoti lʼEngai.
Etamoro si ninje laisimak ootooshokoki esalaba te nebo o ninye.
Ore eiter te saa ile nejing' enaimin shumata enkop pookin metabaiki saa enturuj.
Ore te saa enturuj nedar Yesus tʼoltoilo lʼengolon nejo: Eli, Eli, lamaa asabtani? eji: Engai ai, Engai ai, ainyo pikitung'aiye?
Ore kulekai looitashe te ine nening' nejo: Eipot Eliya.
Nekwet nabokata obo lenye neibung' enjutet neigany ninye engare naitiming'anisho nepik shumata eng'udi olmoloi neitook ninye.
Nejo ake kulekai: Tapala, maing'orai, ten ake elotu Eliya aitopok ninye.
Ore peidip Yesus ataapai kat are oltoilo tʼengolon, nedung'o tau.
Naa ng'orai, nepolosa olkarash lʼengaji sinyati matuan are, eiter te shumata metabaiki enkop.
Neikirikira enkop nedanya soito kituak, nebolo nkuraren nepuku seseni kumok loo sinyat ooirura;
ore peidip aatupukutu, eidipe empiunoto enye, nejing' engang' sinyati nelioi too lkumok.
Ore pedol olkitok loo sikerin te nebo o lootaboitare ninye, erripito Yesus, enkikirikirata enkop o mbaak naataa, neureishoi naleng' nejo: Esipa, era ele tung'ani Oinoti lʼEngai!
Netii ng'oroyok kumok naaing'oraitie t'enelakwa, naa nena naatusuja Yesus, eing'ua Galilaya neisyayaki ninye;
netii empolos enye Maria Magdalena o Maria, ng'otonye e Yakobos o Yosef, o ng'otonye oo nkera e Sebedayos.
Ore peaku teipa, nelotu oltung'ani obo adupani le Arimatia, oji engarna enye Yosef, nera si ninye olaiteng'enuoni le Yesus.
Nelo ninye enetii Pilatos neomonu osesen le Yesus. Neitanapu Pilatos, peishori ninye.
Neibung' Yosef osesen neirin ninye tʼolkarash opukenya sidai
nepik ninye atua enkurare natabatua tiatua osoit neibeleleng'oki osoit kitok kutukaji enkurare, nelo.
Netii ina alo Maria Magdalena o engai Maria, netoni tʼeneitoriokinore enkurare.
Ore tʼengai olong' nasuj engolong' enkitobirakinore, neiturrurrokino laidasak kituak o Ilfarisayoi Pilatos
nejo: Laitoriani, kitadamutua, aajo etejo ilo alejani te ina kata eishiu: Ayeu napiu, eishunye ngolong'i uni.

Akae, ntanapu, perripi enkurare metabaiki engolong' e uni, pemepuonu laiteng'enuok lenyena kiarie aapurroo ninye, nejoki olorere: Etopiwuo ninye aing'ua lootuata, — nelang' elejare enkiting'oto en elukunya.
Nejoki Pilatos ninje: Iatata larripok, enjom, entorrip naleng' anaa piyololo.
Nepuo ninje nerrip naleng' enkurare te nebo o larripok neen osoit tʼolmishire.
Ore peishunye engolong' naeng'ieng'areki nekenyu engolong' elukunya enjuma, nelotu Maria Magdalena o engai Maria aaing'oraa enkurare.
Naa ng'orai, neaku enkikirikirata kitok enkop. Amu etadouo olmalaika lʼOlaitoriani te shumata nelotu neibeleleng'oo osoit te kutukaji neton te shumata enye.
Nenyanyukie emua enye enkiwang'ata neibor ilkilani lenyena anaa esiret.
Neikirikira larripok tʼenkuretishu neaku anaa lootuata.
Nealiki olmalaika nejoki ng'oroyok: Emiureisho ndai! Amu ayolo nanu, ajo ing'oruru Yesus otooshokoki esalaba.
Metii ene; amu etopiwuo anaa petejo. Ewotu, eng'orai ewueji neirragie Olaitoriani.

Embung'a engoitoi aasioki, entiakiti laiteng'enuok lenyena, aajo etopiwuo ninye aing'ua lootuata. Eng'orai, elaiturukie ninye ndai alo Galilaya, nipuopuo aadol ninye te ina alo. Eng'orai, atiaka ndai.
Nedumunye ninje aasioki t:enkurare, eata enkuretishu o eng'ida kitok, nekwet aainosaki laiteng'enuok lenyena. Ore epuoito ninje aainosaki laiteng'enuok lenyena,
naa ng'orai, netumore Yesus ninje, nejo: Entakwenia! Nepuonu neibung' nkejek enyena neserem ninye.
Nejoki Yesus ninje: Emiureisho! Enjom, enosakiti lalashera lainei, pepuo Galilaya, ina alo aapuo aadolie.
Ore epuoito tʼengoitoi, nepuonu kulekai too larripok atua engang', neinosaki laidasak kituak mbaak pookin naataa.
Neiturrurro ninje te nebo o laigwenak neigwena, neisho sikerin ngoshola kumok
nejo: Entejo: Laiteng'enuok lenyena ooetuo kiarie nepurroo ninye, kirura yook.
Ore pening' olkitok lʼolosho ena bae, nikiropirop yook ninye nikimitoo ndai.
Neng'amu ninje ngoshola neiko neijia anaa peiteng'enaki. Neibulu ele rorei atua Yudayoi metabaiki taata.
Neibung' kulo aiteng'enuok tomon o obo engoitoi aapuo Galilaya metabaiki oldonyo oitanapa Yesus ninje.
Ore pedol ninje ninye, neserem ninye; neing'arrirro kulekai.
Nelotu Yesus enetii ninje neirorie ninje nejo: Aaishooki engolon pookin te shumata o tʼenkop.
Akae, embung'a engoitoi, entaa laiteng'enuok loreren pookin, imbatisisi ninje atua engarna e Papa o Oinoti o Olmumua Sinyati,
inteng'ening'ene ninje, peibung' pookin naitanapa nanu ndai. Naa ng'orai, aboitare nanu ndai ngolong'i pookin metabaiki enkiting'oto olmaa.
Nyena enkiterata oo lomon Peng'ida le Yesus Kristos, Oinoti lʼEngai.
Anaa petisiraki tiatua sirat oo layolounok: Ng'orai, airriwaa nanu olmalaika lai lukunya engomom ino, oitobir engoitoi ino;
etii ang'ata oltoilo lʼoloipotisho: Entobira engoitoi Olaitoriani, entorioi nkiimat enyena!
Neaku eibatis Yohanes ti angʼata neinosu enkibatisa enkitaalata nʼenkitaunoto oo nkitarruot.
Neipungʼoki ninye olosho pookin le Yudaya o pookin le Yerusalem neibatis ninye ninje tiatua engare Yordan, neibalu ninje nkitarruot enye.
Neaku eishopito Yohanes ilpapit lʼendames neata enkimeita enjoni tʼempolos enye nenya ilmaat o naishi oo mulugi;
neinosu ejo: Elotu tekurum ai ologol naalang' nanu namaiteu airrugoi, palaku nkeenda oo namuka enyena.
Aibatis nanu ndai tʼengare, kake elaibatis ninye ndai tʼOlmumua Sinyati.
Neaku too nona olong'i eewuo Yesus aing'ua Nasaret e Galilaya, neibatis Yohanes ninye te Yordan.
Ore peilepu nabokata eingʼua engare, nedol ebolo shumata nedoiki Olmumua ninye anaa olmaitai.
Neaku oltoilo eing'ua shumata ajo: Ira iye Oinoti lai lanyor oshipakino oltau lai.
Nearaa Olmumua ninye nabokata atua ang'ata.
Netii ninye ang'ata ngolong'i artam, etemita satan ninye, netii e nebo o iljangʼit, neisyayaki ilmalaikan ninye.
Ore peidip aaitarasai Yohanes, nelotu Yesus Galilaya, neinosu lomon lʼeng'ida lʼenkarsishu Engai ejo:
Etabaua enkata nenyiku enkarsishu Engai. Entaalata, eruko lomon lʼeng'ida!
Ore peim ninye embata olbalbal le Galilaya, nedol Simon o Andreas, olalashe le Simon, enang'aki rresheta enye atua olbalbal; amu era ninje larreshok loo singir.
Nejoki Yesus ninje: Ewotu, entusujaki tekurum ai, paitaa ndai larreshok loo ltung'anak.
Neing'ua ninje nabokata rresheta enye, nesuj ninye.
Nenyikaa ninye peno nedol Yakobos le Sebedayos o Yohanes, olalashe lenye, ootii atua engalawa, eitobirita rresheta; neipot ninje nabokata.
Neing'ua ninje menye lenye Sebedayos tiatua engalawa te nebo o laisyayak, nepuo nesuj ninye.
Neibung' ninje engoitoi nepuo Kapernaum; nejing' ninye nabokata tʼengolong' naeng'ieng'areki atua engaji Engai neiteng'enisho.
Neing'asia ninje tʼenkiteng'enare enye, amu eiteng'ena ninye ninje anaa olopeny engolon, neme neijia anaa layolok lʼesirata.
Netii atua engaji Engai enye oltung'ani oata Olmumua duruki, neapaa ninye oltoilo
ejo: Kainyo kiataiye iye, Yesus le Nasaret? Iewuo iye, piminye yook. Ayolo olira iye, Osinyati lʼEngai.
Nebuaki Yesus ninye ejo: Tumuka enkutuk, tupuku te ninye!
Neipushunye Olmumua duruki te ninye, neishir tʼoltoilo kitok, nepuku te ninye.
Neing'asia pookin neikilikwanaro baiki aajo: Kainyo ena? Kaa kiteng'enare ng'ejuk engolon ena? Neitanap ninye ilmumuan duruk nening' ninje ninye.
Neibulu mbaak enyena nabokata ewueji pookin nemanita Galilaya.
Nepuku ninje nabokata tʼengaji Engai nepuo atua engaji e Simon o Andreas te nebo o Yakobos o Yohanes.
Neirrag engaputani e Simon, eata oltikana, neliki ninje ninye mbaak enyena.
Nelotu neapaa aibung' engaina enye, neing'ua oltikana ninye, neisyayaki ninye ninje.
Ore peaku teipa, eidipa atadoi engolong', neaki ninje ninye loomoiyaa pookin o looata ilmeneng'a.
Neiturrurro engang' pookin tʼendaloishi.
Neishiunye ninye loomoiyaa kumok, neitupuku ilmeneng'a kumok neitu eisho ilmeneng'a meiroro, amu etayoloutuo ninje ninye.
Ore pepej ewuas, eitu ekenyu abaraki, neinyototo ninye nepuku nelo ewueji nemetii iltung'anak, nesaisho te ina alo.
Nesuj ninye Simon o lʼemboitei enye.
Ore petum ninye, nejoki ninye: King'oru pookin.
Nejoki ninye ninje: Maapeti engai wueji tiatua ngang'itie naataana, patum ainosu lomon lʼEngai te ina alo; amu te ina atupukuo.
Nelo einosaa lomon lʼEngai tiatua ngajijik Engai enye te Galilaya pookin nemir ilmeneng'a.
Nelotu enetii ninye oltung'ani loata enkea oo lbolot nesai ninye negilaki kung' nejoki ninye: Teni iyeu, nikindim aisuja.
Neibung'aki Yesus ninye engoshoke nanana neitorioo engaina enye neporoo ninye nejoki: Ayeu, sujai!
Ore ake eirorita, neing'ua enkea oo lbolot ninye nabokata neisujai.
Neitanap ninye tʼengolon nearaa ninye nabokata
nejoki ninye: Ng'orai, pimiliki oltung'ani ororei, kake nno, pintadol kion olaidasani, pintarasaa nʼenkisujata ino naitanapua Mose, peaku enjakenishu too ninje.

Ore peidip atupuku ninye, neiter ainosu nkumok neibulunye ororei neijia, ajo eitu eidim ninye atijing'a atua engang' tʼewuas, kake etii aulo, ewueji nemetii iltung'anak; nepuonu enetii ninye, eing'ua wuejitin pookin.
Neitoki ajing' Kapernaum, eishunye ngolong'i naaje; nening'i, ajo etii aji.
Neiturrurro nabokata ilkumok metaa mekure etii enkigutata te kutuk aji, neliki ninje lomon.
Nepuonu neaki ninye oltung'ani onunukito osupetai, enapita iltung'anak ong'wan ninye.
Ore peitu eidim ninje aatinyikaki ninye tʼolbae lʼolorere, nebol keper aji ene wueji netii ninye; ore peidip aatuud, neitadou erruat nairragie ele tung'ani lonunukito osupetai.
Ore pedol Yesus enkirukoto enye, nejoki ele loata osupetai: Nakerai ai, kintaikiaki nkitarruot inono.
Netii ina alo ematua oo layolok lʼesirata oototonitio neibirribir too ltauja lenye:
Kainyo pemor ele Engai nji? Kang'ai loidim aitau nkitarruot neme obo, nera Engai?
Neyolou Yesus nabokata tʼolmumua lenye, ajo eibirribirrita nji tiatua ninje, nejoki ninje: Kainyo pimbirribirrirri kuna too ltauja linyi?
Kaa nalelek, teni ajoki Oloata osupetai: Kintaikiaki nkitarruot inono, arashu: Tudumunye, tudumakinoi erruat ino, tilimanai!?
Kake piyolouu, aajo eata Engerai oltung'ani engolon naitaunye nkitarruot tʼenkop, nejoki ele loata osupetai:
Aajoki iye, nyototoi, tudumakinoi erruat ino, nno ang'!
Nedumunye nedumakino nabokata erruat enye nepuku tʼengomom oo pookin, neiputukuny baiki pookin neitadaraa Engai ejo: Eitu ai kata kidol nji tukul.
Neitoki apuku nelo embata olbalbal; nelotu olorere pookin enetii ninye neiteng'en ninje.
Ore eimita, nedol Levi le Alfayos, eton tʼewueji e kodi, nejoki ninye: Tusujuaki! Nedumunye nesuj ninye.
Neaku ore einosaa endaa tʼengaji enye, netoni laoshok le kodi kumok o laitarruok te nebo o Yesus o laiteng'enuok lenyena; amu etii ilkumok lootusuja ninye.
Ore pedol layolok lʼesirata o Ilfarisayoi, aajo edaa te nebo o laitarruok o laoshok le kodi, nejoki ninje laiteng'enuok lenyena: Kainyo pedaa neokisho ninye te nebo o laoshok le kodi o laitarruok?
Ore pening' Yesus ina, nejoki ninje: Meyeu loora biot olaishiunoni, neme kulo oomoiyaa. Eitu alotu aipot looata esupato, kake laitarruok, petum aataalata.
Neaku epukoo laiteng'enuok le Yohanes o loo Lfarisayoi. Nepuonu looje nejoki ninye: Kainyo pepukoo laiteng'enuok le Yohanes o laiteng'enuok loo Lfarisayoi, kake mepukoo laiteng'enuok linono?
Nejoki Yesus ninje: Kaji eiko teni epukoo nkera enkiama tʼenkata napon etii osanja te nebo o ninje? Meidim aatupukoi ninje te ina kata natii e nebo o osanja.
Kake epuonu ngolong'i naaoruni ninje osanja, nepuo aapukoo te ina olong'.
Metii oltung'ani oripaki erashet olkila ng'ejuk atua olkila musana; teni eripaki, neitarruo ena rashet ng'ejuk ilo musana, nepona empolosata.
Nemetii olopik olmarua ng'ejuk atua ilbenia musan; teni epik, nepolos ilo marua ng'ejuk ilbenia, neibukori olmarua nerruoio ilbenia. Kake epik olmarua ng'ejuk atua ilbenia ng'ejuko.
Neaku ore peim ninye tʼengolong' naeng'ieng'areki atua nkuruman endaa, neiter laiteng'enuok lenyena aagilu lukuny entapa.
Nejoki Lfarisayoi ninye: Ng'orai kainyo peitobir ninje nemeaku tʼengolong' naeng'ieng'areki?
Nejoki ninye ninje: Eitu isomama ndai tukul eneikuna David, eata osina neibung' olamei ninye o lʼemboitoi?
Eneikuna nejing' atua engaji Engai tʼenkata olaidasani kitok Abyatar nenya ilmkaten lʼenkitaduaroto nemeaku, peinosi neme too laidasak, neisho si ninye lʼemboitoi enye?
Nejoki ninye ninje: Etaa engolong' naeng'ieng'areki tʼolbae lʼoltung'ani, me oltung'ani tʼolbae lʼengolong' naeng'ieng'areki.
Nji era Enkerai oltung'ani baiki Olaitoriani lʼengolong' naeng'ieng'areki.
Neitoki ajing' ninye atua engaji Engai; netii ina alo oltung'ani loata engaina tasat.
Neing oraa ninje, ten ake eishiunye ninye tʼengolong' naeng'ieng'areki, petum aaitang'oro ninye.
Nejoki ninye ele tung ani tasat aina: Wou empolos!
Nejoki ninye ninje: Keaku, peitobiri sidan arashu ntorrok tʼengolong' naeng'ieng'areki? peitopoki oltau arashu peari? Negira ninje.
Neing'oraa ninje aman too mbat pookin tʼengoro neilish tʼolbae loo ltauja lenye oogol nejoki ninye oltung'ani: Ntorioi engaina ino! Neitorioo neishiu engaina enye neaku bioto anaa en e are.
Nepuku nabokata lelo Farisayoi, neigwena te nebo o iltung'anak le Herodes eneiko teni eiminye ninye.
Neing'ua Yesus o laiteng'enuok lenyena ine, nelo metabaiki olbalbal. Nesuj olorere kitok ninye, eing'ua Galilaya o Yudaya
o Yerusalem o Idumaya o olkekun le Yordan o mbat e Tiros o Sidon; esiamu kitok natoning'o mbaak naaitobir, nelotu enetii ninye.
Nejoki ninye laiteng'enuok lenyena, njetaaniki ninye engalawa kinyi tʼolbae lʼesiamu, pemeroosh ninye.
Amu eishiunye ninye ilkumok, neurokino ninje pookin ninye, petum aataporoi ninye kulo looata moiyaitin.
Ore pedol ilmumuan duruk ninye, neurori tʼengomom enye neishir ejo: Ira iye Oinoti lʼEngai.
Neitanap ninje naleng', pemeitalioio ninye.
Neilepaki ninye oldonyo neipot lekua lootayeuo ninye openy, nepuo ninje enetii ninye.
Negelu ninye tomon o are, petum aataboitare ninye, petum si ninye airriwai ninje, peinosaa lomon lʼEngai,
peata engolon naishiunye nkeaitin o namirie ilmeneng'a.
Negelu ninye kulo tomon o are, neisho Simon engarna Petros;
o Yakobos le Sebedayos o Yohanes, olalashe le Yakobos, neisho ninje engarna Boanerges, neji: nkera enkikurrukurroto;
o Andreas o Filipos o Bartolomayos o Matayos o Tomas o Yakobos le Alfayos o Tadayos o Simon Olkananayos
o Yudas Iskariotes, ilo loitarasaiye ninye.
Nejing' ninye aji; neitoki aiturrurro esiamu, neitu eidim ninje baiki aainosa endaa.
Ore pening' kulo lʼengang' enye mbaak, nepuku aapuo aaibung' ninye, amu etejo: Etooshe elukunya.
Nejo layolok lʼesirata lootadoutuo aaing'ua Yerusalem: Eata ninye Beelsebul nemir ilmeneng'a tʼenkidimata olkitok loo lmeneng'a.
Neipot ninye ninje enetii nejoki ninje too nkitanyanyukieta: Kaji eiko teni eidim satan ataarai satan?
Teni ekesho enkarsishu tiatua kion, meidim aitasho ena arsishu.
Teni ekesho engaji tiatua kion, meidim aitasho ena aji.
Teni etudumakine satan kion nekesho, meidim aitasho, kake emuta ninye.
Meidim atijing'a oltung'ani engaji ologol, peoru masaa enyena, eitu eng'as aen ele ogol, petum atooru engaji enye.
Japa, aliki ndai: Eitaikini nkera oo ltung'anak nkitarruot pookin, baiki morot Engai naamorie ninje Engai;
kake olomor Olmumua Sinyati, meata ninye enkitaunoto nkatan pookin, kake etaa te ninye enkitarruoto oo nkatan pookin.
Amu etejo ninje: Eata ninye Olmumua duruki.
Nepuonu ng'otonye enye o lalashera lenyena neitashe te boo, neirriwaki oltung'ani, peipot ninye.
Etotona esiamu aman ninye. Nejoki ninje ninye: Ng'orai, etii ng'utunyi o lalashera linono boo niking'oru iye.
Nealiki ninje ejo: Ang'ai nara yeiyo ai o lalashera lainei?
Neing'oraa lootoni emanita ninye too ngaloli pookin nejo: Eng'orai, yeiyo ai o lalashera lainei!
Amu oltung'ani pookin oitobir eyeunoto Engai, nera ninye olalashe lai o enganashe ai o yeiyo.
Neitoki aiter aiteng'enishe tʼembata olbalbal, neiturrurro esiamu kitok tʼenetii ninye metijing'a atua engalawa neton tʼolbalbal; netii esiamu olosho otoiyo tʼembata olbalbal.
Neiteng'en ninje nkumok too nkitanyanyukieta, neliki ninje tiatua enkiteng'enare enye:
Entoning'! Eng'orai, etupukuo olaisuaroni alo aisuaisho.
Neaku ore eisuaisho, nedoiki ematua engoitoi, nepuonu ntaritik e shumata nenya ina.
Nedoiki engai matua atua soito neitu eata nkulupuok kumok nebulu asioki, tiaraki neitu eata nkulupuok naasur.
Ore peilepu engolong', neinaaia netoi, tiaraki neitu eata ntonat.
Nedoiki engai matua ilkikarreta, nebulu lelo kikarreta negor ninye nemeiu ilmomo.
Nedoiki engai matua atua enkulupuoni sidai, neiu ilmomo nebulu nepona, neisho nabo osom, nabo ntomoni ile, nabo iip.
Nejoki ninye ninje: Oloata nkiyaa naaning'ie njening'.
Ore etii ewueji enye openy, neikilikwan kulo lootamana ninye te nebo o kulo tomon o are mbaak oo nkitanyanyukieta.
Nejoki ninje: Eitumunyanaki ndai piyolouu njumat enkarsishu Engai; ore lekua ootii boo, eaku too nkitanyanyukieta,
peiye eing'oraa eing'orita nemedol, peiye ening' ening'ito nemeyolou, pemeibelekenya o akenya neitaikini ninje nkitarruot.
Nejoki ninye ninje: Miyololo ndai ena kitanyanyukiet? Kaji inkoko teni iyeuu niyolouu nkulie kitanyanyukieta pookin?
Eisuaia olaisuaroni ororei.
Nera kulo lootii engoitoi: enaisuakini ororei, ore peidip aatoning', nelotu nabokata satan neitau ele rorei oisuakaki atua ninje.
Enyanyukie si ninje looisuakaki atua soito kulo looning' ororei, nabokata neng'amu ninye tʼeng'ida,
nemeata ntonat tiatua ninje, kake ebik enkata kiti; ore peaku osina arashu enkinyala tʼolbae lʼororei, nerikai nabokata.
Nera looisuakaki atua ilkikarreta kulo lootoning'o ororei,
nejing' nkishilarot olmaa o elejata endupai o olng'warra loo nkulie baak negor ilo rorei, neaku meisho.
Nera kulo looisuakaki atua enkulupuoni sidai iltung'anak looning' ororei, neng'amu neiu ilmomo, obo osom, obo ntomoni ile, obo iip.
Nejoki ninye ninje: Ketii Oloata enkilang'et, pepik kop olkisembe arashu kop erruat? Mepiki ninye shumata enkibung'et?
Amu metii enaisudori, nemelalioi, nemetii enashuma, nemelotu ewuas.
Oloata nkiyaa naaning'ie, njening'.
Nejoki ninye ninje: Eng'orai enining'itoto! Ore entemet nitemishorere, ninye epuoi aatemakinye ndai, neponikini ndai lining'ining'i.
Amu Oloata, neishori ninye; ore olemeata, neoruni ninye baiki enaata.
Nejo ninye: Nji etiu enkarsishu Engai anaa oltung'ani oisuaki embeu enkop,
neirura neinyototo, dama o kiarie, nepuku embeu, nebulu, meyolo ninye.
Neisho enkop openy, neng'as olkujita, tekurum elukunya, tekurum engano nao tiatua elukunya.
Ore peidip aaoto ilmomo, neirriwaa nabokata emundo, amu etabaua endung'ore.
Nejo ninye: Kainyo kintanyanyukie enkarsishu Engai? Arashu ke ti aa kitanyanyukiet kintanyanyukie ninye?
Anaa embeu e karadali, teni eisuakini enkop, nera kinyi nelang' nkulie beun pookin naatii enkop;
kake ore peidipi aisuai, nebulu neaku kitok nelang' mbenek pookin, netum ilng'osil kituak neidim baiki ntaritik e shumata aatamany abori oloip lenye.
Neinosaki ninje lomon too nkitanyanyukieta kumok anaa nena, neijia anaa peidima aatoning'.
Neitu eirorie ninye ninje neme tʼenkitanyanyukiet, neitaaliki laiteng'enuok lenyena pookin tʼewueji enye oopeny.
Ore peaku teipa te ina olong', nejoki ninye ninje: Matalang' aabaiki lido kekun!
Ore peidip ninje aaitanapare olorere, neng'amu ninje ninye anaa petiu atua engalawa; netii nkulie alawani e nebo o ninye.
Neaku enkutishoto olkutati kitok nenang'aki lopir lʼengare atua engalawa, neaku eiganya engalawa.
Netii ninye openy kurum engalawa, epetita enkirishet elukunya. Neinyeye ninje ninye nejoki ninye: Laiteng'enani, me toki te iye, teni kimin yook?
Neinyototo ninye nebuaki olkutati nejoki olbalbal: Tigirai, tirria! Negira olkutati neaku olgira kitok.
Nejoki ninye ninje: Ainyo pirara kureti nji? Kainyo, miatata enkirukoto?
Neureishoi ninje tʼenkuretishu kitok nejokino: Kang'ai ele? Ajo ening' ninye olkutati o olbalbal.
Nebaiki lido kekun lʼolbalbal, atua olosho loo Lgerasenoi.
Ore pedou ninye tʼengalawa, nenang'are ninye nabokata oltung'ani otupukuo too nkuraren neata Olmumua duruki,
loata ntonat tiatua nkuraren, neitu etumi oltung'ani loidim ateena ninye, baiki too lpisia;
amu eteenaki ninye aigil kumok too ngoteta o too lpisia, negiligil ninye lelo pisia nepurdupurd ngoteta, neitu eidim o obo atigilu ninye.
Ore tʼenkiarie o dama pookin netii atua nkuraren o ildonyo, eishir near kion too soito.
Ore pedol ninye Yesus tʼenelakua, nekwetiki negilaki kung' ninye neishir tʼoltoilo kitok ejo:
Kainyo aataiye iye, Yesus, Oinoti lʼEngai natii shumata naleng'? Aaiturujie iye Engai, pimikintame!
Amu etiaka ninye: Tupuku iye, lemumua duruki, tiatua ele tung'ani!
Neikilikwan ninye: Keji aa engarna ino? Nejoki ninye: Eji engarna ai empuoto, amu kira kumok.
Nesai ninye naleng', pememiraki atua ele osho.
Netii ina alo oldonyo emboo oo lbitiro looirrititai.
Nesai ilmeneng'a pookin ninye nejo: Rriwaki yook atua ilbitiro, pikijing' atua ninje.
Neisho epuo. Nepuku kulo mumuan duruk nejing' atua lelo bitiro, nesulakino emboo asioki tʼemarti atua olbalbal, loobaia iip tikitam, nee tiatua olbalbal.
Nekwet lairritak lenye neibulunye mbaak atua engang' o atua nkuruman. Nepuonu iltung'anak, peing'oraa enataa.
Nepuonu enetii Yesus neing'oraa Oloata opa ilmeneng'a, eton neishopo neata eng'eno naa ninye duo oata empuoto, neureishoi ninje.
Neinosaki ninje kulo lootadua enataa tʼoltung'ani loo lmeneng'a o mbaak oo lbitiro.
Neiter aasai ninye, pepuku tiatua mbatai enye.
Ore peilepaki ninye engalawa, nesai Oloata ilmeneng'a ninye, peruba te nebo.
Neitu eiruk ninye, kake nejoki ninye: Nno engaji ino enetii iltung'anak linono, pinosaki ninje enikinkunaka Olaitoriani nikimbung'aki engoshoke nanana.
Nelo ninye aiter ainosu tiatua Manyat tomon eneikunaka Yesus ninye; neing'asia ninje pookin.
Ore peitoki aidip Yesus atalang'a tʼengalawa, neiturrurrokino ninye esiamu kitok, netii ninye embata olbalbal.
Nelotu obo too lkituak lʼengaji Engai, oji Yairos; ore pedol ninye, nebatatakino nkejek enyena
nesai ninye naleng' ejo: Eng'or peno ee entito ai kiti; teni iyeu nilotu ninteleiki ngaik, petum atopua neishiu.
Nelo te nebo o ninye. Nesuj ninye esiamu kitok neroosh ninye.
Netii eng'oroyoni nabo naata empukunoto osarge enkata oo larin tomon o are,
nening' emion naleng' too laishiunok kumok neishooio naata pookin te ina, neitu eretoki hoo nyoo, kake nepona ake eneikununo aaku torrono.
Ore pening' ninye mbaak e Yesus, nelotu tekurum tiatua olorere neing'unye olkila lenye;
amu etejo ninye: Teni aing'unye ilkilani lenyena ake, napok.
Netoi nabokata engong'u osarge lenye nening' tʼosesen lenye, ajo eishiunyeki tʼele sina.
Nening' Yesus nabokata tiatua kion, ajo etupukuo engolon te ninye, neibelekenyakino olorere nejo: Ang'ai loing'unye ilkilani lainei?
Nejoki laiteng'enuok lenyena ninye: Idolita, kirooshita olorere, nijo: Ang'ai liking'unye?
Neing'oraa mbat pookin, pedol enataasa ena.
Neureisho ake ena ng'oroyoni neikirikira, eyolo enataa te ninye, nelotu nebatatakino ninye neliki esipata pookin.
Nejoki ninye: Naito, kintopua enkirukoto ino, nno ang' tʼeseriani, taa bioto tʼosina lino!
Ore epon eirorita, nepuonu iltung'anak, eing'ua engang' olkitok lʼengaji Engai, ejo: Eidipa atua entito ino. Ainyo pintoki aitirik Olaiteng'enani?
Nening' Yesus nabokata ilo rorei oiroritai, nejoki ninye olkitok lʼengaji Engai: Miureisho, ruko ake!
Neitu eisho oltung'ani o obo losuj ninye neme Petros o Yakobos o Yohanes, olalashe le Yakobos.
Nelotu atua aji olkitok lʼengaji Engai neing'oraa enkipushoi oo looishirita o looilishito naleng'.
Ore peidip atijing'a atua nejoki ninje: Ainyo pimpushosho ninjirishiri? Eitu ee enkerai, kake eirura. Nekweniye ninye.
Ore peitupuku iltung'anak pookin, nerik menye lʼenkerai o ng'otonye o lʼemboitei enye, nejing' atua enetii enkerai.
Neibung' enkerai engaina, nejoki ninye: Talita kumi! nera enkitaalata enye: Nairo, aaliki iye, nyototoi!
Neitashe ina ito nabokata nelimana; nera ninye ake noo larin tomon o are. Neing'asia ninje tʼenking'asiata kitok.
Neitanap ninje naleng', pemeyolou oltung'ani o obo ena; neitanapu, peishori ninye endaa.
Nepuku te ina alo nebaia engang' e menye lenye, nesuj laiteng'enuok lenyena ninye.

Ore peaku engolong' naeng'ieng'areki, neiter aiteng'enisho tiatua engaji Engai. Ore ilkumok looning' ena, neing'asia nejo: Kaji einotie ele kuna? Kaa ng'eno ena naishooki ele? O kuna kitobirat engolon naaku too ngaik enyena?
Mera ninye olagwetani, Oinoti le Maria o olalashe le Yakobos o le Yoses o le Yudas o le Simon? Metii baiki nganashera enyena ene atua yook? Nerikareki ninje ninye.
Nejoki Yesus ninje: Melau olayolounoni enkitook neme tiatua olosho le menye o tiatua iltung'anak lʼenkishomi enye o tiatua engaji enye.
Neitu eidim ninye aitobira enkitobirata engolon o nabo te ina alo neme ake eiteleikio ngaik loomoiyaa kuti neishiunye ninje.
Neiputukuny ninye, tiaraki neitu eiruk ninje. Nemanaa tiatua ngang'itie too mbat pookin, eiteng'enisho.
Neipot ninye kulo tomon o are neiter airriwaa ninje are are, neisho ninje engolon too lmumuan duruk,
neitanap ninje, pemenap toki tʼengoitoi neme eng'udi ake, me olmkate, me olbene, me mpesai tiatua enyorret;
kake njeenikino namuka, pemeishop ilkilani are.
Nejoki ninje: Ore engaji pookin nijing'ijing'i, entobik tiatua metabana nipukuku te ine wueji.

Ore lemeng'amu ndai, entupukutu te ina alo, nimpiripirooro enterit tiabori oo nkejek inyi, peaku enjakenishu too ninje. Japa, aliki ndai: Eiteleleki Sodom o Gomora tʼengolong' enkigwena nelang' ina ang'.
Ore peidip ninje aatupukutu, neinosu ninje, peala iltung'anak
nemir ninje ilmumuan duruk kumok neel loomoiyaa kumok tʼeilata neishiunye ninje.
Nening' olkarsis Herodes mbaak enyena, amu eibale engarna enye, nejo: Etopiwuo Yohanes Olaibatisani too lootuata, onaa eitobirisho nkyasin enkidimata tiatua ninye.
Nejo ilkulekai: Era ninye Eliya; nejo ilkulekai: Era ninye olayolounoni arashu obo too layolounok.
Ore pening' Herodes kuna, nejo: Etopiwuo Yohanes latudung'o elukunya, too lootuata.
Amu eirriwaiye Herodes openy neibung' Yohanes neen ninye tʼengaji eenata tʼolbae le Herodias, eng'oroyoni olalashe lenye Filipos; amu eamaiye ninye.
Amu etiaka Yohanes Herodes: Me sidai te iye, teni iata eng'oroyoni olalashe lino.
Akae, eibaiye Herodias ninye neyeu near ninye metua, neitu eidim.
Amu eturia Herodes Yohanes, tiaraki natayolo, ajo era ninye oltung'ani supat naa sinyati; negolie ninye; ore pening' ninye, neitobir nkumok too nona, neinining' ninye tʼeng'ida.
Ore peaku engolong' sidai, neitobiraki Herodes tʼengolong' eiunoto enye ilkituak lenyena o ilkigeluni o laigwenak le Galilaya endaa kitok.
Nejing'aki entito e ina Herodias neiguran neiting'id Herodes o kulo oototonitio o ninye. Nejoki olkarsis entito: Toomonuoki eniyeu ake, naalaisho iye;
neiturujaki ninye: Ore enikiomonu ake, naalaisho iye, baiki ematua enkarsishu ai.
Nepuku entito nejoki ng'otonye enye: Kainyo aomonu? Nejoki ninye: Elukunya e Yohanes Olaibatisani.
Nejing' asioki enetii olkarsis neomonu ninye ejo: Ayeu nikinjo taata nji tʼengirra elukunya e Yohanes Olaibatisani.
Neilish olkarsis naleng', kake tʼolbae lʼenkiturujata o tʼolbae loo kulo oototonitio tʼendaa, neitu eyeu neany ninye.
Neirriwaa nabokata olkarsis olarani neitanapu, peauni elukunya enye tiatua engaji eenata.
Neau elukunya enye tʼengirra neisho entito, neisho entito ninye ng'otonye enye.
Ore peidip aatoning' laiteng'enuok lenyena nena, nepuonu nenap empopong' enye, nenuk ninye tʼenkurare.
Neiturrurrokino lairriwak Yesus neinosaki ninye mbaak pookin naaitobira ninje o naaiteng'enutua.
Nejoki ninye ninje: Ewotu ndai oopeny ewueji ang' nemetii oltung'ani, pieng'ieng'ang'a peno. Amu etii kumok loopuonu o loopuo; neitu eata ninje baiki erishata nadaare.
Nepuo ninje tʼengalawa ewueji enye openy nemetii iltung'anak.
Neduaia ilkumok ninje epuoito neyolou ninye, nepuo aasioio ina alo too nkejek, eing'ua ngang'itie pookin, neituruk ninje aabaia neiturrurro.
Ore pepuku Yesus nedol olorere, neibung'aki ninye engoshoke nanana ninje, amu etanyanyukie ninje ntare nemeata olairritani, neiter aiteng'en ninje too nkumok.
Ore peaku namutu, nepuonu laiteng'enuok lenyena enetii ninye nejo: Era ene wueji ang'ata narok netaa namutu;
ntanapare kulo, pepuo nkuruman o mbat pookin oo ngang'itie, peinyang'aki aten endaa.
Nealiki nejoki Yesus ninje: Enjoo ndai ninje endaa. Nejoki ninje ninye: Ke kipuo ainyang'aki ninje ilmkaten loo ndenaria iip are, pikinjo ninje enya?
Nejoki ninje: Ke ilmkaten aja iatata? Enjom, eng'orai! Ore peidip aatayolo ninje, nejo: Imiet o singir are.
Neitanap ninje, peitoton ninje pookin tʼenkop too nkisotin, tʼolkujita onyori.
Netoni too lkererin, aa ip ip o aa onom onom.
Neibung' ninye kulo mkaten imiet o kulo singir aare neimariri shumata, nemayan negiligil ilmkaten neisho ninje laiteng'enuok, peitarasaki olorere; neoriki baiki kulo singir aare ninje pookin.
Nenya pookin neraposho.
Nesotu ninje mbelat ilbenia tomon o are oobore o ndung'ot oo singir.
Ore looinosa endaa, nera leak iip onom.
Nearaki nabokata laiteng'enuok lenyena meilepakiii engalawa, peituruk aapuo lido kekun metabaiki Betsaida, metabana neitanapare ninye olorere.
Ore peidip aitanapare ninje, nelo ninye oldonyo asaisho.
Ore pemutu neaku etii engalawa empolos olbalbal netii ninye openy atua olosho otoiyo.
Nedol ninye eata ninje osina tʼeyetunoto, amu etii olkutati lorrinyu ninje. Ore tʼerripore e ong'wan e kiarie nelotu enetii ninje, elimana te shumata olbalbal. Neyeu negiroo.
Ore pedol ninje ninye elimana te shumata olbalbal, nejo ninje era oloip, neyetaki aaishir;
amu etadua pookin ninye neng'ayung'ayu. Neirorie si ninye ninje nabokata nejoki ninje: Entagoluoto too ltauja, amu nanu, emiureisho!
Neilepaki ninje tiatua engalawa, negira olkutati. Neing'asia ninje naleng' tiatua aten.
Amu eitu edamu ninje mbaak oo lmkaten, kake etagolito iltauja lenye.
Ore peidip aatalang', nebaia olosho le Genesaret neitadoiyo eenet tʼembata.
Ore pedou ninje tʼengalawa, neyolou ninje ninye nabokata
nekwetikwet aasioio atua ilo osho pookin neiter aanapu loomoiyaa too rruatin, nepuo wuejitin neetoning'ie, aajo etii ninye.

Ore ewueji pookin, teni etijing'a ninye ngang'itie kutiti arashu kituak arashu nkuruman, neitaper loomoiyaa too singiran nesai ninye, peporoo ninje tʼenaipukoi olkila lenye; ore pookin lootaporoitie ninye nepok.
Neiturrurrokino ninye Ilfarisayoi o ematua o layolok lʼesirata ooing'ua Yerusalem.
Ore pedol ninje ematua oo laiteng'enuok lenyena einosita endaa too ngaik torrok, eji nemeisuja, neisurdany.
Amu menya Ilfarisayoi o Yudayoi pookin endaa eitu eisuj ngaik enye naleng', neibung' ng'amunot oo lpaiyani.
Naa teni epuonu t'osingira, nemedaa eitu eisuja. Netii nkulie ng'amunot kumok naatang'amutua aaibung', anaa enkisujata oo nkwarun o noo lkoboi o noo nareta osuiai o noo lkitareta.
Akae, neikilikwan Ilfarisayoi o layolok lʼesirata ninye: Ainyo pemesuj laiteng'enuok linono ng'amunot oo lpaiyani, kake enya endaa too ngaik torrok?
Nejoki ninye ninje: Sidai enaitayolouo Yesaya too ndai laitusupatuok anaa pesira: Aaitaa kitok ele orere too njonito oo nkutukie, kake aalakwaniki iltauja lenye;
naaisyayaki ninje pesho, neiteng'enu nkiteng'enareitin aa nkitanapat oo ltung'anak.
Ipalipala ndai enkitanapata Engai nimbung'ubung'u ng'amunot oo ltung'anak, enkisujata oo lkoboi o noo nkwarun o nkulie kumok naanyanyukie nena nintobiribiri.
Nejoki ninye ninje: Sidai ianyianya enkitanapata Engai, pitumutumu aatorrip ng'amunot inyi.
Amu etejo Mose: Ntaa kituak minyi o ng'utunyi! o: oloimaki menye arashu ng'otonye torrono, njeari tʼenkea.
Nijojo ndai: Ore pejoki oltung'ani menye arashu ng'otonye „Korban“, eji: „eishooki Engai“, naaku endupoto ino te nanu, nebaiki,
nimintokiki aaisho ndai meitobiraki ninye menye o ng'otonye toki,
niariara ororei lʼEngai too ng'amunot inyi nitang'amutua; nintobiribiri nkumok naanyanyukie kuna.
Neitoki aipot ninye esiamu nejoki ninje: Enining'oki pookin, piyolouu!
Metii entoki e oriong' oltung'ani najing' atua ninye naidim aitaa ninye torrono; kake enapuku tiatua ninye, ninye naitaa oltung'ani torrono.
Oloata nkiyaa naaning'ie, njening'!
Ore pejing' ninye atua aji, eing'ua olorere, neikilikwan laiteng'enuok lenyena ninye ina kitanyanyukiet.
Nejoki ninye ninje: Ke nji miatata si ndai eng'eno? Epon eitu iyolouu si ndai, ajo entoki pookin e oriong' oltung'ani najing' atua ninye, meidim aitaa ninye torrono?
Amu mejing' ninye atua oltau, kake atua engoshoke ake, nepuku tʼosiadi oitai ndaikin pookin.
Nejo ninye: Ore enapuku tʼoltung'ani, ninye naitaa oltung'ani torrono;
amu epuku tiatua oltau lʼoltung'ani ndamunot torrok, entalare, empurrore, earata metua,
earata osotua lʼenkiama, olng'warra, ntorrok, olosek, enkiborra oo ngonyek, engong'u torrono, morot Engai, olwuasa, emodaishu.
Amu tiatua epuku kuna torrok pookin neitaa oltung'ani torrono.
Nedumunye ninye te ina alo nelo metabaiki rishat e Tiros o Sidon. Ore peidip atijing'a aji, neyeu, pemeyolou oltung'ani, neitu eidim aisudori.
Amu etoning'o nabokata eng'oroyoni nabo mbaak enyena, neata entito enye Olmumua duruki, nelotu nebatatakino ninye nkejek
(nera ena ng'oroyoni Engriki entipat e Siro-Foinike) nesai ninye, pemir olmeneng'ani tiatua entito enye.
Nejoki Yesus ninye: Tang'asa njoo eraposho nkera; amu me sidai, teni eitauni endaa oo nkera, penang'akini ildiain.
Nealu si ninye nejoki ninye: Ee, Laitoriani, kake enya si ildiain mbelat oo nkera te kop enaraa.
Nejoki ninye: Tʼolbae le ilo rorei nno! Etupukuo olmeneng'ani tʼentito ino.
Nelo ang' neinepu entito, eirrag tʼerruat, etupukuo olmeneng'ani.
Neitoki apuku tʼerishata e Tiros neim Sidon nelotu metabaiki olbalbal le Galilaya, erishata oo Manyat tomon.
Nerikoki ninje ninye oltung'ani ming'ani lemeiro sidai nesai ninye, peiteleiki ninye engaina.
Nerishu ninye lʼesiamu nerik ewueji enye openy nepik ilkimojik lenyena atua nkiyaa enyena nenotu nkamulak neing'unye olng'ejep lenye
neimariri shumata neang' nejoki ninye: Efata! eji: Taboloi!
Nebolo nabokata nkiyaa enyena nelaa eenet olng'ejep lenye neiro sidai.
Neitanap ninye ninje, pemeliki oltung'ani. Kake neijia anaa peitanapa ninje, nepon naleng' aainosaa.
Neing'asia naleng' nelang' ejo: Eitobira ninye pookin sidai; neisho ilming'an, pening'ishoi, peiro lemeidim aairoro.
Ore too nona olong'i neitoki aaku esiamu kitok naleng', nemeata ninje endaa, neipot Yesus laiteng'enuok lenyena nejoki ninje:
Aibung'aki olorere engoshoke nanana, amu etaa taata ngolong'i uni, etobiko tʼenatii, meata enanya,
ore paitanapaa ninje, pepuo ngang'itie enye epukoo, nepuo aaiterre tʼengoitoi; amu eing'ua ematua enye tʼenelakwa.
Nealiki laiteng'enuok lenyena ninye: Kaji etumie oltung'ani ilmkaten tʼena alo e ang'ata looraposh kulo?
Neikilikwan ninje: Ke ilmkaten aja iatata? Nejo ninje: Oopishana.
Neitanap esiamu, petoni tʼenkop. Neibung' ninye kulo mkaten oopishana nejo ashe nebelibel neisho laiteng'enuok lenyena, peitarasaa. Neitarasaki ninje olorere.
Neata si looti singir kuti; ore peidip atamayana ninje, nejo meitarasai si ninje kulo.
Nenya ninje neraposho, nedumu ilmong'oitie loo mbelat oo lmkaten ilbenia oopishana.
Nebaia iltung'anak looinosa endaa, iip artam. Neitanapaa ninje.
Neilepaki ninye nabokata engalawa te nebo o laiteng'enuok lenyena nelo mbatai e Dalmanuta.
Nepuku Ilfarisayoi neiter aaikilikwanaro o ninye neing'oru te ninye olponoto oing'ua shumata aatem ninye.
Neang' ninye tʼolmumua lenye nejo: Ainyo peing'oru ena kishon olponoto? Japa, aliki ndai: Meishori ena kishon olponoto.
Neing'ua ninje neitoki ailepaki engalawa nelo metabaiki lido kekun.
Nerikino ninje enap ilmkaten, neitu eata tiatua engalawa neme olmkate obo ake.
Neitanap ninje ejo: Eng'orai, piduaiaia aten tʼenkisiijoi oo Lfarisayoi o tʼenkisiijoi e Herodes.
Neibirribir ninje tʼempolos enye ejo: Tiaraki nimikiata ilmkaten.
Neyolou Yesus ena nejoki ninje: Ainyo pimbirribirrirri, aajo tiaraki nimikiata ilmkaten? Epon miyolouu nimidamishosho? Epon iatata iltauja oogol?
Iatata ngonyek, nimidolishosho; niatata nkiyaa, nimining'ishosho, nimidamishosho.
Ore patigiligilaka le naarri mkaten imiet atua iip onom, ke ilbenia aja eiganya ndung'ot nitudumutua? Nejoki ninje ninye: Tomon o are.
Ore patigiligilaka kulo oopishana atua iip artam, ke, ilbenia aja eiganya mbelat nitudumutua? Nejo ninje: Oopishana.
Nejoki ninye ninje: Kaji etiu, pepon eitu iyolouu?
Nepuonu ninje Betsaida. Nerikoki ninje olmodooni nesai ninye, peporoo ninye.
Neibung' ninye olmodooni engaina nerik aulo engang' nenotaki ngamulak ngonyek enyena neiteleiki ninye ngaik neikilikwan ninye: Idolita toki?
Neimariri ninye shumata nejo: Adolita iltung'anak elimana anaa iljanito.
Neitoki aiteleiki ninye ngaik ngonyek enyena, neing'oraa naleng', netum ataa bioto nedol ntokitin pookin abaraki.
Neirriwaa ninye, pelo engaji enye, ejo: Mijing' atua engang' nimiliki oltung'ani tiatua engang'.
Nepuku Yesus o laiteng'enuok lenyena, pepuo ngang'itie e Kaisarea-Filipi. Neikilikwan ninye laiteng'enuok lenyena tʼengoitoi nejoki ninje: Kejo iltung'anak, ara nanu ng'ai?
Nejoki ninje ninye, ejo: Yohanes Olaibatisani; nejo ilkulekai: Eliya; o ilkulekai: obo too layolounok.
Neikilikwan ninye ninje: Ijojo ndai, ara nanu ng'ai? Nealu Petros nejoki ninye: Ira iye Kristos!
Neitanap, pemeliki ninje oltung'ani mbaak enyena.

Neiter aiteng'en ninje, ajo meata kata nemeisilisili Enkerai oltung'ani too nkumok, neany laigwenak o laidasak kituak o layolok lʼesirata ninye, near ninye metua, nelapiu ninye, eishunyete ngolong'i uni.
Neiro ninye ele rorei abaraki. Neibung' Petros ninye nerik ewueji enye openy neiter aisikong' ninye.
Neibelekenya ninye neing'oraa laiteng'enuok lenyena nebuaki Petros, ejo: Nyaai kurum ai, satan, amu mimbirribir nara nʼEngai, kake nara noo ltung'anak.
Neipot esiamu enetii ninye te nebo o laiteng'enuok lenyena nejoki ninje: Oloyeu naasuj tekurum ai, njemiki kion, njedumakino esalaba enye, paasuj.
Amu oloyeu neitopok oltau lenye, nelaiminye ninye; oloiminye oltau lenye tʼolbae lai o tʼolbae loo lomon lʼeng'ida, neitopok ninye.
Kaa dupoto etum oltung'ani, teni eng'eru ninye olmaa pookin, netum elaunoto Olmumua lenye?
Arashu kainyo elakunye oltung'ani oltau lenye?

Amu oloibung' enkurruna te nanu o too rorei lainei tiatua ena kishon eloloito naitarruo, nelaibung'aki Enkerai oltung'ani ilo enkurruna, teni elotu tʼenkitook e Menye lenye te nebo o ilmalaikan sinyat.
Nejoki ninye ninje: Japa, aliki ndai: Etii iltung'anak atua kulo ooitashe tene lemeinyorrinyor enkea, metabana nedol enkarsishu Engai eewuo tʼengolon.
Ore peishunye ngolong'i ile, negelu Yesus Petros o Yakobos o Yohanes nerik ninje keper oldonyo oado, ewueji enye oopeny, neitaali emua enye too ngomomi enye.
Neaku eitintilu ilkilani lenyena neiborru naleng' anaa esiret lemeidim aiborrie olaria lʼenkop neijia.
Nelioi too ninje Eliya te nebo o Mose, neaku eder ninje o Yesus.
Nealu Petros nejoki Yesus: Laiteng'enani, sidai kitii yook ene! Mateshet tene iltomboitie okuni: obo lino, obo le Mose, obo le Eliya.
Amu eitu eyolou ninye enataalua; amu etaa kureti.
Neaku erukenya naiopoiye ninje nepuku oltoilo tʼerukenya ojo: Nyele Oinoti lai lanyor: entoning' ninye!
Ore te ina kata peing'oraa ngaloli pookin neitu eitoki aadol oltung'ani neme Yesus ake openy te nebo o ninje.
Ore edou ninje tʼoldonyo, neitanap ninje, pemeinosaki oltung'ani naatadua ninje metabaiki ina kata, eidipa atopiu Enkerai oltung'ani tiatua lootuata.
Neibung' ninje ilo rorei neikilikwanaro oopeny tʼempolos enye: Kainyo empiunoto too lootuata?
Neikilikwan ninje ninye ejo: Mejo layolok lʼesirata, aajo meata kata nemeng'as alotu Eliya?
Nejoki ninye ninje: Esipa, eng'as alotu Eliya, peitobiraki pookin; kake te nebo o nena etisirakinyeki Enkerai oltung'ani, ajo eisilisili naleng' nemeni.
Kake aliki ndai: Eidipa aeu Eliya, neitobiraki ninje ninye anaa petayeutuo, anaa petisirakaki ninye.
Ore pelotu ninye enetii laiteng'enuok lenyena, nedol esiamu kitok emanita ninje o layolok lʼesirata ooikilikwanare ninje.
Ore nabokata pedol esiamu ninye, neing'asia nekwetiki aairo roki ninye.
Neikilikwan ninye layolok lʼesirata: Kainyo inkilikwanarere ninje?
Nealiki oltung'ani obo tiatua esiamu ninye: Laiteng'enani, aaua enkerai ai enitii, neata ninye Olmumua lemeiro;
ore teni edumaki ninye, neiponyipony ninye; nepuku olaburra nenya lala netoi; nairorie laiteng'enuok linono, petum aatimir; neitu eidim ninje.
Nealiki ninje ejo: Ndai, enkishon nemeiruk, ke metabaiki anu aboitare nanu ndai? Ke, metabaiki anu ang'iriaki ndai? Eakaki!
Neaki ninye. Ore pedol Olmumua ninye, neiponyipony nabokata ninye, neurokino enkop neibeleleng'ori nepuku olaburra.
Neikilikwan ninye menye lenye: Ke ti aa kata eitera aibung' kuna? Nejo ninye: Tʼenkitishu.
Etanang'aka ninye aigil kumok atua enkima o atua engare, peiminye ninye. Kake teni indim toki, mbung'aki yook engoshoke nanana, piretoki yook!
Nejoki Yesus ninye: Teni indim airuko! Eidimai pookin tʼoloiruk.
Neapaa nabo kata menye lʼenkerai oltoilo, nepuku ilkiyo, nejo: Airuk, Laitoriani, taretokoki mairuk!
Ore pedol Yesus, ajo ekwetu olorere amurutokino, nebuaki Olmumua duruki nejoki ninye: Lemumua lemeiro naa ming'ani, aaitanap nanu iye: Tupuku te ninye nimintoki ajing' atua ninye!
Neapaa Olmumua oltoilo neiponyipony ninye naleng' nepuku; neaku enyanyukie lemeishiu, nejo baiki ilkumok: Etua ninye.
Kake eibung'a Yesus ninye engaina neapaa; neitashe ninye.
Ore peidip atijing'a aji, neikilikwan laiteng'enuok lenyena ninye tʼewueji enye oopeny; Ainyo peitu kindim yook aatimir ninye?
Nejoki ninye ninje; Meidim ena mua atupuku neme tʼesayata o tʼempukoroto.
Nepuku ninje te ina alo neibung' engoitoi neim Galilaya; neitu eyeu ninye, peyolo oltung'ani.
Amu eiteng'ena ninye laiteng'enuok lenyena nejoki ninje: Eitarasakini Enkerai oltung'ani atua ngaik oo ltung'anak near ninje ninye metua. Ore peidip aataar, nepiu ninye, eishunyete ngolong'i uni.
Neitu eyolou ninje ilo rorei neurei eikilikwan ninye.
Nepuonu ninje Kapernaum. Ore etii ninje atua aji, neikiliwan ninye ninje: Kainyo imbirribirrutua tʼengoitoi?
Negira ninje, amu eibirribirrutua tʼempolos enye: Kalo lora kitok.
Neton ninye neipot kulo tomon o are nejoki ninje: Oloyeu neaku lʼelukunya, njeaku lʼenkiting'oto too pookin o olaisyayani loo pookin.
Neibung' ninye enkerai nabo neitasheye ninye tʼempolos enye nejap ninye nejoki ninje:
Oloitoomon nabo too kuna kera tʼengarna ai, nanu eitoomon; ore olaaitoomon nanu, me nanu eitoomon, kake olaairriua.
Nejoki Yohanes ninye: Laiteng'enani, kitadua oltung'ani lomirita ilmeneng'a tʼengarna ino leitu esujare yook, nikimitiki yook ninye, tiaraki neitu esuj yook.
Nejo Yesus: Emimitiki ninye, amu metii oltung'ani loitobir entoki engolon tʼengarna ai neiriamare aaimaki nanu tʼentorroni.
Amu olemeiba yook, nera lʼematua ang'.
Amu oloitook ndai tʼeoket engare tʼengarna ai, tiaraki nirara le Kristos, japa, aliki ndai: Meiminaki ninye tukul olkwaje lenye.
Oloitapong'oo nabo too kuna kutiti naairuk nanu, eikash, teni eenikini emurt enye osoit oituutishoreki, nenang'akini ninye atua olbalbal.
Teni kintapong'oo engaina ino, tudung'o ninye; eikash, ijing' atua empuan, iata enkumur, nelang' iata ngaik pokira are, nilo atua ewueji e satan, atua enkima nememuta,
enemee olkurto lenye nemee enkima enye.
Teni kintapong'oo enkeju ino, tudung'o ninye; eikash, ijing' atua empuan, ira ng'ojine, nelang' iata nkejek pokira are, nikinang'akini atua ewueji e satan, atua enkima nememuta,
enemee olkurto lenye nemee enkima enve.
Teni kintapong'oo engong'u ino, nturrai ninye; eikash, ijing' atua enkarsishu Engai, ira mulug ong'u, nelang' iata ngonyek pokira are nikinang'akini atua enkima e satan,
enemee olkurto lenye nemee enkima enye.
Amu eitijing'ari oltung'ani pookin emakat tʼenkima, neitijing'ari enkidasare pookin emakat.
Sidai emakat, kake teni etarruoiye emakat, te nyoo eitaai ninye sidai? Njoo iatata emakat tiatua ndai o eseriani tʼempolos inyi.
Nedumunye te ina alo nelotu rishat e Yudaya tʼolkekun le Yordan. Neitoki aaiturrurrokino ninye siamin, neitoki aiteng'en ninje anaa petamoo.
Nepuonu enetii ninye Ilfarisayoi neikilikwan ninye: Ke sidai, teni eing'ua olmoruo eng'oroyoni enye? etemita ninje ninye.
Nealiki si ninye nejoki ninje: Ainyo eitanapa Mose ndai?
Nejo si ninje: Eiruko Mose, pesiri empalai erishata, neing'ua ninye.
Nejoki Yesus ninje: Tiaraki natagolito iltauja linyi, onaa etisiraka ndai ena kitanapata.
Kake neba tʼenkiterata enkitobirata eitobira Engai olee o eng'oroyoni;
onaa, eing'ua oltung'ani menye o ng'otonye neibung'are eng'oroyoni enye,
neaku pokira are osesen obo; nemeitoki aaku aare, kake osesen obo.
Akae, ore enaidikidiko Engai, njoo merish oltung'ani.
Neitoki aaikilikwan laiteng'enuok lenyena ninye tiatua aji mbaak e ilo rorei.
Nejoki ninje: Oloing'ua eng'oroyoni enye neamu engai, near osotua lʼenkidikidikoto olmoruo o eng'oroyoni te ninye;
naa teni eing'ua eng'oroyoni olmoruo lenye neamaa olekai, near osotua lʼenkidikidikoto olmoruo o eng'oroyoni.
Nerikoki ninje nkera kunyinyi, peiye eporoo ninje. Nebuaki laiteng'enuok lenyena kulo lootorikutuo.
Ore pedol Yesus ena, neisikong' ninye nejoki ninje: Enjoo nkera epuonu enatii, emimitiki ninje, amu era enkarsishu Engai noo loonyanyukie nena.
Japa, aliki ndai: Olemeng'amu enkarsishu Engai anaa enkerai, nemejing' ninye atua tukul.
Nejap ninje nemayan neiteleiki ninje ngaik.
Ore pepuku ninye aim engoitoi, nekwetu oltung'ani obo negilaki ninye kung' neikilikwan ninye: Laiteng'enani sidai, kainyo aitobir, paidim atujung'u empuan nemeiting'?
Nejoki Yesus ninye: Ainyo pikijo sidai? Metii osidai neme obo lora Engai.
Itayolo nkitanapat: Miar metua; miar enkidikidikoto olmoruo o eng'oroyoni; mipurrisho; minjakenoki oltung'ani elejare; misimaa; ntaa kituak minyi o ng'utunyi!
Nejoki ninye: Laiteng'enani, aibung'a nena pookin neba tʼenkitishu ai.
Neing'oraa Yesus ninye nenyorru ninye nejoki ninye: Nabo nikitong'orikia. Nno, timira pookin niata, pinjo laisinak, nilaata masaa te shumata; ore pindip, wou, tusujaki nidumakino esalaba ino!
Neilish ninye tʼolbae lʼele rorei, nelo eing'irisa; amu eata masaa kumok.
Neing'orong'oraa Yesus mbat pookin nejoki laiteng'enuok lenyena: Oi egol, pejing' looata masaa atua enkarsishu Engai.
Neing'asia laiteng'enuok lenyena too kulo rorei lenyena. Neitoki aliki Yesus nejoki ninje: Nakera, oi egol looirishakino masaa ejing' atua enkarsishu Engai!
Elelek eim endames eudoto esindano nelang' oladupani ejing' atua enkarsishu Engai.
Neing'asia ninje naleng' nejokino: Ang'ai naa loidim atopua?
Neing'oraa Yesus ninje ejo: Meidimai ena too ltung'anak, kake eidimai tʼEngai; amu eidimai ntokitin pookin tʼEngai.
Neiter Petros ajoki ninye: Ng'orai, kitung'aitie yook pookin nikisuj iye.

Nejo Yesus: Japa, aliki ndai: Metii oltung'ani otung'aiye engaji arashu lalashera arashu nganashera arashu ng'otonye arashu menye arashu nkera arashu nkuruman tʼolbae lai o tʼolbae loo lomon lʼeng'ida,
nemeng'amu aigil iip taata tʼena kata ngajijik o lalashera o nganashera o noong'otonye o nkera o nkuruman eshula o sinaitin, o tiatua olmaa olotu empuan nemeiting'.
Neaku ilkumok lʼelukunya lʼenkiting'oto o lʼenkiting'oto lʼelukunya.
Netii ninje engoitoi eilep aapuo Yerusalem; neiturukie Yesus ninje, neing'asia ninje neureishoi esujita. Neitoki aibung' Yesus kulo tomon o are neiter aliki ninje mbaak naapuo aaku te ninye, ejo:
Eng'orai, kishumari metabaiki Yerusalem, neitarasakini Enkerai oltung'ani laidasak kituak o layolok lʼesirata, nepuo aaigwenaki ninye, pee, neitarasaki ninye loreren lemeata Engai;
nemor ninje ninye nenotaki ngamulak near too nkeenda near ninye metua, nelapiu ninye, eishunyete ngolong'i uni.
Nepuonu Yakobos o Yohanes, nkera e Sebedayos, enetii ninye nejoki ninye: Laiteng'enani, kiyeu nintobiraki yook enikionionu iye.
Nejoki ninye ninje: Kainyo iyeuu naitobiraki ndai?
Nejoki ninje ninye: Njoo yook kitoni obo te tatene ino o obo te kedyanye ino tiatua enkitook ino.
Nejoki Yesus ninje: Miyololo ndai eniomonunu. Indimidimi ndai aatook enkwaru naok nanu, neibatisi ndai tʼenkibatisa naaibatisieki nanu?
Nejoki ninje ninye: Ee, kindim. Nejoki Yesus ninje: Ore enkwaru naok nanu nipuopuo aaok, neibatisi ndai tʼenkibatisa naaibatisieki nanu;
kake entonata te tatene o te kedyanye ai me enai, paisho ndai, kake eishori looitobirakaki.
Ore pening' ena kulo tomon, neiter aagorokino Yakobos o Yohanes.
Neipotu Yesus ninje enetii ninye nejoki ninje: Iyololo, aajo eitorisho kulo ooikenari aaku ilkarsisi loo loreren neata ilkituak lenye engolon too ninje.
Meaku nji too ndai! Kake oloyeu neaku kitok too ndai, njeaku olaisyayani linyi;
oloyeu tiatua ndai neaku lʼelukunya, njeaku olaisyayani loo pookin.
Amu eitu elotu si ninye, Enkerai oltung'ani, peisyayakini ninye, kake peisyaisho ninye neishooio empuan enye, peaku elakunoto oo lkumok.
Nepuonu ninje Yeriko. Ore peibung' ninye engoitoi aing'ua Yeriko te nebo o laiteng'enuok lenyena o esiamu kitok, neton Bartimayos, enkerai e Timayos, ora olmodooni, tʼembata engoitoi eomonisho.
Ore pening' ninye, ajo ore Yesus le Nasaret ilo, neiter aapaa oltoilo ejo: Yesus, nakerai e David, tokorduaki!
Nebuaki iltung'anak kumok ninye, pegira. Nepon ninye naleng' aapaa oltoilo: Nakerai e David, tokorduaki!
Neitashe Yesus nejo: Empoto ninye. Neipot ninje ilo modooni nejoki ninye: Ntagolo oltau, nyototoi, kimpot ninye!
Neiturraa ninye olkila lenye neipirri nelo enetii Yesus.
Nealiki Yesus ninye nejo: Kainyo iyeu naaitobiraki? Nejoki olmodooni ninye: Laiteng'enani, padolishoi.
Nejoki Yesus ninye: Nno, kitaretoko enkirukoto ino. Nedolishoi ninye nabokata nesuj ninye tʼengoitoi.
Ore penyikaki ninje Yerusalem nebaia Betfage o Betania metabaiki Oldonyo loo loirienito, neirriwaa ninye aare too laiteng'enuok lenyena,
nejoki ninje: Enjom enkiti ang' naitoriokinore ndai; ore nabokata, teni ijing'ijing'i, inepupu enkurrarru osikiria naena nepon eitu eilepaki oltung'ani o obo ninye; entalakutu ninye, entereakaki!
Ore pejoki oltung'ani ndai: Ainyo pinkoko nji? entejo: Olaitoriani oyeu ninye; neirriu nabokata ene.
Nepuo neinepu enkurrarru osikiria naena te kishomi, ti aulo tʼerishata engoitoi, nelaku ninye.
Nejoki ematua oo kulo ooitashe te ine ninje: Kainyo intobiribiri, ilakuku enkurrarru osikiria?
Nejoki ninje anaa peitanapua Yesus, neing'uaiki ninje.
Nereu ninje enkurrarru osikiria enetii Yesus neisalaashaki ninye ilkilani lenye, neton ninye te shumata enye.
Neisalaash ilkumok ilkilani lenye tʼengoitoi; nedung'u kulekai ilng'osil too ljanito neisalaash tʼengoitoi.
Ore looiturukie o loosujita neapaa iltoiloi ejo: Hosiana! Njeitadarari ololotu lʼengarna Olaitoriani!
Njeitadarari enkarsishu nalotu e papa lang' David. Hosiana te shumata!
Nejing' Yesus Yerusalem atua engaji sinyati; neing'orong'oraa ngaloli pookin; ore pemutu, nepuku nelo Betania te nebo o kulo tomon o are.
Ore enasirie, pepuku ninje te Betania, neibung' olamei ninye.
Nedol tʼenelakwa olng'aboli oata mbenek nelotu, peiye etum toki te shumata enye. Ore pelotu enetii, neitu etum toki neme mbenek, amu me enkata oo lng'abolo.
Nealu nejoki ninye: Njoo meitoki anya nkatan pookin oltung'ani ilmomo te iye! Nening' laiteng'enuok lenyena ina.
