Nepuonu Yerusalem. Nejing' Yesus atua engaji sinyati neiter amir lamirak o lainyang'ak tiatua engaji sinyati neibelekeny naraan oo laitaalak loo ngoshola o lorikaishi loo lamirak loo lmaita,
neitu eisho oltung'ani enap enaret eim engaji sinyati.
Neiteng'enisho nejoki ninje: Keitu esiri: Eipoti engaji ai engaji esayata oo loreren pookin? Kake intaa ndai ninye engapunet oo laisimak.
Nening' laidasak kituak o layolok lʼesirata nona neing'oru eneiko petum aaiminye ninye. Neurei ake ninye amu eing'asiaiye esiamu pookin enkiteng'enare enye.
Ore peaku emutu, nepuku nelo aulo engang'.
Ore enasirie egiroo ine, nedol ele ng'aboli etoiyo, eiter too ntonat.
Nedamu Petros nejoki ninye: Laiteng'enani, ng'orai olng'aboli litedia etoiyo.
Nealu Yesus nejoki ninje: Embung'a enkirukoto atua Engai.
Japa, aliki ndai: Ore oltung'ani pookin ojoki ele donyo: Tadotunye, pinang'akino atua olbalbal! nemeing'arrirro tʼoltau lenye, kake eiruk, ajo eaku enajo — neaku te ninye anaa petejo.
Onaa aliki ndai: Ore pookin niomonunu tʼesayata inyi, eruko, aajo ing'amumu, neaku eninyi.
Ore pintasheshe isaishosho, entung'aikiti, teni iataiyeye oltung'ani entoki, peiye eing'uaiki si ninye, Minyi linyi otii shumata, ndai nkitarruot inyi.
Teni ming'uaikiki ndai, nemeing'uaiki baiki ndai Minyi linyi otii shumata nkitarruot inyi.
Neitoki aabaia ninje Yerusalem. Ore elimana ninye tiatua engaji sinyati, nepuonu laidasak kituak o layolok lʼesirata o laigwenak enetii ninye,
nejoki ninye: Ke ti aa golon intobirita kuna? Kang'ai likinjoo ena golon, pitum aitobira kuna?
Nejoki Yesus ninje: Aikilikwan si nanu ndai ororei obo, pikialikiki, tekurum naliki si nanu ndai, ke ti aa golon aitobirita kuna.
Kera enkibatisa e Yohanes ne shumata anai noo ltung'anak? Entaalikiaki!
Neibirribir ninje tʼempolos enye ejo: Teni kijo: Eing'ua shumata! nejo ninye: Ainyo naa peitu irukuruku ninye?
Kake teni kijo: Eing'ua atua iltung'anak! — neturia ninje olorere. Amu etejo pookin, ajo era Yohanes olayolounoni tʼesipata.
Nealiki ninje Yesus nejo: Mikiyolo. Nejoki si Yesus ninje: Majoki si nanu ndai, ke ti aa golon aitobirita kuna.
Neiter airorie ninje too nkitanyanyukieta ajo: Etuuno oltung'ani enkuruma oo nkeek olmarua neitaman osariko netur engumoto naironyishoreki neshet olmnara neitamany laturok nelo olototo.
Neirriwaki laturok tʼenkata enye olaisyayani obo, peng'amu too laturok ilmomo lʼenkuruma oo nkeek olmarua.
Neibung' ninje ninye near neitupuku, meata toki.
Neitoki airriwaki ninje olekai aisyayani; nebor ilo elukunya, nemor ninye neitupuku.
Neitoki airriwaa olekai; near ilo metua; o kulekai kumok; near ilkulekai o ilkulekai near metuata.
Akae, epon eata obo, Oinoti lenye onyor; neitoki airriwaki ninje tʼenkiting'oto ninye ejo: Eanyitu Oinoti lai.
Kake nejokino kulo aturok tʼempolos enye: Era ele olajung'oni; maapeti mataar ninye metua, peaku enjung'o enang'.
Neibung' ninje ninye near metua nenang'aki oriong' enkuruma oo nkeek olmarua.
Kainyo elaitobir Olaitoriani lʼenkuruma oo nkeek olmarua? Elotu ninye neiminye kulo aturok neisho ena kuruma oo nkeek olmarua ilkulekai.
Epon eitu isomama ndai ena sirata: Ore osoit lotanyaita lashetak, etaa ele osoit kitok lʼolpijata.
Etaa ina tʼOlaitoriani, naiputukunyisho ninye too ngonyek ang'?
Neing'oru ninje eneiko, peibung', neurei esiamu, amu etayoloutuo, aajo eirorie ninje te ina kitanyanyukiet. Neing'ua ninye nepuo.
Neirriwaki ninye ematua oo Lfarisayoi o noo laisyayak le Herodes, perresh ninye too rorei.

Ore pepuonu, nejoki ninye: Laiteng'enani, kiyolo, aajo ira oltung'ani lʼesipata, nimishilaa entemet oltung'ani; amu naing'oraa emua oltung'ani, kake inteng'enu tʼesipata engoitoi Engai. Ke sidai, teni eishori kaisar kodi arashu me? Ke kinjooio arashu me?
Neyolou ninye enkitusupatuo enye nejoki ninje: Ainyo pikitemiteme? Eakaki endenarion nabo, padol ninye!
Neau. Nejoki ninje: Ken e ng'ai ena mua o ena sirata? Nejoki ninje ninye: Ne kaisar.
Nejoki Yesus ninje: Akae, enjoo kaisar en e kaisar, o Engai en Engai! Neiputukunyoki ninye naleng'.
Nepuonu Sadukayoi enetii ninye oojo: metii empiunoto, neikilikwan ninye nejo:
Laiteng'enani, etisiraka yook Mose: Teni ee olalashe lʼoltung'ani neing'ua eng'oroyoni nemeata enkerai, njeamaa olalashe lenye aitaa eng'oroyoni enye, netumoki olalashe lenye olmuate.
Netii lalashera oopishana: Neamu ol elukunya eng'oroyoni nee ninye, neitu eing'ua eishoi;
neamu ole are ninye nee, neitu eing'ua eishoi; neijia baiki oli okuni.
Neamu neijia kulo oopishana ninye, neitu eing'ua eishoi. Ore tʼenkiting'oto oo pookin nee si ninye, ina ng'oroyoni.
Akae, ore tʼempiunoto, teni epuo aapiu ninje, eaku eng'oroyoni en e alo too ninje? Amu eamutua ninye kulo oopishana.
Nejoki Yesus ninje: Me neijia? Imanimanaana, amu miyololo sirat o engolon Engai.
Amu teni epuo aapiu tiatua lootuata ninje, nemepuo aamisho nemepuoi aamaa, kake eaku ninje anaa ilmalaikan ootii shumata.
Ore too mbaak oo lootuata, aajo epuo aapiu, eitu isomama ndai tiatua enkitabu e Mose tʼolodung'oro eneikuna teni ejoki Engai ninye, ejo: Ara nanu Engai e Abraham o Engai e Isaak o Engai e Yakoob?
Mera Engai Engai oo lootuata, kake noo looishiu. Onaa imanimanaana ndai naleng'.
Nelotu obo loo layolok lʼesirata, etoning'o eikilikwanaro ninje, neyolou, ajo etaalikia ninje sidai, neikilikwan ninye: Kaa kitanapata nara en elukunya oo pookin?
Nealu Yesus nejo: Ena nara kitok alang' pookin: Toning'o, Israel, era Olaitoriani, Engai ino, Olaitoriani obo!
Tonyorra Olaitoriani, Engai ino, tʼoltau lino pookin o tʼolmumua lino pookin o tʼeng'eno ino pookin o tʼengolon ino pookin. Ena enkitanapata elukunya.
Ore en e are narisiore ninye: Tonyora ol elatia ino anaa pinyor kion! Metii engai kitanapata nara kitok nelang' kuna.
Nejoki olayoloni lʼesirata ninye: Sidai, Laiteng'enani, itolimuo esipata, ajo etii Engai nabo ake, nemetii engai neme ninye;
teni inyorru ninye tʼoltau pookin o tʼeyolounoto pookin o tʼolmumua pookin o tʼengolon pookin, ninyorru ol elatia anaa kion — etalang'a ena naleng' nkidasareitin naapejori o nkulie kidasareitin.
Ore pedol Yesus, ajo etaalua ninye tʼeng'eno, nejoki ninye: Milakwaniki enkarsishu Engai. Neitu eitoki aiteu oltung'ani o obo aikilikwana ninye ororei.
Nealu Yesus nejo, eiteng'enisho tiatua engaji sinyati: Kejaa layolok lʼesirata, ajo era Kristos enkerai e David?
Netejo David openy tʼenkidimata Olmumua Sinyati: Etiaka Olaitoriani Olaitoriani lai: Totona te tatene ai, metabana napik ilmang'ati linono abori oo nkejek inono.
Neipot David ninye Olaitoriani lenye — kaji eiko naa teni era enkerai enye? Nenyorru olorere kitok aatoning' ninye.
Nejo ninye tiatua enkiteng'enare enye: Entaduai aten too layolok lʼesirata loonyorru aalimanare tiatua ilkilani adoru nenyor nkirorokinot too singiraitin
o ntoneta elukunya tiatua ngajijik Engai o nkirragat elukunya tʼengalo oo ndaikin;
loonya ngajijik oo ngolia neitador sayat tʼenkitusupatuo. Nepuo aang'amu ninje enkigwena kitok nalang'.
Neton Yesus aishiaakinore eneitadoikini mpesai engaji Engai neing'oraa olorere lopikita mpesai atua eneitadoikini; nepik ladupak kumok nkumok.
Nelotu engoliai nabo aisinani, nepik naabebek are, nera esenti nabo.
Neipot ninye laiteng'enuok lenyena nejoki ninje: Japa, aliki ndai: Ore ena oliai nara aisinani etipika nelang' kulekai pookin lootipika mpesai atua eneitadoikini;
amu etipika ninje pookin tʼenkumoi enye, ore ena etipika tʼesinaishu enye pookin naata, baiki erripet enye.
Ore pepuku ninye tʼengaji sinyati, nejoki obo too laiteng'enuok lenyena ninye: Laiteng'enani, ng'orai, kakua soito kulo o kaa shetata ena!
Nejoki Yesus ninye: Idolita kuna shetat sapuki? Meleku tene osoit te shumata olekai soit lemerratanyuni.
Ore peton ninye tʼOldonyo loo loirienito aitoriokino engaji sinyati, neikilikwan Petros o Yakobos o Yohanes o Andreas ninye tʼewueji enye oopeny:
Tiaki yook, kanu eaku nena? Kainyo olponoto obaiarie nena pookin?
Neiter Yesus ajoki ninje: Entaduai aten, pemeitamanimanaa ndai oltung'ani!
Amu epuo aapuonu ilkumok lʼengarna ai, ejo: Ara nanu Kristos! nepuo aaitamanimanaa ilkumok.
Teni ipuopuo aaning' njorin o oriri loo njorin, eming'aing'ai! Meata kata nemeaku kuna; kake epon eitu elotu enkiting'oto.

Amu eladumunye olorere aarare olekai orere o enkarsishu nabo aarare engai arsishu. Nepuo aaku nkikirikirat enkop too wuejitin o wuejitin; nepuo aaku lameitin o nking'asiat. Nera nena enkiterata osina.
Entaduai ake aten! amu eitarasakini ndai atua ngajijik enkigwena o atua ngajijik Engai; neari ndai neriki ndai ngomomi oo larikok o noo lkarsisi tʼolbae lai, peaku enjakenishu too ninje.
Meata kata nemeng'asi aainosaa lomon Peng'ida tiatua loreren pookin.
Ore teni epuoi aarik neitarasari ndai, eming'as aaekenyu eniroro, emimbirribir baiki, kake enaishori ndai te ina kata, ina eroro! amu mirara ndai looirorita, kake Olmumua Sinyati.
Neitarasaki olalashe olalashe lenye atua enkea o menye enkerai enye, nedumakino nkera lootoiutuo nepuo aar ninje metuata.
Niakuku looiba pookin tʼolbae lʼengarna ai; kake olong'iriaki metabaiki enkiting'oto, ninye olapok.
Naa teni idolidolo entorroni erruoroto eitashe tʼewueji nemeaku, (oloisoma ena, njeyolou), ore lootii Yudaya, njekwetiki ildonyo,
ore Olotii keper aji, njoo medou ajing' atu aji, pedumu entoki tʼengaji enye;
ore Olotii atua enkuruma, njoo meibelekenyakino kurum adumu olkarash lenye.
Ee, kake aiya, naamena o naaitanakisho too nona olong'i!
Entasaishoto, pemeaku kuna tʼenkata oloirujuruj.
Nepuo aaku nona olong'i sinaitin leitu eaku neba tʼenkiterata enkishirata naitobirua Engai, metabaiki taata, nemeitoki aaku tukul.
Ten emutu eitu eitadorrop Olaitoriani nona olong'i, anaata mepoku oltung'ani o obo; kake tʼolbae loo lootegeluaki ootegelua ninye, eitadorropa nona olong'i.
Ore pejoki baiki ndai oltung'ani te ina kata: Eng'orai, etii Kristos ene! arashu: idye! — emiruk!
Amu epuo aainyototo ilkristoi lʼelejare o layolounok lʼelejare, nepuo aaitobir ilponot kituak o nkiputukunyot, petum aaitamanimanai, ten ake eidimu, baiki lootegeluaki.
Kake entaduai aten! Aidipa atiaki ndai pookin.
Kake ore too nona olong'i, eidipe ilo sina, neopokini engolong' enaimin neiminye olapa enkibor enye
neaku esulunye lakir te shumata neing'unung'un ngoloni naatii shumata.
Nepuo aadol ninje te ina kata Enkerai oltung'ani elotu t'erukenya tʼengolon kitok o tʼenkitook.
Nelairriu te ina kata ilmalaikan nelaiturrur lootegeluaki lenyena, eing'ua nkutat ong'wan, eiter tʼenkiting'oto enkop metabaiki enkiting'oto e shumata.
Enteng'enuoto tʼenkitanyanyukiet olng'aboli: Teni enanau engaitubului enye neitupuku mbenek, niyolouu, aajo etataana enkata olodalu.
Neijia baiki si ndai, teni idolidolo kuna eaku, entayolo, aajo etataana kutukaji.
Japa, aliki ndai, memuta ena kishon tukul, metabana neaku kuna pookin.
Nepuo aamuta shumata o enkop, kake mepuo aamuta rorei lainei tukul.
Ore mbaak e ina olong' arashu e ina saa metii oloyolo, me ilmalaikan le shumata neme Oinoti, kake Papa ake.
Eng'orai, enjololoto, entasaishoto! amu miyololo enkata naaku.
Neijia anaa oltung'ani tiatua olototo otung'aiye engaji enye, neisho laisyayak lenyena engolon, peata oltung'ani pookin enkyas enye, neitanap olarriponi le kutukaji, peishololo.
Akae, enjololoto, amu miyololo enkata nalotu Olaitoriani lʼengaji, ten aa teipa, arashu empolos enkiarie, arashu eorito olkikusieki, arashu enasirie;
pemebau nabokata neinepu ndai irurate.
Ore enaliki ndai, naliki pookin: Enjololoto!
Ore peishunye ngolong'i are, neaku pasaka o ngolong'i oo lmkaten lemeisiijo. Neing'oru laidasak kituak o layolok lʼesirata eneiko, peibung' ninye tʼolosek, pear metua.
Nejo ake: me too ngolong'i kituak, pemeaku enkiposhai olorere.

Ore etii ninye Betania, engaji e Simon loata enkea oo lbolot, eton tʼendaata, nelotu eng'oroyoni nabo naata oltulet lʼeilata narropil nara sidai tukul negol enkinyang'a, negil oltulet, nebukoki elukunya enye.
Netii iltung'anak looibaitie ina tiatua aten nejo: Kainyo peisardakieki ena ilata narropil?
Amu anaata eidimi aatimir ina ilata narropil too denaria iip uni neishori laisinak. Negoroki ninje ninye naleng'.
Nejo Yesus: Entapal ninye! Ainyo pinosiesie ninye osina? Enkyas sidai eitobira ninye te nanu.
Amu iatata laisinak oshi tʼempolos inyi, ore piyeuu, nindimidimi aaitobirakiti ninje sidan; kake mikiatata nanu oshi.
Eitobira ninye anaa peidima; eitera ninye ael osesen lai tʼeilata narropil tʼenukare.
Japa, aliki ndai: Ore ewueji pookin neinosarieki lomon lʼeng'ida tʼenkop, neinosuni baiki enaitobira ninye nedamuni ninye.
Nelo Yudas Iskariotes, obo too kulo tomon o are, enetii laidasak kituak, peitarasaki ninye ninje.
Ore pening' ninje, neng'ida, neisilig ninye aaisho ngoshola. Neing'oru ninye eneiko, peitarasaa ninye tʼenkata naaku.
Ore tʼengolong' elukunya oo lmkaten lemeisiijo, tʼenkata naidasieki pasaka, nejoki laiteng'enuok lenyena ninye: Kaji iyeu nikipuo aaitobir, pinosie pasaka?
Neirriwaa ninye aare loo laiteng'enuok lenyena nejoki ninje: Enjom engang', nelatumore ndai oltung'ani, enapita emoti engare; entusuj ninye!
ore ewueji nelajing', entiakiti olopeny engaji: Ejo Olaitoriani: Kodee engaji oo lomon, panya te ina alo pasaka te nebo o laiteng'enuok lainei?
Nelaitadol ninye ndai olgilata kitok oitobirakaki ntoneta; entobirakiti yook te ina alo!
Nepuku laiteng'enuok nepuo engang' nedol anaa petiaka ninje, neitobir pasaka te ine.
Ore peaku teipa, nelotu te nebo o kulo tomon o are.
Ore petoni ninje, einosita endaa, nejo Yesus: Japa, aliki ndai: Aalaitarasaa obo linyi olonya endaa te nebo o nanu.
Neiter aailish ninje nejoki ninye obo obo: Ke nanu? o olekai: Ke nanu?
Nejoki ninye ninje: Obo too kulo tomon o are likiriamaki aaoku endaa tʼengirra.
Akae, elo Enkerai oltung'ani anaa petisirakaki ninye, kake aiya ele tung'ani loitarasarieki Enkerai oltung'ani! Anaata enaikash, ten emutu eitu eiuni ilo tung'ani.
Ore einosita ninje endaa, neibung' ninye olmkate, nemayan negiligil neisho ninje nejo: Enkoito, entaam! nera ele osesen lai.
Neibung enkwaru nejo ashe neisho ninje neok pookin te ninye.
Nejoki ninje: Era ele osarge lai lʼosotua ng'ejuk oibukori tʼolbae loo lkumok.
Japa, aliki ndai: Maitoki aok tukul tiatua eishoi enjani olmarua, metabaiki ina olong' nalaok eng'ejuk tiatua enkarsishu Engai.
Ore peidip aatarany Osingolio, nepuku aapuo Oldonyo loo loirienito.
Nejoki Yesus ninje: Kipuopuo aarikare ndai pookin, amu esira: Alaar olairritani, nepuo aaisardak ntare.
Ore eidipe empiunoto ai, nalaiturukie ndai alo Galilaya.
Nejoki Petros ninye: Teni kirikare pookin, namaarikare nanu.
Nejoki Yesus ninye: Japa, aaliki iye: Ore taata tʼena kiarie, eton eitu eorito olkikusieki aigil are, nikimiki aigil uni.
Nepon ninye naleng' airo: Baiki teni ae te nebo o iye, maalamiki iye tukul. Neijia etejo ninje pookin.
Nepuonu ninje enkuruma naji Getsemane, nejoki laiteng'enuok lenyena: Entotoni tene metabana nasaisho.
Nerik Petros o Yakobos o Yohanes te nebo o ninye neiter airuturut neisuuto
nejoki ninje: Eata Olmumua lai enkilishoto kitok metabaiki enkea; entotoni tene, enjololoto!
Nenyikaa peno nebatatakino enkop nesai, peiye teni eidimai, njelusoo ena kata ninye,
nejo: Aba, Papa, eidimai ntokitin pookin te iye; ntulusoiyoki ena kwaru; kake njoo meaku enayeu nanu, njeaku eniyeu iye!
Nelotu ninye neinepu ninje eirura te, nejoki ninye Petros: Simon, irura? Eitu indim aishololoi esaa nabo?
Enjololoto, entasaishoto, pemijing'ijing'i atua enkitasuroto! Eidipakine Olmumua, kake eshal osesen.
Neitoki alo nesaisho nelimu kulo rorei ake.
Neitoki arrinyo neinepu ninje eirurate, amu eiroshiutuo ngonyek enye neitu eyolo enaliki ninye.
Nelotu en e uni nejoki ninje: Erraga ade, eeng'ieng'ata! Ebaiki. Etabaua enkata. Eng'orai, eitarasakini Enkerai oltung'ani atua ngaik oo laitarruok.
Enyoito, maapeti! Eng'orai, etinyikua olaaitarasaa.
Ore nabokata epon eirorita ninye, nebau Yudas, obo loo kulo tomon o are, o te nebo o ninye esiamu naata lalema o siaren, eing'ua enetii laidasak kituak o layolok lʼesirata o laigwenak.
Eidipa aishoo olaitarasaroni lenye ninje olponoto nejo: Ore olang'utut, ninye ilo; embung'a ninye, entorik, entagolo!
Ore pebau, nelotu nabokata enetii ninye nejo: Laiteng'enani! neng'utut ninye.
Neaki ninje ninye ngaik neibung' ninye.
Ore obo too kulo ootaboitare ninye, neshitu olalem neosh olaisyayani lʼolaidasani kitok nedung'u ninye enkiyok.
Nealu Yesus nejoki ninje: Itupukutuo ndai, pikimbung'ubung'u too lalema o too siaren anaa iltung'anak loomirita olaisimani;
atii ngolong'i pookin atua ndai tiatua engaji sinyati, aiteng'enishe, neitu kimbung'ubung'u; kake etaa kuna, peiye ebaia sirat.
Neing'ua pookin ninye nekwet.
Nesuj olbarnoti obo ninye oiopokine olkarash oibor nemeata olekai; neibung' ninje ninye.
Neitiak olkarash nekwet meishopo.
Nerik ninje Yesus enetii olaidasani kitok, neiturrurrokino ninye laidasak kituak o laigwenak o layolok lʼesirata pookin
Nesuj Petros ninye tʼenelakwa metabaiki engang' olaidasani kitok nejing' atua neton te nebo o laisyayak aij enkima.
Neing'oru laidasak kituak o enkigwena pookin enjakenishu te Yesus, petum aataar ninye metua, neitu eidim.
Amu eijakenokitio ilkumok elejare, nemenyanyukoro njakenishuni enye.
Neinyototo kulekai neijakenoki ninye elejare, ejo:
Kitoning'o yook ninye ejo: Agil nanu ena aji sinyati naitobiruaki too ngaik, ore too ngolong'i uni nalashet engai neitu eitobiri too ngaik.
Neitu eitoriori baiki ena jakenishu enye.
Neinyototo olaidasani kitok nelo empolos enye neikilikwan ninye Yesus nejo: Mialu ororei too kuna nikinjakenoki kulo?
Negira ninye neitu ealiki ororei. Neitoki aikilikwan olaidasani kitok ninye nejoki ninye: Ira iye Kristos, Oinoti le Loitadarari?
Nejo Yesus: Ara nanu. Nipuopuo aadol Enkerai oltung'ani, eton te tatene Engolon, elotu tʼerukenya e shumata.
Nepolos olaidasani kitok ilkilani lenyena, ejo: Ainyo kintoki aayeunye iljaken?
Itoning'o emoroto Engai. Ijojo aa? Neigwenaki pookin ninye, ajo era lʼenkea.
Neiter kulekai aanotaki ninye ngamulak neop engomom enye near ninye too ntinan nejoki ninye: Ntayolou yook! Neng'amu laisyayak ninye aar engomom enye too ndapi.
Ore etii Petros boo, nelotu nabo too ngaisyayak olaidasani kitok,
nedol Petros eijita enkima neing'oraa ninye nejo: Itaboitare si iye ele Yesus le Nasaret.
Nemiki ninye nejo: Mayolo nanu namaning'ito enijoito. Nepuku aulo, neorito olkikusieki.
Nedol engaisyayani ninye neitoki aiter aliki lʼemboitei, ajo era ele obo too ninje.
Neitoki amiki. Neitoki tʼenkiti kata aajoki Petros kulo ooitashe o ninye: Esipa, ira obo too ninje, amu ira le Galilaya, nikilimu enkiroroto ino.
Neiter adekisho, neiturujisho, ajo: Mayolo nanu ilo tung'ani liimakiki.
Neorito nabokata olkikusieki en e are. Nedamu Petros ilo rorei otiaka Yesus ninye: Ore eton eitu eorito olkikusieki aigil are, nikimiki aigil uni. Ore pedamu, neishir.
Ore tʼentadekeny neosh enkigwena laidasak kituak te nebo o laigwenak o layolok lʼesirata o enkigwena nalulung'a, neen Yesus nerik neitarasaki Pilatos.
Neikilikwan Pilatos ninye: Ira iye olkarsis loo Yudayoi? Nealiki ninye nejo: Ijo iye.
Neitang'or laidasak kituak ninye too nkumok.
Neitoki aikilikwan Pilatos ninye ejo: Mialu ororei? Ng'orai, kaja kintang'orie ninje.
Neitu ealu Yesus toki, neiputukuny baiki Pilatos.
Neata ninye orregie loo ngolong'i kituak, pelaaki ninje obo loena otayeutuo ninje.
Netii obo oji Barabas, oteenaki te nebo o laisisak ootara oltung'ani metua tiatua enkitashoto.
Neilep olorere neiter aasai, peitobiraki ninje anaa oshi ake.
Nealiki Pilatos ninje ejo: Iyeuu nalaaki ndai ele karsis loo Yudayoi?
Amu etayolouo, ajo eitarasutua laidasak kituak ninye tʼengilata e tau.
Neisis laidasak kituak esiamu, peiye eaku enaikash, teni elaaki ninje Barabas.
Neitoki aaiu Pilatos nejoki ninje: Akae, kaa naa aikunaki ele lijojo, era olkarsis loo Yudayoi?
Neitoki aadar ninje: Tooshoki ninye esalaba!
Nejoki Pilatos ninje: Kaa torroni etaasa ninye? Nepon ninje naleng' aadar: Tooshoki ninye esalaba!
Akae, neyeu Pilatos neitobiraki olorere enanyor nelaaki ninje Barabas neitarasaa Yesus, eidipa ataara too nkeenda, petumi aatooshokiti ninye esalaba.
Nerik isikerin ninye atua engaji enkigwena neipot ninje, peiturrurro oltim olulung'a.
Neishopoki ninje ninye olkila odo neshet olmarisian loo lkikarreta neishopoki ninye elukunya;
neiter aairoroki ninye: Supai, lekarsis loo Yudayoi!
Neosh ninye elukunya tʼolmoloi nenotaki ninye ngamulak negil kung' aaitaa ninye kitok.
Ore peidip aatusul ninye, neoru ninye olkila odo neishopoki ninye ilkilani lenyena. Nerik aulo, peoshoki esalaba.
Neitanap ninje tʼengolon oltung'ani oimita, Simon le Kirene, eing'ua enkuruma, nera menye le Aleksandros o le Rufos, penap esalaba enye.
Nerik ninje ninye metabaiki ewueji Golgota, ore enkitaalata enye: ewueji emborbor,
Neisho ninye olmarua oshulare engare naitiming'anisho; neany ninye.
Ore peidip ninje aatooshokiti ninye esalaba, neorikino ilkilani lenyena, neoshoki olenkukuo t'olbae lenye, peyolou ang'ai lotum toki.
Etaa saa uni, etooshokoki ninye esalaba.
Netii shumata enye esirata enkitang'oroto enye: Olkarsis loo Yudayoi.
Neoshoki te nebo o ninye laisimak aare esalaba, obo te tatene o obo te kedyanye enye.
Nebaia esirata najo: Eikenaiyoki ninye te nebo o laitarruok.
Ore kulo ooimita nemor ninye eipiripirito lukuny enye nejo: Kiiti, ologil engaji sinyati neshet ninye too ngolong'i uni!
Ntopua kion, tadou tʼesalaba!
Nesul neijia baiki si ninje laidasak kituak tʼempolos enye te nebo o layolok lʼesirata nejo: Eitopua ilkulekai nemeidim aitopua kion.
Njedou taata Kristos, olkarsis le Israel, tʼesalaba, pekitum aatadol, nikiruk. Etamoro si ninje lootooshokoki esalaba te nebo o ninye.
Ore peaku saa ile, neaku enaimin te shumata enkop pookin metabaiki saa enturuj.
Nedar Yesus te saa enturuj tʼoltoilo kitok nejo: Eli, Eli lamaa asabtani? neji enkitaalata enye: Engai ai, Engai ai, ainyo pikitung'aiye?
Ore pening' ematua oo kulo looitashe tʼenetaana, nejo: Ng'orai, eipotito Eliya.
Nekwet oltung'ani obo neigany enjutet engare naitiming'anisho nepik shumata olmoloi neitook ninye, ejo: Entapal, maing'orai, ten ake elotu Eliya, peitadou ninye.
Neitupuku Yesus oltoilo kitok, nedung'o tau.
Nepolosa olkarash lʼerishata engaji sinyati matuan are, eiter te shumata metabaiki enkop.
Ore pedol olkigeluni loitashe tʼeneitoriokinore ninye, ajo nji etudung'e tau, nejo: Esipa, era ele tung'ani Oinoti lʼEngai!
Netii baiki ng'oroyok ine naaing'orita tʼenelakwa; netii atua ninje Maria Magdalena o Maria, ng'otonye e Yakobos olkiti o ne Yoses, o Salome,
ninje naatusuja ninye, etii Galilaya, neisyayaki ninye, o nkulie kumok naaileputua te nebo o ninye metabaiki Yerusalem.
Ore peaku teipa, etii engolong' enkitobirakinore nara enaiturukie engolong' naeng'ieng'areki,
nelotu Yosef le Arimatia, olaigwenani loataiyeki oloip, nera ninye loanyu enkarsishu Engai, neiteu ninye atijing'aki Pilatos neomonu osesen le Yesus.
Neiputukuny Pilatos, ajo eidipa atua; neipot olkigeluni neikilikwan ninye, ten ake elakwa etua.
Ore peyolou tʼolkigeluni esipata, neisho Yosef empopong'.
Neinyang'u olkarash oibor neitadou ninve neirinaki atua olkarash oibor nepik ninye atua enkurare natabataki tiatua osoit kitok neibeleleng'oki osoit kitok kutukaji enkurare.
Neing'oraa Maria Magdalena o Maria e Yoses enetipikaki.
Ore peishunye engolong' naeng'ieng'areki, neinyang'u Maria Magdalena o Maria, ng'otonye e Yakobos, o Salome ilat naarropil, pepuonu aael ninye.
Ore enasirie naleng', tʼengolong' elukunya enjuma, nepuonu ninje enetii enkurare, eilepu engolong'.
Nejokino ninje tʼempolos enye: Ang'ai oibelekenyaki yook osoit te kutukaji enkurare?
Ore peing'oraa ninje, nedol, aajo eidipaki aibelekenyai osoit; amu era kitok naleng'.
Ore pejing' ninje atua enkurare, nedol olbarnoti otonita te tatene neishopito olkila oibor; neing'asia ninje.
Nejoki si ninye ninje: Eming'asia! Ing'oruru ndai Yesus le Nasaret otooshokoki esalaba; etopiwuo ninye; metii ene. Eng'orai ewueji neitaperieki ninye!
Kake enjom, entiakiti laiteng'enuok lenyena o Petros, ajo elaiturukie ndai alo Galilaya; nipuopuo aadol ninye te ina alo anaa petiaka ndai.
Nepuku ninje aasioio nekwet aaing'ua enkurare, amu eibung'a ninje enkikirikirata o enking'asiata; neitu eliki ninje oltung'ani ororei, amu etureishote.
Ore peinyototo Yesus enasirie tʼengolong' elukunya enjuma, neng'as aitadol kion Maria Magdalena natimirie ninye ilmumuan torrok oopishana.
Neibung' ninye engoitoi neinosaki mbaak kulo lootaboitare ninye, eilishito neishir.
Ore pening' si kulo, aajo eishiu ninye netadua ninye ninye, neitu eiruk ninje.
Ore tekurum oo kuna nelioi ninye tʼengai mua too aare lenye ootilimanate aapuo enkuruma.
Nepuo kulo neinosaki mbaak lootelekutua; neitu eiruk baiki lelo.
Neitadol kion tʼenkiting'oto kulo tomon o obo, etonita tʼendaata, neilepilepaki ninje, tiaraki neitu eiruk, negol iltauja lenye, aajo eitu eiruk kulo lootadua ninye etopiwuo.
Nejoki ninje: Embung'a engoitoi aapuo atua olmaa pookin, enosakiti lomon lʼeng'ida enkitobirata pookin.
Oloiruk neibatisi, nepok; olemeiruk, nepuoi aadek.
Nepuo aarubare looiruk kulo ponot: nepuo aamir ninje lʼengarna ai ilmeneng'a, nepuo aairo too nkutukie ng'ejuko,
nepuo aadumu lasuria; naa teni eok entoki naarisho, nemear ninje tukul; nepuo aaiteleiki ngaik loomoiyaa, neaku ninje biot.
Akae, ore peidip Olaitoriani airorie ninje, nedumari shumata neton te tatene Engai.
Nepuku kulo neinosu lomon lʼEngai too wuejitin pookin; neretoki Olaitoriani ninje too nkyasin enye neitagol ororei too lponot looturubare. Amen.
Tiaraki natii ilkumok ootipika ngaik enye aasir aabaraki lomon loo mbaak naataa tiatua yook,
anaa peakitia yook kulo loora neba tʼenkiterata lootadua too ngonyek enye oopeny nera laisyayak lʼororei,
atadua si nanu, ajo era sidai, teni aasiraki iye, Teofilos lanyor naleng', abaraki mbaak pookin nataleeno neba tʼenkion enye osupatei,
piyolou esipata oo mbaak oo lomon likinteng'enaki.
Etii tʼenkata e Herodes lora olkarsis tiatua Yudaya olaidasani obo, oji Sakarias, nera lʼolkamba le Abia, o eng'oroyoni enye too ntoiye e Aron, naji engarna enye Elisabet.
Nera ninje pokira are supati tʼengomom Engai, neibung' nkitanapat pookin o supaton Olaitoriani, meata eleyata.
Neitu eata ninje enkerai; amu eitasho Elisabet, etaa pokira are moruak too ngolong'i enye.
Akae, eitobir ninye enkyas enkidasare abaraki tʼolkamba lenye tʼengomom Engai,
anaa pera orregie lʼenkidasare, netum enkukuo ninye, pejing' engaji sinyati Olaitoriani airisho.
Netii enkumoi pookin olorere boo, esaisho, tʼenkata nairishore.
Nelioi te ninye olmalaika lʼOlaitoriani, eitashe tʼematua e tatene olperere oirishoreki.
Ore pedol Sakarias ninye, neng'ayung'ayu, nejing' enkuretishu atua ninye.
Nejoki olmalaika ninye: miureishoi, Sakarias! amu etoning'oki esayata ino, kilaiki eng'oroyoni Elisabet enkerai, nimpot engarna enye Yohanes;
nilaata eng'ida o engalali, neitoki aang'ida ilkumok tʼeiunoto enye.
Amu eaku ninye kitok tʼengomom Olaitoriani, nemeok olmarua o eokore naitemerisho, neiganyi ninye Olmumua Sinyati, epon etii engoshoke e ng'otonye enye;
nelarrinyoki ninye ilkumok tiatua nkera Israel Olaitoriani, Engai enye;
nelaiturukie ninye tʼengomom enye tʼolmumua o tʼengolon Eliya arrinyoki iltauja loo loomenye nkera, o lemeiruk eng'eno oo supati, peiye eitobiraki Olaitoriani olorere.
Nejoki Sakarias olmalaika: Kainyo ayolounye ina? Anlu ara nanu moruo naa moruo eng'oroyoni ai too ngolong'i enyena.
Nealiki olmalaika nejoki ninye: Ara nanu Gabriel oitashe tʼengomom Engai naairriuaki, paairorie iye, paainosaki iye nena.
Ng'orai, ilagira nimindim airoro metabaiki ena olong' napuo aaku kuna, tiaraki neitu iruk rorei lainei loopuoi aaitabaia tʼenkata enye.
Netii olorere boo neanyu Sakarias, neiputukuny tʼenkimutioto enye tiatua engaji sinyati.
Ore pepuku ninye, neitu eidim airorie ninje, neyolou ninje, aajo etadua ninye enkitaduaroto tiatua engaji sinyati. Neaku erojaa ninje nebik meiro.
Neaku ore peidipai ngolong'i enkisyayare enye, nelo engaji enye.
Ore peishunye nona olong'i, nemenai eng'oroyoni enye Elisabet, neisudori lapaitin imiet, ejo:
Nji aaitobiraka Olaitoriani too nona olong'i naaing'oraiye, paaitaiki enkurruna ai tiatua iltung'anak.
Ore tʼolapa le ile neirriwaa Engai olmalaika Gabriel atua engang' nabo e Galilaya, naji engarna enye Nasaret,
enetii entito natisira olee obo oji Yosef, lʼengaji e David, neji engarna e ina ito Maria.
Ore peidip atijing'a olmalaika enetii ninye, nejo: Takwenia, naishooki eng'adunoto! Kirubare Olaitoriani! Kitamayanaki tiatua ng'oroyok!
Ore pedol ninye, neng'ayung'ayu naleng' too rorei lenyena neibirribir: Kaa kirorokinoto ena?
Nejoki olmalaika ninye: Miureisho, Maria! amu inoto eng'adunoto tʼEngai.
Naa ng'orai, ilamenai nilaiu Oinoti, nilaipot engarna enye Yesus.
Neaku ele kitok, nepuoi aaipot Oinoti lʼOlotii shumata naleng' nelaisho Olaitoriani Engai ninye olorika lʼenkitoria le menye lenye David,
nelaitore ninye engaji e Yakoob nkatan pookin, nemeata enkarsishu enye enkiting'oto.
Nejoki Maria olmalaika: Kaji eiko teni eaku ena, amu mayolo olee?
Nealiki olmalaika nejoki ninye: Kiladoiki Olmumua Sinyati nikiopoki engolon Olotii shumata naleng'; onaa epuoi aaipot ele Sinyati loiuni Oinoti lʼEngai.
Naa ng'orai, Elisabet, enjoruet ino, emena si ninye tʼenkerai olee tiatua emoruao enye, nera ele olapa le ile te ninye naipoti naitasho;
amu metii entoki o nabo nemeidimai tʼEngai.
Nejo Maria: Ng'orai, ara nanu engaisyayani Olaitoriani; njeaku te nanu anaa pitejo. Nelo olmalaika aing'ua ninye.
Nedumunye Maria to nona olong'i nelo oldonyo tʼesioroto atua engang' e Yuda,
nejing' atua engaji e Sakarias neiro roki Elisabet.
Neaku ore pening Elisabet enkirorokinoto e Maria, neipid enkerai tiatua engoshoke enye, neiganyi Elisabet Olmumua Sinyati,
nedar ninye tʼendarata kitok nejo: Kitamayanaki iye tiatua ng'oroyok nemayana eishoi engoshoke ino.
Kaji eiko teni eaku ena te nanu, ajo elotu ng'otonye Olaitoriani lai enatii nanu?
Amu ng'orai, ore etijing'a oltoilo lʼenkirorokinoto ino atua nkiyaa ainei, neipid tʼengalali enkerai tiatua engoshoke ai.
Ira iye tesh eniruko, amu eidipai enikitiakaki tʼOlaitoriani.
Nejo Maria: Eitaa oltau lai Olaitoriani kitok
neng'idakino Olmumua lai Engai, Olaitopuani lai;
amu etadua ninye enkitadounoto engaisyayani enye. Amu ngʼorai, eiter taata aapuo aaipot nkishomini pookin entesh;
amu aaitobiraka Oloata engolon ntokitin kituak, naa sinyati engarna enye;
nebik eng'adunoto enye tiatua nkishomini pookin, too kulo looure ninye.
Neitaa engolon tʼengaina enye neisardakie looata olwuasa too ndamunot oo ltauja lenye;
nebatat looata engolon too lorikaishi, neitaa kituak looitadou aten;
neitaraposh too ntokitin sidan looata olamei; neing'ua ladupak neijia.
Neretoki Israel lora olaisyayani lenye, nedamu enkordunoto enye,
neijia anaa petiaka loopapa lang', Abraham o eishoi enye, nkatan pookin.
Nebik Maria te nebo o ninye enkata oo lapaitin okuni, nerrinyo engaji enye.
Nebaia enkata Elisabet naishore, neiu enkerai olee.
Nening' lʼelatia o lʼenkishomi enye, ajo eitaa kitok Olaitoriani enkordunoto enye, neng'ida te nebo o ninye.
Neaku engolong' e isiet, nepuonu aamurat enkerai nedung'oki ninye engarna e menye lenye Sakarias.
Nealu ng'otonye enye nejo: Me neija, kake eipoti ninye Yohanes.
Nejoki ninje ninye: Metii o obo lʼenkishomi ino loipotieki ina arna.
Neroj ninje menye lenye, pelimu enayeu neipotieki ninye.
Neyeu ninye osoit nesir nejo: Yohanes engarna enye. Neiputukuny ninje pookin.
Nelaki nabokata enkutuk enye o olng'ejep lenye, neiro neitadaraa Engai.
Neaku enkuretishu too pookin lʼelatia enye, neibulu kulo rorei pookin atua ildonyo pookin le Yudaya.
Neibung' ninje pookin lootoning'o too ltauja lenye nejo: Amaa, keaku ena kerai ng'ai? Amu eturubare engaina Olaitoriani ninye.
Neigany Sakarias, menye lenye, Olmumua Sinyati neitayolo mbaak e akenya nejo:
Njeitadarari Olaitoriani, Engai e Israel, tiaraki natijing'aka neitobiraki enkitopuata olorere lenye,
neunoki yook emowuo enkitopuata tiatua engaji e David, olaisyayani lenye,
neijia anaa petejo ninye, eiter opa, tʼenkutuk oo layolounok sinyat lenyena:
peitopok yook too lmang'ati lang' o too ngaik oo pookin looiba yook,
neitobiraki enkordunoto loopapa lang' nedamu osotua lenye sinyati
o enkiturujata naiturujaka papa lang' Abraham ajo eisho yook
kipok too ngaik oo lmang'ati lang', mikiata enkuretishu, pikisyayaki ninye too ngolong'i ang' pookin
t'esinyatishu o tʼesupato tʼengomom enye.
O iye, nakerai, kipuoi aaipot olayolounoni lʼOlotii shumata naleng', amu ilaiturukie engomom Olaitoriani, pintobir ngoitoi enyena,
pinjo olorere lenye eyoloupoto enkitopuata tiatua enkitaunoto oo nkitarruot enye,
tʼoltau lʼenkordunoto Engai ang' naitijing'ua atua yook enkilepunoto naing'ua shumata,
peilang'aki lootoni tiatua enaimin o tiatua oloip lʼenkea, nerik nkejek ang' atua engoitoi eseriani.
Nebulu ena kerai negolu tʼolmumua, netii atua ang'at metabaiki kuna olong'i naaibalakino ninye atua Israel.
Neaku nepuku too nona olong'i enkitanapata e kaisar Augustos, pesiri olmaa pookin.
Nera ena sirata en elukunya nataa, eitore Kirenios olosho Siria.
Neibung' iltung'anak pookin engoitoi nepuo, pesiri oltung'ani pookin tʼengang' enye.
Nedumunye baiki si ninye Yosef, eing'ua Galilaya, engang' Nasaret, neilep alo Yudaya, metabaiki engang' e David, naji Betlehem, tiaraki nara ninye l'engaji o lʼenkishomi e David,
pesiri ninye te nebo o Maria, eng'oroyoni enye, natasanjana, nemena ninye.
Neaku ore etii ninje ina alo, nebaia ngolong'i naaishore ninye,
neiu ninye olkikau lenye neirin ninye too rasheta oo nkera neirragie ninye tiatua embout, tiaraki neitu etum ninje engai wueji tiatua engaji oo lomon.
Netii lairritak atua ilo osho ooirritita enjoo enye te boo tʼolkamba le kiarie.
Nepukoki ninje olmalaika lʼOlaitoriani neman enkitook Olaitoriani ailang'aki ninje, neureishoi ninje tʼenkuretishu kitok.
Nejoki olmalaika ninje: Emiureisho! Amu eng'orai, ainosaki ndai eng'ida kitok naaku noo loreren pookin;
amu etoikioki ndai taata Olaitopuani, oji Kristos, Olaitoriani, tʼengang' e David.
Naa ele olponoto too ndai: ipuopuo aatum enkerai nairinaki too rasheta oo nkera, eirragieki tiatua embout.
Nelioi nabokata te nebo o olmalaika oltim kitok le shumata loitadaraa Engai nejo:
Njeata Engai enkitook te shumata, njeaku eseriani tʼenkop, too ltung'anak lʼenyorrata.
Neaku ore peing'ua ilmalaikan ninje, pepuo shumata, nejokino lairritak: Maapeti metabaiki Betlehem, piking'oraa ena bae nataa, naitayolo yook Olaitoriani.
Nesioio ninje aapuo neinepu Maria o Yosef o enkerai, eirrag tiatua embout.
Ore peidip aatadol, neinosaa embae natiakaki ninje tʼolbae lʼena kerai.
Ore pookin lootoning'o, neiputukuny too kuna naatiakitia lairritak ninje.
Neshum Maria kuna baak pookin neibirribir tiatua oltau lenye.
Nerrinyo lairritak neitaa kitok neitadaraa Engai too mbaak pookin naatoning'o nedol, neijia anaa petiakaki ninje.
Ore peishunye ngolong'i isiet, pemurati enkerai, neipoti engarna enye Yesus, anaa peipoto olmalaika eton eitu eng'amuni tiatua engoshoke e ng'otonye.
Ore pebau ngolong'i enkisujata enye, anaa ejo nkitanapat e Mose, nenap ninje ninye Yerusalem, peitarasaki Olaitoriani,
neijia anaa petisiraki tiatua nkitanapat Olaitoriani: Ore olee pookin obol enkuset e ng'otonye, njeipoti osinyati lʼOlaitoriani,
petum aaishoi enkidasare, neija anaa petejoki tiatua enkitanapata Olaitoriani: ilmaita aare arashu nkera are oo lmaita.
Naa ng'orai, etii oltung'ani atua Yerusalem, oji engarna enye Simeon; nera ele tung'ani supat neure Engai neanyu enkilejilejata e Israel, netii Olmumua Sinyati atua ninye;
neitayolo Olmumua Sinyati ninye, ajo medol enkea, eitu edol Kristos lʼOlaitoriani.
Nelotu ninye tʼerikunoto Olmumua atua engaji sinyati. Ore pepuonu lootoiutuo enkerai Yesus, peitobir anaa petiu orregie loo nkitanapat tʼolbae lenye,
neng'amu ninye too ngaik enyena neitadaraa Engai, ejo:
Laitoriani, njoo taata olaisyayani lino, pelo tʼeseriani anaa pitejo,
amu etadua ngonyek ainei enkitopuata ino,
nintobira tʼengomom oo loreren pookin,
enkilang'et nailang'aki loreren o enkitook olorere lino Israel.
Neiputukuny menye lenye o ng'otonye too rorei looimakaki te ninye.
Nemayan Simeon ninje nejoki Maria, ng'otonye enye: Ng'orai, epiki ninye, peaku embatatata o enkitasheito oo lkumok tiatua Israel o olponoto oitemenetari —
nikilaim si iye olalem atua oltau —, pebolunye ndamunot oo ltauja kumok.
Netii engayolounoni nabo naji Ana, entito e Fanuel, lenkishomi e Aser; naa moruo ninye naleng', etobiko eata olmoruo larin oopishana, eiter entitoishu enye,
nera ninye engoliai oo larin ntomoni isiet o ong'wan, neitu eing'ua engaji sinyati neisyayaki Engai dama o kiarie too mpukorot o too sayat.
Nelotu si ninye te ina kata neliki Engai ashe neinosaki mbaak enyena kulo pookin ootaanyutua enkitopuata te Yerusalem.
Ore peidip ninje aaitabai pookin natii atua nkitanapat Olaitoriani, nerrinyo aapuo Galilaya metabaiki engang' enye Nasaret.
Nebulu ina kerai negolu tʼolmumua, nebore eng'eno neboitare eng'adunoto Engai ninye.
Nepuo lootoiutuo ninye Yerusalem tʼolari pookin too ngolong'i e pasaka.
Ore peaku ninye noo larin tomon o are, neilep aapuo ninje Yerusalem tʼorregie loo ngolong'i kituak.
Ore peidip aaitabai nona olong i, nerrinyo ninje ang', nebik enkerai Yesus te Yerusalem, neitu eyolou ena lootoiutuo ninye.
Nejo ninje, aajo etii ninye atua iltung'anak lʼolototo, nepuonu olototo lʼengolong' nabo neing'oru ninye tiatua iltung'anak lʼenkishomi o lʼemboitei;
ore pelau ninye, nerrinyo metabaiki Yerusalem, eing'oru ninye.
Neaku ore peishunye ngolong'i uni, netum ninye tiatua engaji sinyati, eton tʼempolos oo laiteng'enak, einining' ninje neikilikwan ninje.
Neirut naleng' pookin lootoning'o ninye tʼolbae lʼeng'eno enye o tʼolbae loo aleta enyena.
Ore pedol ninje ninye, neing'asia naleng', nejoki ng'otonye enye ninye: Nakerai, ainyo pinkunaka yook nji? Ng'orai, king'orutua, minyi lino o nanu, tʼosina.
Nejoki ninye ninje: Ainyo piking'orutua? Miyololo ndai, aajo meata kata namatii atua ne Papa lai?
Neitu eyolou ninje ele rorei lotiaka ninje.
Nedou ninye te nebo o ninje ne-lotu Nasaret neaku ening' ninje. Neshum ng'otonye enye kulo rorei pookin tiatua oltau lenye.
Nenyikaa Yesus tiatua eng'eno o tiatua embulunoto o tiatua eng'adunoto tʼEngai o too ltung'anak.

Ore tʼolari le tomon o imiet lʼenkitoria e kaisar Tiberias, era Pontios Pilatos Olaitoriani le Yudaya nera Herodes Olaitoriani lʼematua e ong'wan le Galilaya nera Filipos, olalashe lenye, Olaitoriani lʼematua e ong'wan le Ituraya o olosho Trakonitis nera Lisanias Olaitoriani lʼematua e ong'wan le Abilene,
tʼenkata olaidasani kitok Anas o Kayafas, nebaiki ororei lʼEngai Yohanes, enkerai e Sakarias, ti ang'ata.
Nelotu ninye atua loshon pookin oomanita Yordan, einosu enkibatisa enkitaalata nʼenkitaunoto oo nkitarruot,
anaa petisiraki tʼenkitabu oo rorei le Yesaya, olayolounoni, ojo: Etii ang'ata oltoilo lʼoloipotisho: Entobira engoitoi Olaitoriani, entorioi nkiimat enyena!
Njeiganyi nong'ot pookin, njeitadouni ildonyo o ndonyo pookin, njeitoriori nariwuo, njeari ilgurumen metorisioto ngoitoi.
Nepuo aadol iseseni pookin enkitopuata Engai.
Akae, nejoki ninye siamin naaetuo, peibatis ninye ninje: Ndai eishoi oo lasuria, kang'ai otoroja ndai, pikwetikwete engoro Engai nalotu?
Akae, entoiu ilmomo sidan lʼenkitaalata! niminteritere aajo tiatua ndai: Kiata papa lora Abraham. Amu aliki nanu ndai, ajo eidim Engai ainyeye Abraham nkera tiatua kulo soito.
Akae, eidipaki aatipik baiki entoiu ntonat oo ljanito; ore oljani pookin lemeiu ilmomo sidan, nedung'i nenang'akini atua enkima.
Neikilikwan kuna siamin ninye nejo: Kaji naa kinko?
Nealiki ninye nejoki: Oloata ilkilani aare, njoo eoriki olemeata; oloata ndaikin, njeiko neijia ake.
Nepuonu si ninje, laoshok le kodi, peibatisi, nejoki ninje ninye: Laiteng'enani, kaji kinko?
Nejoki si ninye ninje: Emiaru enalang' naitanapaki ndai.
Neikilikwan si sikerin ninye ejo: Kaji kinko si yook? Nejoki ninje: Emisil oltung'ani nimisimisimi, njoo ebaiki ndai olkwaje linyi.
Akae, ore pemusu olorere neibirribir ninje pookin too ltauja lenye mbaak e Yohanes, ten ak era ninye Kristos arashu me,
nealiki Yohanes nejoki ninje pookin: Aibatis nanu ndai tʼengare, kake elotu ologol laalang' nanu, nemeaku, palaaki enkeene oo namuka enyena; nelaibatis ninye ndai tʼOlmumua Sinyati o tʼenkima;
neata ninye enkutet enye tiatua engaina enye nelaor ninye naleng' eneisalaashishore enye, neiturrurroki engano atua embeje enye, kake elapej suut tʼenkima nememuta.
Akae, neitoki adiding'ie nkulie kumok neinosaki olorere lomon lʼeng'ida.
Ore peitukurru ninye Herodes, Olaitoriani lʼematua e ong'wan, tʼolbae le Herodias, engoroyoni olalashe lenye, o tʼolbae loo ntorrok pookin naataasa Herodes,
neponaa ele kuna pookin neen Yohanes tʼengaji eenata.
Neaku ore peibatisi olorere pookin neibatisi baiki Yesus, esaisho, nebolo shumata
nedoiki Olmumua Sinyati tʼemua anaa olmaitai shumata enye neaku eing'ua oltoilo shumata nejo: Ira iye Oinoti lai lanyor oshipakino oltau lai.
Nera ninye Yesus te ina kata naitera anaa loo larin osom, anaa enkerai e Yosef le Eliya,
le Matat, le Levi, le Melki, le Yanai, le Yosef,
le Matatias, le Amos, le Nahum, le Esli, le Nangai,
le Maat, le Matatias, le Semei, le Yosek, le Yoda,
le Yohanas, le Resa, le Serubabel, le Salaltiel, le Neri,
le Melki, le Adi, le Kosam, le Elmadam, le Er,
le Yesus, le Elieser, le Yorim, le Matat, le Levi,
le Simeon, le Yuda, le Yosef, le Yonam, le Eliakim,
le Melea, le Mena, le Matata, le Natam, le David,
le Yese, le Obed, le Boas, le Sala, le Naashon,
le Aminadab, le Admin, le Arnei, le Esrom, le Peres, le Yuda,
le Yakoob, le Isaak, le Abraham, le Tara, le Nahor,
le Seruk, le Ragau, le Pereg, le Eber, le Sala,
le Kenan, le Arpaksad, le Shem, le Noa, le Lamek,
le Metusala, le Henok, le Yered, le Malalel, le Kenan,
le Enos, le Shet, le Adam, lʼEngai.
Nerrinyo Yesus, eiganya Olmumua Sinyati, eing'ua Yordan, neriki tʼolmumua ang'ata
netem satan ninye ngolong'i artam. Neitu enya ninye toki too nona olong'i; ore peishunye ninje nening'olamei.
Nejoki satan ninye: Teni ira iye Oinoti lʼEngai, tiaki ele soit, peaku olmkate.
Nealiki Yesus ninye: Etisiraki, ajo: Meishiu oltung'ani tʼolmkate ake, kake tʼororei pookin lʼEngai.
Nerik satan ninye shumata oldonyo oado neitadol ninye nkarsishuni pookin olmaa nabo kata.
Nejoki satan ninye: Aalaisho iye ina golon pookin o enkitook enye, amu aaitarasakaki si nanu nalaisho si nanu ninye olayeu;
akae, teni kiserem tʼengomom ai, neaku pookin nkunonono.
Nealu Yesus nejoki ninye: Etisiraki: Teserema Olaitoriani, Engai ino, nisyayaki ninye openy ake!
Nerik ninye Yerusalem neitasheye ninye tʼoldidio lʼengaji sinyati nejoki ninye: Teni ira Oinoti lʼEngai, tusulakinoi enkop,
amu etisiraki: Kintanapaki ilmalaikan lenyena, pikirrip iye,
nikinap te shumata oo ngaik, pemikinkob osoit enkeju ino.
Nealiki Yesus nejoki ninye: Etejoki: Mitem Olaitoriani, Engai ino!
Ore peidip satan enkitasuroto pookin, neng'as aing'ua ninye.
Neitoki alotu Yesus tʼengolon Olmumua Galilaya neibulaa mbaak enyena atua loshon pookin oomanita.
Neiteng'enisho ninye tiatua ngajijik Engai enye neitaa iltung'anak pookin ninye kitok.
Nelotu ninye Nasaret naitubulunyeki ninye, nejing' tʼengolong' naeng'ieng'areki atua engaji Engai, anaa petii orregie lenye, neinyototo, peisoma.
Neishori ninye enkitabu olayolounoni Yesaya. Ore pebol ina kitabu, netum ewueji netisiraki:
Etii Olmumua lʼOlaitoriani shumata ai, onaa aaela, painosaki laisinak lomon lʼeng'ida; aairriwaiye, painosaki looteenaki elakunoto o ilmodook endolishoto; palaku naing'uaiki lootorogonyaki,
painosaki olari lotonyorraki lʼOlaitoriani.
Neigen ninye enkitabu neisho olaisyayani neton. Neing'oraa ngonyek pookin tiatua engaji Engai ninye.
Neiter ninye ajoki ninje: Eitabaiyoki taata ena sirata atua nkiyaa inyi.
Neijakenoki pookin ninye neiputukuny tʼolbae loo rorei lʼengaripo ootupukutuo tʼenkutuk enye, nejo: Mera ninye enkerai e Yosef?
Nejoki ninye ninje: Esipa, kipuopuo aaliki ena kitanyanyukiet: Laishiunoni, njiunye kion! Ai kitoning'o ntokitin kituak naataa te Kapernaum! Ntobira baiki nji tene, tiatua olosho le minyi lino!
Nejo ninye ake: Japa, aliki ndai: Metii olayolounoni oanyiti tiatua olosho lenye.
Naliki ndai tʼesipata: Etii ngolia kumok naatii atua Israel too ngolong'i e Eliya, eigenoki shumata larin okuni o lapaitin ile neaku olamei kitok tiatua olosho pookin,
neitu eirriwakini Eliya o nabo too ninje neme atua Sarepta oo Sidonia, enetii eng'oroyoni oliai.
Netii ilkumok lʼenkea oo lbolot atua Israel tʼenkata olayolounoni Elisa, neitu eisuji o obo too ninje, neme Naeman, oltung'ani le Siria.
Neigany ninje pookin engoro tiatua engaji Engai, etoning'o kuna,
neinyototo nerrumoki aulo engang' nerik ninye metabaiki oldidio lʼoldonyo oshetakino engang' enye, pesulaa ninye;
kake neim ninye empolos enye, nelo.
Nedou ninye metabaiki Kapernaum, engang' e Galilaya, neaku eiteng'en ninje too ngolong'i naaeng'ieng'areki.
Neiputukuny ninje naleng' tʼenkiteng'enare enye, amu etii rorei lenyena atua engolon.
Netii atua engaji Engai oltung'ani oata Olmumua menengʼani duruki, nedar ninye tʼoltoilo kitok:
Oi, kainyo kiataiye iye, Yesus le Nasaret? Iewuo iye, piminye yook, ayolo olira iye, Osinyati lʼEngai.
Nebuaki Yesus ninye, ejo: Tumuka enkutuk, tupuku tiatua ninye. Nenang'aki olmeneng'ani ninye polos nepuku te ninye neitu easaki toki.
Neaku enkingʼasia too pookin neirorioro tʼempolos enye nejo: Kalo rorei ele? Amu eitanap tʼengolon o tʼenkidimata ilmumuan duruk, nepuku.
Neibulu mbaak enyena too wuejitin pookin olosho lomanita.
Neinyototo ninye aing'ua engaji Engai nejing' atua engaji e Simon. Neaku eibung'ita oltikana kitok engaputani e Simon, nesai ninje ninye tʼolbae lenye.
Neitasheiki ninye nebuaki oltikana, neing'ua ninye, neinyototo nabokata neisyayaki ninje.
Ore pedoiyo engolong', neaki ninje pookin ninye iltamoiya looata nkeaitin oo muain kumok. Neiteleiki ninye ninje, oltung'ani pookin, ngaik neishiunye ninje.
Nepuku baiki ilmeneng'a too lkumok, edar nejo: Ira iye Oinoti lʼEngai! Nebuaki neitu eisho ninje eiro; amu etayoloutuo ninje, aajo era ninye Kristos.
Ore peaku dama, nepuku ninye nelo enemetii iltung'anak; neing'oru siamin ninye nepuonu enetii ninye neibok ninye, pemelo aing'ua ninje.
Nejoki ninye ninje: Meata kata namainosaki baiki nkulie ang'itie lomon lʼeng'ida lʼenkarsishu Engai, amu te ina bae aairriuaki.
Neaku einosaa lomon lʼEngai tiatua ngajijik Engai e Yudaya.
Neaku eroosh esiamu ninye, pening' lomon lʼEngai, neitashe ninye tʼembata olbalbal Genesaret,
nedol ngalawani are naaitashe tʼembata olbalbal; netadoutuo larreshok too ninje, eisujita rresheta enye.
Nejing' ninye engalawa nabo nara ne Simon nesai ninye, pelam peno enetoiyo. Ore peidip atotona, neiteng'en isiamin tiatua engalawa.
Ore peidip airoro, nejoki ninye Simon: Tinyikai metabaiki eneasur, entadoikiti rresheta inyi, pirreshishosho.
Nealu Simon nejo: Laiturukoni, kiteekenyate enkiarie pookin, neitu kitum toki; kake tʼolbae lʼororei lino alaitadoiki rresheta.
Ore peidip aaikuna nji, neiturrur enkumoi kitok oo singir, nedung'udung'o rresheta enye.
Neyuku ninje lʼemboitei enye lootii atua engai alawa, pepuonu aaretoki ninje.
Ore pedol Simon Petros ena, nebatatakino nkung' e Yesus nejo: Tung'aiyoki, Laitoriani, amu ara nanu oltung'ani aitarruoni!
Amu eibung'a enking'asiata ninye o pookin ootaboitare ninye tʼolbae lʼerreshore oo singir looinoto ninje,
neijia baiki Yakobos o Yohanes, nkera e Sebedayos, loora lʼemboitei e Simon. Nejoki Yesus Simon: Miureisho! amu inter aaku taata olarreshoni loo ltung'anak.
Ore peidip aatereu ngalawani enetoiyo, neing'ua ninje pookin nesuj ninye.
Neaku ore etii ninye atua engang' nabo, naa ng'orai, etii oltung'ani obo oiganya enkea oo lbolot; ore pedol ninye Yesus, nebatata aijululori nesai ninye ejo: Laitoriani, teni iyeu, nikindim aisuja.
Neitorioo ninye engaina enye neporoo ninye ejo: Ayeu, sujai! Neing'uaiki enkea oo lbolot nabokata.
Neitanap ninye, pemeliki oltung'ani, kake „nno, pintadol kion olaidasani, pinjooio nʼenkisujata ino anaa peitanapua Mose, peaku enjakenishu too ninje“.
Kake nepona aaibulaa mbaak enyena, neiturrurro siamin kumok, pening' ninye neishiunye leyat enye:
kake nerishunye nelo ewueji nemetii iltung'anak asaisho.

Neaku tʼengolong' nabo, eiteng'enisho ninye; etotonitio Ilfarisayoi o layolok lʼesirata ooetuo eing'ua ngang'itie pookin e Galilaya o Yudaya o Yerusalem; ne-tii engolon Olaitoriani e nebo o ninye, neishiunye ninye oltung'ani pookin.
Naa ng'orai, enapita leak ooje te shumata erruat oltung'ani loata osupetai onunukisho, neyeu nenap ninye atua, peitaper tʼengomom enye.
Ore peitu etum eneimie ninye tʼolbae lʼolorere, neilepaki keperaji, neimie atua ilmatofarini neitadoiyo ninye te nebo o erruat enye metabaiki tʼempolos enye, tʼengomom e Yesus.
Ore pedol ninye enkirukoto enye, nejo: Letung'ani, kintaikiaki nkitarruot inono!
Neiter aaibirribir layolok lʼesirata o Ilfarisayoi nejo: Kang'ai lora ele olimu morot Engai? Kang'ai loidim aitau nkitarruot neme Engai openy ake?
Ore peyolou Yesus nkibirribirrat enye, nealu nejoki ninje: Kainyo imbirribirrirri too ltauja linyi?
Kaa nalelek ajo: Kintaikiaki nkitarruot inono, arashu: Nyototoi, tilimanai?
Kake piyolouu, aajo eata Enkerai oltung'ani engolon tʼenkop, peitau nkitarruot — nejoki ele loata osupetai: Aaliki iye, nyototoi, tudumakinoi erruat ino, nno engaji ino!
Neitashe ninye nabokata tʼengomom enye, nedumu enatepetaiye nelo engaji enye, eitadaraa Engai.
Neibung' enking'asiata ninje pookin neitadaraa Engai, neigany enkuretishu ninje nejo: Kitadua nkiputukunyot taata.
Ore tekurum oo kuna baak nepuku nedol olaoshoni obo le kodi, oji engarna enye Levi, eton tʼeneoshieki kodi, nejoki ninye: Tusujaki!
Neing'ua ninye pookin, neinyototo nesuj ninye.
Neitobiraki Levi ninye endaa kitok tʼengaji enye, neaku enkiturrurroto kitok oo laoshok le kodi o lkulekai oototonitio te nebo o ninje.
Neing'unyung'unyaki Ilfarisayoi o layolok lʼesirata laiteng'enuok lenyena nejo: Ainyo pidaada niokishosho ndai te nebo o laoshok le kodi o laitarruok?
Nealu Yesus nejoki ninje: Meyeu loora biot olaishiunoni, kake loomoi;
eitu alotu nanu, paipot supati, kake laitarruok, petum aataalata.
Nejoki si ninje ninye: Epukoo laiteng'enuok le Yohanes naleng' neitaa sayat, neijia anaa loo Lfarisayoi, kake nenya neokisho ilkulonono.
Nejoki Yesus ninje: Mindimidimi aaitupukoi nkera enkiama, epon etii osanja e nebo o ninje.
Kake epuo aapuonu ngolong'i naapuoi aaoru ninje osanja, nepuo aapukoo too nona olong'i,
Neliki ninje enkitanyanyukiet: Metii o obo lopolosu erashet olkila ng'ejuk nepik atua olkila musana; teni eiko nji, nepolos baiki ele ng'ejuk, nemenyorra erashet olkila ng'ejuk o ilo musana.
Nemetii olopik olmarua ng'ejuk atua ilbenia musan; teni eiko nji, nepolos olmarua ng'ejuk ilbenia neibukori ninye, neimin ilbenia.
Kake epiki olmarua ng'ejuk atua ilbenia ng'ejuko, nepoku pokira are.
Nemetii o obo lotooko olmarua musana neyeu olng'ejuk, amu ejo: Eikash olmusana.
Eaku eimita ninye tʼengolong' naeng'ieng'areki nkuruman endaa, nedung'u laiteng'enuok lenyena lukuny engano nenya nenot too ngaik.
Nejo ilkulekai too Lfarisayoi: Ainyo pintobiribiri nemeaku tʼengolong' naeng'ieng'areki?
Nealiki Yesus nejoki ninje: Eitu isomama ndai enaikuna David, einoto olamei ninye o lʼemboitei enye?
Eneikuna nejing' atua engaji Engai neibung' ilmkaten lʼenkitaduaroto nenya neisho baiki lʼemboitei enye, lemeaku, penya oltung'ani, neme laidasak oopeny ake?
Nejoki ninje: Era Enkerai oltung'ani baiki Olaitoriani lʼengolong' naeng'ieng'areki.
Neaku tʼengai olong' naeng'ieng'areki ejing' ninye atua engaji Engai neiteng'enisho; netii ina alo oltung'ani otoiyo engaina enye e tatene.
Neing'oraa layolok lʼesirata o Ilfarisayoi ninye, ten ak eishiunye ninye tʼengolong' naeng'ieng'areki, petum aaitang'oro ninye.
Kake neyolou ninye nkibirribirrat enye nejoki ele tung'ani otoiyo engaina: Nyototoi, ntasho tʼempolos! Neinyototo neitashe.
Nejoki Yesus ninje: Aikilikwan nanu ndai: Keaku, peitobiri tʼengolong' naeng'ieng'areki sidan arashu ntorrok, peitopoki oltau arashu peari?
Neing'orong'oraa ninje aman too mbat pookin nejoki oltung'ani: Ntorioi engaina ino! Neiko neijia, neitobiri engaina enye neaku bioto anaa en e are.
Neigany ninje enkurruna neirorioro oopeny eneikunaki Yesus.
Neaku elo ninye too nona olong'i shumata oldonyo, pesaisho, nebik enkiarie pookin, esaita Engai.
Ore peaku dama, neipot laiteng'enuok lenyena, negelu tomon o are tiatua ninje neisho lelo engarna lairriwak:
Simon oishoo engarna Petros, o Andreas, olalashe lenye, o Yakobos o Yohanes, o Filipos o Bartolomayos,
o Matayos o Tomas, o Yakobos le Alfayos o Simon loipotoki Selotes (Oirowua),
o Yudas le Yakobos o Yudas Iskariotes otaa olaitarasaroni.
Ore pedou te nebo o ninje, neitashe tʼewuas o esiamu kitok oo laiteng'enuok lenyena o olorere kumok oing'ua Yudaya pookin o Yerusalem o Tiros o Sidon tʼembata olbalbal,
nepuonu lelo, pening' ninye, peishiunyeki too nkeaitin enye o kulo ooitirika ilmumuan duruk, neishiunyeki ninje.
Neing'oru esiamu pookin ninye, peporoo; amu etupukuo te ninye engolon, neishiunye pookin.
Nedumaki ninye ngonyek enyena laiteng'enuok lenyena nejo: Teshi ndai, laisinak, amu eninyi enkarsishu Engai.
Teshi ndai, looata olamei taata, amu ipuopuo aaraposho. Teshi ndai, looishirita taata, amu ipuopuo aakweni.
Teshi ndai, teni epuo aaibai iltung'anak ndai, teni egelaa nesul ndai, neiturraa engarna inyi anaa entorrono tʼolbae lʼEnkerai oltung'ani.
Enting'idata te ina olong', endumuduma; amu eng'orai, kitok olkwaje linyi te shumata. Neijia baiki eikunakitia loomenye lenye layolounok.
Ee, kake aiya, ndai ladupak; amu indipa aata enkilejilejata inyi.
Ee, kake aiya, ndai lootaraposhote taata; amu ipuopuo aatum olamei. Ee, kake aiya, lookweni taata; amu ipuopuo aailish, nipuopuo aaishir.
Ee, kake aiya, looimaki iltung'anak pookin too sidan! amu neijia baiki eikunakitia loomenye lenye layolounok lʼelejare.
Kake aliki ndai lining'itoto: Entonyor ilmang'ati linyi, entobirakiti sidan looiba ndai,
entamayan loodek ndai, entasayakiti loosukeny ndai.
Olikiosh eseder nabo, mbelekenyaki ninye baiki engai; olikioru enkila ino, mimitiki ninye baiki emekiti.
Olikiomonu iye, njoo ninye; olikioru masaa inono, mintoki aikilikwanu.
Ore neijia anaa piyeuu neitobiraki iltung'anak ndai, neijia entobirakiti si ndai ninje.
Ore pinyorrinyorro loonyor ndai, — kaa aripo itumutumu? Amu enyor baiki laitarruok loonyor ninje.
Ore pintobirakiki sidan looitobiraki ndai sidan, kaa aripo itumutumu? Amu eiko baiki laitarruok neijia.
Teni isilenokiki iltung'anak lianyunyu, aajo ipuopuo aaitoki aang'amu — kaa aripo itumutumu? Eisilenoki baiki laitarruok laitarruok, pepuo aang'amu ebaia.
Kake entonyor ilmang'ati linyi; entobira sidan, esilenokiti, nimianyunyu toki; neaku olkwaje linyi kitok nipuopuo aaku nkera Olotii shumata naleng', amu ebor ninye too lemejo ashe o too ltorrok.
Entaa loonana oshuak anaa peata Minyi linyi engoshoke nanana.
Emingwenaki, pemeigwenakini si ndai; emiar tʼenkigwena, pemeari si ndai. Entung'aikiti, neing'uaikini si ndai.
Enjooi, neishori si ndai; entemet sidai, naitunyokino, neiposhiposhakino, neibukubukori, ninye epiki atua olkila tʼolgoo linyi, amu entemet nitemiemie ndai, ninye etemakinyeki si ndai.
Nejoki ninje enkitanyanyukiet: Keidim olmodooni atoriko olekai modooni? Medoiki ninje pokira are atua engumoto?
Melang' olaiteng'enuoni olaiteng'enani lenye; ore olaiteng'enuoni pookin loidipakine, neaku ninye anaa olaiteng'enani lenye.
Akae, ainvo pidol embajuai natii atua engong'u olalashe lino, nimiyolou olmuambai otii atua engong'u ino?

Kaji inko teni indim atiaki olalashe lino: Lalashe, njooki, paitau embajuai natii engong'u ino, nimidol openy olmuambai lotii atua engong'u ino? Iye, laitusupatuoni, tang'asa ntau olmuambai tʼengong'u ino, pitum aing'orai abaraki embajuai natii atua engong'u olalashe lino, pintau ninye.
Metii oljani sidai oiu ilmomo torrok, nemeitoki atii oljani torrono oiu ilmomo sidan.
Amu eyolounye pookin too lmomo lenyena oopeny. Amu meng'eru oltung'ani ilng'abolo too lbibia, nemeng'eru lama too ntulele.
Neitupuku oltung'ani sidai too masaa sidan oltau lenye sidan; neitupuku oltorrono tʼentorroni ntorrok; amu enkiganyata oltau eiro enkutuk enye.
Ainyo pikimpotipoto: Laitoriani, Laitoriani! nimintobiribiri enajo?
Ore oltung'ani pookin olotu enatii neitobir ninje, nalaitadol ndai, ang'ai enyanyukie ninye.

Enyanyukie ninye oltung'ani otesheta engaji enye netur naleng' nepik entonata enye shumata osoit. Ore peaku engare kitok neipony engare ina aji tʼengolon, neitu eidim aing'unung'unye ninye, tiaraki natipikaki entonata enye shumata osoit.
Oloning' nemeitobir, nenyanyukie ninye oltung'ani otesheta engaji enye shumata enkop, nemeata entonata; neipony engare ninye tʼengolon, nerratanya nabokata neaku engiligilata e ina aji kitok.
Ore tekurum, eidipaka ninye rorei lenyena pookin atua nkiyaa olorere, nejing' Kapernaum.
Netii olkigeluni loata olaisyayani lenye omoi otaa nae, nenyor ninye.
Ore pening' ninye mbaak e Yesus, neirriwaki ninye laigwenak loo Yudayoi nesai ninye, pelotu aitopok olaisyayani lenye.
Ore pebaiki ninje Yesus, nesai ninye osupatei nejo: Era ninye supat, pintaasaki ninye ina;
amu enyor ninye olorere lang' neteshetaka yook engaji Engai.

Akae, nelo Yesus te nebo o ninje. Ore peaku mekure elakwaniki ninye engaji, neirriwaki olkigeluni ninye iljorueta, pejoki ninye: Laitoriani, mintanyamal kion; mara nanu toki, pijing' iye abori e keperaji ai;
onaa atejo si nanu, mara toki, palotu eniti iye; kake tolimu ororei obo, neishiu olaisyayani lai.
Amu ara si nanu oltung'ani otii abori enkitoria, naata sikerin tiabori ai, teni ajoki ele: Nno, nelo; o olekai: Wou! nelotu; o olaisyayani lai: Ntobira ena! neitobir.
Ore pening' Yesus kuna, neiputukunyoki ninye, neibelekenyakino esiamu natusuja ninye nejo: Aliki ndai: Eitu adol baiki tiatua Israel enkirukoto kitok anaa ena.
Ore peidip aatorrinyoto looirriwaiyoki aji, neinepu olaisyayani otamoiya aa bioto.
Neaku engai olong' nelotu engang' naji Nain, nerubare laiteng'enuok lenyena o esiamu kitok ninye.
Ore penvikaki ninye kishomi engang', ng'orai, enapitai olotua aaitupuku, nera Oinoti obo te ng'otonye nara engoliai, nerubare olorere kumok lʼengang' ninye.
Ore pedol Olaitoriani ninye, neibung'aki ninye engoshoke nanana nejoki ninye: Minjir!
Nelotu neing'unye osanduku lʼempopong', neitashe lanapak, nejo: Lebarnoti, aaliki iye, nyototoi!
Neinyototo olotua aton neiter airo; neisho ninye ng'otonye enye.
Neibung' enkuretishu iltung'anak pookin neitadaraa ninje Engai nejo: Einyotote olayolounoni kitok tiatua yook, neiroroki Engai olorere lenye.
Neibulu mbaak enyena atua Yudaya pookin o atua loshon pookin loomanita.
Akae, neinosaki laiteng'enuok le Yohanes ninye kuna baak pookin. Neipot Yohanes laiteng'enuok lenyena are
neirriwaki ninje Yesus nejo: Ira iye ololotu arashu kianyu olekai?
Ore pepuonu kulo leak enetii ninye, nejo ninje: Yohanes Olaibatisani loirriua yook ejo: Ira iye ololotu arashu kianyu olekai?
Neishiunye ninye te ina kata ilkumok too nkeaitin o too sinaitin o too lmumuan duruk neisho edolisho ilmodook kumok.

Nealiki nejoki Yesus ninje: Embung'a engoitoi, enosakiti Yohanes enidolitata o enining'itoto: Edolisho ilmodook, nelimana lemeidim aashom, neisuji looata enkea oo lbolot, nening'isho ilming'an, nepiu lootuata, neinosakini laisinak lomon lʼeng'ida;
naa tesh oltung'ani lamaarikare nanu.
Ore peidip aashom kulo kiliku le Yohanes, neiter aliki ninye siamin mbaak e Yohanes: Itupukutuo aapuo ang'ata aaing'oraanyoo? Olperesiong'uyanita olkutati?
Arashu itupukutuo aapuo aadol nyoo? Oltung'ani oishopokoki ilkilani oopuyapui? Eng'orai, etii iltung'anak looata ilkilani lʼendenyata o enkinosata atua ngajijik oo lkarsisi.
Arashu itupukutuo aapuo aadol nyoo? Olavolounoni? Ee, aliki ndai baiki ololang' olayolounoni.
Era ninye olotisirakaki: Ng'orai, airriwaa nanu olmalaika lai lukunya engomom ino olikintobiraki engoitoi tʼengomom ino.
Aliki ndai: Metii o obo lotoiwuoki too ng'oroyok olkitok lolang' Yohanes; kake olora kiti tiatua enkarsishu Engai, naa kitok nelang' ninye.
Ore olorere pookin lotoning'o ninye o laoshok le kodi, neitaa ninje Engai supat neisho eibatisi ninje tʼenkibatisa e Yohanes.
Neany Ilfarisayoi o laiteng'enak loo nkitanapat enkigwena Engai tiatua ninje, neitu eisho eibatis ninye ninje.
Nejo Olaitoriani: Kainyo aitanyanyukie iltung'anak lʼena kishon, kainyo enyanyukie ninje?
Enyanyukie nkera naatoni tʼosingira naaipot nkulie, ejo: Kisulakitia ndai, neitu intyamityamama; kinjirakitia ndai, neitu intong'ung'u ilkiyo.
Amu eewuo Yohanes Olaibatisani, menya endaa nemeok olmarua, nijojo: Eata olmeneng'ani.
Eewuo Enkerai oltung'ani nenya neok, nijojo: Eng'orai, oltung'ani ainosani naa aokoni lʼolmarua, oljore loo laoshok le kodi o loo laitarruok.
Neitaai supat eng'eno too nkera enyena pookin.
Nesai obo too Lfarisayoi ninye, penya endaa te nebo o ninye; nejing' engaji e ilo Farisayos neton tʼenedaareki.
Naa ng'orai, netii eng'oroyoni nabo atua ena ang' nera engaitarruoni; ore peyolou ninye, ajo etotona ninye tiatua engaji Olfarisayos, neau oltulet lʼeilata narropil,
neitashe tekurum, engalo oo nkejek enyena, eishirita, neiter aitong'aki ilkiyo nkejek enyena nejut ninje too lpapit lʼelukunya enye, neng'utut naleng' nkejek enyena neel ninje tʼeilata narropil.
Ore pedol Olfarisayos loipoto ninye kuna, neiro tiatua kion nejo: Ten emutu era ele olayolounoni, anaata eyolou enara o kaa ng'oroyoni ena naporoo ninye; amu era ninye engaitarruoni.
Nealu Yesus nejoki ninye: Simon, aata entoki naaliki iye. Nejo si ninye: Laiteng'enani, tolimu ake.
Etii iltung'anak aare looata esile oltung'ani obo: neata obo esile denaria iip imiet, neata olekai onom.
Ore peitu eata ninje enalakie, neing'uaiki pokira are. Akae, tolimu, kang'ai too ninje onyor ninye nelang'?
Nealu Simon nejo: Ajo nanu ilo lotung'aikiaki nalang'. Nejoki ninye: Itaalua sidai.

Neibelekenyakino ina ng'oroyoni, nejoki Simon: Idolita ena ng'oroyoni? Atijing'ua nanu atua engaji ino, neitu kinjo engare oo nkejek; kake aaitong'aka ilkiyo nkejek ainei nejut ninje too lpapit lenyena.
Neitu kinjo eng'ututata; ore ninye neba nejing'u eitu epal ang'utut naleng' nkejek ainei.
Neitu kiel tʼeilata elukunya ai; aaela ninye tʼeilata narropil nkejek ainei.
Onaa aajoki iye: Etung'aikiaki ninye nkitarruot enyena naara kumok, tiaraki natonyorra naleng'; oloing'uaikini nkuti, nenyorru enkiti.
Nejoki ninye: Kitung'aikiaki nkitarruot inono!
Neiter kulo loototonitio te nebo o ninye aajo tiatua aten: Ang'ai ele oing'uaiki nkitarruot?
Nejoki ninye ina ng'oroyoni: Enkirukoto ino nikintopua; nno tʼeseriani!
Neaku engai olong' neim ninye ngang'itie kituak o nkutiti, eiroru neinosu lomon lʼeng'ida lʼenkarsishu Engai, ninye o lelo tomon o are,
netii si ematua oo ng'oroyok naaishiunye ninye too lmumuan torrok o too moiyaitin, etii Maria naipoti Magdalena, natupukunye ilmeneng'a oopishana,
o Yohana, eng'oroyoni e Kusas lora olaitubulunoni le Herodes, o Susana o nkulie kumok naaisyayakitia ninye too masaa enye.
Ore petumo esiamu kitok nepuonu ninje enetii ninye, eing'ua ngang'itie, nelimu ninye tʼenkitanyanyukiet:
Etupukuo olaisuaroni obo, peiye eisuaia embeu enye. Ore peisuaia ninye, nedoiki ematua engoitoi, neroroi nenya ntaritik e shumata ina.
Nedoiki engai matua shumata osoit, nebulu netoi, tiaraki nemeata ntonat.
Nedoiki engai matua empolos oo lkikarreta, nebulu ina te nebo oo lkikarreta, negor ina.
Nedoiki engai matua atua enkop sidai, nebulu, neiu ilmomo iip. Ore ejoito nona, nelimu tʼoltoilo: Oloata nkiyaa naaning'ie, njening'!
Neikilikwan laiteng'enuok lenyena ninye: Kaa kitanyanyukiet ena?
Nejo ninye: Eitumunyanaki ndai, piyolouu njumat enkarsishu Engai, o ilkulekai too nkitanyanyukieta, pemedolisho edolita, nememus ening'ito.
Naa ena enkitanyanyukiet: Era embeu lomon lʼEngai.
Ore kulo lʼengoitoi nera looning'; nelotu tekurum satan neitai ele rorei too ltauja lenye, pemeiruk nepok.
Ore kulo le shumata osoit, nera looning' tʼeng'ida, neng'amu ororei, kake meata ninje ntonat; neiruk ninje tʼenkiti kata, ore tʼenkata enkitasuroto nerishunye.
Ore enatadoikio atua ilkikarreta, nera ninje lootoning'o nepuo ninje, negori too nkishilarot o too masaa o too naʼidaitin empuan, nemeiu ilmomo.
Ore natii enkop sidai, nera ninje lootoning'o ororei tʼoltau sidai naa bioto neshum neiu ilmomo tʼolng'iria.
Meinok o obo enkilang'et neopoo ninye tʼentutua arashu epik abori erruat; kake epik shumata enkibung'et, pedol loojing'u enkilang'et.
Amu metii enaisudori, nemelo alioi; nemetii enashuma, nemeyolouni, nelotu ewuas.
Eng'orai, eninkoko, pining'ining'i; amu oloata, neishori ninye; ore olemeata, neoruni ninye baiki enaata.
Nepuonu enetii ninye ng'otonye o lalashera lenyena neitu eidim aatinyikakiti ninye tʼolbaelʼesiamu.
Nejokini ninye: Eitashe ng'utunyi ino o lalashera linono te boo neyeu nikidol.
Nealu ninye nejoki ninje: Era yeiyo ai o lalashera lainei kulo looning' lomon lʼEngai neitobir.
Neaku tʼengolong' nabo neilepaki ninye engalawa te nebo o laiteng'enuok lenyena; nejoki ninye ninje: Matalang' aabaiki lido kekun lʼolbalbal! Nenyikaa.
Ore epuoito ninje tʼengalawa neirrag ninye aitai njok. Nedumunye olimwa lʼenkutishoto tʼolbalbal, neigany engalawa engare neaku atua osina etii.
Nepuonu ninje neinyeye ninye nejo: Laiturukoni, Laiturukoni, kiminita! Neinyototo ninye nebuaki olkutati o enkiposhata engare; neagaa neaku olgira.
Nejoki ninje: Kaji etii enkirukoto inyi? Neureishoi ninje neiputukuny nejokino: Kera ang'ai ele oitanap ilkutat o engare, nening' ninye?
Nepuonu tʼengalawa metabaiki olosho loo Lgerasenoi eneishiaakinore Galilaya.
Ore pepuku ninye nelotu enetoiyo, nenang'are olee obo ninye, eing'ua engang' neata ilmeneng'a, neitu eishop olkila enkata naado neitu ebik tiatua aji, kake tiatua nkuraren.
Ore pedol ninye Yesus, nedar nebatatakino ninye nejo tʼoltoilo kitok: Kainyo aataiye iye, Yesus, Oinoti lʼEngai natii shumata naleng'? Aasai iye, pimikintame.
Amu eitanapa ninye Olmumua duruki, pepuku tʼoltung'ani. Amu etung'uyana ninye enkata naado, neeni too lpisia o too ngameta oo nkejek, nerripi, nedung' eeneta, nearaa olmeneng ani atua ang'ata.
Neikilikwan Yesus ninye: Ke kiji aa engarna ino? Nejo si ninye: Empuoto; amu etijing'a ilmeneng'a kumok atua ninye.
Nesai ninje ninye, pemeitanap ninje, pejing' atua easuroto.
Netii ina alo emboo oo lbitiro kumok ooirrititai tʼoldonyo. Nesai ninje ninye, peisho ejing' atua lelo. Neisho ninje.
Akae, nepuku ilmeneng'a te ilo tung'ani nejing' atua ilbitiro, nesulakino emboo tʼemarti atua olbalbal, nedoiki.
Ore pedol lairritak enataa, nekwet aainosu tiatua engang' o tiatua nkuruman.
Nepuku ninje, pedol enataa, nepuonu enetii Yesus, neinepu oltung'ani otupukunye ilmeneng'a, etonita tʼengalo oo nkejek e Yesus eishopo, neata eng'eno enye, neureishoi ninje.
Neinosaki ninje kulo lootadua eneikunaki eishiunyeki oloata ilmeneng'a.
Nesai esiamu pookin oo mbat olosho loo Lgerasenoi ninye, peing'ua ninje, amu eibung'a enkuretishu kitok ninje. Akae, nejing' ninye atua engalawa nerrinyo.
Nesai ninye ele loitupukunye ninye ilmeneng'a, pebik te nebo o ninye. Kake eitanapare ninye nejo:
Torrinyoi engaji ino, pinosaa ntokitin kituak nikintobiraka Engai. Nelo ninye neim engang' pookin neinosu ntokitin kituak naaitobiraka Yesus ninye.
Ore perrinyo Yesus, neng'amu esiamu ninye; amu etaanyutua pookin ninye.
Naa ng'orai, nelotu olee obo oji Yairos, nera ninye olkitok lʼengaji Engai; nebatatakino ninye nkejek e Yesus nesai ninye, pejing' engaji enye;
amu eata entito enye nabo, nera ninye noo larin tomon o are, etaa nae ninye. Akae, ore eloito ninye, neroosh isiamin ninye.
Netii eng'oroyoni nabo naata empukunoto osarge larin tomon o are, neishaka pookin naata ninye laishiunok, neitu eidim oltung'ani o obo aishiunye ninye;
nenyiku ninye tekurum neporoo enaipukoi olkila lenye, neitir nabokata empukunoto osarge lenye.
Nejo Yesus: Kang'ai laataporoiye nanu? Ore emiki pookin, nejo Petros o lʼemboitei enye: Laiturukoni, kimanita siamin nikiroosh, nijo iye: Kang'ai laataporoiye nanu?
Nejo ake Yesus: Aataporoiye oltung'ani; amu atoning'o engolon natupukuo te nanu.
Ore pedol eng'oroyoni ajo meisudori, nelotu eikirikira, nebatatakino ninye neinosaki ninye tʼengomom olorere pookin, ajo ainyo petaporoiye ninye o eneikuna neishiu nabokata.
Nejoki ninye: Naito, ntagoluoi tʼoltau! enkirukoto ino nikintopua. Nno tʼeseriani!
Ore epon eirorita ninye, nelotu oltung'ani obo oing'ua engang' olkitok lʼengaji Engai nejo: Eidipa atua entito ino; mintoki aitanyamal olaiteng'enani.
Ore pening' Yesus ena, nealiki ninye nejo: Miureisho; ruko ake, nelapok!
Ore pelotu aji, neitu eisho oltung'ani o obo ejing' o ninye neme Petros o Yohanes o Yakobos o menye lʼenkerai o ng'otonye.
Neishir pookin aaishiraki ninye. Nejo ninye: Eminjir! eitu ee, kake eirura.
Nekweniye ninje ninye, eyolo, aajo eidipa atua ninye.
Neitupuku ninye ninje pookin neibung' enkerai engaina neipot, ejo: Nakerai, nyototoi!
Nerrinyo Olmumua lenye, neitashe nabokata, neitanapisho, peishori ninye endaa.
Neing'asia lootoiutuo ninye. Neitanap ninje, pemeliki oltung'ani enataa.
Neipot ninye kulo tomon o are te nebo neisho ninje enkidimata naitoreye ilmeneng'a neidim aaishiunye nkeaitin;
neirriwaa ninje, peinosaa enkarsishu Engai, peishiunye loomoiyaa,
nejoki ninje: Eminap entoki engoitoi, olartat arashu olbene arashu endaa arashu ngoshola; emiata baiki ilkilani aare.
Ore engaji pookin nitijing'a, entobik tiatua, metabana nipukuku te ina alo.
Ore iltung'anak pookin lemeng'amu ndai, teni ipukuku te ina ang', empiripiroi enterit too nkejek inyi, peaku enjakenishu too ninje.
Nepuo ninje neim ngang'itie neinosu lomon lʼeng'ida, neishiunye too wuejitin pookin.
Ore pening' Olaitoriani lʼematua e ong'wan, Herodes, pookin nataa, neing'arrirro, tiaraki natejo iltung'anak: Etopiwuo Yohanes too lootuata;
nejo ilkulekai: Etalie Eliya; naa kulekai: Etopiwuo obo too layolounok le opa.
Nejo Herodes: Atudung'o Yohanes elukunya. Ang'ai ele laning'oki nji mbaak enyena? Neyeu nedol ninye.
Nerrinyo lairriwak neinosaki ninye naitobira ninje. Nerik ninye ninje nerishaki ewueji enye openy tʼenetii engang' Betsaida.
Ore peyolou siamin, nesuj ninye; neng'amu ninye ninje neliki ninje mbaak enkarsishu Engai, neishiunye kulo looaku, peishiunyeki.
Neiter anyikaa endama. Nepuonu kulo tomon o are nejoki ninye: Ntanapare olorere, pepuo ngang'itie o nkuruman naamanita, petum nkirragat o ndaikin, amu kitii ene ewueji nemetii iltung'anak.
Nejoki ninye ninje: Enjoo ndai ninje endaa! Nejo ninje: Mikiata enalang' ilmkaten imiet o singir aare, arashu pikimbung' engoitoi aapuo aainyang'aki ndaikin ele orere pookin.
Amu etii leak anaa iip onom. Nejoki ninye laiteng'enuok lenyena: Entotona ninje too lkererin anaa onom, onom.
Neiko neijia neitoton pookin.
Neibung' ninye kulo mkaten imiet o kulo singir aare neimariri shumata nemayan ninje, nebelibel neisho laiteng'enuok, peoriki esiamu.
Nenya neraposho pookin; nedumuni lekunot oo mbelat enye ilbenia tomon o are.
Neaku ore pesaisho ninye tʼewueji enye openy netii laiteng'enuok lenyena te nebo o ninye, neikilikwan ninje, ejo: Kejo siamin ara nanu ng'ai?
Nealu ninje nejo: Yohanes Olaibatisani; nejo ilkulekai: Eliya; o ilkulekai: Obo too layolounok le opa otopiwuo.
Nejoki ninye ninje: Kake ijojo ndai ara nanu ng'ai? Nealu Petros nejo: Kristos lʼEngai!
Neitanap ninye ninje, pemeliki oltung'ani o obo ena,
nejo: Meata kata nemeitamei Enkerai oltung'ani too nkumok, nemeni too laigwenak o too laidasak kituak o too layolok lʼesirata, neari metua, nepiu tʼengolong' e uni.
Nejoki ninje pookin: Oloyeu naasuj, njemiki kion, njedumakino esalaba enye ngolong'i pookin, paasuj.
Amu oloyeu neitopok empuan enye, neiminye ninye; ore oloiminye empuan enye tʼolbae lai, neitopok ele ninye.
Amu kaa dupoto etum oltung'ani, teni esot olmaa pookin neiminye kion arashu neinosie kion osina?
Amu olaaibung'aki sura nanu o rorei lainei, nelaibung'aki Enkerai oltung'ani ninye sura, teni elotu tʼenkitook enye o en e Menye o en oo lmalaikan sinyat.
Aliki ndai tʼesipata: Etii iltung'anak tiatua kulo looitashe tene lemeinyorrinyor enkea, metabana nepuo aadol enkarsishu Engai.
Neaku anaa enkata nijo ngolong'i isiet, eishunyete kulo rorei, nerik ninye Petros o Yohanes o Yakobos nei lepaki oldonyo asaisho.
Neaku ore esaisho ninye, neala emua engomom enye, neiborru ilkilani lenyena neilang'ishoi.
Naa ng'orai, netii leak aare ooderrita o ninye, nera lelo Mose o Eliya;
etaliote ninje tiatua enkitook neimaki enkiting'oto enye nalaitabaia te Yerusalem.
Ore Petros o lʼemboitei enye neiroshiki njok ninje. Ore peinyototo ninje, nedol enkitook enye o kulo tung'anak aare ooitashe o ninye.
Neaku ore perishare ninje aaing'ua ninye, nejoki Petros Yesus: Laiturukoni, sidai, kitii yook ene! Mateshet iltomboitie okuni: obo lino, obo le Mose, obo le Eliya. Nemeyolo ninye enajoito.
Ore epon eirorita ninye kuna, nepukoki erukenya neopoo ninje; neurei ninje ejing' atua erukenya.
Neaku oltoilo, eing'ua erukenya, ejo: Nyele Oinoti lai lategelua; entoning' ninye!
Ore peaku ele toilo, neinepuni etii Yesus openy. Negira ninje neitu eliki too nona olong'i oltung'ani o obo toki too kuna naatadua.
Neaku engai olong', etadoutuo ninje tʼoldonyo, netumore esiamu kitok ninye.
Naa ng'orai, neipot olee obo tiatua esiamu nejo: Laiteng'enani, aasai iye, ping'oraa enkerai ai, amu era ninye enkerai ai nabo,
naa ng'orai, eibung' Olmumua ninye, nedar nabokata, neiponyipony ninye, epuku olaburra, neitoki aing'uaiki tʼosina, eitalepoiye ninye.
Nasai laiteng'enuok linono, pemir ninye, neitu eidim.
Nealu Yesus nejo: Ndai enkishon nemeiruk naa aibeloni, ke metabaiki anu aboitare nanu ndai nang'iriaki ndai? Toriku enkerai ino ene!
Ore elotu ninye, neiponyipony olmeneng'ani ninye neisugum. Nebuaki Yesus Olmumua duruki neishiunye enkerai nerrinyoki menye lenye.
Neiputukuny ninje pookin naleng' tʼolbae lʼenkitook Engai. Ore eiputukunyito ninje pookin tʼolbae loo mbaak pookin naaitobira ninye, nejoki ninye laiteng'enuok lenyena:
Entipik kulo rorei atua nkiyaa inyi: Amu epuoi aaitarasaki Enkerai oltung'ani atua ngaik oo ltung'anak.
Kake eitu eyolou ninje kulo rorei, neaku etushumaki too ninje, pemeyolou. Neurei ninje eikilikwan ninye mbaak oo kulo rorei.
Nejing' atua ninje nkibirribirrat: Kang'ai lora kitok too ninje?
Ore pedol nkibirribirrat oo ltauja lenye, neibung' ninye enkerai nabo neitasheye ninye te bata enye
nejoki ninje: Olong'amu ena kerai tʼengarna ai, naang'amu nanu; naa olaang'amu nanu, neng'amu olaairriua: amu olora kinyi tiatua ndai pookin, nera kitok.
Nealu Yohanes nejo: Laiturukoni, kitadua oltung'ani lomirita ilmeneng'a tʼengarna ino, nikimitiki ninye, amu eitu esujare yook.
Nejoki Yesus ninye; Emimitiki! amu ore olemeiba ndai, nera lʼematua inyi.
Akae, ore pebaia ngolong'i enkilepata enye, neitorioo ninye engomom enye alo Yerusalem,
neirriwaa ilkiliku lukunya engomom enye; neibung' ninje engoitoi nejing' atua engang' nabo oo Samareites, peiye eitobiraki ninye ewueji neirragieki.
Neitu eng'amu ninje ninye, tiaraki naitorioiye engomom enye alo Yerusalem.
Ore pedol ena laiteng'enuok Yakobos o Yohanes, nejo: Laitoriani, iyeu nikintanapu enkima pedou te shumata, peiminye ninje, anaa peikuna Eliya?
Neibelekenya nebuaki ninje nejo: Miyololo, aajo irara le alo mumua?
Amu eitu elotu Enkerai oltung'ani, peiminye iltauja loo ltung'anak, kake peitopok.
Ore peibung' ninje engoitoi aapuo engai ang', nejoki oltung'ani obo ninye: Aasuj iye tʼewueji pookin nilo.
Nejoki Yesus ninye: Eata ntirrashin ngumot neata ntaritik e shumata singin, kake meata Enkerai oltung'ani eneiteleiki elukunya enye.
Nejoki ninye olekai: Tusujaki! Nejo si ninye: Laitoriani, njooki ang'as alo anuk papa lai.
Nejoki Yesus ninye: Njoo enuk lootuata lootuata lenye, kake nno iye, pinosaa enkarsishu Engai!
Nejo si olekai: Laitoriani, aalasuj iye, kake njooki ang'as alo aitanapare kulo loora lʼengaji ai.
Nejoki Yesus ninye: Metii oltung'ani opik engaina olkembe neitoki anang' silig, peaku lʼenkarsishu Engai.
Ore tekurum oo kuna negelu Olaitoriani kulekai ntomoni naapishana neirriwaki ninje aare, aare lukunya engomom enye atua ngang'itie pookin o wuejitin pookin naatayeuo nelo ninye.
Nejoki ninje: Kitok enkisambuare naa kuti laitobirak; akae, entasai Olaitoriani lʼenkisambuare, petum airriwaki laitobirak atua enkisambuare enye.
Enjom! eng'orai, airriwaa nanu ndai anaa mbalelon atua empolos oo suiyan.
Eminap entutua arashu olbene arashu namuka; emiroroki oltung'ani o obo tʼengoitoi.
Ore pijing'ijing'i engaji nabo, entang'as entejo: Njeaku tʼena aji eseriani!
Ore petii ina alo enkerai eseriani, nelabik eseriani inyi te shumata enye; teni metii, neitoki arrinyokino ndai.
Entobik ake tiatua ena aji, nidaarere niokishorere naata ninje; amu eaku, petum olaitobirani olkwaje lenye. Emindur tʼengaji aidurraki engai aji.
Ore engang' pookin nijing'ijing'i neng'amuni ndai, enosa enaitarasakaki ndai;
enjiunye loomoiyaa ootii atua ninje, entiakiti ninje: Etinyikaka ndai enkarsishu Engai.
Ore engang' pookin nijing'ijing'i nemeng'amu ninje ndai, entupukutu, enjom atua ngoitoi enyena, entejo:
Kipioki ndai baiki enterit engang' inyi natijing'a nkejek ang'; entopon, entayolo ena, ajo etinyikaka ndai enkarsishu Engai.
Aliki ndai: Eikashieki Sodom te ina olong' nelang' ena ang'.
Ee, kake aiya, Korasin! Ee, kake aiya, Betsaida! Ten emutu etaa kuna kitobirat kituak tiatua Tiros o Sidon naataasaki too ndai, anaata etotona ninje tiatua ilguniani o atua nkuruon neala.
Kake eikashieki Tiros o Sidon tiatua enkigwena nelang' ndai.
O iye, Kapernaum, nikilepieki metabaiki shumata, kintadouni metabaiki emanyata e satan.
Oloning' ndai, naaning' nanu; olomen ndai, naamen nanu; olaamen nanu, nemen olaairriua.
Nerrinyo kulo ntomoni naapishana tʼeng'ida nejo: Laitoriani, etoning'o yook baiki ilmeneng'a tʼengarna ino.
Nejoki ninye ninje: Atadua nanu satan anaa enkiwang'ata natusulunye te shumata.
Eng'orai, aidipa aishoo ndai engolon niroruarierie lasuria o nkulupan o enkidimata pookin olmang'atinda, nemear ndai entoki o nabo.
Epon ming'idada te ina, ajo eisyayaki ndai ilmumuan, kake enting'idata, aajo etisiraki ngam inyi te shumata.

Negalalu Yesus te ina kata tʼOlmumua Sinyati nejo: Aaitoning'oo iye, Papa o Olaitoriani le shumata o enkop, tiaraki nitushumaka kuna lang'eni o iljartani, nintayolo ninje ilkutiti. Ee, Papa, amu neijia itonyorrua tʼengomom ino.

Neibelekenyakino ninye laiteng'enuok tʼenkilepata nejo: Aaitarasaka Papa lai ntokitin pookin, nemetii o obo oloyolo Oinoti neme Menye, nemetii oloyolo Menye neme Oinoti o ele loyeu neitayolo Oinoti ninye.
Neibelekenyakino ninye laiteng'enuok lenyena nejoki ninje tʼenkilepata: Teshi kuna onyek naadol enidolidolo ndai.
Amu aliki nanu ndai: Etayeutuo nedol layolounok kumok o ilkarsisi enidolitata ndai, neitu edol; neyeu nening' enining'itoto, neitu ening'.
Naa ng'orai, neitashe olaiteng'enani obo loo nkitanapat, petem ninye, nejo: Laiteng'enani, kaji aiko, pajung'u empuan nemeiting'?
Nejoki ninye: Ainyo naa nasira tiatua nkitanapat? Ainyo isoma?
Nealu ninye nejo: Tonyorra Olaitoriani, Engai ino, tʼoltau lino pookin o tʼolmumua lino pookin o tʼengolon ino pookin o tʼeng'eno ino pookin, o lʼelatia ino anaa kion!
Nejoki ninye: Itaalua sidai, nkuna ina, nilaishiu.
Kake neyeu neitaa kion supat nejoki Yesus: Ang'ai naa ol elatia ai?
Nealu Yesus nejo: Etadoiye oltung'ani obo, eing'ua Yerusalem, pelo Yeriko, netumore sing'ouni, neoru ninye ilkilani nepik ilbaak nepuo neing'ua, eirasa ee.
Nedou olaidasani obo aimu ina oitoi, meyolo o nyoo, ore pedol ninye, neiwang'.
Neijia baiki olevites oewuo ine wueji, nedol neiwang'.
Kake eewuo tʼolototo Osamareites obo neinepu ninye; ore pedol ninye, neibung'aki engoshoke nanana,
nerishaki ninye neen ilbaak lenyena nebukoki eilata o olmarua neilepakinye ninye shumata osikiria lenye nerik ninye engaji oo lomon neitolonyilony ninye.
Ore tʼenasirie neitai denaria are neisho olopeny engaji nejo: Ntolonyilonya ninye, teni eaku enalang', ore parrinyunye, naalaisho iye.
Ijo aa, ang'ai too kulo pokira okuni lotaa ol elatia ele otijing'a atua sing'ouni?
Nejo si ninye: Ele loibung'aka ninye engoshoke nanana. Nejoki Yesus ninye: Nno, nkuna si iye neijia!
Ore epuoito ninje, nejing' engang' nabo. Neng'amu ninye eng'oroyoni nabo naji Marta tʼengaji enye.
Neata ninye enganashe naji Maria, neitoton ninye kion tʼengalo oo nkejek Olaitoriani ainining' lomon lenyena.
Nenyamalu Marta tʼenkisyayare kitok; nelotu ninye nejo: Laitoriani, ai mishilaa iye, ajo aapalaki enganashe ai, paisyaisho nanu openy ake? Akae, tiaki ninye, njaaretu.
