nesaisho nejo: Iye Laitoriani, oyolo iltauja lenye pookin, ntadolu obo Etegelua too kulo pokira are,
peng'amu ewueji ena kisyayare o enkirriwaroto natung'aiye Yudas nelo ewueji enye.
Neosh olenkukuo netum enkukuo Matias neikenari ninye te nebo o lairriwak tomon o obo.
Ore pebaia engolong' e Pentekoste netii pookin nabo wueji tʼoltau obo.
Neaku nabokata oltoilo oing'ua shumata anaa lʼenkijape nakutisho tʼengolon neigany engaji pookin natonie.
Nelioi etoorikiaki ninje ilng'ejepa anaa lʼenkima netonie shumata enye pookin obo obo.
Neboreyu ninje pookin Olmumua Sinyati neiter aairo too nkulie kutukie neijia anaa peishoo Olmumua meiroro.
Netii Yerusalem Yudayoi, iltung'anak supati tiatua loreren pookin ootii enkop.
Ore peibulaa ilo toilo, neiturrurro siamin neirut, amu etoning'o oltung'ani pookin eiro ninje tʼenkutuk enye.
Neing'asia pookin neiputukuny nejokino ninje: Kye, ore kulo pookin ooirorita me le Galilaya?
Anai ijo kining' yook oltung'ani pookin eiro tʼenkutuk ang' natoikioki yook?
Ilpartoi o Ilmedoi o Elamitai o lootii Mesopotamia o Yudaya o Kapadokia o Pontos o Asia
o Frigia o Pamfilia o Misri o matuan e Libia tʼembata e Kirene o lomon loora Romayoi
o Yudayoi o ilkaponu o Ilkretes o Ilmarabu, kining' kulo eiro too nkutukie ang' ntokitin kituak Engai.
Neirut ninje pookin neing'arrirro nejokino: Kainyo eaku ena?
Neitaa kulekai engalaa nejo: Etemerate tʼolmarua opi.
Neitashe Petros o kulo tomon o obo neapaa oltoilo lenye nejoki ninje: Lelea loo Yudayoi o pookin litiiti Yerusalem, entayolou kuna, pinining'ung'u rorei lainei.
Amu eitu emera kulo neija anaa pitejo ndai, amu ore taata era esaa uni enasirie;
kake era kuna naatejo olayolounoni Yoel:

Neaku too ngolong'i enkiting'oto, neiro Engai, nalabukoki Olmumua lai shumata oo nkiri pookin nepuo aainosu laiyok linyi o ntoiye inyi mbaak e akenya nepuo aadol ilbarnot linyi nduarot nepuo aata laigwenak linyi nkidetidetat;
nalabukoki too kuna olong'i shumata oo laisyayak lainei o ngaisyayak ainei Olmumua lai nepuo si ninje aainosu mbaak e akenya;
naitaa nkiputukunyot te shumata o ilponot tiabori, tʼenkop, osarge o enkima o oloikuluo lʼempuruo;
Neala engolong' aaku enaimin, neaku olapa osarge, epon eitu elotu engolong' Olaitoriani nara kitok o nʼenkitalioroto;
neaku ore pookin oloipot engarna Olaitoriani, nelapok.

Lelea le Israel, entoning' kulo rorei: Yesus le Nasaret, oltung'ani oitadolua Engai tiatua ndai too nkitobirat engolon o too nkiputukunyot o too lponot ooitobira Engai tʼengaina enye tiatua ndai (anaa piyololo ndai oopeny),
ele (loitarasuaki tʼenkigwena natootikio Engai o tʼeyolounoto enye neba opa) imbung'a ndai too ngaik oo ltorrok nisheshe niariara metua.
Eitopiwuo Engai ninye nedung' mioitin enkea, amu eitu eaku, peibung' ninye.
Amu eimaka David embae enye: Atadua nanu ngolong'i pookin Engai tʼengomom ai, amu etii ninye engaina ai e tatene, pamaing'unung'un.
Onaa eiting'idaki te ina oltau lai neng'ida olng'ejep lai, nelabik baiki osesen lai tiatua eanyunoto.
Amu ming'ua Olmumua lai tiatua ewueji enkiminata niminjo Osinyati lino, petum empurdata.
Kinteng'ena engoitoi empuan; kilaigany eng'ida tʼengomom ino.
Lelea, lalashera, enjooki, pairo, maureisho tʼengomom inyi mbaak olakui lang' David, ajo etua nenuki netii enkurare enye enkop ang' metabaiki taata.
Akae, tiaraki nara olayolounoni neyolo, ajo eisiliga Engai ninye tʼenkiturujata, ajo eton tʼolorika lenye embeu eishoi enye,
neitera adol kuna neimaki empiunoto e Kristos, ajo eitu epali Olmumua lenye tiatua ewueji oo lootuata neitu etum osesen lenye empurdata.
Eitopiwuo Engai ele Yesus nikira yook pookin iljaken lenyena.
Ore peidip ailepie Engai ninye tʼengaina enye e tatene, neng'amu ninye enkisiligata Olmumua Sinyati tʼengaina e Menye, ele otubukuo anaa pidolitata nining'itoto.
Amu eitu eilep David shumata, kake etejo openy: Etiaka Olaitoriani Olaitoriani lai: Totona te tatene ai,
metabana napik ilmang'ati linono abori oo ndapi oo nkejek inono.
Njeyolou taata engaji pookin e Israel esipa, ajo eitaa Engai ele Yesus litasho ndai, peaku Olaitoriani o Kristos.
Ore pening' ninje kuna, nepejoi iltauja lenye nejoki ninje Petros o kulekai airriwaki Kaji kinko, lelea, lalashera?
Nejoki Petros ninje: Entaalata, njeibatisi oltung'ani pookin too ndai atua engarna e Yesus Kristos, petum enkitaunoto oo nkitarruot, nipuopuo aang'amu enkishooroto Olmumua Sinyati.
Amu era ena kisiligata eninyi o noo nkera inyi o noo pookin oolakwa oolaipot Olaitoriani, Engai ang'.
Neijakenisho neroj too kulekai rorei kumok nejo: Enjoo eitopoki ndai tʼena kishon naibelo.
Ore kulo lootang'amutua rorei lenyena too ltauja, neisho eibatisi; neponikini te ina olong' iltung'anak oobaia iip osom (elfun uni).
Nebik ninje tiatua enkiteng'enare oo lairriwak o tiatua enkidikidikoto o embelibelata olmkate o esayata.
Nejing' enkuretishu atua iltauja pookin neaku nkiputukunyot o ilponot kumok too lairriwak.
Netii pookin looiruko e nebo neaku eng'ara ntokitin pookin.
Nemir masaa enye o naata neorikino pookin neijia anaa peata oltung'ani osina,
netoni ninje ngolong'i pookin tʼoltau obo tʼengaji sinyati ebelibel olmkate too ngajijik o ngajijik nenya endaa too ltauja oong'ida naleng' nemeata olosek
neitadaraa Engai netum ninje eng'adunoto tʼolorere pookin; neponiki Olaitoriani esirit ngolong'i pookin iltung'anak ootopua.
Akae, neaku epuo Petros o Yohanes te nebo engaji sinyati tʼenkata nasaishoreki, tʼesaa enturuj.
Netii olee obo purpur eiter tʼengoshoke e ng'otonye otanapaki, oitaperoki ngolong'i pookin te kutukaji engaji sinyati naipoti Sidai, peomon kulo loojing' engaji sinyati nkishoorot empuris.
Ore pedol ninye Petros o Yohanes ejing'ita engaji sinyati, neomon ninje enkishooroto empuris.
Neing'oraa ake Petros te nebo o Yohanes ninye nejoki: Ng'orai yook!
Neing'oraa ninje neanyu, peng'amu entoki too ninje.
Neiro Petros: Maata ngoshola arashu sahabu, ore enaata ninye aaisho: tʼengarna e Yesus Kristos le Nasaret ntasho, tilimanai!
Neibung' engaina enye e tatene neapaa; netum nabokata ndapi enyena o rubat oo nkejek engolon,
neipirriu neitashe nelimana nejing' te nebo o ninje engaji sinyati nelo eityamityam eitadaraa Engai.
Nedol olorere pookin ninye eloito eitadaraa Engai.
Neyolou, aajo ninye oloshi oton eomonu nkishoorot empuris te kutukaji sidai engaji sinyati, neigany ninje nking'asiat o olputukuny too kuna naataa te ninye.
Akae, ore peidikidikore ele purpur loishiunyeki Petros o Yohanes, neiturrurrokino olorere pookin enetii ninje atua enkitala naji ne Salomo, eiputukuny.
Ore pedol Petros ena, nealiki olorere: Lelea le Israel, ainyo pimputukunyokiki kuna? Arashu ainyo pikurrakiki yook ngonyek, anai ijojo tʼengolon ang' arashu tʼesupato ang kinjoo ele, pelimana?
Engai e Abraham o Isaak o Yakoob, Engai oo lakuyani lang', ninye naitaa kitok Enkerai enye Yesus lintarasaitie ndai, litomikio t'engomom e Pilatos te ina kata naigwenaka, peing'uaiki ninye;
kake itomikio ndai ele Sinyati, olopeny esupato, nisaiyuyu, peishori ndai oltung'ani otaara metua,
niariara Olkitok lʼempuan metua. Eitopiwuo Engai ilo aitung'ua lootuata nikira yook iljaken lenyena.
Ore tʼenkirukoto e atua engarna enye eishooki ele lidolitata niyololo engolon tʼengarna enye; enkirukoto te ilo naishoo ninye ena biotishu tʼengomom inyi pookin.
Akae, lalashera, ayolo, ajo intobira kuna, miyololo, anaa peikuna si ninje, ilkituak linyi.
Kake eitisipa Engai kuna baak naatolimuo ninye opa tʼenkutuk oo layolounok lenyena pookin, ajo eisili Kristos lenye.
Ore taata, entaalata, embelekenyata, pejutori nkitarruot inyi,
pepuonu nkatan eng'ieng'are tʼengomom Olaitoriani neirriu ninye Yesus Kristos oiteraki aainosaki ndai,
olemeata kata nemeng'amu enkitoria e shumata metabana neitobirakini mbaak pookin naairoro Engai t'enkutuk oo layolounok lenyena sinyat neba opa.
Etejo baiki Mose: Elo aitopiwuoki ndai Olaitoriani Engai Olayolounoni tiatua lalashera linyi anaa nanu; entoning' ninye too pookin naaliki ndai.
Elaaku ore oltung'ani pookin lemening' ilo ayolounoni, neiminyeki ninye tukul tiatua olorere.
Neinosu layolounok pookin eiter te Samuel o kulo lootusuja ninye, kulo pookin ooiroro, mbaak oo kuna olong'i.
Irara ndai nkera oo layolounok o nʼosotua oitaa Engai o loominyi linyi te ina kata natiaka ninye Abraham: Emayani tʼeishoi ino ntipati pookin enkop.
Eitopiwuoko ndai Engai tʼenkata elukunya enkerai enye Yesus neirriwaki ninye ndai, pemayan ndai, peibelekenyunye oltung'ani pookin aing'ua ntorrok enyena.
Ore eton eirorie ninje iltung'anak, nepuonu laidasak enetii ninje o olkitok lʼengaji sinyati o Sadukayoi
nerika, tiaraki naiteng'en ninje olorere neinosu te Yesus enkitopiunoto too lootuata
neibung' ninje too ngaik neigenoo tiaji, perripi metabaiki enasirie; amu etaa teipa.
Ore ilkumok ootoning'o rorei lenye neiruk; neaku esiana oo leak iip onom.
Ore peaku enasirie neiturrurro te Yerusalem ilkituak o laigwenak o layolok lʼesirata
o Anas, olaidasani kitok, o Kayafas o Yohanes o Aleksandros o pookin loora lʼenkishomi oo laidasak kituak;
neitasheye ninje tʼempolos neikilikwan: Ke ti aa golon arashu ke ti aa arna intobira ndai kuna?
Nejoki Petros eiganya Olmumua Sinyati ninje: Lekituak lʼolorere o laigwenak le Israel,
teni eigwenakini yook taata tʼembae sidai nainoto oltung'ani leyati, ke ti aa bae etopua ninye,

entayolo ndai pookin o olorere pookin le Israel, aajo tʼengarna e Yesus Kristos le Nasaret litooshokitio ndai esalaba, loitopiwuo Engai aitung'ua lootuata, te ninye eitashe ele aa bioto tʼengomom inyi.
Nera ilo osoit linturraitie ndai, lashetak, etaa ninye osoit kitok lʼolpijata.
Nemetii enkitopuata tʼolekai nemetii engai arna abori e shumata naishooki iltung'anak, pikitum aatopok te ninye.
Nedol ninje enjipai e Petros o en e Yohanes neitoki aayolou, aajo era iltung'anak lemeyolo sirat, eitu eiteng'eni, neiputukuny, neyolou baiki, aajo etaboitare Yesus,
neitoki aadol ele tung'ani eishiunyeki eitashe te nebo o ninje, neitu eata enaalu.
Neitanapisho, pepuku tʼenkigwena neigwena nejo:
Kainyo kintaas kulo tung'anak? Amu etayoloki ena kiputukunyoto naitobira ninje neibale too pookin oomanya Yerusalem, nimikindim yook aatomiki.
Kake pemepona, pemeibulaa atua olorere, maituria ninje osupatei, pemeitoki aaimaki tʼoltung'ani o obo tʼena arna.
Neipot ninje neitanapisho, pemeitoki aairo tukul, pemeiteng'enisho baiki tʼengarna e Yesus.
Nealiki Petros o Yohanes nejoki ninje: Engwenakiti oopeny, ten aa entoki sidai tʼengomom Engai, pikining' ndai nikintalang' Engai.
Mikindim yook aatapal eitu kiro enikitadua o enikitoning'o.
Neitoki aaiture ninje neing'uaiki neitu etum entoki naitameiye ninje tʼolbae lʼolorere; amu eitadaraitie pookin Engai too kuna naataa.
Amu etalang'a larin artam ele tung'ani oitobirakaki ena toki kitok enkishiunoto.
Neing'uaikini nepuo enetii iltung'anak lenye neinosaki ninje naatiakitia ninje laidasak kituak o laigwenak.
Ore pening' si ninje neilepie oltoilo tʼoltau obo, pelo enetii Engai neiro: Lemagilani, ira iye Engai naitobira shumata o enkop o ilbalbali o pookin naatii atua,
niroro tʼenkutuk e David, olaisyayani lino, tʼengolon Olmumua Sinyati: Ainyo peiula loreren neibirribir iltung'anak neme o nyoo?
Neitashe ilkarsisi lʼenkop neiturrurro ilkituak te nebo, pear Olaitoriani o Kristos lenye.
Amu esipa, eiturrurrote tiatua ena ang' tʼolbae lʼOinoti lino sinyati Yesus liela iye, Herodes o Pontios Pilatos te nebo o loreren o olorere le Israel,
peiye eitobir anaa petootikio engaina ino o enkigwena ino, peaku neijia.
Akae, ng'orai taata, Laitoriani, nkituriat enye, njoo laisyayak linono, peiro lomon linono tʼenjipai pookin;
ntorioi engaina ino, peaku nkishiunot o ntokitin kituak o nkiputukunyot tʼengaina Oinoti lino Yesus.
Ore peidip aatasaishoto ninje neikirikira ewueji neiturrurrote ninje, neigany pookin Olmumua Sinyati neiro lomon lʼEngai tʼenjipai.
Neaku ake esiamu oo kulo looiruko oltau obo o Olmumua obo, nemetii o obo otejo, ajo era entoki naata ninye emasaita enye, kake etang'ara ninje ntokitin pookin enye.
Neijakenu lairriwak tʼengolon kitok empiunoto Olaitoriani Yesus, neaku kitok eng'adunoto tiatua ninje pookin.
Nemetii o obo too ninje oata elaunoto, amu pookin ooata nkuruman arashu ngajijik nemir neau nainosie
nepik engalo oo nkejek oo lairriwak neorikini oltung'ani pookin neijia anaa peata elaunoto.
Ore Yoses oipoto lairriwak Barnabas (ore enkitaalata enye: enkerai enkilejilejata), olevites otoiwuoki te Kupros,
neata enkuruma nemir neau ngoshola nepik engalo oo nkejek oo lairriwak.
Netii oltung'ani obo oji Ananias nemir te nebo o eng'oroyoni enye naji Safira enaata
neisudoki kion tʼesungureishu ematua oo ngoshola, eyolo eng'oroyoni enye, neau naatelekutua nepik engalo oo nkejek oo lairriwak.
Nejoki Petros: Ananias, ainyo pikinganya satan oltau lino, pilej Olmumua Sinyati nisudoki kion tʼesungureishu ematua oo ngoshola enkuruma?
Ore eton memira, mera entoki ino? Ore indipa atimira — me iye oitore? Ainyo pinjoo oltau lino meikuna nji? Me oltung'ani iteleja, Engai.
Ore pening' Ananias kulo rorei, nebatata nee; neaku enkuretishu kitok too pookin lootoning'o kuna.
Nedumunye ilbarnot neirin ninye nenap nenuk.
Ore peishunye saan uni te ina kata, nejing'u eng'oroyoni enye, meyolo enataa.
Nejoki Petros ninye: Tiakaki, itimira ndai enkuruma te ina kinyang'a? Nejo: Ee, te ina.
Nejoki Petros ninye: Kaji inkuna teni iakuku nabo, pitemiteme Olmumua lʼOlaitoriani? Ng'orai, etii kutukaji nkejek oo kulo ootunuka olmoruo lino, kipuo aanap si iye.
Nebatata nabokata too nkejek enyena nee; nejing' ilbarnot nedol ninye etua, nenap ninye nenuk te nebo wueji o olmoruo lenye.
Netum esirit pookin enkuretishu kitok o pookin lootoning'o kuna.
Neaku ntokitin kituak o nkiputukunyot kumok tiatua olorere too ngaik oo lairriwak; neboita pookin tʼoltau obo tiatua olgilata le Salomo:
neitu eiteu o obo too lkulekai aidikidikore ninje, kake eitadaraitie olorere ninje.
Nepon eponari ake looiruko Olaitoriani, leak kumok o ng'oroyok.
Neitolok iltamoiya too ngoitoi neitepetaa shumata oo lonito o rruatin, peiye, teni elotu Petros, eopoo oloip lenye ematua olorere.
Nepuonu ilkumok eing'ua ngang'itie naamaniki Yerusalem, enapita iltamoiya o looitame ilmeneng'a; neishiunyeki pookin.
Neinyototo olaidasani kitok o pookin ooboitare ninye, oora lʼenkiteng'enare oo Sadukayoi, neigany enkiba,
neibung' lairriwak too ngaik nepik engaji oo looena.
Kake etabolo olmalaika lʼOlaitoriani kiarie kutukaji engaji erripore neitupuku ninje nejo:
Enjom, pintasheshe, pilimumu tiatua engaji sinyati lomon pookin lʼena puan.

Ore peidip aatoning' kuna, nepuo enasirie atua engaji sinyati neiteng'enisho. Nelotu olaidasani kitok o looboitare ninye neipot enkigwena o ilkituak pookin loo nkera Israel neirriwaa iltung'anak engaji erripore, perikuni ninje.
Ore pebaia lairriwak neitu edol ninje tʼengaji erripore, nerrinyo neinosu mbaak
nejo: Kineputua engaji erripore aa bioto katukul neitashe larripok tʼeneishiaakinore kutukaji, kake ore pikibol neitu kidol oltung'ani tiatua.
Ore pening' olkitok lʼengaji sinyati o laidasak kituak kulo rorei, neing'arrirro neitu eyolo kuna baak naataa.
Nelotu oltung'ani obo neinosaki ninje mbaak nejo: Ore kulo tung'anak litipika ndai engaji erripore etii atua engaji sinyati, eitashe neiteng'en olorere.
Nelo olkitok te nebo o laisyayak neriku ninje, kake me tʼengolon, amu eturia olorere, pemeaku enang' ninje too soito.
Neriku neitasheye ninje tʼengomom enkigwena; neikilikwan olaidasani kitok ninje nejo:
Eitu kintanap ndai tʼenkitanapata, peminteng'enishosho tʼena arna? Ore ndai, inganya Yerusalem enkiteng'enare inyi, niyeuu niauu shumata ang' osarge le ilo tung'ani.
Nealu Petros o kulekai airriwak nejo: Meata kata nimikining' Engai nelang' iltung'anak.
Eitopiwuo Engai oo loopapa lang' Yesus litara metua niikiiki tʼenjata.
Eitaa Engai ninye kitok tʼengaina enye e tatene, peaku Olarikoni o Olaitopuani, peisho Israel enkitaalata o enkitaunoto oo nkitarruot.
Nikira yook ake iljaken loo kulo rorei o Olmumua Sinyati oishoo Engai kulo pookin looning' ninye.
Ore pening' ninje kuna, nepejoi iltauja lenye neigwena, pear metuata.
Neitashe obo tiatua enkigwena lora Olfarisayos, neji engama enye Gamaliel, olaiteng'enani loo nkitanapat, neataiye olorere pookin oloip, neitanapu, periki lairriwak boo peno
nejoki ninje: Lelea le Israel, entaduai aten too niasakiki kulo tung'anak.
Amu ore too nona olong'i naaima einyotote Toidas nejo ninye era oltung'ani, nesuj iltung'anak oobaia iip ong'wan; neari ilo metua, ore pookin lootusuja ninye neisardakieki neitu eaku toki;
Ore tekurum enye nedumunye Yudas le Galilaya too ngolong'i enkikenare nerik iltung'anak ooje lootusuja ninye; neimin si ninye, ore pookin lootusuja ninye neisardak.
Akae, ajoki ndai taata: Entapaashare kulo tung'anak, entung'aikiti ninje! Amu teni era ena kigwena o ena kyas en oo ltung'anak, nelarruoio ninye;
kake teni era en Engai, mindimidimi aaitarruoi, pimilioii anaa looarare Engai.
Nening' ninye neipot lairriwak near ninje neitanap, pemeitoki aairo tʼengarna e Yesus, neing'uaiki.
Nepuku tʼengomom enkigwena eng'ida, aajo eishooki enkitook, petum osina tʼolbae lʼengarna enye;
neitu epal too ngolong'i pookin tiatua engaji sinyati o too ngajijik eiteng'enu neinosu lomon le Yesus Kristos.
Ore too kuna olong'i etoponate laiteng'enuok nejing' enking'unyung'unyata oo Lgrikini atua Yudayoi, tiaraki neitu etum ngolia enye nkishoorot oo ngolong'i pookin abaraki.
Neipot kulo tomon o are esiamu oo laiteng'enuok nejo: Meiting'idisho, pikipal yook lomon lʼEngai, peiye kisyayaki endaa.
Onaa, lalashera, entegelutu too ndai iltung'anak oopishana looata enkitadararoto, looiganya Olmumua. Sinyati o eng'eno, pikipik ninje atua ena kyas.
Kipuo aabik yook ake tiatua esayata o enkisyayare oo lomon.
Neiting'idisho ilo rorei tʼesiamu pookin, negelu Stefanos, oltung'ani oiganya enkirukoto o Olmumua Sinyati, o Filipos o Prokoros o Nikanor o Timon o Parmenas o Nikolaos, olomoni le Antiokia,
neitasheye ninje tʼengomom oo lairriwak nesaisho neiteleiki ninje ngaik.
Neibulaa lomon lʼEngai nepona naleng' esiana oo laiteng'enuok tiatua Yerusalem, neiruk ilkumok too laidasak.
Ore Stefanos, obore enkirukoto o engolon, neitobir nkiputukunyot o ntokitin kituak tiatua olorere.
Neinyototo iltung'anak oora lʼesirit oo Libertinoi o Lkirenayoi o ne Aleksandria o ne Kilikia o Asia neikilikwanaro o Stefanos
neitu eidim aatigilunore eng'eno o Olmumua oishoo meiroro.
Neitijing' baiki leak ootejo: Kitoning'o ele eiroro rorei oomorie Mose o Engai.
Neisusukie ninje olorere o laigwenak o layolok lʼesirata nenyikaki enetii neibung' nerik ninye atua enkigwena.
Neitasheye iljaken lʼelejare ootejo: Eitu epal ele tung'ani emor ene wueji sinyati o nkitanapat;
amu kitoning'o, ejoito, ajo elaar ele Yesus le Nasaret ene wueji neitaai rregiei ooishoo yook Mose.
Nekurraki ninye ngonyek pookin lootii enkigwena nedol enyanyukie engomom enye en olmalaika.
Nejo olaidasani kitok: Ke neija etiu?
Nejo ninye: Lelea lalashera o loopapa, entoning'! Eitadua kion Engai enkitook papa lang' Abraham te ina kata etii Mesopotamia, epon eitu eton te Haran;
nejoki ninye: Tupuku tʼolosho lino o tʼenkishomi ino, pilo olosho layeu naaitadol iye!
Nepuku te ina kata tʼolosho loo Lkaldayoi nemany Haran. Ore peidip atua menye lenye te ina alo, neidurrunye Engai ninye metabaiki ele osho litiiti ndai taata,
neitu eisho ninye enjung'o tʼena alo metabaiki eneroro, neisilig ninye, ajo eisho, metaa enenye o noo nkera enyena, tekurum, eton meata enkerai.
Neiro nji Engai, ajo eaku embeu enye engomom tʼolekai osho neitaai ninye osinga, neitaasi ninye ntorrok te ina alo larin iip ong'wan.
Ore olorere oitaa ninye osinga, alaigwenaki nanu, etejo Engai; ore peidipai kuna, nelapuku naalaisyayaki nanu tʼene wueji.
Neisho ninye enkitobirakinoto emurata; neiu ninye Isaak nemurat ninye tʼengolong' e isiet, neiu Isaak Yakoob neiu Yakoob lakuyani tomon o are.
Negil tau lakuyani nemir Yosef, pelo olosho Misri; neboitare Engai ninye,
neitupuku ninye too sinaitin lenyena pookin neisho ninye eng'adunoto o eng'eno tʼengomom e Farao, olkarsis le Misri; neitaa ninye olkitok le Misri o engaji enye pookin.
Nelotu olamei atua olosho Misri pookin o atua olosho Kanaan, o osina kitok, neitu etum loopapa lang' endaa.
Ore pening' Yakoob, ajo etii endaa Misri, neirriwaa loopapa lang' tʼenkata elukunya.
Ore tʼengaigil e are neyolou lalashera Yosef, neyolou Farao enkishomi e Yosef.
Neirriwaa Yosef neipot Yakoob, menye lenye, o enkishomi enye pookin, iltung'anak ntomoni naapishana o imiet.
Nedoiyo Yakoob metabaiki Misri nee, ninye o loopapa lang',
nenapi ninye Sikem nenuki tiatua enkurare nainyang'ua Abraham tʼenkinyang'a oo ngoshola too nkera Emor te Sikem.
Akae, ore petaanu enkata enkisiligata naiturujaka Engai Abraham, nepona olorere neaku kumok tʼolosho Misri,
metabana nejing' olekai karsis leitu eyolo Yosef.
Neitobiraki ele olosek enkishomi ang' neitobiraki loopapa lang' ntorrok neisho eiturrari nkera enye kutiti, pemebik eishiu.
Neiuni te ina kata Mose neaku nenyorru Engai ninye neitotii enkata oo lapaitin okuni tʼengaji e menye;
ore peiturrari, nedumu ninye entito e Farao neitubulu ninye anaa enkerai enye.
Neiteng'eni Mose tʼeng'eno pookin oo Lmisrin, negolu too rorei o too nkyasin enyena.
Ore peaku ninye loo larin artam, nejing'aa atua oltau lenye, peing'oraa lalashera lenyena, nkera Israel.
Nedol oltung'ani oisilitoi, neing'araki neretoki oloinyalitai near Olmisri metua.
Nejo, ajo eyolou lalashera lenyena, ajo eisho Engai ninje enkitopuata too ngaik enyena, kake eitu eyolou ninje kuna.
Ore tʼengolong' e are neipung'oki looara neitobiraki osotua nejo: Lelea, irara ndai lalashera, ainyo pintobirakinono ntorrok?
Ore oloisilito ol elatia enye neiponyaki ninye enelakwa nejo: Kang'ai likintaa iye olkitok o olarishani lang'?
Iyeu nikiar matua anaa pitara ola ng'ole Misri?
Neisik Mose te ilo rorei neaku olomoni tʼolosho Midian neiu te ina alo nkera are.
Ore peishunye larin artam, nelioi te ninye olmalaika lʼOlaitoriani ti ang'ata oldonyo Sinai tiatua enkiwuwuoto enkima tʼolodung'okino.
Ore pedol Mose, neiputukunyoki enatalie; ore penyikaki ninye, peing'oraa, nebaiki ninye oltoilo lʼOlaitoriani:
Ara nanu Engai oo loominyi linono, Engai e Abraham o Engai e Isaak o Engai e Yakoob. Neikirikira Mose neitu eidim aing'orai.
Nejoki Olaitoriani ninye: Talaku namuka too nkejek inono, amu ore ene wueji nintasheiye era enkop sinyati.
Enduata atadua osina loo ltung'anak lainei ootii Misri, naning' ang'at enye nadou, paitupuku ninje; onaa wou taata, paairriwaa iye, pilo Misri.
Ele Mose otanyaita ninje nejoki: Kang'ai likintaa olkitok o olarishani lang? ninye eirriwaiye Engai, peaku olkitok o Olaitopuani tʼengaina olmalaika otalie te ninye tiatua olodung'okino.
Neitupuku ele ninje neitobir nkiputukunyot o ntokitin kituak tʼolosho Misri o tʼOlbalbal odo o tiatua ang'ata, larin artam.
Ninye ele Mose otiaka nkera Israel: Elainyeyeki ndai Olaitoriani Engai inyi olayolounoni tiatua lalashera linyi lijo nanu; entoning' ninye!
Ninye ele otii atua esirit ti ang'ata te nebo o olmalaika oirorie ninye tʼoldonyo Sinai o loopapa lang', otang'amua rorei lʼempuan, peisho yook;
neitu eiruk loopapa lang' aatoning' ninye neiponyaki enelakwa nerrinyo too ltauja Misri
nejoki Aron: Ntobiraki yook ngain naaiturukie yook, amu mikiyolo enataa tʼele Mose oitupukuo yook tʼolosho Misri.
Neitobir olashe too nona olong'i neaki ena mua enkidasare neng'ida tʼolbae loo nkyasin oo ngaik enye.
Neibelekenya Engai neisho ninje, peisyayaki oltim le shumata anaa petisiraki tʼesirata oo layolounok: Ke kiakitia nanu yeng'unot o nkidasareitin larin artam tiatua ang'ata, naaji e Israel?
Niapupu engaji olototo e Molok o olakira lʼengai inyi Romfa, muain nintobira, pisyayakiki ninje; nalaidurrie nanu ndai metabaiki idya matua e Babel.
Neata loopapa lang' engaji olototo enjakenishu ti ang'ata anaa peitanapa ninye olotiaka Mose, peshet aitanyanyukie ena mua natadua;
ore si ninje loopapa lang' ootang'amutua ninye neitijing' te nebo o Yosua atua olosho loo loreren ootimira Engai tʼengomom oo loopapa lang' metabaiki enkata e David
loinoto eng'adunoto tʼengomom Engai neyeu netumoki ewueji natonie Engai e Yakoob.
Neshetaki ake Salomo ninye engaji.
Kake meton Olotii shumata tʼengaji nateshetaki too ngaik anaa pejo olayolounoni:
Nera shumata olorika lai nera enkop enapik nkejek ainei: kaa aji iyeuu nikishetakiki? ejo Olaitoriani, arashu kaa wueji nera ewueji eng'ieng'ata ai?
Me engaina ai naitobira kuna pookin?
Ndai loo murto naagol, lememurata too ltauja o too nkiyaa, nitemumu ngolong'i pookin Olmumua Sinyati, anaa loominyi neijia si ndai.
Kalo ayolounoni eitu einyal loominyi? Etara metuata kulo loinosutua mbaak elotunoto ele oata esupato, ele lintarasaitie niariara ndai metua.
Itang'amutua ndai nkitanapat tʼenkirriunoto oo lmalaikan, neitu imbung'ubung'u.
Ore pening' ninje kuna, nepejoi iltauja lenye neonyiki ninye lala.
Ore peiganya ninye Olmumua Sinyati, nekurraki ninye ngonyek enyena shumata nedol enkitook Engai o Yesus oitashe tʼengaina e tatene Engai
nejo: Eng'orai, adolita shumata etabole neitashe Enkerai oltung'ani tʼengaina e tatene Engai.
Neosh ninje olodoo naleng' nepising' nkiyaa enye neityamaki ninye tʼoltau obo
neiponyaki aulo engan' nenang' too soito. Nepik iljaken ilkarashi lenye engalo oo nkejek olbarnoti obo oji Saulos.
Nenang' ninje Stefanos too soito, esaisho nejo: Laitoriani Yesus, tang'amu Olmumua lai!
Negil kung' nedar tʼoltoilo lʼengolon: Laitoriani, mishumaki ninje ena kitarruoto enye! Ore ejoito kuna nee.
Nenyorru Saulos metaari ninye metua. Neaku too nona olong'i emirata kitok esirit natii Yerusalem; neisardakakino pookin atua olosho Yudaya o Samaria nemetii lairriwak.
Nenuk leak looure Engai Stefanos neishiraki ninye naleng'.
Neitobiraki Saulos esirit ntorrok naleng', ejing' ngajijik o ngajijik neikurtutaa leak o ng'oroyok apik engaji eenata.
Ore looisardaka neim idye o idye, einosu lomon lʼeng'ida.
Nedoiyo Filipos nejing' engang' nabo e Samaria neinosaki ninje Kristos.
Neinining' siamin tʼoltau obo mbaak naairoro Filipos nening' edolita ntokitin kituak naaitobira ninye.
Amu etupukutuo ilmeneng'a eishirita tʼoltoilo kitok too lkumok ooitamioki; neishiu ilkumok ootununuko osupetai o looitong'ojin;
neaku eng'ida kitok tiatua ena ang'.
Netii oltung'ani obo oji engarna enye Simon oitobira ntasimi enyena oshi ake tiatua ena ang' neing'asiaye iltung'anak le Samaria neitaa kion olora kitok;
neinining'u pookin ninye eiter tʼoloti metabaiki ilbotoro nejo: Eata ele tung'ani engolon kitok Engai.
Neing'oraa ninye, tiaraki naing'asiaye ninje ngolong'i kumok too ntasimi enyena.
Ore peiruk ninje Filipos einosu mbaak enkarsishu Engai o engarna e Yesus Kristos, neibatisi leak o ng'oroyok.
Neiruk baiki Simon openy, ore peibatisi ninye, nerubare Filipos, neiputukuny edolita ntokitin kituak o nkitobirat engolon naataa.
Ore pening' si ninje, lairriwak ootii Yerusalem, aajo eiruko Samaria lomon lʼEngai, neirriwaki ninje Petros o Yohanes.
Ore pebaia ninje, nesayaki ninje, peng'amu Olmumua Sinyati,
amu eton eitu edoiki o obo too ninje, eibatisaki ake tʼengarna Olaitoriani Yesus.
Neiteleiki ninje ngaik enye neng'amu ninje Olmumua Sinyati.
Ore pedol Simon, ajo eishooki Olmumua Sinyati tʼenkiteleikinoto oo ngaik, neitarasaki ninje ngoshola
nejo: Enjooki si nanu ena golon, peaku ore pookin laiteleiki ngaik neng'amu Olmumua Sinyati.
Nejoki Petros ninye: Njeimin ngoshola inono o iye, tiaraki ijo iye, ajo einyang'uni enkishooroto Engai too ngoshola.
Miata eng'arata o ematua tiatua ele rorei, amu meitoriori oltau lino tʼengomom Engai.
Akae, taalai tʼena torroni ino, pisai Engai, peiye, ajo nanu, piking'uaikini enkibirribirrata oltau lino;
amu adolita, ajo kibore olodua nikienita ntorrok.
Nealu Simon nejo: Entasayakaki tʼOlaitoriani, pamaabaiki kuna baak nitejo ndai.
Ore peidip ninje aaijakenutu o aainosutu lomon lʼOlaitoriani, nerrinyo aapuo Yerusalem neinosu lomon lʼeng'ida too ngang'itie kumok e Samaria.
Neirorie olmalaika lʼOlaitoriani Filipos nejoki: Nyototoi, pilo, abori metabaiki engoitoi nadoiyo eing'ua Yerusalem metabaiki Gasa, nera ninye ang'ata.
Nedumunye nelo. Naa ng'orai, netii oltung'ani le Etiopia ogelema, olkitok le Kandake, enkarsis oo Laitiopoi, ora olarriponi loo masaa enyena pookin, eewuo ninye Yerusalem, pesaisho;
neaku errinyo neton tiatua olgarri lenye, eisomita olayolounoni Yesaya.
Nejoki Olmumua Filipos: Nno enetaaniki, teshepare ele garri.
Nekwetiki Filipos ina alo nening' eisomita olayolounoni Yesaya neirorie: Itayolo enisomita?
Nejo ninye: Kaji aiko teni aidim, teni metii oltung'ani laaitayolo? Nediding' ninye Filipos, peilepaki, peton o ninye.
Ore ewueji neisoma nera ena: Etereaki ninye anaa enker nayeng'i o anaa esuben e ker nemeorito tʼengomom oloisolito ilpapit, neijia eitu ebol si ninye enkutuk enye.
Neitauni tiatua enkitadounoto earata enye. Kang'ai loinosu entipat enye? Amu eitaiyoki empuan enye tʼenkop.
Nealiki ninye Filipos nejoki: Aasai iye, kang'ai eimaki olayolounoni too kuna baak? ke kion arashu olekai tung'ani?
Nebol Filipos enkutuk enye neinosaki ninye lomon lʼeng'ida le Yesus.
Ore epuoito ninje tʼengoitoi, nebaia enetii engare, nejo Olarriponi loo masaa: Ng'orai, nyena engare. Ainyo naamitiki, pamaaibatisi?
Nejoki Filipos: Teni iruk tʼoltau pookin, naa sidai. Nealu nejo: Airuk, ajo era Yesus Kristos Oinoti lʼEngai.
Neitanapu, peitashe olgarri, nedoiki pokira are atua engare, Filipos o olarriponi loo masaa, neibatisi ninye.
Ore pepuku ninje tiatua engare, nea Olmumua lʼOlaitoriani Filipos neitu eitoki adol olarriponi loo masaa ninye, kake eima ninye engoitoi enye eng'ida.
Netumi Filipos te Asotos neim einosu lomon lʼeng'ida tiatua ngang'itie pookin metabana nebaia Kaisarea.
Nedumakino Saulos aiture near metuata laiteng'enuok lʼOlaitoriani nelo enetii olaidasani kitok
neyeu te ninye mbaruai, penap Damaskos atua ngajijik Engai, periku ninje Yerusalem eena, teni etum iltung'anak lʼena oitoi, leak arashu ng'oroyok.
Ore etii olototo nenyikaki Damaskos, neilang'aki ninye nabokata enkilang'et te shumata;
nebatatakino enkop nening' oltoilo ejoki ninye: Saul, Saul, ainyo pikimirita?
Nejo ninye: Laitoriani, ira iye ng'ai? Nejoki ninye: Ara nanu Yesus likimirita iye; egol te iye, piruaia olkikarret.
Nejo ninye tʼenkikirikirata o tʼenkuretishu: Laitoriani, ainyo iyeu naitobir? Nejoki Olaitoriani ninye: Tudumunye, pijing' atua engang', kilikini te ina alo enintobir.
Neitashe lʼemboitei enye aaitirring'a nening' oltoilo neitu edol oltung'ani.
Nedumunye Saulos tʼenkop; ore pebol ngonyek enyena, neitu edol toki; neibung' ninje engaina enye nerik ninye Damaskos.
Neaku ngolong'i uni medolisho nemenya nemeok.
Netii Damaskos olaiteng'enuoni oji engarna enye Ananias. Nejoki Olaitoriani ninye tiatua enduaroto: Ananias! Nejo: Nyele nanu, Laitoriani!
Nejoki Olaitoriani ninye: Tudumunye, pilo engoitoi naipoti Naitoriori, pinkilikwanu L'engaji e Yudas oltung'ani oji Saulos le Tarsos; amu etii esaisho,
netadua si ninye tiatua enduaroto oltung'ani oji engarna enye Ananias, ejing'ita neiteleiki ninye ngaik, peishori edolisho.
Nealu Ananias: Laitoriani, atoning'o nanu mbaak ele tung'ani too lkumok, eneikuna teni eitobiraki ntorrok isinyat linono lootii Yerusalem;
neitoki aata tene engolon too laidasak kituak naenie pookin looipot engama ino.
Nejoki Olaitoriani ninye: Nno ake, amu era ninye enaret nategelua nanu, peea engarna ai atua loreren lemeata Engai o atua ilkarsisi o atua nkera Israel;
amu alaitadol ninye, ajo elatum sinaitin kumok tʼolbae lʼengama ai.
Nelo Ananias nejing' atu aji neiteleiki ninye ngaik nejo: Lalashe Saul, aairriua Olaitoriani Yesus likimpang'aka tʼengoitoi niimua, pikinjori idolisho, pikingany Olmumua Sinyati.
Nedou nabokata too ngonyek enyena ntokitin nijo ilpalak neitoki adolisho neinyototo neibatisi.
Ore peidip atang'amu endaa, netum engolon. Nebik Saulos te nebo o laiteng'enuok ootii Damaskos ngolong'i naaje.
Neinosu ninye nabokata too ngajijik Engai lomon le Yesus, ajo era ninye Oinoti lʼEngai.
Ore pookin lootoning'o neiputukuny nejo: Me ele loiminye kulo te Yerusalem looipoto ena arna neotiki alotu ena alo, perikoki laidasak kituak ninje looena?
Nepon atum Saulos engolon neapare Yudayoi ootii Damaskos agilu nenyok, ajo era ele Kristos.
Ore peim ngolong'i kumok, neigwena Yudayoi, pear metua;
kake etayolo Saulos olosek lenye; nerreshu dama o kiarie too kishomini, pear ninye metua.
Neibung' laiteng'enuok ninye kiarie neitadoiyo tʼesundai tʼolbene.
Ore pebaia Saulos Yerusalem, neyeu neidikidikore laiteng'enuok, neurei pookin ninye, neitu eiruk baiki, ajo era olaiteng'enuoni.
Neibung' Barnabas ninye nerik enetii lairriwak neinosaki eneikuna ninye nedol Olaitoriani tʼengoitoi oirorie ninye, o eneikuna neiteng'enisho meureisho te Damaskos tʼengarna e Yesus.
Nebik ninye te nebo o ninje te Yerusalem, ejing' nepuku, neiro tʼengarna Olaitoriani Yesus, meureisho,
negilunore Ilgrikini, neyeu si ninje near ninye metua.
Ore peyolou lalashera kuna, nerik ninye metabaiki Kaisarea neirriwaa ninye Tarsos.
Akae, netum esirit eseriani tiatua Yudaya pookin o Galilaya o Samaria, neshetuni nepona nebik tiatua enkuretishu Olaitoriani o tiatua enkilejilejata Olmumua Sinyati.
Ore eimita Petros wuejitin pookin, nedoiki enetii sinyat ootobiko te Lida.
Nedol te ina alo oltung'ani oji engarna enye Aineas oirraga tʼerruat larin isiet eseja osupetai.
Nejoki Petros ninye: Aineas, kinjiunye Yesus Kristos, tudumunye, pintobiraki kion erruat! Neinyototo nabokata.
Nedol pookin ninye lootamanya Lida o Saron, neibelekenyakino Olaitoriani.
Netii Yope engaiteng'enuoni neji engarna enye Tabita, ore enkitaalata enye: engoilii; neiganya ninye nkitobirat sidan o nkishoorot naaishooiye.
Nesejai ninye too nona olong'i nee; neisuji ninye nepiki shumaroto.
Netaaniki Lida Yope; ore pening' laiteng'enuok, aajo etii Petros ina alo, neirriwaa iltung'anak aare enetii ninye nediding'u, pemeimutie elotu enetii ninje.

Neinyototo Petros nerubare ninje; ore pebaia ninje nerik ninye shumaroto, neitasheiki ninye ngolia pookin eishirita eitaduaia lokesenani o ilkarashi ooitobira Engoilii tʼena kata natii e nebo o ninje.
Neitupuku Petros pookin negil kung' nesaisho, neibelekenyakino empopong' nejo: Tabita, nyototoi! Nebol ngonyek enyena; ore pedol ninye Petros, neton.
Neitarasaki ninye engaina enye neapaa ninye; ore peidip aipoto sinyat o ngolia, neriku eishiu.
Neyolouni ena tiatua Yope pookin, neiruk ilkumok Olaitoriani.
Neaku ebik ngolong'i kumok te Yope t'engang' oltung'ani obo oji engarna enye Simon, oladotoni loo lonito.
Etii oltung'ani obo atua Kaisarea neji engarna enye Kornelios, olkitok lʼendung'oti empuoto naji Italia,
supat neure Engai te nebo o engaji enye pookin, neisho olorere nkishoorot kumok nesai Engai ngolong'i pookin,
nedol tiatua enduaroto abaraki, tʼenkata esaa enturuj dama, ejing'aki olmalaika lʼEngai ninye tʼengaji enye nejoki ninye: Kornelios!
Neing'oraa ninye neureishoi nejo: Kainyo natii, Laitoriani? Nejoki ninye: Eilepa sayat o nkishoorot inono engomom Engai nedamu ninje.
Akae, rriwai iltung'anak, pepuo Yope neipot Simon oata engai arna enye Petros,
otii engang' oltung'ani oji engarna enye Simon, ora oladotoni loo lonito, etii engaji enye embata olbalbal; kilaliki ninye enintobir.
Ore peidip ashomo ele malaika oirorie Kornelios, neipot ninye laisyayak lenyena aare lʼengaji enye o osikeri lenye obo supat too kulo looisyayaki ninye oshi;
ore peidip ainosaki ninje mbaak pookin, neirriwaa ninje, pepuo Yope.
Ore tʼengai olong', epon etii ninje engoitoi netaaniki engang', neilepaki Petros keper aji alo asaisho, tʼenkata, naunore engolong'.
Netum olamei kitok neyeu nedaa, kake ore epon eitobirakini endaa, neururu tʼolmumua
nedol shumata etabole nedoiki engusa anaa erridata olkarash nateenaki too matuan ong'wan, neitadouni enkop.
Ore atua enye netii muain pookin oo ng'wesi naata nkejek ong'wan o iljang'it lʼosero o naaikurtutari o ntaritik e shumata.
Nening' oltoilo ojoki ninye: Nyototoi, Petros, teyeng'a, nosa!
Nejo Petros: Me neijia, Laitoriani, amu eitu aikata anya tukul enaiduruk o enemera sidai.
Neitoki aning' ninye oltoilo en e are: Ore naaitisidana Engai, mintaa iye torrok.
Etaa kuna aigil uni; ore tekurum o kuna nerrinyori engusa shumata.
Ore epon eitu eyolou Petros tʼoltau lenye eneiko tʼolbai lʼenduaroto natadua, ng'orai, neing'oru kulo tung'anak looirriwaiye Kornelios, engaji e Simon, neitashe te kishomi,
neipotisho neikilikwan anake etii Simon oata engai arna Petros ene anaa olomoni.
Ore te ina kata eibirribirrita Petros enduaroto, nejoki Olmumua ninye: Ng'orai, etii iltung'anak okuni liking'oru;
tudumunye, tadoi abori, nno te nebo o ninje, ming'arrirro, amu nanu oirriua ninje.
Nedoiki Petros kulo tung'anak ooirriwaka Kornelios enetii ninye nejoki: Eng'orai, nanu ilo oling'oruru. Ke tʼolbae le nyoo itiiti ene?

Nejo ninje: Kornelios, olkitok loo sikerin, oltung'ani supat, oloure Engai, oata enkitadararoto sidai tiatua olorere pookin loo Yudayoi, einoto ninye olkilikwai lʼolmalaika sinyati, pikiriku engaji enye, pikinining'u rorei linono.
Neitijing' neitoomon ninje. Ore tʼengai olong' nedumunye te nebo o ninje nerubare ninye lalashera ooje ootii Yope.
Ore tʼengolong' e are nejing' Kaisarea; neanyu Kornelios ninje eiturrurro enkishomi enye o iljorueta lenyena.
Ore ejing'ita Petros, nenang'are Kornelios ninye nebatatakino nkejek enyena neitaa ninye kitok.
Neapu Petros ninye nejoki: Ntasho, amu ara si nanu oltung'ani.
Ore peidip airorie ninye, nejing' nedol ilkumok ooiturrurrote.

Nejoki ninje: Iyololo ndai, aajo me sidai tʼoltung'ani lora Oyudayos, teni eder arashu elotu enetii loora loo kulekai oreren; kake aaitadua Engai, pamaipot oltung'ani o obo anaa oloiduruk arashu oltorrono.
Onaa aewuo neitu aany aaipotoki. Akae, aikilikwan taata: ke tʼolbae le nyoo kimpoto?
Nejo Kornelios: Engolong' e ong'wan taata eitu anya endaa metabaiki ena kata, ore tʼesaa enturuj nasaisho tʼengaji ai, naa ng'orai, neitashe oltung'ani tʼengomom ai oata ilkarashi ooilang'isho,
nejo: Kornelios, etoning'oki sayat inono nedamuni nkishoorot inono tʼengomom Engai.
Akae, rriwai iltung'anak, pepuo Yope, peipot te ine Simon oata engai arna Petros, otii engaji e Simon, oladotoni loo lonito, natii embata olbalbal: teni elotu ninye, nikilairorie.
Nairriwaa nabokata enitii iye nintobira sidai iewuo. Akae, kitii yook pookin taata ene engomom Engai, pikining' mbaak pookin nikintanapa Engai.
Nebol Petros enkutuk enye nejo: Esipa, atayolo abaraki, ajo meing'oraa Engai emua oo ltung'anak,
kake ore tiatua loreren pookin enyor oloure ninye o oloitobir esupato.
Itayoloutuo ndai ele rorei loirriwaka Engai nkera Israel, peinosu eseriani te Yesus Kristos ora Olaitoriani loo pookin,
oibulu atua Yudaya pookin neiter te Galilaya, tekurum enkibatisa nainosua Yohanes,
ajo eela Engai Yesus le Nasaret tʼOlmumua Sinyati o tʼengolon, oima idyalo o idyalo eitobir sidan, eishiunye pookin looitamio satan, amu etaboitare Engai ninye.
Nikira yook iljaken loo mbaak pookin naaitobira ninye tiatua olosho loo Yudayoi o Yerusalem. Near ninje ninye metua neik tʼenjata.
Eitopiwuo Engai ele tʼengolong' e uni neitadolu ninye tʼewuas,
me tʼolorere pookin, kake too ljaken ooitera Engai agelu nera yook likitadaate nikiokisho te nebo o ninye, eidipa atopiu too lootuata.
Neitanap ninye yook, pikinosaki olorere nikinjakenoki, aajo ninye eitanapua Engai, peaku olaigwenani loo looishiu o loo lootuata.
Eijakenu te ninye layolounok pookin, aajo eishori oltung'ani pookin loiruk, enkitaunoto oo nkitarruot tʼengarna enye.
Ore epon eirorita Petros kulo rorei, nedoiki Olmumua Sinyati pookin ootoning'o ena bae.
Neiputukuny kulo airukok lʼemurata ooetuo te nebo o Petros, tiaraki natubukokoki baiki loreren lemeata Engai enkishooroto Olmumua Sinyati;
amu etoning'o eirorita ninje too nkutukie neitadaraa Engai. Nejo Petros:
Keidim oltung'ani atomito engare, pemeibatisi kulo lootang'amutua Olmumua Sinyati, neijia ake anaa yook?
Neitanapisho, peibatisi ninje tʼengarna e Yesus Kristos. Nesai ninye, pebik ngolong'i naaje.
Nening' lairriwak o lalashera ootii Yudaya, aajo etang'amutua si ninje loreren lomon lʼEngai.
Ore peilep Petros Yerusalem, negilunore ninye loora lʼemurata
ejo: Itijing'a atua iltung'anak lememurata ning'arie endaa.
Neiter Petros ainosaki ninje mbaak tʼolkereri ejo:
Atobiko tiatua engang' Yope asaisho neururu Olmumua lai nadol enduaroto: nedou engusa anaa erridata olkarash, neitadouni te shumata too mowuarak ong'wan, nelotu enatii nanu;
ore pakurraki aing'oraa, nadol ng'wesi lʼenkop naata nkejek ong'wan o iljang'it lʼosero o naaikurtutari o ntaritik e shumata.
Naning' oltoilo laajoki: Nyototoi, Petros, teyeng'a, nosa!
Najo si nanu: Me neijia, Laitoriani, amu ore entoki naiduruk arashu enemera sidai eton eitu ejing' enkutuk ai tukul.
Naaitoki aliki nanu oltoilo oing'ua shumata: Ore naaitisidana Engai, mintaa iye torrok.
Neaku kuna aigil uni, neitokini ailepie pookin shumata.
Ore nabokata eitasheito iltung'anak okuni te boo engaji natii nanu laairriwakaki eing'ua Kaisarea.
Naajoki ake Olmumua: Nno te nebo o ninje, ming'arrirro! Nikiruba te nebo o kulo alashera ile nikijing' engaji e ilo lee.
Neinosaki ninye yook eneikuna teni edol olmalaika oitasho tiatua engaji enye nejoki ninye: Rriwai iltung'anak, pepuo Yope neipot Simon oata engai arna Petros,
likiliki rorei likintopok iye o engaji ino pookin.
Ore paiter nanu airo, nedoiki Olmumua Sinyati ninje anaa petadoikio yook tʼenkiterata.
Nadamu te ina kata ororei lʼOlaitoriani otejo: Eibatisishe Yohanes tʼengare, kake eibatisi ndai tʼOlmumua Sinyati.
Akae, ore peishoo Engai ninje ena kishooroto anaa yook looiruko Olaitoriani Yesus Kristos: kara nanu ng'ai oidim atomitiki Engai?
Ore pening' ninje kuna, negira neitadaraa Engai nejo: Eishoo Engai baiki loreren lemeata ninye enkitaalata, petum empuan.
Ore kulo ooisardaka tʼolbae lʼosina otupukuo too mbaak e Stefanos, nepuo metabaiki Foinike o Kupros o Antiokia neitu einosaki ororei olekai tung'ani neme Yudayoi ake.
Etii ake ilkulekai ooje atua ninje, leak le Kupros o le Kirene. Ore pebaia ninje Antiokia, neirorie ninje baiki Ilgrikini neinosaki ninje Olaitoriani Yesus.
Netii engaina Olaitoriani e nebo o ninje neiruk esiana kitok neibelekenyakino Olaitoriani.
Nebaiki kuna baak nkiyaa esirit natii Yerusalem, neirriwaa Barnabas, pelo metabaiki Antiokia.
Ore peidip atabai ninye nedol eng'adunoto naishorua Engai, neng'ida nediding' pookin, pebik ninje tiatua Olaitoriani osupatei too ltauja lenye.
Amu era ninye oltung'ani supat nebore Olmumua Sinyati o enkirukoto. Nerikokini esiamu narrish Olaitoriani.
Nepuku Barnabas alo Tarsos, peing'oru Saulos,
ore petum ninye, neriku Antiokia. Neaku eiturrurro ninje o esirit olari olulung'a neiteng'en esiamu narrish. Neipoti laiteng'enuok tʼenkata elukunya te Antiokia ilkristianoi.
Nedou to kuna olong'i layolounok eing'ua Yerusalem nepuonu Antiokia.
Neitashe obo too ninje oji engarna enye Agabos neitayolo ninye tʼenkidimata Olmumua, ajo elotu olamei kitok atua olmaa pookin; neaku neijia too ngolong'i e kaisar Klaudios.
Nenyorru aaitobira laiteng'enuok, oltung'ani pookin anaa peidim, enkishooroto, peakini lalashera ootii Yudaya;
neiko nji neirriwaki laigwenak too ngaik e Barnabas o Saulos.
Ore te ina kata neitorioo olkarsis Herodes ngaik enyena, peitobiraki ntorrok iltung'anak lʼesirit.
Near ninye Yakobos, olalashe le Yohanes, t'olalem metua.
Ore pedol, ajo eiting'ida Yudayoi, nepon aibung' baiki Petros. Netii ngolong'i oo lmkaten lemeisiijo.
Ore peidip aibung'a ninye, nepik engaji erripore neitarasaki ilkamban ong'wan loo sikerin, neata olkamba obo sikerin ong'wan, perrip ninye neotiki arik engomom olorere, eidipe pasaka.
Akae, nerripi Petros tʼengaji erripore; nesayaki esirit ninye Engai too sayat nemegira.
Ore pebau engolong' nayeu Herodes neitupuku ninye boo, neirrag Petros te ina kiarie tʼempolos oo sikerin aare, eena too lpisia aare, netii larripok kishomi, perripi engaji erripore.
Naa ng'orai, nebau olmalaika lʼOlaitoriani neilang'isho enkilang'et tiatua olgilata neosh Petros laras neinyeye ninye ejoki; Tudumunye asioki! Nedoiyo ilpisia too ngaik enyena.
Nejoki olmalaika ninye: Teenai, njopo namuka! Neiko nji. Neitoki ajoki ninye: Njopo emekiti ino, tusujaki!
Nepuku asuj neitu eyolou, ajo esipa nena naaitobira olmalaika, kake etejo ninye etadua enduaroto.
Ore pelusoo erripoto elukunya o en e are, nebaiki kishomi esekengei najing' engang'; nebolo openy. Nepuku neim engoitoi nabo, neing'ua nabokata olmalaika ninye.
Ore peitoki arrinyokino Petros kion, nejo: Atayolo taata tʼesipata, ajo eirriua Olaitoriani olmalaika lenye naaitopok nanu too ngaik e Herodes o tʼeanyunoto pookin olorere loo Yudayoi.
Ore eibirribirrita kuna, nelotu ninye engaji e Maria, ng'otonye e Yohanes, loata engai arna Markos, naiturrurrore esiamu narrish esaisho.
Ore peoshiosh Petros oldiripe le kutukaji, nelotu engaisyayani nabo naji Rode, peinining'.
Ore peyolou oltoilo le Petros, neitu ebol kutukaji tʼolbae lʼeng'ida, nerrinyo asioio neinosu, ajo eitashe Petros tʼengalo kishomi e boo.
Nejoki ninje ninye: Iata oloirirua! Nenyok ajo: neijia etiu. Nejo ninje: Olmalaika lenye!
Nepon Petros aoshiosh; ore pebol ninje, nedol ninye neiputukuny.
Ore peidip atoroja ninye tʼengaina, pegira ninje, neinosaki eneikuna teni eitai Olaitoriani ninye tiatua engaji erripore, nejoki: Enosakiti kuna baak Yakobos o lalashera! Nepuku nelo engai wueji.
Ore pekenyu, neng'ayung'ayu sikerin naleng': ketaa nyoo Petros.
Ore peing'oru Herodes ninye, neitu etum, neikilikwan ninye larripok neitanap, periki aar; nedou eing'ua Yudaya nelo metabaiki Kaisarea neton te ina alo.

Negoroki Herodes iltung'anak le Tiros o Sidon; nepuonu ninje enetii ninye tʼoltau obo, eidipa aitau osotua o Blastos, ora olarriponi lʼolgilata loirragieki lʼolkarsis, neomon eseriani, tiaraki naitoti olosho lʼolkarsis olenye.
Ore tʼengolong' nategeluaki neishop Herodes ilkarashi lʼolkarsis netonie olorika lʼenkitook neirorie olorere.
Neosh olorere olodoo nejo: Oltoilo lʼEngai, mekure aa oltoilo lʼoltung'ani!
Neosh nabokata olmalaika lʼOlaitoriani ninye, tiaraki neitu eisho ninye Engai enkitook; nenya ilkuru ninye nedung'o tau.
Nebulu lomon lʼEngai nepona.
Nerrinyo Barnabas o Saulos eing'ua Yerusalem, eidipa aaitarasai nkishoorot, erikito ninje Yohanes oata engai arna Markos.
Netii Antiokia atua esirit layolounok o laiteng'enak, Barnabas o Simeon oipotoki Niger o Lukios le Kirene o Manaen oitubuluaki te nebo o Herodes, olkarsis lʼematua e ong'wan, o Saulos.
Ore peisyayaki ninje Olaitoriani neitupukoo aten, neiro Olmumua Sinyati: Entegelakaki Barnabas o Saulos, peitobir ninje ena kyas naipotoko nanu ninje.
Neitupukoo aten nesaisho neiteleiki ninje ngaik neisho epuo.
Ore kulo looirriwaiye Olmumua Sinyati nepuo metabaiki Seloikia nejing te ina alo engalawa nepuo Kupros;
Ore etii engang' Salamis, neinosu lomon lʼEngai tiatua ngajijik Engai oo Yudayoi; neata ninje baiki Yohanes loisyayaki ninje.
Neim ninje oloigeruno pookin metabaiki Pafos nedol oltung'ani obo lora oloiboni o olayolounoni lʼelejare, Oyudayos, neji engarna enye Baryesus;
netii ninye te nebo o olaigwenani Sergios Paulos, oltung'ani lʼeng'eno; eipoto ele Barnabas o Saulos neyeu nening' lomon lʼEngai.
Negilunore Elimas ninje, lora oloiboni, amu nyena enkitaalata engarna enye, neyeu neitapal olaigwenani enkirukoto.
Kake ore Saulos, oji baiki Paulos, nebore Olmumua Sinyati, nekurraki ngonyek shumata enye
nejo: Iye, enkerai e satan, nabore olosek o olduruki pookin, olmang'atinda lʼesupato pookin, mipal mishukushuk ngoitoi Olaitoriani naara sidan?
Akae, ng'orai, elotu engaina Olaitoriani shumata ino niaku modooni, midol engolong' enkiti kata. Nedoiki ninye nabokata olairambai o enaimin, nemanaa ninye neing'oru oloibung' engaina enye.
Ore pedol olaigwenani enataa, neiruk neiputukunyoki enkiteng enare Olaitoriani.
Nejing' Paulos o lʼemboitei enye engalawa eing'ua Pafos nebaia Perge e Pamfilia; neing'ua Yohanes ninje nerrinyo Yerusalem.
Neing'ua ninje Perge nebaia Antiokia e Pisidia nejing' tʼengolong' naeng'ieng'areki atua engaji Engai netoni.
Ore peidipi aaisoma nkitanapat o layolounok, neirriwaki ilkituak lʼengaji Engai aajoki ninje: Lelea, lalashera, teni etii obo too ndai loata ororei orojie olorere, entolimu!
Neitashe Paulos neroj tʼengaina enye neiro: Lelea le Israel o ndai liurere Engai, enining'o!
Etegelua Engai ele orere Israel loopapa lang' neitaa kitok olorere te ina kata nara lomon tʼolosho Misri, nerik aitung'ua ninje tʼengaina enye nataapaiyoki.
Eting'iriaka ninje larin artam ti ang'ata
neiminye loreren oopishana tiatua olosho Kanaan neitujung' ninje olosho lenye.
Ore tekurum neisho ninje larin iip ong'wan o onom laigwenak metabaiki olayolounoni Samuel.
Tekurum neyeu ninje olkarsis, neisho Engai ninje Saul, enkerai e Kis, oltung'ani lʼenkishomi e Benyamin, larin artam.
Ore peidip aitau ilo, neunoki ninje David aitaa olkarsis lenye, neijakenu te ninye nejo: Ainoto David le Isai (Yese), oltung'ani onyor oltau lai, oloitobir pookin nayeu.
Neunoki Engai Israel tiatua eishoi enye, neijia anaa peisiligua, Olaitopuani Yesus,
eidipa Yohanes aituruko ainosaki olorere pookin le Israel enkibatisa enkitaalata, eton eitu elotu ninye.
Ore peidip Yohanes olototo lenye, nejo: Mara nanu ilo lijojo ndai, kake eng'orai, elotu tekurum ai ele lamaiteu nanu atalaku namuka oo nkejek enyena.
Lelea, lalashera, nakera eishoi e Abraham o ndai liurere Engai, eirriwakaki ndai ororei lʼena kitopuata.
Ore kulo lootii Yerusalem o ilkituak lenye, eitu eyolou ele arashu rorei loo layolounok ooisomai too ngolong'i pookin naaeng'ieng'areki neitabaia ninje tʼenkigwena enye.
Ore peitu etum entoki naarie ninye metua, nesai ninje ake Pilatos, pear ninye metua.
Ore peidip ninje pookin natisirakaki ninye, neitadou ninye tʼenjata nepik atua engapunet.
Neitopiu ake Engai ninye tiatua lootuata;
nelioi ngolong'i kumok too kulo ooilepa o ninye eing'ua Galilaya metabaiki Yerusalem, loora taata iljaken lenyena tiatua olorere.
Kinosaki si yook ndai ena kisiligata nataa too loopapa lang',
aajo eidipa aitisipai Engai ninye too yook, nkera enye, etopiwuo Yesus, anaa petisiraki tiatua Osingolio le are: Ira iye Oinoti lai, aatoiwuo iye taata.
Ore tiaraki naitopiwuo ninye aitung'ua lootuata, pemeala arruoio, neiro nji: Ayeu naisho ndai eng'adunoto naisiliga David, naibung' ninye osupatei.
Onaa ejo tʼengai wueji: Minjooio osinyati lino, pedol erruoroto.
Amu ore David, peidip tʼenkata enye aisyayaki eyeunoto Engai, neirura ninye nepiki enetii loomenye nedol erruoroto;
kake eitu edol ele loitopiwuo Engai, erruoroto.
Akae, njeyolouni too ndai, lelea, lalashera, aajo einosakini ndai enkitaunoto oo nkitarruot tʼolbae lʼele.
Neishori te ninye oltung'ani pookin loiruk ninye esupato neitu eidim aaishoo ndai nkitanapat e Mose.
Eng'orai, pemepuonu shumata inyi kuna naairoro layolounok:
„Eng'orai, ndai lamenak, emputukunyo niminimini! Amu aitobir nanu embae too ngolong'i inyi, embae nimirukuruku, teni einosaki oltung'ani ndai.“
Ore peidip ninje aatupukutu, nesai iltung'anak ninje, peitoki aaliki ninje kulo rorei tʼengai olong' naeng'ieng'areki.
Ore peisardak esirit engaji Engai, nesuj ilkumok loo Yudayoi o lʼemboitei oo Yudayoi looure Engai Paulos o Barnabas ooirorie nediding' ninje, pebik tiatua eng'adunoto Engai.
Ore tʼengolong' naeng'ieng'areki e are neiturrurro engang' pookin, eng'or kuti ake, pening' lomon lʼEngai.
Ore pedol Yudayoi siamin, neibung'aki ong'u neisimakinore enatejo Paulos nemorisho.

Neiro Paulos o Barnabas meureisho ejo: Meata kata nemeng'asi aainosu ororei lʼEngai too ndai, kake tiaraki nirrumokiki ninye enelakwa niming'oraara aten, aajo iyeuu empuan nemeiting', eng'orai, kimbelekenyakino loreren lemeata Engai.
Amu neijia eitanapua yook Olaitoriani: Aatipika iye, piaku enkilang'et oo loreren, piaku iye enkitopuata metabaiki enkiting'oto enkop.
Ore pening' loreren lemeata Engai kuna, neng'ida neitadaraa ororei lʼOlaitoriani neiruk kulo ootushumaki, pebaiki empuan nemeiting'.
Neibulunyeki ororei lʼOlaitoriani atua ele osho pookin.
Kake neiponyaa Yudayoi ng'oroyok naaure Engai naata enkitook o ilkituak lʼengang' neinyeye emirata namirie Paulos o Barnabas neitupuku ninje too mbatai enye.
Neipiripiroo enterit oo nkejek enye, pebaiki ninje, nepuonu Ikonion.
Neiganya laiteng'enuok eng'ida o Olmumua Sinyati.
Neaku eiturrurro ninje te Ikonion tiatua engaji Engai oo Yudayoi neinosu nji, aajo eiruko esiamu kitok oo Yudayoi o noo Lgrikini.
Neiponyaa Yudayoi lemeiruk iltauja loo loreren metagoroki lalashera.
Nebik te ina alo enkata naado peno neiteng'enu meureisho Olaitoriani, oijakenoko lomon lʼeng'adunoto enye neisho metaa ntokitin kituak o nkiputukunyot too ngaik enye.
Nerisha esiamu engang' nejing' kulekai ematua oo Yudayoi o kulekai ematua oo lairriwak.
Neibung'aro loreren o Yudayoi o ilkituak lenye, peitobiraki ninje ntorrok nenang' too soito,
neyolou ninje ena nekwetiki ngang'itie e Likaonia, Listra o Derbe, o olosho lotamana;
Netoni te ina alo neinosu lomon lʼeng'ida.
Netii Listra oltung'ani obo, menati nkejek, leitu eidim ashomo eiter tʼengoshoke e ng'otonye, eitu elo tukul.
Neinining' ilo Paulos eirorita; nekurraki ninye ngonyek nedol, ajo eata enkirukoto enkishiunoto,
neiro tʼoltoilo kitok ejo: Ntasho too nkejek inono aitoriori! Neipirriu ilo tung'ani shumata neiter alimana.
Ore pedol isiamin enaitobira Paulos, neapaa iltoiloi neiro tʼenkutuk e Likaonia: Etanyanyukie ngain iltung'anak nedoiki enikitii yook.
Neipot Barnabas Tseus o Paulos Hermas, amu ninye oljani loo rorei.
Nereu olaidasani lʼengaji e Tseus natii aulo engang', ilmong'i o ilmarisiani loo ntapuka metabaiki kishomi neyeu neidas te nebo o siamin.
Ore pening' lairriwak Barnabas o Paulos kuna, nepolos ninje ilkilani lenye neityamaki siamin edarita

nejo: Lelea, kainyo intobiritata te ina alo? Kira si yook iltung'anak loopuo aae anaa ndai, kinosaki ndai, pimbelekenyanya too kuna ain nemera o nyoo aapuo enetii Engai naishiu, naitobira shumata o enkop o ilbalbali o pookin natii atua ninje;
neisho tʼenkopa naima loreren pookin epuo ngoitoi enye,
kake eitu epal ninje eijakenoki kion eitobir sidan, neisho ndai enjan e shumata o nkatan eiunoto oo lmomo neigany iltauja linyi endaa o eng'ida.
Ore ejoito kuna, nemitiki siamin tʼosina, pemeidasaki ninje.
Nepuonu Yudayoi ooing'ua Antiokia o Ikonion neisis isiamin nenang' Paulos too soito neitupuku ninye aulo engang' nejo etua.
Ore emanita laiteng'enuok, neitashe nejing' atua engang' nelo tʼengolong' e are o Barnabas metabaiki Derbe.
Neinosaki ninje ena ang' lomon lʼeng'ida neitaa ilkumok laiteng'enuok nerrinyo Listra o Ikonion o Antiokia.
Neitagol iltauja loo laiteng'enuok ediding' pebik tiatua enkirukoto neitayolo ninje, aajo meata kaata nimikijing' atua enkarsishu Engai too sinaitin kumok.
Nerukoo sirito nepikaki ninje laigwenak, esaisho nepukoo neitarasaki Olaitoriani oiruko ninye.
Neim Pisidia nepuonu Pamfilia,
neinosu lomon te Perge nedou metabaiki Atalia
nepuo te ine tʼengalawa Antiokia, ene wueji netipikieki tʼeng'adunoto Engai enkyas naitabaitie.
Ore pebaia ninje, neiturrur esirit neinosaki enaitobira Engai too ninje, ajo etaboloko Engai loreren lemeyolo ninye kutukaji enkirukoto.
Nebik te ina alo enkata neme kiti te nebo o laiteng'enuok.
Nedou iltung'anak ooje ooing'ua Yudaya neiteng'en lalashera nejo: Teni memurati ndai tʼorregie le Mose, nimindimidimi aatopok.
Ore peaku endung'o o enkitarrikino e Paulos o Barnabas o lelo, neitanapaa ninje Paulos o Barnabas o kulekai tʼempolos enye, pepuo tʼolbae lʼena kitarrikino Yerusalem enetii lairriwak o laigwenak.
Neitare esirit ninje neim Foinike o Samaria neinosu enkitaalata oo loreren lemeata Engai neiting'id lalashera pookin naleng'.
Ore pebaia ninje Yerusalem, neng'amu esirit o lairriwak o laigwenak ninje, neinosaa enkumoi oo mbaak naaitobira Engai too ninje.
Neinyototo iltung'anak oora lʼematua oo Lfarisayoi ooiruko nejo: Meata kata nememurati ninje neitanapi, peibung' nkitanapat e Mose.
Neiturrurro lairriwak o laigwenak, peleen ena bae.
Ore peishangarra naleng', neitashe Petros nejoki ninje: Lelea, lalashera, iyololo, aajo aategelua Engai opa tiatua ndai, peiye ening' loreren lemeata Engai tʼenkutuk ai lomon lʼenkitopuata neiruk.
Ore si ninye Engai nayolo iltauja neijakenoki kion too ninje neisho Olmumua Sinyati anaa yook,
neitu epik erishata empolos ang' o ninje neisuj iltauja lenye tʼenkirukoto.
Akae, ainyo pitemiteme taata Engai nipikipiki nkeek shumata oo murto oo laiteng'enuok neitu eidim aatanap loopapa lang' o yook?
Kake kiruk, aajo kipok tʼeng'adunoto Olaitoriani Yesus, naa neijia si ninje.
Negira enkumoi pookin aainining' Barnabas o Paulos einosu ilponot o nkiputukunyot naaitobira Engai too ninje tiatua loreren lemeata Engai.
Ore pegira kulo, nealu Yakobos nejo: Lelea, lalashera, enining'oki!
Einosua Simeon eneikuna Engai tʼenkata elukunya ten egelu neng'amu olorere obo too loreren, peata engarna enye.
Etumo rorei loo layolounok o kulo, neijia anaa petisiraki:
Alaibelekenyunye tekurum naitoki ashet engaji e David natuurori, naitoki ashet nkun enyena naataaraki, naitasheye ninje,
peiye eing'oru iltung'anak lootelekutua Olaitoriani, o loreren pookin loipotieki engarna ai, nejo Olaitoriani oitobir kuna.
Eyolo Engai opa moitie nkitobirat enyena pookin.
Onaa aalu nanu, pemeitagolikini kulo looibelekenyakinote Engai tiatua loreren,
kake njesirakini ninje, pepaash ilduruk loo nkulie ain o mbaak torrok oo nkiri o natagoroki o osarge.
Amu eata Mose neba opa moitiei kulo looinosu mbaak enyena tiatua ngang'itie pookin neisomai ninye too ngolong i pookin naaeng'ieng'areki tiatua ngajijik Engai.

Nejo lairriwak o laigwenak te nebo o esirit pookin, aajo sidai, teni egelu leak too ninje, neirriwaa ninje, pepuo Antiokia te nebo o Paulos o Barnabas o Yudas oipotoki Barsabas o Silas, oora leak arikok tiatua lalashera.
Nesir too ngaik enye nji: Kiroroki yook lairriwak o laigwenak likira lalashera ndai lalashera loo loreren ootii Antiokia o Siria o Kilikia.
Tiaraki nikitoning'o yook, aajo eing'arrirroitie ndai iltung'anak ooje too yook too nkiteng'enareitin neitarruo iltauja linyi, eitu kintanap yook ninje entoki,
onaa kitadua yook likinturrurro tʼoltau obo, aajo sidai, pikirriwaki ndai leak ootegeluaki te nebo o likinyor, Barnabas o Paulos,
iltung'anak looidipa aaishoo iltauja lenye tʼolbae Tengarna Olaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos.
Nikirriu naa Yudas o Silas ooinosu oopeny ndai too rorei kuna baak.
Amu eiting'ida Olmumua Sinyati o yook, pemikipon aadumakindai rridat neme nona ake nemepalai,
pipaashipaasha nkiri enkidasare oo nkulie ain o osarge o natagoroki o mbaak torrok oo nkiri; teni imitikiki aten kuna, nintobiribiri sidai. Esere naa!
Ore peishori meshomo, nepuonu ninje Antiokia neiturrur enkumoi olorere neitarasaki empalai.
Ore peidip aaisoma, neng'ida te ina kilejilejata.
Nediding' Yudas o Silas, oora baiki layolounok, lalashera too rorei kumok neitagol ninje.
Ore peidip aatobik enkata naje, neisho lalashera ninje meshomo tʼeseriani enetii looirriutua ninje.
Nenyorru Silas atobiko te ine.
Netoni Paulos o Barnabas te Antiokia eiteng'enisho neinosu lomon lʼOlaitoriani te nebo o kulekai kumok.
Ore peishunye ngolong'i naaje, nejoki Paulos Barnabas: Mainyaaki aamanaa, pikiduare lalashera tiatua ngang'itie pookin nikinosunye lomon lʼOlaitoriani, eneikununo.
Neyeu Barnabas nerik te nebo o ninje Yohanes oji Markos.
Kake etayeuo Paulos, pemeriki ilo lotung'aiye ninje te Pamfilia neitu erubare ninje atua enkyas.
Nejing' enkitarrikino metirishata; nerik Barnabas Markos nepuo tʼengalawa Kupros.
Negelu Paulos Silas nepuo, eidipa aaitarasakiti lalashera ninje eng'adunoto Engai.
Neim ninje Siria o Kilikia neitagol sirito.
Nebaia ninje Derbe o Listra. Naa ng'orai, etii ina alo olaiteng'enuoni oji engarna enye Timoteos, engerai eng'oroyoni nabo oo Yudayoi nairuko, nera menye lenye Olgriki;
Neijakenu lalashera ootii Listra o Ikonion te ninye sidan.
Neyeu Paulos, perubare ele ninye, neibung' nemurat ninye tʼolbae loo Yudayoi lootii atua kuna wuejitin, amu etayolo pookin, aajo era menye Olgriki.
Ore peim atua ngang'itie, neitarasaki kuna sipat, naaitanaputua lairriwak o laigwenak ootii Yerusalem, perrip ninje.
Negolu sirito tiatua enkirukoto nepona aaku kumok too ngolong'i pookin.
Neim Frigia o olosho Galatia nemitiki Olmumua Sinyati ninje einosu lomon tiatua Asia.
Ore pebaia Misia, netem aapuo Bitinia, neitu eisho Olmumua le Yesus epuo;
neim Misia nebaia Troas.
Nelioi enkitaduaroto kiarie te Paulos: etii oltung'ani obo le Makedonia oitashe nesai ninye nejoki: Talang'u Makedonia, piretoki yook!
Ore peidip atadua ena kitaduaroto, nikiyeu nabokata nikipuku aapuo Makedonia nikidol, aajo esipa eipoto yook Olaitoriani, pikinosaki ninje lomon lʼeng'ida.
Nikidotu eenet te Troas nikibaia engoitoi naitoriori Samotrake o tʼengolong' e are Neapolis,
o te ina alo metabaiki Filipi nara engang' kitok olosho Makedonia, engang' oo Romayoi. Nikitoni tiatua ena ang' ngolong'i naaje.
Ore tʼengolong' naeng'ieng'areki nikipuku tʼengang' aapuo embata engare, ewueji nasaishoreki, nikitoni nikirorie ng'oroyok naaiturrurrote.
Nening' eng'oroyoni nabo, naji engarna enye Lidia, engamirani oo lkarashi oodo, nʼengang' Tiatira, naure Engai; nebol Olaitoriani oltau lenye neibung' nairoro Paulos.
Ore peibatisi ninye o engaji enye, nesai yook nejo: Teni kitadua, aajo ara engairukoni Olaitoriani, entijing' engaji ai, pitonini tiatua; nediding'aki yook!
Neaku ore pikipuo ewueji nesaishoreki, neinepu yook engaisyayani nabo naata Olmumua loitayolo mbaak e akenya, enainotoko laitoriak lenyena endupoto kitok tʼenkinosunoto oo mbaak e akenya.
Nesuj ninye Paulos o yook neosh olodoo nejo: Era kulo leak laisyayak lʼEngai natii shumata neinosaki ndai engoitoi enkitopuata.
Neiko neijia ngolong'i kumok. Negoro Paulos neibelekenya nejoki Olmumua: Aaitanap iye tʼengarna e Yesus Kristos, pipuku te ninye. Nepuku te ninye te ina kata ake.
Ore pedol laitoriak lenyena, aajo eimina eanyunoto endupoto enye, neibung' ninje Paulos o Silas neyetaki osingira engomom oo lkituak,
nerik ninje enetii larikok loo sikerin nejoki: Enyaul kulo tung'anak engang' ang' nera ninje Yudayoi,
neiteng'en irregiei lemeaku, piking'amu aaitobir ninje, tiaraki nikira Romayoi.
Negoroki esiamu ninje, neitanapu larikok loo sikerin, peoruni ilkarashi lenye neari.
Ore peidip aataara ninje naleng', nenang'aki ninje atua engaji erripore neitanap olarriponi lʼengaji, perrip ninje naleng'.
Ore peishori ninye ena kitanapata, nenang'aki ninje atua engaji erripore, olgilata liatua tukul, neitirrish nkejek enye too nkeek.
Ore tʼempolos e kiarie nesaisho Paulos o Silas neranyaki Engai, neinining' ninje ilkulekai ooena.
Neaku nabokata enkikirikirata kitok enkop neing'unung'un baiki entonata engaji erripore; nebolo nabokata kutukajini pookin nedoiyo eneta enye pookin.
Ore pepiu olarriponi lʼengaji too njok nedol, ajo etabolote kutukajini engaji erripore, neshitu olalem neyeu near kion metua, amu etejo, ajo ekweta looena.
Neapaa Paulos oltoilo tʼengolon nejoki: Miasaki kion entorroni, amu kitii pookin ene!
Neyeu enkilang'et neilang'aki atua eikirikira, nebatatakino Paulos o Silas
nerik ninje boo nejo: Laitoriak, kaji aiko, patum atopua?
Nejo ninje: Ruko Olaitoriani Yesus Kristos, nipok iye o engaji ino.
Neinosaki ninye lomon lʼOlaitoriani te nebo o pookin lootii atua engaji enye.
Neitoomon ninje te ina kata e kiarie neisuj oshot enye, neibatisi nabokata ninye o ilkulenyena pookin;
neriku ninje engaji enye neisho ninje endaa, neng'ida ninye o engaji enye, tiaraki nairuko Engai.
Ore pekenyu, neirriwaa ilkituak ilmurran lenye ejo: Metalaki kulo tung'anak meshomo!
Neinosaki olarriponi lʼengaji erripore Paulos lelo rorei: Eirriutua ilkituak, pelakuni ndai. Akae, enyoito taata, pipuopuo tʼeseriani.

Nejoki Paulos ninje: Etaaraki yook too ngonyek olorere, eitu eigwenakini yook, nikira yook Romayoi, etanang'akitia yook engaji erriporej o taata neitupuku ninje yook tʼesungureishu? Me neijia! Njepuonu ake oopeny aarik yook boo!
Neliki ilmurran ilkituak kulo rorei. Neureishoi etoning'o, aajo era ninje Romayoi,
nepuonu neirorie ninje, nerik boo nesai, pepuku tʼengang'.
Nepuku tʼengaji erripore nepuo engaji e Lidia; ore pedol ninje lalashera, neitagol ninje nepuku.
Ore peidip aaima Amfipolis o Apolonia, nebaia Tesalonike natii engaji Engai oo Yudayoi.
Neijia anaa petamoo Paulos nejing'aki, negilunore ninje too ngolong'i naaeng'ieng'areki uni too sirat,
neboloki neitayanaki ninje, ajo meata kata nemeinosieki Kristos osina nepiu too lootuata; ore ele Yesus (etejo ninye) lainosaki ndai, ninye Kristos.
Neibelokino kulekai ninje nearakino ematua e Paulos o Silas, baiki esiana kitok oo Lgrikini ooure Engai o ng'oroyok kituak neme kuti.

Neibung'aki Yudayoi ong'u negelaki aten iltung'anak torrok tʼempolos oo lalimanak lʼengang' neitaa esiamu neng'uyan engang'; neitashe tʼengomom engaji e Yason neyeu neitupuku ninje boo engomom olorere.
Ore pelau ninje, neitupuku neyetu Yason o lalashera ooje engomom oo lkituak lʼengang' eoshito olodoo aajo: Kulo lootung'uyana olmaa eetuo baiki ene;
neitoomono Yason ninje; nemen kulo pookin nkitanapat e kaisar nejo: etii olekai karsis, Yesus.
Neng'uyan ninje esiamu o ilkituak lʼengang' lootoning'o kuna.
Ore peidip aainoto entoki endung'okinoto e Yason o lʼemboitei enye, neisho epuo.
Neirriwaa lalashera nabokata Paulos o Silas kiarie metabaiki Beroia; ore pebaia, nejing' atua engaji Engai oo Yudayoi.
Eborraki ninje nelang'kulo le Tesalonike neng'amu ororei too ltauja ooitoriori neleen ngolong'i pookin sirat, ten ake neijia etiu.
Neiruk ilkumok too ninje o ng'oroyok oo Lgrikini naata enkitook o leak leme kuti.
Ore peyolou Yudayoi le Tesalonike, aajo einosu Paulos lomon lʼEngai te Beroia, nebaia ina alo neibelibelie neing'unye baiki te ina alo siamin.
Neirriwaa lalashera Paulos nabokata, pelo metabaiki olbalbal, kake etobiko Silas o Timoteos te ina alo.
Ore kulo looturubare Paulos nerik ninye metabaiki Atenai; ore peidip aatang'amutu enkitanapata, pepuonu Silas o Timoteos aasioki, nepuo.
Ore peanyu Paulos ninje te Atenai, nepejoi atua ninye, edol ajo ebore ena ang' enkisyayare oo nkulie ain.
Neirorie ninye Yudayoi tiatua engaji Engai o kulo ooure Engai o tʼosingira ngolong'i pookin kulo ooinepua.

Negilunore ninye ematua oo lang'eni ooji Epikureyoi o Istoikoi, nejo ilkulekai: Kainyo eyeu nejo ele oiro pesho? Nejo ilkulekai: Enyanyukie oloinosu ngain omon. Amu einosua ninye lomon le Yesus o lʼempiunoto.
Neibung'ninye nerik Areopagos ejo: Sidai, teni kiyolou, aajo kaa kiteng'enare ng'ejuk ena nirorita iye?
Amu iau iye mbaak omon atua nkiyaa ang'; kiyeu nikiyolou enkitaalata oo kuna baak.
Amu ore iltung'anak pookin le Atenai o lomon ootii ine eitu eyeu neimaki lomon neme enkiroroto o ening'oto oo mbaak naara ng'ejuko.
Neitashe Paulos tʼempolos e Areopagos nejo: Lelea le Atenai, atadua ndai too mbaak pookin, ajo iurere naleng' ngain.
Amu ore paim, naing'oraa wuejitin enkisyayare inyi nainepu baiki olkitaret obo lʼenkidasare losira: LʼEngai nemeyoloi! Ainosaki ndai taata ele lisyayakitia neitu iyolouu.
Ninye Engai naitobira enkop o pookin natii atua, era ninye Olaitoriani le shumata o lʼenkop, mebik ninye tiatua ngajijik naaitobiraki too ngaik,
nemeisyayakini ninye too ngaik oo ltung'anak anaa ololau toki, amu ninye oishoo pookin empuan o eang'an o pookin;
neitobir ninye t'osarge obo loreren pookin, pemany ninje shumata enkop pookin nesir nkatan naaitanapaki o enebaiki ntonat enye,
peiye eing'oru ninje Olaitoriani eirrapirrapu, petum; esipa, melakwaniki ninye oltung'ani pookin too yook,
amu kinjiu tiatua ninye nikipuoiye nikitii atua ninye, anaa pejo ilkulekai too ndai loosir singolioitin: Kira yook lʼeishoi Engai.
Akae, teni kira eishoi Engai, meaku, pikintanyanyukie Engai esahabu arashu ngoshola arashu osoit looitobiraki too nkyasin o tʼengarriyano oo ltung'anak.
Eitu eing'oraa Engai nkatan emodaishu, kake eitanap taata iltung'anak pookin too wuejitin pookin, peala,
amu etipika engolong' naigwenakinye olmaa tʼesupato, tʼolee obo oitanapua ninye neleen pookin tʼenkirukoto e atua ilo oidipa aitopiu aitung'ua lootuata.
Ore pening' ninje mbaak enkitopiunoto oo lootuata, nemor ilkulekai, nejo ilkulekai: Kintoki aaning' iye too nona baak.
Nepuku Paulos nji tʼempolos enye.
Neibung'are ninye leak ooje neiruk, netii atua kulo Dionisios, olaigwenani obo Tene wueji, o eng'oroyoni nabo naji engarna enye Damaris o ilkulekai te nebo o ninje.
Neing'ua Paulos tekurum Atenai nelotu Korintos,

neinepu Oyudayos obo, oji engarna enye Akwila, otoiwuoki te Pontos, oewuo too nona olong'i eing'ua Italia te nebo o eng'oroyoni enye Priskila, amu eitanapishe kaisar Klaudios, peing'ua Yudayoi pookin Roma; nejing'aki ninje.
Tiaraki nang'ar enkyas nabo, nebik tʼengaji enye neitobir nkyasin; amu ore enkyas enye — laitobirak loo ng'ajijik olototo.
Neirorie ninye too ngolong'i naaeng'ieng'areki pookin tʼengaji Engai negilunore Yudayoi o Ilgrikini.
Ore pebau Silas o Timoteos eing'ua Makedonia, neisirkoni Paulos tʼolmumua, peijakenoki Yudayoi, ajo era ninye Kristos.
Ore egilunore nemor ninje, neipiripir ninye ilkilani lenyena nejoki ninje: Etii sargeta linyi shumata oo lukuny inyi! Maata eng'oki nanu, ore eiter taata aibelekenyakino loreren lemeata Engai.
Nedumunye te ine nelotu engaji oltung'ani oure Engai, oji Titios Yustos, otashare engaji enye engaji Engai.
Neiruk Krispos, olkitok lʼengaji Engai, Olaitoriani, o engaji enye pookin. Neinining' Ilkorintioi kumok neiruk neibatisi.
Nejoki Olaitoriani Paulos kiarie tʼenkitaduaroto: Miureisho, kake roro, migira!
Amu aaboitare nanu iye nimikinyikaki oltung'ani, pikinosie osina, amu aata olorere kitok tiatua ena ang'.
Nebik te ine olari obo o lapaitin ile, eiteng'enu tiatua ninje lomon lʼEngai.
Ore era Galion Olaitoriani le Akaya, neitokitokakino Yudayoi tʼoltau obo Paulos nerik ninye enetii olorika lʼenkigwena
ejo: Eisis ele tung'ani olorere, peisyayaki Engai t'engoitoi nemeishiaakinore nkitanapat ang'.
Ore peyeu Paulos nebol enkutuk enye, nejoki Galion Yudayoi: Loyudayoi, ten emutu era ororei lʼenkisiloto arashu lʼenkyas torrono, anaata ayeu naning' ndai abaraki,
kake tiaraki nara enkitarrikino enkiteng'enare o noo ngam o noo nkitanapat tiatua ndai, entobirakinoto oopeny; mayeu naaku nanu olaigwenani loo nona baak.
Nemir ninje tʼolorika lʼenkigwena enye.
Neibung' Ilgrikini pookin Sostenes, olkitok lʼengaji Engai, near ninye tʼengomom olorika lʼenkigwena; neitu eshilaa Galion entoki o nabo too nona.
Nebik Paulos te ine ngolong'i naaje, neitanapare lalashera nejing' engalawa alo Siria te nebo o Priskila o Akwila, eidipa atabarno elukunya, amu eisiligishe.
Nebaia Efesos neing'ua ninje te ina alo nejing' openy engaji Engai neirorioro o Yudayoi.
Nesai ninje, pebikoki ninje enkata naado, kake eitu eiruk ninye.
Neitanapare ninje ejo: Meata kata namatii kuna olong'i kituak naapuonu, Yerusalem; aitoki arrinyokino ndai, teni eyeu Engai. Neing'ua Efesos,
nebaia Kaisarea neilep (alo Yerusalem) neiroroki esirit nedou metabaiki Antiokia.
Ore peidip atobiko enkiti kata, nepuku nerukoo atua olosho Galatia o Frigia, eitagol laiteng'enuok pookin.
Nebaia Oyudayos obo Efesos, oji engarna enye Apolos, otoiwuoki te Aleskandria, oltung'ani lʼeng'eno neaku shashaut too sirat.
Eiteng'enaki ele tʼengoitoi Olaitoriani neiro tʼolmumua oiwuwu, neiteng'enisho ninye naleng' too lomon le Yesus, kake etayolo ninye enkibatisa e Yohanes ake.
Neiter ninye airo, metii enkuretishu, tiatua engaji Engai. Ore pening' Priskila o Akwila ninye, neitoomon ninye neitaaliki abaraki engoitoi Engai.
Ore peyeu nelo ninye Akaya, nesiraki nediding' lalashera laiteng'enuok, peng'amu ninye. Ore pebaia ninye, neretoki naleng' kulo looiruko tʼeng'adunoto;
amu etigilua oshi Yudayoi tʼengolon tʼengomom olorere pookin, eitadolu too sirat, ajo era Yesus Kristos.
Neaku ore etii Apolos Korintos, neim Paulos loshon le shumata nelotu Efesos neinepu laiteng'enuok ooje
nejoki ninje: Itang'amutua Olmumua Sinyati te ina kata niruko? Nealiki ninje ninye: Eitu aikata kining', ten ake etii Olmumua Sinyati.
Nejo: Kang'ai eibatisieki ndai? Nejo: Enkibatisa e Yohanes.
Nejo Paulos: Eibatisishe Yohanes t'enkibatisa enkitaalata, ejoki olorere, peiruk ololotu tekurum enye, Yesus lora Kristos;
Ore pening' ninje kuna, neisho eibatisi tʼengarna Olaitoriani Yesus;
neiteleiki Paulos ninje ngaik nelotu Olmumua Sinyati shumata enye neiro too nkulie kutukie neinosu mbaak e akenya.
Neaku leak pookin loonyikaki tomon o are.
Nejing' ninye atua engaji Engai neiro, meata enkuretishu, lapaitin okuni, eiteng'enisho neitayolo ninje mbaak enkarsishu Engai.

Ore peitagol ooje iltauja lenye neitu eiruk neimaki ena oitoi too ntorrok t'engomom esiamu, nepuku ninye too ninje nerishu laiteng'enuok neiteng'enisho ngolong'i pookin tiatua engaji enkiteng'enare e Tiranos.
Neaku kuna too larin aare, nening' pookin lootii Asia lomon lʼOlaitoriani, Yudayoi o Ilgrikini.
Neitobir Engai ntokitin kituak naleng' too ngaik e Paulos,
neakini baiki rasheta enyena enkinyinyiret o nkimeitan enyena neibung'i te shumata oo loomoiyaa, neing'ua moiyaitin ninje nepuku ilmeneng'a.
Netem Yudayoi ooje ooyang'iyang'a oora loibonok, aalimu te shumata oo kulo looata ilmeneng'a, engarna Olaitoriani Yesus nejo; Kinturujaki ndai te Yesus oinosu Paulos.
Netii leak oopishana, nkera Oyudayos Skewas, ora olaidasani kitok, ooikuna nji.
Nealiki olmeneng'ani nejoki ninje: Ayolo Yesus nayolo si Paulos, kake irara ndai nyoo?
Neipirrioki ele tung'ani loata olmeneng'ani shumata negilu nerrek ninje, metabana nekwet aaing'ua ena aji, meata ilkilani, eata ilbaak.
Neyolou Yudayoi o Ilgrikini pookin ootii Efesos kuna baak, nejing' enkuretishu atua ninje pookin, neitaai kitok engarna Olaitoriani Yesus.
Ore ilkumok too kulo ooiruko nepuonu, neibalu neinosu nkitobirat enye.
Ilkulekai ake looitobira mbaak nemeaku neau sirat enye nepej ninje too ngonyek oo pookin; neiken enkinyang'a enye netum ngoshola naaibor elfun onom.
Neibulaa nji lomon lʼOlaitoriani tʼengolon anaa peidim.
Ore peidip aaitaa kuna baak, neibirribir Paulos tʼolmummua lenye, ajo ore peidip aima Makedonia o Akaya nelo Yerusalem, nejo: Ore atii ina alo, meata kata namadol Roma.
Neirriwaa iltung'anak aare too kulo ooisyayakitia ninye, nera Timoteos o Erastos, pepuo Makedonia; nebik ninye openy enkata naje te Asia.
Neaku te ina kata enkipushoi kitok tʼolbae le ina kiteng'enare.
Amu etii oltung'ani obo, oji engarna enye Demetrios, olkunoni loo ngoshola, oitobira ngajijik oo ngoshola enkisyayare e Artemis, netumoki lashetak endupoto neme kiti.
Neiturrur ninye kulo te nebo o laretok loo nkyasin naanyanyukie nejoki: Lelea, iyololo, aajo kiata too kuna kyasin endupoto sapuk.
Itadua ndai nining'ining'i, aajo eisisita ele Paulos neitayolo iltung'anak kumok, me te Efesos ake, kake baiki te Asia pookin, nejo, ajo mera kuna naaitobiraki too ngaik, ngain.

Me entumoto ang' ake kiataiye osina naimin, kake baiki engaji sinyati engai ng'oroyoni kitok ang' Artemis naikenari, ajo me o nyoo, neiminyeki enkitook enye, naisyayaki iltung'anak le Asia pookin o lʼenkop.
Ore pening' ninje kuna, neigany engoro neosh olodoo ejo: Kitok Artemis oo Efesioi!
Neigany engang' pookin enking'oling'olata, nepuo aasioio tʼoltau obo metabaiki ewueji oo nkiguraneitin, newuap Gayos o Aristarkos, iltung'anak le Makedonia, lʼemboitei e Paulos.
Ore peyeu Paulos nejing'aki olorere, nemitiki laiteng'enuok ninye.
Neirriwaki baiki ematua oo laigwenak le Asia, loora iljorueta lenyena, nediding' ninye, pemelo ewueji oo nkiguraneitin.
Akae, neishir kulekai nji o kulekai nji, amu eing'oling'olate iltimito nemeyolo ilkumok, aajo kainyo peiturrurrote ninje.
Neyetu kulekai Aleksandros errumoo Yudayoi ninye. Neroj Aleksandros tʼengaina neyeu nemitu kion tʼengomom olorere.
Ore peyolou ninje, aajo era ninye Oyudayos, neosh ninje olodoo te nebo o pookin tʼenkata oo saan are, eishirita: Kitok Artemis oo Efesioi!
Neitigir olasirani obo esiamu nejo: Lelea le Efesos, kalo tung'ani lemeyolo, ajo era engang' Efesos engashilaroni engai ng'oroyoni Artemis, nʼemua natadouo te shumata?
Tiaraki nemeisimunoi nona, onaa meata kata nimigirara ndai nimintobiribiri entoki enkisarisarata.
Amu itorikutuo kulo tung'anak leitu epurroo ntokitin engaji engai neitu emor engai ng'oroyoni ang'.
Akae, teni eata Demetrios o laitobirak loo nkyasin looboitare ninye embae oltung'ani, neatai nkigwenaitin o laigwenak. Njeitang'oro!
Teni iyeuu ororei loo nkulie baak, nepuoi aal tʼoltumo oitoriokino.
Amu kiureisho, aajo eitang'ori yook tʼolbae lʼele arrabal le taata, amu mikiata emitunoto tʼena kiposhai. Ore peidip atejo kuna, neitanapaa enkigwena.
Ore pegira enkiposhai, neipot Paulos laiteng'enuok, neilejilej neitanapare ninje nepuku, pelo Makedonia.
Ore peidip aima lelo oshon nediding' ninje too rorei kumok, nebaia olosho loo Lgrikini.
Nebik te ina alo lapaitin okuni. Ore peyeu Yudayoi near ninye tʼena kata nayeu nelo ninye tʼengalawa Siria, nepuku eata ajo errinyo eimaa Makedonia.
Nerubare ninye metabaiki Asia Sopatros le Piros te Beroia, Aristarkos o Sekundos le Tesalonike, Gayos le Derbe, o Timoteos o Tukikos o Trofimos le Asia;
neituruk kulo neanyu yook te Troas.
Nikipuo tʼengalawa eidipate ngolong'i oo lmkaten lemeisiijo, king'ua Filipi nikibaiki ninje te Troas eishunyete ngolong'i imiet; nikibik te ina alo ngolong'i naapishana.
Ore tʼengolong' Engai nikitumo, pikigiligil olmkate, neirorie Paulos ninje, neyeu nelo enasirie olototo, neitaador rorei lenyena metabaiki empolos e kiarie.
Netii nkilang'eta kumok keper aji nikitutumore.
Neton olbarnoti obo, oji engarna enye Eutukos, tʼelusiet neiroshiki njok, epon eiro Paulos rorei kumok. Ore etalepoitie njok, nesulakino kai e uni, nedumuni etua.
Nedou Paulos neurokino shumata enye, nejap ninye nejo: Eminya osina, etii empuan atua ninye.
Neitoki ailep negil olmkate neinyorrinyor, neiro naleng' metabaiki enasirie nepuku nji.
Neriku ninje ele barnoti aa bioto, neilejileja nelang' entemet.
Nikinturuk yook tʼengalawa nikipuo metabaiki Asos, nikiyeu niking'amu Paulos te ina alo; amu neijia eitanapua, eyeu nelo openy too nkejek.
Ore peinepu ninye yook te Asos, nikintijing' ninye nikipuonu Mitilene.
Nikijing' te ina alo engalawa nikibaiki tʼengolong' e are eneitoriokinore Kios; ore tʼengai olong nikijing' Samos nikibik tʼengang' Trogilion; ore tʼengolong' natusuja nikipuonu Miletos.
Amu etayeuo neporoo Paulos tʼengalawa Efesos, pemeimutie te Asia; amu etasioiye ninye anaa peidim, ten ake eaku, petii Yerusalem tʼengolong' e Pentekoste.
Neirriwaa oltung'ani oing'ua Miletos, pelo Efesos neipot laigwenak lʼesirit.
Ore pepuonu enetii ninye, nejoki ninje: Iyololo ndai enaikuna eiter tʼengolong' elukunya natabaua Asia, naton tiatua ndai oshi,
aisyayaki Olaitoriani tʼenkitadounoto pookin o too lkiyo o too nkitasurot nainoto too losekin loo Yudayoi;
neitu apal eitu adiding' ndai tʼengomom olorere o too ngajijik o ngajijik,
naijakenoki Yudayoi o Ilgrikini enkitaalata aaibelekenyakino Engai neiruk Olaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos.
Akae, eng'orai taata, aateenaki tʼolmumua, palo Yerusalem, namayolo mbaak natum te ina alo;
kake aaijakenoki Olmumua Sinyati ejo too ngang'itie pookin, ajo aanyu enat o sinaitin.
Kake ore nona pookin nabo te nanu, adol baiki, ajo me entoki kitok empuan ai, paidim aidipa olototo lai tʼeng'ida o enkisyayare naaishoo Olaitoriani Yesus, paijakenu lomon lʼeng'adunoto Engai.
Akae, eng'orai, ayolo, ajo mikintokiki aadol engomom ai, ndai pookin laimaiye ainosu enkarsishu Engai.
Onaa aijakenoki ndai pookin taata, ajo ara bioto tʼosarge linyi pookin;
amu eitu apal ainosaki ndai enkigwena pookin Engai.
Entagolie aten o enjoo pookin natipika ndai Olmumua Sinyati anaa laing'orak, entotio esirit Engai nainotoko kion t'osarge lenye openy.
Amu ayolo kuna, ajo ore paidip ashomo, nejing'u suiyan malmalin atua ndai nemepal enjoo.
Nepuku baiki tʼempolos inyi iltung'anak ooiro nemeitoriori, pearaki laiteng'enuok ematua enye.
Onaa enjololoto, entadamutu, ajo eitu apal tʼenkata oo larin okuni, dama o kiarie, adiding' oltung'ani pookin too lkiyo.
Akae, lalashera, aitarasaki ndai taata Engai o lomon lenyena lʼeng'adunoto naidim atesheta neisho ndai enjung'o tiatua kulo pookin loora sinyat.
Eitu ang'war too ndai ngoshola arashu sahabu arashu ilkilani;
amu iyololo ndai oopeny, aajo ore kuna aik ainei eisyayutua yeunot ainei o noo kulo laataboitare.
Aitadua ndai pookin eninkoko, teni intobiribiri nkyasin nji niretokiki lemeata engolon, nidamumu rorei lʼOlaitoriani Yesus otejo: Sidai enkishooroto nelang' eng'amunoto.
Ore peidip atejo kuna, negil kung' nesaisho te nebo o ninje pookin.
Neishir pookin naleng' neurokino ninje emurt e Paulos neng'utut ninye,
