eilish naleng' tʼolbae lʼele rorei otejo, ajo meitoki aadol engomom enye; neitare ninye metabaiki engalawa.
Ore pikindip aatirishare ninje, nikipuonu tʼengalawa tʼengoitoi naitoriori metabaiki Koos, ore tʼengai olong' metabaiki Rodos; niking'ua ina alo metabaiki Patara.
Nikidol engalawa naloito Foinike, nikilepaki nikipuo.
Akae, ore pelioi Kupros, niking'ua te kedyanye nikiim metabaiki Siria, nikidou te Tiros, amu te ina alo eyeu neitadounye masaa engalawa.
Nikinepu laiteng'enuok nikibik te ina alo ngolong'i naapishana; nejoki ninje Paulos tʼenkidimata Olmumua, pemeilep abaiki Yerusalem.
Neaku ore pikintabaia yook nona olong'i, nikidumunye nikipuo; neitare yook ninje pookin, ng'oroyok o nkera, metabaiki aulo engang', nikigil kung' tʼembata olbalbal nikisaisho.
Ore pikintanaparo, nikilepaki yook engalawa, nerrinyo si ninje aapuo ang'.
Ore pikindip olototo lang' king'ua Tiros, nikibaia Ptolemais, nikiroroki lalashera nikibik o ninje engolong' nabo.
Ore tʼengolong' e are nikipuku yook loosujita Paulos, nikibaia Kaisarea nikijing' engaji e Filipos oinosu lomon lʼeng'ida, nera ninye obo too lelo oopishana, nikibik tʼengaji enye.
Neata ele ntoiye ong'wan neitu eamari, naainosu mbaak e akenya.
Ore pikipon aabik ngolong'i kumok, nedou olayolounoni obo, oji engarna enye Agabos, tʼolosho Yudaya, nelotu enikitii.
Neibung' ninye enkimeita e Paulos neenye kion ngaik o nkejek nejo: Nji ejo Olmumua Sinyati: Neijia epuo aaen Yudayoi le Yerusalem olopeny ena kimeita neitarasaki atua ngaik oo loreren.
Ore pikining' kuna, nikisai yook o iltung'anak le ine wueji, pemeilepaki Yerusalem.
Nealu Paulos: Ainyo pinjirishiri nikigiligili oltau? amu aidipakine, me paaeni ake, kake paitoki ae te Yerusalem tʼolbae lʼengarna Olaitoriani Yesus.
Ore eitu eisho yook mairorie, nikigira kijo: Njeaku enayeu Olaitoriani Yesus!
Ore peishunye kuna olong'i, nikintobirakino nikipuo Yerusalem.
Nepuonu te nebo o yook baiki laiteng'enuok ooje le Kaisarea, erikito yook enetii Mnason le Kupros, olaiteng'enuoni le opa; nikipuo aabik tʼengang' enye.
Ore pikibaia Yerusalem, neng'amu yook lalashera tʼeng'ida.
Nejing' Paulos te nebo o yook engaji e Yakobos; neiturrurro te ina alo ilpaiyani pookin.
Ore peidip ninye airoroki ninje, nelimu nabo nabo mbaak naitobira Engai tiatua loreren tʼenkisyayare enye.
Ore pening' ninje ena, neitadaraa Engai nejoki ninye: Idolita, lalashe, ke elfun aja naatii atua Yudayoi looiruk, nera kulo pookin shashauti, eibung' nkitanapat;
etolikioki ninje mbaak inono, ajo inteng'enita Yudayoi pookin lootii atua loreren, peing'ua Mose, nijo, pememurati nkera enye nemesuj orregie lenye.
Akae, kainyo ena? Meata kata nemeiturrurro esiamu, amu epuo aaning' ninje, aajo iewuo.
Akae, nyaaki, ntobira enikijoki iye! Kiata iltung'anak ong'wan ooata enkisiligata;
mbung'a lelo, tisinyai kion te nebo o ninje, njoo ngoshola, pebarn aten lukuny, peyolou pookin aajo ore mbaak naatolikioki te iye me toki, ore iye openy ishomo abaraki nimbung' nkitanapat.
Ore lairukok too loreren kitisirakitia nikingwenu, pemeibung' too nona entoki o nabo, kake njepaash ake enkidasare oo nkulie ain o osarge o natagoroki o mbaak torrok oo nkiri.

Neibung' Paulos kulo tung'anak nesinyaa kion o ninje tʼengolong' e are nejing' engaji sinyati aitaduaia enkitabaiaroto oo ngolong'i esinyaroto enye metabaiki neishori enkidasare tʼolbae lʼoltung'ani pookin lenye.
Ore peaku eishunye ngolong'i naapishana, nedol Yudayoi le Asia ninye etii atua engaji sinyati, neisis olorere pookin, neibung' ninye too ngaik nedar:

Lelea le Israel, entaretishoto! Eiteng'en ele tung'ani iltung'anak pookin too wuejitin pookin neibelie olorere lang' o nkitanapat o ene wueji; neinyaaka si ariku Ilgrikini atua engaji sinyati neitaa ene wueji torrono.
Amu etaduaki te nebo o ninye Trofimos le Efesos tiatua engang' nejo ninje, Paulos otorikuo ninye atua engaji sinyati.
Neng'ayung'ayu engang' pookin neiturrurro olorere, neibung' ninje Paulos neyetaki boo engaji sinyati; neigen! nabokata kutukajini.
Ore eing'oru eneiko, pear ninye metua, nebaiki mbaak olkitok lʼoltim, ajo eing'ole Yerusalem pookin;
neipot ninye nabokata sikerin o ilkituak nekwet nedoiki ninje; ore pedol ninje olkitok o sikerin, nepal ear Paulos.
Nenyikaki olkitok neoru ninye neitanapisho, peeni ninye too lpisia aare neikilikwanu: Kera ninye ng'ai? Kainyo etaasa?
Nejo kulekai tiatua esiamu kuna, nejo ilkulekai nona; neitu eidim ainoto esipata tʼolbae lʼenkiposhai neitanapisho, periki ninye engang' oo sikerin.
Ore pebaia riot engaji, nenap isikerin ninye tʼolbae lʼenkisimaroto olorere;
amu esujita esiamu olorere eishirita: Ntaiki ele enelakwa!
Ore eitijing'itai engang' oo sikerin, nejoki Paulos olkitok: Ke kinjo aairorie iye? Nejoki: Iyolo enkutuk oo Lgrikini?
Me iye le naarri Misri oaua enyaul too kuna olong'i nerik ang'ata le naarri tung'anak elfun ong'wan loora laarak?
Nejo Paulos: Ara nanu oltung'ani Oyudayos lʼengang' Tarsos te Kilikia, Oinoti lʼengang' nemera kinyi. Aasai, pikinjo mairorie olorere.
Neiruk. Neitashe Paulos te shumata oo riot engaji neroj olorere tʼengaina. Ore pegirai tukul, neirorie tʼenkutuk oo Lhebrayoi nejo:
Lelea, lalashera o loopapa, enining'oki, painosaki ndai emitunoto ai!
Ore pening' ninje, aajo eirorie ninje tʼenkutuk oo Lhebrayoi, nepon aagira. Nejo:

Ara nanu oltung'ani Oyudayos, aatoiwuoki te Tarsos, engang' e Kilikia, naaitubuluni te ina ang', naaiteng'eni too nkejek e Gamaliel reriot oo loopapa lang' abaraki, naaku olanyuani tʼEngai anaa ndai pookin taata;
Nainosie iltung'anak lʼena oitoi osina metabaiki enkea, aen napik ninje, leak o ng'oroyok, engaji erripore,
anaa paaijakenoki olaidasani kitok o laigwenak, kulo laaishoo mpala, panap enetii lalashera nalo Damaskos, pariku lootii ina alo eena metabaiki Yerusalem, peitamei ninje.
Ore aloito, nabaia enetaaniki Damaskos, euno engolong', naailang'aki nabokata lubot pookin enkilang'et kitok aing'ua shumata,
Nabatatakino enkop naning' oltoilo laajoki: Saul, Saul, ainyo pikimirita?
Naalu: Ira ng'ai, Laitoriani? Naajoki: Ara nanu Yesus le Nasaret likimirita iye.
Nedol kulo laataboitare nanu enkilang'et nejing' enkuretishu atua ninje, kake eitu ening' oltoilo lʼele laairorie nanu.
Najo: Kainyo alaitobir, Laitoriani? Naajoki Olaitoriani: Tudumunye, pilo Damaskos, nikilikini te ina alo pookin nikintanapaki iye, pintobir.
Ore pamadolisho nanu tʼolbae lʼenkiwuwuoto ena kilang'et, naaibung' laataboitare engaina ai nabaia Damaskos.
Nelotu enatii Ananias, oltung'ani supat too nkitanapat, oijakenokoki too Yudayoi pookin ootii ina alo;
neitashe naajoki: Lalashe Saul, tadolishoi! Nadol si nanu ninye te ina kata ake.
Nejo: Kitegelua Engai oo loopapa lang', pitum atayolo enayeu ninye nidol olopeny esupato nining' oltoilo oing'ua enkutuk enye,
amu iaku oljakeni lenye too ltung'anak pookin too kuna nitadua nining'.
Akae, kainyo taata pimutie? Nyototoi, pikimbatisi, peisujari nkitarruot inono nimpot engarna Olaitoriani.
Neaku ore paidip atorrinyoi Yerusalem nasaisho tʼengaji sinyati, napurrupurru Olmumua lai nadol ninye
aajoki: Sarisara, tupuku tasioi te Yerusalem! Amu meiruk ninje enjakenishu ino o mbaak ainei.
Najo: Laitoriani, etayoloutuo kulo, aajo ateena nanu naar too ngajijik Engai kulo pookin likiruko iye.
Ore peibukori osarge lʼoljakeni lino Stefanos, atii nanu, aitasheiki nairuk narripoki ninje looiminye ninye, ilkilani lenye.
Naajoki: Tudumunye, amu aairiwaa nanu iye enelakwa atua loreren.
Neinining' ninye metabaiki kulo rorei, neapaa iltoiloi lenye nejo: Ntupuku ele tʼena kop! amu meaku, peishiu.
Ore eoshito olodoo, neiturraki ilkilani lenye enelakwa neisuaki enterit shumata,
neitanapisho olkitok, periki ninye engang' oo sikerin, nejo, petem aar too nkeenda, peiye eyolou, ajo kainyo peishiraki neijia.
Ore eenita ninye too nkeenda, peari, nejoki Paulos olkigeluni obo oitasheiki ninye: Ke sidai too ndai, piariara oltung'ani ora Oromayos, eitu eigwenakini?
Ore pening' olkigeluni kuna, nelo enetii olkitok neinosaki ninye mbaak ejo: Ainyo iyeu nintobir? Amu era ele tung'ani Oromayos.
Nelotu olkitok nejoki ninye: Tolikioki, ten ake ira Oromayos? Nejo: Ee!
Nealiki olkitok: Ainoto nanu aaku Oromayos too ngoshola kumok. Nejo Paulos: Tʼeiunoto nanu.
Neing'uaiki ninye nabokata kulo lootayeutuo neikilikwan ninye. Neureishoi olkitok, etayolouo ninye, ajo Oromayos, tiaraki nateena.
Ore tʼengolong' e are eyeu neyolou esipata, ainyo peitang'oro Yudayoi ninye, nelaku ninye, neitanapu, peiturrurro laidasak kituak o enkigwena pookin, nerik Paulos neitasheye tʼempolos enye.
Nekurraki Paulos ngonyek enyena enkigwena nejoki: Lelea lalashera, atobiko nanu tʼoltau sidai pookin tʼengomom Engai metabaiki ena olong' e taata.
Neitanap olaidasani kitok Ananias looitashe o ninye, peosh enkutuk enye.
Nejoki Paulos: Kiar Engai iye, enjewata engaji naelaki tʼenturoto! Amaa itotona aigwenaki nanu too nkitanapat nilau iye nintanapu, paaoshi nanu?
Ore looitashe te nebo o ninye nejo: Imor olaidasani kitok lʼEngai?
Nejo Paulos: Eitu ayolo, lalashera, ajo era olaidasani kitok, amu etisiraki: Mirorie torrono olkitok lʼolorere lino!

Ore peyolou Paulos, ajo era ematua Sadukayoi, nera engai matua Ilfarisayoi, neapaa oltoilo lenye tiatua enkigwena ajo: Lelea lalashera, ara nanu Olfarisayos o enkerai Olfarisayos, aaigwenakini nanu too mbaak eanyunoto o enkitopiunoto oo lootuata.
Ore peidip airoro kuna, neaku enkitarrikino too Lfarisayoi o Sadukayoi nerisha esiamu.
Amu ejo Sadukayoi, aajo metii enkitopiunoto, metii ilmalaikan, metii ilmumuan; neibalu Ilfarisayoi pokira are.

Neaku olodoo kitok. Neinyototo layolok lʼesirata lʼematua oo Lfarisayoi negiluno nejo: Mikidol entorroni tiatua ele tung'ani, kake teni eiroro Olmumua te ninye arashu olmalaika, akae, nikindim aaing'orutu olarrabal lʼEngai.
Ore peaku enkitarrikino kitok, neureishoi olkitok lʼoltim, ajo epolos ninje Paulos, neitanapu, pedou oltim, peitupuku ninye tʼengolon tʼempolos enye, periki engang' oo sikerin.
Ore enkiarie natusuja neitasheiki Olaitoriani ninye nejo: Ntagoluoi, Paulos, tʼoltau, amu neijia anaa pikinjakenoko nanu te Yerusalem, meata kata nimikinjakenoki neijia baiki te Roma.
Ore pekenyu, neitobirakino Yudayoi ooje nediaro nejo, aajo menya nemeok metabana neidip aataar Paulos metua.
Etalang'a artam looiturujakinote nji.
Nepuonu ninje enetii laidasak kituak o laigwenak nejo: Kinturujakinote naleng', pimikinyorrinyor toki metabana nikiar Paulos metua.
Akae, ore ndai entiakiti olkitok lʼoltim o enkigwena, perikuni ninye taisere enitiiti, anaa ijo iyeuu niyolouu esipata oo mbaak enyena; ore si yook, epon eitu enyiku nikintobirakino aar metua.
Ore pening' enkerai enganashe e Paulos ele osek, nelotu nejing' atua engang' oo sikerin neliki Paulos.
Neipot Paulos olkigeluni obo nejo: Toriko ele barnoti enetii olkitok lʼoltim, eata mbaak naainosaki ninye.
Neibung' nerik enetii olkitok nejo: Aaipoto lido Paulos oena neyeu naarikoki ele barnoti, amu eata ororei likiliki.
Neibung' olkitok ninye engaina nerishunye nelo enkilepata neikilikwan ninye: Kakua baak iata, pikinosaki?
Nejo: Etaa nabo Yudayoi, pikisai iye, pirik Paulos taisere atua enkigwena anaa ijo eyeu neikilikwanishore.
Kake miruk iye ninje, amu eoseku too ninje iltung'anak oolang' artam looiturujakinote, pemenya nemeok metabana near ninye metua; eitobirakinote taata ninje neanyu enkitanapata ino.
Neitanapare olkitok olbarnoti neitanap, pemeliki oltung'ani, ajo etolikio kuna.
Neipot ilkigeluni aare nejo: Entobirakiti sikerin iip are oopuo Kaisarea o ntomoni naapishana lakedok loo mbartaishi o iip are loo remeta tʼesaa uni enkiarie;
njeitobiraki ninje mbartaishi, peilepakinye Paulos, perik aa bioto enetii Olaitoriani lʼolosho Feliks.
Nesir empalai nji:
Airoroki nanu Klaudios Lisias Olaitoriani kitok lʼolosho, Feliks.
Eibung'a Yudayoi ele tung'ani neyeu near ninye metua. Nalotu nanu o oltim naitau ninye, amu aatiakaki, ajo Oromayos.
Ore payeu nayolou enaitang'orie ninje, narik ninye enkigwena enye,
nadol ajo eitang'oroki too nkitarrikinot oo nkitanapat enye nemetii enkitang'oro nanang' arashu naenyeki ninye.
Ore paainosakini, ajo eoseku Yudayoi ooje, nairriu nabokata engang' ino, naitanap looitang'oro ninye, peiro mbaak enyena tʼengomom ino. Sere!
Akae, nerik isikerin Paulos anaa peitanapaki ninje kiarie metabaiki Antipatris;
ore enasirie neisho lakedok loo mbartaishi erubare ninye, nerrinyo ilkulekai engang' oo sikerin.
Ore pebaia ninje Kaisarea, neisho Olaitoriani lʼolosho empalai neitarasaki ninye baiki Paulos.
Ore peidip Olaitoriani aisoma empalai, neikilikwan, ke oltung'ani li aa balbal ninye. Ore peyolou, ajo era oltung'ani le Kilikia,
nejo: Aalaning' iye eetuo laitang'orok linono. Neitanapu, perripi ninye tiatua engaji enkigwena e Herodes.
Ore peishunye ngolong'i imiet, nedou olaidasani kitok Ananias te nebo o laigwenak o olairoroni Tertulos; eetuo ninje enetii Olaitoriani lʼolosho, peitang'or Paulos.
Ore peipoti ninye, neiter Tertulos aitang'or ninye nejo:
Tiaraki ninotoko yook eseriani kitok netaa mbaak sidan tʼele orere tʼenkishilaroto ino, king'amu yook nona ngolong'i pookin too wuejitin pookin, iye Feliks kitok, te ashe naleng'.
Kake pamapon aitanaur iye, aasai, pinining'u yook too nkuti tʼemborran ino.
Kinoto ele tung'ani ekurro eitera enkiposhai tiatua Yudayoi pookin lootii atua olmaa nera olaiturukoni Tesiamu oo Lnasarayoi,
netem baiki aitarruo engaji sinyati, nikimbung' nikiyeu nikingwenaki ninye too nkitanapat ang'.
Kake eewuo olkitok Lisias neitau ninye tʼengolon kitok tiatua ngaik ang'
neitanap laitang'orok, pepuonu enitii iye; nindim si iye aikilikwanu openy ninye, piyolou kuna pookin nikintang'orie ninye.
Neitang'or baiki Yudayoi ninye ejo: Neijia etiu!
Nealiki Paulos, eidipa Olaitoriani lʼolosho atoroja ninye, neiro: Tiaraki nayolo, ajo itaa, eiter too laritin kumok, olaigwenani lʼele orere, onaa ayeu namitu kion, maureisho.
Amu indim atayolo, ajo melang' ngolong'i tomon o are neba nailepaki Yerusalem asaisho.
Neitu aadol ninje tiatua engaji sinyati airorie oltung'ani arashu aing'oru enkisisa tʼesiamu arashu tʼengaji Engai arashu tʼengang',
nemeidim aaitisipai naaitangorie ninje taata.
Kake aibalu te iye ena, ajo aisyayaki tʼena oitoi, naipot ninje enkiteng'enare ng'ejuk, Engai oo loopapa lang', nairuk pookin natisiraki tiatua nkitanapat o tiatua layolounok,
naata eanyunoto tʼEngai, anaa peanyu si ninje oopeny, ajo elaaku enkitopiunoto oo lootuata, noo loora supati o noo lemera supati.
Naitamok nanu kion, paata eseriani oltau, metii entibili tukul, tʼengomom Engai o tʼengomom oo ltung'anak.
Ore peishunye laritin kumok, nalotu naaki olorere lai nkishoorot, o nkidasareitin.
Ore too nona naadol aaitisinyari tʼengaji sinyati, metii esiamu nemetii olodoo, kake Yudayoi ooje le Asia ootii;
meata kata nemetii ninje engomom ino, paaitang'or nanu, teni eata mbaak te nanu.
Arashu njelimu kulo oopeny, kaa kitarruoto etadua te nanu, aitasho tʼengomom enkigwena,
neme ele rorei obo lairoro, aitashe too ninje, ajo: Too mbaak enkitopiunoto oo lootuata aaigwenakini nanu taata too ndai!
Ore peidip Feliks atoning'o nena, neitaany enkigwena engai olong', amu etayolo abaraki ena oitoi, nejo: Teni elalotu olkitok Lisias, nadung' ororei linyi.
Neitanap olkigeluni, perrip Paulos, pemeinosie ninye osina nememitiki oltung'ani ora olenye elotu enetii.
Ore peishunye ngolong'i kuti, nelotu Feliks te nebo o eng'oroyoni enye Drusila nara Eyudayos, neipot Paulos nening' mbaak enkirukoto e atua Kristos Yesus.
Ore peiro Paulos mbaak esupato o nʼemitikinoto oo mbaak oo nkiri o nʼenkigwena nalotu, neureishoi Feliks nealiki: Nno taata, ore pebau enkata nanyor, naaitoki aipot iye.
Neanyu ninye baiki, ten ake eisho Paulos ninye ngoshola, peiye elaku ninye; onaa etopona aipot neirorie ninye.
Ore peishunye laritin aare, neaku Porkios Festos olasujani le Feliks. Neyeu Feliks neiting'id Yudayoi neing'ua Paulos eena.
Ore pebaia Festos embalbal enye, neilep, eishunyete ngolong'i uni, alo Yerusalem eing'ua Kaisarea.
Nepuonu laidasak kituak o Yudayoi kituak, peitang'or Paulos, neirorie ninye naleng'
neomon entoki empuris, peisho elotu ninye Yerusalem; neoseku, pear ninye tʼengoitoi metua.
Nealu Festos, ajo erripi Paulos te Kaisarea, netaana, peitoki alo ninye ang'.
Nejo: Entadou looidim te nebo o nanu, pintang'oring'oro ninye, teni etii entorroni tʼele tung'ani.
Ore peidip atobiko tʼempolos enye ngolong'i nemelang' isiet arashu tomon, nedoiyo alo Kaisarea; neton tʼengai olong' tʼolorika lʼenkigwena neitanapu, perikuni Paulos.
Ore pelotu, neitasheiki Yudayoi ootadoutuo eing'ua Yerusalem ninye, neau nkitang'orot kumok naairoshi nemeidim aaitagolo,
amu etomituo Paulos kion nejo: Me tʼolbae loo nkitanapat oo Yudayoi neme tʼolbae lʼengaji sinyati neme tʼolbae le kaisar eitu aitarruo toki.
Neyeu Festos neiting'id Yudayoi nealiki Paulos nejoki: Iyeu nilo iye Yerusalem, pikingwenakini te ina alo tʼolbae loo kuna baak tʼengomom ai?
Nejo Paulos: Aitashe nanu tʼengomom olorika le kaisar, ine wueji ake naaku, paaigwenakinyeki. Eitu aitarruoki Yudayoi anaa piyolo si iye naleng'.
Amu teni aitarruoiye arashu aitobira entoki nanang', maany ae; akae, teni me toki aaitang'orie kulo, maaidim oltung'ani aitarasaki ninje. Aipotie kaisar!
Ore peidip airorie Festos enkigwena, nealu: Impotie kaisar, ilo enetii kaisar.
Ore peishunye ngolong'i naaje, nebaia olkarsis Agripas o Bernike Kaisarea, peiroroki Festos.
Ore pebik ngolong'i kumok o ninye, neitayolo Festos olkarsis mbaak e Paulos nejo: Etii oltung'ani obo otung aiye Feliks eena.
Ore atii nanu Yerusalem, nepuonu laidasak kituak o laigwenak loo Yudayoi engomom ai naaomonu earata enye.
Naliki ninje, ajo me orregie loo Romayoi, peitarasari oltung'ani, peari metua, metii oloitang'oroki o looitang'or, peing'oraro ngomomi, neishori enkata namitunye kion too nena kitang'orot.
Akae, ore petumo te ine, eitu aimutie, naton tʼengolong' e are tʼolorika lʼenkigwena naitanapu, perikuni ilo tung'ani;
neitasheiki ninye kulo looitang'oro ninye neitu elimu anaa paibirribirrua, ororei torrono.
Kake eata ake nkitarrikinot naaje te ninye nʼenkisyayare Engai enye o nʼoltung'ani obo Yesus lotua loimaka Paulos, ajo eishiu.
Ore peitu ayolo enaiko tʼolbae Perishare oo kuna kitarrikinot, naikilikwan ninye, ten ake eyeu nelo Yerusalem, peigwenakini te ina alo too kuna baak.
Kake ore peipotoki Paulos kion, perripokini enkigwena e kaisar, naitanapisho, perripi metabana nairriwaa enetii kaisar.
Nejoki Agripas Festos: Ayeu si nanu nainining' ele tung'ani. Nejo si ninye: Ilainining' taisere.
Ore enasirie nepuonu Agripas o Bernike tʼenkitook kitok nejing' engaji enkigwena te nebo o ilkituak loo ltimito o ilkituak lʼengang', neitanapisho Festos, perikuni Paulos.

Nejo Festos: Olkarsis Agripas o ndai lelea pookin litiiti e nebo o yook, idolitata ele tung'ani laatayeuokitio esiamu pookin oo Yudayoi enatii, te Yerusalem o tʼene, eapaa iltoiloi, aajo meaku, pepon aishiu.
Ore padol si nanu, ajo eitu eitobir ororei lonang' neipotoki ninye openy kion kaisar, naigwenu, pairriwaa ninye.
Namaata mbaak enyena naaitoriori nasiraki olaitoriani. Onaa atorikuo ninye engomom inyi, ore naleng' engomom ino, olkarsis Agripas, peiye ore peaku nkikilikwanat, natum ororei pasir;
amu adol, ajo meaku, peirriwari oloena nemetii entoki naitang'orieki ninye.
Nejoki Agripas Paulos: Kinjori pilimu rorei tʼolbae lino. Neitorioo Paulos engaina, pemitu kion, nejo:
Lekarsis Agripas, ating'ide, tiaraki naidim atomitu kion tʼengomom ino taata too mbaak pookin naaitang'orie Yudayoi,
nang'ida naleng', tiaraki niyolo iye rregiei o nkitarrikinot pookin atua Yudayoi; onaa aasai iye, pikinining'u tʼemborran.
Eyolo Yudayoi pookin empuan ai eiter tʼenkeraishu, ati neba tʼenkiterata atua olorere lai te Yerusalem,
laatayoloutuo neba opa, teni enyorru aaijakenutu; amu atobiko anaa Olfarisayos loibung' orregie ogol naleng' lʼenkisyayare Engai ang'.
Ore taata aitashe naaigwenakini t'olbae lʼeanyunoto enkisiligata naishoo Engai loopapa lang',
ore te ina eanyu nkishomitie ang' tomon o are nenyok aasaisho dama o kiarie peaku. Ore tʼolbae le ina anyunoto aaitang'or Yudayoi, lekarsis.
Ainyo pemeirukoi too ndai, aajo eitopiu Engai lootuata?
Atejo nanu tiatua kion, ajo meata kata namaitobir mbaak kumok, pamit engarna e Yesus le Nasaret;
anaa paikuna te Yerusalem, ateena sinyat kumok tʼengaji erripore, aidipa ainoto engolon too laidasak kituak; atang'arie si nanu enkigwena, earitai ninje metuata.
Naitame ninje aigil kumok tiatua ngajijik Engai kumok naaraki ninje, pemorisho; ore aareota engoro naleng', naar ninje baiki tiatua ngang'itie oo nkwapi.
Ore te ina aloito Damaskos, aata engolon o enkitanapata oo laidasak kituak,
euno engolong', lekarsis, nadol tʼengoitoi enkilang'et naing'ua shumata nelang' enkilang'et engolong', naailang'aki nanu o lʼemboitei ai.
Nikibatatakino yook pookin enkop, naning' oltoilo laairorie nanu ojo too rorei lʼenkutuk oo Lhebrayoi: Saul, Saul, ainyo pikimirita? Egol te iye piruaia olkikarret.
Najo nanu: Ira ng'ai, Laitoriani? Nejo Olaitoriani: Ara nanu Yesus likimirita iye. Kake tudumunye, pintashe too nkejek inono.
Onaa aaipung'oko, paaitaa iye olaisyayani o oljakeni loo kuna baak nitadua o nikipuoi aaitadol;
nayeu naaitopok iye tiatua ele orere o tiatua kulekai oreren, naairriwaki iye taata enetii kulo,

pibol ngonyek enye nimbelekeny ninje, peing'ua enaimin nebaiki enkilang'et, peing'ua engolon e satan aapuo enetii Engai, peng'amu enkitaunoto oo nkitarruot o enjung'o te nebo o kulo loosinyari tʼenkirukoto naairuk nanu.
Neitu amen si nanu ena kitaduaroto e shumata, lekarsis Agripas,
kake ainosaka tʼenkata elukunya lootii Damaskos o Yerusalem o atua olosho pookin loo Yudayoi o too kulekai oreren, peala neibelekenyakino Engai, peitobir nkyasin sidan enkitaalata.
Ore tʼolbae loo nona naaibung' Yudayoi tiatua engaji sinyati neyeu naar matua.
Akae, ore tʼeretokinoto Engai natii metabaiki ena olong' e taata naijakenisho too lkutiti o too lkituak namairo o nyoo neme enairo layolounok o Mose, peaku neijia,
aajo eitamei Kristos neaku olaiturukoni tiatua empiunoto oo lootuata neinosaki olorere lenye o kulekai oreren mbaak enkilang'et.
Ore emitu ninye kion nji, nejo Festos tʼoltoilo kitok: Iata oloirirua, Paulos! Kintaa eng'eno kitok, pitum oloirirua.
Nejo Paulos: Maata oloirirua, Festos kitok, kake alimu rorei lʼesipata o lʼentemet.
Amu eyolo olkarsis kuna pookin nairo tʼengomom enye tʼeng'ida, nayolo, ajo meisudoroi te ninye ororei o obo too kulo, amu eitu eaku kuna baak t'embata.
Lekarsis Agripas, iruk iye layolounok? Ayolo, ajo iruk.
Nejoki si ninye Agripas: Paulos, ore too nkuti kisis si nanu, paaku Olkristianos.
Nejo Paulos: Ayeu tʼengomom Engai, too nkuti arashu too nkumok, peaku me iye ake, kake pookin laainining'ito taata, anaa nanu, metii kuna eneta.
Ore peidip airoro ninye kuna, nedumunye olkarsis o Olaitoriani lʼolosho o Bernike o loototonitio te nebo o ninje,
nepuo embata neirorioro oopeny nejo: Eitu eitaas ele tung'ani entoki nanang' arashu enaenyeki.
Nejoki Agripas Festos: Anaata elakuni ele tung'ani, ten emutu eitu eipotoki kion kaisar.
Ore peigwenakini, pikipuo yook tʼengalawa metabaiki Italia, neitarasakini Paulos o ilkulekai looena olkigeluni obo, oji engama enye Yulios, lʼoltim le kaisar.
Nikilepaki engalawa e Adramiteno, natayeuo nalo ngang'itie naatii embata e Asia; netii e nebo o yook Aristarkos le Makedonia, lʼengang' Tesalonike.
Ore tʼengolong' e are nikibaia Sidon; neitobiraki Yulios Paulos nʼemborran neisho ninye, pelo enetii iljorueta lenyena, pesaru ninye too yeunot.
Ore pikindip aatung'ai ina alo, nikiim abori e Kupros, tiaraki narriny yook enkijape.
Nikiim olbalbal le Kilikia o Pamfilia nikibaia engang' Mira e Likia.
Nedol te ina alo olkigeluni engalawa e Aleksandria naloito Italia, neilepakinye yook.
Ore pikipuo akiti, nikibaia too ngolong'i kumok tʼosina Knidos, nemitiki yook enkijape, nikiim abori e Krete nikibaia Salmone,
nikiporoo ninye tʼosina nikipuonu ewueji neji Enkutoto sidai, netaaniki engang' Lasaya.
Ore peishunye ngolong'i kumok neitoki aaku osina kitok kipuo tʼolbalbal, eima enkata napukori, neitayolo Paulos
nejoki ninje: Lelea, adol, ajo elaata elʼlototo lʼengalawa osina kitok, me loo masaa o lʼengalawa ake, kake baiki lʼempuan ang'.
Kake eiruko olkigeluni olaiturukoni o olopeny engalawa nelang' kuna naairoro Paulos.

Tiaraki neme sidai enkutoto, pebik te ina alo tʼenkata enkirobi, neyeu ilkumok neing'ua ina alo, pebaia Foiniks, pebik te ina alo tʼenkata enkirobi, nera enkutoto e Krete natii erishata eunore o endoiyoroto engolong' o erishata endoiyoroto engolong' o shumata.
Ore pekutishoi enkijape eunore engolong', nejo ninje einoto enatayeutuo, nedotu eenet neim enetaaniki Krete naleng'.
Ore tʼenkiti kata nekut enkijape nadumisho, neitu edamu ninje, naimua erishata enkilepunoto engolong' o shumata.
Ore peibung'i engalawa neitu eidim aitoriokinore enkijape, nikinjo metanapi yook.
Nikipuo aasioki embata oloigeruno loji Klauda, nikitum tʼosina aaibung'a embout,
nikidumu ninye, peretoki yook, nikien engalawa ang' abori too nkeenda; ore pikiurei, aajo kidoiki atua Sirtis, nikintadou rasheta enkijape, nenapi yook neijia.
Ore pekut yook enkijape naleng', neiter aaiturraa ninje tʼengolong' e are masaa.
Ore tʼengolong' e uni nikinturraki too ngaik ang' nareta engalawa enelakwa.
Neitu elioi engolong' o lakir too ngolong'i kumok neiposhita yook enkijape neme kiti, neish osiligi lʼempuan too yook.
Ore peitu enya ninje endaa ngolong'i kumok neitashe Paulos tʼempolos enye nejoki ninje: Lelea, anaata kitoning'o nanu, pimidotutu te Krete, pikitum ele sina o enkiminata oo masaa.
Kake ore taata, adiding' ndai, entagolo iltauja, amu meimin o obo tiatua ndai, neme engalawa ake.
Amu aaitasheikio tʼena kiarie olmalaika lʼEngai nara olenye, naa ninye oshi aisyayaki nanu,
nejo: Miureisho, Paulos, meata kata nimintashe tʼengomom e kaisar! Naa ng'orai, kinyaaka aisho iye Engai pookin liboitare tʼolototo.
Onaa, lelea, entagolo iltauja, amu airuk Engai, ajo eaku neijia anaa paatiakaki.
Kake meata kata nimikibaiki oloigeruno obo.
Ore pebau enkiarie e tomon o ong'wan, nenapi yook ngaloli pookin tiatua olbalbal Adria, nejo iltung'anak lʼengalawa tʼempolos e kiarie, etaaniki olosho.
Neitadou entemet, netum ntemeta tikitam; ore penyikaa peno, neitoki aitadou entemet, netum ntemeta tomon o imiet.
Neureishoi, pemeitabaari yook enetii soito; neitadoiyo eneta ong'wan tekurum engalawa, neyeu nekenyu.
Ore peyeu iltung'anak lʼengalawa nekwet aaing'ua engalawa neitadoiki embout atua olbalbal anaa looyeu neitadoiki eenet lukunya engalawa,
nejoki Paulos olkigeluni o sikerin: Teni mebik kulo tiatua engalawa, nimindimidimi aatopok ndai.
Nedung' isikerin nkeenda embout neisho edoiyo.
Ore pekenyu enasirie, nediding' Paulos pookin, penya endaa nejo: Era taata engolong' e tomon o ong'wan, itaanyishote nitonini neitu inyanya endaa, neitu intubutubu nkutukie.
Onaa adiding' ndai, pinyanya endaa, amu eaku ena nʼenkitopuata inyi; amu medoiyo olpapita o obo too lukuny inyi.
Ore peidip atejo kuna, neibung' olmkate neliki Engai ashe tʼengomom oo pookin, negiligil neiter anya.
Negolu iltauja pookin nenya si ninje endaa.
Nikiaku pookin looishiu tiatua engalawa iip are o ntomoni naapishana o ile.
Ore peidip aataraposhoto, neiteneneng' engalawa neiturraki endaa dorrop atua olbalbal.
Ore pekenyu, neitu eyolou ninje olosho, kake etadua olkutoto loata embata sidai olosho, neyeu neitijing' engalawa atua, ten ake eaku.
Nedung' eneta neing'ua tiatua olbalbal neitololong' nkeenda eriket engalawa neilepakinye olkarash lʼenkijape nepuoiye embata olosho.
Ore pebaia ewueji neata too mbat pokira are olbalbal, nenang'ari engalawa neitirrishi lukunya neitashe neitu eing'unung'un, nedanya kurum tʼengolon enkiposhai.
Neigwena sikerin, peari looena metuata, pemepor oltung'ani engare ailanyisho.
Kake etayeuo olkigeluni neitopok Paulos nemitiki ninje, pemeitobir enatayeutuo neitanapu, penang'akino aang'as kulo olbalbal ooyolo aatapor engare, pebaia olosho;
ore lootelekutua nejing' kulekai shumata oo mbaon o kulekai shumata oo nareta engalawa. Neaku nji netum aatabai pookin aa biot atua olosho.
Ore pikindip aatopoku, nikiyolou, aajo eji engarna oloigeruno Melite.
Neitobiraki yook loomanya nʼempuris enye oopeny: neinok enkima neitoomon yook pookin, tiaraki natasha enjan o tʼolbae lʼenkirobi.
Ore peiturrur Paulos orridati loo lkeek nepik atua enkima, nepuku olasurai tʼenkirowuaj neibung' engaina enye.
Ore pedol kulo tung'anak olasurai eililiokino engaina enye, neirorioro oopeny: Esipa, era ele tung'ani olarani, etopokua tiatua olbalbal, kake meisho elaata oo ntorrok, peishiu.
Nenang'aki ninye ake olowuaru atua enkima neitu etum entorroni.
Neanyu kulo peiju arashu erria nabokata etua. Ore peidip aataanyu naleng', nedol, aajo meaku toki, neibelekenya nejo ninje, aajo ninye Engai.
Ore enemanita ene netii nkuruman olkitok lʼoloigeruno oji engarna enye Publios, otang'amua yook neitaa yook lomon lenyena ngolong'i uni.
Neaku eirraga menye le Publios tʼerruat neata oltikana nerotu osarge; nejing' Paulos enetii nesaisho neiteleiki ngaik neishiunye ninye.
Ore peidip aataa kuna, nepuonu ilkulekai loomoiyaa tiatua oloigeruno neishiunyeki.
Neitaa ninje yook kituak tʼenkitook kitok. Ore pikipuo, neilepakinye yook ntokitin naabaiki yook.
Ore peishunye lapaitin okuni, nikipuo tʼengalawa e Aleksandria natobiko, tʼengalo oloigeruno tʼenkata enkirobi neata olponoto lenye: Ilmao.
Ore pikipuonu Sirakusai, nikibik ngolong'i uni.
Nikimanaa king'ua ina alo nikibaia Region. Ore peishunye engolong' nabo, nekutunye enkijape eunore engolong' nikipuonu tʼengolong' e are Puteoli.
Nikinepu te ina alo lalashera nesai ninje yook, pikibik ngolong'i naapishana. Nikibau tekurum Roma.
Ore pening' lalashera le ina alo mbaak ang', nepuonu aatumore yook te Apioforum o Trestaberne. Ore pedol Paulos ninje, neliki Engai ashe negolu.
Ore pikibaia Roma, neitarasaki olkigeluni looena olkitok lʼoltim. Neishori Paulos metotona tʼewueji enye openy te nebo o osikeri obo orripito.

Ore peishunye ngolong'i uni, neipot Paulos ilkituak loo Yudayoi. Ore pepuonu, nejoki ninje: Lelea, lalashera, eitu aitobir entoki torrono tiatua olorere lang' arashu tʼorregie loo loopapa lang', naarikuni ake aena te Yerusalem naaitarasakini atua ngaik oo Romayoi.
Ore paaidip aaikilikwana kulo, neyeu naalaku, amu metii entoki nanang' atua nanu.
Kake ore peing'unyung'unyaki Yudayoi ninje, naaitagolikini, paipotoki kion kaisar, me anaa Oloata ororei laitang'orie olorere lai.
Onaa aipoto ndai, paduare nairorie ndai; amu tʼolbae lʼeanyunoto e Israel aamanita ele pisiai.
Nejoki lelo: Eitu king'amu yook empalai tʼolbae lino, eing'ua Yudaya, nemetii oltung'ani tiatua lalashera oewuo ene, peinosaki neliki yook mbaak torrok te iye.
Kake kinyor aatoning' te iye eniata, amu kitayoloutuo te ina kiteng'enare ng'ejuk aajo eing'unyung'unyakini ninye too wuejitin pookin.

Nedung'oki ninje ninye engolong' nepuonu ilkumok engaji enye natii, neitayolo neijakenoki ninje enkarsishu Engai neinosaki mbaak e Yesus tiatua nkitanapat e Mose o tiatua layolounok, eiter enasirie metabaiki teipa.
Neiruk ematua enairoro ninye, neitu eiruk kulekai.
Ore peitarrikino ninje tʼempolos enye, nepuo, eidipa Paulos airoro ororei obo: Sidai enatiaka Olmumua Sinyati loopapa lang' tʼenkutuk olayolounoni Yesaya
nejo: Nno enetii ele orere, piro: Ipuopuo aaning' too nkiyaa nimiyolouu, nipuopuo aaing'oraa too ngonyek nimidolidolo;
amu epising'a oltau lʼele orere neiroshi nkiyaa enye tʼening'ore, neiturukuny ngonyek enye, pemepuo aadol too ngonyek nemening' too nkiyaa nemetum eng'eno too ltauja, peala, paitopok.
Akae, entayolo, ajo eirriwakaki enkitopuata Engai loreren, nepuo aaning' ninje.
Ore eirorita kuna, nepuo Yudayoi, eata nkikilikwanat kumok tʼempolos enye.
Nebik Paulos tʼengaji enye nainyang'ua emanyata enkata oo larin aare oolulung'a neng'amu pookin ootijing'a engaji enye,
neinosu enkarsishu Engai neiteng'enu tʼeng'ida pookin mbaak e Yesus Kristos nememitikini.
Paulos, osinga le Yesus Kristos, oipotoki metaa olairriwani, netegeluaki peinosu lomon sidan lʼEngai,
ootang'asa Engai aisilig too layolounok tiatua esirata sinyati,
tʼolbae lʼOinoti lenye, otoiwuoki tʼeishoi e David tʼempukunoto oo nkiri,
neitaduaki tʼengolon, ajo era Oinoti lʼEngai tʼempukunoto Olmumua osinyaa, neba empiunoto too lootuata, lora Yesus Kristos, Olaitoriani lang'.
Kinoto te ninye engaripo o enkirriwaroto, penyor aairuko loolamita Engai pookin Tengarna enye,
nirara si ndai tiatua lelo ooipotuo Yesus Kristos: —
enitiiti ndai pookin ootii Roma, loonyor Engai, ooipotoki metaa sinyat. Njebikie ndai eng'adunoto o eseriani naing'ua Engai Papa lang', o Olaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos.
Ang'as aliki Engai ai ashe, tiatua Yesus Kristos tʼolbae linyi pookin, tiaraki nalikiori enkirukoto inyi tiatua olmaa pookin.
Amu ore Engai naisyayaki tiatua Olmumua lai nalikioo lomon sidan lʼOinoti lenye, naa ninye oljakeni lai, padamu oshi ake ndai
tiatua sayat ainei, naomonu anake eaku, palotu enitiiti, teni eyeu Engai.
Amu ayeu naleng' nadol ndai, patum aishoo ndai enkishooroto emumuaishu, aitagol ndai,
eji paailejileji nanu te nebo o ndai tʼenkirukoto inyi o enai, nikiatakino.
Mayeu nimiyololo ndai, lalashera, ajo aibung'a aigil kumok alotu enitiiti, naamitikini metabaiki taata, patum ilmomo baiki tiatua ndai, anaa baiki tiatua kulekai oreren.
Aata nanu esile oo Lgrikini o noo nkwapi, noo lang'eni o noo lemera lang'eni.
Ore te nanu aitobirakine, painosaki si ndai tiatua Roma lomon Peng'ida.
Amu makurru nanu too lomon Peng'ida le Kristos; amu era ninje engolon Engai, peaku enkitopuata oltung'ani pookin oiruk, ang'as en Oyudayos neitoki en Olgriki.
Amu eboluni tiatua ninje esupato Engai naing'ua enkirukoto nejing atua enkirukoto, anaa petisiraki: Elaishiu osupat tʼenkirukoto.
Amu etabolokoki engoro Engai naing'ua shumata entorroni pookin o empaashata esupato oo ltung'anak looibok esipata tiatua empaashata esupato,
amu enayolouni tʼEngai neibala too ninje; amu eitadua Engai ninje kuna.
Amu eyolouni ntokitin enyena nemelio, nera enkidimata enye oo nkatan pookin o engaishu, tʼenkitobirata olmaa, nelioi too nkyasin enyena; onaa, meata ninje emitunoto.
Tiaraki natayoloutuo Engai, kake eitu eitadaraa ninye anaa Engai neitu eliki ashe; kake eibelekenyate tiatua ndamunot enye, neitoipoki iltauja lenye aaku enaimin.
Nejo aten aa ng'eni, neaku ninje moda.
Neibelekeny enkitook Engai nemeata erruoroto naitanyanyukie emua oltung'ani loata erruoroto, o en oo ntaritik, o en oo ng'wesi oo nkejek ong'wan, o en oo ng'wesi naaikurtutari.
Akae, eitarasaka Engai ninje tiatua ilng'warrat loo ltauja lenye atua olduruki, peitobir aten too seseni lenye nʼenkurruna.
Amu ninje ooibelekenya esipata atua elejare, neitaa kitok neisyayaki enkitobirata aaitalang' olaitobirani, oitadarari nkatan pookin.
Onaa, eitarasaka Engai ninje atua ilng'warraitin lʼenkurruna, amu ore ng'oroyok enye eibelekenya orregie oishiaakino aaitaa orregie lemeishiaakino;
neijia si eikuna leak, etung'aitie orregie oitoriori te nebo o eng'oroyoni, neinokino aten too lng'warraitin lenye, leak o leak, neas mbaak enkurruna, netum olkwaje orisiore enkiminata enye.
Neijia anaa petanyaita aatayolou Engai, neijia eitarasaka Engai atua ndamunot naariwuo metaasa enemeitoriori,
neigany mesupato pookin o entalare o empiani o entorroni, loobore olom, earata metua, enjangar, olosek, esayet, enkisuro,
looiteeniki, looiba Engai, looitai loikop, loowuasa, looilash, looiminye, lemening' lootoiutuo ninje,
lootolo, lemeibung' osotua, lemeata enyorrata, lemeing'uaikino, lemeata engoshoke nanana.
Eyolo ninje esupato Engai, aajo ore kulo looas nona, nenarikino enkea, kake neme ninje oopeny ooas, eshipakino baiki ilkulekai ooas.
Onaa, miata emitunoto, oltung'ani pookin eigwenaki; amu eningwenakinye olekai, ningwenakinye kion, amu intobir kuna ningwenaki.
Kake kiyolo, aajo era enkigwena Engai esipata too kulo looiko neijia.
Kake ijo aa iye, letung'ani, oigwenaki looitobir kuna nintobir si iye, ijo ilakwet iye enkigwena Engai?
Arashu imen endupoto emborran enye o olng'iria o olgira? Miyolo, ajo kirikoki emborran Engai enkirridunoto?
Kake inturrurroki iye kion tʼengogong'i ino o tʼoltau leitu eala engoro tʼengolong' engoro o embolunoto enkigwena supat Engai,
nalaisho oltung'ani pookin noo nkitobirat enyena:
kulo looing'oru tʼolng'iria loo nkitobirat sidan empuan nemeiting', enkitadararoto o enkitaaroto enkitook;
kake kulo loora ilkiminjal lʼolarrabal nemening' esipata nening' nemera esupato, engoro o enairowua.
Enkilishoto o osina Olmumua pookin oitobir ntorrok, ang'as lʼOyudayos, baiki lʼOlgriki;
enkitadarraroto o enkitaaroto enkitook o eseriani oltung'ani pookin oitobir sidan, ang'as Oyudayos, baiki Olgriki.
Amu meing'oraa Engai entemet oltung'ani.
Amu ore lelo ooitarruoitie meata nkitanapat, nepuo aaimin meata nkitanapat, o lelo ooitarruoitie tiabori oo nkitanapat, nepuoi aaigwenaki too nkitanapat.
Amu me looning' nkitanapat era supati tʼengomom Engai, kake looitobir ninje, nepuo aaku supati.
Amu teni eitobir loreren lemeyolo Engai, lemeata nkitanapat, tʼentonai enye openy nkitanapat, neaku ninje, lemeata nkitanapat, nkitanapat enye oopeny,
neitadolu ninje, aajo etisiraki enkyas oo nkitanapat tiatua iltauja lenye, neijakenu oltoilo lʼoltau lenye, baiki ndamunot naaitang'oro nemitikino;
te ina olong' naigwenakinye Engai nkisudorot oo ltung'anak te Yesus Kristos, tʼerisioroto oo lomon lʼeng'ida lainei.
Akae, ng'orai, iye likiji Oyudayos niimany nkitanapat ning'idare Engai,
niyolo eyeunoto enye; ore tiaraki nikindipaki aaiteng'ena tiatua nkitanapat, nileen enara sidai, peitobiri,
nijo indim ataa Olarikoni loo lmodook, enkilang'et oo kulo ootoni tiatua enaimin,
olashukoni loo lʼmoda, olaiteng'enani loo nkera naashal, olotiu anaa jartani tiatua eyolounoto o esipata oo nkitanapat.
Kake inteng'en olekai niminteng'en kion? Inosaki, ajo mipurrisho, nipurrisho iye openy?
Ijo, miar enkidikidikoto olmoruo o eng'oroyoni, niar iye ninye? Ira iye oiba nkulie ain, nioru enkitook Engai?
Iimany nkitanapat, nintukurru Engai ipaashare nkitanapat?
Amu „tʼolbae linyi emori engarna Engai tiatua lemeata Engai“, anaa petisiraki.
Amu edupa emurata, teni imbung' nkitanapat; kake teni mimbung' nkitanapat, indipa ataa olememurata, baiki teni kitumurataki.
Ore teni eibung' olememurata esupato oo nkitanapat, ke meikeni ninye, ajo etumurataki?
Akae, kilaigwenaki ele, leitu emurati tʼosesen neibung' nkitanapat, iye, litii atua esirata o emurata nipaashare nkitanapat.
Amu me ninye Oyudayos ora Oyudayos oriong', nemera ina emurata, naitobiri too nkiri,
kake ilo, lora Oyudayos tiatua, naa ina emurata oltau, naitobiri tʼolmumua, me tʼesirata. Ore oloikununo nji, neitadarari ninye tʼEngai, me too ltung'anak.
Kaa dupoto eata Yudayoi? Anai kedupa sa emurata nyoo?
Edupa naleng' tʼorregie pookin. Ore tʼenkiterata, eishooki ninje rorei lʼEngai.
Kake teni eitu eiruk kulekai, keibelekeny eanyata enye enkirukoto Engai?
Me neijia. Njoo Engai metisipai neaku oltung'ani pookin olalejani, anaa petisiraki: pekintaai supat too rorei linono nigilu tʼenkata nikingwenakinyeki.
Kake, teni eitabaia mesupato ang' esupato Engai, kijo nyoo? ke Engai nemera supat, tiaraki nagoro? (Airo tʼorregie loo ltung'anak.)
Me neijia. Amu kaji eiko ten eidim Engai aigwenaki olmaa?
Amu teni epon elejare ai esipata Engai neaku nʼenkitook enye, ainyo paaigwenakini ade anaa olaitarruoni?
Meikash pekinko anaa pemori yook neimaki yook kulekai pekijo yook: maitobira ntorrok, peaku ade sidan? ore earata natum ninje, neitoriori.
Ainyo naa? Kidupo yook aalang' ilkulekai? Me neijia katukul. Kitang'asa duo aaitadolu, aajo etii pokira are, Yudayoi o Ilgrikini, tiabori oo nkitarruot,
anaa petisiraki: Metii olora supat o obo,
nemetii oltung'ani ng'en nemetii oloing'oru Engai.
Amu etalamate pookin neaku pookin serserin, nemetii oloitobir sidan o obo.
Ore olgos lenye, naa enkurare nabolo, eiro too lng'ejepa lenye elejare, netii esayet oo lasuria tiabori oo njonito oo nkutukie enye,
nebore enkutuk enye endiata o enduaran,
nekwet ngejek enye aaibukoo osarge,
netii enkiminata o osina ngoitoi enye,
nemeyolo engoitoi eseriani,
nemeata enkuretishu Engai tʼengomom oo ngonyek enye.
Kiyolo, aajo enalimu nkitanapat, neliki kulo ootii atua nkitanapat, peiye enuki enkutuk pookin, neauni oltung'ani pookin atua enkigwena Engai;
Amuoretoo nkitobirat oo nkitanapat, meitaai supat enkiring'o o nabo tʼengomom enye. Amu too nkitanapat elotu eyolounoto oo nkitarruot.
Akae, etalie taata esupato Engai, metii nkitanapat, naijakenuoki too nkitanapat o too layolounok,
esupato Engai nataa tʼenkirukoto e atua Yesus Kristos tiatua pookin looiruk. Amu metii ene erishata:
eitarruoitie ninje pookin neitong'or enkitook Engai
neaku supati pesho, tʼeng'adunoto enye, tʼelakunoto tiatua Kristos Yesus
loitera apik Engai, peaku enkidasare enkitobirakinoto tʼenkirukoto tiatua osarge lenye, peaku olponoto lʼesupato enye tʼenkitaunoto oo nkitarruot, naatobiko metabaiki taata tiatua olng'iria lʼEngai,
peaku olponoto lʼesupato enye tʼena kata e taata, peaku ninye supat neitaa supat oloiruk Yesus.
Akae, kaji etii enkitadararoto? Eitaiyoki. Ke ti aa kitanapata? Noo nkitobirat? Me neijia, kake tʼenkitanapata enkirukoto.
Onaa kijo yook, aajo eitaai oltung'ani supat tʼenkirukoto, metii nkitobirat oo nkitanapat.
Ore Engai, ke Engai oo Yudayoi ake? Me Engai oo loreren lemeyolo ninye si? Ee, baiki noo lelo oreren.
Tiaraki naa Engai nabo, naitaa supat lʼemurata tiatua enkirukoto o lememurata tʼolbae lʼenkirukoto.
Ke kinturraa nkitanapat tʼolbae lʼenkirukoto? Me neijia, kake kintasheye nekua kitanapat.
Akae, kijo aa, kainyo einoto Papa lang' Abraham tʼorregie lʼosesen?
Kijo nji: Teni eitaaki Abraham supat too nkitobirat, neata enkitadararoto, kake me tʼengomom Engai.
Kake kejo aa esirata? Ejo: Eiruko Abraham Engai, neikenakini ninye esupato.
Kake ilo oas nkitobirat, meikenakini olkwaje tʼempuris, kake tʼenarikinoto.
Ore ilo lemeitobirisho, kake eiruk oloitaa supat olaitarruoni, neikenakini enkirukoto enye esupato.
Neijia anaa pejo si David, ajo eata ilo tung'ani enteshishu, oikenaki Engai esupato, metii nkitobirat,
nejo: Teshi looitaikiaki ntorrok enye neopori nkitarruot enye.
Tesh oltung'ani lemeikenaki Olaitoriani enkitarruoto.
Ore ena teshishu, ke en oo lekua oomurata ake, arashu noo lememurata si? Meata kata nimikijo: eikenakaki Abraham enkirukoto enye esupato.
Kanu eikenakaki? Kemurata arashu memurata? me tʼemurata, kake eton eitu emurata.
Etang'amua olponoto lʼemurata aaku olmishire lʼesupato naing'ua enkirukoto, naata ninye eton eitu emurata, peiye eaku ninye menye loo pookin looiruk lememurata, neikenakini si ninje esupato;
peitoki aaku menye lʼemurata, me loo lekua oomurata ake, kake oopuoiye baiki roruat enkirukoto, natii atua Papa lang' Abraham te ina kata eton eitu emurata.
Amu eitu etum Abraham o eishoi enye ina kisiligata, ajo eaku olajung'oni lʼolmaa, too nkitanapat, kake tʼesupato enkirukoto.
Amu teni eitaai lekua ooata nkitanapat lajung'ok, neitaai en e pesho enkirukoto, ore enkisiligata, nemekure aa enkisiligata.
Amu eau nkitanapat engoro, amu enemetii nkitanapat, nemetii empaashata.

Akae, meata kata nemelotu esupato aing'ua enkirukoto, peaku nʼeng'adunoto, netum ataa ina kisiligata eata engolon tʼeishoi pookin, me te ina ake natii abori oo nkitanapat, kake baiki te ina naata enkirukoto anaa Abraham, lora Papa lang' pookin
(anaa petisiraki: Aatipika iye, piaku menye loo loreren kumok), tʼengomom Engai, neiruk ninye eitopiu lootuata neipot nekua nemetii, petii.
Neiruko, metii eanyunoto, neanyu ajo elaaku menye loo loreren kumok tʼolbae lʼororei otiakaki ninye: Neijia eaku eishoi ino.
Neitu eshalu tiatua enkirukoto, neitu eing'oraa osesen lenye oidipe atua, amu etaa enkitook enye anaa larin iip, neitu eing'oraa si enkea engoshoke e Sara.
Amu eitu eing'arrirrore enkisiligata Engai anaa lemeiruk, kake einoto engolon tiatua enkirukoto neitaa Engai kitok,
neitagolieki naleng' te ina, ajo eata Engai enkidimata naitobirie enaisiligishe.
Onaa, eikenakaki ninye esupato.
Kake eitu esiri nona tʼolbae lenye ake, ajo eikenakaki ninye,
kake baiki tʼolbae lang', peikenakini si yook, teni kiruk ele, oitopiwuo Yesus Kristos too lootuata,
loishoruaki tʼolbae loo nkitaruot ang' neitopiwuoki tʼolbae lʼesupato ang'.
Akae, ore peishooki yook esupato naing'ua enkirukoto, nikiata eseriani o Engai tʼOlaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos,
nikiata te ilo tʼenkirukoto enyikakinoto e atua ena ng'adunoto nikintasheye, nikintadaraa tiatua ena tʼolbae lʼeanyunoto enkitook Engai.
Kake me tʼena ake, kintadaraa baiki tiatua sinaitin, tiaraki nikiyolo, aajo eitaa osina olng'iria,
o olng'iria enkitagoluoto, o enkitagoluoto eanyunoto,
nemeishoru eanyunoto enkutaroto; amu etubukokoki enyorrata Engai atua iltauja lang' tʼOlmumua Sinyati oishooki yook.
Amu etua baiki Kristos, eton kira yook menat, tʼenkata enye tʼolbae loo lemeata Engai.
Amu eton mee o obo tʼolbae lʼosupat; kake ajo nanu, eiteu atua oltung'ani tʼolbae loo sidan.
Kake eitadolu Engai enyorrata enye too yook, ajo etua Kristos tʼolbae lang', eton kira laitarruok.
Akae, eitopuaki yook naleng' te ninye tʼengoro, eishooki yook esupato tʼosarge lenye.
Amu teni eitobirakaki yook o Engai tʼenkea Oinoti lenye, eton kira ilmang'ati, nelusoo naleng', eidipaki aaitobiraki yook, nikipok tiatua empuan enye.
Me te ina ake, kake kintadaraa baiki tiatua Engai tʼOlaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos, likinotie taata enkitobirakinoto.
Onaa, neijia anaa petijing'a enkitarruoto tʼoltung'ani obo atua olmaa o tʼenkitarruoto enkea, neijia eima enkea baiki atua iltung'anak pookin looitarruoitie pookin tiatua ele obo.
Amu etii enkitarruoto atua olmaa eton metii nkitanapat, kake eitu eikenakini enkitarruoto opa ina kata metii nkitanapat.
Kake eitoria enkea iltung'anak eiter te Adam metabaiki Mose, baiki kulo leitu eitarruo tʼerisioroto empaashata e Adam, lora enkitanyanyukiet e ilo otipikaki, pelotu tekurum.

Kake meikununo enkishooroto anaa enkitarruoto. Teni etuata ilkumok tʼolbae lʼenkitarruoto ele obo, nelusoo naleng' eng'adunoto o enkishooroto Engai tiatua eng'adunoto oltung'ani obo, Yesus Kristos, natoponikiaki ilkumok.
Nemetiu enkishooroto anaa idia kitarruoto nabo e lido oitarruoiye. Amu ore enkigwena naing'ua enkitarruoto nabo, eaua enkiminata, kake eitopok eng'adunoto too nkitarruot kumok o metabaiki esupato.
Amu teni eitorishe enkea tʼolbae lʼenkitarruoto ele obo, nepon naleng' neitorisho kulo loong'amu enkumoi eng'adunoto o enkishooroto naau esupato, tiatua empuan tʼolbae le obo, Yesus Kristos.
Akae, anaa peima enkea tʼolbae lʼenkitarruoto e obo atua iltung'anak pookin, netum enkigwena nagol, neijia, tʼolbae lʼesupato e obo, eima si esupato empuan atua iltung'anak pookin.
Neijia anaa petaa tʼolbae lʼeanyata oltung'ani obo kumok laitarruok, neijia epuo aaku tʼolbae lʼening'oto e obo ilkumok supati.
Etijing'ua nkitanapat petum aatoponai nkitarruot. Kake anaa petoponaiye enkitarruoto, netulusoiye apona eng'adunoto,
peiye, neijia anaa peitorishe enkitarruoto tʼenkea, neijia eitorisho si eng'adunoto metabaiki empuan nemeiting' tʼolbae le Yesus Kristos, Olaitoriani lang'.
Kijo aa yook? Kibik tiatua enkitarruoto, pepona eng'adunoto?
Me neijia. Ore yook, nikituatakitia enkitarruoto, kaji kinko teni kintoki aaishiu tiatua ninye?
Miyololo ndai, aajo eibatisaki yook pookin, looibatisaki atua Kristos Yesus, atua enkea enye?
Akae, etunukaki yook te nebo o ninye tʼenkibatisa atua enkea, peiye, neijia anaa peitopiwuoki Kristos tiatua lootuata tʼenkitook e Menye, neija kipuo aalimana si yook tiatua eng'ejukishu empuan.
Amu teni enuki yook te nebo o ninye tʼenyanyukoroto enkea enye, nikipuo aaku baiki lʼenyanyukoroto empiunoto enye.
Kiyolo ena, aajo etooshokoki oltung'ani lang' musana esalaba te nebo o ninye, peiye eishunye osesen lʼenkitarruoto, pemikintoki aaisyayaki yook enkitarruoto;
amu olotua, eitaaki supat tʼenkitarruoto.
Kake teni kituata te nebo o Kristos, kiruk, aajo kipuo aaishiu baiki te nebo o ninye,
nikiyolo, aajo meitoki ae Kristos loitopiwuoki tiatua lootuata, meitoki aitore enkea ninye.
Amu enaidipa atua, etuaka nkitarruot nabo kata; ore peishiu, neishiuoki Engai.
Neijia entejo si ndai, aajo irara ndai lootuatakitia enkitarruoto, ninjiuokiki Engai tiatua Kristos Yesus, Olaitoriani lang'.
Kake eminjo enkitarruoto meitoria atua osesen linyi otum enkea, nining'ining'i ninye tiatua ilng'warraitin lenyena,
nimintarasakiki enkitarruoto rubat inyi anaa nareta entorroni, kake entarasaki aten Engai anaa looishiu too lootuata, o rubat inyi anaa nareta esupato.
Amu melaitore enkitarruoto ndai, amu mitiiti abori oo nkitanapat, kake abori eng'adunoto.
Ainyo naa? Kintarruo, tiaraki nimikitii abori oo nkitanapat, kake abori eng'adunoto? Me neijia.
Miyololo, aajo ore ilo, lintarasakiki ndai aten singan nirukuruku, nirara singan lenyena, metaa irara lʼenkitarruoto aabaiki enkea, arashu lʼening'oto aabaiki esupato?
Ashe, Engai, tiaraki nirara opa singan lʼenkitarruoto, kake indipa aairuko taata too ltauja ilo aiturukoni lʼenkiteng'enare lining'ining'i ndai.
Amu ore pitalakunote too nkitarruot, niakuku singan lʼesupato.

Airo tʼorregie lʼentung'anishu tʼolbae lʼemenatishu enkiring'o inyi. Amu anaa pinjoo rubat inyi eisyayaki olduruki o empaashata oo nkitanapat, neijia enjoo taata rubat inyi, peisyayaki esupato tiatua esinyaroto.
Amu te ina kata nirara ndai singan loo nkitarruot, nirara loolakuno tʼesupato.
Akae, kakua momo inoto te ina kata? Ore taata iatata sura tʼolbae loo nona; amu era enkiting'oto enye enkea.
Kake itaa taata loolakuno too nkitarruot, nisyayakiki Engai, niatata ilmomo linyi, piakuku sinyat, niatata enkiting'oto nara empuan nemeiting'.
Amu era enkea olkwaje lʼenkitarruoto, kake era enkishooroto Engai empuan nemeiting' tiatua Kristos Yesus, Olaitoriani lang'.
Miyololo ndai, lalashera, (amu airorie kulo looyolo nkitanapat), aajo eitore nkitanapat oltung'ani enkata naishiuye?
Amu ore eng'oroyoni nayama olmoruo, eteenikino o ninye too nkitanapat, eton eishiu olmoruo lenye. Ore pee olmoruo, netalakuaki tʼenkitanapata olmoruo.

Kake eji engaarani enkidikidikoto enkiama, teni eam olekai moruo ninye eton eishiu olmoruo. Ore pee olmoruo, netalakuaki tʼenkitanapata, nemeji engaarani enkidikidikoto enkiama, teni ea olekai moruo ninye.
Naa neijia itiuu si ndai, lalashera lainei, ituatakitia nkitanapat tiatua osesen le Kristos, piakuku lʼolekai lora ilo oitopiwuoki too lootuata, pekiiki Engai ilmomo.
Amu te ina kata nikitii atua enkiring'o, tʼolbae loo nkitanapat neasisho ilng'warraitin loo nkitarruot tiatua rubat ang' aaiki enkea ilmomo.
Kake ore taata, kitaa loolakuno too nkitanapat, nikituatakitia ninje naateena yook, pekisyaisho tʼeng'ejukishu Olmumua, me tʼentiinoto musana esirata.
Akae, kijo aa? Kera nkitanapat enkitarruoto? Mera tukul. Kake eitu ayolou enkitarruoto neme too nkitanapat; amu anaata eitu ayolo olng'warra, ten emutu eitu ejo nkitanapat: Ming'war!
Kake einoto enkitarruoto eretokinoto enkitanapata, peinyeye tiatua nanu olng'warra pookin; amu teni metii nkitanapat, netua enkitarruoto.
Aishiuwo nanu enkata naje, metii nkitanapat. Ore pelotu enkitanapata, neishiu enkitarruoto,
kake atua nanu, netumi, ajo etaa enkitanapata nara nʼempuan, te nanu nʼenkea.
Amu einoto enkitarruoto eretokinoto enkitanapata naalej nanu naari matua te ninye.
Nera nkitanapat sinyat, nera si enkitanapata sinyati o supat o sidai.
Akae, ketaa enara sidai enkea te nanu? Me tukul. Kake etaa enkitarruoto, pelioi anaa enkitarruoto, tʼesidai enkea te nanu, pepon aaku enkitarruoto torrono naleng' tʼenkitanapata.
Amu kiyolo, aajo era nkitanapat nʼe-mumuaishu, nara ake nanu lʼenkiring'o, laatimirakaki abori enkitarruoto.
Amu mayolo enaitobir; amu maitobir enayeu, kake enaiba, ninye aitobir.
Teni aitobir enamayeu, nairuk nkitanapat, ajo era sidan.
Ore taata, me nanu oitobir nona, kake enkitarruoto natii atua nanu.
Amu ayolo, ajo memanya entoki sidai atua nanu, eji tiatua enkiring'o ai. Aata eyeunoto, kake matum aitobira sidan.
Amu maitobir ena sidai nayeu, kake enda torroni nemayeu, aitobir.
Ore paitobir enamayeu, mekure aas nanu, kake enkitarruoto natii atua nanu.
Akae, anyorriki, ajo atii nanu oyeu neas enara sidai, abori enkitanapata, paitobir entorroni.
Amu ashipakino nkitanapat Engai tiatua oltau lai.
Kake adol nkulie kitanapat tiatua rubat ainei, naarare nkitanapat eng'eno ai, naaeniki, paisyayaki nkitanapat enkitarruoto naatii atua rubat ainei.
Oi, ara nanu oltung'ani aisinani. Kang'ai laaitopok tʼosesen tʼena kea?
Kake ashe, Engai, tiatua Yesus Kristos, Olaitoriani lang'. Onaa, aisyayaki nanu openy tʼeng'eno ai nkitanapat Engai, kake tʼenkiring'o nkitanapat enkitarruoto.
Akae, metii taata endiata o nabo atua kulo lootii atua Kristos Yesus, lemelimana anaa peyeu enkiring'o, kake anaa peyeu Olmumua.
Amu aatalakutua nkitanapat Olmumua lʼempuan tiatua Kristos Yesus aitung'ua nkitanapat enkitarruoto o enkea.
Amu enameidim nkitanapat, tiaraki naa menat tʼolbae lʼenkiring'o, neirriu Engai Oinoti lenye openy tiatua emua enkiring'o enkitarruoto o tʼolbae lʼenkitarruoto, nedek enkitarruoto tiatua enkiring'o,
peitabaiari esupato oo nkitanapat tiatua yook lemikilimana anaa peyeu enkiring'o, kake anaa peyeu Olmumua.
Amu loora loo nkiri, neibirribir noo nkiri, kake loora lʼolmumua, neibirribir nʼolmumua.
Nera nkibirribirrat enkiring'o enkea, kake era nkibirribirrat Olmumua empuan o eseriani.
Amu era nkibirribirrat enkiring'o emang'atishu e atua Engai, amu mening' ninye nkitanapat Engai, nemeidim baiki.
Meidim kulo lootii atua enkiring'o aaiting'ida Engai.
Mitiiti ake ndai atua enkiring'o, kake atua Olmumua, ten ake emanya Olmuma lʼEngai atua ndai. Olemeata Olmumua le Kristos, nemera olenye.
Teni etii Kristos atua ndai, netua osesen tʼolbae lʼenkitarruoto, kake eishiu Olmumua tʼolbae lʼesupato.
Teni emanya Olmumua le ilo, oitopiwuo Yesus too lootuata, atua ndai, neitopiu ilo oitopiwuo Yesus tiatua lootuata, si seseni linyi ooe, tʼolbae lʼolmumua lenye omanya atua ndai.
Akae, lalashera, kira yook loo silen, me lʼenkiring'o, pikisyayaki enkiring'o.
Amu teni injiuu anaa peyeu enkiring'o, nipuopuo aae; kake teni iariara nkitobirat osesen tʼOlmumua metuata, nipuopuo aaishiu.
Amu pookin loorik Olmumua, nera ninje nkera Engai.
Amu eitu ing'amumu Olmumua lʼesingaishu, pintokiki aaureisho, kake itang'amutua Olmumua lʼenkeraishu, nikidarie ninye: Aba, Papa!
Eijakenishe ele mumua te nebo o Olmumua lang', ajo kira nkera Engai.
Teni kira nkera, nikira lajung'ok, lajung'ok lʼEngai, loojung'isho te nebo o Kristos; teni eisili yook te nebo o ninye, neitaai yook baiki kituak te nebo o ninye.
Amu ajo nanu, ajo menyanyuk nkisilot ena kata e taata o enkitook nalalioi too yook.
Amu eanyu naleng' enkitobirata elioroto oo nkera Engai.
Amu etii enkitobirata abori emutata, me tʼeyeunoto enye, kake tʼolbae lʼele, lotipika ninye abori, tʼeanyunoto.
Amu epuoi aalaku baiki enkitobirata, peing'ua enkisyayare erruoroto, petum elakunoto enkitook oo nkera Engai.
Amu kiyolo yook, aajo eang' neata emion enkitobirata pookin te nebo o yook metabaiki taata.
Me ninye ake, kake baiki yook likiata enkishooroto elukunya Olmumua, nikiang' tiatua aten nikianyu, peitaai yook nkera nikitum elakunoto oo seseni lang'.
Amu kitopua tʼeanyunoto. Ore eanyunoto nikidol, mera ninye eanyunoto; amu olodol toki — kainyo peanyu?
Teni kianyu nimikidolita, nikianyu tʼolng'iria.
Nji eretoki baiki Olmumua emenatishu ang'; amu mikiyolo aatoomonu toki neijia anaa peitoriori, amu etii Olmumua openy ewueji ang' too ang'an nemeiroroi.
Kake eyolo ololeen iltauja ndamunot Olmumua, amu eomonoki sinyat, anaa penyor Engai.
Kake kiyolo, aajo eaku sidan ntokitin pookin too kulo loonyor Engai, too kulo looipotoki tʼentootiki.
Amu looiturukie ayolou, etipika ninje, perisyorei emua Oinoti lenye, peaku ninye olkikau tiatua lalashera kumok.
Ore lootipika ninye, lelo eipoto; ore looipoto ninye, lelo eitaa supati; ore looitaa supati, lelo eitaa kituak.
Akae, ainyo kintoki aajo too kuna? Teni etii Engai ematua ang' — kang'ai loiteu atigilunore yook?
Neitu eshilu ninye baiki Oinoti lenye openy, kake eitarasua ninye tʼolbae lang' pookin; meitoki aisho ninye yook te ninye ntokitin pookin?
Ang'ai oidim aitang'oro lootegeluaki lʼEngai? Etii Engai ene naitaa supat.
Ang'ai oidim atedia? Etii Kristos Yesus ene lotua, ore naleng' eitopiwuoki, lotii engaina e tatene Engai, nera baiki olosayaki yook.
Ang'ai oidim atorishie yook enyorrata Engai? Enkilishoto arashu osina arashu emirare arashu olamei arashu engokishu arashu enkikirikirata arashu olalem?
Anaa petisiraki: Eari yook dama pookin tʼolbae lino, eikenari yook anaa nkerra naayeng'i.
Kake kigilu nona pookin tʼele lotonyorra yook.
Amu atayolo osupatei, ajo meidim enkea arashu empuan arashu ilmalaikan arashu nkitoriaitin arashu naatii arashu naapuo aaku arashu ngoloni
arashu naatii shumata arashu engasuri arashu engai kitobirata pookin aatorishie yook enyorrata Engai natii atua Kristos Yesus, Olaitoriani lang'.
Airo esipata tiatua Kristos, malejisho, anaa paaijakenoki oltoilo lʼoltau lai tʼOlmumua Sinyati,
ajo aata osina kitok o emion nemeish tʼoltau lai.
Amu anaata ak ayeu, paadeki nanu openy aing'ua Kristos tʼolbae loo lalashera lainei laanyikita tʼempukunoto osesen;
loora loo Israel, looinoto enkeraishu o enkitook o nkitanapat o enkisyayare Engai o nkisiligat,
neata si loopapa, nepukunye Kristos ninje tʼemua enkiring'o, nera ninye Engai too pookin, neitadarari nkatan pookin.
Majo nona, tiaraki natabatate ororei lʼEngai. Amu mera pookin Israeli loora le Israel.
Nemera pookin nkera e Abraham, tiaraki nara eishoi enye, kake: te Isaak kimpotieki eishoi ino.
Eji mera nkera Engai nona naara nʼosesen, kake nkera enkisiligata eikeni aaku eishoi.
Amu ele ororei lʼenkisiligata teni ejo: Aitoki alotu tʼena kata, netum Sara engaiyoni.
Me ina ake, kake ore pemenai Rebeka te ilo obo, lora Isaak, Papa lang',
eton eitu eini nkera neitu eas entoki sidai arashu torrono — petum eotikinoto Engai aitasho tʼerisioroto engelunoto,
neme tʼerisioroto oo nkitobirat, kake tʼolbae le ilo oipoto, — netiakaki ninye (Rebeka): Eisyayaki olbotor oloti.
Anaa petisiraki: Atonyorra Yakoob, kake aibaiye Esau.
Kijo aa yook? Ke me supat Engai? Me neijia.
Amu etiaka Mose: Ang'adu ele lang'adu, naing'urrie ele laing'urrie.
Idol ta: me entoki e ilo oyeu anai okwet, kake nʼEngai nang'adu oloyeu.
Amu ejoki esirata Farao: Te ina aainyeye iye, paitaduaya engolon ai te iye neitayolori engarna ai tiatua loshon pookin.
Akae, eng'adu ninye oloyeu, neitagol oloyeu.
Nikijoki iye nanu: Ainyo peitang'or ninye yook? Amu ang'ai oibelekeny eyeunoto enye?
Iye, letung'ani, ira iye ng'ai, pingwenare Engai? Amaa, keikilikwan olokidong'oi oloitobir motiok: Ainyo pekintobira nji?
Meata oloitobir motiok engolon, peitobir tʼolokidong'oi obo emoti nabo naata enkitook, o engai naata enkurruna?
Akae, ore peyeu Engai neitaduaya engoro enye neitayolou engolon enye, nenap ninye tʼolng'iria kitok, nkitobirat engoro enye naaitobiraka enkiminata,
peiye eitayolou enkumoi enkitook enye too nkitobirat eng'adunoto enye, naatang'asa aitobir pebaiki enkitook,
naa yook, ooipotuo ninye, me ake too Yudayoi, kake baiki too loreren lemeyolo Engai.
Anaa peitoki ajo te Hosea: Aipot aitaa olorere lai lemera olorere lai, ore eneitu anyor nanu, naipot: enanyor ai.
Neaku, ore ine wueji netiakinyeki ninje: mirara olorere lai, neipoti: nkera Engai naishiu.
Neishiraki si Yesaya Israel, ajo teni eaku eba nkera Israel anaa osunyai lʼolbalbal, anaata epok ake olpisiai.
Amu eaku ororei lʼenkitabaiaroto o endung'ore, naa Olaitoriani oiko nji tʼenkop.
Anaa petang'asa Yesaya ajo: Ten emut eitu eing'uaiki yook Olaitoriani loo ltimito eishoi, anaata kitaa yook anaa Sodom neitanyanyukieki yook Gomora.
Amaa, kijo aa yook? Amu einoto loreren lemeyolo Engai esupato leitu eing'oru, kake esupato naing'ua enkirukoto.
Ore Israel otusuja nena kitanapat esupato, neitu ebaiki ninje.
Kainyo peitu ebaiki? Tiaraki neitu eing'oru tʼenkirukoto, kake eing'orutua too nkitobirat oo nkitanapat. Eikobo aten tʼosoit lʼenkikoboto.
Anaa petisiraki: Ng'orai, apik te Sion osoit lʼenkikoboto o osoit lʼenkitirikata, ore oloiruk ninye, nemeitukurruni.
Lalashera, era eyeunoto oltau lai o esayata tʼEngai tʼolbae loo nkera Israel, petum ninje enkitopuata.
Amu aijakenoki ninje, ajo eata enyuata tʼEngai, kake me tʼeng'eno;
amu meyolou esupato Engai, neing'oru naitasheye enenye oopeny, neitu epik aten abori esupato Engai.
Amu era Kristos embaiaroto oo nkitanapat, petum oltung'ani pookin oiruk esupato.
Amu esir Mose, ajo elaishiu oltung'ani oitobir esupato naing'ua nkitanapat, tiatua ninje;
kake eiro esupato naing'ua enkirukoto nji: Mijo tʼoltau lino: Kang'ai olailep shumata? neji ena, perikuni Kristos enkop.
Arashu: Kang'ai olodoiki atua engasuri? Neji ena, ajo peilepunyeki Kristos tiatua lootuata.
Kake kejo aa? Kitaaniki ororei tiatua enkutuk ino o tiatua oltau lino. Nera ele rorei lʼenkirukoto likinosu.
Amu teni imbalu tʼenkutuk ino Olaitoriani Yesus niruk tiatua oltau lino, ajo eitopiwuo Engai ninye too lootuata, nilapok;
amu eiruki tʼoltau, petumi esupato, neibaluni tʼenkutuk, petumi enkitopuata.
Amu ejo esirata: Ore oltung'ani pookin oiruk ninye, nemeitukurruni.
Amu merisha ene Oyudayos o Olgriki; amu era ninye Olaitoriani loo pookin, oladupani le atua pookin looipot ninye.
Amu elapok oltung'ani pookin, olaipot engarna Olaitoriani.
Kake kaji eiko teni epuo aaipot oleitu eiruk? Naa kaji eiko teni epuo aairuk oleitu ening'? Na kaji eiko teni epuo aaning', meata olainosunoni?
Naa kaji eiko teni epuo aainosu, teni eitu eirriwari ninje? Anaa petisiraki: Oi, sidan nkejek oo looinosu eseriani o looinosu sidan.
Kake me pookin ooiruk lomon lʼeng'ida. Amu ejo Yesaya: kang'ai oiruk enkinosunoto ang'?
Onaa, elotu enkirukoto tʼenkinosunoto, nelotu enkinosunoto tʼororei lʼEngai.
Kake aikilikwan: Eitu ening? Ee, etoning'o. Amu etupukuo oltoilo lenye ajing'aa olmaa pookin, nejing'aa rorei lenyena matuan pookin enkop.
Kake aikilikwan: Eitu eyolou Israel? Tʼenkiterata ejo Mose: Aisho nanu ndai piataiyeye olom ilo orere lemera, naitagoroki ndai olorere lemeata eng'eno.
Neiteu Yesaya atejo: Aainotoki too lelo leitu aaing'oru, natalioko lelo leitu aaikilikwanu nanu.
Kake ejoki Israel: Aitorioko ngaik ainei engolong' pookin olorere lemening'isho neata engogong'i.
Akae, aikilikwan: Keiturraiye Engai olorere lenye? Me neijia. Amu ara si nanu ole Israel, lʼeishoi e Abraham, lʼenkishomi e Benyamin.
Eitu eiturraa Engai olorere lenye otang'asa ninye ayolou. Arashu miyololo ndai enajo esirata te Eliya, anaa pelotu enetii Engai tʼolbae le Israel ajo:
Olaitoriani, etaara metuata layolounok linono netigilutua ilpereren lʼenkidasare linono; nanu ake otelekua, naaing'oru Olmumua lai.
Kake kainyo etaalikia Engai ninye? Aaiteliaka kion iltung'anak elfun naapishana leitu egilaki nkung' Baal.
Neijia etiu si taata tʼena kata; etii lootelekutua tʼengelunoto eng'adunoto.

Teni eaku tʼolbae lʼeng'adunoto, nemekure tʼolbae loo nkitobirat, amu anaata mekure aa eng'adunoto eng'adunoto. Kake teni eaku too nkitobirat, nemekure etiu eng'adunoto toki, amu anaata mekure aa enkitobirata enkitobirata.
Ainyo naa? Ina naing'orua Israel eitu etum, kake lʼengelunoto einoto; eitagoloki ilkulekai iltauja,
anaa petisiraki: Eishoo Engai ninje Olmumua loo njok naairoshi, o ngonyek nemedolisho, o nkiyaa nemening'isho metabaiki ena olong'.
Nejo David: Njeaku endaaret enye erreshet o eloket o enkitapong'oroto o elaakinoto too ninje.
Iopoki ngonyek enye enaimin, pemedolisho, nirrugie ngoriong'i enye oshi ake.
Amaa, keikobo ninje, pebatata? Me neijia. Kake tʼembatatata enye etabaikia enkitopuata lemeata Engai, penyok aasuj ninje.
Amu teni era embatatata enye endupoto olmaa o enkitong'oroto enye endupoto oo lemeata Engai, melusoo naleng', teni eitabaiari esiana enye?
Kake airorie ndai, lemeata Engai, tiaraki nara nanu olairriwani loo lemeata Engai, nayeu naitadaraa enkisyayare ai,
anake atum aitonyua lʼenkiring'o ai, pepok looje.
Amu teni eaku enkiturraroto enye enkitobirakinoto olmaa, me naleng' neaku eng'amunoto enye empiunoto too lootuata?
Ten aa sinyat ilmomo lʼenkiterunoto, neijia si etiu empurpurjata nalulung'a; naa ten aa sinyati entonata, neaku sinyat baiki ilng'osil.
Kake teni etigilaki kulekai ng'osil aaitainye, ore iye lora opa oloirien lʼentim nintijing'akinyeki tʼempolos ning'ar entonata o engare oloirien —
mintadaraa kion aibai ilng'osil. Ore teni intadaraa kion aibai ninje, meata kata nimiyolo, ajo me iye onap entonata, kake entonata nikinap iye.
Nialu iye: etigilaki ilng'osil aaitainye, paapiki nanu atua. Sidai!
Tiaraki neitu eiruk ninje, netigilaki, nintashe iye tʼolbae lʼenkirukoto. Miwuasa, kake tureisho.
Amu teni eitu eing'urrie Engai lelo ng'osil oora, nimiking'urrie si iye.
Ng'orai taa emborran o empijan Engai, empijan too kulo, lootabatatate, kake emborran te iye, teni ibik tiatua emborran: pemikidung'i si iye.
Naa neijia etiu lekua, teni mebik eany enkirukoto, nepuoi aaitijing'aki. Eitoki aidim Engai aitijing'aki ninje.

Amu teni kitudung'oki iye aitainye oloirien lʼentim nikintijing'akini atua oloirien sidai, kake omoni te iye, ke me naleng' eitokini aaitijing'aki kulo ng'osil oora, ootudung'uoki opa, atua oloirien lenye openy?
Mayeu, lalashera lanyor, nimiyololo ena kisudoroto, (pemiwuasasa), ajo etamodono Israel tʼematua, metabana nejing' enkumoi oo lemeata Engai
nepok neijia Israel olulung'a, anaa petisiraki: Elotu Olaitopuani aing'ua Sion, neshurtaa entorroni e Yakob,
naa ilo osotua lai laitaa o ninje, teni alaitau nkitarruot enye.
Ore too lomon lʼeng'ida, nera ninje ilmang'ati tʼolbae linyi, kake tʼengelunoto era ninje lootonyorraki tʼolbae loo loopapa.
Amu meinyaaia Engai nkishoorot o enkipototo enye.
Neija anaa ndai opa eitu irukuruku Engai, kake ekorduni taata ndai, tiaraki neitu eiruk ninje;
neija meiruk taata si lekua enkordunoto ninoto ndai, peiye etum si ninje enkordunoto.
Amu eigenoiye Engai pookin pemeata enkirukoto, petum atokordu ninje pookin.
Oi, engasuri endupoto o eng'eno o eyolounoto Engai! Meyolounoi nkigwenaitin enyena nemetumoi ngoitoi enyena!
Amu kang'ai lotayolo enkibirribirrata Olaitoriani? Arashu kang'ai lotaa olautakinoni lenye?
Arashu kang'ai loituruko aisho ninye, peitoki aisho arrinyoki ninye?
Amu eing'ua ninye neaku te ninye nejing' atua ninye pookin. Njeata ninye enkitook metabaiki nkatan pookin. Amen.
Akae, asai ndai, lalashera, tʼeng'adunoto Engai, pinjoioio seseni linyi, peaku enkidasare naishiu, sinyati, naiting'id Engai, nera enkisyayare Engai naitoriori.
Eminyanyukiei ele maa, kake entaalata tʼeng'ejukishu oo nkibirribirrat inyi, pindimidimi aataleen enara eyeunoto Engai sidai, naiting'idisho, enabaia.

Amu ajoki tʼeng'adunoto Engai, naaishooki nanu, oltung'ani pookin lotii atua ndai, pemeitaa ninye kion kitok too ndamunot nelang' olora, kake njedamu mbaak enyena anaa nkuti, oltung'ani pookin anaa petetemaka Engai ninye entemet enkirukoto.
Amu neija anaa pekiata tiatua osesen obo rubat kumok nemeata rubat pookin enkyas nabo,
neijia kira yook ilkumok osesen obo tiatua Kristos, nera tiatua yook obo erubata olekai.
Nikiata nkishoorot nemenyanyukoro tʼeng'adunoto naishooki yook.
Teni eata oltung'ani eyolounoto e akenya, njeata t'entemet enkirukoto; ten aa enkisyayare, njeisyaisho; ten aa oloiteng'enisho, njeiteng'enisho;
ten aa olodiding'isho, njediding'isho; ten aa olaishooroni, njeishooio tʼoltau sidai; ten aa olaitasheikinoni, njeitasheiki tʼenyuata; ten aa olang'adunoni, jeng'adu tʼeng'ida.
Njoo meata enyorrata enkitusupatuo. Embai enara torrono nimbung'arere enara sidai.
Njeaku enyorrata oo lalashera tiatua ndai nʼoltau. Njeituruk obo aitaa olekai kitok.
Emishalu tʼenyuata. Enjoo iatata enkima tiatua iltauja. Esyayakiti Olaitoriani.
Enting'idata tiatua eanyunoto, enting'iria tiatua osina, entobik tiatua esayata.
Entang'ar elaunoto oo sinyat. Entoomonishoto tʼeng'ida.
Entamayan looisil ndai; entamayan, emidek.
Enting'idata te nebo o loong'ida, enjira te nebo o looishir.
Njoo idamumu tʼempolos inyi nabo. Emimbirribir ntokitin kituak, kake embung'are enkitadounoto. Emiaku looitadaraa aten tʼen'geno.
Emilaaki oltung'ani entorroni tʼentorroni. Embirribirrutu sidan tʼengomom oo ltung'anak pookin.
Teni eaku, embung'akinore iltung'anak pookin eseriani anaa pindimidimi ndai.
Emilaakino, lanyor, ntorrok, kake ewuang'ie engoro Engai, amu esira: Enai elaata oo ntorrok, alalak nanu, ejo Olaitoriani.
Akae, teni etum olmang'atinda lino olamei, ntotio ninye; teni etum enkure, ntooko ninye; amu teni inko nji, ninturrurroki nkuk enkima shumata elukunya enye.
Minjo kigilu entorroni, kake tigilu iye entorroni too sidan.
Njening oltung'ani pookin ilkituak t'engolon. Amu metii engolon neme enaing'ua Engai; ore looata engolon, Engai natipika ninje.
Ore ologogong' tʼoloata engolon, negogong'oki orregie lʼEngai; ore loogogong', neaki aten enkigwena.
Amu mera ilkituak laituriak loo nkyasin sidan, kake loo nkyasin torrok. Teni miyeu niurei Oloata engolon, ntobira sidan, nilaata enkitadararoto te ninye.
Amu era ninye olaisyayani lʼEngai, pitum iye sidan; kake teni intobir ntorrok, tureishoi, amu menapita ninye olalem pesho; era ninye olaisyayani lʼEngai, pelaaki near oloitobir ntorrok.
Onaa, meata kata nemening'i ninye, me tʼolbae lʼearata ake, kake baiki tʼolbae lʼoltoilo lʼoltau.
Onaa, entalak baiki kodi, amu era ninje laisyayak lʼEngai loonyamal te ina.
Enjoo oltung'ani pookin esupato enye: le kodi — kodi, olasotoni — esotore, oloitureisho — enkuretishu, lʼenkitook — enkitook.
Njoo miatata esile oltung'ani o obo, neme ake entonyorrata, amu olonyor olekai, eitabaiye nkitanapat.

Amu enatejoki: miar enkidikidikoto olmoruo o eng'oroyoni, miar metua, mipurrisho, midung' ilmarenge, ming'war, arashu teni etii engai kitanapata nalang', etuumaki tiatua ele rorei: Tonyorra oltung'ani lʼelatia ino anaa pinyor kion.
Meitobiraki enyorrata olʼelatia ntorrok. Akae, era enyorrata enkitabaiaroto oo nkitanapat.
Ore piyololo ena, eji enkata, ajo etabaua enkata, pinyotototo too njok; amu etataanua enkitopuata ang' taata nelang' enikirukie,
etaa nalusoo enkiarie nenyiku endama; onaa maitau nkitobirat enaimin, maishopo nareta enkilang'et.
Matilimanata tʼorregie sidai anaa dama, me tʼenkinosata o tʼemerai, me tʼentalare o tʼenkimalimal, me tʼenkitarrikino o tʼengilata e tau;
kake enjopo Olaitoriani Yesus Kristos, ore enkishilaroto osesen eminko aainokie olng'warra.
Entang'amutu olmenati lʼenkirukoto, emingwenaki nkibirribirrat enyena.
Eiruk obo, ajo eidim ainosa pookin; olora menati, nenya mbenek.
Olonya, minjo emen olemenya; minjo eigwenaki baiki olemenya olonya, amu etang'amua Engai ninye.
Ira iye ng'ai oloigwenaki olaisyayani omoni? Eitashe arashu ebatata ninye tʼOlaitoriani lenye openy; kake epuoi aaitasheye, amu eidim aitasheye Engai ninye.
Erishu obo engolong' tʼengai olong', neitoris olekai ngolong'i pookin; njegolu oltung'ani pookin too ndamunot enyena.

Oloibung' ngolong'i, neibung'aki Olaitoriani; olemeibung' ngolong'i, nemeibung'aki Olaitoriani; olonya, nenya tʼOlaitoriani, amu eliki ninye Engai ashe; olemenya, nemenya tʼOlaitoriani, neliki Engai ashe.
Amu meishiuoki o obo too yook kion, nemeeki o obo kion;
amu teni kinjiu, kinjiuoki Olaitoriani; teni kiee, nikieeki Olaitoriani. Akae, teni kinjiu, teni kiee, nikira lʼOlaitoriani.
Amu etua Kristos te ina neishiu, peiye eitore lootuata o looishiu.
Kake iye, ainyo pingwenaki olalashe lino? Ore iye olekai, ainyo pimen iye olalashe lino? Amu epuoi aaitasheye yook pookin tʼengomom olorika lʼenkigwena le Kristos;
amu etisiraki: Aishiu, ejo Olaitoriani, meata kata nemaagilakini enkung'u pookin tʼengomom ai, neibalu olng'ejep pookin Engai.
Neijia elaisho pookin obo too ndai Engai ealet.
Akae, njoo mikintoki yook aaigwenaki obo olekai, kake eikash, teni ingwenarere, pemeikob o obo olalashe lenye nemeitapong'oo ninye.
Ayolo naitisipu, ajo metii entoki nara torrono kion tiatua Olaitoriani; neaku ake torrono te ilo loikenaki ajo torrono.
Kake teni eisinanu olalashe lino tʼolbae lʼendaa ino, mekure ilimana iye tʼenyorrata. Miminye tʼendaa ino ilo otuaka Kristos ninye.
Eminjo emori sidan inyi.
Amu mera enkarsishu Engai endaa o eokoto, kake esupato o eseriani o eng'ida tiatua Olmumua Sinyati;
amu oloisyayaki te ina Kristos, neiting'id Engai nera kitok too ltung'anak.
Akae, matusuj mbaak eseriani neretokino obo olekai.
Mintarruo tʼolbae lʼendaa enkyas Engai. Amu esmya entoki pookin, kake eaku torrono te ilo onya tʼenkikoboto oltau lenye.
Sidai, teni minya nkiri, nimiok olmarua, nimintobir toki, teni eikob arashu epong'ori arashu eshalu olalashe lino too ninje.
Teni iata iye enkirukoto, njoo iata kion t'engomom Engai. Tesh olemeata enkikoboto oltau tʼolbae lʼendaa nanya.
Kake oloing'arrirro teni enya, neigwenakini, amu mepukunye enkirukoto. Kake enamepukunye enkirukoto, naa enkitarruoto.
Akae, nenare taa too yook likira oogol, pekinap enjalan oo looshal, nimikintiship aten.
Njeitiship oltung'ani pookin too yook ol elatia, peaku sidai netum enkitagolioroto.
Amu ore si Kristos eitu eitiship kion, kake anaa petisiraki; Aatusulakinote nanu morot oo kulo likimor.
Enatisiraki opa etisiraki, peaku enkiteng'enare ang', pikitum eanyunoto tʼolng'iria o tʼenkilejilejata esirata.
Njeisho ndai Engai olng'iria o enkilejilejata, pidamumu tiatua ndai nabo anaa peyeu Kristos Yesus,
pitumutumu aaitadarai Engai o Menye lʼOlaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos, tʼoltau obo o tʼenkutuk nabo.
Onaa, entang'amaroto anaa petang'amua yook Kristos, peitaai Engai kitok.
Kake ajo nanu, etaa Yesus Kristos olaisyayani lʼemurata tʼolbae lʼesipata Engai, peitagol nkisiligat naaishooki loopapa;
peiye eitadaraa loreren Engai tʼenkordunoto enye, anaa petisiraki: Onaa aalaibalu iye tiatua loreren, naranyaki engarna ino.
Neitoki si ajo: Enting'idata, loreren, te nebo o olorere lenye!
Neitoki: Loreren pookin, entadarai Olaitoriani, njeiting'id ninye iltung'anak pookin!
Neitoki ajo Yesaya: Elaaku entonata e Yese o oloitashe, peitore loreren; epuo aanyu loreren ninye.
Njeigany ake ndai Engai eanyunoto tʼeng'ida pookin o tʼeseriani enkirukoto, peitunyoi eanyunoto inyi tʼengolon Olmumua Sinyati.
Ayolo si nanu, lalashera lainei, ajo eiganyi ndai emborran niboreii eyolounoto pookin, pindimidimi aatorojaroto ndai aten.
Kake aitewuo atisiraki ndai nkuti, lalashera, anake aitadamu ndai, tʼolbae lʼemunyani naaishoo nanu Engai,
patum ataa olaisyayani le Kristos Yesus nalo enetii loreren lemeata Engai, paitobir enkyas oo lomon lʼeng'ida osupatei, neaku loreren enkidasare nashipakino Engai, naa sinyati tiatua Olmumua Sinyati.
Onaa aidim aitadarai kion tiatua Kristos Yesus, ajo aisyayaki Engai.
Anaata maiteu ainosu ororei, ten emutu meitobir Kristos tiatua nanu pening'isho loreren, tʼororei o tʼenkyas,
tʼenkidimata oo nkitaduarot o noo lponot, o tʼenkidimata Olmumua lʼEngai, netaa aiganya pookin aing'ua Yerusalem o mbat naamanimanaa metabaiki Ilirikon, too lomon lʼeng'ida le Kristos.
Atonyua baiki, painosu euangelion too wuejitin neton eitu eipoti engarna e Kristos, pemashet tʼentonata omoni,
kake anaa petisiraki: Meata kata nemedol lelo leitu einosuni lomon lenyena, neyolou lelo leitu ening'.
Neijia taa etiu, paaiboiyoki aigil kumok alotu enitiiti ndai.
Tiaraki namaata taata erishata too kuna kwapi, natayeuo oshi ake kulo arin kumok nalotu enitiiti ndai,
onaa ayeu nalotu enitiiti, teni aim too ndai alo Spania. Amu ajo nanu, alatumore ndai tʼolototo lai, nikintarere ndai nanu ine, kindipa aaiting'ida peno enkata natii e nebo o ndai.
Kake taata ang'as alo Yerusalem, paisyayaki lelo sinyat.
Amu etonyorra iltung'anak le Makedonia o Akaya, pesotu eng'ara naje aaretoki sinyat aisinak ootii Yerusalem.
Kake etonyorra, nera si loo silen enye. Amu teni etang'ara loreren lemeata Engai ntokitin emumuaishu enye, neitoriori, peretoki si lelo ninje too mbaak oo seseni.
Teni aidipa aitabai ena bae naeaki ninje kulo momo petum, naimaa ndai alo Spania.
Nayolo, ajo teni alotu enitiiti, alotu tʼemborei emayani e Kristos.
Adiding' ndai, lalashera, tʼOlaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos o tʼenyorrata Olmumua, pekiretokiki aatigilunore nikisayakiki nanu tʼEngai,
paakorduni too lelo lemeiruk te Yerusalem, neshipakino lelo sinyat enkisyayare ai naiko te Yerusalem,
patum aeu tʼeng'ida enitiiti ndai tʼeyeunoto Engai naeng'ieng'a te nebo o ndai.
Ore Engai eseriani metobiko te nebo o ndai pookin. Amen.
Aitanapaki ndai enganashe ang' Foibe, naa ninye engaisyayani esirit natii Kenkerea,
ping'amumu ninye tʼOlaitoriani anaa peaku too sinyat, ninjosho eretokinoto too ngolati pookin naairishakinore ninye ndai. Amu etaretoko ilkumok, naataretoko baiki nanu.
Eroroki Priskila o Akwila, laretok lainei tiatua Kristos.
Amu etipika tʼolbae lʼempuan ai emurt enye; me nanu ake oliki ninje ashe, kake eiko nji si sirito pookin naatii tiatua loreren lemeata Engai.
Eroroki si esirit natii tʼengaji enye. Eroroki Epainetos olanyor lai, lora olkikau le Kristos te Asia.
Eroroki Maria natanyamala naleng' tʼolbae linyi.
Eroroki Andronikos o Yunias lʼenkishomi ang' looteenaki te nebo o nanu, neyolouni anaa lairriwak loora, naaiturukie nanu aairuk Kristos.
Eroroki Ampliatos olanyor lai tʼOlaitoriani.
Eroroki Urbanos, olaretoni lang' o Stakis, olanyor lai.
Eroroki Apeles, otonyorraiyoki te Kristos.
Eroroki Herodion lang'. Eroroki lelo loora lʼengang' e Narkisos tʼOlaitoriani.
Eroroki Trifeena o Trifosa, naatanyamala tʼOlaitoriani. Eroroki Perse enanyor, natanyamala naleng' tʼOlaitoriani.
Eroroki Rufus, olotegeluaki tʼOlaitoriani, o ng'otonye naa yeiyo ai.
Eroroki Asinkritos o Flegon o Hermas o Patrobas o lalashera ootii e nebo o ninje.
Eroroki Filologus o Yulia, Nereus o enganashe enye, o Olimpas o sinyat pookin te nebo o ninye.
Erorokinoto ndai aten tʼeng'ututata sinyati. Eiroroki ndai sirito le Kristos.
Kake adiding' ndai, lalashera, ping'oraara lelo ooau rishat o nkitapong'orot nemeishiaakino ina kiteng'enare ninteng'enuote ndai, nipaasharere aaing'ua ninje.
Amu meisyayaki looba nji, Olaitoriani, kake engoshoke enye, nelej si iltauja loo lemera torrok too rorei lenye oobor naa sidan.
Amu eibale enkirukoto inyi too ltung'anak pookin. Onaa, ashipakino ndai, nayeu niakuku ng'eni tiatua mbaak supati, kake turua tiatua mbaak torrok.
Ore Engai eseriani, metororuaki satan abori oo nkejek inyi asioki. Njebik eng'adunoto Olaitoriani Yesus Kristos te nebo o ndai.
Eiroroki ndai Timoteos, olaretoni lai, o Lukios o Yason o Sosipater lʼenkishomi ang'.
Airoroki ndai, nanu Tertius, otisira ena palai, tʼOlaitoriani.
Eiroroki ndai Gayos, olaaitoomono nanu o esirit nalulung'a. Eiroroki ndai Erastos, olopeny masaa engang', o Kwartos, olalashe.
Njebik eng'adunoto Olaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos te nebo o ndai.
Ore Engai, naidim aitagolo ndai tʼerisioroto oo lomon lʼeng'ida lainei o nkinosunot e Yesus Kristos, naaibalu emikio naisudoiyoki neba tʼenkiterunoto olmaa,
kake etaboluoki neitayolouni taata tiatua sirat oo layolounok, tʼenkitanapata Engai oo nkatan pookin, peuni ening'oto enkirukoto tiatua loreren pookin:
Njeata Engai nara openy ake ng'en, enkitook nkatan pookin metabaiki nkatan pookin. Amen.
Paulos oipotoki, peaku olairriwani le Yesus Kristos tʼeyeunoto Engai, o Sostenes, olalashe lang':

en esirit Engai natii Korintos ena palai, noo lelo ootisinyaiyoki tiatua Yesus Kristos, isinyat ooipotoki, te nebo o pookin ooipot engarna Olaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos, too wuejitin enye o nkunang' pookin.
Njeboitare ndai eng'adunoto o eseriani naing'ua Engai Papa lang' o Olaitoriani Yesus Kristos.
Aliki Engai ashe oshi tʼolbae lʼeng'adunoto Engai naishooki ndai tiatua Kristos Yesus,
tiaraki nitudupore ndai ntokitin pookin tiatua ninye, enkiteng'enare pookin o eyolounoto pookin,
neijia anaa petagolo enjakenishu e Kristos tiatua ndai,
neijia eitu ing'oruru tʼenkishooroto o nabo nianyunyu embolunoto Olaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos
oloitagol baiki ndai metabaiki enkiting'oto, perneitang'ori ndai tʼengolong' Olaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos.
Supat Engai naipotokinyeki ndai atua enkidikidikoto Oinoti lenye Yesus Kristos, Olaitoriani lang'.
Adiding' ndai, lalashera, tʼolbae lʼengarna Olaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos, piroro pookin entoki nabo, nimiatata orot tiatua ndai, kake embung'aroto tʼoltau obo o tʼendamunoto nabo.
Amu aatolikitio mbaak inyi, lalashera lainei, lekua lʼengaji e Kloe, aajo etii enjangar atua ndai.
Ajo nanu ele rorei, njere ejo pookin too ndai: Ara nanu ole Paulos, nara nanu ole Apolos, nara nanu ole Kefas, nara nanu ole Kristos.
Amaa, ketoore Kristos? Ketooshokoki Paulos esalaba tʼolbae linyi? Arashu keibatisaki ndai lʼengarna e Paulos?
Aliki Engai ashe, amu eitu aibatis oltung'ani obo too ndai neme Krispos o Gayos.
