Nemetii oltung'ani o obo oidim atejo eibatisaki lʼengarna ai.
Kake aibatisa si lʼengaji e Stefanos. Teni me lelo, madamu ajo aibatisa kulekai.
Amu eitu aainiwaa Kristos, paibatis, kake painosu lomon lʼeng'ida, neme too rorei ng'eni, pemeiturrari esalaba e Kristos.
Amu ore ororei lʼesalaba, nera emodaishu too lelo ooimin, kake ore too yook ooitopuaki, naa engolon Engai.
Amu etisiraki: Aiminye eng'eno oo lang'eni, naiturraa eng'eno oo looyolo.
Kodee olng'en? Kodee olayoloni loo sirat? Kodee lang'eni lʼele maa? Keitu eitaa Engai eng'eno ele maa emodaishu?
Amu tiaraki neitu eyolou olmaa tʼeng'eno enye Engai tiatua eng'eno enye, etonyorrua Engai aitopua tʼenkinosunoto emodaishu kulo looiruk.
Amu eing'oru Yudayoi ilponot, neing'oru Ilgrikini eng'eno,
kake kinosu yook Kristos otooshokoki esalaba, nera too Yudayoi erikai o too loreren emodaishu,
kake too kulo looipotoki, too Yudayoi o too Lgrikini, nera Kristos engolon Engai o eng'eno Engai.
Amu era emodaishu Engai ng'en nelang' iltung'anak, neata emenatishu Engai engolon nelang' iltung'anak.
Amu eng'orai, lalashera, enkipototo inyi, metii atua ndai kumok loora lang'eni nemetii kumok lʼengolon nemetii kumok looata enkitook;
kake etegelua Engai naara moda olmaa, peiye eitukurru lang'eni, o naara menat olmaa etegelua Engai, peiye eitukurru naara nʼengolon;
etegelua Engai nemeata enkitook olmaa o natemenaki, nemera toki, peiye eiturraa nara toki, peiye pemeitaa toki nara toki,
pemeitadaraa kion enkiring'o pookin tʼengomom Engai.
Ing'uang'ua si ndai atua ninye tiatua Kristos Yesus, lotaa too yook eng'eno naing'ua Engai, esupato o esinyaroto o elakunoto,
peiye anaa petisiraki; Oloitadaraa kion, njeitadaraa kion tiatua Olaitoriani.
Ore si nanu, lalashera, eitu alotu enitiiti ndai tʼenkishaa ororei arashu eng'eno ainosaki ndai enjakenishu Engai.
Amu eitu aikenaki kion payolo toki too ndai neme Yesus Kristos otooshokoki esalaba.
Natii nanu atua ndai tʼenjalan o tʼenkuretishu o tʼenkikirikirata naleng'.
Ore ororei lai o enkinosunoto ai, nemera ororei sidai lʼeng'eno oo ltung'anak, kake ol enkitaduaroto Olmumua o tʼengolon,
peiye eunokino enkirukoto inyi, me tʼeng'eno oo ltung'anak, kake tʼengolon Engai.
Kake kilimu eng'eno too lootabaitie, me eng'eno ele maa, neme en oo lkituak lʼele maa, loopuo aamuta,
kake kilimu eng'eno Engai tiatua emikio, natushumaki, natipika Engai tʼenkiturukoto e opa moitie, peaku enkitook ang';
neitu eyolou ninye o obo loo lkituak lʼele maa; amu ten emutu etayoloutuo, anaata eitu eoshoki esalaba Olaitoriani lʼenkitook;
kake anaa petisiraki: Neitu edol engong'u, neitu ening' enkiyok, neitu ejing' atua oltau lʼoltung'ani, ninje eitobiraka Engai kulo loonyor ninye.
Kake etaboloko yook Engai ena tʼOlmumua lenye; amu eirengesu Olmumua mbaak pookin, baiki ngasurin Engai.
Amu kang'ai too ltung'anak loyolo nʼoltung'ani neme Olmumua lʼoltung'ani otii atua ninye? Neijia meyolo o obo nʼEngai, neme Olmumua lʼEngai.
Eitu king'amu yook Olmumua lʼele maa, kake Olmumua oing'ua Engai, pikitum aatayolou ng'adunot naaishoo yook Engai;
nikilimu baiki ninje, me too rorei looiteng'enu eng'eno oo ltung'anak, kake looiteng'enu Olmumua, nikingwenaki mbaak emumuaishu tʼemumuaishu.
Meyolo oltung'ani lʼenkop mbaak Olmumua lʼEngai, amu era te ninye emodaishu, nemeidim atayolou, amu eigwenuni ninje tʼemumuaishu.
Kake eigwenu ol Olmumua mbaak pookin, nemeigwenaki o obo ninye.
Amu kang'ai lotayolouo nkibirribiirat Olaitoriani? Kang'ai elaiteng'en ninye? Kake kiata yook nkibirribirrat e Kristos.
Neitu aidim nanu airorie ndai, lalashera, anaa lʼOlmumua, kake itiuu anaa lʼenkiring'o, anaa nkera kutiti tiatua Kristos.
Aitotio ndai too kule, me tʼendaa nagol; amu eton eitu indimumu. Baiki taata eton mindimumu.
Amu eton irara lʼenkiring'o. Amu teni etii atua ndai olom o olarrabal o enjangar, keton mirara lʼenkiring'o nipuoiyeye mbaak oo ltung'anak?
Amu teni ejo obo: Ara ole Paulos, nejo lekai: Ara nanu ole Apolos — mirara ndai loo ltung'anak?
Kang'ai Apolos? naa kang'ai Paulos? Me laisyayak lootaretokitio ndai, pitumutumu enkirukoto, kake anaa peishoo Olaitoriani oltung'ani pookin.
Atuuno nanu, neitook Apolos, kake Engai naitubulua.
Akae, ore oloun, me toki, neme oloitook, kake Engai naitubulu.
Kake ore oloun o oloitook, naa obo; kake etum pookin olkwaje lenye tʼerisioroto enkyas enye.
Amu kira yook laitobirak lʼenkyas te nebo o Engai, nirara ndai enkuruma, neitoki enjetata Engai.
Ore tʼeng'adunoto Engai naaishooki nanu, anaa olashetani arriya atipika enkitamanyunoto, neshet olekai tung'ani shumata. Njeing'oraa oltung'ani pookin, eneiko teni eshetaki shumata e ina.
Amu meidim atipika o obo engai kitamanyunoto neme ena natipikaki, nera Yesus Kristos.
Teni eshetaki oltung'ani shumata ena kitamanyunoto sahabu, ngoshola, soito lʼenkinyang'a nagol, ilkeek, olkujita, ndung'ot olperesi,
nelaibalai enkyas oltung'ani pookin; amu elaibalie engolong', amu eboluni tʼenkima, nelaleen ena kima enkyas oltung'ani pookin eneikununo.
Teni ebik enkyas oltung'ani natesheta ninye, nelatum olkwaje;
teni eiku enkyas oltung'ani, nelatum elaunoto, elapok ake ninye openy, kake anaa tʼenkima.
Miyololo ndai, aajo irara engaji Engai, nemanya Olmumua lʼEngai atua ndai?
Teni eitarruo oltung'ani engaji Engai, neitarruo Engai ele; amu sinyati engaji Engai, nirara ndai.
Njoo melej oltung'ani kion; olojo too ndai, ajo era ng'en tiatua ele maa, njeaku olmodai, petum ataa ng'en.
Amu era eng'eno ele maa emodaishu tʼEngai. Amu etisiraki: Erresh ninye lang'eni tiatua olosek lenye.
Neitoki: Eyolo Engai ndamunot oo lang'eni, aajo mera toki.
Onaa, njoo meitadaraa o obo kion too ltung'anak! Amu era pookin nkun inyi:
ten aa Paulos, ten aa Apolos, ten aa Kefas, ten aa olmaa, ten aa empuan, ten aa enkea, ten aa naatii, ten aa naapuo aaku, — nkun inyi pookin,
kake irara ndai le Kristos, nera Kristos lʼEngai.
Nji njeikenaki yook oltung'ani pookin, ajo kira laisyayak le Kristos o laitasheikinok loo njumat Engai.
Akae, meing'oruni toki too laitasheikinok neme ak etumi aa supati.
Mera toki te nanu, teni aaigwenakini too ndai arashu tʼengolong' oo ltung'anak; namaigwenaki baiki nanu kion.
Amu mayolo toki te nanu, kake maaitaai te ina supat; era Olaitoriani, olaaigwenaki nanu.
Onaa, emingwenu toki eitu ebau enkata enye, metabana nelotu Olaitoriani ololo ailang'u njumat enaimin neitalioio yeunot oo ltauja; netum te ina kata oltung'ani pookin enkitadararoto tʼEngai.
Ore kuna baak, lalashera, airo te kion ai o Apolos tʼolbae linyi, pinteng'enuonuo too yook, pemilang'ilang'a nona naatisiraki, pemetii obo linyi owuasare olekai tʼolbae lʼolekai.
Amu kang'ai likintooruo iye nikintalang' olekai? Ainyo iata neitu itum? Kake ten aa inoto iye ninye, ainyo pintadaraa kion, anake eitu itum?
Indipa aataraposhoto, indipa aataa ladupak, nintorishosho mikitii yook. Eaku ten emut intorishosho, peiye kintorisho si yook te nebo o ndai.
Kake ajo nanu, eitaduaia yook Engai anaa looti naleng', ooitarasakaki enkea, amu kitaa yook enking'orare olmaa o noo lmalaikan o noo ltung'anak.
Kira ilmoda tʼolbae le Kristos, kake irara ndai ng'eni tiatua Kristos; kishal yook, nigoligolo ndai; neanyiti ndai, nemenari yook.
O metabaiki ena saa kiata olamei o enkure, nimikinjopo, neoshi yook isederi, nimikiata ang',
nikinyamalu, nikintobir enkyas too ngaik ang' aten; teni emori yook, nikimayan; naa teni einyali yook, niking'iri;
teni eiteenikini yook, nikisaisho; eitaaki yook anaa endiata olmaa, anaa oloirerio loo pookin oo taata.
Eitu asir kuna baak, paitukurru ndai, kake padiding' ndai, nkera ainei nanyor.
Amu ten emut iatata ndai laiteng'enak iip kat iip tiatua Kristos, anaata miatata loominyi kumok. Amu ore te Yesus Kristos atoiwuo nanu ndai too lomon lʼeng'ida.
Onaa adiding' ndai: Entaa lasujak lainei!

Te ina airriwaiye enitiiti ndai Timoteos, ora enkerai ai nanyor naa supat tiatua Olaitoriani, paitadamu ndai rregieita lang' ootii atua Kristos, anaa paiteng'enisho too wuejitin pookin tiatua esirit pookin.
Ewuasa kulekai, aajo malotu nanu enitiiti;
kake alotu asioki, teni eyeu Olaitoriani, nayolou nanu me rorei loo loowuasa, kake engolon.
Amu ore enkarsishu Engai meitashe tʼororei, kake tʼengolon.
Ainyo iyeuu? kalotu tʼeng'udi arashu tʼenyorrata o oltau lʼemborran?
Eitoning'oro ororei ajo etii entalare atua ndai, anaa pemeba nji tiatua lemeata Engai, neji eama obo eng'oroyoni e menye lenye.
Niwuasasa ndai, neme injirishiri, peitupukuni olotaasa ina tiatua ndai?
Kake ore nanu, lematii tʼosesen e nebo o ndai kake tʼolmumua, aidipa aigwenaki anaa Olotii ilo otaasa nji,
peiye, teni itumomo lʼengarna Olaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos, eitarasakini ninye tʼolmumua lai o tʼengolon Olaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos satan,
aitarruo enkiring'o, kake pepok Olmumua tʼengolong' Olaitoriani Yesus.
Me sidai, neijia anaa pintadaraara aten. Miyololo ndai, aajo eisiijie enkiti kisiijoi entapa pookin?
Akae, entau tiatua ndai ina kisiijoi musana, pitumutumu aataa entapa ng'ejuk, neijia anaa pemekure etii enkisiijoi atua ndai. Amu eidasaiyeki embalelo e pasaka ang', nera Kristos.
Onaa, maitaa ngolong'i kituak, me tiatua enkisiijoi musana, neme tiatua enkisiijoi emalmalishu o entorroni, kake tiatua neitu eisiijoi esidano o esipata.
Atisiraka ndai tiatua empalai, pimimbung'arere looas mbaak torrok oo nkiri.
Majo ina tukul too looas mbaak torrok oo nkiri lʼele maa, arashu too lʼempiani o laisimak o looisyayaki muain, amu te ina meata kata niming'uang'ua olmaa.

Kake atisiraka taata ndai, pimimbung'arere oltung'ani oipoti olalashe, teni era ninye oloas mbaak torrok oo nkiri, ana ol empiani, ana oloisyayaki muain, ana olamoroni, ana olaisimani. Eming'arie oloba nji endaa si.
Ara nanu ng'ai, paigwenaki lootii boo? Nimingwenakiki lootii atua?
Ore kulo ootii boo, neigwenaki Engai. Ore si ndai entau oltung'ani torrono tʼempolos inyi.
Teni eataiye oltung'ani too ndai olekai embae, kaji eiko teni eiteu aing'oru enkigwena too lemera supati, neme too sinyat?
Arashu miyololo ndai, aajo epuo aaigwenaki sinyat olmaa? Teni ipuopuo aaigwenaki olmaa, midupapa aaigwenaki mbaak kutiti?
Miyololo ndai, aajo kingwenaki yook ilmalaikan? Me naleng' sii mbaak ena kishon?
Kake ore ndai, teni iororo tʼolbae loo ntokitin ena kishon, ning'oruru kulo lemeata enganyit tiatua esirit, nipikipiki ninje aaku laigwenak?
Atiaka ndai kuna aitukurru ndai. Metii atua ndai oltung'ani o obo ora ng'en oidim atirisha olalashe o olalashe?
Kake eishangarra olalashe o olekai, baiki tʼengomom oo lemeiruk?
Mekure eitoriori, teni injangarrarra tʼempolos inyi. Ainyo piminjosho eikunakini ndai entorroni? Ainyo piminyorrurru aatalaita endupoto?
Kake ndai oopeny looitobir ntorrok neisimisho, naa too lalashera.

Amaa miyololo, aajo mejung'u iltorrok enkarsishu Engai? Emilej aten. Mepuo aajung'u looas mbaak torrok oo nkiri o looisyayaki nkulie ain o looar enkidikidikoto olmoruo o eng'oroyoni o lʼenjalan torrono o looisokorisho
o lapurrok o lang'warrak o lamerak o lamorok o laisimak enkarsishu Engai.
Ore kulekai tiatua ndai, naa nji opa etiu. Kake eisujaki ndai neitaai ndai sinyat tiatua engarna Olaitoriani Yesus Kristos o tiatua Olmumua lʼEngai ang'.
Aidimakino pookin, kake meitoriori pookin; aidimakino pookin, kake mayeu naaen o nyoo.
Endaa tʼengoshoke o engoshoke tʼendaa; kake eitarruo Engai pokira are: engoshoke o endaa. Kake ore osesen, me oloo mbaak torrok oo nkiri, kake ol Olaitoriani, neitoki Olaitoriani ol osesen.
Eitopiwuo Engai Olaitoriani nelaitopiu si yook tʼengolon enye.
Arashu miyololo ndai, aajo era seseni linyi rubat e Kristos? Kaitaa rubat e Kristos rubat esindani? Me neijia.
Arashu miyololo ndai, aajo olorubare esindani, naa osesen obo o ninye. Amu ejo: Eaku pokira are enkiring'o nabo.
Kake oloibung'are Olaitoriani, neaku Olmumua obo o ninye.
Enkwet mbaak torrok oo nkiri! Etii enkitarruoto pookin naitobir oltung'ani, oriong' osesen, kake oloitobir mbaak torrok oo nkiri, neitarruoki osesen lenye openy.
Anai miyololo, aajo era osesen linyi engaji Olmumua Sinyati otii atua ndai, linoto tʼEngai nimirara kul inyi oopeny?
Amu einyang'uaki ndai tʼenkinyang'a nagol. Onaa entadarai Engai tʼosesen linyi o tʼolmumua linyi oora lʼEngai.
Ore too kuna baak nikitisirakitia nanu ndai, ajo nanu, eikash, teni meporoo oltung'ani eng'oroyoni.
Kake tʼolbae loo mbaak torrok oo nkiri, njoo olee metaa eata engoroyoni enye kion, njeata si eng'oroyoni olmoruo lenye kion.
Ore olee, njeisho eng'oroyoni enye enanare, njoo si eng'oroyoni meikunaki neijia olee lenye.
Meata enaidim eng'oroyoni tʼosesen lenye kion, kake olee, neijia si etiu olee, meata enaidim tʼosesen lenye kion, kake eng'oroyoni.
Emimitikino ndai aten, neme teni irukuruku pokira are tʼenkata naje, pitumutumu erishata oo sayat, nintokiki aatumo, pemeitasur ndai satan tʼolbae lʼolduruki linyi.
Kake ajo ena, paitadol ndai, maitanap.
Amu ayeu iltung'anak pookin netiu anaa nanu enaikununo. Kake eata oltung'ani pookin enkishooroto naishoo Engai ninye, obo ena, olekai enda.
Kake ajoki leitueamaro o ngolia: sidai too ninje, teni ebik anaa nanu enaikununo.
Kake teni meidim ninje aatobik meama, njeama. Amu eikash, teni eama nelang' empejoto.
Ore lekua ooamishote, naitanap, kake me nanu, kake Olaitoriani, pemeing'ua eng'oroyoni olmoruo lenye, —
kake teni eing'ua, njebik meama, ana eitobirakinore olmoruo lenye, — nemeing'ua olmoruo eng'oroyoni enye.
Ore ilkulekai ajoki nanu ndai, me Olaitoriani: Teni eata olalashe eng'oroyoni nemeiruk, neyeu ina neboitare ninye, njoo mepal ninye.
Ore si eng'oroyoni, teni eata olmoruo lemeiruk, neyeu ilo neboitare ninye, njoo mepal ninye.
Amu etisinyaiyoki olmoruo lemeiruk tʼeng'oroyoni, neitokini aasinyaa eng'oroyoni nemeiruk tʼolmoruo. Teni me neijia, anaata era duruk nkera inyi, kake etaa sinyat taata.
Kake teni erisha lido lemeiruk, njerisha. Teni eikununo nji, meeni olalashe arashu enganashe; kake eipotie Olaitoriani yook eseriani.
Ti aji iyolo iye, eng'oroyoni, an ake intopok olmoruo lino? Anai ti aji iyolo iye, olmoruo, an ake intopok eng'oroyoni ino?
Kake anaa petoorikia Olaitoriani, anaa peipotoko Engai, njelimana oltung'ani pookin neijia.
Teni eipotoki oltung'ani emurata, nemetiu anaa olememurata. Naa teni eipotoki oltung'ani memurata, nememurati.
Me toki emurata, ana teni mimurata me toki, kake teni imbung' nkitanapat Engai.
Njebik oltung'ani pookin tʼenkipototo naipotieki.
Inyorriki ai kimpotoki tʼesingaishu? Miekenyakinore. Kake teni indim atalakunye, tonyorra aikuna nji.
Amu oloipotoki tʼOlaitoriani anaa osinga, nelakuno tʼOlaitoriani; neijia si etiu oloipotoki elakuno, nera osinga le Kristos.
Einyang'uaki ndai tʼenkinyang'a nagol; akae, emiaku singan loo ltung'anak.
Lalashera lainei, njebikie oltung'ani pookin eneipotieki te nebo o Engai.
Kake ore tʼolbae loo ntoiye, maata enkitanapata Olaitoriani, kake aisho ndai enkigwena ai anaa oltung'ani oinoto eng'adunoto Engai, pabik tiatua enkirukoto.
Akae, ajo nanu: Sidai tʼolbae lʼosina otii, teni eikununo oltung'ani pookin nji:
Teni kiteenaki eng'oroyoni, naing'oru elakunoto. Teni ilakunore eng'oroyoni, ming'oru eng'oroyoni.
Kake teni iamisho, mintarruo; naa teni eami entito, nemeitarruo; kake eata looba nji enyamali tʼosesen, anaata ayeu naibooio ndai te ina.
Kake ajo nji, lalashera, amu dorrop enkata. Ore nkulie mbaak, naa kuna: looata ng'oroyok, njetiu anaa lemeata; ore looishir, netiu anaa lemeishir;
ore looshipa, netiu anaa lemeshipa; ore looinyang'u, netiu anaa lemeata toki;
ore looitobirishore ena kop, netiu anaa lemeitobirishore t'entorroni: amu emuta mbaak ena kop.
Ak ayeu ndai pimiekenyanya. Ore olemeama, neshilaa mbaak Olaitoriani, peitiship Olaitoriani;
ore oloamishe, neshilaa mbaak ena kop, peitiship eng'oroyoni.

Kake etii enaor eng'oroyoni nayama o entito. Ore enda nemeama, neshilaa mbaak Olaitoriani, petum ataa sinyati tʼosesen o tʼoltau; kake ore enda nayama, neshilaa mbaak ena kop, anaa peitiship olmoruo lenye.
Atejo kuna, peaku endupoto inyi, neme erreshet apik ndai, kake peitoriori, nisyayakiki ndai Olaitoriani osupatei, meiboiyori ndai.
Kake teni ejo oltung'ani meidim aiboo entito enye enganyit, tiaraki nataa botor, nenare peaku neijia, njeitobir enanyorru, meitarruo: njeami.
Kake ore ilo oibung'a tiatua oltau lenye, tiaraki naa ninye oitore nemeata earakinoto, netayeuo si tʼoltau lenye, peibok entito enye, neiko sidan.
Akae, ore oloamaki entito enye, neitobir sidan, ore olemeamaki, neitobir sidan nelang'.
Eibooki eng'oroyoni too nkitanapat, eton eishiu olmoruo lenye; kake teni ee olmoruo, neishori meama elde oyeu; tiatua Olaitoriani ake.
Kake era ninye tesh nelang', teni ebik nji, anaa paigwenu nanu; amu ajo aata si nanu Olmumua lʼEngai.
Ore too ntokitin naayeng'akini nkulie ain aaitaa nkidasareitin, nikiyolo, amu kiata pookin eyolounoto. Eyolounoto, naitaa sapuk elukunya, kake eshet enyorrata.
Teni ejo oltung'ani eyolo toki, neton eitu eyolo anaa pemeata kata nemeyolo.
Kake ore oltung'ani onyor Engai, ninye eyolouni tʼengomom enye.
Akae, kiyolo mbaak endaa oo nkidasareitin naayakini nkulie ain, aajo mera engai omoni toki tiatua olmaa, nikintoki aayolo, aajo metii engai Ai neme nabo ake.
Naa ten ake etii nkulie naaji ngain te shumata arashu tʼenkop (anaa petii ngain kumok o laitoriak kumok),
kake ore yook, nikiata Engai nabo ake, ninye Papa, nepukunye ntokitin pookin te ninye, nikitii yook atua ninye, o Olaitoriani obo, Yesus Kristos, te ninye etaa ntokitin pookin o yook te ninye.
Kake meata iltung'anak pookin ena yolounoto. Kake eton esuj kulekai o taata nkulie ain, nenya ntokitin naateyeng'akaki ninje, aajo noo nena, neidurukieki nji ndamunot enye, tiaraki nashal.
Kake meitudupaki yook endaa tʼEngai. Teni mikinya, nemeng'oriki yook toki, naa teni kinya, nimikilang'.
Kake eng'orai, pemeaku ena lakunoto inyi enkikoboto oo looshal.
Amu ten emutu kidol olekai tung'ani iye, liata eyolounoto, inya endaa tʼengaji oo nkulie ain, meisisi tʼoltau lenye naa ten ake eshal, penya enateyeng'akaki nkulie ain?
Neimin neijia tʼeyolounoto ino olalashe oshal, otuaiye Kristos ninye.
Kake teni intarruokiki neijia lalashera niariara ndamunot enye naashal, nintarruokiki si Kristos.
Akae, teni eitapong'oo endaa olalashe lai, namanyankiri ai kata, pemaitapong'oo olalashe lai.
Ke malakuno nanu? Mara nanu olairriwani? Keitu adol Yesus. Olaitoriani lang'? Mirara ndai enkyas ai tiatua Olaitoriani?
Teni mara nanu olairriwani too lkulekai, kake ara too ndai. Amu ore olponoto, ajo ara olairriwani, nirara ndai tiatua Olaitoriani.
Ena emitunoto ai too lelo laaikilikwan.
Amaa, mikiata engolon, pekinya arashu pekiok?
Mikiata engolon nikiea enganashe aaku eng'oroyoni anaa ilkulekai airriwak, o lalashera lʼOlaitoriani, o Kefas?
Arashu nanu ake openy o Barnabas lemeata engolon nimikipalie enkyas?
Kalo sikeri oisyaisho nkatitin pookin nemetum olkwaje? Ana kang'ai oun enkuruma oo njanito olmarua nemenya ilng'anayok lenyena? Ana kang'ai oirrita enjoo nemeok kule e inajoo?
Kajo kuna anaa oltung'ani? Ana mejo nkitanapat neijia?
Amu etisiraki too nkitanapat e Mose aajo: Mien olkiteng' enkutuk eidong' ilpaik. Ke ilmong'i eshilaa Engai?
Arashu eitu ejo tʼolbae lang' katukul? Kake etisiraki tʼolbae lang', amu ore olotur enkuruma, njetur tʼeanyunoto, ore oloituutisho, njeituutisho tʼeanyunoto, peiye eng'arie ninye tʼenkata enye.
Teni kituunokitio yook ndai ntokitin emumuaishu, ke entoki sapuk, teni kisambu yook ntokitin enkop inyi?
Ten aa eaku kulekai eng'ar ndai kuna baak, mikilusoo yook? Kake eitu yook kisuj ena golon, kake kiting'iria nkumok, pemikimbooio euangelion e Kristos.
Miyololo ndai, aajo ore looitobirisho tʼengaji sinyati, nenya ne ina aji, o looidasisho tʼolperere lʼenkidasare, nenyaiye olperere.
Neijia si eitanapua Olaitoriani, peata kulo ooinosu euangelion, embaikinoto enye tʼeuangelion.
Kake eitu asuj entoki o nabo too nena. Neitu asir nanu kuna baak, peaku neijia te nanu. Amu enare nae nanu, pemeitai oltung'ani enkitadararoto ai.
Amu teni ainosu lomon lʼeng'ida, namaata enkitadararoto. Amu meata kata namainosu. Ee, kake aiya, teni mainosu lomon lʼeng'ida.
Amu teni aiko kuna tʼenyorrata, natum olkwaje, teni me tʼenyorrata, naaishooki ake ena kisyayare.
Kainyo naa olkwaje lai? Nyele painosu lomon lʼeng'ida aiko nji pesho tʼempuris ake, namaitarruo engolon naata tiatua lomon lʼeng'ida.
Amu alakuno too ltung'anak pookin, kake aaua kion atua esingaishu oltung'ani pookin, patum kumok too ninje.
Too Yudayoi naaku Oyudayos, patum Yudayoi, o too lelo ootii abori oo nkitanapat naaku anaa abori oo nkitanapat, ten ake matii openy abori oo nkitanapat, patum lootii abori oo nkitanapat.
Too lelo lemeata nkitanapat, natiu anaa maata nkitanapat, (kake me anaa maata nkitanapat tʼEngai, kake aata nkitanapat tiatua Kristos), patum lemeata nkitanapat.
Too looshal nataa anaa oloshal, patum looshal. Ataa anaa iltung'anak pookin too mpukunot pookin, patum too ngoitoi pookin aitopua iltung'anak.
Naitobir nanu pookin tʼolbae loo lomon lʼeng'ida, peiye atum atang'ara ninje.
Miyololo ndai, aajo ore lookwet tiatua eneikarruno, nekwet ninje pookin, kake eng'amu obo ake en engilunoto? Neijia enkwet si ndai, pitumutumu aatang'amu.
Ore oltung'ani pookin logilunore, neitore kion too pookin; akae, eng'amu lelo enkaja namuta, ore yook enememuta.
Akae, akwet si nanu nji, me anaa oltung'ani lemeyolo enelo; aara nji, me anaa oloar enkijape.
Kake aibooio osesen lai naisingan ninye, pamainosaki kulekai naaku openy oloiturrari.
Amu mayeu, pemiyololo ndai, lalashera, aajo etii loopapa lang' pookin abori erukenya neim pookin atua olbalbal,
neibatisi pookin atua Mose tiatua erukenya o tiatua olbalbal,
nenya pookin endaa nabo emumuaishu,
neok pookin eokoto nabo emumuaishu, amu etooko tʼosoit lʼemumuaishu lotusujare ninje, nera ele soit Kristos.
Kake eitu eng'ida Engai too lkumok lenye, amu etaraki ninje ti ang'ata.
Etaa nena entoki enkiteng'enare too yook, pimikiaku yook lang'warrak loo ntorrok, anaa petang'warrishote lelo.
Emiaku baiki laisyayak loo nkulie ain, anaa petaa looje too ninje, anaa pesira: Etotonitio olorere aadaa neokisho neinyototo, peiguran.
Njoo mikintobir mbaak torrok oo nkiri anaa peitobira looje too ninje, nerara tʼengolong' nabo elfun tikitam o uni.
Njoo mikintasur baiki Olaitoriani, anaa peitasuro looje too ninje, neimin ninje too lasuria.
Eming'unyung'uny baiki anaa peing'unyung'unya looje too ninje, neimin tʼolaiminieni.
Etaa nena pookin, peaku entoki enkiteng'enare oo lelo, nesiri, peaku erojata too yook looinepua emutata enkop.
Onaa, olojo eitashe, peing'oraa, pemebatata.
Eitu einepu ndai enkitasuroto neme nʼentung'anishu; kake era Engai supat nemeisho eitasuri ndai nalang' enindimidimi, kake eitaa tʼenkitasuroto empukunoto, pindimidimi aatanap ninye.
Akae, lalashera lainei, elanya enkisyayare oo nkulie ain.
Airorie ndai anaa iltung'anak ng'eni; entetem enalimu.
Ore enkwaru emayani nikimayan, mera ninye enkidikidikoto osarge le Kristos? Ore olmkate likibelibel yook, mera ninye enkidikidikoto osesen le Kristos?
Tiaraki nara olmkate obo, nikira si yook ilkumok osesen obo, amu king'ar yook pookin olmkate obo.
Eng'orai Israel eneikununo too mbaak osesen. Ore kulo ooinos nkidasareitin, meidikidikore ninje si olperere?
Kajo aa? Kajo entoki nateyeng'akaki nkulie ain, ninye toki?
Kake ajo: Ore ntokitin naaidasishore loreren lemeata Engai, neidasaki loiriruani, me Engai; namayeu nanu ndai ping'aring'ara loiriruani.
Mindimidimi ndai aatook enkwaru Olaitoriani o enkwaru oo loiriruani, nimindimidimi aatang'ar enaraa Olaitoriani o enaraa oo loiriruani.
Arashu king'elaki Olaitoriani? Ke kiata yook engolon aalang' ninye?
Aidimakino pookin, kake me pookin naisho endupoto; naidimakino pookin, kake me pookin nashet.
Njoo meing'oru oltung'ani nkun enyena, kake baiki nʼolekai.
Entoki pookin natii tʼenemirishoreki, entaam, niminkilikwanunu tʼolbae loo ndamunot.
Amu: En Engai enkop o emborei enye.
Kake ore teni eipot ndai obo too lemeiruk, pinyanya endaa te nebo o ninje, niyeuu nipuopuo, entaam pookin naisho ndai, niminkilikwanunu tʼolbae loo ndammunot.
Naa teni ejoki ndai oltung'ani: eteyeng'akaki kuna kiri nkulie ain, eminya, tʼolbae le ilo otiaka ndai o pimitutu ndamunot.
Kake me ndamunot inono, ajo ndamunot olekai. Ainyo peigwenakini elakunoto ai too ndamunot olekai?
Teni anya aliki ashe, ainyo paamori tʼolbae loo nena natejoiye ashe?
Akae, teni inyanya arashu iokioko arashu intobiribiri toki, entobira pookin, peaku nʼenkitook Engai.
Eminjo enkikoboto Yudayoi, ana Ilgrikini, ana esirit Engai,
neijia anaa paitiship si nanu iltung'anak pookin, namaing'oru endupoto ai, kake en oolkumok, petum aatopok.
Entaa ndai lasujak lainei, neijia anaa para nanu olasujani le Kristos.
Aitadaraa ndai, lalashera, tiaraki nikidamumu nanu too ntokitin pookin nimbung'arere rregieita laishoo ndai.
Nayeu ndai niyololo, aajo era elukunya olee pookin Kristos, ore elukunya eng'oroyoni, naa olmoruo, ore elukunya e Kristos, naa Engai.
Ore olee pookin osaisho arashu oitayolou mbaak e akenya, teni eitoip elukunya, nemepik elukunya enye enganyit.
Ore eng'oroyoni pookin nasaisho arashu naitayolou mbaak e akenya, teni meitoip elukunya, nemepik elukunya enye enganyit; netiu anaa etabarnoki.
Teni eitu eitoip eng'oroyoni elukunya, njebarni ninye. Kake tiaraki nemeaku tʼeng'oroyoni, teni edung'i ilpapit ana ebarni, njeitoip elukunya.
Kake ore olee, njoo meitoip elukunya, tiaraki naa ninye emua o enkitook Engai. Kake ore eng'oroyoni, naa enkitook olmoruo.
Amu eitu eing'ua olee atua eng'oroyoni, kake eng'oroyoni natung'aiye atua olee.
Neitu eitobiri olee tʼolbae reng'oroyoni, kake eng'oroyoni tʼolbae lʼolee.
Onaa, eikash, teni eata engolon tʼelukunya tʼolbae loo lmalaikan.
Kake eikununo nji: mera eng'oroyoni metii olmoruo, nemera olmoruo metii eng'oroyoni tiatua Olaitoriani.
Amu anaa eng'oroyoni eing'ua olee, neija etii olee tʼeng'oroyoni; kake eing'ua pookin Engai.
Engwenare ndai oopeny: Keitoriori, teni esai eng'oroyoni Engai eitu eitoip elukunya?
Arashu meiteng'en ndai enkitobirunoto ajo ore teni eata olee ilpapit ooado, neaku enkurruna te ninye,
neija teni eata eng'oroyoni ilpapit ooado, naa enkitook te ninye? amu eishooki ilpapit aaku eopet enye.
Teni etii oltung'ani onyor enjangar, mikiata yook orregie oba nji, nemeata si sirito Engai.
Ore aisho ndai ena kitanapata, maitadaraa ndai, tiaraki nimitumomo tʼorregie oikash, kake tʼorregie torrono nelang'.
Ore en enkiterata, teni itumomo tʼesirit, natoning'o ajo etii rishat atua ndai, nairuk ematua oo nona.
Amu meata kata nemeaku rishat tiatua ndai, peibaluni loora supati tiatua ndai.
Kake teni itumomo, nemenyai endaa Olaitoriani.
Amu teni iyeuu ninyanya endaa sinyati, neng'as pookin anya endaa enye openy, neata olekai olamei, nemera olekai.
Amaa, miatata ngajijik inyi ninyayeye niokioko? Arashu imenimene ndai esirit Engai nintukurrurru kulo lemeata toki? Kajoki aa ndai? Kaitadaraa ndai? Tʼolbae loo nona maitadaraa ndai.
Amu atang'amua nanu tʼOlaitoriani enaishoo ndai, ajo eibung'a Olaitoriani Yesus te ina kiarie naitarasarieki ninye, olmkate
nejo ashe nebelibel ejo: Enkoito, entaam! Era ele osesen lai logilieki ndai; enkuna ena, pekidamumu nanu.
Neijia eibung'a baiki enkwaru, eidipa endaata, ejo: Era ena kwaru osotua ng'ejuk tiatua osarge lai; enkuna ena oshi, teni iokioko, pekidamumu nanu.
Amu oshi, teni inyanya ele mkate niokioko ena kwaru, enosutu enkea Olaitoriani, metabana nelotu ninye.
Ore olonya olmkate neok enkwaru Olaitoriani, meitobirakino, nelatumoki kion earata osesen o osarge lʼOlaitoriani.
Akae, njeleen oltung'ani kion, petum ainosa nji ele mkate neok ena kwaru.
Amu olonya neok, meitobirakino, nenya neokoki kion enkigwena, tiaraki nemeitaa kitok osesen lʼOlaitoriani.
Onaa, etii atua ndai ilkumok loora menat o loomoiyaa neirura ematua kitok.
Amu teni kingwenaki aten, nemeigwenakini yook.
Ore peigwenaki yook Olaitoriani, neitubuluni yook, pemedeki yook te nebo o olmaa.
Onaa, lalashera lainei, teni itumomo te nebo aanya endaa, entaanyunoto ndai aten.
Ore teni eata obo olamei, nenya tʼengaji enye, pemeaku oltumo linyi ol enkigwena. Ore nkulie naatong'oro, teni alotu naitobir.
Mayeu, lalashera, pimiyololo mbaak emumuaishu.
Iyololo, aajo itang'asa aaku lemeata Engai, nipuopuo enetii muain nemeiro, anaa petorikoki ndai.
Onaa, aitayolo ndai, ajo metii oltung'ani loiro tiatua Olmumua lʼEngai ojo: Njedeki Yesus! Nemetii oloidim atejo: Olaitoriani Yesus! neme tʼOlmumua Sinyati.
Etii rishat oo nkishoorot, kake etii Olmumua obo;
netii rishat oo nkisyayareitin, kake etii Olaitoriani obo;
netii rishat oo nkitobirat, kake etii Engai nabo naitobir pookin tiatua pookin.
Eishori oltung'ani pookin enkitaduaroto Olmumua, peaku endupoto oo pookin.
Amu eishori oltung'ani obo tʼOlmumua ororei lʼeng'eno, o olekai ororei lʼeyolounoto, tʼele Mumua ake,
o olekai enkirukoto tiatua ele Mumua, o olekai nkishoorot enkishiunoto tiatua Olmumua obo,
o olekai enkidimata oo ngoloni, o olekai eyolounoto e akenya, o olekai enkitooroto oo lmumuan, o olekai nkutukie kumok, o olekai enkitaalata oo nkutukie.
Neitobir kuna pookin Olmumua obo orisio neoriki oltung'ani pookin anaa peyeu ninye.
Amu neijia anaa pera obo osesen neata rubat kumok naa rubat pookin nʼosesen obo, teni era ninje baiki kumok, naa n'osesen obo ake: neijia baiki Kristos.
Amu eibatisaki yook pookin tʼOlmumua obo, pekiaku osesen obo, ten aa Yudayoi, ana Ilgrikini, ana singan, ana loolakuno, neitooki pookin atua Olmumua obo.
Ore si osesen, nemera erubata nabo, kake rubat kumok.
Teni ejo enkeju: mara engaina, akae, mara en osesen, — ainyo, me en osesen ninye?
O teni ejo enkiyok: mara engong'u, akae, mara en osesen, — ainyo, me en osesen ninye?
Ten aa osesen olulung'a engong'u, kodee ening'oto? Ten aa osesen ening'oto katukul, ti aji eing'uaya?
Kake etipika Engai rubat pookin tiatua osesen, anaa petayeuo.
Teni era rubat pookin erubata nabo, kodee osesen?
Kake etaa taata rubat kumok, kake osesen obo.
Nemeidim engong'u atiaki engaina: Mikitumoki nanu; arashu meidim elukunya atiaki nkejek: Mikitumokiki nanu.
Kake enare kuna rubat osesen naalio eshalu naleng', neyeuni naleng',
o nena rubat osesen nikijo etong'orikitia enganyit too nkulie, nikinjo enganyit naleng'; o nena naaitukurru yook, nikintaa kituak aaitulusoo.
Amu ore nena rubat supati ang', nemelaita enkitadararoto. Kake eitushula Engai osesen, neisho enganyit idia rubata natong'orikia,
pemeaku eoroto tiatua osesen, kake peshilaro pookin aten.
Naa teni emoi erubata nabo, neme nkulie pookin te nebo; ore teni eitaai kitok erubata nabo, neng'idakino nkulie pookin.
Kake irara osesen le Kristos o rubat enyena anaa perisiore oltung'ani pookin.

Netipika Engai iltung'anak tiatua esirit; ore lʼenkiterata lairriwak, ore liare layolounok, ore li okuni laiteng'enak, ore tekurum looitobir nkidimat, ore tekurum nkishoorot naaishiunyeki loomoi, o laretok, o looitorisho, o nkutukie naaoro.
Ke, lairriwak pookin? Ana layolounok pookin? Ana laiteng'enak pookin? Ana nkidimat pookin?
Ana keata pookin enkishooroto naishiunye loomoi? Ana keiro pookin too kulekai ng'ejepa? Ana keitaal pookin ninje?
Kake entonyok, pitumutumu nkishoorot kituak naleng', napon aitadol ndai engoitoi naikash naleng'.
Ten emutu airo too lng'ejepa loo ltung'anak o loo lmalaikan, namaata enyorrata, anaata ara olduala oorito o elil naoru.
Ten emutu aata eyolounoto nayolo mikiot pookin o eng'eno pookin, ten emutu aata enkirukoto pookin, paidurrie ildonyo, namaata enyorrata, namara toki.
Ten emutu aoriki laisinak masaa ainei pookin naishooio osesen lai, peikie enkima, namaata enyorrata, namaaku toki.
Eng'iri enyorrata, ebor enyorrata, megil tau, meyang'iyang' enyorrata, meikarrikar,
melau enganyit, meing'oru enara enenye, meitagoroi, meiken entorroni,
meng'idakino enemeitoriori, kake eng'idakino esipata;
enyuakino pookin, eiruk pookin, neanyu pookin, eng'iriakino pookin.
Meitoki amuta enyorrata. Teni aa yolounot, nepuo aamuta; teni aa nkutukie, nepuo aaiting'; teni aa eng'eno, nelamuta.
Amu kiata eng'eno ematua ake, nikiyolou ne akenya ematua ake.
Teni ebau embaiaroto, nelaishunye nʼematua.
Ore opa ara enkerai, airoro anaa enkerai, naata eng'eno anaa enkerai, aaibirribir anaa enkerai; ore ataa olee, naing'ua enkeraishu.
Amu kidolita taata tiatua enking'oret anaa tʼoloyote; ore te ina kata engomom tʼengomom. Atayolo taata ematua, kake alayolou te ina kata naleng', anaa paatayolouoki si nanu.
Akae, ebik taata enkirukoto, eanyunoto, enyorrata, kuna uni; kake era enyorrata kitok too kuna nelang'.
Entusuj enyorrata, ninyokinyoko aaing'oru nkishoorot emumuaishu, enaikash teni intayolouu ne akenya.
Amu ore ilo oiro tʼolekai ng'ejep, nemeirorie iltung'anak, kake Engai; nemening' olekai, eiro ninye ake mikiot tʼOlmumua.
Kake oloitayolou ne akenya, neirorie iltung'anak, peaku nʼenjetakinoto o nʼendiding'aroto o nʼenkilejilejata.
Ore oloiro tʼolekai ng'ejep, neshet kion; kake oloitayolou ne akenya, neshet esirit.

Kake ayeu taata ndai pookin niroro too lng'ejepa, o naleng', teni intayolouu ne akenya. Amu ore oloitayolou ne akenya, nelang' oloiro too lng'ejepa, teni meitaai ninye ninje, peiye etum esirit enjetakinoto.
Onaa, lalashera, ten emut eaku alotu enitiiti, airo too lng'ejepa, kaa dupoto itumutumu te nanu, teni mairorie ndai tʼembolunoto ana tʼeyolounoto ana tʼenkitayolounoto ana tʼenkiteng'enare?
Neijia etiu ntokitin nemeishiu naaisho oltoilo, anaa enkisulet arashu enkinanda; teni meisho ninje iltoiloi ooro, kaji eikuni teni eyolouni enaoshi tʼenkisulet arashu tʼenkinanda?
Arashu teni eoshi emowuo tʼoltoilo lemeyolounoi, kang'ai oitobirakinore enjore?
Neijia si itiuu ndai, teni iroro too lng'ejepa nimiatata rorei ooyolounoi, kaji eiko teni eyolo iltung'anak, enilimumu? Amu iroro anaa atua enkijape.
Etii iltoiloi loo muain kumok tiatua olmaa, kake metii nemeyolounoi.
Teni mayolou enkutuk enye, naaku omoni tʼele oiro, neaku ilo oiro, olomoni te nanu.
Neijia si ndai liyeuu nkishoorot emumuaishu, entonyok aaing'oru enkumoi oo nkishoorot nishetietie esirit.
Akae, ore oloiro too lng'ejepa, njesaisho nji, peitaai si.
Amu teni asaisho too lng'ejepa, nesai Olmumua lai, kake meaki eng'eno ai ilmomo oltung'ani o obo.
Ainyo naa enaikash? Ayeu nasai tʼolmumua lai naitoki asai tʼeng'eno ai. Arany singolioitin lʼEngai tʼolmumua lai, narany tʼeng'eno ai si.
Kake teni imayan tʼolmumua, kaji eiko teni eiruk ele otii ewueji oo laning'ok ajo: Amen, tʼelikinoto ashe ino, teni meyolo eniroro?
Esipa, iliki iye ashe naleng', kake eitu eitagoli olekai te ina.
Aliki Engai ashe, tiaraki nairo too lng'ejepa nalang' ndai pookin;
kake tiatua esirit, ayeu nairo rorei imiet ake tʼeng'eno ai, paiteng'en ilkulekai, nelang' airo rorei iip kat iip too lng'ejepa.
Lalashera, emiaku nkera tiatua eng'eno inyi; kake tiatua ntorrok entaa nkera, kake entaa baiarot tiatua eng'eno inyi.
Etisiraki tiatua nkitanapat: Ayeu nairorie ele orere too kulekai ng'ejepa o too nkutukie oo lomon, nemaaning' ninje nanu, etejo Olaitoriani.
Akae, era ilng'ejepa ilponot loo lemeiruk, neme loo looiruk, kake era enkitayoloto e akenya en oo looiruk, neme noo lemeiruk.
Ten emutu etumo esirit nalulung'a tʼewueji nebo neiro pookin too lng'ejepa, neitoki aapuonu iltung'anak leme ng'eni ana lemeiruk, anaata mejo iatata oloirirua?
Kake ten eaku eitayolou pookin lomon lʼEngai, nelotu olemeiruk ana olemeyolo toki, nediding' neigwenaki pookin ninye;
ore mbaak oltau lenye naaisudori, neibalunyeki, nebatata tʼengomom enye aserem Engai, neiruk ajo etii Engai atua ndai esipa.
Ainyo naa, lalashera? Teni itumomo ndai, niatata pookin isingolioitin lʼEngai, enkiteng'enare, embolunoto, ilng'ejepa, enkitaalata; enjoo ntokitin pookin meidipata nʼenjetata.
Teni eiro oltung'ani too lng'ejepa, njoo metaa aare, ana teni elusoo, neaku okuni, kake tʼolkereri, ninjosho obo, peitaalu.
Naa teni metii oloitaal, njegira ilo tiatua esirit, neirorie kion o Engai.
Enjoo layolounok loo lomon lʼEngai eiro aare arashu okuni, ninjosho ilkulekai metirisha.
Kake teni etum olekai oton tene embolunoto, negira ol enkiterata.
Amu indimidimi ndai pookin aatayolou, me obo ake, peiteng'enuo pookin nediding! pookin.
Ore ilmumuan loo layolounok, nening' layolounok.
Amu ore Engai, me Engai enjangar, kake en eseriani.
Anaa tiatua sirito pookin oo sinyat, enjoo egira ng'oroyok tiatua esirit. Amu eitu eishori ninje, peirorie, kake pening' anaa enatejo nkitanapat.
Naa teni eyeu neiteng'enuo toki, njoo meikilikwana ilmoruak lenye too ngajijik, amu enkurruna tʼeng'oroyoni, teni eiro tʼesirit.
Ainyo, ai ndai eing'ua ororei lʼEngai, ana ndai etabaikia ake?
Ore oltung'ani pookin oiken kion ajo olayolounoni arashu ol Olmumua, njeyolou nona baak nasiraki ndai, amu nkitanapat Olaitoriani.
Naa ten eaku emoda oltung'ani, njemoda.
Akae, lalashera lainei, entonyok piakuku layolounok, emimitiki eiro too lng'ejepa.
Enjoo ntokitin pookin eitoriori neaku tʼorregie sidai.
Aitayolo ndai, lalashera, lomon lʼeng'ida lainosaka ndai, ning'amumu baiki nintasheshe tiatua ninje,
ipokipoko baiki too ninje, teni imbung'ubung'u ele rorei anaa painosaka ndai; ten emutu me, anaata iruko pesho.
Amu aitarasaka ndai tʼenkata elukunya kuna natang'amua si nanu openy, ajo etua Kristos tʼolbae loo nkitarruot ang' anaa pejo sirat,
ajo etunukaki neitopiuni tʼengolong' e uni, anaa pejo sirat,
ajo etalie te Kefas, tekurum too lelo tomon o are.
Tekurum nelioi too lalashera loolang' iip imiet te nebo, neishiu ilkumok lenye metabaiki taata, neirurate ilkulekai.
Nelioi tekurum te Yakobos, tekurum too lairriwak pookin.
Ore tekurum oo pookin nelioi baiki te nanu anaa lʼeiunoto neitu ebaia.
Amu ara nanu olkiti loo lairriwak nemeaku paaipoti nanu olairriwani, amu atimira esirit Engai.
Kake ara tʼeng'adunoto Engai olara, neitu eaku eng'adunoto Engai pesho tiatua nanu, amu atopona anyamalu nalang' ninje pookin, me nanu baiki, kake eng'adunoto Engai naarubare nanu.
Kake ten aa nanu arashu ninje, neijia kinko teni kinosu lomon, naa neija iruko.
Kake teni einosuni Kristos, ajo etopiwuo too lootuata, kejo aa kulekai too ndai, aajo meatai empiunoto oo lootuata?
Teni metii empiunoto oo lootuata, eitu epiu baiki Kristos.
Teni eitu epiu Kristos, akae, era enkinosunoto ang' en e pesho naa ne pesho enkirukoto inyi.
Netumi baiki yook anaa iljaken lʼelejare lʼEngai, tiaraki nikinjakenokitio Engai empaashata, aajo eitopiwuo ninye Kristos leitu eitopiu, teni mepiu lootuata;
amu teni mepiu lootuata, neitu epiu baiki Kristos.
Teni eitu epiu Kristos, nera enkirukoto inyi pesho, nepon itiiti atua nkitarruot inyi.
Akae, neimina si ninje looirurate tiatua Kristos.
Teni kianyu Kristos tiatua ena puan ake, nikira yook laisinak too ltung'anak pookin.
Ore taata etopiwuo Kristos too lootuata nera ol elukunya loo looirura.
Amu oltung'ani obo oaua enkea, naa oltung'ani obo oaua empiunoto oo lootuata.
Amu anaa petuata ninje pookin te Adam, neijia epuoi aaitopiu pookin te Kristos.
Kake oltung'ani pookin tʼerisioroto enye: Ol elukunya Kristos, tekurum loora le Kristos tʼelotunoto enye,
tekurum enkiting'oto, teni eitarasaki ninye Engai o Papa enkarsishu, neidip enkitoria pookin o engolon o enkidimata pookin.
Meata kata nemeitorisho ninye metabana nepik ilmang'ati lenyena pookin abori oo nkejek enyena.
Ore olmang'atinda obaiye opuoi aaidip, naa enkea.
Amu etipika pookin abori oo nkejek enyena. Teni ejo, etipikaki pookin abori, neibalunye ajo nemetii ilo otipika pookin abori enkitoria enye.
Kake teni etii pookin abori enkitoria enye, te ina kata nening' si Oinoti ilo otipika pookin abori enkitoria enye, peiye eaku Engai pookin tiatua pookin.
Anai kaji eiko lelo ooibatisi tʼolbae loo lootuata, teni mepiu lootuata katukul? Ainyo peibatisi tʼolbae lenye?
Nikitii yook enemeserian ngolong'i pookin?
Esipa, tʼenkitadararoto naata te Kristos Yesus, Olaitoriani lang', ae engolong' pookin.
Ten aa tʼempukunoto oo ltung'anak ataarare lowuarak te Efesos, kaa dupoto aata te ina? Teni mepiu lootuata: „Mataam nikiok, amu kituata taisere!“
Eminjo eimalimalie ndai. Eitarruo ilderrat torrok rregieita sidan.
Enyeito osupatei, emias ntorrok! Amu etii kulekai lemeyolo Engai oo toki; ajo ena aitukurru ndai.
Ore eikilikwan oltung'ani: Kaji eikuni teni eitopiuni lootuata? Kalo sesen epuonunye?
Iye, lemodai, enisuaia mepiu, teni mee.
Ore enisuaia, mera ninye osesen, oaku tekurum, kake embeu ake, anaa en entapa arashu nabo oo nkulie pookin.
Kake Engai naisho osesen anaa peyeu ninye openy, neisho pookin nabo too mbeun osesen lenye.
Nkiri pookin mera enkiring'o nabo; kake engai en oo ltung'anak, engai en oo ntaritik, engai en oo singir.
Netii seseni le shumata o seseni lʼenkop.
Eata engolong' engai kilang'et, neata olapa engai kilang'et; kake epaasha olakira obo tʼolekai tʼenkilang'et.
Neija eaku empiunoto oo lootuata. Eisuari tiatua entiinoto narruoio neitopiuni tiatua entiinoto nemerruoio.
Eisuari tiatua entiinoto emenata, neitopiuni tiatua entiinoto enkitook. Eisuari tiatua enjalan, neitopiuni tiatua engolon.
Eisuari osesen lʼenkishon, neitopiuni osesen lʼemumuaishu. Ten etii osesen lʼenkishon, netii si osesen lʼemumuaishu.
Anaa petisiraki: Etaa oltung'ani lʼenkiterata Adam oltau oishiu; neaku ilo Adam lʼenkiting'oto Olmumua loisho empuan.
Kake mera osesen lʼemumuaishu ol enkiterata, kake ol enkishon, nesuj ol emumuaishu.
Ore oltung'ani lʼenkiterata eing'ua enkop naa ol enterit; ore oltung'ani liare, neing'ua shumata.
Anaa peikununo ele lʼenterit, neijia si etiu lʼenterit; eneikununo ele le shumata, neijia si eikununo kulo le shumata.
Anaa peitanapa emua e ilo lʼenterit, neijia si kipuo aanap emua e ilo le shumata.
Kake ajo ele rorei, lalashera: meidim nkiri o osarge aatujung'u enkarsishu Engai; nemejung'u naarruoio nena nemerruoio.
Eng'orai, aliki ndai emikio: Mikipuo pookin aairura, kake epuoi aaitaal yook pookin;
neaku neijia nabokata anaa tʼenkirriabata engong'u, teni eoshi emowuo enkiting'oto. Amu eru emowuo neinyototo lootuata eata empuan nemerruoio, neitaali yook.
Amu meata kata nemeishop ena narruoio enemerruoio, ore ena nae, neishop ina nemee.
Teni eishop ena narruoio enemerruoio nelaishop ena nae enemee, nelaaku ororei etisiraki:
Etoijoiyoki enkea tiatua engilunoto. Kaji etii, enkea, engilunoto ino? Kaji etii, enkea, olkikarret lino?
Kake era olkikarret lʼenkea enkitarruoto, nera engolon enkitarruoto nkitanapat.
Ashe Engai naisho yook engilunoto tʼOlaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos!
Onaa, lalashera lainei lanyor, entuunoto, eming'unung'un, entopon naleng' aaitobir oshi enkyas Olaitoriani, iyololo, aajo mera enyamali inyi en e pesho tiatua Olaitoriani.
Ore tʼolbae lʼesotore oo ngoshola, peishori sinyat, enkuna neijia anaa paitanapa si sirito naatii Galatia.
Tʼengolong' elukunya enjuma pookin, njepik pookin too ndai neshumaki kion enanyorru, pemetii enkitaunoto oo ngoshola, teni alotu.
Ore teni abau, nairriwaa lelo ligelulu ndai oopeny, te nebo o mpala, peaki ninje nkishoorot inyi Yerusalem.
Ore teni enare nalo si nanu, nepuo ninje te nebo o nanu.
Kake alotu enitiiti ndai, teni aimua Makedonia, amu aimu Makedonia.
Abik too ndai enkiti kata arashu si enkata oloirujuruj, pekintarere ndai nanu ewueji enalo nanu.
Amu mayeu naduare ndai taata tʼolototo lai, kake ajo nanu alabik enkata naje te nebo o ndai, teni enyorru Olaitoriani.
Kake abik te Efesos metabaiki Pentekoste,
amu aatabolokoki enkishomi kitok naau ilmomo kumok, netii si ilmang'ati.
Teni elotu Timoteos, eng'orai, peton te nebo o ndai metii enkuretishu; amu eitobir enkyas Olaitoriani anaa nanu openy.
Njoo memen o obo ninye. Entario ninye tʼeseriani, pelotu enatii; amu aanyita ninye te nebo o lelo alashera.
Ore tʼolbae le Apolos, olalashe lang', entayolo, aajo atididing'a ninye naleng', pelotu enitiiti ndai te nebo o lalashera; kake eitu eyeu nelotu taata, kake elotu teni etumoki.
Enjololoto, entasheito tʼenkirukoto, nitiuu anaa leak, entagol!
Entobira ntokitin pookin tʼenyorrata.
Aitadamu ndai, lalashera, piyolouu engaji e Stefanos, amu ninje ilmomo lʼelukunya te Akaya nepik aten atua enkisyayare oo sinyat.
Entoning' ninje ooba nji o pookin looitobir enkyas nenyamalu te nebo.
Ang'ida tʼolbae lʼelotunoto e Stefanos o Fortunatos o Akaikos; amu ore pookin natong'oro too ndai, eitabaitie ninje.
Amu eeng'ieng'ie Olmumua lai o ilmumuan linyi; akae, entayolou ootiu neijia.
Eiroroki ndai sirito naatii Asia. Eiroroki ndai naleng' tiatua Olaitoriani Akwila o Priskila te nebo o esirit tʼengaji enye.
Eiroroki ndai lalashera pookin. Erorokinoto ndai aten tʼeng'ututata sinyati.
Ore nanu, Paulos, airoroki ndai tʼengaina ai.
Ore oltung'ani pookin lemenyor Olaitoriani, njeaku anatema. Maran ata (eji: njedeki. Wou, Olaitoriani lang'.)
Njeboitare ndai eng'adunoto Olaitoriani Yesus Kristos.
Ore enyorrata ai, njeboitare ndai pookin tiatua Kristos Yesus. Amen.
Paulos, olairriwani le Yesus Kristos tʼeyeunoto Engai, o olalashe Timoteos: en esirit Engai natii Korintos ena palai, te nebo o sinyat pookin tiatua Akaia nalulungʼa.
Njeboitare ndai engʼadunoto o eseriani naingʼua Engai, Papa lang', o Olaitoriani Yesus Kristos.
Njeitadarari Engai o Menye lʼOlaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos, lora Papa lʼeng'adunoto o Engai enkilejilejata.
Eilejilej yook tiatua enkilishoto ang' pookin, pikindim aailejileja si yook kulo lootii atua enkilishoto pookin tʼenkilejilejata nailejilejie Engai yook.
Amu anaa pepona sinaitin le Kristos too yook, neijia nepona si enkilejilejata nailejilejie yook Kristos.
Teni kitum yook enkilishoto, neaku enkilejilejata o enkitopuata inyi; teni eilejileji yook, neaku enkilejilejata inyi, teni ing'iriri lelo sinaitin anaa pking'iri si yook.
Nikiata eng'idaroto nagol tʼolbae linyi, tiaraki nikiyolo, aajo anaa ping'aring'ara nkisilot, neijia si enkilejilejata.
Amu mikiyeu nimiyololo, lalashera, mbaak osina lang' nikinoto te Asia, njere einepua yook olemikindimaa, peking'arrirrore empuan ang' si,
nikiata yook enkigwena enkea tiatua aten. Etaa nona, pemiking'idare yook aten, kake Engai naitopiu lootuata;
eitopua yook tʼenkea naba nji, neton eitopok yook engolong' pookin; nikianyita ninye ajo elaitopok yook baiki akenya,
tʼeretokinoto inyi, teni isayakiki yook, peliki iltung'anak kumok ashe tʼolbae lʼeng'adunoto naishooki yook.

Ore enkitadararoto ang' naa ina: eijakenu oltoilo lʼoltau lang', aajo tʼesinyatishu o tʼesipata Engai, neme tʼeng'eno entung'anishu, kake tʼeng'adunoto Engai, kitilimanate tiatua ele maa, naleng' too ndai.
Amu eitu kisiraki ndai nkulie neme nena nisomama ana niyolouu, nairuk ajo ipuopuo aatayolou yook metabaiki enkiting'oto, neijia anaa pitayoloutuo yook tʼematua.
Amu kira yook enkitadararoto inyi, neijia anaa pirara si ndai enkitadararoto ang' atua engolong' Olaitoriani Yesus.
Ore tiatua ena ng'idaroto najo te ina kata alotu enitiiti, pintokiki aatum enkishooroto,
naimaa ndai alo Makedonia, naitoki arrinyokino ndai aing'ua Makedonia, pikintarere aaitabaiki Yudaya.
Ore adamu nena, kaing'ashaiye? Arashu ketaa noo nkiri natayeuo? Me neijia. Kake era ee ee, ore me naa me, te nanu.
Kake supat Engai, tiaraki neitu eaku nikirorie ndai ee o me,
kake ore Oinoti lʼEngai likinosutua nanu o Silvanos o Timoteos too ndai, neitu eaku ee o me, kake etaa ee tiatua ninye.
Amu era nkisiligat Engai pookin ee te ninye, neaku Amen te ninye, peitadarari Engai tʼolbae lang'.
Kake Engai ninye naitagolo yook te nebo o ndai tiatua Kristos, neel yook,
nepik ninye yook olmishire neisho yook enkiterunoto Olmumua tiatua iltauja lang'.
Naipot nanu Engai, peaku oljakeni te shumata oltau lai, ajo aing'urrie ndai, tiaraki neitu aitoki alotu enitiiti ndai engalo Korintos.
Neme, pikintore yook enkirukoto inyi, kake kira laretok Eng'ida inyi, amu intasheshe ndai tiatua enkirukoto.
Kake atejo, paiko neijia, pamaitoki alotu tʼenkilishoto enitiiti ndai.
Amu teni ailishie nanu ndai, ang'ai laaiting'id nanu, teni me ilo lailishie?
Onaa, atisiraka ndai nona, peiye, teni alotu, matum enkilishoto too lelo lemeata kata namang'idare ninje; amu airukore ndai pookin, ajo ore eng'ida ai, naa eng'ida inyi si.
Amu tʼosina kitok o emion oltau atisiraka ndai, o too lkiyo kumok: neme pitumutumu ndai enkilishoto, kake piyolouu enyorrata kitok naata too ndai.
Ore teni eishoo oltung'ani enkilishoto, neitu aailishie nanu, kake eilishie tʼematua, — pamairoshiye — ndai pookin.
Kake ebaiki oltung'ani otiu neijia, teni einoto ninye earata naba nji too ltung'anak kumok;
enaikash, teni iponipono aapalaki ndai ninye nilejilejeje oltau lenye pemeimisori ninye tiatua enkilishoto nalang'.
Akae, adiding' ndai, pintokiki ndai aanyor ninye.
Amu atisiraka ndai, patum atujurro ndai, ten aa iruko ndai tiatua mbaak pookin.
Ore ele ling'uaikiki ndai toki, naing'uaiki si nanu. Amu ore nanu, teni aing'uaiki oltung'ani toki, naing'uaiki tʼolbae linyi tʼengomom Olaitoriani;
pemegilu yook satan; amu metiu, ajo mikiyolou yeunot enyena.
Ore palotu Troas ainosu euangelion e Kristos, aatabolokoki kutukaji tiatua Olaitoriani,
neitu aeng'ieng'a tʼolmumua lai, tiaraki neitu atum Titos, olalashe lai; kake kintanapate o ninje, naing'ua ninje ajing' Makedonia.
Nikiliki Engai ashe naisho yook oshi ake engilunoto tiatua Kristos, nebolu erropili eyolounoto enye too yook too wuejitin pookin.
Amu tʼEngai kira yook erropili sidai e Kristos tiatua lelo oopok o tiatua lelo ooimin:
Too kulo kira erropili naing'ua enkea atua enkea, kake too lekua erropili naing'ua empuan atua empuan. Naa ang'ai oidipakine too kuna baak?
Amu mikitiu yook anaa ilkumok, ooitarruo ororei lʼEngai, kake kinosu anaa lʼesipata ooing'ua Engai nikitii tʼengomom Engai atua Kristos.
Ke kitang'asa aaitoki aaitadaraa aten? Arashu kiyeu anaa looje, mpala enkitadararoto too ndai?
Ndai empalai ang' natisiraki tiatua iltauja lang', nayoloi neisomai too ltung'anak pookin;

tiaraki neibalunyeki ndai, aajo irara empalai e Kristos naitobiraki tʼenkisyayare ang'; eitu esiri tʼerokan, kake tʼOlmumua lʼEngai naishiu, me tiatua soito dapashi oogol, kake tiatua soito loo nkiri loo ltauja.
Kiata eng'idaroto naba nji te Kristos atua Engai,
me tiaraki nikira toki te aten nikidamu anaa te aten, kake eing'ua enkidimata ang' Engai
naishoo yook maidimai anaa laisyayak lʼosotua ng'ejuk, me lʼesirata, kake lʼOlmumua; amu ear esirata metua, kake eisho Olmumua empuan.
Kake teni eata enkisyayare enkea tiatua sirat, natabatuaki too soito, enkitook, neitu eidim baiki nkera Israel aaing'orai engomom e Mose tʼolbae lʼenkitook namuta engomom enye,
me naleng' eitoki aata enkisyayare Olmumua enkitook?
Amu teni eata enkisyayare endiata enkitook, me naleng' epon aata enkisyayare esupato enkitook?
Amu meikeni enkitook e ina matua naitaai opa kitok tʼolbae lʼena kitook nalang' tukul.
Amu teni eata enda naiting', enkitook, me naleng' eata ena nabik, enkitook?
Akae, ore pikiata eanyunoto naba nji, meata kata nimikiata enkiteunoto kitok,
nimikintobir neijia anaa Mose, lotipika eopet shumata engomom enye, pemeing'oraa nkera Israel enkiting'oto ena naiting';
kake eitiming'anaki ndamunot enye, amu ebik metabaiki ena olong' e taata ena opet shumata enkisoma osotua musana, neitu eboluni, amu eiting'ieki tiatua Kristos;
kake ebik metabaiki taata, oshi teni eisomai Mose, eopet shumata oo ltauja lenye.
Kake oshi, teni eibelekenyakino oltung'ani Olaitoriani, neitauni eopet.
Nera Olaitoriani Olmumua; ore enetii Olmumua lʼOlaitoriani, naa ine etii elakunoto.
Kake king'oraa yook pookin tʼengomom nemeata eopet enkitook Olaitoriani anaa tʼenking'oret, nepuoi aaitaal yook te ina mua enkitook atua enkitook, anaa tʼOlaitoriani ora Olmumua.
Tiaraki nikiata ena kisyayare, anaa pikinoto eng'adunoto, nimikinaura,

kake kiany nekua baak emikio naaitukurru, nimikintobir tʼolosek, nimikintaal ororei lʼEngai tʼelejare; kake tʼembolunoto esipata kintadol aten oltoilo loo ltauja loo ltung'anak pookin tʼengomom Engai.
Akae, teni eisudori lomon lʼeng'ida ang', neisudori too kulo loopuo aaimin,
neitamodono engai ele maa eng'eno oo lemeiruk, pemeilang'aki ninje enkilang'et oo lomon lʼeng'ida o lʼenkitook e Kristos, lora emua Engai.
Amu mikinosu yook aten, kake Kristos Yesus, lora Olaitoriani, nikira yook laisyayak linyi te Yesus.
Amu Engai najo: Njeilang'isho enkilang'et tʼenaimin, ninye nailang'ishe tiatua iltauja lang', aisho eong'an nikiyolounye enkitook Engai tiatua engomom e Kristos.
Kake kiata kuna masaa kiroteti too ntokitin esarng'ab, peaku enkidimata naitobirisho en Engai, neme enang'.
Kitum osina too ngaloli pookin, kake miking'ashaa; niking'aing'ai, kake mikipalaa;
eitamei yook, kake merikinoi yook; enang'ari yook enkop, kake mikiimin.
Kinap enkata pookin tʼosesen lang' enkea Olaitoriani Yesus, peibalunye empuan Olaitoriani Yesus tʼosesen lang'.
Amu ore yook likinjiu, neishori yook enkata pookin, matuata tʼolbae le Yesus, petum si aibalunye empuan e Yesus tiatua seseni lang' ooe.
Akae, eitobirisho enkea tiatua yook, kake empuan tiatua ndai.
Ore pikiata Olmumua obo lʼenkirukoto, anaa petisiraki: Airuko, tiaraki nairo, nikiruk nikintoki aairo.
Nikiyolo ele oitopiwuo Olaitoriani Yesus, neitopiu si yook te Yesus, neitasheye yook te nebo o ndai.
Amu eaku pookin tʼolbae linyi, peitadaraa eng'adunoto kitok Engai, eliki ilkumok Engai ashe.
Akae, mikinaura, kake ten ake eimin oltung'ani lang' li oriong', neitaai ng'ejuk oli atua ngolong'i pookin.
Ore enkilishoto ang' nanyanyukie enkirriabata nelelek, neitaa pikitum yook enkitook oo nkatan pookin naa kitok naleng',
yook limiking'oraa nalio, kake nemelio. Amu eim nalio, nebik nemelio nkatan pookin.
Kake kiyolo yook, aajo teni erratanyi engaji ang' olototo ena kop, kiata enjetata natesheta Engai, engaji oo nkatan pookin te shumata, neitu eitobiri too ngaik.
Amu kiang' si yook te ina niking'war, peishopokini yook entonata' e shumata;
ore baiki, teni eishopokini yook, pimikilioi mikinjopo.
Amu ore pikitii atua engaji olototo, nikiang' eiroshikini yook; mikiyeu neoruni yook tiatua ninye ilkilani, kake peitokini aaishopoki yook, peimisori nʼenkea tiatua empuan.
Ore oloitobira yook tiatua ina, nera Engai, naishoo yook errimata Olmumua.
Akae, kintagoluo yook oshi naleng' too ltauja nikiyolo, aajo teni kimany atua osesen, nimikimany atua Olaitoriani;
amu kilimana yook tʼenkirukoto, me tʼenking'orare;
kake kintagoluo too ltauja nikinyor nelang', kimanyisho mikitii atua osesen, pikimanyisho tʼenetii Olaitoriani.
Onaa, kinyok, kimanyisho arashu kindur, peng'ida ninye too yook.
Amu meata kata nimikipuo aalioi tʼengomom olorika lʼenkigwena le Kristos, peiye ea oltung'ani pookin naaitobira ninye tʼenkata empuan osesen, naara sidan arashu ntorrok.
Kake tiaraki nikiyolo euriata Olaitoriani, niking'urrie iltung'anak, kake kimbalunye tʼEngai. Ang'idare, ajo kimbalunye baiki tiatua oltoilo loo ltauja linyi.
Mikintoki aaitadaraa aten too ndai, kake kinjo ndai entumokinoto, pindimidimi aaitadarai aten tʼolbae lang', niatata enialikiki lelo ooitadararie aten naalio, neme tʼoltau.
Amu teni kintalang', naa tʼolbae lʼEngai; ten aa kira ng'eni, tʼolbae linyi.
Amu eisirkonoo yook enyorrata e Kristos; kingwenu ena, aajo etua obo tʼolbae loo pookin, akae, etuata ninje pookin;
etua ninye tʼolbae loo pookin, peiye meishiuoki looishiu aten, kake ele lotua tʼolbae lenye nepiu.
Neijia mikiyolo yook, eiter taata, oltung'ani o obo tʼenkiring'o; teni kitayoloutuo baiki Kristos tʼenkiring'o, kake mikintoki aayolou taata.
Neijia, teni etii oltung'ani atua Kristos, etaa enkitobirata ng'ejuk; eima musan, ng'orai, etaa pookin ng'ejuko.
Kake eing'ua pookin Engai naitobirakinye yook kion te Kristos, neisho yook enkisyayare enkitobirakinoto;
amu etii Engai atua Kristos neitobirakinye kion olmaa nemeikenaki ninje lang'at enye, nepik atua yook ororei lʼenkitobirakinoto.
Akae, kira yook taata lairriwak tʼewueji e Kristos, amu Engai nadiding'isho too yook; kisaisho tʼewueji e Kristos: Enjoo eitobirakini ndai o Engai.
Amu eitaa ninye ele lemeyolo enkitarruoto, enkitarruoto, tʼewueji ang', pikiaku yook esupato Engai tiatua ninye.
Kididing' ndai anaa loong'ar enkyas inyi, piming'amumu pesho eng'adunoto Engai,
amu ejo: Aatoning'o iye tʼenkata sidai naataretoko iye tʼengolong' enkitopuata. Eng'orai, etaa taata enkata sidai. Eng'orai, etaa taata engolong' enkitopuata.
Mikinjo yook oltung'ani o obo enkikoboto o nabo, pemesuli enkyas ang',
kake kintadol aten tʼentoki pookin anaa laisyayak lʼEngai: tiatua olng'iria kitok, tiatua nkilishot, tiatua sinaitin, tiatua nkatan naagol,
tiatua arat, tiatua ienat, tiatua nkiposhiposhat, tiatua nkyasin naagol, tiatua njololot, tiatua mpukorot,
tiatua enkishaa, tiatua eyolounoto, tiatua enyuakinoto, tiatua emborran, tiatua Olmumua Sinyati, tiatua enyorrata nemeitusupatuo,
tiatua ororei lʼesipata, tiatua engolon Engai, too nareta esupato oo ntatenia o nkedyanyia,
tʼenkitook o tʼemenata, tʼeimakinoto torrono o tʼeimakinoto sidai, anaa laitapaashak, kake anaa lasipak,
anaa lemeyoloi, kake anaa looyolouni; anaa looe, kake kinjiu; anaa looari, kake mearai metuata;
anaa looilish, kake loong'ida oshi; anaa laisinak, kake looitudup ilkumok; anaa lemeata toki, kake looata pookin.
Oi ndai Ilkorintioi, etabolokoki ndai nkutukie ang', elala iltauja lang'.
Eitu eironyi ndai tiatua yook, kake eironyi ndai tiatua iltauja linyi oopeny.
Airorie ndai anaa nkera ainei, pinkoko anaa yook neboli si iltauja linyi.
Emiaku looeni te nebo o lemeiruk too nemeitoriori. Amu kaa kidikidikoto eata esupato o empaashata oo nkitanapat? Kaa kidikidikoto eata eong'an o enaimin?
Kaa kitushulata eata Kristos o Belial? Arashu kaa ng'arata eata oloiruk o olemeiruk?
Kaa risioroto eata engaji sinyati Engai o muain? Amu irara ndai engaji sinyati Engai naishiu anaa pejo Engai: Alamany atua ninje nalalimana tʼempolos enye, nepuo aaku ninje olorere lai.
Onaa: Entupukutu tʼempolos enye, entirishunye, ejo Olaitoriani, emiporoo nemeisuja; nalang'amu nanu ndai,
nalaaku too ndai Minyi, nipuopuo aaku ndai te nanu laiyok lainei o ntoiye ainei, ejo Olaitoriani tʼengolon pookin.
Akae, ore pikiata kuna kisiligat, lanyor, maisuja aten tʼentibilishu pookin enkiring'o o en olmumua, pikibaiki esinyatishu tiatua enkuretishu Engai.
Entang'amu yook. Eitu kintarriki oltung'ani, neitu kiony olekai, neitu kinkonyu olekai.
Majo nena aigwenaki ndai. Atang'asa duo ajo, njere itiiti atua iltauja lang', pikie anai kipok te nebo.
Airorie ndai tʼenjipai kitok; naata nkitadararot kumok tʼolbae linyi; aaiganya enkilejilejata, napon aata eng'ida naleng' tiatua osina lang' pookin.
Amu ore kietuo yook atua Makedonia, eitu eata enkiring'o ang' eng'ieng'ata tukul, kake eilishieki yook too ngaloli pookin: etii boo arat netii atua nkuretishuitin.
Kake eilejileja yook Engai nailejilej looitadou aten, tʼembaunoto e Titos;
me t'embaunoto enye ake, kake baiki tʼenkilejilejata nailejilejieki ninye too ndai, neinosaki ninye yook errimata inyi, enkishirata inyi, enyuata inyi tʼolbae lai, napon baiki ang'ida.
Amu teni ailishie ndai tiatua embarua, mairridu; ten ake airridu, tiaraki nadol, ajo eilishie ndai ina barua enkiti kata ake,
nang'ida taata, me tiaraki nilisho, kake tiaraki nilisho pialala; amu eilishieki ndai anaa peyeu Engai, peiye mitumutumu entorroni o nabo too yook.
Amu eishoru enkilishoto anaa peyeu Engai enkitaalata e atua enkitopuata nemeirriduni; kake eishoru enkilishoto olmaa enkea.

Eng'orai, tiaraki neilishieki ndai anaa peyeu Engai, keba aa enyuata natupukunye, te nebo o emitikinoto, o engoro o enkuretishu o errimata o engilata e tau o elaakinoto; intadua ndai aten aa supati tukul tʼena bae.
Ore patisiraka ndai, eitu asiraki ndai tʼolbae le ilo oitarruoiye, anai tʼolbae le ilo otemenaiyoki, kake peibalunye enyuata inyi tʼolbae lang' tʼengomom Engai;
too nona baak eilejilejaki yook iltauja lang'. Tʼenkilejilejata ang' etopone eng'ida ang' tʼolbae lʼeng'ida e Titos; amu eeng'ieng'ieki Olmumua lenye too ndai pookin.
Amu ore enaitaa ndai kituak te ninye, neitu akurru; kake anaa esipata pookin natolikio nanu ndai, neijia eitisipaki si enkitadararoto ang' tʼengomom e Titos.
Ore enyorrata oltau lenye, naa kitok naleng' atua ndai, teni edamu ninye enkirukoto inyi pookin, enitang'amutua ninye tʼenkuretishu o tʼenkikirikirata.
Ang'ida, amu aanyunye ndai ntokitin sidan pookin.
Aitadamu ndai, lalashera, eng'adunoto Engai naishooki tiatua sirito e Makedonia.
Ten ake etaa sapuk osina otetemieki ninje, nepona naleng' eng'ida enye; ore ten aa ninje aisinak loora, neishooio nkumok tʼesupato.
Aijakenoki ninje, ajo tʼenkidimata enye, kake enalang' enkidimata enye, eitobirakinote,
nesai yook tʼenkilejilejata kitok, peking'amu enkishooroto o eng'arata enkisyayare, naitobirakitia sinyat.
Neme anaa pikitaanyutua, kake etang'asa aaishooio aten Olaitoriani, ore tekurum yook, tʼeyeunoto Engai.
Onaa, nikididing' Titos, peiye, anaa petang'asa asotu too ndai, eitabaia si ina kishooroto.
Kake neijia anaa piatata enkumoi oo mbaak pookin, tiatua enkirukoto o ororei o eyolounoto o enyuata o enyorrata inyi too yook, neijia entonyok piponana si tʼena munyani.
Mairo aitanapu toki, kake tiaraki natonyua ilkulekai, natem si enyorata inyi, anake eitoriori.
Amu iyololo eng'adunoto Olaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos, ajo ninye adupani, kake etaa aisinani tʼolbae linyi, piakuku adupak tʼesinaishu enye.
Nyena eng'eno ai naliki ndai, amu etumoki ndai, tiaraki ninterutua tʼolari le ng'ole pokirare: me enkitobirata ake, baiki eyeunoto.
Ore taata, entabai enkitobirata inyi; anaa pitonyorra opa aatayeu, neijia entaas si tʼerisioroto oo masaa inyi.
Amu teni enyorru oltung'ani, neshipakinoi te ina naata, me te ina nemeata.
Majo ena, peiteneneng'i ilkulekai neiroshieki ndai, kake perisioi.
Onaa, enjoo etumoki endupoto inyi enang'oriki ninje ena kata, petumoki si akenya endupoto enye enyorrata inyi, perisioroi,
anaa petisiraki: Ore ele oiturrurro nkumok, nemeata enaleku; ore elde oiturrurro nkuti, nemeng'oriki toki.
Ashe Engai naishorua enyuata naba nji tiatua oltau le Titos too ndai.
Amu etang'amua ninye eutata ang', kake eisarisara tʼenyorrata enye openy, pelotu enitiiti ndai.
Kirriwaitie olalashe te nebo o ninye, oitadarari tʼolbae lʼeuangelion tiatua sirito pookin.
Neme neijia ake, kake etegelutua sirito ninye, perubare yook t'olototo lang' tʼolbae lʼena munyani nikintobir, peitaai Engai kitok nelioi olokiyo lang'.
Nikimitiki te ina, pemeduaki oltung'ani yook ntorrok tʼolbae lʼena sotore nikintobir.
Amu king'as aadamu mbaak sidan, neme tʼengomom Olaitoriani ake, kake tʼengomom oo ltung'anak si.
Kirriwaitie te nebo o ninje ilo alashe lang', likitujurro too mbaak kumok aigil kumok, aajo enyokita naleng', kake epon taata anyok.
King'idare ndai naleng', ten aa tʼolbae le Titos ora lʼemboitei ai neretoki ndai te nebo o nanu, arashu tʼolbae loo lalashera lang' oora lairriwak loo sirito, naa enkitook e Kristos.
Akae, entaduai ninje enaibalunye enyorrata inyi o enkitadararoto ang' tʼolbae linyi, baiki too ngomomitie oo sirito.
Ore mbaak e ina kisyayare naitaasi sinyat, mayeu nasiraki ndai.
Amu ayolo eyeunoto inyi sidai, naitadararie too kulo le Makedonia, ajo ebik eitobirakino Akaia olari le ng'ole; neisis enyuata inyi ilkumok.
Nairriwaa lalashera, pemeaku enkitadararoto ang' tʼolbae linyi en e pesho te ina toki, nintobirakinono ndai anaa pairorie tʼolbae linyi;
pemeaku, teni epuonu iltung'anak le Makedonia te nebo o nanu, nedol ndai, aajo eitu ianyishosho, nikikurru yook (pamajo; ndai) te ina kitadararoto.
Akae, atejo, meata kata namadiding' lalashera, peiturukie aabaiki ndai neitobir ena mayani nitang'asa ndai aaisilig opa, peidipakino anaa emayani, neme anaa empiani.
Ajo nanu ena: Oloisuaia eng'or, nelaisambu eng'or; oloisuaia osupatei, nelaisambu osupatei.
Njeisho oltung'ani pookin anaa penyor tʼoltau, me tʼenkilishoto arashu tʼengolon; amu enyor Engai olaishooroni oshipa.
Eidim aitaa Engai, petii eng'adunoto pookin atua ndai, peiye iatata oshi embaikinoto pookin tʼentoki pookin, niponana naleng' tʼenkyas sidai pookin,
anaa petisiraki: Eitarasaiye ninye naleng' neisho laisinak, ebik esupato enye nkatan pookin.
Oloitarasaki embeu olaisuaroni, nelaitarasaki baiki endaa nainosi, nepon embeu inyi nelaitubulu ishot esupato inyi,
pidupaii tiatua entoki pookin e atua emborrakinoto, naitaaki Engai ashe too yook.
Amu ore enkisyayare ena sotore nemeidip ake enang'oriki sinyat, kake epon si ina, peliki ilkumok Engai ashe tʼolbae lʼena kisyayare supat,
amu eitaa ninje Engai kitok tʼolbae lʼening'oto inyi nimbalunyenye euangelion e Kristos, o tʼolbae lʼemborrakinoto e ina ng'arata ninjosho ninje o pookin;
neng'war ndai tʼengomono enye neomonoki ndai tʼolbae lʼenkumoi emunyani Engai too ndai.
Njeishori Engai ashe t'enkishorunoto enye nemeimakinoi.
Ore nanu, Paulos, adiding ndai tʼengaripo o tʼemborran e Kristos, lara oti, teni atii e nebo o ndai, kake ore alamita ndai, napi too ndai.
Kake asai ndai, emikisis, papiju atii e nebo o ndai, naiteunore te ina golon naaikenaki nanu iltung'anak, looje, loojo kilimana anaa peyeu nkiri.
Amu ten ake kipuo tiatua nkiri, nimikiara too nareta oo nkiri.
Amu ore nareta ang', nemera noo nkiri, kake eata engolon tʼEngai, pikirratanyie naaikarraro.
Kintadou ndamunot o engadoro pookin naapare eyolounoto Engai, nikiaru eng'eno pookin aitaa singan, pening' Kristos.
Kindipakino, pikilaaki eanyata pookin, teni etabaiye ening'oto inyi.
Amaa, ing'oraara ndai mbaak naatii oriong'? Teni etii oltung'ani ong'idare kion ajo ninye le Kristos, njeitoki adamu si ninye ena, ten aa ole Kristos ninye, nikira si yook.
Ore ten emutu apon aitadararie kion engolon ang' naishoo yook Olaitoriani mateshet ndai neme tʼenkiminata, anaata makurru;
pamatiu anake ayeu naiture ndai too mpala.
Amu, ejo, eiroshi mpala enyena, neitoki aata engolon; kake teni etii ninye tʼosesen, neshal nemeata enaidim ororei lenye.
Ore olotiu neijia, njedamu ena, ajo anaa pikinkununo too rorei oo mpala teni mikitii, naa neijia si kitiu yook tʼenkyas ang', ten aa kitii.
Amu mikinteu aatipik aten esiana oo lelo ooitadaraa aten nimikintorisiore ninje, amu tiaraki naitorisiokino aten o aten neiken aten anaa iltung'anak loora, nemeyolou toki.
Ore yook, mikintadaraa aten aalang' entemet, kake anaa perisiore entemet e ilo rregie otetemaka Engai yook, pekibaiki si enitiiti ndai.
Amu mikilusoo yook naleng', anake eitu kibaiki enitiiti ndai. Kindipa aatabaiki ndai tʼeuangelion e Kristos.
Nimikintadaraa aten aalang' entemet tiatua nyamalareitin oo lkulekai, nikiruk, aajo teni ebulu enkirukoto inyi tiatua ndai, pekipon yook tʼorregie lang',
nikinosaki euangelion si kulo oomanya idya matua too ndai, nimikintadararie aten nona naaitobiraki tʼorregie loo lkulekai.
Kake ore Oloitadaraa kion, njeitadaraa tiatua Olaitoriani.
Amu mera ele supat, loitadaraa kion, kake teni eitadaraa Olaitoriani ninye.
Eikash, ten emutu ing'iriri peno emodaishu te nanu, kake ajo, ing'iriri sa.
Amu anyokita tʼolbae linyi tʼenyuata Engai. Amu atasayaka olmoruo obo, patum atoriko entito supat ayaki Kristos.
Kake aureisho, peiye, anaa peteleja olopa asurai Eva tʼesungureishu enye, eiminyeki si ndamunot inyi aaing'ua emborrakinoto e atua Kristos.
Amu ten emutu elotu obo, neinosu olekai Yesus leitu kinosu yook, arashu ing'amumu olekai mumua leitu ing'amumu, arashu engai euangelion neitu eishori ndai, anaata igirara.
Kake aiken nanu kion, ajo maang'oriki toki too lelo airriwak „kituak“.
Ore ten aa mara ng'en too rorei, namara neijia tiatua eyolounoto, kake aibalunye too ndai tiatua mbaak pookin.
Kaitarruoiye, tiaraki naitadouo kion, peitaai ndai kituak? Amu ainosaka ndai euangelion Engai pesho,
naoru nkulie sirito ang'amu olkwaje too ninje, painosaki ndai.

Ore eton atii opa e nebo o ndai tʼeng'oroto ai, eitu aek olekai tung ani; amu ore pepuonu lalashera aaing'ua Makedonia, aataretokitio eng'oroto ai; o tiatua mbaak pookin atorripo kion, pamairoshiki ndai, narrip kion aiko neijia.
Anaa esipata natii atua nanu, metii oltung'ani oidim aiboi enkitadararoto ai naata tiatua loshon le Akaia.
Tʼolbae le nyoo? Tiaraki namanyor nanu ndai? Eyolo Engai.
Kake enayeu naitobir, alaitobir, padung' ororei loo lelo ooing'oru entoki naitadararie, aajo etiu ninje anaa yook.
Amu ore iltung'anak ooba nji, oora lairriwak lʼelejare naa laitobirak looata olosek, neitaai aten aaku lairriwak le Kristos.
Nemeiputukunyisho; amu eitaai kion satan openy aaku olmalaika lʼenkilang'et.
Onaa, mera entoki sapuk, teni eitaai aten laisyayak lenyena aatiu anaa lainosunok lʼesupato; neaku enkiting'oto enye tʼerisioroto oo nkitobirat enye.
Aitoki ajo, njere njoo mejo oltung'ani ajo amoda; teni me, entang'amuaki anaa olmodai, peiye si nanu aitadaraa kion peno.
Ore enajo taata, malimu anaa tʼOlaitoriani, kake anaa tʼemodaishu, amu kitabaitie enkitadararoto.
Tiaraki naitadaraa ilkumok aten tʼolbae lʼenkiring'o, nayeu naitadaraa kion si nanu.
Amu ing'iriakiki ilmoda tʼeng'ida, nirara ndai ng'eni.
Ing'iriri, teni eitaa ndai oltung'ani singan, arashu teni einyal ndai, arashu teni earaa ndai, arashu teni egogong'oki ndai, arashu teni ear ndai engomom inyi.
Airo tʼengilata enganyit, anaa teni kishal yook. Ore entoki naimany oltung'ani, (airo tʼemodaishu), naimany si nanu.
Kera Ilhebrayoi ninje? ara si nanu. Ke Israeli ninje? ara si nanu. Kera eishoi e Abraham? ara si nanu.
Kera laisyayak le Kristos? airo tʼemodaishu, alusoo nanu. Atanyamala alang'; aataaraki aaitalang'; atii aigil kumok atua sinaitin enkea; aateenaki aaitalang;
too Yudayoi atang'amua aigil imiet oshot artam neng'oru nabo;
naataaraki too lkikarreta aigil uni; naataaraki too soito kat nabo. Etigile embout natii aigil uni. Dama o kiarie atobiko tiatua enaiposha.

Tiatua lotot aigil kumok, tiatua osina loo lkejek, tiatua osina loo laisimak, tiatua osina tʼentipat ai, tiatua osina too lemeata Engai, tiatua osina too ngang'itie, tiatua osina ti ang'ata, tiatua osina tʼolbalbal, tiatua osina loo lalashera lʼelejare;
tiatua nyamalareitin o nkyasin, tiatua erripore aigil kumok, tiatua olamei o enkure, tiatua mpukorot kumok, tiatua enkirobi o maishopo;
metii nona tokitin neitu aipot, naa enkyas naaek ngolong'i pookin o enkishilaroto oo sirito pookin.
Ang'ai oshal, namashal nanu? Ang'ai oitapong'ori, namairowua nanu?
Teni meata kata namaitadaraa, naitadaraa kion tʼolbae lʼenjalan ai.
Eyolo Engai o Menye lʼOlaitoriani Yesus, otamayanaki nkatan pookin, ajo malejisho.
Tiatua Damaskos etorripo olaigwenani kitok lʼolkarsis Aretas engang oo Ldamaskoi, paaibung' nanu;
naaitadoiyori tʼelusiet tiatua oltutua tʼesundai engang', napok ailany ngaik enyena.
Medupa, paitadaraa kion, kake ainosu peno nduarot o mbolunot Olaitoriani.
Ayolo oltung'ani tiatua Kristos, neba too larin tomon o ong'wan — ten aa tiatua osesen, mayolo; Engai nayolo — etanapaki ele metabaiki shumata e uni.
Nayolo ele tung'ani — ten aa tiatua osesen, ten aa metii atua osesen, mayolo; Engai nayolo —,
ajo etanapaki atua emparadis nening' rorei lemeiroroi, lemeidim oltung'ani aimaki.
Aitadaraa kion tʼele, kake maitadaraa kion te nanu, neme tʼemenatishu ai.
Amu ten emut ayeu naitadaraa kion, anaata mamoda, anaata alimu esipata; kake aitore kion, pamaaitaa o obo kitok nelang' enadolita te nanu arashu enaning'ito te nanu.
Ore pamaikarrikar tʼolbae lʼenkumoi oo mbolunot, aaishooki olkikarret tiatua osesen, olmalaika le satan, paaar too ndapi, pamatum aikarrikarra.
Ore te ilo aidipa atasaya Olaitoriani aigil uni, paaing'ua ninye nanu.
Naajoki ninye nanu: Kibaiki eng'adunoto ai, amu ebaia engolon ai tiatua emenatishu. Onaa, eikash naleng', teni aitadarrarie kion emenatishu ai, pemany engolon e Kristos atua nanu.
Onaa, ang'ida tiatua menatishuitin, tiatua menat, tiatua nkisilot, tiatua mirat, tiatua sinaitin, tʼolbae le Kristos. Amu teni aaku menati, naata te ina kata engolon.
Ataa olmodai tʼenkitadararoto, nikiarakiki ndai nanu. Kake anaata eikash, paaitaai kitok too ndai. Amu mara oti too lelo airriwak „kituak“, ten ake mara toki.
Amu eitobiraki ilponot lʼolairriwani tiatua ndai tʼolng'iria pookin, o too nkitaduat, o too nkiputukunyot, o too nkidimat.
Ainyo natong'orikia ndai too nona kulie sirito, neme ilo rorei ake, ajo eitu airoshiki ndai? Entung'aiyoki nanu ena torroni.
Eng'orai, aidipakino palotu enkata e uni enitiiti ndai, namairoshiki nanu ndai. Amu maing'oru nkun inyi, kake ndai oopeny. Amu meiteng'elaki nkera lootoiutuo masaa sidan, kake lootoiutuo nkera enye.
Nayeu naishooio ntokitin ainei naitoki aishooio nanu kion t'eng'ida kitok tʼolbae lʼenkishui inyi; ten aa anyor nanu ndai naleng', nikinyorrinyorro nanu aaitong'or.
Kake njeaku neijia, peitu aek nanu ndai; kake tiaraki nara osunguroi, aibung'a ndai tʼolosek.
Arashu kaikonyaiye entoki oltung'ani tʼengaina e obo loo kulo lairriwaka ndai?
Atididing'a Titos nairriwaa olalashe obo te nebo o ninye. Keikonyarie Titos ndai toki? Eitu kilimana tʼolmumua obo? Ana eitu kipuoiye eroruata nabo?
Intokiki aajo ndai, njere kimitu yook too ndai? Kirorie tiatua Kristos tʼengomom Engai; kake eaku kuna pookin, lanyor lainei, pesheti ndai.
Amu aureisho, teni alotu, pamainepu ndai anaa payeu, nimikinepupu si ndai nanu anaa piyeuu: netii too ndai enjangar, olom, engoro, enkitarrikino, enkurrata, elikioroto, olwuasa, enkiposhiposhata;
neaku, teni aitoki alotu enitiiti, naaitadou Engai ai too ndai, natum ailishoki ilkumok looitarruoitie opa neitu eala aaing'ua olduruki o entalare o enkimali-mal naataasa.
Alotu taata enkata e uni enitiiti ndai. Tʼenkutuk oo ljaken aare arashu okuni njeitashe ororei pookin.
Atang'asa aliki, naitoki aliki ndai, neijia anaa patiaka ndai atii enkata e are, nasiraki si taata matii, lelo ooitarruoitie opa o ilkulekai pookin: Teni aitoki alotu, namaing'urrie.
Tiaraki ning'oruru enkitisipunoto, ajo eiro Kristos tiatua nanu, lemeshal tiatua ndai.
Amu etooshokoki esalaba tʼenjalan, kake eishiu tʼengolon Engai. Ore peaku kishal yook tiatua ninye, nikinjiu te nebo o ninye tiatua engolon Engai enitiiti ndai.
Entetem ndai aten, ten aa itiiti atua enkirukoto, entujur ndai aten. Arashu miyolouu ndai aten, aajo etii Kristos atua ndai? Anake etaa irara turua.
Naanyu piyolouu, aajo mikira yook turua.
Asai Engai, pemintobiribiri entorroni o nabo, me pikilioi yook anaa supati, kake pintobiribiri ndai naishiaakino, nikitiu yook anaa turua.
Amu mikindim yook aaitobira entoki nemeishiaakinore esipata, kake naponiki esipata.
Amu king'ida ina kata teni kishal yook nigoligolo ndai; naa ena kiyeuoki ndai, pintabaiaia.
Akae, asiraki ndai kuna baak eton atioyo, peiye, teni alotu, maiko empijan tʼerisioroto engolon naaishoo Olaitoriani, pashet neme paiminye.
Ore tʼenkiting'oto, lalashera, enting'idata, entabai, elejileja ndai aten, embirribirra nabo, embung'a eseriani, nelarubare ndai Engai enyorrata o en eseriani.
Erorokinoto ndai tʼeng'ututata sinyati! Eiroroki ndai sinyat pookin.
Ore eng'adunoto Olaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos o enyorrata Engai o enkidikidikoto Olmumua Sinyati, njebik too ndai pookin. Amen.
Paulos, olairriwani, (neme loo ltung'anak, neme too ltung'anak, kake te Yesus Kristos o Engai Papa oitopiwuo ninye too lootuata)
o lalashera pookin ootii e nebo o nanu: En oo sirito naatii Galatia ena palai.
Njebikie ndai eng'adunoto o eseriani naing'ua Engai Papa o Olaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos,
oishooiye kion tʼolbae loo nkitarruot ang', peitopok yook tʼele maa torrono e taata anaa peyeu Engai naa Papa lang',
oitaai kitok nkatan pookin oo nkatan pookin. Amen.
Aiputukuny, tiaraki nitapaashare aasioki ele oipotoko ndai atua eng'adunoto e Kristos nimbelekenyakinono engai euangelion;
kake metii engai, neme etii looje ooyeu neitang'aing'ai ndai neibelekeny euangelion e Kristos.
Kake ten eaku yook arashu olmalaika le shumata oinosaki ndai engai euangelion nimikinosakitia yook ndai, njedeki ilo.
Anaa pikintera aajo, naitoki ajo taata: Teni einosaki ndai oltung'ani euangelion neme nitang'amutua, njedeki ilo.
Eton aisyayaki iltung'anak tʼenkinosunoto arashu Engai? Arashu ijojo, ayeu naitiship iltung'anak? Ten emut ayeu naitiship iltung'anak, anaata eitu aaku osinga le Kristos.
Kake aitayolo ndai, lalashera, ore ena euangelion nainosu nanu, nemera en oo ltung'anak.
Amu eitu ang'amu neitu aiteng'enuo ninye tʼoltung'ani o obo, kake tʼembolunoto e Yesus Kristos.
Ajo nanu, indipa aatoning', anaa paikununo opa eton asuj orregie loo Yudayoi, amu atimira naleng' esirit Engai naiminye ninye,
naponaa tiatua rregieita loo Yudayoi nalang' ilkumok lʼolosho lang' o lʼolporror lai, amu atonyua naleng' too nena naatang'amutua loopapa.
Ore penyorru Engai naategelua opa tʼengoshoke e yeiyo naaipot tʼeng'adunoto enye,
aitayolo Oinoti lenye tiatua nanu, painosaki lomon lenyena loreren lemeata Engai: akae, atudumunye nabo kata neitu aigwena o looata enkiring'o o osarge,
neitu ailep alo Yerusalem enetii lelo ootang asa aaku lairriwak, kake ashomo Arabia naitoki arrinyunye Damaskos.
Ore peishunye larin okuni, nabaiki Yerusalem, padol Petros, nabik ngolong'i tomon o imiet te nebo o ninye.
Too lkulekai airriwak eitu adol o obo, neme Yakobos, olalashe lʼOlaitoriani.
Kake enasiraki ndai, ng'orai, eyolo Engai, malejisho.
Ore tekurum nalotu atua enkop e Siria o Kilikia.
Neton eitu aayolouni engomom ai too sirito tiatua Kristos naatii Yudaya.
Eidipa ake aatoning', aajo ore ilo otang'asa amir yook opa, neinosu taata ena kirukoto naiminye opa,
neitadaraa Engai te nanu.
Ore tekurum, peishunye larin tomon o ong'wan, naitoki ailep alo Yerusalem te nebo o Barnabas narik si Titos te nebo o nanu.
Kake ailepa alo tʼolbae lʼembolunoto naaishooki, nairorie o ninje mbaak euangelion nainosu too loreren lemeata Engai, naigwena naleng' o lelo ooikenaki, aajo etaa eanyitai, pemeaku akwet pesho.
Kake ore Titos otii e nebo o nanu, lora Olgriki, neitu earakini pemurati.
Amu ore pejing'u tʼenkisudoroto lalashera lʼelejare aaikeernu elakunoto ang' nikiata tiatua Kristos, petum aaitaa yook isingan,
neitu kinjo yook ewueji meitoria ninje yook, peitashe esipata euangelion too ndai.
Kake ore lekua ooata enkitook, — anaa petotiutuo ninje opa, me toki te nanu, amu meing'oraa Engai engomom oltung'ani — amu ore lelo ooata enkitook, eitu aaponiki nanu toki,
kake ore pedol, aajo aaishooki nanu euangelion too lememurata, anaa peishooki Petros too lelo oomurata,
(amu ore ilo oitaa Petros olairriwani too lelo oomurata, naa ninye si laaitaa nanu too lemeata Engai),

ore peyolou ninje ena ng'adunoto naaishooki nanu, Yakobos o Kefas o Yohanes, ooikenaki aa ng'apeta, naaishoo nanu o Barnabas engaina e tatene neiruk, pikipuo yook enetii loreren lemeata Engai, nepuo ninje enetii loomurata.
Naa ororei obo ake, eyeu nikidamu laisinak, naa ina atonyua si nanu paitobir.
Kake ore pelotu Petros Antiokia, naitasheikio nanu engomom enye, amu eitang'oroki ninye.
Amu ore eton eitu epuonu iltung'anak ooing'ua Yakobos, neaku eng'arie ninye endaa lemeata Engai; kake ore pepuonu, nepal neorunye, amu eure ninye lelo oomurata,
o metabaiki ilkulekai Yudayoi eibelekenyate te nebo o ninye, nerikori si Barnabas tʼesungureishu enye.

Kake ore padol, ajo eitu eitoriokino esipata euangelion, najoki Petros tʼengomom oo pookin: Teni ira Oyudayos, ninjiu tʼorregie loo lemeata Engai neme tʼoloo Yudayoi, ainyo piaraki lemeata Engai, peikununo anaa Yudayoi?
Kira yook Yudayoi tʼempukunoto ang', nimikira laitarruok ooing'ua loreren lemeata Engai.

Kake tiaraki nikiyolo, aajo meitaai oltung'ani supat too nkitobirat oo nkitanapat, kake tʼenkirukoto e atua Yesus Kristos, nikiruk si Yesus Kristos, peitaai yook supati tʼenkirukoto e atua Kristos, neme too nkitobirat oo nkitanapat; amu ore too nkitobirat oo nkitanapat meitaai supat enkiring'o o nabo.
Kake ten emut eaku edoli yook ooing'oru esupato tiatua Kristos, kira laitarruok, anaata mera Kristos olaisyayani loo nkitarruot? Njoo meaku!
Amu teni aitoki ashet ina natigila, naitaa nanu kion olalang'ani.
Kake aidipa atuaki nkitanapat, paishiuoki Engai. Aatooshokoki esalaba te nebo o Kristos.
Aishiu, kake me nanu, amu Kristos oishiu tiatua nanu; ore enaishiu taata tiatua enkiring'o, naishiu tiatua enkirukoto Oinoti lʼEngai laatonyorra nanu neishooio kion tʼolbae lai.
Maiturraa eng'adunoto Engai; amu teni elotu esupato aing'ua nkitanapat, netua Kristos pesho.
Ndai Ilgalatai lemeng'enu, ang'ai eibelekenya ndamunot inyi nimirukuruku esipata? Amu eitaduaki ndai Kristos anaa etooshokoki esalaba enitiiti ndai.
Ayeu nikintayololo nanu ele rorei ake: Itang'amutua Olmumua too nkitobirat oo nkitanapat, arashu tʼenkinosunoto enkirukoto?
Miatata eng'eno aaiko nji? Itang'asa tʼolmumua, niyeuu taata nintabaiaia tʼenkiring'o?
Ke, iting'iria nkitamiot kumok naaba nji pesho? Ten aa neija, naa pesho.
Ore ele oisho ndai Olmumua neas nkitobirat naaba nji tiatua ndai, amaa, keas too nkitobirat oo nkitanapat, arashu tʼenkinosunoto enkirukoto?
Neijia anaa peiruko Abraham Engai neikenakini ninye ina esupato.
Akae, niyololo, aajo kulo lʼenkirukoto, naa ninje nkera e Abraham.
Etang'asa adol esirata, ajo eitaa Engai loreren lemeata ninye, supati tʼenkirukoto; onaa etiaka Abraham: Epuoi aamayan loreren pookin te iye.
