Onaa, eaku emayani looata enkirukoto te nebo o Abraham ora airukoni.

Amu ore lelo pookin ooirishakino nkitobirat oo nkitanapat, netii abori endiata. Amu etisiraki: Edia oltung'ani pookin lemebik tiatua mbaak pookin, naatisiraki tʼenkitabu oo nkitanapat, peitobir ninje.
Eibala taata, ajo metii oltung'ani oaku supat too nkitanapat, amu: Elaishiu osupat tʼenkirukoto;
Mera nkitanapat nʼenkirukoto; kake „ore oltung'ani oitobir ninje, neishiu“.
Etalakua Kristos yook tʼendiata oo nkitanapat etaaiye yook endiata, amu esira: „Edia oltung'ani pookin oika tʼenjata“,
petum aeu emayani e Abraham shumata oo loreren lemeata Engai pookin te Yesus Kristos, niking'amu nji Olmumua oisiligaki tʼenkirukoto.
Lalashera lainei, airo anaa iltung'anak. Meiturrari osotua lʼoltung'ani, oidipaki aitagolo, nemeponikini toki.
Ore taa nkisiligat, neisiligakaki Abraham o eishoi enye. Mejo „too ishoreitin“, anaa kumok; kake etiu anaa nabo, eji: „tʼeishoi ino“, naa ninye Kristos.

Kake ajo nji: Ore ele sotua otang'asa Engai aitagolu peaku te Kristos, nemeiturrari, nemeiting'ie nkitanapat enkisiligata; amu eishooki nkitanapat, eidipate aatulusoi larin iip ong'wan o osom eiter ninye.
Amu ten emut etumi enjung'o too nkitanapat, anaata eitu eishori tʼenkisiligata; kake eishoo Engai Abraham tʼenkisiligata pesho.
Ainyo naaku nkitanapat? Etoponikiaki tʼolbae loo nkitarruot, metabana nelotu eishoi, naishooki enkisiligata, netipikaki too lmalaikan t'engaina olaidikidikoni.
Mera olaidikidikoni oli obo, kake nabo Engai.
Amaa, kearare nkitanapat nkisiligat Engai? me neija. Ore ten emutu eishooki nkitanapat naaidim aaishoo empuan, anaata elotu esupato aing'ua nkitanapat.
Kake eigenoiye esirata pookin tiabori enkitarruoto, peishori enkisiligata enkirukoto e atua Kristos kulo looiruk.
Ore eton eitu ebau enkirukoto, etorripoki yook abori oo nkitanapat, neigenori yook tiatua enkirukoto napuoi aabolu.
Nji etaa nkitanapat ngarikok, perik yook enetii Kristos, peitaai yook supati tʼenkirukoto.
Ore peidip aeu enkirukoto, nimikintoki aatii abori oo ngarikok.
Amu irara ndai pookin nkera Engai tʼenkirukoto e atua Kristos Yesus.
Ore ndai pookin looibatisaki atua Kristos, injopo baiki Kristos.
Metii ene Oyudayos arashu Olgriki, metii ene osinga arashu olakuno, metii ene olee arashu eng'oroyoni; amu itaa ndai pookin obo tiatua Kristos Yesus.
Ore pirara ndai le Kristos, itaa eishoi e Abraham o lajung'ok, anaa pejo nkisiligat.
Kake ajo nanu, meata olajung'oni te ina kata nara enkerai kinyi erishata o osinga, baiki teni era Olaitoriani lʼenjung'o;
kake etii ninye abori oo laing'orak o laitasheikinok metabaiki enkata natipika menye.
Neija baiki yook, ore te ina kata nikira nkera kunyinyi, nikira looisyaisho tiabori oo nkiteng'enareitin ele maa.
Ore peidip atabau embaiaroto enkata, neirriu Engai Oinoti lenye, neiu eng'oroyoni ninye nepiki abori oo nkitanapat,
pelaku kulo lootii abori oo nkitanapat, peiye king'amu enkeraishu.
Akae, tiaraki nitaa nkera, onaa eirriwaka Engai Olmumua lʼOinoti lenye atua iltauja linyi, lodar: Aba, Papa!
Akae, mekure ira osinga, kake enkerai; teni ira enkerai, nira olajung'oni lʼEngai te Kristos.
Kake ore idia kata eitu iyolouu Engai, nisyayakiki kulo lemera ngain tʼempukunoto.
Kake ore taata, indipa aatayolou Engai niponana aayolounoi tʼEngai, ainyo pintokiki ndai aarrinyokino nkitaduat tashala o sasi niyeuu aaku kat are singan lenye?
Imbung'ubung'u naleng' ngolong'i o lapaitin o rishat o larin.
Aureisho tʼolbae linyi, pemeaku aisyayaka ndai pesho.
Entotiu anaa nanu enatiu; amu atiu si nanu anaa ndai; lalashera, asai ndai. Eitu kiasakiki entoki torrono.
Iyololo, aajo tiatua enjalan osesen lai ainosaka ndai euangelion tʼenkata elukunya.
O nkitasurot ainei naata tʼosesen, eitu imenimene neitu ianyianya; kake kitang'amutua nanu anaa olmalaika lʼEngai, anaa Kristos Yesus openy.
Kaa teshishu iatata te ina kata? Amu ara oljakeni too ndai, ten emut eidimai, anaata itadotutuo ngonyek inyi nikinjosho nanu.
Kataa olmang'atinda linyi, tiaraki naitadol ndai esipata?
Ore enyuata enye tʼolbae linyi, me sidai; kake eyeu nikipaasharere nanu, pinyokitata tʼolbae lenye.
Kake eikash, teni inyokinyoko oshi tiatua mbaak sidan, me ena kata ake atii e nebo o ndai.
Nakera ainei, naiu kat are tʼemion, metabana nelioi emua e Kristos tiatua ndai:
Ak ayeu naboitare ndai naitaai oltoilo lai; amu mayolo anaa pitiuu ndai.
Entolikioki nanu ndai, liyeuu nibikibiki abori oo nkitanapat: Eitu ining'ining'i ndai nkitanapat?
Amu etisiraki, ajo eata Abraham laiyok aare, etoiwuo obo esinga, neiu olekai enalakuno.
Kake ore ilo otoiwuo esinga, etoiwuoki too mbaak enkiring'o, ore ilo otoiwuo enalakuno, naa tʼengolon oo nkisiligat.
Ore kuna baak etiu anaa nkitanyanyukieta. Amu ninje sotuan aare, eing'ua obo oldonyo Sinai, oiki esingaishu, naa ninye Hagar.
Naa ore Hagar, eipoti tʼenkop oo Lmarabu oldonyo Sinai, neishiaakinore Yerusalem, naatai tʼena kata, netii atua esingaishu te nebo o nkera enyena.
Kake ore Yerusalem natii shumata, elakuno, naa ninye yeiyo ang pookin.
Amu etisiraki: Ting'idai, engolupi nemeisho, Taapu oltoilo ninjir, en eitu ening' emion eishoi. Amu ore nkera e ina naton openy, naa kumok, nelang' nʼena naata olmoruo.
Ore taata yook, lalashera, kira nkera oo nkisiligat tʼolbae le Isaak.
Kake anaa te ina kata petimira ele otoiwuoki too mbaak enkiring'o lido otoiwuoki tʼOlmumua, naa neijia etiu si taata.
Kake ketejaa sirat? Taarai ena singa o engaiyoni enye; amu mejung'u engaiyoni esinga te nebo o engaiyoni enalakuno.
Akae, lalashera, mikira yook nkera esinga, kake kira nkera enalakuno.
Akae, entobik tiatua elakunoto natalakunye yook Kristos, emintoki aajing' atua enjata esingaishu.
Eng'orai, nanu Paulos aliki ndai, ajo teni emurati ndai, miduporere toki Kristos.
Naitoki aijakenoki oltung'ani pookin lomurati, ajo meata kata nemeitabaia nkitanapat pookin.
Imina ndai te Kristos, loojo, eitaai supati too nkitanapat, itusulunyete tʼeng'adunoto.
Kake kimaririu yook tʼOlmumua eanyunoto esupato naing'ua enkirukoto,
Amu meata tiatua Kristos emurata engolon arashu memurata, kake enkirukoto naitobirisho tʼenyorrata.
Ikweta sidai. Ang'ai lotomitikio ndai, pimisujusuju esipata?
Eitu epukunye ena kisisa oloipoto ndai.
Ore enkisiijoi kinyi neisiijie enkitushulata pookin.
Airuk nanu ndai tiatua Olaitoriani, ajo mipuopuo aaibirribir engai toki. Ore oloitang'arrir ndai, nelaea enkigwena, lora enara.
Ore nanu, lalashera, teni epon ainosu emurata, ainyo pepon aaisili? Anaata eishunye erikai esalaba.
Edupa, teni eiturrari kulo looibelie ndai.
Kake eipotokoki ndai, lalashera, elakunoto. Njoomeaku ake elakunoto inyi eng'asiata enkiring'o, kake esyayakinoto tʼenyorrata,
amu eitobirai nkitanapat pookin tʼororei obo, tʼele: Tonyorra ol elatia ino anaa pinyor kion!
Kake teni ionyororo ninosaroro, eng'orai, pimimutaroro.
Ajo ake: Entilimanata tʼolmumua, pemintobiribiri baiki olng'warra lʼenkiring'o.
Amu eng'war enkiring'o agilunore Olmumua negilunore Olmumua enkiring'o, amu eara ninje pokira are, pemintobiribiri kuna niyeuu ndai.
Kake teni erik ndai Olmumua, mitiiti abori oo nkitanapat.
Eibala nkitobirat enkiring'o naara: earata enkidikidikoto olmoruo o eng'oroyoni, entalare, olduruki, enkimalimal,
enkisyayare oo muain, enkibonore, mang'atishuitin, enkitarrikino, engilata e tau, ngoroitin, nkiminjalishuitin, rishat osotua, njangarrin, nkibaroitin,
earata metua, meraitin, nkinosareitin o nanyanyukye kuna, naiturukie aliki ndai naitoki aiturukie alimu, ajo mepuo aajung'u looitobir kuna enkarsishu Engai.
Kake era ilmomo lʼOlmumua: enyorrata, eng'ida, eseriani, olng'iria, emborran, esidano, enkirukoto, olgira sidai, emitikinoto oo mbaak oo nkiri.
Megilunore nkitanapat kuna.
Ore kulo loora le Kristos Yesus, neoshoki enkiring'o enye esalaba te nebo o yeunot torrok o ilng'warraitin.
Teni kinjiu tʼOlmumua, matilimanata baiki tʼOlmumua.
Njoo mikiaku looing'oru enkitadararoto e pesho, looisisiuno, looibaro.
Lalashera, teni ebatatari oltung'ani tʼenkitarruoto nabo, entaretokiti, ndai lʼemumuaishu, ele tʼolmumua obor, niduaia kion, pimikintasuri si iye.
Entanapakinoto irridat, pipuopuo aaitabaia nji nkitanapat e Kristos.
Amu teni ejo oltung ani, era toki, nemera o nyoo, nelej kion.
Njeleen oltung'ani pookin enkyas enye openy, neata ninye te ina kata enkitadararoto te kion openy neme tʼolekai tung'ani.
Amu elanap oltung'ani pookin orridati lenye openy.
Oloiteng'eni tʼororei, njeng'arie sidan pookin oloiteng'en ninye.
Emimbel, memoroi Engai! Amu enaun oltung'ani, naa ninye elaisambu.
Amu oloun tʼenkiring'o enye, nelaisambu tʼenkiring'o erruoroto; oloun tʼOlmumua, nelaisambu tʼOlmumua empuan nemeiting'.
Njoo mikinaura kintobir sidan, amu kipuo aaisambu tʼenkata enye nimikiishu.
Akae, teni kintoki aatum enkata, maitobira sidan too ltung'anak pookin, kake tʼenkata elukunya too loong'ar enkirukoto.
Idolitata ndai, aajo keba aa kulo rorei latisiraka ndai tʼengaina ai.
Ore kulo looyeu neshipakinoi ndai tʼenkiring'o, nearaki ndai metumurati ndai, pemetum emirata tʼolbae lʼesalaba e Kristos.
Amu ore si ninje oomurata, nemeibung' nkitanapat, kake eyeu nemurati ndai, petum aaitadararie seseni linyi.
Kake njaapaash ena kitadararoto, neme en esalaba Olaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos; te ilo aatooshokoki nanu olmaa esalaba, neoshokini olmaa esalaba te nanu.
Amu tiatua Kristos medupa emurata arashu memurata, kake enkitobirata ng'ejuk nadupa.
Ore kulo pookin oopuoiye ilo rregie, njebik eseriani o enking'urroto shumata enye o shumata Israel lʼEngai.
Eiter taata njoo maaitoki oltung'ani aitanyamal; amu anapita ilponot lʼOlaitoriani ootipikaki osesen lai.
Metobikie eng'adunoto Olaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos Olmumua linyi, lalashera lainei. Amen.
Paulos, olairriwani le Yesus Kristos tʼolbae lʼeyeunoto Engai: too sinyat ootii Efesos o too lairukok le atua Kristos.
Metobikie ndai eng'adunoto o eseriani naing'ua Engai Papa o Olaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos!
Njeitadarari Engai o Menye lʼOlaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos! Etamayana ninye yook tʼemayani pookin emumuaishu te shumata tiatua Kristos.
Etegelua ninye yook tiatua Kristos, eton eitu epiki entonata olmaa, pikiaku sinyat nimikiata ntibil tʼengomom enye tiatua enyorrata.
Neituruk apik yook, pekitum enkeraishu e atua ninye te Yesus Kristos, tʼenyorrata eyeunoto enye,
peitadarari enkitook eng'adunoto enye natang'adunye ninye yook tiatua Olotonyorra.
Nikiata tiatua ninye elakunoto tʼosarge lenye, enkitaunoto oo nkitarruot tʼendupoto eng'adunoto enye
natoponikia ninye yook tiatua eng'eno pookin o enjartano.
Neitayolo ninye yook emikio eyeunoto enye tʼenyorrata enye naiturukie aotiki tiatua ninye,
peitobiri tʼembaiaroto oo nkatan, neiturrur pookin tiatua Kristos, ntokitin naatii shumata o naatii enkop.
Kinoto tiatua ninye enjung'o, yook lootipikaki tʼentootiki enye loitaa ntokitin pookin tʼenkigwena eyeunoto enye,
pekiaku yook enkitadararoto enkitook enye, yook likinturuko aanyu Kristos.
Itiiti si ndai atua ninye, indipa aatoning' lomon lʼesipata, euangelion enkitopuata inyi; eitagoloki baiki ndai lairukok tiatua ninye tʼOlmumua Sinyati lʼenkisiligata,
ora eng'asiata enjung'o ang', pekitum elakunoto nikiaku masaa enyena, neaku enkitadararoto enkitook enye.
Onaa baiki nanu, aidipa atoning'o enkirukoto too ndai tiatua Olaitoriani Yesus o enyorrata e atua sinyat pookin,
mapal eitu ajo ashe tʼolbae linyi nadamu ndai too sayat ainei,
peisho ndai Engai Olaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos, Menye lʼenkitook, Olmumua lʼeng'eno o embolunoto tiatua eyolounoto enye
o ngonyek oo ltauja linyi naailang'akaki, piyolouu ndai enara eanyunoto enkipototo enye o enara endupoto enkitook enjung'o enye tiatua sinyat
o enara enkitook nemetemai engolon enye e atua yook likiruk tʼenkidimata engolon enye kitok,
naitaa ninye tiatua Kristos te ina kata naitopiwuo ninye too lootuata neitoton ninye te tatene enye e shumata,
peaku shumata enkitook pookin o engolon o enkidimata o enkitoria o engarna pookin naimakini, me tiatua ele maa ake, kake baiki tiatua ololotu;
nepik ntokitin pookin abori oo nkejek enyena neisho, peaku ninye elukunya oo pookin tʼesirit
nara osesen lenye nera emborei naigany pookin tiatua pookin.
ishoo empuan si ndai ootuata tʼolbae loo lang'at o nkitarruot,
ipuoiyeye opa tʼerisioroto orregie lʼele maa o lʼoloata engolon tʼolng'inai, ora Olmumua oitobirisho tiatua iltung'anak lemeiruk.
Amu te nebo o ninje kitilimanate si yook opa tiatua ilng'warraitin lʼenkiring'o ang' nikintobir eyeunoto enkiring'o o en eng'eno, nikira si yook nkera engoro tʼempukunoto ang', neijia anaa ilkulekai.
Kake ore Engai nara adupani tʼenkordunoto, tʼenyorrata enye kitok natonyorrie ninye yook,
neishoo yook empuan te nebo o Kristos te ina kata nikituata too nkitarruot, — eitopuaki ndai tʼempuris, —
neitopiu neitoton yook te nebo o ninye tiatua wuejitin e shumata tiatua Kristos Yesus,
peiye elaitadolu tiatua nkatan naapuonu akenya enkitook endupoto empuris enye tiatua emborran too yook tiatua Kristos Yesus.
Amu eitopuaki ndai tʼempuris tʼenkirukoto, ena me too ndai, era ninye enkishooroto Engai:
me too nkitobirat, pemeitadaraa oltung'ani kion.
Amu kira yook enkyas enye, eitobiraki yook tiatua Kristos Yesus, pekintobir nkyasin sidan naaituruko aitobir Engai, pekilimana tiatua ninje.
Akae, entadamu, aajo ore pirara ndai opa lemeata Engai t'enkiring'o ooipotoki lememurata too kulo ooji emurata tʼenkiring'o, naitobiri tʼengaina,
niakuku te ina kata lemeata Kristos, oolakwaniki enkarsishu e Israel, nirara lomon loo sotuaitin o loo nkisiligat, leitu eata eanyunoto neitu eata Engai tiatua olmaa.
Kake ore taata, ndai ootii atua Kristos neaku enelakwa opa, nitinyikutua tʼolbae lʼosarge le Kristos.
Amu ninye eseriani ang', oitaa yook pokira are nabo, netigila erishata natii tʼempolos, eitai emang'atishu tʼenkiring'o enye,
nara nkitanapat naatipikaki neum naaitanapishoteki, petum aitaa kulo are oltung'ani obo ng'ejuk te ninye kion neitobir eseriani,
neitobirakinye pokira are tiatua osesen obo Engai tʼesalaba, eidipa atara emang'atishu te ninye openy.
Eewuo ninye neinosaki tʼeuangelion eseriani ndai ootii enelakwa, o yook ootataana.
Amu tiatua ninye eishori yook pokira are, pikijing' Engai tʼOlmumua obo.
Akae, mekure irara taata lomon o ilkaponu, kake irara loopeny te nebo o sinyat o loong'ar engaji Engai,
ooteshetakaki entonata oo lairriwak o layolounok, nera Yesus Kristos osoit lʼolpijata lenye;
ore tiatua ninye eidikidikoki enjetata pookin nebulu, peaku engaji sinyati tiatua Olaitoriani,
eteshetakaki baiki ndai shumata enye, piakuku emanyata Engai tiatua Olmumua.
Akae, ara nanu, Paulos, oloena le Kristos Yesus tʼolbae linyi lemeata Engai,
anaa pitoning'o ndai lomon lʼenkisyayare eng'adunoto Engai, naaishooki nanu tʼolbae linyi.
Amu aaitayolouoki ena mikio tʼembolunoto, anaa patisira shumata too looti rorei,
peiye, teni isomama ndai, nejing'aa ndai eyolounoto ai ena mikio e Kristos.
Eitu eitayoloi too lkulekai porrori loo nkera oo ltung'anak, anaa petabolokoki taata tʼOlmumua lairriwak o layolounok,
aajo ore loreren lemeata Engai eaku loong'ar enjung'o, naa rubat osesen obo, neng'ar nkisiligat e atua Kristos tʼeuangelion,
naaitaai nanu olaisyayani lenye tʼerisioroto enkishooroto eng'adunoto Engai naaishoo nanu tʼengolon enye naidimari.
Ara nanu oti naleng' tiatua sinyat pookin, kake aaishooki ena ng'adunoto, painosu tiatua loreren lemeata Engai endupoto nemetemai e Kristos,
nailang'aki oltung'ani pookin aitayolo keba aa eng'arata emikio natushumaki tʼenkiterata olmaa tiatua Engai, naitaa ntokitin pookin tiatua Yesus Kristos,
petum aatayolou taata nkitoriaitin o ngoloni e shumata tʼesirit eng'eno oo muain kumok Engai,
tʼerisioroto eotikinoto enye oo nkatan pookin, naitadua tiatua Kristos Yesus, Olaitoriani lang',
nikiata tiatua ninye enkiteunoto o enyikakinoto tiatua eng'idaroto tʼenkirukoto e atua ninye.
Onaa, asai ndai, pimishalulu too nkisilot ainei natum tʼolbae linyi, nera ninje enkitook inyi.
Onaa agilaki kung' ainei Menye lʼOlaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos,
eing'ua ninye empapaishu pookin naipoti te shumata o tʼenkop,
peiye eisho ninye ndai tʼemborei enkitook enye, pigolulu tʼolmumua linyi tiatua oltung'ani le atua,
pemany Kristos atua iltauja linyi tʼenkirukoto, ipikipiki ntonat neuni ndai tiatua enyorrata,
pindimidimi aatayoloutu te nebo o sinyat pookin enara endapasho o engadoro nairag o engadoro naitashe o engasuri,
piyolouu baiki enyorrata e Kristos nalang' eyolounoto pookin, peiganyi ndai tʼenkiganyata pookin Engai.
Ore ele loidim aitobira nelang' naleng' pookin, enikiomonu arashu enikimbirribirru, tʼenkidimata naitobirisho ninye tiatua yook,
njeishori ele enkitook tiatua esirit o tiatua Kristos Yesus too ishoreitin pookin enkata pookin o nkatan pookin. Amen.
Akae, adiding ndai, nanu oloena tiatua Olaitoriani, pilimanana anaa peaku tʼenkipototo naipotieki ndai,
tʼenkitadounoto pookin o tʼemborran o tʼolng'iria, pinapakinono tiatua enyorrata,
ninyokinyoko aaibung' enaboishu Olmumua tiatua eenet eseriani.
Etii osesen obo ake o Olmumua obo, anaa peipotokoki baiki ndai tiatua eanyunoto nabo enkipototo inyi;
netii Olaitoriani obo, enkirukoto nabo, enkibatisa nabo,
Engai nabo o Menye loo pookin, Olotii shumata oo pookin o too pookin o tiatua pookin.
Kake eishooki pooki tung'ani lang' eng'adunoto narisiore entemet enkishooroto e Kristos.
Onaa ejo: Eilepaka shumata neibok engaji oo looena neisho iltung'anak nkishoorot.
Ore peilepaka shumata, meji si ena ajo etang'asa adou atua wuejitin e abori naleng' enkop?
Ore ninye otadouo, naa ninye si oloilepa alo shumata alang' wuejitin pookin, peigany ntokitin pookin.
Eishoo ninye, peaku ematua lairriwak o ilkulekai layolounok o ilkulekai lainosarok loo lomon lʼeng'ida o ilkulekai lairritak o laiteng'enak,
peaku sinyat looidim aaitobira enkyas enkisyayare, pesheti osesen le Kristos,
metabana nikilep yook pookin atua enaboishu enkirukoto o eyolounoto Oinoti lʼEngai, pikiaku leak ootabaitie nikibaiki entemet embotoro nalulung'a e Kristos,
pimikintoki aaku nkera, pemerikiriki yook idye o idye tʼolkutati pookin lʼenkiteng'enare tiatua olosek loo ltung'anak o tiatua esungureishu, peaku emputokinoto enkitamanimanaroto,
kake pikiata esipata tiatua enyorrata nikibulu tiatua ninye lora elukunya, Kristos, too mbaak pookin;
neidikidikoki te ninye osesen pookin neibung'aro too rubat pookin, peretokino ematua nabo o engai t'entemet enkidimata neitaa, pebulu osesen metaa enjetakinoto enye openy tiatua enyorrata.
Ajo ena naijakenu tiatua Olaitoriani: Emintoki ndai aalimana anaa ilkulekai lemeata Engai tʼempesho oo ndamunot enye.
Eidipaki aatipik enaimin ndamunot enye nelam empuan naing'ua Engai, tiaraki nemetii eng'eno tiatua ninje, etaa modook iltauja lenye.
Naa torrok ninje neishooio aten atua mbaak torrok oo nkiri neas nʼolduruki te nebo o empiani.
Kake ore ndai eitu inteng'enuonuo Kristos neijia,
ten aa itoning'o lomon lenyena neiteng'eni ndai tiatua ninye, anaa petii esipata tiatua Yesus.
Onaa, entautu oltung'ani musana tʼorregie lenye lʼelukunya, loiminye kion tʼolng'warra lʼeng'uyan,
niakuku ng'ejuko tiatua Olmumua loo ndamunot,
ninjopishopo oltung'ani ng'ejuk oitobiraki tʼemua Engai tiatua esupato o esinyatishu o esipata.
Onaa enturrai elejare, eroro esipata, oltung'ani pookin tʼol elatia enye, amu kira rubat tiatua yook.
Emigoro, pemintarruoruo; eminjo edoiyo engolong', iatata engoro!
Eminjo si satan eng'asiata!
Olotupurrishe, njoo meitoki apurrisho, kake njepon anyok aitobir too ngaik enyena sidan, peiye etum aata enaisho Oloata elaunoto!
Njoo mepuku olderra torrono tʼenkutuk inyi, kake enara sidai, peaku enjetakinoto neisho looning' enjipai!
Emilishie Olmumua Sinyati lʼEngai lotipikieki ndai olmishire lʼengolong' elakunoto!
Njelakwaniki ndai erokan e oshoke pookin o olmurai le oshoke o engoro o enjangar o emoroto te nebo o entorroni pookin!
Entaa tiatua ndai oopeny loobor, looata ngoshuak naanana, looing'uaikino anaa petung'aikia Engai ndai tiatua Kristos.
Akae, entaa lasujak lʼEngai anaa nkera naanyorri,
entilimanata tiatua enyorrata anaa petonyorra yook Kristos neishooio kion tʼolbae lang', peaku enkishooroto o enkidasare, nara erropili sidai tʼEngai.
Njoo meimakini too ndai tukul mbaak torrok oo nkiri o olduruki pookin o engong'u oo masaa, anaa pemeata kata nemeaku too sinyat,
baiki nemeata sura o olderra lʼemodaishu o enkitakwenishoto torrono nemeaku too ndai, kake entopon elikinoto e ashe.
Amu meata kata nimiyololo ena, aajo meata enjung'o tiatua enkarsishu e Kristos o Engai oloitobir mbaak torrok oo nkiri arashu lʼolduruki arashu lʼengong'u oo masaa, lora olaisyayani loo nkulie ain.
Eminjo eitamanimanaa ndai oltung'ani o obo too rorei le pesho; amu elotu tʼolbae loo kuna engoro Engai shumata oo ltung'anak lemeiruk.
Akae, emiaku lang'arak o ninje.
Amu irara opa enaimin, kake itaa taata enkilang'et tiatua Olaitoriani.
Entobik anaa nkera enkilang'et, amu etii ilmomo lʼenkilang'et atua esidano o esupato o esipata pookin;
entaleen enashipakinoi tʼOlaitoriani.
Eming'ar nkyasin enaimin nemeata ilmomo, kake eaku, pingwenakiki ninje.
Amu enaitobir ninje tʼemikio, neata si enkurruna.
Kake ore kuna pookin eibalunye, teni eigwenaki enkilang'et ninje; amu pookin naibalunye, naa enkilang'et.
Onaa ejo: Nyototoi oloirura, topiu tiatua lootuata nikilailang'aki Kristos.
Akae, eng'orai, pilimanana aabaraki, me anaa ilmoda, kake anaa lang'eni,
ilakuku enkata, amu etaa ngolong'i torrok.
Onaa emiaku ilmoda, kake loodamu enara eyeunoto Olaitoriani!
Emimera tʼolmarua lotii enkibor oo ngonyek, kake njebore ndai Olmumua!
Erorioroto too singolioitin lʼengauo o too singolioitin lʼenkitadararoto o too singolioitin sidan lʼemumuaishu niranyakiki nintadaraara Olaitoriani too ltauja linyi,
nilikiki Engai o Papa oshi ashe tʼolbae loo ntokitin pookin tʼengarna Olaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos,
ining'ororo too ndai tiatua enkuretishu e Kristos.
Njening' ng'oroyok ilmoruak lenye anaa Olaitoriani,
amu era olmoruo elukunya eng'oroyoni, anaa pera Kristos elukunya esirit nera ninye Olaitopuani lʼosesen.
Neijia anaa pening' esirit Kristos, neijia njening' ng'oroyok ilmoruak too pookin.
Lemoruak, entonyor ng'oroyok inyi anaa petonyorra Kristos esirit neishooio kion tʼolbae lenye,
pesinyaa ninye eikishaanye tʼenkisujata engare tiatua ororei,
petum aeaki ninye kion esirit enkitook nemeata entibili arashu esototo arashu pookin nijo kuna, kake peaku sinyati o nemeata eleyata.
Neijia meata kata nemenyor ilmoruak ng'oroyok enye anaa seseni lenye oopeny. Olonyor enkitok enye, nenyor kion,
amu eitu ai kata eibai o obo osesen lenye; kake eitoti neramat ninye, neijia anaa si Kristos esirit enye.
Amu kira yook rubat osesen lenye, lʼenkiring'o enye o loo loik lenyena.
Onaa elaing'ua oltung'ani menye o ng'otonye neibung'are eng'oroyoni enye, neaku pokira are osesen obo.
Kitok ena mikio; kake alimu mbaak e Kristos o nʼesirit.
Neijia si ndai, njoo oltung'ani pookin too ndai enyor enkitok enye anaa kion; ore enkitok, njeure olmoruo.
Nakera, entoning' lootoiutuo ndai tiatua Olaitoriani; amu eitoriori ena.
„Ntaa kituak minyi o ng'utunyi!“ era ena enkitanapata elukunya naata enkisiligata,
„pitum sidan nibik enkata naado tʼenkop.“
Ore ndai, loomenye, emintagor nkera inyi, kake entubulu ninje tʼenkiteng'enare o tʼendiding'are Olaitoriani!
Laisyayak, entoning' loora laitoriak linyi loo seseni tʼenkuretishu o tʼenkikirikirata too ltauja linyi oosipa anaa Kristos,
me tʼenkisyayare oo ngonyek anaa looiting'id iltung'anak, kake anaa laisyayak le Kristos nintobiribiri eyeunoto Engai too ltauja,
tʼolokiyo sidai isyayakiki ninje anaa looisyayaki Olaitoriani, neme iltung'anak,
niyololo, aajo ore oltung'ani pookin oitobir sidan, nelang'amu kuna tʼOlaitoriani, ten aa osinga arashu ololakuno.
Ore ndai, laitoriak, enkunakiti si ninje neijia, entapal enkituriata, iyololo, aajo etii shumata Olaitoriani lenye o linyi, nemeing'oraa ninye entemet oltung'ani.
Ore tʼenkiting'oto, lalashera lainei, entagolito tiatua Olaitoriani o tiatua enkidimata engolon enye.
Enjopo nareta pookin Engai, pitumutumu aaitashoito too losekin le satan;
amu mikiarare osarge o enkiring'o, kake ilkituak o looata engolon o laitoriak lʼolmaa lʼena aimin o ilmumuan torrok ootii abori e shumata.
Onaa, embung'a nareta pookin Engai, peiye indimidimi aaitashoito tʼengolong' torrono, naa teni itigilutua pookin, nintasheshe.
Akae, entashoito, iteenikinote esipata too mpolosi ninjopishopo esupato tʼolgoo,
ninjopitoto namuka tiabori oo nkejek anaa looidipakinote too lomon lʼeng'ida o eseriani.
Ore too kuna pookin embung'a elong'o enkirukoto nindimiemie aailiilarie mbaa naaiwuwu oltorrono,
nimbung'ubung'u erripet esekengei elukunya naisho enkitopuata o olalem lʼolmumua lora lomon lʼEngai.
Entasaishoto tʼenkata pookin tiatua Olmumua tʼesayata o tʼeomonoto pookin ninjolololo baiki tʼenyuata pookin nisayakiki sinyat pookin,
nikisayakiki si nanu, paaishori abolu enkutuk ai maureisho naitayolou emikio euangelion,
amu ninye ataaiye olaisyayani oena, peiye anyokita tʼeng'ida nairo anaa pemeata kata namaiko.
Onaa, piyolouu, anaa paikununo, enaas, elaitayolo ndai mbaak pookin Tukikos, olalashe onyorri o olaisyayani supat tiatua Olaitoriani,
lairriwaka ndai, piyolouu anaa paikununo, neilejilej ninye iltauja linyi.
Metobiko eseriani too lalashera, o enyorata te nebo o enkirukoto naing'ua Engai Papa o Olaitoriani Yesus Kristos!
Metobiko eng'adunoto too pookin loonyor Olaitoriani Yesus Kristos oshi ake. Amen.
Paulos o Timoteos, isingan le Yesus Kristos: too sinyat pookin tiatua Yesus Kristos ootii engang' e Filipi, te nebo o laing'orak o laisyayak.
Njeboitare ndai eng'adunoto o eseriani naing'ua Engai Papa lang' o Olaitoriani Yesus Kristos!
Aliki oshi Engai ai ashe, teni adamu ndai,
ngolong'i pookin, too sayat ainei pookin tʼolbae linyi pookin, nasaisho tʼeng'ida,
tʼolbae lʼenkidikidikoto inyi tiatua lomon lʼeng'ida, eiter tʼengolong' elukunya metabaiki taata,
nayolo ena toki nabo, ajo oloitera tiatua ndai enkyas sidai, nelaitabaia metabaiki engolong' e Kristos Yesus,

anaa peitoriori te nanu, paibirribirraki ndai pookin, tiaraki naata ndai tiatua oltau lai tiatua ienat ainei o tiatua emitunoto o enkitagoloto oo lomon lʼeng'ida, amu irara ndai pookin ling'aring'ara te nebo o nanu eng'adunoto.
Amu era Engai oljakeni lai, ajo aataiye ndai pookin esing'ati tʼenkordunoto e Yesus Kristos.
Nasayu ena, pepona abulu enyorrata inyi oshi tiatua eyolounoto o tiatua enkitagoluoto pookin,
pindimidimi aataleen enaaku, piakuku berleli, lemeitirikisho metabaiki engolong' e Kristos,
iborere too lmomo lʼesupato lootaa te Yesus Kristos, peaku enkitook o enkitadararoto Engai.
Ayeu ake niyolouu ndai, lalashera, ajo ore mbaak nainoto, eaku ninje emponata enkibularoto oo lomon lʼeng'ida,
neijia ajo etaliote ienat ainei tiatua Kristos tʼengaji enkigwena pookin o too lkulekai pookin,
netum lalashera kumok tiatua Olaitoriani enkitagoloto too ienat ainei, nepon naleng' aaiteu aairoro lomon lʼEngai, metii enkuretishu.
Kake einosu looje Kristos tʼolbae lʼengilata e tau o enkitarrikino, ore ilkulekai tʼoltau sidai.
Einosu lelo Kristos tʼenkitarrikino nemebaraki, amu ejo eponiki ienat ainei enkilishoto;
ore ilkulekai tʼenyorrata, amu eyolo, aajo abik ene tʼolbae lʼemitunoto oo lomon lʼeng'ida.
Ainyo si? Njeinosuni Kristos tʼorregie pookin, tʼenkitaduaroto arashu tʼesipata, nang'ida tiatua ina naitoki alang'ida;
amu ayolo, ajo elaaku ena te nanu enkitopuata tʼolbae lʼesayata inyi o tʼolbae lʼenkitarasunoto Olmumua le Kristos,
anaa paibartu naleng' naanyu, ajo makurru tʼentoki o nabo, kake eitadarari Kristos tʼenjipai pookin anaa oshi o taata tiatua osesen lai, ten eaku tʼempuan arashu tʼenkea.
Amu aishiye nanu Kristos naeiye endupoto.
Kake tiaraki naitobir enkyas ai ilmomo, ten aishiu tʼosesen, namayolo enagelu.
Aairony kuna baak pokira are: Aata olng'warra lʼelakunoto, patii e nebo o Kristos, naa sidai ena naleng';
kake meata kata namabik tʼosesen tʼolbae linyi.
Ore Eng'idaroto kitok ayolo, ajo alabik naitoki aboitare ndai pookin, pitumutumu enjetakinoto o eng'ida enkirukoto,
nindimidimi aaitadarai aten tʼolbae lai, teni aitoki alotu enitiiti ndai.

Embung'a ake orregie sidai anaa peyeu lomon lʼeng'ida le Kristos, peiye, ten alotu nadol ndai arashu matii naning' mbaak inyi, intasheshe tiatua Olmumua obo o tiatua oltau obo nigilunono te nebo o yook tʼolbae lʼenkirukoto oo lomon lʼeng'ida,
niminjosho eiture ndai ilmang'ati linyi tʼentoki o nabo, nera ena too ninje olponoto oibala lʼenkiminata, kake too ndai lʼenkitopuata, neing'ua ena Engai;
amu eishooki ndai tʼolbae le Kristos, me pirukuruku ake atua ninye, kake peisili ndai baiki tʼolbae lenye,
niatata ina araroto anaa pitadua te nanu nining'ining'i taata te nanu.
Akae, ten etii atua ndai enkilejilejata tiatua Kristos, ten etii enkitigiraroto enyorrata, ten etii enkidikidikoto Olmumua, ten etii ngoshuak naanana o nkordunot,
enganyutu eng'ida ai, piatata ndamunot naanyanyuk, niatata enyorrata nanyanyuk, niatata oltau obo, nidamumu nabo,
nimintobiribiri toki tʼenkitarrikinoto o enkitook e pesho, kake entaaroto kituak tiatua aten tʼenkitadounoto;
Njoo meing'oraa oltung'ani nkun enyena ake, kake baiki mbaak oo lkulekai.
Embung'a nkibirribirrat tiatua ndai, anaa peata ninje Kristos Yesus,
lotii atua emua Engai, neitu eing'oraa anaa nkyarunot, perisiore Engai,
kake eitoroka kion neibung' emua osinga, neaku anaa iltung'anak nelioi tʼorregie anaa oltung'ani;
neitadou kion nening'ishoi metabaiki enkea, metabaiki enkea esalaba.
Onaa, eitaa Engai ninye kitok naleng' neisho ninye engarna nalang' nkulie arn pookin,
pegila Tengarna e Yesus enkung'u pookin natii shumata o enkop o abori enkop,
peibalu olng'ejep pookin, ajo era Yesus Kristos Olaitoriani, peitaa kitok Engai Menye.
Akae, lanyor lainei, anaa pitoning'o oshi, neme enkata ake natii, kake naleng' taata matii, entaa enkitopuata inyi tʼenkuretishu o tʼenkikirikirata.
Amu Engai naitobir tiatua ndai eyeunoto o enkitabaiaroto tʼenyorrata enye.
Entaas pookin metii enking'unyung'unyata o enking'arrirro,
piakuku nkera Engai nemeata entioto ana esungureishu, nemetii embuakinoto, tiatua ena kishon torrono nariwuo; ore tiatua ninje ilang'ishosho anaa nkilang'eta olmaa,
tiaraki nimbung'arere ororei lʼempuan, paaitadarari tʼengolong' e Kristos anaa oleitu ekwet pesho, neitu eitobirisho pesho.
Ten ake aaibukori shumata enkidasare o enkisyayare enkirukoto inyi, ang'ida nang'ida te nebo o ndai pookin.
Enting'idata si ndai too nena, o te nebo o nanu.
Kake aisilig tʼOlaitoriani Yesus, ajo airriwaki ndai Timoteos asioki, patum si nanu enjipai, ten ayolou enitiuu.
Amu maata olekai laanyanyukie nanu, oshilaa tʼolbae linyi tʼenyorrunoto naba nji.
Amu eing'oru pookin nkun enye, me en e Kristos.
Kake iyololo ndai, aajo ninye supat; amu aataretoko anaa enkerai menye too lomon lʼeng'ida.
Ninye aisilig, ajo airriwaa nabo kata, teni ayolou mbaak ainei eneikunari.
Kake ang'idare Olaitoriani, ajo alotu si nanu asioki.
Kake ajo eishiaakino, teni airriwaki ndai Epafroditos ora olalashe lai neitobir enkyas te nebo o nanu, na osikari lʼematua ai, neitoki aa olairriwani linyi, peisyayaki ngolati ainei.
Amu eataiye ndai esing'ati neimuntut naleng', tiaraki nitoning'o ndai, aajo etamoiya.
Amu etamoiya naleng' o metinyikaki enkea, kake etang'adua Engai ninye; neme ninye ake, kake si nanu, pamatum osina aitaalie olekai sina.
Onaa, airriwaiye ninye aitasioki, peiye, ten intokiki aadol ninye, ing'idada ndai, neitong'ori si osina lai.
Akae, entang'amutu tiatua Olaitoriani tʼeng'ida pookin nintaata kituak iltung'anak ooba nji.
Amu tʼolbae lʼenkyas e Kristos etinyikaka enkea nemerrip empuan enye, peitabaia enatong'oro tʼenkisyayare inyi tʼolbae lai.
Enyaaki, lalashera lainei, enting'idata tiatua Olaitoriani. Teni asiraki ndai il oshi rorei, namaaitanaur ina, kake eitagol ndai.
Eng'orai ildiain, eng'orai laasak torrok, eng'orai loodung'isho!
Amu kira yook emurata, nikisyayaki Engai tʼolmumua, nikintadaraa aten tʼolbae le Kristos, nimiking'idare enkiring'o,
ten ake aata si nanu, pang'idare enkiring'o. Teni ejo olekai tung'ani, eidim ating'idare enkiring'o, nalang' nanu naleng':
Aatumurataki tʼengolong e isiet, nara lʼolorere le Israel, lʼentipat e Benyamin, Olhebrayos oing'ua Ilhebrayoi; tʼempukunoto oo nkitanapat ara Olfarisayos,
tʼenyuata, atimira esirit, ore t'esupato naing'ua nkitanapat, namaata entibili.
Kake enataa endupoto te nanu, aikena aa enkiminata tʼolbae le Kristos.
Eton aiken nona pookin aa enkiminata, amu kitok naleng' eyolounoto Olaitoriani lai Yesus Kristos; ore tʼolbae lenye aikena pookin ajo enkiminata, naitoki aiken aa olduruki, patum Kristos,
nalio nanu tiatua ninye, ajo maata esupato naing'ua nkitanapat, kake eing'ua enkirukoto e atua Kristos, naa ninye esupato naikenaki Engai enkirukoto,
patum atayolo ninye o enkidimata empiunoto enye o eng'arata oo nkisilot enyena, panyanyukie enkea enye,
nabaiki enkitopiunoto oo lootuata.
Me neijia, ajo aidipa ainoto arashu aitabaiye; kake akwetiki, anake atum aibung'a ina, tiaraki naaibung'a Yesus Kristos nanu.
Lalashera, maiken kion, ajo aidipa aibung'a; kake aas nabo toki: arikino enatii kurum, naitoriokinore enda natii lukunya,
nanyok aisarisar, pabaiki idya rishata o emasaita sidai, naaitadolu enkipototo e shumata Engai tiatua Kristos Yesus.
Kake ore yook pookin lootabaitie, matadamutu ina, naa teni idamumu ndai engai bae, enjoo eboloki Engai ndai ena,
kake pikipuoiye ake ilo rregie likitang'amutua.
Entaa lasujak lainei, lalashera, eng'orai kulo loolimana neijia anaa piatata too yook enkitanyanyukiet.
Amu elimana ilkumok anaa patiaka ndai aigil kumok nalimu taata aishirita, ajo era ninje ilmang'ati lʼesalaba e Kristos,
nera enkiting'oto enye enkiminata, nera engai enye engoshoke, neata enkitook tiatua enkurruna enye, neibirribir ntokitin enkop.
Amu etii entonata ang' shumata nikianyu te inalo Olaitopuani o Olaitoriani Yesus Kristos
olaitaal osesen lang' lʼenkitadounoto, petum atanyanyukie osesen lenye lʼenkitook, tʼenkidimata naidimie ninye atipika ntokitin pookin abori enye.
Akae, lalashera lainei lanyor, laataiye esing'ati, lirara eng'ida o enkaja ai, entashoito tiatua Olaitoriani, lanyor lainei.
Asai Evodia, nasai Sintike, peata endamunoto nabo tiatua Olaitoriani.
Ee, aasai si iye, ol emboitei ai, taretoki nena kituak naataarare tʼolbae loo lomon lʼeng'ida te nebo o nanu, o Klemens o ilkulekai aretok lainei ootii ngam enye enkitabu empuan.
Enting'idata tiatua Olaitoriani oshi ake! Naitoki ajo: Enting'idata!
Njeyolouni emborran inyi too ltung'anak pookin! Etaanu Olaitoriani.
Emiekenya te toki, kake enjoo, peyolou Engai oshi yeunot inyi tʼesayata o tʼeropare te nebo o elikinoto e ashe.
Ore eseriani Engai nalang' eng'eno pookin, njerrip iltauja linyi o ndamunot inyi tiatua Kristos Yesus.
Ore tʼenkiting'oto, lalashera, entoki pookin nasipa, naata enkitook, naata esupato, naata eshaatishu, naiting'idisho, elimunoto sidai, enara orregie sidai, enaitadarari — ninje embirribirra!
Nona baak nintengenuote ning'amumu nining'ining'i nidolidolo te nanu, entobira, nebik Engai eseriani te nebo o ndai.
Ang'ida naleng' tiatua Olaitoriani, tiaraki ninyaakitia aapiu, pikishilaala nanu. Esipa, itishilaitie oshi ake, kake eitu itumutumu erishata.
Majo ena tʼolbae lʼeng'oroto; amu aiteng'enue, paabaiki mbaak pookin natii atua.
Amu ayolo enaikununo, teni aang'oriki toki arashu teni ebore ntokitin. Aidipakino ewueji pookin o too mbaak pookin: teni ataraposhe arashu teni aata olamei, teni aata enkumoi arashu elaunoto.
Aidimu pookin tʼolbae le ilo, laaidimunye, lora Kristos.
Kake itaasa enaishiaakino, tiaraki nikitaretokitio tiatua osina lai.
Niyololo si ndai, le Filipi, aajo ore tʼenkiterata euangelion, neba enkata natupukuo Makedonia, nemetii esirit naatang'arie esiana enkishooroto o eng'amunoto, neme ndai ake.
Amu baiki tiatua Tesalonike kirriwakitia nanu enkata elukunya o enkata e are enataa naatumoki nanu.
Metiu ajo aing'oru enkishooroto, kake aing'oru ilmomo, pebore tiatua enkikenata inyi.
Amu aata pookin, naata emborei. Aata tʼenkumoi aidipa atang'amu te Epafroditos enaing'ua ndai, erropili sidai, enkidasare nashipakino Engai.
Njeigany Engai ai naang'or too ndai pookin tʼerisioroto endupoto enye tiatua enkitook te Yesus Kristos.
Njeata Engai, Papa lang', enkitook eiter nkatan pookin o nkatan pookin.
Eroroki sinyat pookin tiatua Kristos Yesus. Eiroroki ndai lalashera ootii e nebo o nanu.
Eiroroki ndai sinyat pookin, naleng' lelo lʼengaji e kaisar.
Ore eng'adunoto Olaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos, njebik too ndai pookin. Amen.
Paulos, olairriwani le Yesus Kristos, tʼeyeunoto Engai, o olalashe Timoteos:
Too sinyat ootii engang' e Kolosai, o enetii lalashera airukok tiatua Kristos. Njeboitare ndai eng'adunoto o eseriani naing'ua Engai Papa lang' o Olaitoriani Yesus Kristos.
Kiliki yook Engai o Menye lʼOlaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos ashe nikisayaki ndai oshi,
kindipa aatoning' enkirukoto inyi e atua Kristos o enyorrata niatata ndai too sinyat pookin,
tʼolbae lʼeanyunoto naitaanyaki ndai te shumata, nindipa aatoning' opa tʼororei lʼesipata tiatua euangelion.
Eewuo enitiiti ndai, anaa atua olmaa pookin neiu ilmomo anaa si tiatua ndai, eiter te ina olong' nitoning'o niyolouu eng'adunoto Engai tiatua esipata;
anaa pinteng'enuote te Epafras, ol emboitei ang'
etaboloko yook enyorrata inyi tʼOlmumua.
Onaa, mikigira si yook nikisayaki ndai, eiter te ina olong' nikitoning'o ena, nikisai, peiganyi ndai eyolounoto eyeunoto enye tiatua eng'eno pookin o eyolounoto emumuaishu,
pilimanana anaa peaku tʼOlaitoriani, metaa enting'idata pookin, piiuu ilmomo tiatua enkitobirata sidai pookin,
niponana tʼeyolounoto Engai nigolulu tʼengolon pookin, tʼentemet engolon enkitook enye, pitumutumu olng'iria pookin o olgira tʼeng'ida,
ilikiki Papa ashe loidimunye yook eng'arata enjung'o oo sinyat tiatua enkilang'et,
loitopua yook tiatua engolon enaimin neitobik yook tiatua enkarsishu Oinoti lʼenyorrata enye,
nikiata tiatua ele elakunoto tʼosarge lenye, nera enkitaunoto oo nkitarruot.
Naa ninye emua Engai nemeduai, olkikau loo nkitobirat pookin.

Amu te ninye eitobiraki ntokitin pookin naatii shumata o naatii enkop, naalio o nemelio, ten aa lorikaishi loo looitore, arashu nkitoriaitin, arashu nkarsishuni, arashu ngoloni; pookin eitobiraki te ninye o tʼolbae lenye.
Netii ninye tʼenkiterata oo ntokitin pookin, netii pookin atua ninye.
Nera ninye elukunya osesen, eji nʼesirit; ninye ora enkiterunoto o olkikau oing'ua lootuata, peiturukie tiatua pookin.
Amu etishipakine, pemany emborei pookin atua ninye;
neitobirakinye pookin kion, naatii enkop arashu naatii shumata, tiaraki naitaa eseriani tʼosarge tʼesalaba enye tʼengalo enye openy.
Ore ndai, lirara opa lomon o ilmang'ati tiatua ndamunot inyi tʼolbae loo asat inyi torrok,
einotoko ndai enkitobirakinoto tʼosesen enkiring'o enye tʼenkea, peitasheye ndai irara sinyat nimiatata entioto arashu entibili tʼengomom enye,

ten aa ipuoiyeye enkirukoto niunokinono ninye nigoligolo, niminjosho eibelekenyari ndai aaitung'ua eanyunoto euangelion, nitoning'o ndai, nainosuaki tiatua nkitobirat pookin naatii abori e shumata, neaku ataa nanu, Paulos, olaisyayani lenye.
Ashipa taata tiatua sinaitin lainei tʼolbae linyi naitahaia tʼenkiring'o ai enang'oriki nkisilot e Kristos tʼosesen lenye, lora esirit;
naa ninye aaitaaki nanu olaisyayani lenye tʼerisioroto enkisyayare Engai, naaishooki tiatua ndai, paitabaia naleng' ororei lʼEngai,
naa ninye emikio natushumaki too nkatan o lajijik le opa, kake etabolokoki sinyat lenyena taata.
Amu etonyorra Engai aitayolo enara enkumoi sidai e ina mikio tiatua loreren lemeata Engai, naa ninye Kristos tiatua ndai, lora eanyunoto enkitook.
Nikinosu yook ninye nikididing' iltung'anak pookin tʼeng'eno pookin, pikintasheye oltung'ani pookin etaa baiaroti tiatua Kristos Yesus;
nanyamalaki nanu ina kyas nanyok tʼentemet enkidimata e ilo oitobirisho tiatua nanu tʼengolon.
Amu ayeu niyololo, ajo keba aa eaparoto naata tʼolbae linyi o lelo le Laodikea o pookin leitu edol engomom ai tʼosesen,
peilejileji iltauja lenye neitushuli te nebo tiatua enyorrata, petum endupai pookin enkitabaiaroto eng'eno, aatayolou emikio Engai Papa o ne Kristos;
ore tiatua ninye eisudori masaa sidan pookin eng'eno o eyolounoto.
Najo kuna, pemelej ndai oltung'ani too rorei sidan.
Amu teni matii tʼosesen, natii e nebo o ndai tʼolmumua, nang'ida, teni adol orregie linyi o enkirukoto inyi nagol e atua Kristos.
Anaa pitang'amutua Olaitoriani Yesus Kristos, neijia entilimanata tiatua ninye,
niunokinono, nishetakinono tiatua ninye tʼenkirukoto nagol, neijia anaa peiteng'enaki ndai, niponana aaliki ashe te ina.
Eng'orai, pemeitamanimanaa ndai oltung'ani tʼenkiteng'enare arashu tʼempesho elejare tʼerisioroto eng'amunoto oo ltung'anak, o noo rregieita lʼolmaa, neme tʼeyeunoto e Kristos.
Amu emanya tiatua ninye emborei pookin engaishu anaa osesen.
Nirara ndai baiarot tiatua ninye lora elukunya enkitoria o engolon pookin.
Ore tiatua ninye etumurataki ndai tʼemurata neitu eitobiri too ngaik, kake etushurtaki osesen oata nkitarruot tiatua enkiring'o, eji tʼemurata e Kristos.
Etunukaki ndai te nebo o ninye tʼenkibatisa; ore te ninye itopiutuo si ndai tʼenkirukoto naitobir Engai, naitopiwuo ninye too lootuata.
Einyeye si ndai te ina kata nituata tiatua nkitarruot o tiatua enkiring'o inyi nememurata, neisho ndai empuan te nebo o Kristos, etapalaka yook nkitarruot pookin,
nejut esirata naitang'oro yook, nataa too nkitanapat neibok yook; kake etoshoroiye ninye nesheiki esalaba,
neitau enkishopo oo nkitoriaitin o looata engolon, neitaduaia tʼewuas, nerik ninje anaa nkyarunot, eidipa atigilu ninje.
Eminjo eigwenakinye ndai oltung'ani endaa arashu enaoki arashu ngolong'i kituak naaje arashu lapaitin lʼenkibor arashu ngolong'i e sabato;
ore kuna baak, naa oloip loo ntokitin e akenya; kake ole Kristos osesen.

Eminjo eiwang'ie ndai oltung'ani enjunet, lora oloito anaa peyeu openy tʼenkitadounoto o tʼesupato oo lmalaikan, neitu edol hoo nabo too nena, neitaa sapuk elukunya pesho tiatua ndamunot naaing'ua enkiring'o enye,
nemeibung'are elukunya, naa ninye naret osesen olulung'a neisho eidikidiko te nebo neibung'aro tʼengalo oo rubat o ieneta enyena, nebulu nji, petum emponaroto Engai.
Teni ituata te nebo o Kristos nipalipala rregieita lʼolmaa, ainyo pisujusuju rregieita lʼolmaa anaa loopon aaishiu tiatua olmaa?
Ejo: mimbung' ena, niminyorrinyor ena, nimiporoo ena,
naa pookin ntokitin naamuta ake tiabori oo ngaik oo ltung'anak, nera nkitanapat o nkiteng'enareitin oo ltung'anak,
naatiu anaa eng'eno tʼolbae lʼesinyatishu nageluno o enkitadounoto, tiaraki nemeing'urrie osesen nemeshilaa enkiring'o, peata ngolati enyena.
Akae, teni itopiutuo ndai te nebo o Kristos, eng'orutu ne shumata, enetii Kristos lotonita te tatene Engai.
Embirribirra nara ne shumata, me nara nʼenkop.
Amu ituata ndai netushumaki empuan inyi te nebo o Kristos tiatua Engai.
Teni elalioi Kristos, empuan ang', nipuopuo aalioi si ndai te nebo o ninye tiatua enkitook.
Akae, entaar metuata rubat inyi naatii enkop: mbaak torrok oo nkiri o olduruki o enkima o olng'warra torrono o engong'u oo masaa, nara enkisyayare oo nkulie ain.
Tʼolbae loo kuna baak elotu engoro Engai shumata oo ltung'anak lemeiruk.
Naa tiatua ninje itilimanate si ndai opa injiuyeye ninje.
Kake ore taata, entautu pookin too ndai: engoro o enkiba o entorroni o emoroto o ilderrat torrok tʼenkutuk inyi.
Emilejaro tiatua ndai aten! Entautu oltung'ani musana te nebo o nkyasin enyena,
ninjopishopo oltung'ani ng'ejuk, oitaai ng'ejuk tʼeyolounoto, tʼerisioroto emua e ilo oitobira ninye;
nemetii ene Olgriki arashu Oyudayos arashu omurata arashu lememurata arashu olmeeki arashu Oskite arashu osinga arashu ololakuno, kake era Kristos pookin netii atua pookin.
Akae, enjopo anaa lootegeluaki lʼEngai, sinyat o loonyorri, iltauja lʼenkordunoto, emborran, enkitadounoto, enkirobi, olng'iria,
ninapakinono, ning'uaikinono, teni eata oltung'ani enkitang'oroto tʼolekai; neijia anaa petung'aikia Olaitoriani ndai, neijia si ndai!
ore too kuna pookin, enjopo enyorrata nara eenet enkitabaiaroto.
Njeitorisho eseriani e Kristos tiatua iltauja linyi, ndai looipotokoki atua ninye tiatua osesen obo, niakuku loobore ashe.

Njebik ororei le Kristos tiatua ndai tʼemborei, ninteng'enaroro nididing'aroro tʼeng'eno pookin, niranyakiki Engai too ltauja linyi too singolioitin lʼengauo o too singolioitin lʼenkitadararoto o too singolioitin sidan lʼolmumua.
Ore pookin nintobiribiri tʼororei arashu tʼenkyas, entobira kuna pookin tʼengarna Olaitoriani Yesus, pilikiki ashe Engai Menye te ninye.
Ndai, nang'oroyok, entoning' ilmoruak linyi, anaa peitoriori tʼOlaitoriani.
Ndai, lemoruak, entonyor ng'oroyok inyi, emiaku pushunot too ninje.
Ndai, nakera, entoning' lootoiutuo ndai too ntokitin pookin; amu ena naiting'id Olaitoriani.
Ndai loomenye, emintagor nkera inyi, pemeaku kureti.
Ndai, laisyayak, entoning' loora laitoriak linyi loo seseni too pookin, me tʼenkisyayare oo ngonyek anaa looiting'id iltung'anak, kake too ltauja lemeata olosek niurere Olaitoriani.
Ore pookin enintobiribiri, too ltauja entobirakiti anaa Olaitoriani, me anaa iltung'anak,
niyololo, aajo ipuopuo aatum elaakinoto enjung'o tʼOlaitoriani; amu isyayakiki Olaitoriani Kristos.
Kake ore oloitobir entorroni, nelang'amu entorroni naitobira; amu meing'oraa Engai entemet oltung'ani.
Ore ndai, laitoriak, enkunakiti laisyayak linyi naaishiaakino o naarisiore, niyololo aajo, iatata si ndai Olaitoriani te shumata.
Entonyok tʼesayata, ninjolololo tʼenkishooroto e ashe,
niomonokiki si yook pookin, peboloki yook Engai kutukaji ororei, nikilimu emikio e Kristos, amu ina aateenyeki,
paibalunye ninye neija anaa pemeata kata namalimu.
Entilimanata tʼeng'eno tʼengomom oo kulo lootii aulo ninyang'unyenye enkata.
Enjoo eborru ororei linyi netipikaki emakat pejing'aa tʼenkata pookin, piyololo eninkoko, pindimidimi aaishoo ealet naitoriori oltung'ani pookin.
Eitayolo ndai Tukikos mbaak ainei pookin, naa ninye olalashe lanyor o olaisyayani supat o osinga te nebo o nanu tiatua Olaitoriani,
lairriwaka ndai, peyolou, eninkununono, neilejilej nediding' iltauja linyi,
te nebo o Onesimos, olalashe supat naa kirotet, lora obo linyi. Eitayolo ndai mbaak pookin naataa tʼene.
Eiroroki ndai Aristarkos loena anaa nanu, o Markos, ol enganashe e Barnabas, lora ninye itang'amarie nkitanapat naaje; teni elotu enitiiti ndai, entang'amutu ninye,
o Yesus oji Yustos, loora lʼemurata. Nera ninje ake laretok lainei tiatua enkyas enkarsishu Engai, nainoto enkilejilejata too ninje.
Eiroroki ndai Epafras, lora obo linyi, naa osinga le Kristos, osayaki ndai oshi tʼenyuata, pintasheshe aa baiarot neiganyaki ndai tʼeyeunoto pookin Engai.
Aijakenoki ninye, ajo enyamalaki ndai naleng' o kulo lootii Laodikea o Hierapolis.
Eiroroki ndai Lukas, olabaani likinyor, o Demas si.
Eroroki lalashera ootii Laodikea o Nimfa si, o esirit natii engaji enye.
Ore teni eidipaki aaisoma ena palai too ndai, ninjoioio, peisomai si tʼesirit e Laodikea, nisomama ndai en e Laodikea,
nijokiki Arkipos: Ng'orai enkisyayare nitang'amua tiatua Olaitoriani, ntabai iye.
Enkirorokinoto ai Paulos, tʼengaina ai. Entadamutu ienat ainei. Metobikie eng'adunoto ndai. Amen.

Paulos o Silvanos o Timoteos: en esirit oo Ltesalonikes ena palai tiatua Engai Papa o Olaitoriani Yesus Kristos. Njebikie ndai eng'adunoto o eseriani naing'ua Engai Papa lang' o Olaitoriani Yesus Kristos.
Kiliki Engai ashe oshi too ndai pookin nikimpot ndai tiatua sayat ang'
nikidamu mikipal enkyas enkirukoto o enyamali enyorrata o olng'iria lʼeanyunoto, nara ninye Olaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos tʼengomom Engai o Papa lang'.
Amu kiyolo, lalashera oonyor Engai, anaa petegelua ndai Engai;
amu eitu ebaiki euangelion ang' ndai tʼororei ake, kake baiki tʼengolon o tiatua Olmumua Sinyati o tʼenkitisipunoto kitok; niyololo, neijia anaa pikinkununo too ndai tʼolbae linyi;
itaa ndai lasujak lang' o lʼOlaitoriani, nitang'amutua ororei tiatua sinaitin kumok tʼeng'ida tiatua Olmumua Sinyati
niakuku larikok loo pookin ooiruko te Makedonia o te Akaia.
Amu eibulaiye oltoilo lʼororei lʼOlaitoriani aing'ua ndai; neyolounoi enkirukoto inyi e atua Engai, me tiatua Makedonia o Akaia ake, kake baiki too wuejitin pookin, nemeyeuni nikipon yook ororei.

Amu eitayolo ninje oopeny eneikunakine ororei lang' too ndai te ina kata kijing' atua ndai, anaa eninkuna ndai, pimbelekenyakinono Engai, nipalipala muain nemera Engai, nisyayakiki Engai naishiu nasipa,
nianyunyu Oinoti lenye aing'ua shumata oitopiwuo ninye too lootuata, Yesus, loitopok yook aitung'ua engoro nalotu.
Amu iyololo si ndai, lalashera, enjing'ata ang' te ina kata kietuo enitiiti, ajo eitu eaku pesho;
amu ten ake kindipa aatang'amutu nkisilot o morot kumok te Filipi, anaa eniyololo ndai, nikiata empijan kitok tiatua Engai ang', pikinosaki ndai lomon lʼeng'ida kiata enara kitok.
Amu ore enkitaduaroto ang' eitu eaku tʼenkitapong'oroto arashu tʼolduruki arashu tʼolosek;
kake anaa peishoo yook Engai, pikinosu lomon lʼeng'ida, neijia kilimu; neme pikintiship iltung'anak, kake Engai naleen oltau lang'.
Amu eitu ai kata kiimaki rorei lʼolosek, anaa piyololo, arashu kiata empiani naisudoro, — Engai oljakeni lang' —;
neitu king'oru enkitadararoto too ltung'anak, neme too ndai, neme too kulekai.
Amu eaku, ten emutu kiroshikitio ndai anaa lairriwak le Kristos; kake kitoborrita yook too ndai, anaa engaibung'ani naitoti nkera enyena.
Neijia kitishipakinote ndai naleng' nikitonyorra yook aaishoo ndai, me lomon lʼeng'ida ake, kake iltauja lang' si, tiaraki nikitonyorra ndai naleng'.
Ajo nanu idamumu, lalashera, enyamali o enyuata ang'; amu kintobira enkyas dama o kiarie, pemikiek oltung'ani too ndai nikinosu too ndai lomon lʼeng'ida lʼEngai.
Irara ndai iljaken, naa si ninye Engai, enikinkunari too ndai tʼesinyatishu o t'esupato, nimikiata entioto,
niyololo, aajo anaa eikunaki menye nkera enyena, neijia kitididing'a nikilejilej
nikinjakenoki si yook oltung'ani pookin too ndai, pilimanana ndai aaitoriokino Engai, naipotoko ndai enkarsishu o enkitook enye.

Onaa kiliki Engai ashe mikipal, amu ore ping'amumu ororei lʼEngai likinosakitia yook ndai, neitu ing'amumu anaa ororei loo ltung'anak, kake anaa ororei lʼEngai, anaa pera tʼesipata, naitobirisho tiatua ndai liruko.
Amu ore ndai, lalashera, itaa lasujak loo sirito naatii Yudaya tiatua Kristos Yesus, tiaraki ninoto si ndai enkisiloto too ltung'anak lʼenkishomi inyi, anaa peinoto ninje too Yudayoi.
Etara Olaitoriani Yesus o layolounok ootupukutuo too ninje, nemir si yook, nemeitiship Engai neapare iltung'anak pookin,
nemitiki ninje yook kirorie lemeata Engai, pepok, neitabaia nkitarruot enye wuejitin pookin. Amu eton elotu engoro shumata enye metabaiki enkiting'oto.
Kake ore yook, lalashera, peoruni yook ndai nimikiduare enkiti kata tʼengomom, kake me too ltauja, nikisarisara naleng', pikidol engomom inyi tʼesing'ati kitok.
Akae, kitayeutuo nikipuo enitiiti ndai (nanu Paulos), aigil are, kake etomitikio satan yook.
Amu kang'ai ora eanyunoto o eng'ida o enkaja ang' enkitadararoto? Mirara si ndai tʼengomom Olaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos tʼelotunoto enye?
Amu irara ndai enkitook o eng'ida ang'.
Ore peaku mekure kindim aating'iria, nikinyor, aajo eing'uaikini yook oopeny te Atenai
nikirriwaa Timoteos, olalashe lang' o olaisyayani lʼEngai, naa olaretoni lang' too lomon lʼeng'ida le Kristos, peitagol neilejilej ndai tʼenkirukoto inyi,
pemenanau oltung'ani tiatua kulo sinaitin; amu iyololo, aajo etipikaki yook nona.
Ore en opa kata nikitii e nebo o ndai, kitolikitio yook ndai tʼenkiterata, aajo kipuo aatum sinaitin, anaa petaa niyololo si ndai.
Tiaraki nemekure aidim ating'iria, nairriwaa olkilikwai, payolou enkirukoto inyi, pemeaku eitasur ndai olaitasuroni neaku enkyas ang' en e pesho.
Kake ore pelotu Timoteos aing'ua ndai enikitii neliki yook enkirukoto inyi o enyorrata inyi, nidamunyenve yook oshi ake too sidan niyeuu naleng' nidolidolo yook, anaa si yook kiyeu nikidol ndai:
akae, eilejilejaki yook, lalashera, tʼolbae linyi tiatua emion ang' pookin o osina lang' tʼenkirukoto inyi;
amu kinjiu yook taata, teni intasheshe ndai tiatua Olaitoriani.
Amu kaa ashe kindim aatalaaki Engai tʼolbae linyi tʼena ng'ida pookin niking'ida too ndai tʼengomom Engai ang'?
Kiomon Engai naleng' dama o kiarie, pikidol ngomomi inyi nikitum aaitobira ina natong'oro tʼenkirukoto inyi.
Ore Engai Papa lang' openy o Olaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos, njeitorioo ngoitoi ang' maetu enitiiti.
Metoponai Olaitoriani enyorrata tiatua ndai aten o too ltung'anak pookin, anaa eniki-tiu yook too ndai,
peitagoli iltauja linyi nemeata entibili tiatua esinyatishu tʼengomom Engai o Papa lang' metabaiki elotunoto Olaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos te nebo o sinyat lenyena pookin.
Akae, eng'or, lalashera, kisai nikididing' ndai tiatua Olaitoriani Yesus Kristos, peiye (anaa pitang'amutua too yook, pibikibiki tʼorregie oitoriori ninting'iding'idi Engai) iponipono aapona.
Amu itayolo nkitanapat nikinjoo yook ndai tʼOlaitoriani Yesus.
Amu era ena eyeunoto Engai, esinyaroto inyi, pipaasharere mbaak torrok oo nkiri,
peyolou oltung'ani pookin atoriku enaret enye tʼesinyaroto o too nganyiti,
me tʼenkima olng'warra anaa loreren lemeyolo Engai,
pemeitarruo oltung'ani nemelej olalashe lenye tʼenkinyang'a, amu elalaaki Olaitoriani entorroni oo kuna pookin, anaa pekinturuko aaliki ndai nikinjakenu.
Amu eitu eipotoki yook Engai olduruki, kake esinyaroto.
Akae, olomen ena, memen oltung'ani, kake Engai naishoo atua ndai Olmumua lenye Sinyati.
Ore tʼenyorrata oo lalashera meaku, pasiraki ndai, amu eiteng'ena Engai ndai openy, pinyorrara,
amuneijia intobirakiki baiki lalashera tiatua Makedonia pookin. Kake adiding' ndai, lalashera, entopon enalang';
ninyokinyoko aagira aaitobir nkun inyi nintobiribiri nkyasin inyi too ngaik inyi, anaa pikintanapa ndai,
peiye ilimanana tʼorregie oitoriori too kulo loora le boo niming'oruru toki too ninje.
Mikiyeu, lalashera, pimiyololo mbaak oo looirura, pimilishilishi anaa kulekai lemeata eanyunoto.
Amu teni kiruk, aajo etua Kristos nepiu, neijia elariku Engai te Yesus baiki kulo looirurate te nebo o ninye.
Amu kiliki ndai ena tiatua ororei lʼOlaitoriani, aajo mikipuo aaiturukie yook likinjiu, likitelekutua te ina kata nalotu Olaitoriani, kulo looirurate.
Amu eladou te shumata ninye, Olaitoriani, tiatua enkipototo sapuk, tʼoltoilo lʼolmalaika kitok, tiatua eorunoto esekegwa Engai, nepuo aapiu tʼenkata elukunya lootuata tiatua Kristos,
tekurum nepuoi aailepie tiatua rukenyan yook likinjiu, likitelekutua, te nebo o ninje, pikipuo aanang'are Olaitoriani tʼolng'inai, pikipuo aatii nji e nebo o Olaitoriani nkatan pookin.
Elejilejaroto nji too kulo rorei.
Kake ore nkatan o rishat, lalashera, meyeuni nasiraki ndai.
Amu iyololo ndai oopeny, aajo ore engolong' Olaitoriani elotu anaa olapurroni olotu te kiarie.
Amu ore ejo ninje: osotua neserian, nelotu entorroni nabo kata shumata enye, anaa peinepu emion eng'oroyoni namena, nemeidim aailanyishoi ninje.
Kake ore ndai, lalashera, mirara ndai lʼenaimin, peinepu ndai ina olong' anaa olapurroni.
Irara ndai pookin nkera eong'an o nkera endama; mikira yook lʼenkiarie arashu lʼenaimin.
Akae, njoo mikirura anaa ilkulekai, kake maishololoto nikitum eng'eno.
Amu ore kulo ooirura, kiarie eirura; ore loomera, nemera kiarie.
Kake ore yook likira lʼendama, maishololoto tʼeng'eno ang', kinjopo elong'o enkirukoto o enyorrata, o olkaranda lʼesekengei lʼeanyunoto nabaiki enkitopuata.
Amu eitu epikaki yook Engai engoro, kake pikitum enkitopuata tiatua Olaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos
otuaka yook, peiye, teni kinjololo arashu kirura, kinjiu te nebo o ninye.
Akae, elejilejaroto tiatua ndai aten nishetakinono obo o olekai, anaa eninkoko.
Kake kisai yook ndai, lalashera, piyolouu kulo ooitobiraki ndai enkyas, oorikito ndai tiatua Olaitoriani nediding' ndai.
Entopon entonyor ninje tʼolbae lʼenkyas enye; entobik iataiyeye ninje eseriani.
Kake kididing' ndai, lalashera, enteng'ena lemeibung' orregie oitoriori, entagolo looshal, entanapakinore ilmenat, enting'iriakiti iltung'anak pookin.
Eng'orai, pemelaaki oltung'ani olekai tung'ani entorroni tʼentorroni, kake entusuj oshi sidan, too ndai oopeny o too ltung'anak pookin.
Enting'idata oshi!
Entasaishoto oade!
Entejo ashe tʼentoki pookin! amu ninye eyeunoto Engai tiatua Kristos Yesus too ndai.
Emiliilarie Olmumua!
Emimenu eyolounoto e akenya!
Entaleen pookin, emboo si naara sidan!
Entapaashare emua entorroni pookin!
Kake ore ninye, Engai eseriani, njesinyaa ndai tukul, njerripoki elulung'ata inyi, Olmumua o oltau o osesen, meata entibili, elotunoto Olaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos!
Supat oloipot ndai, nelaitobir baiki ninye.
Ndai, lalashera lanyor, entoomonoki yook Engai!
Eroroki lalashera pookin tʼeng'ututata sinyati!
Aitanapa ndai tʼOlaitoriani, peisomai ena palai too lalashera sinyat pookin.
Ore eng'adunoto Olaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos, njeboitare ndai pookin. Amen.
Paulos o Silvanos o Timoteos: en esirit oo Ltesalonikes ena palai, tiatua Engai, Papa lang' o Olaitoriani Yesus Kristos.
Njeboitare ndai eng'adunoto o eseriani naing'ua Engai, Papa lang' o Olaitoriani Yesus Kristos.
Meata kata nimikiliki oshi Engai ashe tʼolbae linyi, lalashera, anaa peaku; amu ebulu enkirukoto inyi naleng', nepona enyorrata oltung'ani pookin tiatua ndai pookin,
neijia ajo kintadaraa aten tʼolbae linyi tiatua sirito Engai tʼolng'iria linyi o tʼenkirukoto inyi tiatua nkisilot inyi pookin o tiatua sinaitin liting'iria,
nera olponoto lʼenkigwena supat Engai, peiye intobirakinono aajing' enkarsishu Engai, eitameitoi ndai baiki tʼolbae lenye,
anaa peitoriori tʼEngai, pelaaki tʼosina kulo looisilisil ndai,
o ndai looisilisili, eng'ieng'ata te nebo o yook, te ina kata nalalioi Olaitoriani Yesus eing'ua shumata te nebo o ilmalaikan lʼengolon enye,
tiatua enkiwuwuoto enkima, peisho elaata kulo lemeyolou Engai o kulo lemening' euangelion Olaitoriani lang' Yesus,
loopuo aaning' earata o erruoroto oo nkatan pookin, nemetii engomom Olaitoriani, nemetii enkitook engolon enye,
teni elalotu neitadarari tiatua sinyat lenyena neiputukunyokini tiatua lairukok pookin, te ina olong, amu eirukoki enjakenishu ang' too ndai.
Onaa, kiomonoki yook ndai Engai ang', peisho ninye ndai intobirakinorere ena kipototo, neitabaia enjipakinoto pookin emborran o enkyas enkirukoto tiatua engolon,
peitadarari too ndai engarna Olaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos, o ndai te ninye, tʼeng'adunoto Engai ang' o Olaitoriani Yesus Kristos.
Ore tʼolbae lʼelotunoto Olaitoriani Yesus Kristos o enkiturrurroto ang' enetii ninye, kisai ndai, lalashera lanyor,
eminjo eiposhiposhi ndai aasioki aaing'ua ndamunot inyi, niminjosho eiturei ndai, neme tʼolmumua, neme tʼororei, neme tʼempalai natiu eing'ua yook, ajo etabaua engolong' e Kristos.
Eminjo elej ndai oltung'ani tʼorregie o obo, amu melotu ina olong', neme empaashata nang'as alotu, neboluni ele tung'ani lʼenkitarruoto, enkerai enkiminata,
lora olmang'atinda, neilepie kion te shumata oo pookin naji Engai arashu enda naseremi, peitoton kion anaa Engai atua engaji sinyati Engai neitaduaia kion, ajo ninye Engai.
Midamumu, aajo ore opa eton aboitare ndai, atolikio ndai kuna baak?
Niyololo taata si ina naibooio ninye, petum aibalunye tʼenkata enye.
Amu eitera aitobirisho emikio entorroni, kake etii obo oibooio taata ninye o metabana neitaini.
Te ine neboluni ilo torrono, oar Olaitoriani tʼolmumua lʼenkutuk enye, nelaidip ninye, teni elioi tʼelotunoto enye,
naa ilo oata elotunoto tʼerisioroto enkyas e satan te nebo o nkidimat oo muain kumok o ilponot o nkitaduat elejare,
o tʼenkitamanimanaroto atua mesupato too kulo looimin, tiaraki neitu eng'amu enyorrata aanyor esipata neitopoki ninje.
Onaa, eirriwaki Engai ninje engolon enkitapong'oroto, peiruk elejare,
peiye eigwenakini lemeiruk esipata, kake eshipakino mesupato.

Kake ore yook, meata kata nimikiliki oshi Engai ashe tʼolbae linyi, lalashera lang' kiroteti tiatua Olaitoriani, tiaraki nategelua Engai ndai tʼenkiterunoto, pitumutumu enkitopuata tʼesinyaroto Olmumua o tʼenkirukoto esipata;
naa ina eipotoko ndai tʼeuangelion ang', piakuku masaa enkitook Olaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos.
Akae, lalashera, entashoito nimbung'ubung'u nena nitang'amutua, naatolikioki ndai, ten aa tʼororei arashu tʼempalai ang'.
Ore ninye, Olaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos o Engai Papa lang', otonyorra yook neisho enkilejilejata oo nkatan pookin o eanyunoto sidai tiatua eng'adunoto:
njediding' ninye iltauja linyi neitagol ndai tiatua enkiteng'enare o nkyasin sidan pookin.
Ore enang'or, lalashera, entasayaki yook, pesioki ororei lʼOlaitoriani aponari, neitadarari anaa too ndai,
neng'adieki yook iltung'anak moda o torrok; amu me en oo lkumok enkirukoto.
Kake supat Olaitoriani! elaitagol nerrip ndai tʼentorroni.
Kiruk tiatua Olaitoriani ndai, aajo enikintanap ndai, ninkoko nipuopuo aaiko.
Njeitorioki Olaitoriani iltauja linyi enyorrata Engai o olng'iria le Kristos.
Kake kintanap ndai, lalashera, tʼengarna Olaitoriani Yesus Kristos, pipaasharere olalashe pookin lemeibung' orregie oitoriori neme tʼenkiteng'enare nitang'amutua too yook.
Amu iyololo ndai oopeny eninkoko, pisujusuju yook; amu eitu kimposha too ndai,
neitu kinya endaa oltung'ani o obo pesho, kake kintobira dama o kiarie nkyasin tʼenyamali o tʼosina, pimikiroshiki obo linyi,
me, tiaraki nimikiata engolon, kake pikinjo ndai enkiteng'enare, pisujusuju yook.
Amu te ina kata nikitii atua ndai, kintanapa ndai ena, ajo teni meyeu neitobir oltung'ani enkyas, njoo medaa.
Amu kining', aajo etii atua ndai looibung' orregie lemeitoriori nemeitobir enkyas, kake eitobir mbaak nemeaku.
Kake kintanap lelo nikididing' ninje tiatua Olaitoriani Yesus Kristos, peitobir enkyas tʼolgira nenya endaa enye openy.
Ndai, lalashera, eminaura intobiribiri sidan.
Teni etii oltung'ani lemening' ororei lang', entayolo ele tung'ani nimiatata eng'arata o ninye, pekurru ninye.
Kake eminkenaki ninye anaa olmang'atinda, kake entididing' anaa olalashe linyi.
Ore ninye, Olaitoriani lʼeseriani, njeisho ndai eseriani oshi too ngoitoi kumok. Njebik Olaitoriani te nebo o ndai!
Enkirorokinoto tʼengaina ai nanu Paulos; naa ilo olponoto lai tiatua mpala pookin; asir aiko nji.
Njebik eng'adunoto Olaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos tiatua ndai pookin. Amen.
Paulos, olairriwani le Yesus Kristos tʼenkitanapata Engai, Olaitopuani lang', o Olaitoriani Yesus Kristos lora eanyunoto ang':
en ino, Timoteos, enkerai ai nasipa tʼenkirukoto, eng'adunoto o enkordunoto o eseriani naing'ua Engai, Papa lang', o Yesus Kristos, Olaitoriani lang'.
Anaa idya naaitanapa iye, pibik te Efesos enkata nalo Makedonia, nintanap kulekai, pemeiteng'en nkulie baak,
nemening' natinin e opa o noo lmakui nemeata enkiting'oto, naayau nkilikwanat nelang' enjetakinoto e atua Engai tiatua enkirukoto.
Kake enkitabaiaroto oo nkitanapat, naa enyorrata naing'ua oltau oibor o oltoilo sidai lʼoltau o enkirukoto nemeata esungureishu.
Ore kulekai etapaasha nona neibelekenyakino ororei le pesho,
neyeu neaku laiteng'enak lʼesipata, nemeyolo enalimu arashu enaitasheye.
Kake kiyolo, aajo sidan nkitanapat, teni eitobir oltung'ani abaraki,

neyolou ena, ajo eitu epiki tʼoltung'ani supat, kake etipikaki too looitobir ntorrok o lemening'isho, too lemeure Engai o laitarruok, too lemesinyari o looimaki engarna Engai pesho, too lootara menye o lootara ng'otonye, o laarak metuata,
o looitobir mbaak torrok oo nkiri, o looisokorisho, o loopur iltung'anak, o lalejak, o looituruj elejisho, o teni etii olekai bae lemenyanyukie enkiteng'enare naishiuniisho,
tʼerisioroto euangelion kitok Engai tesh, naaishooki nanu, painosu.
Aliki ashe Kristos Yesus, Olaitoriani lang', Aaitagolo, amu aatadua ara airukoni naapik atua enkisyayare,
lara tʼenkata elukunya olamoroni o olamirani o olaotikinoni loo ntorrok; kake aaibung'akaki engoshoke nanana, amu aitobira opa nena mayolo, maata enkirukoto.
Kake etaa kitok naleng' empuris Olaitoriani lang' te nebo o enkirukoto o enyorrata natii atua Kristos Yesus.
Esipa ele rorei neaku, peng'amu pookin, ajo eewuo Kristos Yesus atua olmaa, peitopok laitarruok, naa nanu ol elukunya lenye.

Kake te ina aaibung'akaki engoshoke nanana, peitadolu Yesus Kristos tʼenkata elukunya tiatua nanu olng'iria pookin, peaku entoki enkiteng'enare oo kulo loopuo aairuk ninye, petum empuan oo nkatan pookin.
Njetum olkarsis loo nkatan pookin o Engai nabo ng'en, nemerruoio, nemelio, enganyit o enkitook nkatan pookin o nkatan pookin.
Ena enkitanapata naaisho iye, enkerai ai Timoteos, tʼerisioroto oo nkitayolounot nitang'asa atum, piarare enjore sidai tiatua ninje,
niata enkirukoto o oltoilo sidai lʼoltau, naa ninje eiturraitie kulekai, netigile emeili enkirukoto enye.
Ore too lelo naa Humenayos o Aleksandros, laitarasaka satan, peiboiori nememorisho.
Akae, adiding'isho, peitaai tʼenkata elukunya oo ntokitin pookin omonot, sayat, sayakinot, ashen too ltung'anak pookin,
too lkarsisi o too pookin looata engolon, pekiata empuan girati o nʼeseriani tʼorregie lʼEngai o tʼenkishaa pookin.
Amu sidai ena neiting'idisho tʼengomom Engai, Olaitopuani lang',
loyeu nepok iltung'anak pookin nepuonu atua eyolounoto esipata.
Amu etii Engai nabo netii olaidikidikoni obo lʼEngai o loo ltung'anak, oji oltung'ani Kristos Yesus,
loishooiye kion, peaku elakunoto too pookin, enjakenishu too nkatan enye;
te ina aaitaaki olkilikwai o olairriwani, (airo esipata, malejisho) o olaiteng'enani loo loreren lemeata Engai tiatua enkirukoto o esipata.
Akae, ayeu nesaisho leak tʼewueji pookin neilepie ngaik sinyat, metii engoro o enking'arrirroto.
Neija si ng'oroyok, njekaj aten tʼolkila oikishaan te nebo o nganyiti o eng'eno bioto, neme tʼenjetata oo lpapit o tʼeikare e sahabu o noo lulu arashu tʼenkishopoto oo lkilani oogol enkinyang'a,
kake anaa peaku too ng'oroyok naaibalu enkuretishu Engai too nkitobirat sidan.
Ore eng'oroyoni, njeiteng'enuo tʼolgira o tʼening'oto.
Maisho eng'oroyoni eiteng'enisho, arashu eitore olee, kake njegira.
Amu Adam etang'asaki aaitobir, neitokini Eva.
Eitu eleji Adam, kake eng oroyoni etelejaki, neau enkitarruoto.
Kake eitopoki tʼeishoi oo nkera, teni ebik ninje tiatua enkirukoto o enyorrata o esinyatishu te nebo o eng'eno bioto.
Esipa ele rorei: teni eyeu oltung'ani enkyas olaing'orani lʼesirit, nesuj enkyas sidai.
Ore si ninye olaing'orani, njoo meata eleyata, neaku olmoruo lʼeng'oroyoni nabo, lememera, loata eng'eno aitabaia, lobaraki, olaitinyikunoni loo lomon, oloyolo aiteng'enisho,
me olaokoni lʼolmarua, me olaarani, me olong'oroki kion too ntorrok, kake olobor, olgirati, lemenyor ngoshola,
loitasheiki engaji enye sidai, neata nkera naaning'isho tʼenganyit pookin.
Teni eaku meidim oltung'ani aitasheiki engaji enye, kaji eiko teni eitasheiki esirit Engai?
nemeaku olng'ejuk lʼenkirukoto, pemeitaa sapuk elukunya nebatata atua enkigwena e satan.
Meata kata nemeata si enjakenishu sidai too kulo lootii boo, pemebatata atua emoroto neitoki atua erreshet e satan.
Neijia si laisyayak lʼesirit, njeaku loobor, lemeata ilng'ejepa aare, nemeok enaisho naleng', nemeata olorok loo masaa,
looata emikio enkirukoto tiatua ndamunot naaibor.
Ore kulo njeng'asi aaleen, peishori tekurum enkisyayare, teni enyorrikini meata eleyata.
Neijia si ng'oroyok enye, njeata nganyiti, nemekurrisho, nerrip aten, naara supati too ntokitin pookin.
Ore laisyayak, njeaku pookin obo olmoruo lʼeng'oroyoni nabo, naa looitasheiki nkera enye o ngajijik enye aabaraki.
Ore looisyaisho sidai, netumoki aten enkitook sidai neata enkiteunoto sapuk tʼenkirukoto e atua Kristos.
Aatisiraka iye kuna baak nairuk, ajo alotu enitii asioki.
Kake teni aimutie naleng', pitum atayolo orregie limbung' tiatua engaji Engai, naa ninye esirit Engai naishiu, eng'apet o entonata esipata.

Naa kitok naleng' peinosuni ena mikio engaishu: Ninye oloibalunyeki tiatua osesen, neitaaki supat tʼolmumua, nelioi too lmalaikan, neinosuni tiatua loreren lemeata Engai, neiruki tʼolmaa, neng'amari te shumata.
Kake ejo Olmumua aibalunye, ajo tiatua nkatan enkiting'oto epuo aarrinyo kulekai aaing'ua enkirukoto, neibung'are ilmumuan enkitamanimanaroto o nkiteng'enareitin oo loiriruani.
Amu etelejaki tʼolosek loo kulo ooiro elejare, ootapejoki olmishire tiatua ndamunot enye,
nemitiki iltung'anak eamisho, nemitiki enya ndaikin naaitobira Engai, peng'amu lairukok o looyolou esipata ninje te ashe.
Amu era enkitobirata Engai pookin sidai, nemetii enaiturrari nang'amuni te ashe;
amu esinyari tʼororei lʼEngai o tʼesayata.
Teni intanap lalashera kuna, niaku olaisyayani sidai le Kristos Yesus oitubuluaki too rorei lʼenkirukoto o lʼenkiteng'enare sidai nitusuja oshi.
Tapaasha natinin e pesho oo ntasati. Ntamoo kion orregie lʼEngai.
Amu eishoru emokunoto osesen endupoto kinyi, kake eata emokunoto Engai endupoto too ntokitin pookin, neata enkisiligata empuan e taata o enalaaku.
Esipa ele rorei neaku penyorruni naleng'.
Amu kinyamal te ina nikinyok aang'idare Engai naishiu, ora Olaitopuani loo ltung'anak pookin, naleng' loo lairukok.
Ntanapa kuna, nteng'enu!
Minjo eiba oltung'ani enkitishu ino! kake taa enkiteng'enare too lairukok tiatua ororei, tiatua orregie, tiatua enyorrata, tiatua Olmumua, tiatua enkirukoto, tiatua eshaatishu.
Metabana nalotu, tonyua tʼenkisoma, tʼendiding'aroto, tʼenkiteng'enare!
Mirikino enkishooroto nikinjooki tʼenkitayolounoto, kinteleikitia ilpaiyani ngaik.
Nena tishilarie, tamokunore, pipona tiatua ntokitin pookin aibalunye.
Torripo kion o enkiteng'enare; tobikie nena baak. Amu teni inko neijia, nintopok kion o kulo likining'.
Milepilepaki olpaiyan, kake tididing'a ninye anaa minyi lino, o ilmurran anaa lalashera,
nkituak tasati anaa noo yeiyo, nkutiti anaa nganashera inono tʼeshaatishu pookin.
Ntaa kituak ngolia naara!

Kake teni eata engoliai nkera arashu nkera oo ltoiye lenye, njeng'as ninje aaiteng'enuo aten, peyolo aaitadua enkisyayare Engai too ngajijik enye nelaaki lootoiutuo ninje too sidan, amu ina sidai tʼengomom Engai neiting'id ninye.
Enara oliai, nebik openy neanyu Engai, nebik tiatua eomonoto dama o kiarie.
Amu enabik tiatua olng'warra, netua eishiu.
Ntanapa kuna baak, pebik meata eleyata!
Teni meshilaa oltung'ani ilkulenyena o naleng' kulo l'engaji enye, eisimua ele enkirukoto naa torrono nelang' olemeiruk.
Minjo egeluni engoliai neitu ebaiki larin ntomoni ile, natii opa eng'oroyoni olmoruo obo,
neijakenoki nkyasin sidan ninye, teni eitubulua nkera, neitoomon lomon, neisuj isinyat nkejek, neretoki looata osina, nesuj enkyas sidai pookin, peitobir.
Kake ore ngolia kutiti, tapala, amu teni ewuasare Kristos, neyeu neami,
neata enkigwena, ajo eiturraitie en opa kirukoto elukunya.
Neitoki aaku turua nemoku emanaa too ngajijik. Neme turua ake, kake era si noopeny olderra o rorei loo nkurrat, neiro mbaak nemeaku.
Akae, ayeu ngolia kutiti neami, neiu nkera, neing'oraa ngajijik enye, nemeisho ele mang'atinda eng'asiata namorishore.
Amu eidipa kulie aatorrinyoto aatusuj satan.
Kake teni eata olairukoni arashu engairukoni ngolia, njeshilaa ninje, nemeisho eek esirit, petum nena olia naara, enabaiki.
Njoo eitaai kituak aigil are kulo aigwenak looitasheiki sidai, naleng' kulo loonyok tʼororei o tʼenkiteng'enare.
Amu ejo esirata: meenai enkutuk olkiteng' loidong'isho; neitoki: Eaku, petum olaitobirani olkwaje lenye.
Teni eitang'ori olaigwenani, ming'amu ena kitang'oroto, neme teni etii iljaken aare arashu okuni.
Ore looitarruo, ngwenaki tʼengomom oo pookin, peureisho si ilkulekai.
Aijakenu tʼengomom Engai o Kristos Yesus o ilmalaikan gelunot lʼEngai, pimbung' nena baak, miata enyorunoto arashu enkitooroto.
Minteleiki oltung'ani ngaik asioki! Ming'ar nkitarruot oo lkulekai tung'anak! Torripo kion, pibik aa shaat!
Mintoki taata aok engare, kake tooko enkiti aisho tʼolbae lʼengoshoke ino, tiaraki nimoi aigil kumok.
Ore nkitarruot oo kulekai tung'anak edoli nabokata, netum earata tʼenkiterata; nelioi nkitarruot oo kulekai tekurum.
Neijia etiu si nkitobirat sidan oo kulekai edoli tʼenkiterata, nemeidim aaisudoroto nkulie.
Ore singan pookin ootii abori enjata, njeiken laitoriak lenye tʼenganyit pookin, pememori engarna Engai o enkiteng'enare.

Ore lelo, looata laitoriak ooiruk, nememenaa tiaraki nara lalashera; kake eikash, teni epon ninje aaisyayaki ninje, amu era ninje lairukok naa kiroteti oong'ar emunyani. Nteng'ena kuna baak nididing'!
Teni eiteng'en oltung'ani nkulie baak nemebik tiatua rorei ooi-shiuniisho lʼOlaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos o tiatua enkiteng'enare narisiore orregie lʼEngai,
neiteija ilo elukunya pesho, nemeyolo toki, neata emoiyan naaunye nkikilikwanat o njangarrin, naapukunye engilata e tau, enkitarrikino, emoroto, elapo torrono,
olarrabal loo ltung'anak ooitarruoitie eng'eno enye netooruoki esipata, loodamu, aajo orregie lʼEngai etumie endupoto. Tapaashare looba nji!
Kake era emokunoto Engai o engiraishu oo naatai, engong'u sapuk endupoto;
amu eitu kiau toki atua olmaa, eibala, ajo mikindim aaea toki.
Ore pikiata ndaikin o ilkilani, matigirata too nena.
Ore kulo looyeu neaku ladupak, neurokino atua enkitasuroto o erreshet o ilng'warraitin kumok lʼemodaishu o looata enkitameito looitadoiki iltung'anak atua erruoroto o enkiminata.
Amu era enyorrata oo ngoshola entonata oo ntorrok pookin, neng'war kulekai ena neimalimal neing'ua enkirukoto nepej aten too mioitin kumok.
Kake iye, letung'ani lʼEngai, kweta kuna! Tonyoku esupato, emokunoto Engai, enkirukoto, enyorrata, olng'iria, emborran!
Taarai tʼearata sidai enkirukoto, mbung'a empuan oo nkatan pookin nikimpotieki nimbalu enkibalunoto sidai tʼengomom oo ljaken kumok.
Aaitanap iye tʼengomom Engai naisho pookin enkishui, o tʼengomom e Yesus Kristos oijakenuo tʼengomom e Pontius Pilatos enkibalunoto sidai;
mbung'a enkitanapata, metii entibili nemetii enkitadiata, metabana neaku elioroto Olaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos,
naitadol tʼenkata enye ilo lora tesh, naa ninye oata engolon pookin ake, ora olkarsis loo lkarsisi pookin o Olaitoriani loo laitoriak pookin,
naa ninye ake lemee, omany tiatua eong'an enemeidim atijing'a oltung'ani, neitu edol oltung'ani ninye nemeidim atadua; enenye enkitook o enkarsishu oo nkatan pookin. Amen.
Ntanapa ladupak lootii atua ele maa, pemewuasa, pemeiruk masaa naaibelibel, kake Engai naishiu, naitarasaki yook pookin tʼenkumoi, pekisotu tʼeng'ida,
peitobir ninje sidan, netum endupai oo nkitobirat sidan, neishooio tʼeng'ida, neretisho,
neiturrur aten masaa naaku entonata sidai e idya nalotu, neibung' empuan nasipa.
Iye, Timoteos, torripo kuna nikinjooki, tanya rorei le pesho lʼentung'anishu o njangarrin eyolounoto elejare,
amu etusuja kulekai nena neiminye enkirukoto. Njoo kiboitare eng'adunoto. Amen.
Paulos, olairriwani le Yesus Kristos tʼeyeunoto Engai tʼerisioroto enkisiligata empuan tiatua Kristos Yesus:
en ino, Timoteos, enkerai ai nanyor, eng'adunoto o enkordunoto o eseriani naing'ua Engai Papa o Kristos Yesus, Olaitoriani lang'.
Aliki Engai ashe naomon neba opa tʼentonai oo lakuyani lang' too ndamunot sidan, anaa enaadamu iye namapal dama o kiarie,
nayeu naadol iye, teni adamu ilkiyo linono, paaigany eng'ida;
amu adamu enkirukoto ino nasipa natii atua iye, naitera opa amany tiatua koko ino Lois o tiatua ng'utunyi Oinike, nayolo, ajo tiatua iye si.
Te ina bae aaitadamu iye, pinyeye enkishooroto Engai natii atua iye tʼenkiteleikinoto oo ngaik ainei.
Amu eitu eisho Engai yook Olmumua lʼenkuretishu, kake Olmumua lʼengolon o lʼenyorrata o lʼenkitoriokinoto.
Onaa, mining' enkurruna te nanu, oloena lenye, kake ting'iria too nkisilot tʼolbae lʼeuangelion, anaa nanu, tʼerisioroto engolon Engai,
naitopua neipotoki yook tʼenkipototo sinyati, me tʼolbae loo nkitobirat ang', kake tʼeotikinoto enye o eng'adunoto naishooki yook tiatua Kristos Yesus, eton eitu eiteruni olmaa;
neibalunyeki taata tʼelioroto Olaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos, oiminye engolon enkea neitupukoki atua enkilang'et empuan o entiinoto nemerruoio tʼeuangelion,
naatipikaki nanu, mataa olainosunoni o olairriwani o olaiteng'enani loo loreren lemeata Engai.
Te ilo bae atum kuna kisilot; kake maning' enkurruna too ninje, amu ayolo olairuk, naaitisipuni, ajo aaidim atorripoki nena naaishooki, metabaiki ina olong'.
Mbung'a naleng' enkiteng'enare oo rorei ooishiuniisho Etoning'o te nanu, tiatua enkirukoto o enyorrata natii atua Kristos Yesus.
Ina kishooroto sidai torripo tʼeretokinoto Olmumua Sinyati, omany tiatua yook.
Iyolo ele rorei, ajo aatalamare nanu pookin ootii Asia; naa too ninje si Filipos o Ermogenes.
Metokordu Olaitoriani engaji e Onesiforos, amu aaitishipa aigil kumok neitu ening' enkurruna too nkeenda ainei;
kake ore etii Roma, aaing'orua naleng' naainoto.
Njeisho Olaitoriani, petum ninye enkordunoto tʼOlaitoriani te ina olong'; iyolo si iye, keba aa nkyasin aaisyayaka te Efesos.
Ore iye, nakerai ai, tagolo tiatua eng'adunoto e atua Kristos Yesus.
Kuna limot nitoning'o te nanu too ljaken kumok, njoo kulekai tung'anak supati, ooata eyolounoto, peiteng'en si ilkulekai.
Tang'ara enkisiloto te nebo o nanu anaa olmurrani supat le Yesus Kristos.
Metii osikari olo enjore oitushulaki kion mbaak ena kop, amu eyeu neitiship ilo otisiraka ninye enkyas osikari.
Ore tʼenkiguran, baiki teni eapare oltung'ani, nemetum enkaja, neme teni eapare osupatei.
Meata kata nemetum olaturoni lotur enkuruma, ilmomo tʼenkiterata. Tumuso naleng' enajo!
Amu kinjo Olaitoriani eng'eno tiatua mbaak pookin.
Tadamu Yesus Kristos, otopiwuo too lootuata, lʼeishoi e David, tʼeuangelion ai;
naaisilieki ena metabaiki too nkeenda anaa oloitobira ntorrok, kake meenai ororei lʼEngai.
Onaa, ang'iriaki pookin tʼolbae loo lootegeluaki, peiye etum si ninje enkitopuata tiatua Kristos Yesus te nebo o enkitook oo nkatan pookin.
Esipa ele rorei: Teni kie te nebo o ninye, nikipuo aaishiu te nebo o ninye,
teni kimiki, nelamiki si ninye yook;
teni mikiruk, nebik ninye aa supat, amu meidim ninye atomikio kion.
Ntadamu iltung'anak kuna baak, ninjakenu tʼengomom Olaitoriani, pemeishangarrare rorei, amu medupai, neibelekenyari ake kulo looning'.
Tonyua aitadol kion tʼEngai anaa olaitobirani supat lemeata eleyata, looriki ororei lʼesipata abaraki.
Ntalama kion mbaak enderrare oo mpeshoi entung'anishu; amu epon ina ake orregie torrono,
nenya ilo rorei anaa enkea nayeng'i; tiatua kulo etii Humenayos o Filipos,
ootapong'ori aaing'ua esipata, nejo eidipa ataa empiunoto oo lootuata, neibelekenya enkirukoto oo kulekai tung'anak.
Kake ebik entonata nagol Engai neata ele ponoto: Eyolo Olaitoriani loora ilkulenyena — o: Njepaash entorroni oltung'ani pookin oipot engarna Olaitoriani.
Ore tʼengaji kitok, metii ake ntokitin e sahabu arashu nʼosuiai oibor, kake baiki noo nkeek o nʼesarng'ab, neata kulie enganyit, neata kulie enkurruna.
Kake teni eisuja oltung'ani apaash nona, neaku entoki sinyati naata enganyit, netumoki olopeny, neidipakinore enkyas pookin sidai.
Lanya ilng'warraitin torrok enkitishu! kake tusuja esupato, enkirukoto, enyorrata, eseriani te nebo o pookin ooipot Olaitoriani tʼoltau oibor.
Tanya nkikilikwanat naatii emodaishu nemedupa; amu iyolo, ajo eiu ake olarrabal.
Kake ore olaisyayani lʼOlaitoriani, me sidai, teni eilepilep, kake meata kata nemebor too ltung'anak pookin, neyolo aiteng'enisho, neng'iriaki iltorrok,
odiding' tʼemborran lelo ooata engogong'i, an ake eisho Engai ninje enkitaalata, peyolou esipata,
neng'enu neidim aatupukutu tiatua erreshet e satan, oteena ninje, peitobir enayeu ninye.
Kake tayolou ele rorei, ajo too ngolong'i enkiting'oto, nepuonu nkatan nemeserian.
Amu eaku iltung'anak loonyor aten, nenyor masaa, looilash, newuasa, nemorisho, nemening' lootoiutuo ninje, nemeliki ashe, nemeure Engai,
nemeata enyorrata, nemeing'uaikino, nekurrisho, nemera shaati, nera pushunot, nemeata emborran,
neitarasaki, neitobir mbaak torrok, neitaa sapuk elukunya pesho, nenyor olng'warra torrono nelang' Engai,
neitanyanyukie aten enyor Engai, kake eany engolon enye. Talama iye iltung'anak ooba nji.
Amu tiatua lelo ninje epuku oojing' ngajijik nerresh ng'oroyok naanap orridati loo nkitarruot, erikito atua ilng'warraitin loo muain kumok,
naa ninje ooiteng'enuo oade, nemeidim aainoto eyolounoto esipata.
Kake anaa etanyaita Yanes o Yambres eiruk Mose, neijia etiu si ninje neany esipata; nera ninje iltung'anak ootarruoitie ndamunot, lemeidimunye tiatua enkirukoto.
Kake meidim aashom lukunya oade; amu eibalunye emodaishu enye too ltung'anak pookin, neijia anaa opa peibalunye emodaishu oo lelo.
Kake itusuja iye enkiteng'enare ai, orregie lai, eotikinoto ai o enkirukoto o enkitirring'a o enyorrata o olng'iria lai,
o mirat ainai o nkisilot ainei nainoto te Antiokia, Ikonion o Listra. Keba aa nkisilot nating'iria te ine! Kake aatang'adua Olaitoriani aitung'ua pookin.
