Ore pookin ooyeu neibung'are orregie sidai tiatua Yesus Kristos, netum emirata.
Kake ore kulo tung'anak torrok oolejisho, nelusoo aaku torrok, neitapong'oo neitapong'ori.
Kake tobiko iye tiatua nena ninteng'enue nikintanapaki.
Ore tiaraki niyolo esirata sinyati neba enkata ira enkerai, nikindim ninye aiteng'ena iye, pitum enkitopuata tiatua enkirukoto e atua Kristos Yesus.
Amu ore esirata pookin nara enkutunoto Engai, netumoki ataa enkiteng'enare o enkigwena o enkitoriokinoto o enkitubulunoto tiatua esupato,
peaku oltung'ani lʼEngai oljartan oidimu enkyas sidai pookin.
Onaa, aijakenu tʼengomom Engai o Olaitoriani Yesus Kristos, olotu aigwenaki looishiu o lootuata tʼelioroto enye o tʼenkarsishu enye:
Nosu ele rorei, tonyua tʼenkata sidai o neme sidai, ngwenaki, ntureishoi, tuutu tʼolng'iria pookin o tʼenkiteng'enare.
Amu elotu enkata nemeyeu ninje enkiteng'enare naishiuniisho, kake tʼerisioroto oo lng'warraitin lenye oopeny eing'oru laiteng'enak ootiu anaa peyeu nening' nkiyaa enye,
neibelekeny nkiyaa enye pemening' esipata, neibelekenyakino natinin elejare.
Ore iye, torripo kion too pookin, ting'iria too ntorrok, ntobira enkyas olainosunoni loo lomon lʼeng'ida, ntabai enkisyayare ino!
Amu atioyo aidasishoreki netinyikua enkata elakunoto ai.
Atigilunore engilunoto sidai, aidipa enkwetata, aiboiye enkirukoto;
eng'or aarripokini olkaranda tʼesupato, laalaisho Olaitoriani te ina olong', olaigwenani supat, neme nanu ake, kake pookin lootonyorra elioroto enye.
Tonyua naleng', tasioku enatii nanu!
Amu natung'aiye Demas, nenyor mbaak ele maa, neshomo Tesalonike, neshomo Kreskens Galatia, neshomo Titos Dalmatia.
Lukas ake openy otii e nebo o nanu. Iao Markos enitii, toriku ene wueji, amu ninye laaretoki nanu enkisyayare.
Amu airriwaiye Tukikos meshomo Efesos.
Au ele kila liopore latung'aiye te Troas too ngaik e Karpos, teni ilotu, o nkitabuni, naleng' nena naaitobiraki too ndapan.
Ore Aleksandros, ele kunoni, aaikunaka ntorrok kumok; njelaaki Olaitoriani ninye, anaa perisiore nkyasin enyena.
Kake torripo si iye kion naleng' te ninye, amu etanya rorei lang' naleng'.
Tʼemitunoto ai elukunya eitu aaitasheiki o obo engalo ai, kake aatung'aitie pookin. Njoo meikenakini ninje.
Kake aaitasheikio Olaitoriani naaitagolie, peitabaiari enkinosunoto te nanu, nening' lemeata Engai pookin; naatang'adieki nanu enkutuk olng'atuny,
Aalo ang'adie Olaitoriani enkyas torrono pookin naalo aitopok tiatua enkarsishu enye e shumata. Njeishori ninye enkitook nkatan pookin o nkatan pookin. Amen.
Roroki Priska o Akwila o engaji e Onesiforos.
Etobiko Erastos te Korintos; ore Trofimos atung'aiye ninye te Miletos emoi.
Tasioku wou eton eitu ebau enkata enkirobi. Kiroroki Oibulos o Prudens o Linos o Klaudia o lalashera pookin.
Njebik Olaitoriani te nebo o Olmumua lino. Njebik eng'adunoto te nebo o ndai. Amen.
Paulos, osinga lʼEngai o olairriwani le Yesus Kristos, tʼerisioroto enkirukoto oo lootegeluaki lʼEngai o eyolounoto esipata nabaiki enkisyayare Engai,
tiatua eanyunoto empuan nemeiting', naisiliga Engai nemelejisho, eton eitu ebau nkatan enkop;
kake tʼenkata enye etaboluo ororei lenye tʼenkinosunoto naaishooki nanu tʼenkitanapata Engai, Olaitopuani lang':
te Titos, enkerai ai nasipa tiatua enkirukoto niking'ar yook pokira are. Njoo kiboitare eng'adunoto o enkordunoto o eseriani naing'ua Engai Papa o Olaitoriani Yesus Kristos, Olaitopuani lang'.
Te ina aatung'aiye iye te Kreta, pintabaia nena baak naatong'oro, nipik laigwenak too ngang'itie pookin, anaa enaaitanapa iye.
Ten etii olemeata entibili, olmoruo lʼeng'oroyoni nabo, olopeny nkera naairuk nemeimakini aajo era ninje naaiminye arashu nemening'isho.

Amu njoo meata olaing'orani (bishop) eleyata, anaa olaramatani lʼengaji Engai, nemeaku oltung'ani ogol ong'u, nemeaku ologoro asioki, neme olaokoni lʼolmarua, neme olaarani, me olong'oroki kion too ntorrok,
kake olorik lomon aji, Oloata emborran, Oloata eng'eno nabore, olora supat o sinyati o shaat,
oloibung'are ele rorei osipa tʼensioroto enkiteng'enare, oloyolo aiteng'enisho, peata engolon nadiding'ie tʼenkiteng'enare naishiuniisho neigwenaki looata engogong'i.
Amu etii laderrak o laitasurok kumok lemening'isho ooata rorei le pesho, kake naleng' kulo lʼemurata.
Meata kata nemenuki nkutukie enye, amu eibelekeny ngajijik naalulung'a, neiteng'en nemeitoriori tʼolbae lʼendupoto enye torrono.
Etejo obo too ninje, oloiboni lenye openy ajo: Era Ilkretes oshi lalejak, lowuarak torrok o ngoshuak turua.
Esipa ena jakenishu. Tiaraki natiu neijia, ngwenaki ninje tʼempijan, peidim aataa supati tʼenkirukoto,
nemesuj natinin oo Yudayoi o nkitanapat oo ltung'anak oolam esupato.
Sidan ntokitin pookin too loora sidan, kake metii entoki sidai too lduruki o lemeiruk, kake eidurukieki eng'eno o oltoilo lʼoltau lenye.
Ejo ninje eyolo Engai; kake too nkitobirat enye, nemiki ninye, neata ntorrok, nemening'isho, neru tiatua enkyas sidai pookin.
Kake ore iye, roro lomon anaa perisiore enkiteng'enare naishiuniisho.
Tiaki ilpaiyani, pememera, neata enganyit o eng'eno, neaku biot tʼenkirukoto, tʼenyorrata, tʼolng'iria;
neija si ntasati, peata orregie oaku too sinyat, nemeaku naakurrisho arashu naaok enaisho sapuk, neaku ngaiteng'enak sidan,
aaiteng'enu nkituak kutiti, penyor ilmoruak lenye o nkera enye,
neitore aten, neaku shaati, neramat ngajijik enye, neata emborran, nening' ilmoruak lenye, pememori ororei lʼEngai.
Neijia tididing'a leak ooti, peitore aten.
Kake tiatua ntokitin pookin, tang'asa ntadua kion anaa enkitanyanyukiet oo nkitobirat sidan, tʼenkiteng'enare nemeshula nkulie baak, tʼesinyatishu,
tʼororei oishiuniisho lemeata eleyata, pekurru olmang'atinda torrono nemetum enaimaki yook tʼentorroni.
Njening' laisyayak laitoriak lenye neiting'id ninje too pookin, nemeing'unyung'uny,
nemepurrisho, kake peitadolu esupato pookin sidai, peiye ekaj enkiteng'enare Engai, Olaitoriani lang', too mbaak pookin.
Amu etaliokine eng'adunoto Engai naitopokisho iltung'anak pookin,
eiteng'enita yook, pikiany empaashata Engai o ilng'warran lʼolmaa, pikinjiu tiatua ele maa tʼeng'eno o tʼesupato o tʼenkuretishu Engai,
nikimaririu eanyunoto tesh o enkitadolunoto enkitook Engai kitok o Olaitopuani lang' Yesus Kristos,
oishorua kion tʼolbae lang', pelaku yook tʼempaashata pookin oo nkitanapat neisujaki kion olorere lemeata entemakino nenyok nkyasin sidan.
Roro kuna baak nididing' ningwenaki tʼempijan sidai. Niminjo oltung'ani obo kiany.
Ntadamu ninje, pening' laitoriak o looata engolon neiruk, neidipakino tʼenkyas pookin sidai,
nememor iltung'anak, nemeata olarrabal, neaku aripi, neitaduaia emborran pookin too ltung'anak pookin.

Amu ore si yook opa nimikiata eng'eno, neitu kining', nikimanimanaa, nikisyayaki ilng'warraitin o ng'idaitin torrok oo muain kumok, nikipuoiye entorroni o olkikainit, neibai yook nikimbaro tiatua aten.
Kake etalie emborran o enyorrata Olaitopuani lang', Engai, too ltung'anak,
me tʼolbae loo nkitobirat esupato nikintobira yook, kake eitopua ninye yook tʼenkordunoto enye, tʼenkisujata eiunoto e are o tʼenkitaaroto ng'ejuk tʼOlmumua Sinyati,
lotubukoko yook tʼemborei te Yesus Kristos, Olaitopuani lang',
pekiaku supati tʼempuris e ilo o lajung'ok lʼempuan nemeiting' tʼeanyunoto.
Esipa ele rorei, nayeu ninteng'en akurraki, peiye edoli kulo ooiruk Engai, aajo etii eitobirita nkitobirat sidan. Naa sidai ina neretoki iltung'anak.
Tanya nkikiliwanat emodaishu o noo lmakui, o enjangar o enara tʼolbae loo nkitanapat; amu medupa ninje naa pesho.
Ore oltung'ani orishari, talama, teni eidipaki aitaduai aigil nabo arashu are,
niyolo, ajo eibelekenye oltung'ani oba nji neitarruo, neigwenaki kion.
Teni aairriwaki iye Artemas arashu Tukikos, tasioku wou Nikopolis enatii, amu ayeu nabik te ine enkata enkirobi.
Rriwai Senos, ele ayoloni loo nkitanapat, o Apolos, peitobir olototo lenye naleng', pemeng'oriki toki.
Njeiteng'enuo si iltung'anak lang', peitobirita nkitobirat sidan, aaitaa ngolati naayeuni, pemeaku loolau ilmomo.
Kiroroki pookin ootii e nebo o nanu. Roroki pookin oonyor yook tʼenkirukoto. Njebik eng'adunoto too ndai pookin. Amen.
Paulos, oloena le Yesus Kristos, o Timoteos, olalashe: te Filemon olikinyor o olaitobirani lʼenkyas te nebo o yook,
o te Apia, enganashe, o te Arkipos, olong'ar enjore te nebo o yook, o tʼesirit natii atua engaji ino.
Njeboitare ndai eng'adunoto o eseriani naing'ua Engai, Papa lang', o Olaitoriani Yesus Kristos.
Aliki Engai ai ashe enkata pookin, teni aadamu iye tʼeomonoto ai,
teni aning' mbaak enyorrata ino o enkirukoto niata tiatua Olaitoriani Yesus Kristos o too sinyat pookin,
petum enkirukoto ino niking'ar, engolon tʼeyolounoto oo ntokitin pookin sidan nikiata tiatua Kristos Yesus.
Kake kiata eng'ida kitok o enkilejilejata tʼenyorrata ino; amu intaraposho iltauja loo sinyat, lalashe lai.
Onaa, ten ake aata enkiteunoto pookin tiatua Kristos, paaitanap iye mbaak naaku,
aadiding' iye tʼenyorrata ake, nanyanyukie Paulos olpaiyan, ore taata ara si oloena le Yesus Kristos.
Aadiding' iye tʼolbae lʼenkerai ai natoiwuo tiatua nkeenda, Onesimos,
neitu kitumoki opa, kake ore taata aaretoki nanu o iye.
Amu airriwaa ninye meeu enitii iye, tang'amu ninye anaa ijo oltau lai openy.
Amu atayeuo nebik ninye te nebo o nanu, paaisyayaki tʼewueji ino tiatua nkeenda oo lomon lʼeng'ida;
kake eitu ayeu neitobir ninye toki, metii enyorrata ino, pemetiu anaa eikonyuni sidan inono, kake pinyor iye openy.
Ebaiki te ina kitoorunyeki tʼenkiti kata, piata ninye nkatan pookin,
nemekure enyanyukie osinga, kake elusoo tʼosinga, anaa olalashe kirotet, naa olalai o naleng' olino, too pokira are, tʼosesen o tiatua Olaitoriani.
Onaa, teni kinkenaki nanu olora liking'ar, tang'amu ninye anaa nanu kion.
Kake teni kintarruoiye toki arashu eata entoki esile, tipika atua esiana ai.
Nanu, Paulos, otisiraka tʼengaina ai openy, ajo alak nanu; pamaajoki iye, ajo iye openy laa esile ai.
Ee, lalashe lai, njooki mainoto eng'ida tʼolbae lino tiatua Olaitoriani; eng'ieng'ie oltau lai tiatua Kristos!
Aatisiraka iye, amu airuk ajo kining' iye nanu, nayolo, ajo intobir iye nalang' enajo.
Kake te nebo o nona, ntobirakaki ewueji nabikie; amu airuk ajo tʼolbae loo omonot inyi, naaishori nanu ndai.
Kiroroki Epafras, oloena te nebo o nanu tiatua Yesus Kristos,
o Markos o Aristarkos o Demas o Lukas, looisyaisho te nebo o nanu.
Njebik eng'adunoto Olaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos tʼolmumua linyi. Amen.
Ore peidip airorie Engai opa loopapa too layolounok aigil kumok o too muain kumok,
neirorie ninye yook tʼenkiting'oto oo kuna olong'i tʼOinoti, lotipika, peaku olajung'oni loo pookin, eitobirieki baiki ninye enkop;
olora enkibor enkitook o erisioroto entiunoto enye, loirishiu ntokitin pookin tʼororei lʼenkidimata enye, eidipa aitaa enkisujata oo nkitarruot ang' neton te tatene enkitook natii shumata,
etaa sidai naleng' nelang' ilmalaikan nejung'u engarna kitok nelang' enenye.
Amu kalo too lmalaikan etiaka ninye aikata: Ira iye Oinoti lai, nanu laatoiwuo iye taata? Neitoki: Alaaku nanu Menye lenye te ninye, nelaaku ninye Oinoti te nanu?
Neitoki ajo te ina kata nariku olkikau lenye atua olmaa: Nepuo aaserem ninye ilmalaikan lʼEngai pookin.
Ore tʼolbae loo lmalaikan ejo: Eitaa ilmalaikan lenyena metotiu anaa ilkutat o laisyayak lenyena metotiu anaa ilng'ejepa lʼenkima;
kake tʼolbae lʼOinoti ejo nji: Olorika lino, iye Engai, obik nkatan pookin; ore eng'udi enkarsishu ino naa eng'udi enkitoriokinoto.
Itonyorra iye esupato nimbai mesupato. Onaa Engai, kielie iye Engai ino eilata eng'ida, nikintalang' iljorueta linono.
O: Iye, Olaitoriani, otuuno tʼenkiterunoto enkop; ore shumata, naa nkitobirat oo ngaik inono.
Neaku erruoio ninje, nibik iye oshi; nepuo aamusanu anaa enkila,
nintaal ninje anaa olkila, nepuo aawala; kake itiu iye anaa oshi ake, nemepuo aaiting' larin linono.
Kake kalo too lmalaikan etiaka aikata: Totona iye te tatene ai, metabana napik ilmang'ati linono abori oo nkejek inono?
Mera ninje pookin ilmumuan aisyayak looirriwaiyoki tʼolbae lʼenkisyayare oo kulo loopuo aajung'u enkitopuata?
Akae, meata kata nimikinyok kimbung' ororei likitoning'o, pemikimin ai wueji.
Amu ten aa ele rorei oiroro ilmalaikan, meibelekenya, ore elang'ata o eanyata pookin netum elaakinoto enye,
kaji kinko teni kilany yook, teni mikinyor enkitopuata naba nji, natang'asa Olaitoriani alimu, neakitia yook kulo ootoning'o,
neaku si Engai oljakeni lenye te nebo o ninje, too lponot o nkiputukunyot kumok o nkidimat oo muain kumok, neoriki Olmumua Sinyati tʼerisioroto eyeunoto enye.
Amu eitu epik ilmalaikan meitoria olmaa olotu, likiimaki yook.
Kake eijakenu obo aibalunye ajo: Ainyo oltung'ani metaa idamu ninye, o enkerai oltung'ani metaa ishilaa ninye?
Nintaa iye ninye oti too lmalaikan enkiti kata, ninjopoko ninye enkaja enkitadararoto o nʼenkitook, ninjoo ninye eitore nkitobirat oo ngaik inono,
nipik ntokitin pookin abori oo nkejek enyena. Tiaraki natipika pookin abori enye, neitu epal o nyoo neitu epiki abori enye. Kake ore taata, eton eitu kidol ntokitin pookin etipikaki abori enye.

Kake kidol ele, oitaaki oti too lmalaikan enkiti kata, Yesus, tʼolbae lʼenkitamioto enkea, eishopokoki enkaja enkitadararoto o nʼenkitook, peiye, tʼeng'adunoto Engai, einyorrinyor enkea tʼolbae loo pookin.
Amu enare ilo, lotii ntokitin pookin tʼolbae lenye, oitobira ntokitin pookin, netorikoko nkera kumok enkitook, peitabaia olkitok lʼenkitopuata enye too nkitamiot.
Amu ore ele osinyaa o kulo oosinyari, neing'ua pookin atua obo; onaa mekurru ninye, teni eipot ninje lalashera,
nejo: Ainosaki engarna ino lalashera lainei, o tiatua esirit aranyaki engarna ino.
Neitoki: Ayeu nang'idare ninye. Neitoki: Ng'orai, nanu o nkera naaishoo Engai nanu.
Ore petaa nkera etang'ara enkiring'o o osarge, neng'arie si ninye nena, peiminye tʼenkea enkidimata e ilo loata engolon enkea, naa ninye satan,
petum atalaku kulo loora tʼolbae lʼenkuretishu enkea singan ngolong'i enye pookin.
Amu meramat ninye ilmalaikan, kake eishoi e Abraham eramat.

Akae, meata kata nemenyanyukie ninye lalashera lenyena too ntokitin pookin, peaku ninye olobore enkordunoto o olaidasani kitok, oitabaia ntokitin pookin tʼEngai, netum olorere enkitaunoto oo nkitarruot.
Amu ina einotie ninye emion o enkitasuroto, peidim ataretoki kulo ooitasuri.
Onaa, lalashera lainei sinyat, oong'ar enkipototo e shumata, entayolou olairriwani o olaidasani kitok likirabalu, naa ninye Kristos Yesus,
oata enkirukoto te ilo oitaa ninye, anaa si Mose tiatua engaji enye pookin.
Kake meata kata nemetum ele enkitook nelang' Mose, neijia anaa pelang' enkitook olaitobirani lʼengaji enkitook engaji.
Amu ore engaji pookin, iltung'anak ooitobira; kake Engai, naitobira ntokitin pookin.
Esipa, eata Mose embaiaroto tʼengaji enye pookin anaa osinga, neaku enjakenishu oo kuna baak naaishooki pelimu.
Kake ore Kristos etaa anaa enkerai neitore engaji enye; ore engaji enye, nikira yook, teni kimbung' aakurraki eng'idaroto o enkitook eanyunoto metabaiki enkiting'oto,
Akae, anaa pejo Olmumua sinyati: Taata, teni ining'ining'i oltoilo lenye,
emintagol iltauja linyi, anaa petaa tʼenkitagoroto tʼengolong' enkitasuroto ti ang'ata,
paaitasurokitio loo minyi linyi, naatem, nedol nkitobirat ainei larin artam.
Neijia patagorokine ina kishon najo: Epong'ori oshi too ltauja. Kake eitu eyolou ngoitoi ainei,
paituruj tʼengoro ai ajo: mepuo aajing' eng'ieng'ata ai.
Eng'orai, lalashera lainei, pemeaku obo too ndai, oata oltau torrono lemeiruk nelam Engai naishiu;
kake entididing'aroto aten ngolong'i pookin eton eipoti: taata, pemeaku obo too ndai oitagol oltau lenye tʼelejata enkitarruoto.
Amu etaa king'ar Kristos, teni kimbung' aakurraki entiunoto nikintera, metabaiki enkiting'oto.
Ore teni eji: Taata, teni ining'ining'i ndai oltoilo lai, emintagol iltauja linyi anaa petaa tʼenkitagoroto:
Kakua naa lelo ootoning'o neitaa enkitagoroto? Me ninje pookin, ootupukutuo aaing'ua Misri te Mose?
Naa kakua lelo ootagorokine ninye larin artam? Me ninje ooitarruoitie, netuata seseni lenye ti ang'ata?
Arashu kakua eiturujaka ninye ajo: mejing' atua eng'ieng'ata enye, neme kulo lemeiruk?
Nikidol yook aajo eitu eidim ninje aatijing', amu eitu eiruk.
Onaa, matureisho yook, pemikilau kijing' atua eng'ieng'ata enye naisiliga ninye, pemetii obo too yook otioyo.
Amu einosakaki si yook lomon ooitopokisho anaa lekua; kake ore ilo rorei lʼenkinosunoto eitu eretoki ninje, tiaraki neitu eiruk lootoning'o,
(amu yook ootaa eiruk, kijing' atua eng'ieng'ata) anaa petejo: Kake aituruja tʼengoro ai, mepuo aajing' eng'ieng'ata ai. Ore peidipaki aaitobira nkitobirat opa tʼenkiterunoto enkop,
nejo engai wueji tʼengolong' e napishana nji: Neeng'ieng'a Engai tʼengolong' e napishana too nkitobirat enyena pookin.
Neitoki ene wueji: Mepuo aajing' eng'ieng'ata ai.
Te ina eng'or ajo etii loojing' ine, o lelo ootang'asaki aainosaki, eitu etum aatijing, amu eitu eiruk;
neitoki apik ninye engolong', eidipa atulusoi enkata naado naba nji, nejo te David: Taata, anaa petejoki opa, taata, teni ining'ining'i oltoilo lenye, emintagol iltauja linyi.
Amu ten emut eeng'ieng'ie Yosua ninje, anaata eitu eitoki ninye aimaki ai olong'.
Onaa, eng'or eng'ieng'ata tʼolorere lʼEngai.
Amu olotijing'a atua eng'ieng'ata enye, neeng'ieng'a ninye too nkyasin enyena, anaa Engai too nkun enyena.
Akae, matonyok, pekijing' atua ena eng'ieng'ata, pemedoiki o obo atua ilo rregie lʼeanyata.
Amu eishiu ororei lʼEngai neitobirisho nedung'isho nelang' olalem pookin opi mbat pokira are nerish empuan o Olmumua o rubat o ntolo neigwenaki ndamunot o nkibirribirrat oltau.
Nemetii enkitobirata o nabo nemelioi tʼengomom enye, kake etii eor netaboluoki pookin too ngonyek enyena. Kilimu te ina.
Akae, ore pekiata olaidasani kitok, Yesus Kristos, Oinoti lʼEngai, oilepa shumata, maibung'a enkibalunoto.
Amu mikiata olaidasani kitok lemeidim atoning'oki yook emion too menatishuitin ang', kake eitasuroki ninye too pookin anaa yook, metii ake enkitarruoto.
Akae, matinyikaki tʼenjipai olorika lʼeng'adunoto enye, peking'amu enkordunoto nikitum eng'adunoto naau eretokinoto tʼenkata nanare.
Amu ore olaidasani kitok pookin oitayoki tiatua iltung'anak, nepiki tʼolbae loo ltung'anak tiatua nena naaishiaakinore Engai, peaki nkishoorot o nkidasareitin tʼolbae loo nkitarruot;
oloidim aing'urrie kulo lemeyolo o loomanimanaa, tiaraki naman enjalan si ninye.
Onaa, meata kata nemeidasisho si tʼolbae loo nkitarruot enyena openy, anaa tʼolbae loo nkitarruot olorere.
Nemetii oltung'ani ong'amu kion enkitook, kake Engai naipotoki ninye, anaa Aron.
Neijia si Kristos, eitu epik kion atua enkitook, peaku olaidasani kitok, kake ilo otiaka ninye; Ira iye Oinoti lai; taata aatoiwuo iye.
Anaa pejo si engai wueji: Ira iye olaidasani nkatan pookin tʼorregie le Melkisedek.
Ore too ngolong'i enkiring'o enye, eaka omonot o sayat te nebo o enkishirata sapuk o ilkiyo ilo oidim aitopua ninye tʼenkea; netoning'uoki ninye, tiaraki naitaa Engai kitok.
Ten aa Oinoti lʼEngai ninye, neiteng'enuo tiatua sinaitin, pebik tiatua ening'oto.
Ore peidipi aitabai, neaku ninye olaretoni loo pookin ooiruk ninye, petum ninje enkitopuata nemeiting',
neipot Engai ninye olaidasani kitok tʼorregie le Melkisedek.
Te ina eng'or mbaak kumok, pekirorie ndai, kake egol, tiaraki nirara ndai yetuti tʼening'oto.
Kake eikash, ten emut indipa aataa laiteng'enak, ore taata nintokiki aayeu neiteng'eni ndai sirat lʼenkiterunoto tiatua rorei lʼEngai; nirara ndai oonare kule, lemeidim endaa nagol.
Amu ore oltung'ani leton eok kule, netiu anaa olemeyolo naleng' ororei lʼesipata; amu era enkerai kiti.
Kake endaa nagol en oo ltung'anak kituak, ooitamoo eng eno enye too nkyasin engolon, petum aaitooro sidan o ntorrok.

Akae, matapal taata kiimaki en opa kiteng'enare enkiterunoto e Kristos, nikinyok, pekibaiki embaiaroto, nimikintoki aaitobir entonata enkitaalata aing'ua nkitobirat enkea, o en enkirukoto e atua Engai,
o en enkibatisa, o en enkiteng'enare, o en enkiteleikinoto oo ngaik, o en empiunoto oo lootuata, o en enkigwena oo nkatan pookin.
Kiyeu nikintobir si nena, teni eisho Engai pekias.
Amu ore kulo ooidipaki aailang'aki neinyorrinyor enkishooroto e shumata neng'ar Olmumua Sinyati
neinyorrinyor ororei obor lʼEngai o engolon olmaa olotu,
teni elam, nemeidimai peitokini aaitaa ng'ejuko neala; amu ore lelo neitoki aaoshoki Oinoti lʼEngai esalaba tiatua aten, nepik ninye enkurruna metalioi.
Amu ore enkop natooko enjan nashaiki aigil kumok shumata enye, neiu ilmomo sidan ooret kulo ootuturo ninye, neng'amu emayani naing'ua Engai.
Kake teni eiu ilkeko o ntulele entim, nemedupa, nenyikita endiata, ore enkiting'oto enye, epejori.
Kake, lanyor lainei, kianyu enaikash too ndai, petaana enkitopuata, baiki ten ake kiro neijia.
Amu supat Engai, merikino enkitobirata inyi o enkyas enyorrata nintaduaitie lʼengarna enye, amu isyayakitia sinyat, nepon ake isyayakiki.
Nikiyeu neitaduaia oltung'ani pookin too ndai ina nyuata, pimbung'ubung'u eanyunoto metabaiki enkiting'oto,
pemiakuku ilturua, kake lasujak loo kulo oojung'u tʼenkirukoto o olng'iria nkisiligat.
Amu ore peisho Engai Abraham enkisiligata, pemeidim aituruja tʼolikai kitok alang' ninye, neituruj te ninye kion,
nejo: Esipa, ayeu naamayan iye naapon iye.
Neijia eting'iria netum enkisiligata.
Eiturujisho iltung'anak tʼolkitok olang' ninje, neidip enkiturujata enjangar pookin o metipika engolon.
Neijia eikuna Engai, peyeu neitadolu lajung'ok enkisiligata akurraki, ajo neing'unung'un eyeunoto enye, neponiki enkiturujata;
nikitum yook too ntokitin are nemeing'unung'un, (amu meidimai nelejisho Engai), enkilejilejata nagol, teni kikwetiki nikimbung' eanyunoto nairragieki tʼengomom ang',
nikiata anaa enkibung'et supat nagol oltau lang' najing' si atua ine wueji naigaraa ilo karash,
enetijing'a olaiturukoni tʼolbae lang', lora Yesus, otaa olaidasani kitok nkatan pookin tʼorregie le Melkisedek.
Amu ore ele Melkisedek, naa olkarsis le Salem, olaidasani lʼEngai natii shumata naleng', otanang'are Abraham, peshukunye aing'ua enjore naarare lelo karsisi,
nemayan ninye, netoorikia Abraham ninye ematua e tomon oo ntokitin pookin. Ore tʼenkiterata neitaali ninye neji: olkarsis lʼesupato; tekurum nera si olkarsis le Salem, eji: olkarsis lʼeseriani,
lemeata menye, nemeata ng'otonye, nemeata enkishomi, nemeata enkiterata oo ngolong'i enyena arashu enkiting'oto enkishui enye. Kake eitanyanyukieki Oinoti lʼEngai nebik olaidasani nkatan pookin.
Eng'orai, keba aa enkitook naata ilo loishoo si Abraham lora olakui lang' kitok, ematua e tomon oo nena tokitin naataarua.

Ore lelo ooing'ua atua nkera e Levi, netum enkisyayare enkidasare, eata engolon nang'amunye ematua e tomon oo lalashera lenye tʼerisioroto oo nkitanapat, ten aa etupukutuo si ninje tʼolopoli le Abraham.
Kake ore ilo lemeipoti ishoreitin o lakuyani lenyena ootupukuo ninye, nea ematua e tomon e Abraham, nemayan ele oishooki nkisiligat.
Kake meatai enjangar, ajo emayani oloti tʼolkitok.
Naa ene, iltung'anak lʼenkea, ootang'amutua ematua e tomon, kake ine obo oata enjakenishu ajo eishiu, otang'amua.
Onaa, pajo nji: Eishooio si Levi ong'amu ematua e tomon, ematua e tomon tʼolbae le Abraham.
Amu eton etii opa olopoli le Abraham lora menye, penang'are Melkisedek ninye.

Kake ten etaa enkitabaiaroto tʼenkisyayare enkidasare e Levi (amu te ina einotie olorere nkitanapat), kainyo naa peyeuni olekai aidasani kitok oinyototo tʼorregie le Melkisedek, nemeikeni ninye tʼorregie le Aron?
Amu teni eitaali enkisyayare enkidasare, meata kata nemeitaali si nkitanapat.
Amu ore ilo oimakinyeki kuna baak, naa ol lekai orere, leitu aikata epukunye ninye oltung'ani oitobira enkyas olperere lʼenkidasare.
Amu eibala ajo, atua Yuda etupukuo Olaitoriani lang', naa entipat neitu eimakinye Mose ororei o obo tʼenkisyayare enkidasare.
Neibalunye naleng', ten eaku einyototo olekai aidasani tʼorregie le Melkisedek,
ajo eitaaki olaidasani me tiatua nkitanapat naata engolon enkiring'o, kake tiatua enkidimata empuan nemeiting'.
Amu eijakenu ajo: Ira iye olaidasani loo nkatan pookin tʼorregie le Melkisedek.
Neijia ejuti nkitanapat naaiturukie, tiaraki nashal nemedupa,
(amu eitu eidim nkitanapat aaitabai toki), neauni eanyunoto naikash naleng', naa ninye kinyikakinye Engai.
Neaku emponaroto ajo etipikaki ninye melai enkiturujata. Amu eitaaki lelo laidasak metii enkiturujata,
kake ore ninye tʼenkiturujata e ilo otiaka: Eituruja Olaitoriani nemeinyaku ninye ena: Ira iye olaidasani loo nkatan pookin tʼorregie le Melkisedek.
Neijia etaa Yesus olaramatani lʼosotua sidai naleng'.
Ore lelo naa ilkumok ootaa laidasak, tiaraki natomitikio enkea ninje ebik.
Kake ore ninye obik nkatan pookin, eata enkisyayare enkidasare nemeiting'.
Onaa, eidim aitopua oshi ake kulo oopuonu enetii Engai, ten eimaa ninye, amu eishiu oshi neomonoki ninje.
Amu eikash too yook, teni kiata olaidasani kitok oba nji, ajo era sinyati nemeata entorroni, nemeata entibili, otirishunye too laitarruok, netii ninye shumata naleng',

lemenare ninye anaa lelo aidasak, peng'as aidasisho ngolong'i pookin tʼolbae loo nkitarruot enyena oopeny, neitoki aidasisho tʼolbae loo nkitarruot olorere; amu eikuna nji enkata nano, eidasaiye kion.
Amu ore nena kitanapat neitaa iltung'anak ooshal, peaku laidasak kituak. Kake ore ele rorei lʼenkiturujata otusuja nkitanapat, etipika Oinoti baiaroti obik nkatan pookin.
Ore eumata oo kuna nikiimaki, naa ena: Kiata olaidasani laijo ele oton te tatene olorika lʼenkitook e shumata,
naa olaisyayani lʼewueji sinyati o lʼengaji nasipa naitobira Engai neme oltung'ani.
Amu ore olaidasani kitok pookin nepiki, peidas too nkishoorot o nkidasareitin. Onaa, meata kata nemeata si ele entoki naidas.
Ten emut etii ninye ena kop, anaata mera ninye olaidasani, amu ene etii laidasak ooyaki nkishoorot tʼerisioroto oo nkitanapat.
Eisyayaki lelo enkitanyanyukiet o oloip loo nena tokitin naatii shumata, neijia anaa peirorie ealet Engai Mose: Ngorai, etejo, pintobir pookin aitanyanyukie ina mua nikintaduaki tʼoldonyo.
Kake einoto ninye enkisyayare naikash naleng', tiaraki naa ninye olaramatani lʼosotua olusoo tʼesidano, otuunokino nkisiligat sidan naleng'.
Amu ten emut eitu eata ol enkiterata eleyata, anaata eitu eing'oruni ole are.
Amu eikok ninye ninje ejo: Ng'orai, epuonu ngolong'i, ejo Olaitoriani, nayeu naitaa o engaji Israel o engaji Yuda osotua ng'ejuk;
me anaa ilo sotua naitaa o loopapa lenye te ina olong' naibung' engaina enye, parik aitung'ua enkop e Misri. Amu eitu ninje ebik tiatua osotua lai; onaa, eitu ayeu nashilaa ninje, ejo Olaitoriani.
Amu ele osotua laitaa o engaji Israel, eishunye kuna olong'i: Ayeu naisho nkitanapat ainei atua endamunoto enye, nasir atua oltau lenye, nayeu naaku Engai enye, neaku ninje olorere lai.
Nemeiteng'en obo ol elatia enye, arashu olalashe lenye: Tayolou Olaitoriani! amu aapuo nanu aayolou pookin, eiter oloti metabaiki olbotor.
Amu alaing'urrie mesupato enye, nemaitoki adamu nkitarruot enye.
Ore petejo: ng'ejuk, neitaa musana ol enkiterata; amu enataa musana o moruo, netinyikaka emutata.
Eata si ele sotua lʼenkiterata rregieita lʼenkisyayare o ewueji sinyati enkop.
Amu eteshetaki olgilata oiteru, ore tiatua netipikieki enkilang'et o emesa o olperere loo lmkateni. Neji ine wueji esinyati.
Ore tekurum olekai karash lʼerishata netii olgilata oji: esinyati naleng',

enetii emoti nairishoreki e sahabu o osanduku lʼosotua otapetieki esahabu katukul; ore atua etii oloti le sahabu oigany mana, ele mkate le shumata, o eng'udi e Aron natubulakitia mbenek, o soito lʼosotua.
Ore shumata e ilo sanduku netii ilkerubin lʼenkitook, ooitoipito olorika lʼenkordunoto, naa ntokitin nemeimakinyeki taata.
Kake ore peidipaki aaitobira kunda tokitin, neng'as laidasak aajing' atua ilo gilata lʼenkiterata ngolong'i pookin, peitobir enkisyayare Engai.
Kake ore tiatua ele gilata le are, nejing' olaidasani kitok openy, tʼolari obo nabo kata ake, nemejing' ninye meata osarge oitainye nkitarruot enyena o nʼolorere.
Neijia eitayolo Olmumua Sinyati ajo, ore ena oitoi narik atua ewueji sinyati, eton eitu eibalunyeki ina kata naitasheye olgilata lʼenkiterata.
Naa ina enkitanyanyukiet naitadol ena kata e taata, tʼeneidasieki nkishoorot o nkidasareitin nemeidim aaitaa supat tiatua ndamunot enyena ele oisyayakinye ninje Engai.
Amu mebaiki endaa o eokoto o nkisujat naaorioro o esinyatishu e oriong' naaitanapaki metabaiki enkata naitobiri eng'ejuk.
Kake eewuo Kristos, peaku olaidasani kitok loo sidan naapuonu, neim engaji olototo nara kitok nabaia nelang', neitu eitobiri too ngaik, eji ena mera nʼena kitobirata,
nejing' nabo kata atua olgilata sinyati, me tʼosarge loo lkineji o loo lasho, kake tʼosarge lenye openy, eidipa ainoto elakunoto oo nkatan pookin.
Amu teni esinyaa osarge loo lkineji o loo lmong'i o nkuruon entauo naaisuakaki ilduruk, peaku enkisujare enkiring'o,
me naleng' eisuj osarge le Kristos, loitarasaka kion Engai, meata eleyata, tʼOlmumua loo nkatan pookin, iltauja lang', peking'ua nkitobirat nemeishiu, pekisyayaki Engai naishiu.

Onaa era ninye tʼolbae le ina olaidikidikoni lʼosotua ng'ejuk, peiye eng'amu tʼenkea nataa elakunoto oo ntorrok kulo, lootii abori osotua lʼelukunya, looipotokoki enkisiligata enjung'o oo nkatan pookin.
Amu tʼenetii enkitanapata enjung'o, meata kata nemeng'as enkea e ilo oitanapishie.
Amu eata enkitanapata enjung'o enkidimunoto tʼenkea. Meidimu enkata neton eishiu oloitanapishie.
Onaa, ele sotua lʼelukunya eitu eitobiri metii osarge.

Amu ore opa, peidip Mose aimaki nkitanapat pookin aliki olorere olulung'a, neibung' osarge loo lasho o loo lkineji aitushulaki engare o ilpapit oonyokio loo nkerra o oljani oji isop, neisuaki shumata enkitabu o olorere pookin,
ejo: Ele osarge lʼosotua, oitanapa ndai Engai.
Neijia si eikuna engaji olototo o ntokitin pookin enkisyayare aisuaki osarge,
naa ore tʼorregie loo nkitanapat, etaana ntokitin pookin eisuji tʼosarge; naa ten eitu eibukori osarge, nemetii enkitaunoto oo nkitarruot.
Akae, meata kata nemeisuji nkitanyanyukieta oo ntokitin e shumata too nkidasareitin anaa nena. Kake ore ninje oopeny, kuna tokitin e shumata, meata kata nemetum nkidasareitin naalusoo too nekua.
Amu eitu ejing' Kristos ewueji sinyati naitobiraki too ngaik, (nara oloip le ine nesipa), kake etijing'a te shumata, nedoli taata tʼengomom Engai tʼolbae lang',
neme peidas kion aigil kumok, anaa pejing olaidasani kitok atua ewueji sinyati olari pookin tʼosarge omoni.
Amu ten aa neijia, anaata enarikino ninye, neitamei aigil kumok eiter enkiterunoto olmaa; kake ore taata, tʼenkitabaiaroto oo nkatan, etalie nabo kata, petum aitau nkitarruot tʼenkidasare enye kion.
Anaa petipikakaki iltung'anak, pee nabo kata, nelotu tekurum enkigwena,
neijia eidasaki Kristos nabo kata, aitau nkitarruot oo lkumok. Ore ninye lemeata nkitarruot nelalioi enkata e are too kulo ooanyu ninye, petum enkitopuata.
Amu ore nkitanapat, eata oloip loo ntokitin sidan naapuonu, me entiinoto oo ntokitin oopeny. Meata kata nemeidasi nkidasareitin naanyanyuk larin pookin, nemeidim aaitabai kulo ooidasisho.
Amu ten emutu mekure eata kulo ooisyayaki Engai, oltoilo torrono lʼoltau, tʼolbae loo nkitarruot, ten eidipaki aaisuja nabokata, anaata eiting'o enkyas enkidasare.
Kake ore tiatua kuna kidasareitin etii ake enkitadamunoto oo nkitarruot larin pookin.
Amu meidim osarge loo lmong'i o loo lkineji aitau nkitarruot.
Onaa etejo, pelotu atua olmaa: Eitu iyeu nkidasareitin o nkishoorot, kake kintobiraka osesen lai.
Ore lasari oopejori o nkidasareitin oo nkitarruot, nimikintiship.
Akae, atejo: Ng'orai alotu, (tiatua enkitabu etisiraki te nanu), paitobir, Engai, eniyeu iye.
Ore pejo shumata: Ore nkidasareitin o nkishoorot, lasari oopejori o nkishoorot tʼolbae loo nkitarruot, neitu iyeu, neitu kintiship (naa ninje ooishoori tʼorregie loo nkitanapat)
neitoki ajo: Ng'orai, alotu, Engai, paitobir eniyeu iye, — neiwang'ie ilo lʼelukunya, pepik oli are.
Te ina yeunoto etisinyaiyoki yook nabo kata tʼenkidasare osesen le Yesus Kristos.
Ore olaidasani pookin, eitashe peitobir enkisyayare ngolong'i pookin, neishooio in oshi kidasareitin nemeidim katukul aaitau nkitarruot.
Kake ore ninye, peidipa aidasa tʼenkidasare nabo tʼolbae loo nkitarruot, nadupa nkatan pookin, neton taata te tatene Engai,
eanyu metabana nepiki ilmang'ati lenyena abori oo nkejek enyena.
Amu tʼenkidasare nabo eitabaiye too nkatan pookin kulo ootisinyaiyoki.
Eijakenoki yook si Olmumua Sinyati. Amu ore peidip atang'asa ajo:
Nyele osotua, laitaa o ninje, eishunye kuna olong'i, nejo Olaitoriani: Ayeu naisho nkitanapat ainei atua iltauja lenye nasir atua ndamunot enye,
namaitoki adamu nkitarruot o ntorrok enye.
Kake ten eitauoki nona, nemekure etii nkidasareitin tʼolbae loo nkitarruot.
Akae, lalashera, ore pekiata enkiteunoto nikiimie enjing'ata ewueji sinyati tʼosarge le Yesus,
naitobiraka ninye yook, peaku engoitoi ng'ejuk naishiu tʼolkarash lʼerishata, neji, tʼenkiring'o enye,
nikiata olaidasani kitok loitore engaji Engai:
matinyikaki tʼoltau osipa tiatua emborei enkirukoto, looisuaki iltauja nimikiata oltoilo torrono loo ltauja neisujaki seseni tʼengare sidai;
maibung'a enkibalunoto eanyunoto, metii enking'unung'unata, amu era ninye supat loisiligishe;
maibirribirrakinoto tʼenyuata nʼenyorrata o noo nkitobirat sidan,
njoo mikipal oltumo lang' anaa peiko looje, kake mati diding'aroto niponipono ina naleng', amu idolidolo, aajo etinyikua engolong'.
Amu teni kintarruo aaotiki, kindipa aatang'amu eyolounoto esipata, nimikintoki aata engai kidasare tʼolbae loo nkitarruot,
kake te idye eanyu enkigwena naitureisho o empijan enkima napej laanyak.
Ore oloany nkitanapat e Mose, meata kata nemee metii olng'ur, too ljaken aare arashu okuni.
Naa inyorrikiki, keba aa enkigwena e ilo oany Oinoti lʼEngai, neiken ele sarge lʼosotua oisujieki, aa torrono, nemor Olmumua lʼeng'adunoto?
Amu kiyolo ilo ojo: Enai elaata oo ntorrok, nanu olaaki; neitoki: Elaigwenaki Olaitoriani olorere lenye.
Olbae torrono oitureisho, teni ibatata tiatua ngaik Engai naishiu.
Kake entadamutu ngolong'i enkiterata niting'iriakitia, eilang'akaki ndai, earata kitok oo nkisilot,
ematua nabo, tʼolbae lʼemenata o loo nkisilot itaa emoroto, o engai matua, ping'arierie kulo looikunakaki nji.
Amu itoning'o nkisilot oo looteenaki, ning'iriakiki enkisimaroto oo masaa inyi tʼeng'ida, iyololo, aajo iatata te shumata masaa sidan naalang' naabik.
Akae, eminturraa eng'idaroto inyi, naata ninye olkwaje kitok.
Amu eaku, piatata olng'iria, peiye intobiribiri eyeunoto Engai, nitumutumu enkisiligata.
Amu epon eng'or enkiti, pelotu ololotu, nemeimutie ninye baiki;
Nelaishiu osupat lai tʼenkirukoto, kake olorrinyo tekurum, nemeshipakino oltau lai.
Kake mikira yook loorrinyo tekurum neimin, kake looata enkirukoto naitopok iltauja.
Era enkirukoto entonai oo nikianyu o esiparoto oo kuna tokitin nimikidol.
Te ina einoto iltung'anak le opa enjakenishu.
Tʼenkirukoto kiyolo, aajo ore enkop eitobiraki tʼororei lʼEngai, neitu eaku kuna nikidol tʼentoki nalio.
Tʼenkirukoto eaka Abel Engai enkidasare kitok nelang' Kain; naa te ina einoto enjakenishu, ajo era supat, tiaraki naijakenuo Engai tʼenkishooroto enye; naa te ina neton eiro o taata, etua.
Tʼenkirukoto eitainyeki Henok, pemetum enkea, neitu edoli, amu Engai naitaia ninye; amu ore eton eitu eitaini, neata enjakenishu ajo enyorruni tʼEngai.
Amu teni metii enkirukoto, meidimai penyorruni too ngonyek Olaitoriani. Amu ore oloyeu nelo enetii Engai, meata kata nemeiruk, ajo etii ninye neisho kulo ooing'oru ninye, olkwaje.

Tʼenkirukoto eitaa Noa Engai kitok, petum ororei lʼEngai too mbaak neitu edoli, neitobir engalawa naaku enkitopuata engaji enye; te ina eigwenaka olmaa neaku olajung'oni lʼesupato naing'ua enkirukoto.
Tʼenkirukoto etoning'o Abraham peipoti metupuku alo ilo osho otiakaki ajo elajung'u; nepuku alo meyolo enebaia.
Tʼenkirukoto etaa ninye olomoni te idya kop naisiligaki anaa me enenye, nemanya atua ilng'oborri te nebo o Isaak o Yakoob, ootaa te nebo o ninye lajung'ok le ina kisiligata,
amu etaanyutua ina ang' naata enkitamanyunoto, amu ore olashetunoni o olaitobirani, naa Engai.
Tʼenkirukoto etang amua Sara enkidimata nemenai tʼeishoi ina kata etaa moruo netulusoiye larin lenyena, amu eikena aa supat ilo oisiliga.
Akae, etoiwuoki tʼosesen obo, ten aa etiu anaa otua, ilkumok, loorisiore lakir le shumata tʼenkumoi, netiu anaa osunyai lʼembata olbalbal lemeikenai.
Netuata kulo pookin tʼenkirukoto neitu opa ninje etum nkisiligat, kake etadua tʼenelakwa neilejilej aten too nona, nenyorru neibalu, aajo era ninje lomon o ilkaponu tʼenkop.
Amu lelo oojo neijia, eibalu aajo eing'oru olosho lora.
Naa ten ak einyaakitia aadamu ilo osho otung'uaitie, anaata einoto erishata narrinyore.
Kake eyeu taata ninje olosho oikash, naa shumata ilo. Te ina bae mekurru Engai, teni eji Engai enye, amu eitobiraka ninje engang.
Tʼenkirukoto eidasa Abraham Isaak, peitasuri, neishooio Oinoti lenye obo, eidipa atang'amu nkisiligat,
naa ninye otiakaki: Te Isaak kimpoti eishoi ino,
neiken ajo eidim Engai aitopiu si too lootuata; onaa, einyaaka atum ninye anaa enkitanyanyukiet.
Tʼenkirukoto etamayana Isaak Yakoob o Esau too ntokitin naapuonu akenya.
Tʼenkirukoto etamayana Yakoob, pee, nkera pokira are e Yosef, nesai airishakino elukunya eng'udi enye.
Tʼenkirukoto, penyikaki Yosef enkea, nelimu ninye ororei lʼempukunoto oo nkera Israel, neisho enkitanapata tʼolbae loo loik lenyena.
Tʼenkirukoto, peini Mose, neisudoo lootoiutuo ninye, tiaraki natadua, aajo enkerai sidai, neitu eure ninje enkitanapata olkarsis.
Tʼenkirukoto, pebulu Mose, etanya eipoti ajo enkerai entito e Farao,
nenyor ategelu osina te nebo o olorere lʼEngai nelang eng'ida ele maa naing'ua enkitarruoto,
neiken ajo era emoroto e Kristos endupoto kitok nelang' masaa sidan e Misri; amu eing'oraiye ninye olkwaje.
Tʼenkirukoto etung'aiye ninye Misri nemeure engoro olkarsis, amu eibung'are ilo leitu edol anaa olodolita.
Tʼenkirukoto eibung'a pasaka o idya kisuakinoto osarge, pemeporoo ilo oiminie ilkikaunot, ilkulenye.
Tʼenkirukoto eima ninje tʼempolos Olbalbal Odo anaa tʼenkop natoiyo; netem Ilmisrin aajo kinko neijia, nemut ninje engare.
Tʼenkirukoto etuurori isunda e Yeriko, peidip aataman ngolong'i naapishana.
Tʼenkirukoto eitu eimin Rahab, idya naibor onyek, te nebo o kulo leitu eiruk, amu etang'amua lelo aikitalak tʼeseriani.
Naa kainyo apon ajo? Amu mebaiki enkata, ten alimu lomon le Gideon o le Barak o le Simson o le Yefta o le David, o le Samuel, o loo layolounok,
ootigilutua nkarsishuni tʼenkirukoto, neitobir esupato, netum nkisiligat, nenuk ilgoso loo lng'atunyo,
near engolon enkima, neilany empijan olalem, netum enkidimata tiatua enjalan, negolu ninje t'enjore, nemir njoreitin oo lmangati,
neitoki aatum ng'oroyok lootuata lenye eitopiwuoki aaitung'ua enkea. Ore kulekai etaaraki tʼemion, neany elakunoto, peiye etum ninje enkitopiunoto nara.
Ore kulekai eting'kiakitia emoroto o arat, te nebo o nkeenda o enkibooroto;
netaaraki too soito, netudung'oki tʼolmusumeno, netaremoki, netaraki tʼolalem; nemanimanaa eishopito ndapan oo ntare o ndapan oo nkineji, lemeata toki, netum osina o enkinyala,
(lemenarikino enkop), netaa ninje loomanimanaa ti ang'ata, o too ldonyo, o too ngapunia, o tiatua ngumot enkop.
Ore kulo pookin einoto enjakenishu tʼenkirukoto, neitu eng'amu enkisiligata,
amu etang'asa Engai aitaany yook entoki nadupa, pemeitabaiari ninje neme te nebo o yook.
Akae si yook, likiata erukenya naba nji oo ljaken looman yook, maitapero orridati pookin oiroshi o enkitarruoto naibung'are yook, makwetiki tʼolng'iria engilunoto natipikaki yook lukunya,
maimariria Yesus ora olaiturukoni o olaitabaiani lʼenkirukoto, oting'iriaka esalaba tʼewueji eng'ida natii engomom enye, neitu eshilaa enkurruna, neton te tatene olorika lʼenkitoria lʼEngai.
Entadamutu oloting'iriaka engogong'i naba nji oo laitarruok tiatua kion, peiye minaurara nimileporiri too ltauja linyi.
Eton eitu iariara meeu osarge igilunorere enkitarruoto,
nitorikinote enkilejilejata nairorie ndai anaa nkera: Nakerai ai, mimenu earata Olaitoriani, nimiliilaa, teni kiar ninye!
Amu olonyor Olaitoriani, ninye ear; near ninye enkerai pookin nang'amu ninye.
Teni ing'iriri earata, neiken Engai ndai anaa nkera; amu Kaa kerai mear menye?
Naa ten eitu itumutumu earata natang'ara pookin, nitaa ndai iyat, me iinot.
Ore pekiata yook loopapa lʼosesen lang', ootaara yook, nikianyit ninje, meaku pekipon aaning' ilo menye loo lmumuan, pekinjiu?
Amu too nkuti olong'i etaara ninje yook, anaa petadua aajo sidai, kake ore ninye tʼeretokinoto, pekitum aatang'amu esinyaroto enye.
Ore earata pookin tʼena kata natii, melio ajo era eng'ida, kake enkilishoto; elaisho ake tekurum ilmomo lʼeseriani o lʼesupato kulo looiteng'enaki te ninye.
Onaa, entorioi ngaik naatuurori o nkung' naatalepori,
entaa ngoitoi naaitoriori oo nkejek inyi, pemeiwang'iwang' o obo anaa olng'ojine, kake peikashu aishiu.
Enkwetiki eseriani too ltung'anak pookin o esinyaroto, amu medol o obo Olaitoriani metii ena.
Eng'orai, pemeng'oru o obo tʼe-ng'adunoto Engai, pemebulu entonata o nabo nadua naitirik ndai, neidurukieki ilkumok te ina.
Njoo mera o obo olaitobirani loo mbaak torrok oo nkiri arashu osuuji anaa Esau otimira tʼolbae lʼendaa nabo enkikaushu enye.
Amu entayolo, aajo ore petayeuo ninye tekurum nejung'u emayani, etemenaki, amu eitu etum ninye eng'adata enkitaalata, baiki eing'oraa naleng' too lkiyo.
Amu eitu ipuonunu enetii oldonyo oirrapirrapuni, oiwuwu tʼenkima, o emiso o enaimin o enkutishoto kitok enkijape
o eorunoto esekegwa o oltoilo loo rorei lotanyaita kulo, lootoning'o, pemeponikini ninje ororei;
amu eitu eidim aatanapakinore enaitanapaki: Baiki ten eporoo olowuaru oldonyo, nepuoi aanang' too soito arashu tʼempere metua;
eitureishe baiki neijia ena kitaduaroto metejo Mose: Aaibung'a enkuretishu neikirikira.
Kake ietuo ndai oldonyo Sion o engang' Engai naishiu, Yerusalem natii shumata, o iip nkujit oo lmalaikan, o enkiturrurroto kitok olorere,
o esirit oo lkikauni lootisiraki te shumata, o Engai, olaigwenani loo pookin, o ilmumuan loo supati looitabaiyoki,
o olaidikidikoni lʼosotua ng'ejuk, Yesus, o osarge lʼenkisuaroto loiro sidai nelang' le Abel.
Eng'orai, emiany ele olimu. Amu ten eitu edany lelo ootanyaita oloiroro tʼenkop, ke melusoo pe mikilany, teni kiany ilo oiro aing'ua shumata?
Ore te ina kata eikirikirie oltoilo lenye enkop, kake ore taata eisiligishe, ajo: o nabo kata alaing'unung'unye me enkop ake, kake shumata si.
Kake ore kulo rorei „o nabo kata“ eitayolou aajo, epuoi aaitaal naaing'unung'un, eji nena naaitobiraki, peiye ebik nemeing'unung'un.
Akae, tiaraki nikitum enkarsishu nemeing'unung'un, kiata eng'adunoto nikisyayakinye Engai, nikintiship ninye tʼenganyit o tʼenkuretishu.
Amu era Engai ang' enkima napejisno.
Njebik enyorrata oo lalashera.
Emirikino enkitoomonoto oo lomon; amu eitoomono ilkulekai, meyolo, ilmalaikan.
Entadamutu looteenaki anaa looteenaki te nebo o ninje, o kulo looisilitoi, anaa litiiti ndai oopeny atua iseseni.

Njeata enkidikidikoto olmoruo o eng'oroyoni too pookin enkitook, njoo meata enkirragata entibili. Amu eigwenaki Engai laitobirak loo mbaak torrok oo nkiri o laarak lʼenkidikidikoto olmoruo o eng'oroyoni,
Njoo metii orregie lʼenyorrata oo masaa, entigirata too ntokitin naatai; amu ninye otejo: Maapal iye namaaing'ua;
kinteu baiki yook aatejo: Era Olaitoriani olaretoni lai namalo aureisho. Kainyo aasaki oltung'ani?
Entadamutu laiturukok linyi, looinosakitia ndai lomon lʼEngai, eng'orai enkiting'oto empuan enye, entusuj enkirukoto enye.
Yesus Kristos ng'ole o taata o ninye ilo metabaiki nkatan pookin.
Eminjo peimalimali ndai too nkiteng'enareitin oo muain kumok o ngomon; amu sidai ten egolu oltau tʼeng'adunoto, me too ndaikin nemeitudup kulo loonyamal too ninje.
Kiata olperere lʼenkidasare lemeaku kulo ooramat ena aji, neinos.
Amu ore lelo shang'it, ooaki olaidasani kitok osarge lenye atua ewueji sinyati, nepej ori seseni lenye tʼenkima ti aulo enkirragata.
Onaa si ninye Yesus, pesinyaa olorere tʼosarge lenye openy, neaku oinoto enkisiloto ti aulo engalo kishomi.
Akae, maapeti si yook aaing'ua enkirragata, enetii ninye, pekinap emoroto enye.
Amu mikiata tene engang' nabik, kake king'oru engai nalotu.
Onaa, mayaki Engai enkidasare enkitadararoto oshi tiatua ninye, naa ilmomo loo njonito oo nkutukie naaibalu engarna enye.
Emirikino aaitobira sidan ning'aring'ara, amu eiting'id kuna kidasareitin Engai.
Entoning' laiturukok linyi, entusuj ninje, amu eishololo ninje tʼolbae loo lmumuan linyi anaa loopuoi aaikilikwan, petum aaitobira tʼeng'ida meang'iang', amu meisho ndai ena endupoto.
Entoomonoki yook. King'idare ena, pekiata oitoilo sidai lʼoltau nikinyok aaibung' orregie sidai too pookin.
Adiding' ndai naleng' pinkoko nji, patum atorrinyoi enitiiti ndai asioki.
Ore Engai eseriani, natorikuo aitung'ua too lootuata ele shokut kitok loo ntare, tʼosarge lʼosotua loo nkatan pookin, ninye Olaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos,
njeitaa ndai looitabaia enkyas sidai pookin, pitumutumu aataas enayeu ninye, neas tiatua ndai enaitiship ninye te Yesus Kristos; enenye enkitook nkatan pookin o nkatan pookin. Amen.
Kake adiding' ndai, lalashera lainei, entang'amutu ele rorei lʼendiding'aroto, amu atisiraka ndai too lkuti rorei.
Entayoloito, aajo eidipaki aatalaku olalashe lang' Timoteos. Ten elotu asioki, naladol ndai te nebo o ninye.
Eroroki laiturukok linyi pookin o sinyat pookin. Eiroroki ndai lalashera ootii Italia.
Njebik eng'adunoto te nebo o ndai pookin. Amen.
Yakobos, osinga lʼEngai o lʼOlaitoriani Yesus Kristos: eninyi ena palai, ndai kuna tipati tomon o are naaisardakakinote nkwapi. Entasupai!
Enkena aajo eng'ida nabore, lalashera lainei, ten ibatatakinono atua nkitasurot oo mpukunot kumok,
niyololo, aajo eitaa enkirukoto inyi, ten eitoriori, olng'iria.
Ore olng'iria, meata kata nemebik egol metabaiki enkiting'oto, piakuku lbaiarot oolulung'a lemeng'oriki toki.
Ten etii oltung'ani linyi otong'orikia eng'eno, njesai ninye Engai naisho oltung'ani pookin tʼenkumoi nemeisikong'aki, neaku eishori ninye.
Kake njoo metasaya tʼenkirukoto, meata enking'arrirroto. Amu oloing'arrirro nenyanyukie lopir lʼenaiposha, ooreota neiposhiposh enkijape.
Njoo mejo ilo tung'ani, ajo elang'amu ninye toki tʼOlaitoriani;
ore oltung'ani orisha oltau, nemeitoriori too ngoitoi enyena pookin.
Ore olalashe lora oti, njeitadaraa kion tʼenkitook enye,
ore oladupani, njeitadaraa kion tʼenkitadounoto enye, amu elusoo anaa entapukai oo nkujit.
Eilepu engolong' te nebo o enkirowuaj, netoi nkujit, nerarunye entapukai enye, neimin enkishaa enkitobirata enye. Neijia si etiu oladupani, einaaia too nkyasin enyena pookin.
Tesh oltung'ani oting'iria tʼenkitasuroto, amu ore etaa etaleenoki, nelang'amu enkaja empuan naisiliga Olaitoriani kulo loonyor ninye.
Njoo mejo o obo loitasuri: aaitasur Engai. Amu meitasuri Engai too ntorrok, nemeitasur ninye openy oltung'ani o obo.
Eitasuri oltung'ani pookin tʼolng'warra lenye openy, loroju neisis ninye.
Ore tekurum eidipa atang'amu olng'warra neiu ninye enkitarruoto, ore petabaiye enkitarruoto neiu ninye enkea.
Emimanimanaa, lalashera lainei lanyor!
Eing'ua enkishooroto pookin sidai o enkishooroto nabaia shumata, edou eing'ua enetii Menye loo nkilang'eta, nemetii enetii ninye enkitaalata arashu oloip lʼenkibelekenyata.
Etoiwuo ninye yook tʼeyeunoto enye, tʼororei lʼesipata, pekiaku yook enkiterata oo nkitobirat enyena.
Onaa, lalashera lainei lanyor, njeaku oltung'ani pookin losioki ainining'u, lemesioki agoro;
amu meitobir engoro oltung'ani enaaku tʼEngai.
Onaa, entautu olduruki pookin o enkumoi entorroni, ning'amumu tʼemborran ororei, lotuunoki atua ndai, loidim aitopua iltauja linyi.
Entaa laitobirak lʼororei, me laning'ok ake, pemilejileje aten.
Amu teni era oltung'ani olaning'oni lʼororei nemera olaitobirani, nenyanyukie ninye oltung'ani loing'oraa engomom osesen lenye tʼenking'oret.
Ore peidip aing'orai, nelo nerikino nabo kata enetiu.
Ore loturuma atua nkitanapat naabaia elakunoto, nemera olaning'oni lorikinisho, kake olaitobirani lʼenkyas, neaku ninye tesh tiatua enkitobirata enye.
Teni ejo oltung'ani, ajo era olaisyayani lʼEngai, nemeitore olng'ejep lenye, kake elej oltau lenye, nera enkisyayare enye ne pesho.
Ore enkisyayare sidai nemeata eleyata tʼengomom Engai, Papa, era ena: Enking'orare oo lokishin o en oo ngolia tiatua enkilishoto enye, o erripore e kion tʼolmaa, pemeata entibili.
Lalashera lainei, eminken, aajo eing'oraa enkirukoto e atua Yesus Kristos, Olaitoriani lʼenkitook lang', entemet oltung'ani.
Amu ten emut ejing'u oltumo linyi oltung'ani oishopo olgisoi le sahabu o olkila sidai, neitoki alotu olaisinani oishopito olkila duruki,
ning'oring'oro ndai ele oishopo olkila sidai, nijokiki ninye: Totona tʼene wueji sidai, nintokiki aajoki ele aisinani: Ntasho iye tʼende, arashu: Totona ene abori olorika loo nkejek ainei:
anaata eitu intoorioro tiatua ndai aten, niakuku laigwenak oosuj ndamunot torrok?
Entoning'oki nanu, ndai, lalashera lainei lanyor, keitu egelu Engai laisinak lʼena kop loora ladupak lʼenkirukoto o lajung'ok lʼenkarsishu, naisiligaka kulo oonyor ninye?
Kake ore ndai, itemenaitie oltung'ani aisinani. Me ladupak ooek ndai neyetu ndai tʼengomom enkigwena enye?
Ke, memor ninje engarna sidai naipotieki ndai?
Ten intabaiaia enkitanapata olkarsis, anaa pejo esirata: Tonyorra oltung'ani lʼelatia ino anaa kion, ninkoko sidai,
kake ten ing'oraara entemet oltung'ani, nintarruorruo, neaku nkitanapat iljaken, aajo irara lalang'ak.
Amu teni eibung' oltung'ani nkitanapat pookin neitarruoki nabo, etaa oloitarruoko pookin.
Amu olotejo: „Miar enkidikidikoto olmoruo o eng'oroyoni!“ etejo baiki: „Miar metua!“ Akae, teni eitu iar enkidikidikoto olmoruo o eng'oroyoni, kake itaara metua, itaa olalang'ani loo nkitanapat.
Eroro nji, enkuna nji, anaa loopuoi aaigwenaki too nkitanapat elakunoto.
Amu etum enkigwena, metii eng'adunoto, lemenana oshoke; neitadaraa kion enanai e oshoke, meure enkigwena.
Kaa dupoto ena, lalashera, teni ejo oltung'ani, ajo eata enkirukoto nemeata nkitobirat? Keidim aitopua enkirukoto ninye?
Teni meishopo olalashe arashu enganashe nelau embaikinoto endaa,
nejoki obo linyi ninje: Esere naa, erowuajie aten, entaraposhoto! niminjosho ninje launot osesen: kaa dupoto ena?
Neijia baiki enkirukoto, teni meata nkitobirat, netua tiatua kion openy.
Kake ebaiki oltung'ani ejo: Iata iye enkirukoto, naata nanu nkitobirat. Ntaduaki enkirukoto ino metii nkitobirat, nayeu naaitadol iye too nkitobirat ainei enkirukoto ai.
Iruk iye, ajo etii Engai nabo. Itaasa sidai; neiruk si ninje loiriruani, neikirikira.
Ke, iyeu niyolou, oltung'ani oilash, ajo etua enkirukoto nemeata nkitobirat?
Keitu eitaai Abraham, Papa lang', supat tʼolbae loo nkitobirat, peidas Oinoti lenye Isaak tʼolperere lʼenkidasare?
Idol taa, ajo eitobirishore enkirukoto nkitobirat enyena, neitabaiyoki enkirukoto too nkitobirat;
nebaia esirata najo: Eiruko Abraham Engai, neikenakini ninye ena esupato, neipoti: oljore lʼEngai.
Itadua ndai, aajo eitaai oltung'ani supat tʼolbae loo nkitobirat, me tʼolbae lʼenkirukoto ake.
Neija si etiu Rahab, enda sindani: Keitu eitaai si ninye supat too nkitobirat, peng'amu lelo aikitalak, neisho epuku aulo tʼengai oitoi?
Amu anaa petua osesen, metii Olmumua, neijia si etua enkirukoto, metii nkitobirat.
Eminjo eyeu oltung'ani pookin too ndai neaku olaiteng'enani, lalashera lainei, niyololo, aajo eigwenakini yook enkigwena nalang'.
Amu kintadiak pookin too mbaak kumok. Ore oltung'ani pookin lemeitadiak tʼororei obo, ninye oltung'ani baiaroti, neidim si aiboo osesen lenye pookin, anaa peiboori olbarta opiki esekengei enkutuk.
Ng'orai, kimbooio ilbartan too sekenge aagoliki, pening' ninje yook, nikintamanaa seseni lenye pookin.
Ng'orai si imeilin, ten aa sapuki naleng', nereo ilkutat oogol ninje, kake eitamanaa ninje enkiti kitamanet ewueji eneyeu oloreota.
Neijia si etiu olng'ejep, era enkiti rubata osesen, neas mbaak kituak. Ng'orai, enkiti kima, kake keba aa entim nainok ninye?

Neijia si olng'ejep, naa enkima, neitoki enkop nabore mesupato. Neijia etiu olng'ejep tiatua rubat ang', nepik osesen olulung'a ntibil, neinok orregie lang' pookin, teni epuku enkiwuwuoto enye aing'ua ewueji e satan.
Amu eitamokuni mpukunot pookin oo ng'wesi o noo ntaritik o noo ng'wesi naaikurtutari o noo ng'wesi naatii atua enaiposha, neitamoku iltung'anak ninje.
Kake meidim oltung'ani aitamoku olng'ejep, entorroni nemegirai, nabore esayet nadua.
Ninye kintadararie Engai Papa, naa ninye kimorie oltung'ani, oitobiraki tʼemua Engai.
Nepuku tʼenkutuk nabo enkitadararoto o endiata. Njoo meaku neijia, lalashera lainei.
Keitupuku oljorro tʼeululu nabo engare namelok o engare nadua?
Keidim, lalashera lainei, olng'aboli atoiu ngululu oloirien, anai enjani olmarua ilng'abolo? Neijia meidim si oljorro oisukut aishoo engare namelok.
Kang'ai ora ng'en o jartan too ndai? Njeitaduaia tʼorregie lenye sidai nkitobirat enyena tʼemborran o enʼgeno.
Kake teni iatata olom odua o enjangar tiatua iltauja linyi, emilash nimile jishosho aaibooio esipata.
Amu ina me eng'eno nalotu aing'ua shumata, kake en enkop, o en oo ltung'anak, o en oo loiriruani.
Amu enetii olom o enjangar, ine etii enking'oling'olata o enkyas pookin enkurruna.
Kake ore eng'eno naing'ua shumata, era tʼenkiterata shaat, neitoki aata eseriani, neborr, nelelek ening'oto, nebore enkordunoto o ilmomo sidan, nemeata enyorrakinoto o esungureishu.
Ore olmomoi lʼesupato, neisuakini tʼeseriani kulo ooitobir eseriani.
Kaji eing'ua enjore o olarrabal tiatua ndai? Meing'ua ilng'warraitin linyi ooara tiatua rubat inyi?
Ing'warring'warra ndai, nimitumutumu; imbaroro ndai niatata olom, niming'amumu; iariara ndai tʼenjore; miatata toki, amu eitu iomonunu.
Iomonunu niming'amumu, tiaraki niomonunu too ntorrok, pinosishosho tiatua ilng'warraitin linyi.
Ndai, laitobirak loo mbaak torrok oo nkiri, miyololo, aajo era enjoruetishu olmaa emang'atishu Engai? Ore oloyeu neaku oljore lʼolmaa, neaku ninye olmang'atinda lʼEngai.
Arashu ijojo, ak eiro esirata pesho ojo: Ore Olmumua omany atua ndai, neng'war nenyokisho?
Kake eisho eng'adunoto nalang'; onaa, ejo esirata: Eany Engai loowuasa, kake eisho ninye eng'adunoto looitadou aten.
Akae, entoning' Engai, nianyianya satan, neaku eipirri aing'ua ndai.
Entinyikaki ndai Engai, nenyikaki si ninye ndai. Esuja ngaik, ndai laitarruok, entaa iltauja linyi shaati, ndai looing'arrirro.
Entoning' osina, nilishosho, ninjirishiri; enjoo enkwenia inyi eitaali aaku enkishirata, o eng'ida inyi neaku enkilishoto.
Entadou aten tʼengomom Engai, nelailepie ndai.

Eminteenikino ndai, lalashera lainei. Ore oloiteeniki olalashe lenye neigwenaki ninye, neiteeniki ilo neigwenaki nkitanapat. Kake teni ingwenaki nkitanapat, nimira olaitobirani loo nkitanapat, kake olaigwenani.
Etii obo oishoru nkitanapat neigwenaki, oloidim aitopua neiminye. Ira iye ng'ai oigwenaki ol elatia ino?
Akae, aiya, ndai loojo: Kipuo taata arashu taisere atua ena arashu atua enda ang', nikipuo aabik te ina alo olari obo nikintaa enkinyang'a, pekitum endupoto,
nimiyololo enaaku taisere. Amu kainyo empuan inyi? Nera empuruo nalio enkiti kata, tekurum neitoki aimisori.
Eaku pijojo te ina: Teni elayeu Olaitoriani nikipuo aaishiu, nikipuo aaitobir ena arashu ina.
Kake intadaraara taata aten tiatua olwuasa linyi. Ore enkitadararoto anaa ena nera torrono.
Ore oloyolo aitobira sidan, nemeitobir, nera te ninye enkitarruoto.
Akae, aiya, ndai ladupak, enjira nilishilishi tʼolbae lʼosina olotu shumata inyi.
Etobobua endupoto inyi, nenya laing'ur ilkilani linyi.
Ore esahabu inyi o ngoshola inyi etadoro einosa enkop, ore endoron enkinosata enkop, neijakenu, nenya nkiri oo seseni linyi anaa enkima. Inturrurro masaa too ngolong'i naatulusoitie.
Ng'orai, ore olkwaje loo laitobirak ooisambutua nkuruman inyi litomito ndai tʼenkikonya, ninye oishir; etijing'a enkishirata oo laisambuak atua nkiyaa Olaitoriani loo ltimito.
Inosa ndai olkar tʼenkop, nitonini tiatua naaitiship osesen, nintotiti iltauja linyi tʼengolong' eyeng'are.
Ingwenakitia olora supat niariara, neitu eany ninye ndai.
Enting'iria ndai, lalashera, metabau elotunoto Olaitoriani. Eng'orai olaturoni lʼenkuruma eanyu ilmomo sidan lʼenkop, neng'iri metabana netum enjan elukunya o en e tekurum.
Enting'iria si ndai, nintagoligolo iltauja linyi; amu etinyikua elotunoto Olaitoriani.
Emiang'iang'akino obo o olekai, lalashera lainei, pemeigwenakini ndai. Ng'o rai, eitashe olaigwenani te kutukaji.
Entusuj, lalashera lainei, enkisiloto o olng'iria loo layolounok, ooirorie tʼengarna Olaitoriani.
Ng'orai, kijo ninje teshi looting'iria. Itoning'o olng'iria le Iyob, nitadua enkiting'oto Olaitoriani; amu eata Olaitoriani engoshoke nanana, naa ninye oata enking'urroto.
Kake enang'or, lalashera lainei, eminturuj, me te shumata, neme tʼenkop, neme tʼengai kiturujata. Njeaku ororei linyi: ee, ora ee, o: me, ora me, pemibatatata abori enkigwena.
Ore peisili obo too ndai, njesaisho! Ore peng'ida oltung'ani, njerany singolioitin lʼengauo!
Ore pemoi obo too ndai, njeipot ninye laigwenak lʼesirit, pesayaki ninje ninye, neelie eilata tʼengarna Olaitoriani.
Nelaitopok esayata enkirukoto oltamoiyai, neapaa Olaitoriani ninye; naa teni eitobira nkitarruot, nepuoi aaitaiki ninje.
Akae, embalakinoto nkitarruot, entasayakinoto, pitumutumu aaishiutu. Eidim esayata engolon osupat nkumok.
Nera Eliya oltung'ani onyanyukie yook, nesaisho tʼesayata, pemesha enjan, neitu eshaiki enjan enkop laritin okuni o lapaitin ile;
neitoki asaisho, neishoru shumata enjan, neiu enkop ilmomo lenyena.
Lalashera lainei, teni eimalimal obo linyi neing'ua esipata, neibelekenya oltung'ani ninye,
njeyolou ele, ajo ooibelekenya olaitarruoni tʼengoitoi enye naimalimalie, nelaitopok ninye empuan enye tʼenkea neopoo enkumoi oo nkitarruot.
Petros, olairriwani le Yesus Kristos: too lomon ootegeluaki, ooisardakakinote Pontus o Galatia o Kapadokia o Asia o Bitinia,

loora gelunot lʼEngai Papa tʼeyolounoto enye neba opa, o tiatua esinyaroto Olmumua Sinyati metabaiki ening'oto o enkisuakinoto osarge le Yesus Kristos. Metoponari eng'adunoto o eseriani Engai too ndai!
Njeitadarari Engai o Menye lʼOlaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos, lotoiwuo yook kat are tʼenanai enye kitok e oshoke, pekitum eanyunoto naishiu tʼempiunoto e Yesus Kristos too lootuata,
pekitum enjung'o nemerruoio, nemeata entibili, nemeinaaia, natorripokoki ndai te shumata,
ndai loorripi tiatua engolon Engai tʼenkirukoto, pitumutumu enkitopuata naitobirieki, peboluni tʼenkata enkiting'oto.
Nipuopuo aagalalu te ina kata, baiki teni meata kata nemeilishieki ndai enkiti kata too nkitasurot oo muain kumok,
petumi enkirukoto inyi enataleenoki neata enkinyang'a kitok nelang' esahabu namuta naleeni tʼenkima, neaku enkitadararoto o enkitook o enganyit tiatua embolunoto e Yesus Kristos,
leitu idolidolo ninyorrinyorro nirukuruku ninye nimidolitata taata, nipuopuo aagalalu tʼeng'ida nemeiroroi o enaitadarari,
nipuopuo aaea enkiting'oto enkirukoto inyi, nera enkitopuata oo ltauja linyi.
Ore ina kitopuata, eing'orutua neikeernu layolounok ooitayolo ena ng'adunoto nipuopuo aatum ndai.
Eikeernutuo, aajo kaa kata arashu kaa pukunoto natuutua Olmumua le Kristos otii atua ninje, netang'asa aijakenu nkisilot e Kristos o enkitook nasuju tekurum.

Etabolokoki ninje metayolo; amu eitu eisyayaki aten, kake ndai, tiatua nena baak naainosakitia taata ndai lelo ooakitia ndai euangelion tʼOlmumua Sinyati, oirriuaki aitung'ua shumata, naa mbaak naang'war si ilmalaikan pedol.
Onaa, enteen mpolosi oo ndamunot inyi, enjololoto, enting'idare metabaiki enkiting'oto empuris nayakini ndai tiatua embolunoto e Yesus Kristos,
anaa nkera naaning'isho, emimbung' orregie loo lng'warraitin linyi lʼenkata elukunya litonyorra miyololo,
kake anaa peyeu oloipoto ndai, ora sinyati, entaa si ndai sinyat tiatua orregie pookin,
amu etisiraki: njoo irara sinyat, amu ara nanu sinyati.
Naa tiaraki nimpotipoto ninye Papa oigwenaki oltung'ani pookin anaa petiu enkyas enye, meing'oraa entemet enye, entilimanata tiatua enkuretishu tʼenkata inyi nitiiyeiye ene,
iyololo, aajo eitu elakuni ndai too naarruoio, too ngoshola arashu tʼesahabu, tʼemokunoto inyi musana nitang'amutua too loominyi,
kake tʼosarge ogol enkinyang'a anaa lʼembalelo neitu eitarruo nemeata entibili, le Kristos,
loiturukieki ayolou, eton eitu epiki entonata olmaa, kake loitalioiyoki tʼenkiting'oto oo nkatan tʼolbae linyi,
ndai liruko te ninye Engai, naitopiwuo ninye tiatua lootuata neisho ninye enkitook, peiye iatata enkirukoto inyi o eanyunoto e atua Engai.
Esuja iltauja linyi tiatua ening'oto esipata tʼolmumua, piatata enyorrata oo lalashera nemeitusupatuo, entonyorrata too ltauja naleng',
anaa lootoiwuoki kat are, me tʼembeu erruoroto, kake te nemerruoio, tʼororei lʼEngai naishiu obik nkatan pookin.
Amu Era enkiring'o pookin anaa olkujita, o enkitook enye pookin anaa entapukai olkujita; etoiyo olkujita nerarunye entapukai;
kake ebik ororei lʼOlaitoriani nkatan pookin. Nera ninye ele rorei loinosuaki too ndai.
Akae, enturrai entorroni pookin o olosek pookin o enkitusupatuo o engilata e tau o elikioroto pookin;
entang'warr anaa nkera naa eneiunyeki kule eng'eno nemeata olosek, pipuopuo aabulaki too kuna atua enkitopuata,
teni inyorrinyorra, aajo ebor Olaitoriani.
Ipuonunu enetii ninye anaa osoit oishiu loiturraitie iltung'anak, kake lotegelua Engai negol enkinyang'a.
Enteshet si ndai aten anaa soito looishiu, piakuku engaji emumuaishu, nipuopuo aaitobir enkyas sinyati olaidasani, ninjoioio nkidasareitin emumuaishu naaiting'id Engai te Yesus Kristos.
Onaa etisiraki tiatua esirata: Ng'orai, apik atua Sion osoit kitok lʼolpijata otegeluaki negol enkinyang'a, naa oloiruk ninye, nemelakurru.
Akae, nera ninye too ndai looiruk, lʼenkinyang'a nagol; kake etaa ele soit, loiturraitie lashetak neaku olkitok lʼolpijata lʼengaji, too lemeiruk
osoit lʼenkikoboto o osoit lʼenkitarrikino; nepuo aaikob ninje aten tiatua ororei nemening'isho, etipikaki ninje baiki atua ena.
Kake irara ndai eishoi nategeluaki, enkyas olaidasani olkarsis, olorere sinyati, olorere lenye, pitumutumu aainosutu sidan oloipotoko ndai tʼenaimin atua enkilang'et enye naiputukunyi;
leitu irara opa olorere, kake irara taata olorere lʼEngai, leitu eibung'akini ndai engoshoke nanana, kake eibung'akaki taata.
Lanyor, adiding' ndai anaa lomon o iltung'anak lʼolototo, pipaasharere ilng'warraitin loo nkiri looarare Olmumua
niatata orregie sidai tiatua loreren, pedol kulo looimaki ndai anaa laitobirak loo ntorrok, nkyasin inyi sidan neitadaraa Engai tʼengolong' eleenoto.
Entipik aten abori enkitoria pookin oo ltung'anak tʼolbae lʼOlaitoriani, ten aa olkarsis lolang' kulekai,
ten aa larikok looirriua ninye, pelaaki laitobirak loo ntorrok neitadaraa laitobirak loo sidan.
Amu era ena eyeunoto Engai, pipising'ing'i nkutukie o emodaishu oo ltung'anak lemeata eng'eno, intobiribiri sidan;
anaa loolakuno, nimintaata elakunoto anaa enaopoo entorroni, kake anaa laisyayak lʼEngai.
Entaa kituak iltung'anak pookin, entonyor lalashera, enturia Engai, enjoo olkarsis enkitook.
Laisyayak, entoning laitoriak tʼenkuretishu pookin, me isidan o loobor ake, kake baiki lemebor,
Amu era ena empuris, teni eng'iriaki oltung'ani nkisilot tʼolbae lʼoltoilo lʼoltau edamu Engai, netum osina pesho.
Kaa kitadararoto ena, teni ing'iriri neari ndai intarruorruo? Kake teni intobiribiri sidan neisili ndai ning'iriri, era ena empuris tʼengomom Engai.
Amu eipotoki ndai te ina, amu eisiloki baiki Kristos tʼolbae linyi neing'uaiki ndai olponoto, pisujusuju rregiei lenyena;
leitu eitobir enkitarruoto o nabo neitu etumi olmarengei o obo tiatua enkutuk enye;
leitu emorisho, etamoroki ninye; neitu eitureishe, eisiloki ninye; kake eitarasaka pookin ele loigwenaki aitorio;
olotanapa nkitarruot ang' tiatua osesen lenye shumata enjata, pikinjiuoki esupato, kituatakitia nkitarruot; injiutuo too lbaak lenyena.
Amu nanyanyukie ntare naaisardaka, kake etorrinyokoki ndai taata olairritani o olaing'orani loo lmumuan linyi.
Entotiu neijia, na ng'oroyok, entoning' ilmoruak linyi, pe, teni etii lemeiruk ororei, etumi tʼorregie loo ng'oroyok enye, metii rorei,
tiaraki nadol ninje orregie linyi shaat tʼenkuretishu.
Njoo meaku enkaja inyi en e boo tʼenjetata oo lpapit o tʼeikare esahabu o tʼenkishopoto oo lkilani,
kake enkaja tiatua, enememuta emborran, Olmumua ogira nebor; nera sidai naleng' tʼengomom Engai.
Amu neijia opa etakaja ng'oroyok sinyat aten, naa Engai etipika eanyunoto enye, nening' ilmoruak lenye,
anaa petoning'o Sara Abraham neipot ninye Olaitoriani lenye; nitaa ndai nkera enyena, teni intobiribiri sidan nimiureishosho nimiruturutu too pookin.
Entotiu si neijia, ndai le moruak, entushulare ninje tʼeng'eno, enjoo eng'oroyoni anaa enaret nemeata engolon enkitook, anaa naajung'u te nebo o ndai eng'adunoto empuan, pememitikini sayat inyi.
Ore tʼenkiting'oto, njoo iatata pookin ndamunot naanyanyuk, nirara loong'ar nkisilot, loonyor lalashera, looata ngoshuak naanana, looitadou aten.
Emilak entorroni tʼentorroni, arashu enkilepilepata tʼenkilepilepata, kake entamayanishoto, amu iyololo, aajo eipotoki ndai te ina, pipuopuo aajung'u emayani.
Amu oloyeu nenyor empuan enye nedol ngolong'i sidan, njerishie olng'ejep lenye entorroni o njonito enkutuk enye, pemelimu olosek.
Njeibelekenya tʼentorroni neitobir sidan, njeing'oru eseriani nesuj ninye;
amu etii ngonyek Olaitoriani shumata oo supati, nening' nkiyaa enyena omonot enye, kake eiba engomom Olaitoriani looitobir ntorrok.
Naa kang'ai oidim aitobiraki ndai ntorrok, teni irara ndai lanyuak loo sidan?
Naa teni iatata nkisilot tʼolbae Mesupato, nirara teshi. Emiurei enkituriata enye, emiirut!
Kake entisinyai Olaitoriani Kristos tiatua iltauja linyi. Entobirakinoto, pialulu oltung'ani pookin oikilikwan ndai ororei tʼolbae lʼeanyunoto natii atua ndai,
kake tʼemborran o tʼenkuretishu o tʼoltoilo sidai lʼoltau, peaku ore kulo ooimaki ndai anaa looitobir ntorrok, neitukurruni, tiaraki natamoro orregie linyi sidai tiatua Kristos.
Enaikash teni eitamei oltung'ani eas sidan, ten aa eyeunoto Engai, alang' teni eitamei eas ntorrok.
Amu etua baiki Kristos nabo kata tʼolbae loo nkitarruot ang', osupat tʼolbae loo lemeata esupato, peiye erik yook enetii Engai; etaaraki metua tʼosesen meitaai eshiu tʼolmumua;
eshomo baiki te ilo peinosaki ilmumuan tʼenkibooroto,
leitu opa ening'isho eton eanyisho olng'iria lʼEngai too nkatan e Noa naaitobiritai emeili, naa ina naitopokieki ilkuti ake tauja, oora isiet, tʼengare.

Naa engare naitopok si yook taata tʼenkibatisa naitanyanyukieki te ina, nemera enjororoto oloirerio lʼosesen, kake osotua lʼoltoilo sidai lʼoltau oitoriokinore Engai tʼolbae lʼempiunoto e Yesus Kristos,
oilepa shumata neton te tatene Engai: ore ilmalaikan o nkitoriaitin o nkidimat, naa nʼenkitoria enye.
Tiaraki nating'iriaka Kristos yook nkisilot osesen, akae, enterreten si ndai aten te ina otikinoto, amu ore ilo oitamioki osesen, etung'aiye nkitarruot,
pemekure eishiuoki ninye ilng'warraitin loo ltung'anak tʼerishata nepon ebikie osesen, kake eyeunoto Engai.

Amu ebaiki, ajo kintobira tʼenkata empuan ang' natulusoiye, yeunot oo loreren oolamita Engai, kipuoiye mbaak torrok oo nkiri, ilng'warraitin, emerai, enkinosishore, eokishore, nkisyayareitin oo nkulie ain.
Ore pemishularere ndai ninje tiatua ele rregie torrono lemeitoriori, neaku eing'asia nesukeny ndai.
Kake epuo aaisho ealet ilo eitobirakino, peigwenaki looishiu o lootuata.
Te ilo bae, einosakaki si lootuata euangelion, peigwenakini tʼosesen anaa iltung'anak, kake neishiuoki Engai tʼolmumua.
Etinyikua enkiting'oto oo ntokitin pookin.
Akae, enteng'enuoto, enjololoto, pisaishosho. Ore enaiturukie pookin, njoo iatata enyorrata kitok tiatua ndai, amu eopoo enyorrata enkumoi oo nkitarruot,
Entoomonoto, metii enking'unyung'unyata.
Esyayakinoto, oltung'ani pookin anaa petang'amua enkishooroto, anaa laing'orak sidan loo ng'adunot kadami Engai.

Teni eiro oltung'ani, njeiro anaa rorei lʼEngai; teni eisyaisho oltung'ani, njeisyaisho anaa tʼenkidimata naisho Engai ninye, peiye eitadarari Engai tiatua ntokitin pookin te Yesus Kristos, oata enkitook o enkitoria metabaiki nkatan pookin o nkatan pookin.
Lanyor lainei, eminjo eitomonokino ndai enkima naleenyeki ndai, anaa entoki omoni nataa too ndai;
kake enting'idata, tiaraki ning'aring'ara nkisilot e Kristos, peiye ing'idada nigalalulu tʼenkata embolunoto enkitook enve,
Irara teshi, teni eitemenetari ndai tʼolbae lʼengarna e Kristos, amu eeng'ieng'akino shumata inyi Olmumua lʼenkitook o lʼEngai; emori ninye tiatua ninje, neitadarari tiatua ndai.
Kake njoo meisili o obo too ndai anaa olotaara metua arashu olapurroni arashu olaitobirani loo ntorrok arashu oloitijing' kion enkyas olekai.
Kake teni eisili, tiaraki nara Olkristianos, njoo metum enkurruna, kake njeitaa Engai kitok te ina arna.
Amu etabaua enkata, peiter enkigwena tʼengaji Engai. Teni eng'as too yook — kaa kiting'oto naaku too kulo lemeiruk lomon lʼeng'ida lʼEngai?
Teni epok osupat tʼosina — ke ti aji elioi olemeure Engai o olaitarruoni?
Akae, ore looisili tʼeyeunoto Engai, njeitarasaki ninje iltauja lenye olaitobirani supat tiatua nkitobirat sidan.
Ore loora ilpaiyani tiatua ndai, adiding' nanu lara si olpaiyan anaa ndai o oljakeni loo nkisilot e Kristos, ong'ar ena kitook naapuoi aabolu:
Errita enjoo e Kristos natii atua ndai, ning'oraara, neme tʼearakinoto, kake tʼenyorrrunoto; anaa penyor Engai; niming'oruru endupoto torrono, kake tʼenyorrata oltau,
neme anaa laitoriak lʼolorere, kake anaa laiturukok lʼenjoo.
Ore peibalunye ele airritani kitok, neishori ndai enkaja enkitook nemeinaaia.
Neijia si entotiu ndai looti, entoning' ilpaiyani. Entoning'oroto pookin tiatua ndai, embung'akinoto pookin aten enkitadounoto; amu eibooio Engai loowuasa, kake eisho eng'adunoto looitadou aten.
Akae, entadou aten tiabori engaina nagol Engai, petum ailepunye ninye ndai tʼenkata enye.
Entanang'akiti nkishilarot inyi pookin shumata enye, amu ninye oshilaa ndai.
Enteng'enuoto, enjololoto, amu eman ndai olmang'atinda linyi, satan, anaa olng'atuny oipurrito neing'oru olonya;
enteunore ninye tʼenkirukoto nagol, iyololo, aajo etabaikitia si lalashera linyi ootii olmaa nena kisilot.
Ore Engai eng'adunoto pookin naipotoko ndai, looisili enkata kinyi, atua enkitook enye oo nkatan pookin tiatua Kristos Yesus, ninye olaitorioki ndai engoitoi nelairishiu nelaitagol neitasheye ndai.
Njeata ninye enkitook o enkitoria metabaiki nkatan pookin o nkatan pookin! Amen.
Tʼengaina e Silvanos, olalashe linyi supat (enajo nanu), atisiraka ndai too lkuti rorei, padiding' ndai naijakenu, ajo ina eng'adunoto nasipa Engai; entasheiye ina.
Eiroroki ndai kulo ootegeluaki te nebo o ndai, ootii Babilon, o enkerai ai Markos.
Erorokinoto ndai obo olikai tʼeng'ututata enyorrata. Njebik eseriani too ndai pookin ootii atua Kristos. Amen.
Simon Petros, osinga o olairriwani le Yesus Kristos: too lelo ooinoto ena nabo kirukoto kirotet te nebo o yook, tiatua esupato naisho Engai ang' o Olaitoriani Yesus Kristos.
Njeisho Engai ndai eng'adunoto o eseriani kitok tʼeyolounoto Engai o Olaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos.
Tiaraki naidipaki aaishoo yook tʼeyolounoto oloipoto yook tʼenkitook o tʼenkishaa enye engolon pookin engaishu enye naeaki yook empuan o enkuretishu Engai,
naishorieki yook nkisiligat naaikishaan naa kituak naleng', peiye itumutumu aatang'ar too nona entiunoto Engai, ikwetikwete olng'warra lʼerruoroto lotii enkop:
onaa entonyok te ina naleng', pintaduaiaia tiatua enkirukoto inyi enkishaa o tiatua enkishaa eyolounoto
o tiatua eyolounoto emitikinoto o tiatua emitikinoto olng'iria o tiatua olng'iria enkuretishu Engai
o tiatua enkuretishu Engai enyorrata oo lalashera o tiatua enyorrata oo lalashera enyorrata oo pookin.
Ore piatata nona osupatei, meisho ninje ndai ishalulu nimiatata ilmomo tiatua eyolounoto Olaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos;
kake olemeata nona, nera modooni neirrapirrapisho nerikino enkisujata oo nkitarruot enyena e opa.
Onaa, lalashera, entopon aanyok, pintagoligolo enkipototo o engelunoto inyi; amu teni intobiribiri nona, nimipuopuo aaitoki aaikobo.
Amu nji epuoi aadup aaisho ndai enjing'ata e atua enkarsishu oo nkatan pookin Olaitoriani lang' naa Olaitopuani Yesus Kristos.
Akae, mayeu napai, paitadamu ndai oshi kuna baak, ten aa iyololo neitagolieki ndai tiatua esipata natii.
Nadol ajo eitoriori, eton atii atua ena aji, paitadamu nainyeye ndai;
amu ayolo, ajo meata kata namaitau engaji ai asioki, anaa enaaitadua Olaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos.
Kake ayeu nanyokita, peiye, teni aidipa ashomo, itumutumu aatadamutu kuna baak.
Amu eitu kisuj yook natinin eng'eno te ina kata nikintayolo ndai engolon o elotunoto Olaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos, kake kitadua too ngonyek ang' enkitook enye,
te ina kata nainoto ninye tʼEngai Menye enganyit o enkitook tʼoltoilo oakaki ninye eing'ua enkitook kitok: Nyele Oinoti lai lanyor oshipakino oltau lai.
Kitoning'o yook ele toilo lotaa eing'ua shumata, kiboitare ninye tʼoldoinyo sinyati.

Nikiata si ororei ogol lʼeyolounoto, nintobiribiri sidai, teni ing'oraara ninye anaa enkilang'et nailang'isho tiatua ewueji emiso, metabana neiter endama neilepu olakira lʼengakenya tiatua iltauja linyi.
Meata kata niming'asing'asa aayolou ena, aajo meaku eyolounoto o nabo esirata tʼenkitaalata enye openy;
amu eitu eauni eyolounoto o nabo tʼeyeunoto oltung'ani, kake eiroro iltung'anak sinyat lʼEngai, eutakini tʼOlmumua Sinyati.

Kake etaa opa si layolounok lʼelejare tiatua olorere, neijia anaa peaku si tiatua ndai laiteng'enak lʼelejare, oopuo aaiteru orot enkiminata, nemiki Olaitoriani oinyang'ua ninje, neaki aten enkiminata asioki.
Nepuo aasuj ilkumok enkiminata enye; ore tʼolbae lenye neimakini engoitoi esipata too ntorrok.
Tʼempiani o too rorei lʼolosek epuo aaing'oru endupoto too ndai. Kake meimutie enkigwena enye e opa, nemeirura enkiminata enye.
Amu eitu eing'urrie Engai ilmalaikan ooitarruoitie, kake too ngameta enaimin etanang'aka ninje atua easuroto, peitaanyitai enkigwena;
neitu eing'urrie olmaa li opa, kake etorripo Noa, olainosunoni lʼesupato, te nebo o kulekai oopishana, peau ninye oloirrag lʼengare kitok shumata enkop, natii kulo torrok.
Neibelekeny ngang'itie Sodom o Gomora metaa nkuruon, neigwenaki ninje tʼenkigwena ogol, nepikaki enkiteng'enet iltung'anak torrok oopuonu tekurum;
neitopok Lot, ele supat, lora ninye eisilo kulo tung'anak torrok tʼorregie lenye lʼolduruki;
amu tiaraki natamanya ninye ora supat, te nebo o ninje, nening' nedol enataasa, neitamio ninje ngolong'i kumok Olmumua le ilo supat too nkyasin enye nemeishiaakino.
Eyolo Olaitoriani atang'adu looure ninye tiatua nkitasurot, neitaany looas ntorrok atua engolong' enkigwena, petum earata,
naleng' kulo oolimana anaa peyeu nkiri tiatua olng'warra duruki, neany nkitoriaitin, looata olwuasa, looata engogong'i, lemeikirikira teni emor ninje ngoloni enkitook;
kake too nona pookin eitu eau ilmalaikan oolusoo tʼenkidimata o tʼengolon, emoroto torrono aaigwenaki ninje tʼengomon Olaitoriani.
Kake etiu lelo anaa ng'wesi nemeata endamunoto, naatoinyeki neba empukunoto peibung'i neyeng'i, naa ninje oomorisho, nepuo aaimin tiatua orregie lenye torrono,
netum olkwaje loo nkyasin enye torrok. Eiken aajo naa olkar, teni esuj mbaak emerai endama, loora ntibil o ntiot enkurruna, neinosisho tʼenedaareki teni eng'arie ndaikin inyi,
neata ngonyek oobore mbaak torrok oo nkiri, lemeiboiori too ntorrok, nelej iltauja ooshal, neata oltau otamoo ngoitoi oo lng'warraitin, naa nkera endiata.
Etung'aitie engoitoi naitoriori, nemanimanaa eibung' engoitoi e Bileam, enkerai e Beor, otonyorra olkwaje le mesupato,
kake einoto earata elang'ata enye, neirorie esikiria nemeidim airoro tʼoltoilo loo ltung'anak, neibooio emodaishu oloiboni.
Ore ninje naa iljorroi lemetii engare, ng'atambo naareo olkutati, neitaanyitai ninje erokan enaimin nkatan pookin.
Amu elimu ninje rorei lʼolwuasa, neitasur too mbaak torrok oo nkiri, peiwuwu ilng'warraitin torrok loo nkiri tiatua kulo ootang'asa aailany lelo oomanimanaa tʼelejare;
neisiligaki ninje elakunoto, kake era ninje oopeny singan lʼenkiminata; amu teni egiluni oltung'ani, neaku osinga le ilo otigilua ninye.
Amu ore peidip ninje aailanya oloirerio lʼolmaa tʼeyolounoto Olaitoriani o Olaitopuani Yesus Kristos, nerreshi negiluni kat are, neaku too ninje mbaak enye enkiting'oto torrok nelang' nʼenkiterata.
Enaikash too ninje, ten emut eitu eyolou engoitoi esupato, alang' teni eyolou neitoki aalam tʼenkitanapata sinyati naishooki ninje.
Neaku too ninje asipai ena tepe: Eitoki anya oldia enaturrugumna, neitoki aing'olare olbitir oisuja olokidong'oi.
Ena empalai e are nasiraki ndai, lanyor lainei, naitadamunye ndai nainyeye ndamunot inyi sidan,
pidamumu kulo rorei ootang'asa aaliki ndai layolounok sinyat, o enkitanapata ang', likira lairriwak lʼOlaitoriani o Olaitopuani.
Entayolo tʼenkata elukunya ena, aajo epuo aapuonu too ngolong'i enkiting'oto lamorok tiatua emoroto luopuoito anaa peyeu ilng'warraitin lenye oopeny,
nejo: „Kaji etii enkisiligata elotunoto enye? Amu neba eiruate loopapa etobiko pookin anaa tʼenkiterata enkitobirata“.
Kake eshuma too kulo loojo ena, ajo etii shumata neba opa o enkop nataa tʼengare nepuku tʼengare tʼororei lʼEngai;
Onaa neiminyeki enkop te ina kata tʼoloirrag lʼengare.
Neijia eitaanyitai shumata e taata o enkop tʼororei lenye, nerripokini enkima metabaiki engolong' enkigwena o enkiminata oo ltung'anak lemeure Engai
Njoo meshumakini ndai, loonyorri, ena nabo, ajo enyanyukie engolong' nabo tʼOlaitoriani anaa laritin iip tomon, o laritin iip tomon anaa engolong' nabo.
Moimutie Olaitoriani eitabaia enkisiligata enye, anaa pejo looje enkimutioto, kake eng'iri too yook nemeyeu, peimin oltung'ani, kake pebaiki pookin enkitaalata.
Kake elalotu engolong' Olaitoriani anaa olapurroni te kiarie, nepuo aamuta shumat tʼoriri, nepuo aashola ntokitin tʼeikan, nepuo aamuta enkop o nkitobirat naatii atua,
Ore pelolong'u kuna pookin, kaji inkoko teni meata kata nimimbung'ubung'u orregie sinyati o orregie lʼenkuretishu Engai,
pianyunyu nikwetikiki elotunoto engolong' Engai, napuoi aamutie shumat tʼenkima nepuoi aasholie neikieki ntokitin!
Kake kianyu yook shumata ng'ejuk o enkop ng'ejuk tʼenkisiligata enye namanyie esupato.
Onaa, loonyorri, entonyok ianyunyu kuna, pedoli ndai tʼeseriani t'engomom enye miatata ntibil o entorroni,
ninkenikene olng'iria lʼOlaitoriani lang' enkitopuata inyi, anaa petisira si olalashe lang' likinyor Paulos tʼeng'eno enye naishooki ninye,
anaa peirorie nona tiatua mpala enyena pookin; ore tiatua ninje etii kulie baak naagol nemeyolounoi, naaitaai kulo lemeyolo nemeunokino, neijia anaa nkulie sirat, neaku nʼenkiminata enye.
Kake ore ndai, loonyorri, tiaraki niyololo nona tʼenkiterata, entorrip aten, pemerikori ndai tʼenkitapong'oroto oo ltung'anak torrok te nebo o ninje, mbatatata aaing'ua ewueji inyi neikarraro.
Kake entubul tiatua eng'adunoto o eyolounoto Olaitoriani lang o Olaitopuani Yesus Kristos. Njeata ninye enkitook taata o metabaiki ngolong'i oo nkatan pookin. Amen.
Enataa neba tʼenkiterata, enikitoning'o, enikitadua too ngonyek ang', eniking'oraitie neirrapirrap ngaik ang', mbaak ororei lʼempuan, —
etalie empuan nikitadua nikinjakenu nikinosaki ndai ena puan nemeiting', enataboitare Menye nelioi too yook —:
kinosaki ndai enikitadua, enikitoning'o, peiye ing'aring'ara si ndai o yook; nera eng'arata ang' nabo o Papa o Oinoti lenye Yesus Kristos.
Nikisir yook nona, peiganyi eng'ida ang'.
Nyena enkinosunoto nikitoning'o yook naing'ua ninye, nikinosaki ndai, aajo era Engai eong'an, nemetii enaimin atua ninye katukul.
Teni kijo yook, aajo kiata eng'arata te nebo o ninye nikipuo tiatua enaimin, nikilejisho nimikintobir esipata.
Kake teni kipuo tiatua eong'an anaa petii ninye atua eong'an, nikiata yook eng'arata tiatua aten, neisuj osarge le Yesus Kristos, Oinoti lʼEngai, yook too nkitarruot pookin.
Teni kijo, mikiata enkitarruoto, nikilej aten, nemetii esipata atua yook.
Teni kimbalu nkitarruot ang', nera ninye airukoni naa supat, peiye eitaiki yook nkitarruot neikishaanye yook tʼentorroni pookin.
Teni kijo, eitu kintarruo, nikintaa ninye olalejani, nemetii ororei lenye atua yook.
Nakera ainei, asiraki ndai kuna, peiye mintarruorruo; naa teni eitarruo obo, kiata olomitu yook te Papa, Yesus Kristos, ora supat.
Nera ninye enkitobirakinoto too nkitarruot ang', neme too nkitarruot ang' ake, kake too nʼolmaa pookin.
Ena nikiyolounye, aajo kiyolou ninye, teni kimbung' nkitanapat enyena.
Ore olojo: Ayolo ninye, nemeibung' nkitanapat enyena, naa olalejani, nemetii esipata atua ninye.
