Kake ore oloibung' ororei lenye, neitabaiyoki enyorrata Engai tiatua ninye, esipa. Ina kiyolounye, aajo kitii atua ninye.
Ore olojo, ebik tiatua ninye, meata kata nemelimana neijia anaa petilimane ninye.
Lanyor lainei, eitu asiraki ndai enkitanapata ng'ejuk, kake enkitanapata musana, niatata neba tʼenkiterata. Ore enkitanapata musana, naa ilo rorei Etoning'o tʼenkiterata.
Naitoki asiraki ndai enkitanapata ng'ejuk, nasipa tiatua ninye o tiatua ndai; amu etinyikaiye enaimin, neilang'isho eong'an nasipa.
Ore olojo, etii atua eong'an neiba olalashe lenye, neton etii ninye atua enaimin.
Ore olonyor olalashe lenye, nebik tiatua eong'an nemetii enkitapong'oroto atua ninye.
Ore oloiba olalashe lenye, netii ninye atua enaimin nelimana tiatua enaimin nemeyolo, enelo; amu eitamodono enaimin ngonyek enyena.
Asiraki ndai, nakera kutiti, ajo eitaikiaki ndai nkitarruot tʼolbae lʼengarna enye.
Asiraki ndai, loopapa, ajo Itayoloutuo ele lora neba tʼenkiterata. Asiraki ndai, le murran, ajo itigilutua oltorrono.

Atisiraka ndai, nakera, ajo itayoloutuo Minyi. Atisiraka ndai, loopapa, ajo itayoloutuo ele lora neba tʼenkiterata. Atisiraka ndai, le murran ajo irara ndai oogol nebik lomon lʼEngai tiatua ndai nitigilutua oltorrono.
Eminyor olmaa, baiki naatii atua olmaa. Teni enyor oltung'ani olmaa, metii enyorrata e Menye atua ninye.
Amu ntokitin pookin naatii atua olmaa: olng'warra lʼenkiring'o o olng'warra loo ngonyek o olwuasa lʼempuan, mera naaing'ua Menye, kake era naaing'ua olmaa.
Nelamuta olmaa o olng'warra lenye; kake oloitobir eyeunoto Engai, ninye lobik nkatan pookin.
Nakera kutiti, esaa enkiting'oto ena; anaa enitoning'o ndai, aajo elotu olmang'atinda le Kristos, neijia eetuo ilmang'ati le Kristos kumok. Te ina kiyolou, aajo etaa esaa enkiting'oto.
Eshomo ninje aaing'ua atua yook, kake me ilkulalang' ninje. Amu ten emut aa ninje ilkulalang', anaata etobiko te nebo o yook. Kake meata kata nemeibalunye, ajo me ilkulalang' pookin.
Eelieki ndai eilata te ilo ora Sinyati niyololo ndai mbaak pookin.
Eitu asiraki ndai anaa lemeyolo esipata, kake iyololo ninye, nintokiki aayolo, aajo meing'ua elejare esipata.
Kang'ai olalejani, leme elde omiki, ajo era Yesus ele Kristos? Naa ilo olmang'atinda le Kristos omiki Menye o Oinoti.
Ore olomiki Oinoti, netomikio si Menye; ore oloibalu Oinoti, neata si Menye.
Ore nena nitoning'o tʼenkiterata, njebik tiatua ndai. Teni ebik tiatua ndai, enitoning'o tʼenkiterata, nipuopuo aabik si ndai te nebo o Oinoti o Menye.
Naa ena enkisiligata naishoo ninye yook: empuan nemeiting'.
Kuna baak atisiraka ndai tʼolbae loo lelo oorik ndai aaitapong'oo.

Ore eelare nitang'amutua ndai te ninye, nebik tiatua ndai, nimiyeuu olekai tung'ani, peiteng'en ndai; kake enaiteng'ena ndai eelare pookin, nesipai nemetii elejare; ore anaa peiteng'ena ndai, entobik tiatua ninye.
Ore taata, nakera ainei kutiti, entobik tiatua ninye, pekiata enkiteunoto, teni eboluni ninye, nimikikurru tʼelotunoto enye.
Teni iyololo, aajo ninye supat, nintokiki aayolou, aajo ore oloitobir esupato, naa ilo etoiwuo ninye.
Eng'orai eneba enyorrata naishoo yook Papa, peipoti yook nkera Engai, nikira. Onaa meyolo yook olmaa, amu meyolo ninye.
Akae, lanyor, kira yook nkera Engai, neton eitu elioi enikipuo aaku. Kake kiyolo, aajo teni elalioi, nikipuo aaku anaa ninye, amu kipuo aadol ninye anaa petiu.
Ore pookin loataiye ninye ena anyunoto, neisuj kion anaa pera ilo loisuja.
Ore oltung'ani pookin loitobir nkitarruot, nepaashare nkitanapat, naa nkitarruot empaashata oo nkitanapat.
Niyololo, aajo etalie ninye, peitai nkitarruot ang', nemetii enkitarruoto atua ninye.
Ore oltung'ani pookin lobik tiatua ninye, nemeitarruo; ore pookin oitarruo, eitu edol neitu eyolou ninye.
Nakera kutiti, eminjo oltung'ani metoriko ndai aitapong'oo. Ore oloitobir esupato, naa supat ilo, anaa pera ninye supat.
Ore oloas enkitarruoto, naa satan eing'ua. Amu eitarruo satan neba tʼenkiterata. Te ina etalie Oinoti lʼEngai, peiminye nkitobirat e satan.
Ore pookin otoiwuoki tʼEngai, nemeitarruo, amu ebik eishoi enye te nebo o ninye; meidim ninye aitarruoi, amu etoiwuoki tʼEngai.
Too kuna baak eibalunye nkera Engai o nkera e satan: ore pookin lemeitobir esupato, nemeing'ua Engai, o ele lemenyor olalashe lenye.
Amu nyena enkinosunoto litoning'o tʼenkiterata, ajo pekinyorra aten.
Me anaa Kain, otupukuo tʼentorroni, near olalashe lenye metua. Ainyo petaara ninye metua? Tiaraki nara nkitobirat enyena torrok, kake supati nʼolalashe lenye.
Emimputukuny, lalashera lainei, teni eibai ndai olmaa.
Kiyolo yook, aajo kiima atua enkea nikijing' atua empuan, amu kinyor yook lalashera; olemenyor olalashe lenye, nebik tiatua enkea.
Ore oltung'ani pookin loibai olalashe lenye, nera olaarani oar oltung'ani metua, niyololo ndai, aajo meata olarani lʼoltung'ani empuan nemeiting' tiatua ninye nabik.
Kitayoloutuo te ina enyorrata, tiaraki naishooiye ilo oltau lenye tʼolbae lang'; meata kata nimikinjooio si yook iltauja lang' tʼolbae loo lalashera.
Ore Oloata masaa ele maa, nedol olalashe lenye loata elaunoto, neitagoloki ninye engoshoke enye nanana — kaji eiko teni ebik enyorrata Engai tiatua ninye!
Nakera kutiti, eminyor tʼororei arashu tʼolng'ejep, kake tʼenkyas o tʼesipata.
Te ina kiyolou, aajo kira lʼesipata nikindim aaitigira oltau lang' tʼengomom enye,
ore teni eigwenaki yook oltau lang', nera Engai kitok nelang' oltau lang' neyolou ntokitin pookin.
Lanyor lainei, teni meigwenaki yook oltau lang', nikiata enkiteunoto nikintoriokinore Engai,
ore enikiomonu, nikipuo aang'amu te ninye; amu kimbung' nkitanapat enyena, nikintobir, enaitiship ninye.
Naa ena enkitanapata enye, peiye kiruk engarna Oinoti lenye, Yesus Kristos, nikinyorra tʼempolos ang', anaa peishoo ninye yook enkitanapata.
Ore oloibung' nkitanapat enyena, nebik tiatua ninye o elde tiatua ninye. Te ina kiyolou yook, aajo ebik tiatua yook, tʼOlmumua oishoo ninye yook.
Lanyor lainei, emiruk ilmumuan pookin, kake entaleen ilmumuan, ten ake Engai eing'ua, amu etijing'a laiteng'enak kumok lʼelejare atua olmaa.
Meata kata nimiyolouu ndai Olmumua lʼEngai tʼena: Ore Olmumua pookin oibalu, ajo eewuo Yesus Kristos tʼosesen, naa ninye Engai eing'ua;
ore Olmumua pookin lemeibalu, ajo eewuo Yesus Kristos tʼosesen, nemeing'ua ninye Engai. Naa ele Olmumua lʼolmang'atinda le Kristos litoning'o ninye, ajo elotu, neidipa taata aeu atua olmaa.
Irara ndai l'Engai, nakera kutiti, nitigilutua lelo; amu ore oloti! atua ndai, nera kitok nelang' ele otii atua olmaa.
Naa lʼolmaa ninje, onaa elimu nʼolmaa, nening' olmaa ninje.
Kira yook lʼEngai, ore oloyolou Engai, nening' yook; ore olemeing'ua Engai, nemening' yook. Te ina kiyolou Olmumua lʼesipata o Olmumua lʼenkitapong'oroto.
Lanyor lainei, matonyorrata tiatua aten; amu ore enyorrata, Engai eing'ua, o olonyor, netoiwuoki tʼEngai neyolo Engai.
Olemenyor, nemeyolo Engai, amu era Engai enyorrata.
Etalie enyorrata Engai tiatua ena too yook, ajo eirriwaka Engai Oinoti lenye obo atua olmaa, pekipuo aaishiutu yook te ninye.
Etii enyorrata atua ena: me tiaraki nikitonyorra yook Engai, kake tiaraki natonyorra ninye yook neirriu Oinoti lenye, peaku enkitobirakinoto too nkitarruot ang'.
Lanyor, teni etonyorra yook Engai neijia, meata kata nimikinyorra si yook.
Eitu edol aikata oltung'ani o obo Engai. Teni kinyorra yook, nebik Engai tiatua yook, neitabaiyoki enyorrata enye tiatua yook.
Kiyolou tʼena, ajo kibik tiatua ninye nebik ninye tiatua yook, tiaraki naishoo ninye yook nʼOimumua lenye.
Nikitadua yook nikinjakenu, ajo eirriua Menye Oinoti lenye, peaku Olaitopuani lʼolmaa.
Ore oloibalu, ajo Oinoti lʼEngai Yesus, nebik Engai tiatua ninye, o si ninye tiatua Engai.
Nikindipa aatayolou nikiruk enyorrata naata Engai too yook. Era Engai enyorrata; ore olobik tiatua enyorrata, nebik tiatua Engai o Engai tiatua ninye.
Te ina eitabaiari enyorrata too yook, pekiata eng'idaroto tʼengolong' enkigwena; amu neijia anaa petii ninye, nikitii si yook atua ele maa.
Metii enkuretishu atua enyorrata, kake eiturraki enyorrata natabaiye enkuretishu boo, amu eata enkuretishu emion. Oloureisho, neitu ebaia tiatua enyorrata.
Matonyor yook ninye, amu ninye loitera anyor yook.
Teni ejo oltung'ani; „Anyor Engai“, neiba olalashe lenye, nera olalejani. Amu olemenyor olalashe lenye lodol — kaji eiko ten eidim ninye atonyorra Engai nemedol?
Ore ena kitanapata kiata te ninye peiye olonyor Engai, nenyorru si olalashe lenye.
Ore oltung'ani pookin loiruk Yesus, ajo ninye Kristos, etoiwuoki ninye tʼEngai. Ore oltung'ani pookin lonyor olotoiwuo ninye, nenyor baiki olotoiwuoki te ninye.
Kiyolo te ina, ajo kinyor nkera Engai, teni kinyor Engai nikintobir nkitanapat enyena.
Amu nyena enyorrata Engai, pikimbung' nkitanapat enyena, nemegol nkitanapat enyena.
Ore pookin natoiwuoki tʼEngai, negilu olmaa; nera enkirukoto ang' engilunoto natigilua olmaa.
Ang'ai lora Ologilu olmaa neme oloiruk, ajo era Yesus Oinoti lʼEngai?
Ele ninye olotu tʼengare o tʼosarge, Yesus Kristos; me tʼengare ake, kake tʼengare o tʼosarge. Naa Olmumua, oijakenu; amu era Olmumua esipata.
Amu etii okuni ooijakenu: Olmumua o engare o osarge;
netii pokira okuni atua obo.
Teni king'amu enjakenishu oo ltung'anak, nera enjakenishu Engai kitok nalang'; amu enjakenishu Engai ena naijakenuo tʼOinoti lenye.
Ore oloiruk Oinoti lʼEngai, neata ina jakenishu tiatua ninye. Ore olemeiruk Engai, neitaa ninye olalejani, amu meiruk ninye enjakenishu naijakenu Engai tʼOinoti lenye.
Naa ena enjakenishu, ajo eishoo yook Engai empuan nemeiting', netii ena puan atua Oinoti lenye.
Ore Oloata Oinoti lʼEngai, neata empuan; ore olemeata Oinoti lʼEngai, nemeata ninye empuan.
Atisiraka ndai kuna baak, piyololo, aajo iatata empuan nemeiting' nirukuruku engarna Oinoti lʼEngai.
Naa ena eng'idaroto nikiataiye ninye, teni kiomonu toki tʼeyeunoto enye, nening' ninye yook.
Teni kiyolo yook, aajo ening' yook enikiomonu, nikiyolo, aajo kiata omonot nikitoomonutuo ninye.

Teni edol oltung'ani olalashe lenye eitarruo enkitarruoto neme en enkea, njeomonoki; neaku eisho Engai empuan kulo lemeitarruo nʼenkea. Etii enkitarruoto narik enkea; eitu aliki, peomonoki oltung'ani ena.
Era mesupato pookin enkitarruoto, nemera kulie kitarruot nʼenkea.
Kiyolo yook, aajo ore olotoiwuoki tʼEngai, nemeitarruo; kake olotoiwuoki tʼEngai, nerrip kion nemeporroo ninye ele torrono.
Kiyolo yook, aajo kira lʼEngai, neton olmaa pookin tiatua entorroni.
Kake kiyolo, aajo eewuo Oinoti lʼEngai neisho yook eng'eno, pekiyolou olosipa, nikitii yook atua olosipa, atua Oinoti lenye Yesus Kristos. Ninye Engai nasipa o empuan nemeiting'.
Nakera kutiti, entorrip aten too nkulie ain. Amen.
Olpaiyan osiraki eng'oroyoni nategeluaki o nkera enyena, nanyor tiatua esipata, neme nanu ake, kake enyor si kulo pookin ootayoloutuo esipata,
tʼolbae lʼesipata nabik tiatua yook nelabik te nebo o yook nkatan pookin:
Njeboitare ndai eng'adunoto o enkordunoto o eseriani naing'ua Engai Papa o Olaitoriani Yesus Kristos, Oinoti le Papa, tiatua esipata o enyorrata.
Ating'ide naleng', tiaraki nainoto too nkera inono kulie, naalimana tiatua esipata, anaa kitang'amutua enkitanapata e Papa.
Onaa, aasai iye taata, nakitok, me anaa aasiraki iye enkitanapata ng'ejuk, kake ina nikiata tʼenkiterata, pekinyorra.
Naa ena enyorrata, pekilimana anaa peyeu enkitanapata enye; nyena enkitanapata, anaa pitoning'o tʼenkiterata, peiye ilimanarere ina.
Amu kumok lalejak ooetuo atua olmaa, lemeibalu Yesus Kristos, aajo eewuo tʼenkiringʼo. Ninye olalejani, naa olmang'atinda le Kristos.
Entaduai ndai aten, pemiiminyenye kunda nikintobira, kake pikitum olkwaje olulung'a.
Ore pookin opaash nemebik tiatua enkiteng'enare e Kristos, nemeata ninye Engai. Ore olobik tiatua enkiteng'enare e Kristos, neata pokira are, Papa o Oinoti.
Teni elotu oltung'ani atua ndai nemeau ena kiteng'enare, eminjo ejing' engaji inyi ana irorokiki.
Amu ore oloiroroki ninye, neng'arie nkitobirat enyena torrok.
Aata ntokitin kumok nayeu nasiraki ndai, nemayeu nasiraki tʼenkaratasi arashu tʼerokan, kake aanyu metabana nalotu enitiiti ndai, airorie tʼenkutuk, peborei eng'ida inyi.
Kiroroki iye nkera enganashe ino nategeluaki. Amen.
Olpaiyan osiraki Gayos, oljore lai, lanyor tiatua esipata.
Olanyor lai, aayeuoki iye piserian tiatua mbaak pookin niata embiotishu, neijia anaa peserian Olmumua lino.
Atishipe naleng', pepuonu lalashera aaijakenu esipata ino, anaa pilimana tiatua esipata.
Maata ai ng'ida kitok nalang' ena, teni atoning'o mbaak oo nkera ainei naapuoiye esipata.
Olanyor lai, iasita tʼesupato tʼentoki pookin nintobiraki lalashera o lelo oora lomon,
ooijakenutuo enyorrata ino tʼengomom esirit; nintoki aas sidan, teni irriwaa ninje eitobirakinote osupatei tʼengomom Engai.
Amu etupukutuo ninje tʼolbae lʼengarna enye nemeng'amu toki too lemeata Engai.
Onaa, meata kata nemeking'amu lootiu anaa lelo, pekiaku te nebo o ninje laitobirak lʼena sipata.
Atisiraka esirit; kake ore Diotrefe, oyeu neaku olkitok too ninje, eitu eng'amu yook.

Onaa, teni alotu, ayeu naitadamu ninye nkitobirat naaitobir, amu eimaki yook too rorei torrok. Nemebaiki ina ake, kake meng'amu ninye lalashera, nemitiki lelo ooyeu neng'amu ninje, neitoki aitai tʼesirit.
Olanyor lai, misuj entorroni, kake esupato. Oloitobir esupato, neing'ua Engai.
Eata Demetrios enjakenishu oltung'ani pookin o en esipata, nikinjakenu si yook; niyolo iye enjakenishu ang' ajo esipa.
Aata mbaak kumok nayeu naasiraki, kake mayeu naasiraki iye tʼerokan o tʼenjata nasirishoreki.
Kake aanyu, ajo aadol iye asioki, nikiro yook too nkutukie.
Njoo kibikie eseriani. Kiroroki iye iljorueta. Roroki iljorueta too ngam enye.
Yudas, osinga le Yesus Kristos, olalashe le Yakobos: too lelo ooipotoki, loonyorri tiatua Engai Papa lang', nerripi tiatua Yesus Kristos.
Njeponari enkordunoto o eseriani o enyorrata too ndai.
Lanyor lainei, ore pashilaa naleng' asiraki ndai tʼolbae lʼenkitopuata ang' niking'ar, nemeata kata namadiding' ndai, peiye iaparere aamitu enkirukoto, naishooki nabo kata sinyat.

Amu etii kulekai tung'anak ooetuo aaisudunye, naa ninje ootisirieki neba opa ena kigwena, ajo era ninje lemeure Engai, neibelekeny eng'adunoto Engai eas entorroni, nemiki Engai, Olkitok obo, o Olaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos.
Kake ayeu naitadamu ndai, oo ten aa iyololo mbaak pookin, ajo ore ena kata nabo eitopua Olaitoriani olorere aitungʼua olosho le Misri, near enkata e are kulo leitu eiruk.
Eibooko ninye baiki ilmalaikan leitu ebik tiatua enkitoria enye openy, kake lootung'aitie entonata enye, enkigwena engolong' kitok, peen ninje too ienat oo nkatan pookin tiabori enaimin.
Neijia si Sodom o Gomora o ngang'itie naataanikino, naataasa mbaak torrok oo nkiri nesuj engai kiring'o, eitaaki ninje enkiteng'enet, petum enkisiloto enkima oo nkatan pookin.
Neijia etiu si kulo aidetidetak oopik eng'iring'o ntibil, neany enkitoria, nemor looata enkitook.
Kake ore Mikael, ele malaika kitok, peishangarra o satan neirorie tʼolbae lʼosesen le Mose, nemeiteu atudung'o enkigwena emoroto shumata enye, kake etejo: Njoo kilaaki Olaitoriani!
Kake ore lelo oomor pookin nemeyolo; ore enayolou ninje tʼempukunoto enye anaa ng'wesi nemeata eng'eno, te ina erruoio.
Kake aiya ninje, amu esujita ninje engoitoi e Kain, nebatatakino enkitapong'oroto e Bileam tʼolbae lʼendupoto, neimin tʼenkiposhiposharoto e Kora.

Naa ninje ooata empiani too ndaikin enyorrata inyi, neinosisho meureisho, neitoti aten, netiu ninje anaa ng'atambo nemeata engare naanap ilkutat, nera iljanito oorony lukuny lemeata ilmomo, ootuata kat are, nedotuni too ntonat,
naa ninje anaa lopir pushunot lʼenaiposha ooiponyu enkurruna enye oopeny, lakir oopuaiya, ooitaanyaki erokan enaimin oo nkatan pookin.
Kake eibonishe si too lootiu nji Henok, ole opishana neba Adam, nejo: Ng'orai, elotu Olaitoriani te nebo o iip tomon kumok oo sinyat lenyena,
peigwenaki pookin neitalak lemeure Engai pookin tʼolbae loo nkitobirat pookin orregie lenye torrono naaitarruoitie o tʼolbae loo mbaak naagol pookin naaimakitia laitarruok torrok ninye.
Naa kulo ninje ooing'unyung'uny neishir oshi ake, nelimana too lng'warraitin lenye, neiro nkutukie enye mbaak sapuki olwuasa, nenyorraki aten too ltung'anak tʼolbae lʼendupoto ele maa.
Kake ore ndai, lanyor lainei, entadamutu kulo rorei ootang'asa aalimu lairriwak lʼOlaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos,
enetiakitia ndai, aajo tʼenkata enkiting'oto epuo aatii lamorok oolimana too lng'warraitin lʼorregie lenye torrono.
Naa kulo ooau rishat nesuj mbaak osesen, nemeata nʼolmumua.
Kake ore ndai, lanyor lainei, enteshetakinoto enkirukoto inyi sinyati naleng' tiatua Olmumua Sinyati, nisaishosho,
nirripirripi aten tiatua enyorrata Engai, nianyunyu enkordunoto Olaitoriani lang' Yesus Kristos narik atua empuan nemeiting'.
O kulekai looing'arrirro, eng'urrie, o kulekai, entopua iwuapupu ninje tiatua enkima, ning'urrierrie kulekai tʼeuriata; nimbaii si olkila otipikaki oloirerio lʼenkiringʼo.
Ore ninye naidim atorripo ndai, miatata entibili, neitasheye ndai tʼengomom enkitook enye, miatata eleyata, tʼeng'ida kitok,
naa ninye Engai nabo, Olaitopuani lang' te Yesus Kristos, Olaitoriani lang': njeishori ninye enkitook o emagilanishu o engolon o enkidimata taata oo metabaiki nkatan pookin. Amen.
Embolunoto e Yesus Kristos naishoo Engai ninye meitadua singan lenyena mbaak nemeata kata nemeaku aasioki, neutaki neirriwaki tʼolmalaika lenye osinga lenye Yohanes,
oijakenuo ororei lʼEngai o enjakenishu e Yesus Kristos natadua.
Teshi oloisoma o looning' ororei lʼenkitayolounoto nerrip enatisira tiatua; amu etinyikua enkata.

Yohanes: too kuna sirito naapishana naatii Asia. Njebik eng'adunoto te nebo o ndai o eseriani naing'ua ilo otii taata, naa ninye opa otii, naa ninye olotu, neing'ua kulo mumuan oopishana ootii tʼengomom olorika lenye,
neing'ua Yesus Kristos lora oljakeni supat o olkikau loo lootuata o olkitok loo lkarsisi tʼenkop. Ninye otonyorra yook neisuj yook too nkitarruot tʼosarge lenye,
neitaa yook ilkarsisi o laidasak tʼengomom Engai o Menye lenye, oishori enkitook o engolon nkatan pookin o nkatan pookin. Amen.
Ng'orai, elotu too ng'atambo e shumata, nepuo aadol ninye ngonyek pookin o lootaremo ninye; nepuo aaishir tʼolbae lenye njomito pookin enkop. Ee, esai!
Ara nanu A o O, ejo Olaitoriani Engai otii taata, naa ninye opa otii, naa ninye olotu, tʼengolon pookin.

Nanu Yohanes, lora si olalashe linyi ong'arie ndai osina o enkarsishu o olng'iria le Yesus Kristos, atii napari oloigeruno lʼenaiposha oji Patmos, tʼolbae lʼororei lʼEngai o lʼenjakenishu e Yesus Kristos.
Natii atua Olmumua tʼengolong' Olaitoriani naning' tekurum ai oltoilo sapuk laijo ol emowuo,

ojo: Ara nanu A o O, ol enkiterata o ol enkiting'oto: Tisira nena nidolita tiatua enkitabu nirriwaki nekua sirito naapishana naatii Asia, atua Efesos o Smirna o Pergamos o Tiatira o Sardes o Filadelfia o Laodikea.
Nashuko nanu, ajo paing'oraa ilo toilo laairorie. Ore paidip atushukoi, nadol nkilang'eta naapishana e sahabu,
o tʼempolos oo nekua kilang'eta naapishana obo, onyanyukie Oinoti lʼoltung'ani, oishopo olkila oado, nerretena enkimeita e sahabu olgoo lenye.
Ore elukunya o ilpapit lenyena neibor anaa enaileri naibor, anaa esiret, netiu ngonyek anaa ilng'ejepa lʼenkima.
Netiu nkejek enyena anaa suia ooika tʼenkima, naijo oltoilo lenye oloo ngariak kituak;
neata lakir oopishana tʼengaina enye e tatene, nepuku tʼenkutuk enye olalem opi ngaloli pokira are, neilang'isho engomom enye anaa engolong' nailiil.
Ore padol ninye, nabatata too nkejek enyena anaa olotua; naaiteleiki ninye engaina enye e tatene, naajoki: Miureisho, ara nanu ol enkiterata o ol enkiting'oto
o oloishiu. Ataa olotua, o ng'orai, aishiu nkatan pookin o nkatan pookin naata ieneta enkea o ine wueji enkima.
Tisira naa kuna baak nitadua, o naatii o naapuo aaku akenya.

Ore emikio oo lelo akir oopishana litadua t'engaina ai e tatene o nena kilang'eta naapishana e sahabu: Ore lakir oopishana, naa ilmalaikan loo sirito naapishana; ore nkilang'eta naapishana nitadua, naa sirito naapishana.
Tisiraki olmalaika lʼesirit natii atua Efesos: Kuna ejo oloibung'ita kulo akir oopishana te tatene enye, olimana tʼempolos oo kuna kilang'eta e sahabu naapishana:
Ayolo nkitobirat inono o enkyas ino o olng'iria lino, nimindim atanapa iltung'anak torrok, nitetema kulo ooipot aten lairriwak, nemera ninje, nitadua si ajo lalejak;
niata olng'iria ninyok tʼolbae lʼengarna ai, neitu inauru.
Kake aataiye embae nabo, ajo itung'aiye enyorrata elukunya.
Tadamu, kaji itusulari, taalai nintobir nkitobirat enkiterata! Teni me, nalotu asioki enitii naoshoo enkilang'et ino tʼewueji enye, teni miala.
Kake iata ele rorei, ajo imbai nkitobirat oo Lnikolaitin, naibai si nanu.
Oloata enkiyok, njening enajoki Olmumua sirito. Ologilu, naisho ninye meinosa tʼoljani lʼempuan otii atua emparadis Engai.
Tisiraki olmalaika lʼesirit natii atua Smirna: Kuna ejo ol enkiterata o ol enkiting'oto, otaa olotua neitoki apiu:
Ayolo nkitobirat inono o osina lino o esinaishu ino — kake ira iye oladupani — o emoroto oo looipot aten Yudayoi, nemera, kake era lʼesirit e satan.

Miurei nikipuoi aaisilie! Ng'orai, elanang'aki satan kulekai linyi engaji eenata, peleeni ndai, nipuopuo aata enkisiloto ngolong'i tomon. Taa airukoni metabaiki enkea, naalaisho iye enkaja enkitook empuan.
Oloata enkiyok, njening' enajoki Olmumua sirito. Ologilu, nemeinosie enkea e are ninye osina.
Tisiraki olmalaika lʼesirit natii atua Pergamos: Kuna ejo Oloata olalem opi ngaloli pokira are:
Ayolo enintobir o ewueji enimanya, enetii olorika le satan. Nimbung' engarna ai neitu imiki enkirukoto ai baiki too nena olong'i naataarieki metua Antipas, oljakeni lai supat, too ndai, enetii satan.

Kake aataiye nkuti baak, amu iata iltung'anak ooibung'a enkiteng'enare e Bileam oigwena Balak, peuni enkitadiata tʼengomom oo nkera Israel, ajo meinosa nkiri oo nkidasareitin naateyeng'akaki nkulie ain neas mbaak torrok oo nkiri.
Niata si iye kulekai ooibung'a enkiteng'enare oo Lnikolaitin; aiba ina.
Taalai! Teni me, nalotu asioki enitii, naarare ninje tʼolalem lʼenkutuk ai.

Oloata enkiyok, njening' enajoki Olmumua sirito. Ologilu, naisho ninye meinosa mana naisudori, naisho ninye osoit oibor netisiraki shumata ele soit engarna ng'ejuk nemeyolo oltung'ani neme ilo ong'amu ninye.
Tisiraki olmalaika lʼesirit natii atua Tiatira: Kuna ejo Oinoti lʼEngai oata ngonyek anaa ilng'ejepa lʼenkima netiu nkejek enyena anaa suia:
Ayolo nkitobirat inono o enyorrata ino o enkirukoto ino o enkisyayare ino o olng'iria lino, nayolo, ajo etalang'a nkitobirat inono enkiting'oto nena enkiterata.

Kake aataiye embae nabo, tiaraki ninjo ena ng'oroyoni Isebel naipot kion engayolounoni, eiteng'en neitapong'oo singan lainei, peitobir mbaak entalare nenya nkiri oo nkidasareitin naateyeng'akaki nkulie ain.
Naishoo ninye enkata naalare tʼolbae lʼentalare enye; nemeala.
Ng'orai, anang'aki ninye atua erruat, o kulo ootaara te nebo o ninye enkidikidikoto enkiama, atua osina kitok, teni meala tʼolbae loo nkitobirat enye,
naar nkera enyena metuata, peyolou sirito pookin, aajo nanu oleen lairakuji o iltauja; naisho oltung'ani pookin too ndai tʼerisioroto oo nkitobirat inyi.
Naliki ndai ilkulekai ootii Tiatira lemeata enkiteng'enare naijo ena, neitu eyolou ngasurin e satan (anaa pejo): Manang'aki shumata inyi olekai rridati.
Kake eniatata, embung'a, metabana nalotu.
Ologilu nerrip nkitobirat ainei metabaiki enkiting'oto, naisho ninye engolon, peitore ninye lemeata Engai,
neirrita ninje tʼeng'udi esekengei nedany anaa motiok esarng'ab,
anaa enatang'amua si nanu te Papa; naisho ninye olakira lʼengakenya.
Oloata enkiyok, njening' enajoki Olmumua sirito.
Tisiraki olmalaika lʼesirit natii atua Sardes: Kuna ejo Oloata ilmumuan oopishana lʼEngai o lakir oopishana: Ayolo nkitobirat inono, amu iata engarna ajo injiu, nitua iye.
Topiu nintagol nkulie naataa ee. Amu eitu adol nkitobirat inono etabaitie tʼengomom Engai.
Onaa, tadamu enitang'amua nitoning'o, torripo taalai! Teni minjololo, nalotu shumata ino anaa olapurroni, nimiyolo ina saa nalotunye enitii.
Kake iata kulie arn te Sardes neitu epik oloirerio nkilani enye; nepuo ninje aalimana te nebo o nanu, amu eaku too ninje;
Ologilu, nemeata kata nemeishopokini ilkilani ooibor, namajut nanu engarna enye tʼenkitabu empuan, nayeu naibalu engarna enye tʼengomom e Papa lai o ilmalaikan lenyena.
Oloata engiyok, njening' enajoki Olmumua sirito.
Tisiraki olmalaika lʼesirit natii atua Filadelfia: Kuna ejo ele Sinyati olosipa, oata eenet e David, obolu nemetii oigen, oloigenoo nemetii obolu:
Ayolo nkitobirat inono. Ng'orai, aishoo tʼengomom ino kutukaji nabolo, nemetii oloidim aigeno; amu iata iye enkiti golon, nimbung'a ororei lai neitu imiki engarna ai.
Ng'orai, aisho kulekai loora lʼolturrur le satan oojo aten Yudayoi, nemera, kake elejisho; ng'orai, aau ninje, pepuonu nebatatakino nkejek inono neyolou, aajo aatonyorra iye.
Tiaraki nitorripo ororei lʼolng'iria lai, nayeu naarrip si iye te saa enkitasuroto nalotu shumata olmaa pookin, peitasuri loomanya tʼenkop.
Ng'orai, alotu asioki; mbung'a akurraki ina niata, pemea o obo enkaja enkitook ino.

Ologilu, naitaa ninye eng'apet engaji Engai ai, nemeitoki ninye apuku tukul, nasir shumata enye engarna Engai ai o engarna e Yerusalem ng'ejuk nara engang' Engai ai nadou aing'ua shumata o Engai ai, o engarna ai ng'ejuk.
Oloata engiyok, njening' enajoki Olmumua sirito.
Tisiraki olmalaika lʼesirit natii atua Laodikea: Kuna ejo ele oji Amen, ele jakeni supat osipa, laa ninye enkiterata enkitobirata Engai:
Ayolo nkitobirat inono, ajo mirobi nimirowua. Oi, ten emut irobi arashu irowua!
Kake tiaraki nimololong' ake, mirowua nimirobi, naanotaa iye aitung'ua enkutuk ai.
Amu ijo iye: ara oladupani, ataraposhe tukul namalau toki; kake miyolo, ajo iata enkurruna o leyat, nira aisinani o modooni niminjopo.

Aaigwen iye, wou enatii nanu, nyang'u sahabu natiikaki tʼenkima, pidupore, o ilkilani ooibor Enjopo, pemelioi enkurruna ino, tiaraki niminjopo; nyang'u eilata oo ngonyek aelie ngonyek inono, pitum atadolishoi.
Ore kulo lanyor, naitame naar; onaa, tonyua niala.
Ng'orai, aitashe te kutukaji, aoshiosh. Oloning' oltoilo lai nebol kutukaji, nalotu atua ainos endaa te nebo o ninye, o ninye te nebo o nanu.
Ologilu, naisho ninye, peton te nebo o nanu tʼolorika lai lʼenkigwena, anaa patigilua nanu naton te nebo o Papa tʼolorika lʼenkigwena lenye.
Oloata engiyok, njening' enajoki Olmumua sirito.

Ore peidipai kuna baak, nadol kutukaji natabole te shumata. Ore oltoilo lʼenkiterata latoning'o, netiu anaa oltoilo lʼemowuo laairorie nanu nejo: lepu ene, naaitadol iye mbaak nemeata kata nemeaku akenya.
Ore nabo kata natii tʼolmumua. Naa ng'orai, etipikaki te shumata olorika lʼenkitoria netii obo otonita ilo orika.
Ore olotonita, neya tʼeng'or anaa osoit yaspis o sarder, nemanita olakira Ai olorika lʼenkitoria otiu anaa smaragid.

Netii si kulekai orikan tikitam o ong'wan oomanita ilo orika, natadua too lelo orikan ilpaiyani tikitam o ong'wan ootonita, ooishopokoki ilkilani ooibor, neata shumata oo lukuny enye ilkarandan lʼenkitoria le sahabu.
Nepuku tiatua olorika lʼenkitoria nkiwang'at o nkikurrukurrot o iltoiloi, netii nkilang'eta naapishana naaiwuwu tʼengomom olorika, naa ninje ilmumuan oopishana lʼEngai.
Netii engomom olorika enaiposha e bilauri nailiil anaa kristal; ore tʼempolos olorika lʼenkitoria o mbat, nemanita ng'wesi ong'wan naabore ngonyek tʼengomom o tekurum.

Ore ena ng'wes elukunya, netiu anaa olng'atuny, ore engai ng'wes e are, netiu anaa olashe, ore eng'wes e uni, neata engomom anaa oltung'ani, ore eng'wes e ong'wan, netiu anaa olkelerua oipirri te shumata.

Neata eng'wes pookin too kuna ong'wan naipuko ile, nebore ninje oriong' o tiatua ngonyek, nemeeng'ieng'a dama o kiarie ejo: Sinyati, sinyati, sinyati Engai Olaitoriani, tʼengolon pookin, otii opa, netii taata, naa ninye olotu!
Ore peaki ng'wesin enkitadararoto o enkitook o ashe ilo otonita olorika lʼenkitoria neishiu nkatan pookin o nkatan pookin,
nebatatakino kulo paiyani tikitam o ong'wan ilo oton tʼolorika neserem oloishiu nkatan pookin o nkatan pookin, nenang' ilkarandan lʼenkitoria lenye tʼengomom olorika nejo:
Eaku, Olaitoriani o Engai ang', ping'amu enkitook o enganyit o engolon; amu iye oitobira ntokitin pookin, ore tʼolbae lʼeyeunoto ino, peitobiraki.
Nadol tʼengaina e tatene e ilo oton tʼolorika lʼenkitoria enkitabu nasira atua o oriong', nateenaki too lmishiren oopishana.
Nadol olmalaika ogol, eipotisho tʼoltoilo kitok ajo: Kang'ai oaku, pebolu enkitabu negil ilmishiren lenyena?
Neaku metii te shumata ana tʼenkop ana tiabori enkop oloidim atabolu enkitabu arashu aing'orai.
Naishir naleng', tiaraki neitu etumi oloaku, pebol enkitabu aisoma ana aing'oraa.
Naajoki obo too lelo paiyani: minjir! Ng'orai, etigilua olng'atuny lora lʼenkishomi e Yuda, entonata e David, abolu enkitabu negil ilmishiren lenyena oopishana.

Naitoki adol tʼempolos olorika lʼenkitoria o ng'wesin ong'wan o ilpaiyani embalelo eitashe tʼempolos, natiu anaa eteyeng'aki, neata mowuarak naapishana o ngonyek naapishana, naa ninje ilmumuan oopishana lʼEngai ooirriwakaki enkop pookin.
Nelotu nea enkitabu tʼengaina e tatene e ilo oton tʼolorika.

Ore peidip ninye aibung'a enkitabu, nebatatakino ng'wesi ong'wan o ilpaiyani tikitam o ong'wan tʼengomom embalelo, eata pookin engauo oo singolioitin o ngirran e sahabu naabore loirienito, nera ninje sayat oo sinyat,

nerany Osingolio ng'ejuk ejo: Kitumoki iye, pimbung' enkitabu nigil ilmishiren lenyena; amu kiteyeng'aki, ninyang'aki yook Engai t'osarge lino aitung'ua enkishomi pookin o enkutuk o olosho o olorere pookin,
nintaaki yook Engai ilkarsisi o laidasak nikipuo aaku looitorisho tʼenkop.
Nadol nanu naning' oltoilo loo lmalaikan kumok oomanita olorika lʼenkitoria o ng'wesin o ilpaiyani, naa ore esiana iip tomon kat iip tomon kumok naleng',
nejo tʼoltoilo kitok: Eaku peng'amu embalelo nateyeng'aki, engolon o endupai o eng'eno o enkidimata o enganyit o enkitook o emayani.

Ore enkitobirata pookin natii shumata o enkop o abori enkop o enaiposha o pookin naatii atua, naning' pookin ejo: Njeata ilo oton tʼolorika lʼenkitoria o embalelo, emayani o enganyit o enkitook o engolon nkatan pookin o nkatan pookin.
Nejo ng'wesi ong'wan: Amen! Nebatata ilpaiyani tikitam o ong'wan neserem ilo oishiu metabaiki nkatan pookin o nkatan pookin.
Nadol embalelo ebolu obo loo lelo mishiren oopishana; naning' nabo oo nena ng'wesi ong'wan ejo anaa tʼoltoilo lʼendarata: Wou!
Nadol, ng'orai, embarta naibor. Ore ilo okedito, neata engauo; neishori olkaranda lʼenkitoria, nepuku egilunore, o petum engilunoto.
Ore pegil olekai mishire, naning' engai ng'wes ejo: Wou!
Neitoki engai barta, nanyokie apuku; ore olokedito, neishooki ninye engolon naitainye eseriani tʼenkop, metarakinoto ninje aten; neishooki ninye olalem kitok.
Ore pegil ilo mishire li okuni, naning' ina ng'wes e uni ejo: Wou! Nadol nanu, ng'orai, embarta narok; ore olokedito, neata ninye entemet tʼengaina enye.
Naning' oltoilo tiatua nena ng'wesi ong'wan ejo: Ore enkibaba engano naibor tʼengosholai nabo, ore nkibabani uni oo lmoya too ngoshola are; nimishoroo ina ilata o enaisho.
Ore pegil olmishire li ong'wan, naning' oltoilo lʼeng'wes e ong'wan ojo: Wou!

Nadol, ng'orai, embarta pukoti; ore olokedito ninye, neji enkea, nesuj ninye ewueji oo lootuata. Neishori ninje engolon, pear ematua e ong'wan enkop metua tʼolalem o tʼolamei o tʼenkea o too lowuarak lʼenkop.
Ore pegil olmishire le imiet, nadol tiabori olperere tʼenkidasare iltauja loo lelo ootaraki tʼolbae lʼororei lʼEngai o lʼenjakenishu naata,
neishir ninje tʼoltoilo kitok nejo: Metabaiki anu ianyu, iye, Laitoriani sinyati osipa, nimingwenaki nintalaku osarge lang' too lelo oomanya tʼenkop?
Neishori pooki obo too ninje olkila oibor, nejokini ninje meeng'ieng'ata enkiti kata, metabana neitabaiari lelo shorueta lenye o lalashera lenye, lemeata kata nemeari si anaa ninje opa.
Ore pegil olmishire le ile, ng'orai, neaku enkikirikirata kitok enkop, neroku engolong' anaa olgunia loo lpapit, o olapa anaa osarge;
nedoiki lakir le shumata enkop, neijia, anaa peraru olng'aboli ilng'abolo lenyena, teni eipiripir ninye olkutati kitok.
Neiwang'ieki shumata anaa enkitabu nairinaki; neidurrieki ildonyo o looigeruno pookin tʼewueji enye.
Ore ilkarsisi lʼenkop o ilkituak o ladupak o singan o loolakuno pookin, neisudori tiatua ngapunia o soito loo ldonyo
nejoki ildonyo o soito: Entuurokinoto shumata ang' niopoopo yook tʼengomom e ilo oton tʼolorika lʼenkitoria o tʼengomom engoro embalelo.
Amu etabaua engolong' kitok engoro enye; naa ang'ai oidim aitasho?
Ore tekurum oo nena, nadol ilmalaikan ong'wan ooitashe too nkutot pokira ong'wan enkop, eibooio ilkutat ong'wan lʼenkop, pemekutisho olkutati tʼenkop ana tʼenaiposha ana tʼoljani hoo obo.
Nadol olekai malaika eilepu tʼenkilepunoto engolong', oata olmishiret lʼEngai naishiu, nebuaki tʼoltoilo kitok kulo malaikan ong'wan ooishooki, peitame enkop o enaiposha,
ajoki: Emintame enkop arashu enaiposha arashu ilkeek, metabana nikipik singan lʼEngai ang' olmishire too nkirribon enye.
Naning' esiana oo kulo ootipikaki olmishire: naa elfun iip o artam o ong'wan ooing'ua njomito pookin oo nkera Israel.
Ore tʼenkishomi e Yuda, naa elfun tomon o are ootimishiraki; ore tʼenkishomi e Ruben, naa elfun tomon o are ootimishiraki; ore tʼenkishomi e Gad, naa elfun tomon o are ootimishiraki;
ore tʼenkishomi e Aser, naa elfun tomon o are ootinaishiraki; ore lʼenkishomi e Naftali, naa elfun tomon o are ootimishiraki; ore tʼenkishomi e Manase, naa elfun tomon o are ootimishiraki;
ore tʼenkishomi e Simeon, naa elfun tomon o are ootimishiraki; ore tʼenkishomi e Levi, naa elfun tomon o are ootimishiraki; ore tʼenkishomi e Isashar, naa elfun tomon o are ootimishiraki;
ore tʼenkishomi e Sebulon, naa elfun tomon o are ootimishiraki; ore tʼenkishomi e Yosef, naa elfun tomon o are ootimishiraki; ore tʼenkishomi e Benyamin, na elfun tomon o are ootimishiraki.

Ore tekurum oo kuna nadol, ng'orai, esiamu kitok nemeidim o obo aikena, ooing'ua loreren pookin o njomito o loshon o nkutukie pookin, eitashe tʼengomom olorika lʼenkitoria o tʼengomom embalelo, eishopokoki ilkilani ooibor, neata ilng'osil loo ltuka too ngaik enye,
nedar tʼoltoilo kitok ejo: En Engai ang' naton shumata olorika lʼenkito ria, enkitopuata o nʼembalelo!
Neitashe ilmalaikan pookin aaman olorika lʼenkitoria, o ilpaiyani o ng'wesin ong'wan, nebatata neijululokino engomom olorika lʼenkitoria neserem Engai
ejo: Amen, ore emayani o enkitook o eng'eno o elikinoto e ashe o enkitaaroto enkitook o enkidimata o engolon, njeaku nʼEngai ang' metabaiki nkatan pookin o nkatan pookin! Amen!
Nealu obo too lpaiyani naajoki: Kakua kulo ooishopokoki ilkilani ooibor? Kaji eing'ua?
Najoki nanu ninye: Laitoriani lai, iyolo iye. Naajoki ninye nanu: Era kulo looing'ua atua osina kitok, neisuj ilkilani lenye neiborrie ninje tʼosarge lʼembalelo.
Onaa, etii ninje engomom olorika lʼenkitoria lʼEngai neisyayaki ninye dama o kiarie tiatua engaji enye; ore oloton te shumata olorika lʼenkitoria, nemany shumata enye.
Nemeitoki aapuo aatum olamei arashu enkure, nemeitoki aadoiki ninje engolong' arashu eikai pookin;
amu elairrita ninje embalelo natii empolos olorika lʼenkitoria, nerikoki ninje ngonyek oo ngariak naaishiu; nelajut Engai ilkiyo pookin too ngonyek enye.
Ore pegil olmishire le opishana, negira shumata anaa enusu saa.
Nadol kulo malaikan oopishana ooitashe tʼengomom Engai, neishori ninje mowuarak naapishana.

Nepuku olekai malaika aitashe tʼengomom olperere lʼenkidasare, neata emoti nairishoreki e sahabu, neishori loirienito kumok, peponiki sayat oo sinyat shumata olperere lʼesahabu otii engomom olorika lʼenkitoria.
Neilep empuruo oo loirienito lʼesayata oo sinyat tʼengaina olmalaika abaiki Engai.
Nedumu olmalaika emoti nairishoreki neigany tʼenkima olperere nebukoki enkop. Neaku endarata o iltoiloi o nkiwang'at o nkikirikirat.
Ore lelo malaikan oopishana ooata mowuarak, neitobir peosh.
Neosh olmalaika lʼelukunya emowuo, nepuku soito lʼenjan o enkima etushulare osarge, nedoiki enkop; nepejo ematua e uni enkop, nepejo ematua e uni oo ljanito, nepejo nkujit naanyori pookin.
Neitoki aosh olmalaika le are emowuo; nelotu anaa oldonyo kitok oiwuwu tʼenkima, nenang'akini atua enaiposha; neaku ematua e uni enaiposha osarge,
nee ematua e uni oo ng'wesi naaishiu naatii enaiposha, neiminyeki ematua e uni oo meilini.
Neitoki aosh olmalaika li okuni emowuo; nedou olakira sapuk aing'ua shumata oiwuwu anaa enkilang'et nedoiki ematua e uni oo wuason o noo ljorroi.
Neji engarna e ilo akira olkurto lʼentim, neaku ematua e uni oo ngariak olkurto lʼentim, neeye iltung'anak kumok engare, amu eitaduaraki naleng'.

Neitoki aosh olmalaika le ong'wan emowuo, near ematua e uni engolong' o ematua e uni olapa o ematua e uni oo lakir, pepiki ematua enye e uni enaimin, nemeitoki ematua e uni endama awang'u, naa neijia si etiu enkiarie.

Nadol, naning' olmalaika obo oipirri te shumata ejo tʼoltoilo sapuk: Ee, kake aiya, aiya, aiya, ndai loomanya tʼenkop, tʼolbae loo lkulekai toiloi leton eng'or loo lmalaikan okuni ooitoki aaosh emowuo.
Neosh olmalaika le imiet emowuo; nadol olakira oing'ua shumata, nedoiki enkop, neishooki ninye embolet engumoto easuroto,
nebol ninye ena gumoto easuroto, nepuku empuruo tʼengumoto ailep shumata, netiu empuruo anaa en engaji empejoto sapuk, neigany enaimin engolong' o shumata tʼempuruo naing'ua ena gumoto.
Nepuku ilmaat tiatua empuruo aapuo shumata enkop; neishooki ninje engolon anaa peata nkulupan engolon tʼenkop.
Nejokini ninje: emiony nkujit tʼenkop, arashu entoki nanyori, arashu oljani, kake iltung'anak ake lemeata olmishire lʼEngai too nkirribon enye.
Neishooki ninje, pemeony metuata, kake peitame ninje lapaitin imiet; neaku emion enye anaa emion ten eony enkulupa oltung'ani.
Ore too nona olong'i nepuo aaing'oru iltung'anak enkea, neilany enkea ninje.
Netiu kulo maat anaa mbartan naaitobiraki aapuo enjore; neata too lukuny enye ilkarandan anaa lʼesahabu, netiu ngomomi enye anaa ngomomi oo ltung'anak,
neata ilpapit anaa ng'oroyok, netiu lala lenye anaa lala loo lng'atunyo,
neata enkishopoto anaa olkila lʼesekengei, ore oltoilo loo naipuko enye anaa en oo lgarrin ooyetita mbartan kumok naapuo enjore;
neata ilkidong'o anaa loo nkulupan o onyeta too lkidong'o, neishooki engolon, peony iltung'anak lapaitin imiet;
neata ninje olkarsis lenye, laa olmalaika lʼengumoto easuroto, neji engarna enye tʼenkutuk oo Lhebrayoi Abadon, neji tʼen oo Lgrikini Apolion.
Eidipa osina lʼenkiterata atulusoi; ng'orai, epon epuonu sinaitin aare tekurum.
Neosh olmalaika le ile emowuo; naning' oltoilo eing'ua nkutot ong'wan olperere lʼenkidasare lʼesahabu otii engomom Engai,
nejoki olmalaika le ile oata emowuo: Talaku ilmalaikan ong'wan ooteenaki tʼolkeju kitok Farati.
Nelakuni kulo malaikan ong'wan, ooitobirakinore esaa o engolong' o olapa o olari, pear metuata ematua e uni oo ltung'anak.
Ore esiana enjore nakedito mbartan, naa elfun kat elfun kumok; naning' esiana enye,

nadol neijia mbartan tʼenduaroto, o lelo ookedito, eata ilkilani lʼesekengei laaijo lʼenkima o loo pusi soito o loo nkibiritini. Ore lukuny oo mbartan, netiu anaa lukuny oo lng'atunyo, nepuku too nkutukie enye enkima o emburuo o enkibiriti.
Nearieki ematua e uni oo ltung'anak too kuna tabo pokirauni, tʼenkima o tʼempuruo o tʼenkibiriti, naapuku too nkutukie enye.
Amu ore engolon oo mbartan, naa en oo nkutukie o noo lkidong'o; netiu ilkidong'o lenye anaa lasuria ooata lukuny neonyisho too ninje.

Ore iltung'anak ootelekutua too nona tabo, neitu eala aapal nkitobirat oo ngaik enye, pemeitoki aasai ilmeneng'a o muain naaitobiraki te sahabu o tʼengosholai o tʼosuiai o too soito o too nkeek, nemedolisho nemening'isho nemeidim aashom,
neitu eala tʼolbae lʼearata metua enye, arashu esakutore, arashu entalare, arashu empurrore enye.
Nadol olekai malaika ogol edou aing'ua shumata; neishopokoki eng'atamboi neata olakira Ai tʼelukunya enye, netiu engomom enye anaa engolong' o nkejek enyena anaa ng'apeta enkima,
neata tʼengaina enye enkiti kitabu nabolo, neroro tʼenkeju enye e tatene enaiposha, neroro tʼenkeju e kedyanye enkop.
Nebuak tʼoltoilo sapuk anaa peipurrito olng'atuny. Ore pebuak, neiro ndarat naapishana too ltoiloi lenye,
Ore peiro nena darat naapishana too ltoiloi lenye, najo asir; naning' oltoilo aing'ua shumata naajoki: Teena enairoro nena darat naapishana, tʼolmishire; misir ninje!
Ore ilo malaika latadua eitashe tʼenaiposha o tʼenkop, nedumu engaina enye e tatene aitorioki shumata,

neituruj te ilo oishiu metabaiki nkatan pookin o nkatan pookin, ninye oitobira shumata o ntokitin naatii atua, o enkop te nebo o naatii atua, o enaiposha o naatii atua, ajo pemeitoki aatai engai kata,
kake ore too ngolong'i oltoilo lʼolmalaika le opishana, teni eosh emowuo, neitabaiari emikio Engai, neijia anaa peitayolo singan lenyena loora layolounok.
Naaitoki airorie oltoilo latoning'o aing'ua shumata naajoki: Nno, tudumu enda kiti kitabu nabolo, natii engaina e ilo malaika ororita tʼenaiposha o tʼenkop.
Nalo nanu enetii olmalaika najoki: Njooki ena kiti kitabu! Naajoki ninye: Nko, toijoi, kintaduar engoshoke ino, kake ore tʼenkutuk, emelok anaa enaisho.
Nadumu nanu ena kiti kitabu tʼengaina olmalaika naijoo, nemelok ninye tʼenkutuk ai anaa enaisho; ore paidip ataama, neduaru engoshoke ai.
Naajoki ninye: meata kata nimintoki iye aitayolo mbaak e akenya too loshon o loreren o nkutukie o ilkarsisi kumok.
Naaishori nanu entiani anaa eng'udi, naajoki obo: Nyo, tetema engaji sinyati Engai o olperere lʼenkidasare o kulo ooserem tiatua.
Ore ilo leng'oti ti aulo engaji sinyati, nturraki oriong', nimitem! Amu eishooki loreren lemeata Engai, nepuonu aaroro engang' sinyati lapaitin artam o are.
Nalaisho iljaken lainei aare, peitayolou ninje mbaak e akenya ngolong'i iip tomon o iip are o ntomoni ile, eishopo ilguniani.
Kulo lelo oirienito aare o lelo kilang'eta aare, ooitashe tʼengomom Olaitoriani lʼenkop.
Naa ten eyeu oltung'ani near ninje, nepuku enkima too nkutukie enye, nenya ilmang'ati lenye, ore oltung'ani pookin oyeu neitame ninje, neari ninye metua.
Neata lelo engolon naigenye ninje shumata too ngolong'i enkitayolounoto enye, pemesha, neata engolon naibelekenyie engare metaa osarge, near enkop tʼentaboi pookin nayeu naarie.
Ore peitabaia enjakenishu enye, nearare ninje ina ng'wes naing'ua easuroto, negilu ninje, near metuata.
Neirrag mpopong'i enye tʼengoitoi e ina ang' sapuk, naji tʼemumuaishu: Sodom o Misri, enetooshokoki si Olaitoriani esalaba.
Ore kulekai loo loshon o nkishomitie o nkutukie o loreren, nedol mpopong'i enye ngolong'i uni o nusu, nemeisho mpopong'i enye metunukari too nkuraren.
Neng'idakino ninje kulo oomanya atua enkop, nerany tʼenjipai, neirriwakino ninje nkishoorot aten; amu eisilo kulo ayolounok aare lelo ootii enkop.
Ore peishunye ngolong'i uni o nusu, nejing' Olmumua lʼenkishui oing'ua Engai, atua ninje, neitashe too nkejek enye, neibung' enkuretishu kitok kulo ootadua ninje.
Nening' ninje oltoilo sapuk oing'ua shumata ajoki ninje: Eleputu ene wueji! Neilep ninje aapuo shumata tʼeng'atamboi, nedolita ilmang'ati lenye ninje.

Ore te ina saa neaku enkikirikirata sapuk enkop, neurori ematua e tomon engang': neari metuata tʼenkikirikirata enkop ngam elfun napishana, ore lootelekutua, nejing' enkuretishu, neitaa kitok Engai natii shumata.
Eidipa osina le are atulusoi, ng'orai, elotu osina li okuni asioki.

Neosh olmalaika le opishana emowuo. Neaku iltoiloi kituak ooing'ua shumata, nejo ninje: Eidipa enkarsishu olmaa ataa en Olaitoriani lang' o ne Kristos lenye, neitorisho metabaiki nkatan pookin o nkatan pookin.
Ore ilpaiyani tikitam o ong'wan ootoni tʼengomom Engai too lorikan lʼenkitoria, nebatata too ngomomi enye aaserem Engai,
nejo: Kiliki yook iye ashe, Olaitoriani o Engai magilani, litii taata, naa iye otii opa, tiaraki nitang'amua engolon ino kitok nintorisho;
negoro loreren, nelotu engoro ino o enkata naigwenakinyeki lootuata, neishori olkwaje singan linono loora layolounok o sinyat o kulo ooure engarna ino, looti o ilkituak, neiminyeki looiminye enkop.
Neboli engaji sinyati Engai te shumata, nedoli osanduku lʼosotua lenye tiatua engaji enye, neaku enkiwang'ata o iltoiloi o endarata o enkikirikirata enkop o enjan oo soito sapuk.
Nelioi olponoto kitok te shumata, naa eng'oroyoni naishopokoki engolong' netii olapa abori oo nkejek enyena, ore shumata elukunya enye, netii olmarisian lʼenkitoria loata lakir tomon o aare.
Nemena ninye neishir ninye tʼemion eishoi.
Neitoki alioi olekai ponoto te shumata, naa ng'orai, entiamasi sapuk nanyokie, naata lukuny naapishana o mowuarak tomon, netii shumata oo lukuny enyena nkeenda enkitoria naapishana:
ore ol-kidong'oi lenye, neyetaa ematua e uni oo lakir anang'aki enkop, neitashe ina tiamasi tʼengomom e ina ng'oroyoni naata emion eishoi, peiye, teni eisho, eijoo enkerai enye.
Neiu ninye engaiyoni, naa ninye olairrita loreren lemeata Engai pookin tʼeng'udi esekengei. Neilepieki enkerai enye enetii Engai o olorika lenye lʼenkitoria.
Neilanyisho ina ng'oroyoni alo ang'ata, ewueji naitobiraka Engai ninye, peitotii ninye ngolong'i iip tomon o iip are o ntomoni ile.
Nejing' olarrabal shumata. Ore Mikael o ilmalaikan lenyena nearare entiamasi; nearare si entiamasi te nebo o ilmalaikan lenyena,
nemegilu nemeitokini aatum ewueji enye te shumata.
Nenang'uni abori entiamasi kitok, naa ninye olasurai musana, oji oloirirua o satan, oitapong'oo olmaa pookin; etanang'uaki enkop o ilmalaikan lenyena te nebo o ninye.

Naning' oltoilo kitok te shumata ojo: Etaa taata enkitopuata o engolon o enkarsishu nʼEngai ang', o enkitoria en e Kristos lenye, tiaraki naiturraiyoki olaitang'oroni loo lalashera lang', oitang'oro ninje tʼEngai dama o kiarie.
Etigilutua ninje tʼosarge lʼembalelo o tʼororei lʼenjakenishu enye, neitu enyor empuan enye metabaiki enkea.
Onaa, enting'idata, ndai shumat o loomanya tiatua. Ee, kake aiya kulo oomanya tʼenkop o tʼenaiposha. Amu elotu satan adoiki ndai, neata engoro sapuk, neyolo ajo enkiti kata ake eata.
Ore pedol ina tiamasi ajo etanang'aki aitadou enkop, neipirrioki ina ng'oroyoni natoiwuo engaiyoni.
Neishori ina ng'oroyoni naipuko are naaijo nʼolmotony kitok, peipirri ninye alo ang'ata ewueji enye, eneitotiyeki enkata nabo o nkatan are o enusu kata, tʼengomom entiamasi.
Neiponyaki entiamasi engare ina ng'oroyoni tʼenkutuk enye anaa olkeju lʼengare, pewuapaa engare ninye.
Kake etaretoko enkop eng'oroyoni abol enkutuk aijoo ina are naiponya entiamasi tʼenkutuk enye.
Negoroki entiamasi eng'oroyoni, nelo ninye aarare kulo lʼeishoi enye ootelekutua, lepon eibung'ita nkitanapat Engai, neata enjakenishu e Yesus.

Naitashe tʼosunyai lʼenaiposha, nadol eng'wes naing'ua enaiposha, naata mowuarak tomon o lukuny naapishana, neata shumata oo mowuarak enyena ilkarandan lʼenkitoria tomon, neata shumata oo lukuny enyena ngam oo morot.

Ore ina ng'wes, padol, netiu anaa olowuaru keri, netiu nkejek enyena anaa nʼemuny, netiu enkutuk enye anaa enkutuk olng'atuny, neisho entiamasi ninye engolon enye o olorika lenye lʼenkitoria o enkidimata kitok.
Nadol elukunya enye nabo naijo etaremoki metua; ore ilo bae lenye lʼenkea, neishiu, neing'asia enkop pookin tekurum ina ng'wes,
neserem ninje entiamasi, amu eishoo eng'wes engolon, neserem ninje eng'wes nejo: Kang'ai onyanyukie eng'wes, naa ng'ai oidim ataarare ninye?
Neishooki ninye enkutuk nairorie mbaak sapuki o ildeketa; neishooki ninye engolon metabaiki lapaitin artam o are.
Nebol ninye enkutuk enye amor Engai, nemor engarna enye o engaji enye o kulo oomanyita shuniata.
Neishooki ninye metaarare sinyat negilu ninje; neishooki ninye engolon meitoria enkishomi o enkutuk o olorere pookin.
Neserem ninye kulo pookin oomanya atua engop, leitu esira ngam enye tʼenkitabu empuan Embalelo nataraki, opa tʼenkiterunoto olmaa.
Oloata enkiyok, njening'!
Teni epik oltung'ani atua engaji eenata, nelo si ninye atua engaji eenata; teni ear obo tʼolalem metua, meata kata nemeari si ninye tʼolalem metua. Ene etii olng'iria o enkirukoto oo sinyat.
Nadol engai ng'wes eilepu aing'ua enkop; neata ninye mowuarak are, anaa embalelo, neiro si ninye anaa entiamasi.
Neasishore ninye engolon e ina ng'wes enkiterata, tʼengomom enye; neisho enkop o pookin oomanya atua meteserema ina ng'wes elukunya, idya naishiuwo eremoto enye enkea;
neitobir ilponot kituak, oo meitadou enkima aitung'ua shumata tʼengomom oo ltung'anak,
neitapong'oo kulo oomanya atua enkop tʼolbae loo lponot oishooki ninye, peas tʼengomom e ina ng'wes; nejoki kulo oomanya atua enkop, peitobir aten emua e ina ng'wes naata olbae t'olalem neishiu.
Neishooki ninye meishoo enkiyang'et ina mua, peiro ina mua eng'wes, neisho metaari metuata kulo leitu eserem emua eng'wes.
Nearaki ninje pookin, looti o ilkituak, ladupak o laisinak, loolakuno o singan, metipiki ninje olkigeroto tʼengaina enye e tatene arashu tʼenkirribo enye,
pemeidim oltung'ani ainyang'u arashu atimira, leme elde oata olkigeroto lʼengarna e ina ng'wes ana esiana engarna enye
Ene etii eng'eno. Oloata endamunoto, njemus esiana eng'wes; amu era esiana oltung'ani, nera esiana enye iip ile o ntomoni ile o ile.
Nadol ina Balelo eitashe tʼoldonyo le Sion o te nebo o ninye iltung'anak elfun iip o artam o ong'wan, ooata engarna enye o engarna e Menye etisiraki too nkirribon enye.
Naning' nanu oltoilo oing'ua shumata, laijo oltoilo loo ngariak kumok; laijo si oloo ndarat kituak; ore ilo toilo latoning'o, netiu anaa oloo laoshok lʼenkinanda eoshito enkinanda.

Nerany ninje Osingolio ng'ejuk tʼengomom olorika lʼenkitoria o tʼengomom oo nena ng'wesi ong'wan o tʼengomom oo lelo paiyani; nemetii oltung'ani oidim aiteng'enuoi ilo singolio neme lelo tung'anak elfun iip o artam o ong'wan, ooinyang'uaki tʼenkop.

Naa ninje leitu epiki oloirerio te nebo o ng'oroyok, — amu era ninje ntoiye — o kulo oosujita Embalelo ewueji pookin enelo. Nera ninje ooinyang'uaki tiatua iltung'anak metaa ilmomo lʼenkiterata lʼEngai o lʼEmbalelo.
Neitu etumi too nkutukie enye elejare, amu meata entibili.
Nadol olmalaika eipirri agiroo te shumata, oata lomon lʼeng'ida loo nkatan pookin, peinosaki kulo oomanya atua enkop o loreren o njomito o nkutukie o loshon pookin,
nejo ninye tʼoltoilo kitok: Entureita Engai ninjosho ninye enkitook; amu eewuo enkata enkigwena enye. Entasai ele oitobira shumata o enkop o enaiposha o ngonyek oo ngariak.
Nesuju olekai malaika ajo: etabatate, etabatate Babilon, ina ang' kitok, naitooko loreren lemeata Engai pookin tʼenaisho torrono entalare enye.
Nesuju olekai malaika li okuni ninye otejo tʼoltoilo kitok: Teni eserem oltung'ani eng'wes o emua enye neng'amu olkigeroto tʼenkirribo enye ana tʼengaina enye,
nelaok ninye si enaisho engoro Engai, natubukokoki atua enkikombe engoro enye, eitu eitushuli, neisili tʼenkima o tʼenkibiriti tʼengomom oo lmalaikan sinyat o nʼEmbalelo.
Neilep empuruo enkisiloto enye shumata metabaiki nkatan pookin, nemeata ninje eng'ieng'ata dama o kiarie, lelo ooteserema eng'wes o emua enye, o olotang'amua olkigeroto lʼengarna enye.
Ene etii olng'iria loo sinyat, netii kulo looibung' nkitanapat Engai o enkirukoto e atua Yesus.
Naning' oltoilo oing'ua shumata ejo: Tisira! Teshi lootuata looe tiatua Olaitoriani eba taata. Esipa, ejo Olmumua, ajo epuo aaeng'ieng'a ninje too nyamalareitin enye, amu esuj nkitobirat enye ninje.
Nadol, naa ng'orai, eng'atamboi naibor. Ore tʼeng'atamboi neton obo, laijo Oinoti lʼoltung'ani, neata olkaranda lʼenkitoria lʼesahabu tʼelukunya enye, neata tʼengaina enye emundo napi.
Nepuku olekai malaika aing'ua engaji sinyati, nebuaki tʼoltoilo kitok ilo otonita te shumata eng'atamboi: Rriwai emundo ino, tudung'o; amu eewuo enkata enkisambuare, amu etoiyo enkisambuare enkop.
Ore ilo otonita eng'atamboi, nenang'aki emundo enye enkop, neisambuni enkop.
Nepuku olekai malaika aing'ua engaji sinyati natii shumata, neata emundo napi.

Nepuku olekai malaika aing'ua olperere lʼenkidasare, oata engolon aitore enkima, neipot ninye ilo oata emundo napi tʼoltoilo kitok: Rriu emundo ino napi nidung' ilmomo lʼoljani lʼolmarua lʼenkop; amu eoto nkululu enyena.
Nenang'u olmalaika emundo enye enkop nedung' ilmomo lʼoljani lʼolmarua lʼenkop, nenang'aki ninje atua enkironyet engoro kitok Engai.
Neironyi ina kironyet ti aulo engang', nepuku osarge tiatua enkironyet metabaiki sekenge oo nkutukie oo mbartan; neba engadoro anaa nang'arot osoit iip tomon o iip ile.
Nadol olekai ponoto kitok naing'asiai naleng' te shumata. Naa ilmalaikan oopishana, ooata ntabo naapishana naabaiye, amu ninje, peishunye engoro Engai.

Nadol entoki anaa enaiposha e bilauri nashulare enkima. Ore kulo ootigilutua aaing'ua enetii eng'wes o emua enye o olkigeroto lenye o esiana engarna enye, neitashe tʼembata e ina aiposha e bilauri neata ngauoi oo singolioitin lʼEngai,
nerany Osingolio le Mose, lʼosinga lʼEngai, o Osingolio lʼEmbalelo, nejo: Kituak nkitobirat inono neing'asiai, Olaitoriani, Engai magilani. Supati ngoitoi inono nesipa, lekarsis loo loreren.
Kang'ai, lemeata kata nimikiure, Olaitoriani, nemeitaa engarna ino kitok? Amu iye ake ora sinyati; amu epuonu loreren pookin nikiserem; amu eidipaki aatabolu nkigwenat inono.
Ore peishunye kuna, nadol eboluni engaji sinyati olng'obor lʼenjakenishu te shumata,
nepuku aaing'ua engaji sinyati lelo malaikan oopishana ooata ntabo naapishana, eishopokoki olkila oibor lemeata entioto, neteenikiaki nkimeitani esahabu ilgoon lenye.
Ore nabo too nena ng'wesi ong'wan, neisho lelo malaikan oopishana ngirran esahabu naapishana naabore engoro Engai naishiu metabaiki nkatan pookin o nkatan pookin.
Neigany engaji sinyati empuruo naing'ua enkitook Engai o engolon enye; nemetii oltung'ani oidim atijing'a engaji sinyati, metabana neishunye ntabo naapishana oo lmalaikan oopishana.
Naning' oltoilo kitok oing'ua engaji sinyati, ojoki ilmalaikan oopishana: Enjom, entubukoki nena girran naapishana naabore engoro Engai, enkop.
Nelo ol elukunya abukoki engirra enye tʼenkop, nejing' iltuduta torrok naleng' iltung'anak ooata olkigeroto lʼeng'wes neserem emua enye.
Nebukoki oli are engirra enye atua enaiposha; neaku enaiposha osarge anaa lʼoltung'ani otua, nee iltauja ooishiu pookin ootii atua enaiposha.
Nebukoki oli okuni engirra enye atua ilkejek loo ngariak o atua ngonyek oo ngariak, neaku ninje osarge.
Naning' olmalaika loo ngariak ejo: Olaitoriani, iye ora supat, litii taata, naa iye otii opa, lora sinyati, tiaraki ningwenaka neijia,
amu eibukoitie sargeta loo sinyat o loo layolounok, ninjoo iye ninje osarge metooko, amu eaku too ninje.
Naning' nanu olekai malaika lʼolperere ejo: Ee, Laitoriani Engai, tʼengolon pookin, esipa nkigwenat inono naa supati.
Nebukoki oli ong'wan engirra enye atua engolong', neishori ninye metapejo iltung'anak tʼenkima.
Nepeji iltung'anak tʼenkirowuaj kitok, nedek ninje engarna Engai, naata engolon oo kuna tabo, neitu eala aaitaa ninye kitok.
Nebukoki ole imiet engirra enye shumata olorika lʼenkitoria lʼeng'wes, neaku enkarsishu enye enaimin; neony ninje ilng'ejepa lenye tʼemion,
nedek Engai te shumata tʼolbae loo mioitin o tʼolbae loo ltuduta lenye, neitu eala aaing'ua nkitarruot enye.
Nebukoki ole ile engirra enye shumata emoipo kitok Farati, nemita engare enye, peitobirakini ilkarsisi lʼenkilepunoto engolong' engoitoi naimu.
Nadol epuku ilmumuan duruk okuni tʼenkutuk entiamasi o tʼenkutuk eng'wes o tʼenkutuk olayolounoni lʼelejare, ootiu anaa nduan;
amu era ninje ilmumuan loo loiriruani ooas ilponot, nepuo ngaloli pookin olmaa enetii ilkarsisi, aaiturrurroki ninje enjore engolong' kitok Engai, lʼengolon pookin.
Ng'orai, alotu anaa olapurroni. Tesh oloishololo, neiteng'el ilkilani lenyena, pemelo meishopo nedoli enkurruna enye.
Neiturrurroki ninje eweji neji t'enkutuk oo Lhebrayoi: Harmagedon.
Nebukoki ole opishana engirra enye atua olng'inai. Nepuku oltoilo kitok oing'ua shumata tʼenetii olorika lʼenkitoria lʼEngai, nejo: Eidipe.
Neaku enkiwang'ata o iltoiloi o ndarat, neaku enkikirikirata enkop kitok, neitu eaku enkikirikirata kitok naba nji, eiter enkata natii iltung'anak tʼenkop.
Neoro ina ang' kitok aaku matuan uni, neurori ngang'itie oo loreren lemeata Engai. Nedamuni Babilon, ena ang' kitok, tʼengomom Engai, peisho ninye enkikombe enaisho engoro napi enye.
Neilanyisho looigeruno lʼenaiposha, neitu eitokini aadol ildonyo.
Nedou enjan sapuk oo soito neshaiki iltung'anak, neba anaa mosor. Nedek iltung'anak Engai tʼolbae lʼentaboi enjan oo soito, amu entaboi sapuk naleng'.
Nelotu obo too lelo malaikan oopishana ooata nena girran naapishana, naairorie nanu ajoki: Wou ene, amu ayeu naaitadol iye ena ng'oroyoni entalare kitok, naton too ngariak kumok,
neas ilkarsisi lʼenkop mbaak torrok entalare te nebo o ninye, nemerai loomanya atua enkop tʼenaisho entalare enye.
Naanap ninye tʼolmumua metabaiki ang'ata, nadol eng'oroyoni natonita shumata eng'wes nanyokie naleng', nabore ngam oo morot, neata lukuny naapishana o mowuarak tomon.

Neishopokino ina ng'oroyoni olkila odo o olonyokie, neikodo tʼesahabu o too soito sidan o musetani enkinyang'a kitok naleng', neata enkikombe esahabu tʼengaina enye, nabore ntorrok o loirerion lʼentalare enye,
nesira tʼenkirribo enye engarna, naa emikio aiko nji: Babilon kitok, ng'otonye entalare o noo mbaak torrok enkop.
Nadol nanu ina ng'oroyoni etemere tʼosarge loo sinyat o tʼosarge loo ljaken le Yesus. Naing'asia naleng', padol ninye.
Naajoki olmalaika: Ainyo ping'asia? Aaliki iye emikio e ina ng'oroyoni o nʼeng'wes nanap ninye neata lukuny naapishana o mowuarak tomon.

Ore ina ng'wes nitadua, opa etii, nemetii taata, neitoki elailepu aing'ua easuroto e satan, nejing' erruoroto, nepuo aaing'asia loomanya atua enkop, leitu esiri ngam enye tiatua enkitabu empuan tʼenkiterunoto olmaa, teni edol eng'wes, ajo etii opa, nemetii taata, neitoki atii.
Ene etii endamunoto naata eng'eno: Ore lukuny naapishana, naa ildonyo oopishana ootonita eng'oroyoni, naa ilkarsisi oopishana.
Ore imiet etabatatate, netii obo taata, neton eitu elotu olekai; ore teni elotu, nemeata kata nemebik enkiti kata.
Ore eng'wes, natii opa, nemetii taata, naa ole isiet otii atua lelo oopishana, nelo ninye atua erruoroto.
Ore nona mowuarak tomon nitadua, naa ilkarsisi tomon, leton eitu eng'amu enkarsishu; kake epuo aatum engolon anaa ilkarsisi esaa nabo te nebo o eng'wes.
Naa enkigwena nabo eata kulo, neisho engolon o enkidimata enye eng'wes.
Naa ninje ooarare Embalelo, negilu Embalelo ninje (amu ninye Olaitoriani loo laitoriak o Olkarsis loo lkarsisi), o te nebo o ninye looipotokoki o lootegeluaki o lairukok.
Naajoki nanu: Ore ngariak nitadua, naatonita ina ng'oroyoni entalare, naa loshon o siamin o loreren o nkutukie.
Ore nona mowuarak tomon nitadua, o eng'wes, naa kulo ooibai ina ng'oroyoni entalare, neing'ua ninye openy meishopo, nenya ninje nkiri osesen lenye, nepejoo ninye katukul tʼenkima.
Amu etipika Engai atua iltauja lenye, peitobir enayeu ninye, neas enkigwena nabo, neisho enkarsishu enye eng'wes, metabana neitabaiari rorei lʼEngai.
Ore ina ng'oroyoni nitadua, naa engang' kitok, naata enkarsishu aitore ilkarsisi lʼenkop.
Ore peishunye kuna, nadol olekai malaika otadouo aing'ua shumata, oata engolon kitok, newang'u enkop tʼenkitook enye.
Nedar ninye tʼoltoilo kitok ajo: Etabatate, etabatate Babilon, idya kitok, neaku olmuate loo loiriruani o enkibooroto oo lmumuan duruk pookin o enkibooroto oo ntaritik duruk naaibai pookin.
Amu etooko loreren lemeata Engai pookin enaisho engoro entalare enye, neas ilkarsisi lʼenkop mbaak torrok entalare te nebo o ninye, nedupore lamirak lʼenkop tʼengolon olng'warra lenye.
Naning' olekai toilo oing'ua shumata ojo: Entung'ai atua ninye, olorere lai, piming'arierie nkitarruot enyena, nimitumutumu si ntabo enyena.
Amu eilepu nkitarruot enyena aabaiki shumata, nedamu Engai ng'ok enyena.
Entalaaki ninye anaa petalaaka si ninye, ningilielie tʼerisioroto oo nkitobirat enyena. Ore enkikombe natubukoko, nibukokiki ninye aigil are.
Anaa peitaa kion kitok neitumuru kion, neijia enjoo ninye osina o enkilishoto naba nji. Amu ejo ninye tʼoltau lenye: Aton ara enkarsis, mara engoliai, namadol enkilishoto tukul.
Onaa, epuonu ntabo enyena engolong' nabo: enkea, enkilishoto, enkure, nepejori ninye tʼenkima katukul, amu egol Engai Olaitoriani oigwenaki ninye.
Nepuo aaishiraki neilishoki ninye ilkarsisi lʼenkop ootaasa mbaak torrok entalare neiguran te nebo o ninye, teni edol empuruo empejoto enye.
Nepuo aaitashe tʼenelakwa tʼenkuretishu emion enye nejo: Oi, kake aiya, ena ang' kitok Babilon, engang' naikarra, amu kitabaikia tʼesaa nabo enkigwena ino.
Nepuo lamirak lʼenkop aaishiraki ninye neilishoki, tiaraki nemekure etii oltung'ani oinyang'u ntokitin enye,

anaa nʼesahabu, o noo ngoshola, o noo soito oogol enkinyang'a, o soito ooji lulu, o ilkarashi oopuyapui neibor, o ilkilani oodo, o le hariri, o nkilani naanyokio, o pooki shani orropil, o pooki toki oo lala loo ljang'ito sapukin, o pooki toki naitobirieki lkeek sidan, o noo suia, o noo sekenge, o nʼosoit owang',

o ngabobok oo mdalasini, o ngoirienito naairishoreki, o eilata narropil, o ilbani, o enaisho, o eilata lʼoljani, o entaba naibor, o engano, o nkishu, o ntare, o mbartan, o ilgarrin, o seseni o iltauja loo ltung'anak;
o ilmomo ootonyorra oltau lino, kitung'aitie, o ntokitin pookin naapir o naaikishaan, kitulusoitie, nimintoki adol katukul.
Ore lamirak loo nona masaa, ootudupore ninje, nepuo aaitashe tʼenelakwa tʼenkuretishu emion enye, eishir neilish
aajo: Kake aiya, aiya, aiya ena ang' kitok, naishopokoki nkilani naapuyapui neibor, o nkilani naado, o nkilani naanyokio, neikodi tʼesahabu o too soito oogol enkinyang'a o too lulu!
Amu tʼesaa nabo eitarruoiyoki masaa kumok naaba nji. O ilkituak loo meilini pookin, o pookin ooasisho too meilini, o pookin ooitobirisho tʼenaiposha, neitashe tʼenelakwa,
neishir pedol empuruo empejoto enye nejo: Kaa ang' narisiore ena ang' tʼenkitook?

Nepik ninje enterit shumata oo lukuny enye, nebuak aaishir, neilish, nejo: Kake aiya, aiya ena ang' kitok nainotie endupoto kulo pookin looata meilini tʼenaiposha, too masaa enyena, amu eitarruoiyoki tʼesaa nabo.
Enting'idakinoto ndai ninye, iye shumata, o ndai sinyat o lairriwak o layolounok; amu eigwenaka Engai ninye enkigwena inyi.
Nedumu olmalaika ogol osoit kitok laijo osoit oituutishoreki anang'aki atua enaiposha, nejo: Neijia eurokini enkop tʼolkutati kitok nabo Babilon, ena ang' kitok, nemeitokini ninye aadol tukul;

nemeitokini aaning' tiatua iye oltoilo loo loosh engauo oo singolioitin o loosh nkisuleta o ndulen o mowuarak; nemeitokini aatum tiatua iye oltung'ani arriya lʼenkyas engarriyano oo nabo; nemeitokini aaning' tiatua iye oltoilo loo soito ooituut engano tukul;

nemeitoki ailang'isho tiatua iye eong'an enkilang'et, nemeitokini aaning' oltoilo lʼosanja o lʼesanja tiatua iye. Amu era opa lamirak linono ilkituak lʼenkop; amu esakutore ino naitapong'oiye loreren pookin lʼenkop;
nenyorrikini tiatua ninye osarge loo layolounok o loo sinyat o loo kulo pookin ootaraki tʼenkop.
Ore peishunye kuna, naning' oltoilo loo siamin kituak te shumata, oojo: Haleluya! Ore enkitopuata o enkitook o engolon, njeaku nʼEngai ang',
amu esipa naa supati nkigwenaitin enyena, tiaraki naigwenaka ninye ina ng'oroyoni entalare, naitarruoiye enkop pookin tʼentalare enye, netalaakaki osarge loo singan lenyena ngaik enyena.
Nejo ninje kat are: Haleluya! neilep empuruo enye alo shumata metabaiki nkatan pookin o nkatan pookin.
Ore lelo paiyani tikitam o ong'wan o ng'wesi ong'wan, nebatata aaserem Engai naton tʼolorika lʼenkitoria aajo: Amen. Haleluya!
Nelotu oltoilo oing'ua olorika lʼenkitoria ojo: Entadarai Engai ang', ndai singan lenyena pookin o kulo ooure ninye pokira, looti o ilkituak.
Naning' nanu anaa oltoilo loo siamin kituak, o anaa oltoilo loo ngariak kituak, o anaa oltoilo loo ndarat naagol, ejo: Haleluya! Amu etang'amua Engai ang', Olaitoriani tʼengolon pookin, enkarsishu.
Mating'idata nikining' enjipai, maitaa ninye kitok, amu etabaua enkiama Embalelo neitobirakino eng'oroyoni enye,
neishooki ninye meishopo olkila sidai oibor naleng'; amu ore olkila oibor sidai, naa supaton oo sinyat.
Naajoki: Tisira! Teshi kulo ooipotokoki endaata Embalelo. Naajoki: Ore kulo, naa rorei oosipa lʼEngai.

Nabatatakino nkejek enyena aserem ninye. Naajoki ninye: Ng'orai, minko neijia! Amu ara olang'arani lino o loo lalashera linono o loo kulo ooata enjakenishu e Yesus. Teserema Engai! Amu ore enjakenishu e Yesus, naa Olmumua lʼenkitayolounoto.
Nadol shumata etabole, naa ng'orai, embarta naibor. Ore olokedito neji: Supat, nesipa, neigwenu neara tʼesupato.
Netiu ngonyek enyena anaa olng'ejep lʼenkima, neata tʼelukunya enye nkeenda enkitoria kumok, neata ninye engarna natisiraki, nemetii olekai otayolo, leme ninye ake.
Neishopito ninye olkila osuakino osarge, neji engama enye Ororei lʼEngai.
Nesujita ninye iltimito le shumata ookedito mbartan naaibor, neishopito nkilani naaibor sidan naleng'.
Nepuku olalem opi tʼenkutuk enye naarie loreren lemeiruk pookin; neirrita ninje tʼeng'udi esekengei, neroro ninye enkironyet enaisho engoro kitok Engai magilani.
Neata tʼolkila lenye o tʼenkupes enye engarna nasira: Olkarsis loo lkarsisi o Olaitoriani loo laitoriak.
Nadol olmalaika oitashe tiatua engolong' nedar tʼoltoilo kitok nejoki ilmotonyi pookin ooipirri te shumata: Wotu, enturrurrokinoto endaata kitok Engai,
pinyanya nkiri oo lkarsisi o noo mbartan o noo kulo ookedito ninje o nkiri oo loolakuno o noo singan, noo looti o lkituak.
Nadol eng'wes o ilkarsisi lʼenkop o iltimito lenyena lʼenjore eiturrurrote aarare ilo okedito embarta, o iltimito lenyena.

Neibung'i ina ng'wes te nebo o ilo ayolounoni lʼelejare, oitobira ilponot t'engomom enye neitapong'orie kulo ootang'amutua olkigeroto lʼeng'wes neserem emua eng'wes. Nenang'akini kulo pokira are eishiu atua olbalbal lʼenkima naiwuwu tʼenkibiriti.
Neari ilkulekai tʼolalem le ilo okedito embarta, ilo alem opuku tʼenkutuk enye. Neraposho ilmotonyi pookin too nkiri enye.
Nadol olmalaika edou aing'ua shumata neata embolet ewueji easuroto o olpisiai kitok tʼengaina enye.
Neibung' ninye entiamasi, ol opa asurai musana, lora oloirirua o satan, neen enkata oo larin iip tomon,

nenang'aki atua ewueji easuroto, neigenoo, neen shumata tʼolmishire, pemeitoki ninye aitapong'oo loreren, metabana neishunye larin iip tomon; ore peishunye lelo, meata kata nemelaki ninye enkiti kata.

Nadol lorikan, ore lelo ootonie ninje, neishooki enkigwena. Nadol iltauja loo kulo ootaraki tʼolbae lʼenjakenishu e Yesus o lʼororei lʼEngai, leitu eserem eng'wes o emua enye, neitu eng'amu olkigeroto tʼenkirribo o tʼengaina enye; neishiu neitore ninje te nebo o Kristos larin iip tomon.
Ore ilkulekai ootuata, neitu epiu metabana neishunye larin iip tomon. Ena empiunoto enkiterata.
Teshi o sinyat loong'ar empiunoto enkiterata, amu meata engai kea engolon nashororie ninje.
Ore peidipai larin iip tomon, nepuoi aalak satan aing'ua enkibooroto enye,
nepuku ninye aitapong'oo loreren ootii nkutot pokira ong'wan enkop, Goog o Magoog, neiturrur ninje aiko enjore, neba esiana enye anaa osunyai lʼenaiposha.
Neilep ninje metabaiki endapasho enkop, neman enkirragata oo sinyat o engang' nanyorri. Nedou enkima aing'ua shumata tʼEngai amut ninje.
Nenang'akini oloirirua oitapong'oiye, olbalbal lʼenkima o enkibiriti, enetii si eng'wes o olayolounoni lʼelejare; nepuoi aaitame dama o kiarie o nkatan pookin.
Nadol olorika lʼenkitoria kitok oibor, ore ilo otonie olorika, nedanya enkop o shumata engomom enye, nelai ewueji enye.

Nadol lootuata, ilkituak o looti, eitashe tʼengomom olorika lʼenkitoria, neboluni nkitabuni. Neboli engai kitabu, naa enkitabu empuan; neigwenakini lootuata too mbaak naatisiraki tiatua nkitabuni, tʼerisioroto oo nkitobirat enye.
Neitai enaiposha lootuata ootii atua ninye, neitai enkea o gehena lootuata ootii atua ninje; neigwenakini oltung'ani pookin tʼerisioroto oo nkitobirat enyena.
Nenang'akini enkea o gehena olbalbal lʼenkima. Naa ninye enkea e are, olbalbal lʼenkima.
Ore oltung'ani leitu etumi, etisiraki engarna enye tʼenkitabu empuan, nenang'akini olbalbal lʼenkima.
Nadol shumata ng'ejuk o enkop ng'ejuk, amu etulu soiye shumata elukunya o enkop elukunya,
nemekure etii enaiposha. Nadol engang' sinyati, Yerusalem ng'ejuk, edou te shumata aing'ua Engai, eitobiraki anaa esanja natakajakaki olmoruo lenye.

Naning' oltoilo kitok oing'ua olorika lʼenkitoria ejo: Ng'orai, emanyata Engai te nebo o iltung'anak, nelamany te nebo o ninje, nepuo aaku ninje loreren lenyena, netii ninye openy, Engai, e nebo o ninje.
Nelajutu Engai ilkiyo pookin too ngonyek enye nemeitoki atii enkea arashu enkilishoto arashu enkishirata arashu meitoki atii emion; amu etulusoitie mbaak elukunya.
Nejo ilo oton tʼolorika lʼenkitoria: Ng'orai, aitaa ntokitin pookin ng'ejuko. Naajoki: Tisira, amu supati kulo rorei nesipa.
Naajoki ninye: Eidipe. Ara nanu A o O, enkiterata o enkiting'oto. Ayeu naisho Oloata enkure tʼenjorro engare empuan pesho.
Ologilu, nelajung'u kuna pookin, naaku nanu Engai enye, neaku ninye engerai ai.

Kake ore looing'ashaa, o lemeiruk, o looisho osina, o larak, o looas mbaak torrok oo nkiri, o lasakutok, o looserem muain neme Engai, o lalejak pookin, nepuo aajing' olbalbal lʼengumoto, eneiwuwu enkima o enkibiriti; naa ninye enkea e are.
Nelotu obo too lelo malaikan oopishana ooata ngirran naapishana naaigany ntabo naapishana enkiting'oto, naairorie nanu ejo: Wou ene, maitadua ina ng'oroyoni, esanja Embalelo.
Naarik tʼolmumua shumata oldonyo kitok oado, naaitadol engang' kitok, Yerusalem sinyati, edou te shumata aing'ua Engai.
Neata ninye enkitook Engai, netiu enkilang'et enye osoit oji yaspis owang' naleng'.
Neata esundai sapuk naado, neata kishomini tomon o are, o shumata oo kishomini ilmalaikan tomon o are, netisiraki ngam too kishomini, naa ngam oo ntipati tomon o are oo nkera Israel.
Netii engalo nailepunye engolong' kishomini uni, netii empolos enkiarie kishomini uni, netii moikwape kishomini uni, o engalo nadoiyorie engolong' kishomini uni.
Neata esundai engang' ntonat tomon o are o tiatua ninje ngam oo lairriwak tomon o are lʼEmbalelo.
Ore ilo laairorie, neata entiani esahabu, peiye etem engang' o kishomini o esundai enyena.

Ore ina ang', neitorisi mbat pokira ong'wan, nerisioro engadoro o endapasho. Netem ninye engang' tʼentiani, neaku nang'arot osoit iip tomon kat tomon o are; nerisioro engadoro o endapasho o engadoro nailep engang'.
Netem esundai enye, nera ntemeta oo ngaik iip o artam o ong'wan, t'entemet oo ltung'anak naata olmalaika.
Ore enjetata esundai enye, naa yaspis, ore engang' naa esahabu sidai natiu anaa bilauri sidai.

Ore ntonat esundai engang', netakajaki too soito sidan oogol enkinyang'a. Ore entonata elukunya naa yaspis, ore en e are naa yakuti sidai, ore en e uni naa akiki naibor, ore en e ong'wan naa smaragid,

ore en e imiet naa akiki warikoi, ore en e ile naa akiki nanyokie, ore en e napishana naa sabariyadi, ore en e isiet naa smaragid nanyori, ore en e enturuj naa yakuti warikoi, ore en e tomon naa akiki nanyori, ore en e tomon o nabo, naa akiki naijo eng'atamboi, ore en e tomon o are naa ametistos.
Nera nena kishomini tomon o are soito sidan ooji lulu tomon o are, ore kishomi pookin, neitaunyeki lulu nabo. Ore ngoitoi engang', naa esahabu sidai, nawang' naleng' anaa bilauri berlel.
Neitu adol engaji sinyati tiatua, amu era Olaitoriani, Engai magilani, engaji sinyati enye, o Embalelo.
Nemeyeu ina ang' engolong' ana olapa, peilang'aki ninye, amu eilang'aki enkitook Engai ninye, ore enkilang'et enye, naa Embalelo.
Nepuo loreren aalimana tʼenkilang'et enye; neau ilkarsisi lʼenkop enkitook enye atua ninye.
Nemeitokini aaigen kishomini enyena dama, amu meitoki atii enkiarie ine.
Neau ninje enkitook o enganyit oo loreren aapik atua ninye.
Nemejing' atua ninye entoki duruki arashu enaitobir entorroni ana elejare, neme lelo ake ootisiraki ngam enye tiatua enkitabu empuan Embalelo oojing'.
Naaitadol ninye olkeju lʼengare empuan, nailiil anaa bilauri, naing'ua ilo orika lʼenkitoria lʼEngai o Embalelo.

Ore tʼempolos engoitoi enye, o too mbat pokira are olkeju, netii nkeek empuan, naata ilmomo mpukunot tomon o are, neiu ilmomo lenye olapa pookin, naa mbenek oo nena keek ninje naaishiunye loreren lemeata Engai.
Nemeitoki atii oldeket katukul. Naa ine etii olorika lʼenkitoria lʼEngai o Embalelo, nepuo singan lenyena aaisyayaki ninye
nedol ninje engomom enye, nepiki engarna enye too nkirribon enye.
Nemeitoki atii enkiarie katukul, nemeyeu enkilang'et, arashu eong'an engolong', amu Olaitoriani Engai, oisho ninje eong'an, neitore ninje metabaiki nkatan pookin o nkatan pookin.
Naajoki nanu: Era kulo rorei supati nesipa; eirriua Olaitoriani, Engai oo lmumuan loo layolounok, olmalaika lenye, meitadua singan lenyena ntokitin nemeata kata nemepuonu aasioki.
Ng'orai, alotu asioki. Tesh oloibung' rorei lʼenkitayolounoto tʼena kitabu.
Naa nanu, Yohanes, otoning'o nadol kuna baak. Ore paning' nadol, nabatatakino enkop, asai too nkejek olmalaika laaitadua nanu kuna baak.
Naajoki ninye: Ng'orai, minko neijia, amu ara si nanu osinga anaa iye o lalashera linono o kulo looibung' rorei lʼena kitabu. Tasaiya Engai!
Naajoki nanu: Mien rorei lʼenkitayolounoto lʼena kitabu tʼolmishire! Amu etinyikua enkata.
Olora torrono, njeaku torrono oade; olora duruki, njeaku duruki oade: kake olora supat, njeaku supat oade, o olora sinyati, njeaku sinyati oade.
Ng'orai, alotu asioki, netii olkwaje lai te nebo o nanu, paisho oltung'ani pookin anaa peikununo nkitobirat enyena.
Ara nanu A o O, enkiterata o enkiting'oto, ol elukunya o olobaiye.
Teshi kulo, looibung' nkitanapat enyena, petum engolon nang'arie nkeek empuan, nejing' too kishomini atua engang'.
Amu ti aulo etii ildiain o lasakutok o looas mbaak torrok oo nkiri, o larak, o looserem muain neme Engai, o pookin oonyor neitobir elejare.
Nanu, Yesus, oirriwaiye olmalaika lai, peijakenoki ndai kuna baak, naara noo sirito. Ara nanu entonai o enkishon e David, nara ilo akira lʼentadekenya oibor.
Nejo Olmumua o esanja: Wou! Ore ilo oning', metejo: Wou! Oloata enkure, njelotu; ore oloyeu, njeea engare empuan pesho!
Aijakenoki oltung'ani pookin oning' rorei lʼenkitayolounoto Eena kitabu: Teni eponiki ninje, nelaponiki Engai ninye ntabo naatisiraki tiatua ena kitabu.
Teni eitai oltung'ani too rorei l'enkitabu ena kitayolounoto, neitai si Engai ematua enye tiatua nkeek empuan o tiatua engang' sinyati, naatisiraki tiatua ena kitabu.
Ore ilo oijakenu kuna, nejo: Ee, alotu asioki. Amen, wou, Laitoriani Yesus!
Njebikie eng'adunoto Olaitoriani Yesus Kristos ndai pookin. Amen.
